language1_text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ, the son of David, the son of Abraham.
language2_text: O yamalavat rana ngarangaran do jya am ineynapo na ni Yeso Kizisto a sivovoong na ni Tawey. Si Tawey am sivovoong na ni Apolahan.

language1_text: Abraham begat Isaac; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren;
language2_text: O anak na ni Apolahan am si Isa. O anak na ni Isa am si Yakebo. O anak na ni Yakebo am si Yoda kano kakakteh na.

language1_text: and Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar; and Phares begat Esrom; and Esrom begat Aram;
language2_text: O anak na ni Yoda kani Tama am si Veyletse a kani Syala. O anak na ni Veyletse am si Heselon. O anak na ni Heselon am si Yalan.

language1_text: and Aram begat Aminadab; and Aminadab begat Naasson; and Naasson begat Salmon;
language2_text: O anak na ni Yalan am si Aminata. O anak na ni Aminata am si Nason. O anak na ni Nason am si Saarmen.

language1_text: and Salmon begat Booz of Rachab; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth; and Obed begat Jesse;
language2_text: O anak na ni Saarmen a kani Laha am si Poatse. O anak na ni Poatse a kani Lote am si Opeyte. O anak na ni Opeyte am si Yesi.

language1_text: and Jesse begat David the king; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias;
language2_text: O anak na ni Yesi am si Tawey. O anak na ni Tawey am si Solomen. O ina na am mina mavakes na ni Odiya.

language1_text: and Solomon begat Roboam; and Roboam begat Abia; and Abia begat Asa;
language2_text: O anak na ni Solomen am si Lopoan. O anak na ni Lopoan am si Apiya. O anak na ni Apiya am si Yasa.

language1_text: and Asa begat Josaphat; and Josaphat begat Joram; and Joram begat Ozias;
language2_text: O anak na ni Yasa am si Yesava. O anak na ni Yesava am si Yelan. O anak na ni Yelan am si Ociya.

language1_text: and Ozias begat Joatham; and Joatham begat Achaz; and Achaz begat Ezekias;
language2_text: O anak na ni Ociya am si Yetan. O anak na ni Yetan am si Ahatse. O anak na ni Ahatse am si Sisicya.

language1_text: and Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;
language2_text: O anak na ni Sisicya am si Manase. O anak na ni Manase am si Amen. O anak na ni Amen am si Yeseya.

language1_text: and Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren, about the time they were carried away to Babylon:
language2_text: No karakep da so Isedi a tao a yangay do Papilon am meytaodtod si Yeseya. O anak na am si Yoyacin a kano kakakteh na.

language1_text: and after they were brought to Babylon, Jechonias begat Salathiel; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel;
language2_text: Yangay da sira do Papilon am meytaodtod si Yekeniya. O anak na am si Salati. O anak na ni Salati am si Solopapey.

language1_text: and Zorobabel begat Abiud; and Abiud begat Eliakim; and Eliakim begat Azor;
language2_text: O anak na ni Solopapey am si Apio. O anak na ni Apio am si Idiacing. O anak na ni Idiacing am si Aso.

language1_text: and Azor begat Sadoc; and Sadoc begat Achim; and Achim begat Eliud;
language2_text: O anak na ni Aso am si Sato. O anak na ni Sato am si Asin. O anak na ni Asin am si Idio.

language1_text: and Eliud begat Eleazar; and Eleazar begat Matthan; and Matthan begat Jacob;
language2_text: O anak na ni Idio am si Idiasa. O anak na ni Idiasa am si Matan. O anak na ni Matan am si Yakebo.

language1_text: and Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary, of whom was born Jesus, who is called Christ.
language2_text: O anak na ni Yakebo am si Yoseyvo a kahanghangan ni Madiya. O meyngaran si Yeso am anak na ni Madiya. Si Yeso am Misayya.

language1_text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations.
language2_text: No ko vilangan am no yapwen ji Apolahan a kangay na ji Tawey am apat o ikarwa na (14) no katatapilan da rana. No yapwen ji Tawey a kangay na do nirakpan da so Isedi a yangay do Papilon am akman sang a apat so ikarwa (14) so katatapilan sira. No vilangan o niyan da no Isedi a tao do Papilon a kangay na do cinatazak na no Misayya am akman sang, ta apat so ikarwa (14) o katatapilan da.

language1_text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise: When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph, before they came together, she was found with child of the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Kasasaodan ni Yeso Kizisto no katazak na. Si Madiya a ina na a nitamtamkan ni Yoseyvo am ji pa nizomagpit do vahay da am katenngan na rana ni Madiya o kapangalavat na so metdeh, do kowyat na jya no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Then Joseph her husband, being a just man, and not willing to make her a publick example, was minded to put her away privily.
language2_text: O mangay na seksekan a tao a meyngaran so Yoseyvo am tey yapya o ahahapan na so vazay na do icyatatao na. Am ori o naknakman na sya do onowned na so kato na rana ngaolyan so tamtamek da. Ta ji nakzan o kapeyrengerengay da jya no tao a katenngan.

language1_text: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Naknakmen na o akman sang a vazay am mangay na patateynepan no tinsi ni Ama ta do to. Maniring am, "Mo Yoseyvo a sivovoong ni Tawey, ji ka nyahey. Ta ahapen mo si Madiya kataned mo do vahay. Ta o na alavaten am yapo do Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And she shall bring forth a son, and thou shalt call his name JESUS: for he shall save his people from their sins.
language2_text: Si Madiya am mangahanas so mahakay. No si malikey am ingaran mo jya si Yeso, ta iya o mapatastas so omraralay nya tao do peyraratenan da."

language1_text: Now all this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying,
language2_text: O aro a vazay eya am todey mangononong do mina ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. Ta o mina ciring na am,

language1_text: Behold, a virgin shall be with child, and shall bring forth a son, And they shall call his name Emmanuel, which being interpreted is, God with us.
language2_text: "Amyan so ji meylimoteng so onowned a mavakes a mangalavat so mahakay. O ngaran na am Imaneydi." O peypeypangayan na am, "Macilovot jyaten si Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him, and took unto him his wife:
language2_text: Mayokay si Yoseyvo am to na mangozai o mina ciring na jya no tinsi na ni Ama ta do to a mapasakay si Madiya.

language1_text: and knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son: and he called his name JESUS.
language2_text: Am no kaji na pa tazakan no kanakan a mahakay am ji pa nimacitovong si Yoseyvo ji Madiya. Matazak rana a tao o kanakan am ngaranan na ni Yoseyvo a si Yeso.

language1_text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judæ a in the days of Herod the king, behold, there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem,
language2_text: No kapeypanirsirngen da pa si Helote am matazak a tao si Yeso do Podiheng a ili do Yotay. O manitanita rana so mata no hanit a nimapo do teyhesa ka ili am mangay sira do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: saying, Where is he that is born King of the Jews? for we have seen his star in the east, and are come to worship him.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Wanjin jya o nimatazak a tao a panirsirngen no tao do Yotay. Ta namen nimacita o mata no hanit do daddan no araw a yongkad no kanimatazak na rana. Ori o namen nyai a yaomraralay nya."

language1_text: When Herod the king had heard these things, he was troubled, and all Jerusalem with him.
language2_text: Mamizing na no panirsirngen a meyngaran si Helote am marahet o onowned na. Akman sang sira o tao do Yelosaleng a mamogaw.

language1_text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together, he demanded of them where Christ should be born.
language2_text: Makarahan am lovoten na ni Helote o panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to. Maniring jira am, "Do wanjin o na katazakan no Misayya a ipanci da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa."

language1_text: And they said unto him, In Bethlehem of Judæ a: for thus it is written by the prophet,
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Do Podiheng a ili do Yotay. Ta o yadomket a ciriciring da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to am,

language1_text: And thou Bethlehem, in the land of Juda, Art not the least among the princes of Juda: For out of thee shall come a Governor, That shall rule my people Israel.
language2_text: 'Inyo rana tao a meyvahay do Podiheng a macinapnap do Yotay am tana ney likey na o ili nyo am ney manhama kamo a tao. Ta amyan jinyo so asa ka tao a makayokod ninyo a Isedi a tao.'"

language1_text: Then Herod, when he had privily called the wise men, enquired of them diligently what time the star appeared.
language2_text: Makarahan am lovoten na ni Helote a panirsirngen o manitanita so mata no hanit a tao a kapanahes na nya jira so araraw na no nipeytotwaw no mata no hanit ang.

language1_text: And he sent them to Bethlehem, and said, Go and search diligently for the young child; and when ye have found him, bring me word again, that I may come and worship him also.
language2_text: Makarahan am ipanci na sira mangay do Podiheng. Maniring jira am, "Pakapyahen nyo pala kalahen o kanakan ang. Si makala nyo am ipanci nyo jyaken, ta mangay ko a iraralay."

language1_text: When they had heard the king, they departed; and, lo, the star, which they saw in the east, went before them, till it came and stood over where the young child was.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring na am mangay rana sira. Makarahan am to da cita pa tomwaw o mata no hanit a nimacita da do daddan no araw a meypalanginan nira to meynonozey a mangay a someyked do nikatazakan a tao no kanakan ang.

language1_text: When they saw the star, they rejoiced with exceeding great joy.
language2_text: So nisaray da makacita so mata no hanit ang.

language1_text: And when they were come into the house, they saw the young child with Mary his mother, and fell down, and worshipped him: and when they had opened their treasures, they presented unto him gifts; gold, and frankincense, and myrrh.
language2_text: Somdep sira do vahay am macita da o kanakan a kano ina na si Madiya. Am ori o nilogod da amraralay no kanakan ang. Makarahan am babahen da rana o nipalolo da ovay a kano mahangno a haneng a kano makdeng a kosozi a yazaw da sya.

language1_text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod, they departed into their own country another way.
language2_text: Meysinaoli sira o manitanita so mata no hanit a tao am patareken na o rarahan da ni Ama ta do to, do kanimapatateynep na jira a jyangay ji Helote a panirsirngen.

language1_text: And when they were departed, behold, the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream, saying, Arise, and take the young child and his mother, and flee into Egypt, and be thou there until I bring thee word: for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him.
language2_text: Mangay rana sira am patateynepan na si Yoseyvo no tinsi ni Ama ta do to. Maniring jya am, "Peyvangon rana kangay mo nira meyina a somazok do Ayci, kato nyo ngyanan dang a meyvahay mangay no ipanci ko na inyo a komaro do dang. Ta si Helote am na kalahen o kanakan a yawakwaken."

language1_text: When he arose, he took the young child and his mother by night, and departed into Egypt:
language2_text: Am ori o nyangayan na ni Yoseyvo nira meyina do Ayci a meyvahay do dang,

language1_text: and was there until the death of Herod: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet, saying, Out of Egypt have I called my son.
language2_text: mangay do nikawakwak ni Helote. O icyakman na sang no vazay am pangononongan na o mina ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. Ta maniring am, "Nipeysinaoli ko o anak ko a apo do Ayci."

language1_text: Then Herod, when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men, was exceeding wroth, and sent forth, and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem, and in all the coasts thereof, from two years old and under, according to the time which he had diligently enquired of the wise men.
language2_text: Katenngan ni Helote o kanimlita da jya no manitanita so mata no hanit am meyoyaoya. Am ori o nipanovoy na so itaysang a mangay omwakwak so anak da mahakay a mablit rana adwa so kakawakawan a kano jyablit pa so ikadwa so kakawakawan a minalikey do Podiheng a kado peycyeylilyan na, do gazagazan na so araraw no nipakacittan da so mata no hanit.

language1_text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet, saying,
language2_text: O icyakman na sang am todey mangononong o mina ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran so Yedimi. Ta maniring am,

language1_text: In Rama was there a voice heard, Lamentation, and weeping, and great mourning, Rachel weeping for her children, And would not be comforted, because they are not.
language2_text: "Makamizing do Lama so sivosivovoong ni Reyci a omlololos a amlavi do ananak da a jya nimakey a padnadnahen da so pahad, do kanimamimin no anak da niwakwak da."

language1_text: But when Herod was dead, behold, an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt,
language2_text: Mawakwak si Helote am patateynepan no tinsi ni Ama ta do to si Yoseyvo do Ayci.

language1_text: saying, Arise, and take the young child and his mother, and go into the land of Israel: for they are dead which sought the young child's life.
language2_text: Maniring jya am, "Peyvangon rana, kangay mo nira meyina do Isedi. Ta yarana nimawakwak o yapwa amwakwak si Yeso."

language1_text: And he arose, and took the young child and his mother, and came into the land of Israel.
language2_text: Makarahan am ipeysinaoli na rana ni Yoseyvo sira meyina yangay do Isedi.

language1_text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judæ a in the room of his father Herod, he was afraid to go thither: notwithstanding, being warned of God in a dream, he turned aside into the parts of Galilee:
language2_text: Ikongo do nimamizing na o anak ni Helote a meyngaran so Acilaw a omlit do ama na a panirsirngen no Yotay, am ori o ji na nimangai do Isedi. Am ori o nipatateynepan na pa ji Yoseyvo ni Ama ta do to. So nipananawan na no angayan da. Ori o nyangay da tomayo do Cyadidi.

language1_text: and he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets, He shall be called a Nazarene.
language2_text: O meyngaran so Nasale a ili am ori rana o nikaplinan da meyvahay. O icyakman na sang no vazay am todey mangononong o mina ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. Ta maniring sira am, "Iya rana am ngaranan da tao do Nasale."

language1_text: In those days came John the Baptist, preaching in the wilderness of Judæ a,
language2_text: No kano nang am nimangay o nimanaktak a si Yowani do kabwan no nihakawan no tao do Yotay a mangnanao.

language1_text: and saying, Repent ye: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Mamlis kamo na, ta yarana makeykai o na katalamozong ninyo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias, saying, The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, Make his paths straight.
language2_text: O mina ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran so Isayya am si Yowani o peycirngan na sya. Ta maniring am, "Amyan so tao a amlololos do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a manci no, 'Inyo rana am wadwaden nyo o rarahan no Panirsirngen ta. So katazineng na rana no pangonongan na.'"

language1_text: And the same John had his raiment of camel's hair, and a leathern girdle about his loins; and his meat was locusts and wild honey.
language2_text: O ayob na ni Yowani am niparing a bobow no baka. O abtek na am kolit no baka. O kanen na am zozon a kano maganinem a amyan do vahay no tapipi.

language1_text: Then went out to him Jerusalem, and all Judæ a, and all the region round about Jordan,
language2_text: Nimai pa sira o tao a apo do Yelosaleng a kado peycyeylilyan na do Yotay a kano macisngen so ili do ayo a meyngaran so Yotan a malovot do tangain na.

language1_text: and were baptized of him in Jordan, confessing their sins.
language2_text: Ipanci da o raraten da. Am ori o nitaktakan na jira ni Yowani do meyngaran so Yotan a ayo.

language1_text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism, he said unto them, O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?
language2_text: Macita ni Yowani o aro a tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano macyagom do Satokay a mai a manci ni Yowani a tomaktak jira am pamizngen na sira. Maniring jira am, "Inyo a yakmey mavowaw, sino ipanci jinyo o yanyo katayo no oyaoya na ninyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance:
language2_text: Ta si mamlis kamo na so icicirawat am ori o ikanoyong nyo rana yana nikomaro do peyraratenan nyo.

language1_text: and think not to say within yourselves, We have Abraham to our father: for I say unto you, that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham.
language2_text: Ji nyo mancyan o kapakaliklik nyo so peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to, do nyo kapeyineynapo si Apolahan. To ko na macitangayan jinyo am makamaog si Ama ta do to do vato ito so sivosivovoong na ni Apolahan.

language1_text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees: therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.
language2_text: Yana mazomtad o zaig do atngeh no kayo. O ji malasi a kayo am miminen na atbahen a kapasleb na sya do apoy.

language1_text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance: but he that cometh after me is mightier than I, whose shoes I am not worthy to bear: he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost, and with fire:
language2_text: Ko taktakan inyo no ranom do nyo na kapamlis. Am o manownowji pa ka nyaken a yamai am taktakan na inyo no Seyzi a kano apoy. So ikaizaizay na pa ka nyaken. So ji ko macingai jya.

language1_text: whose fan is in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and gather his wheat into the garner; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire.
language2_text: Yamyan do lima na so ipaninigi. So cigyan na so kadai a kapangay na so pipya kadai do peyvokavokan, kasleb na so ata na do jyahesep a lila no apoy."

language1_text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John, to be baptized of him.
language2_text: No kanang am nimapo si Yeso do Cyadidi a kapeypangay na do Yotan a ayo a mangay ji Yowani a manci nya tomaktak jya.

language1_text: But John forbad him, saying, I have need to be baptized of thee, and comest thou to me?
language2_text: Am naknakmen ni Yowani o kazazat na do nakenakem ni Yeso. Maniring ji Yeso am, "Beken a yaken o taktakan mo a. Ikongo mo yai jyaken."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said unto him, Suffer it to be so now: for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness. Then he suffered him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "To ta macyozai o akman sya vazay an. Ta o ikakman na sya am ahapen ta o vazay ni Ama ta do to." Makarahan am to na rana amya ni Yowani a taktakan si Yeso.

language1_text: And Jesus, when he was baptized, went up straightway out of the water: and, lo, the heavens were opened unto him, and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove, and lighting upon him:
language2_text: Meypapowpow si Yeso apo do ranom am todacyangi o hanit. So nipakacita na so Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a akmey hato a meyhekas a someyked do kataotao na.

language1_text: and lo a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amyan so ciring a apo do teyngato. Maniring am, "Iya rana ya am Anak ko a ko tey kaglaw. So yako sarayan nya."

language1_text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil.
language2_text: Makarahan am ipeypalanginan no Seyzi si Yeso a yangay do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a littan ni Satan.

language1_text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights, he was afterward an hungred.
language2_text: Makasikapat (40) so araraw si Yeso a jya nikoman am maliliw na o kakcin na.

language1_text: And when the tempter came to him, he said, If thou be the Son of God, command that these stones be made bread.
language2_text: Ori o nyangay ni Satan ji Yeso. Maniring jya am, "No ka manoyong a Anak no Tao do to am pancyan pala o aro a vato a kapeyvaliw na a myanpaw."

language1_text: But he answered and said, It is written, Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.
language2_text: Tovisan ni Yeso am, "O ciring do Seysyo am, 'Beken a kanehen o ikavyay no tao, ta makdekdeng pa o Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a ikavyay no tao.'"

language1_text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city, and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple,
language2_text: Makarahan am yangay na pa ni Satan si Yeso do Yelosaleng a kangay na nya do toktok na no rako a panaralayan da.

language1_text: and saith unto him, If thou be the Son of God, cast thyself down: for it is written, He shall give his angels charge concerning thee: And in their hands they shall bear thee up, Lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.
language2_text: Maniring jya am, "No ka manoyong a Anak no Tao do to am okso pala do teyrahem ito. Ta o ciring do Seysyo am, 'Manovoy o Tao do to so tinsi na a mangay omzat jimo. So tazapyan da jimo no lima da kaji na meyzazan no ai mo do vato.'"

language1_text: Jesus said unto him, It is written again, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.
language2_text: Tovisan ni Yeso am, "O ciring do Seysyo am, 'Ji nyo ngileylamdama o Panirsirngen nyo a Tao do to nyo.'"

language1_text: Again, the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain, and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world, and the glory of them;
language2_text: Am ori o nitanggahan na ni Yeso ni Satan do makarang a tokon a kapacita na no peykamahamahatawan na kano aro a masamasaod no karawan.

language1_text: and saith unto him, All these things will I give thee, if thou wilt fall down and worship me.
language2_text: Maniring si Satan am, "No si meylilitod ka amraralay nyaken am to ko na mimina o makakaday a itoro jimo."

language1_text: Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.
language2_text: Tovisan ni Yeso am, "Angay rana mo Satan! Ta o ciring do Seysyo am, 'Iraralay nyo o Panirsirngen a Tao do to nyo. So ika iya na no iraralay nyo. Ta abo o ikararwa na a iraralay nyo an.'"

language1_text: Then the devil leaveth him, and, behold, angels came and ministered unto him.
language2_text: Makarahan am karwan na rana si Yeso ni Satan a kai no aro a tinsi ni Ama ta do to a somidong sya.

language1_text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison, he departed into Galilee;
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Yeso si Yowani a nipteng da do pamemtengan am meysinaoli do Cyadidi.

language1_text: and leaving Nazareth, he came and dwelt in Capernaum, which is upon the sea coast, in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim:
language2_text: Am ji rana meyvahay si Yeso do Nasale, ta nimangay rana a meyvahay do Cyapaynong. O ili rana ori am amyan ori do Sipolon a kado Navotadi a macisngen do rako a meybebneng a ranom a meyngaran so Cyadidi.

language1_text: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying,
language2_text: O icyakman na sang am todey mangononong o ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran so Isayya. Ta maniring am,

language1_text: The land of Zabulon, and the land of Nephthalim, By the way of the sea, beyond Jordan, Galilee of the Gentiles;
language2_text: "O tao do Sipolon a kado Navotadi a macisngen do rako a meybebneng a ranom a kado meyngaran so Yotan a ayo a yanan da no beken a tao do Yotay do Cyadidi am

language1_text: The people which sat in darknessSaw great light; And to them which sat in the region and shadow of deathLight is sprung up.
language2_text: o amyan do yakasarisaryan a manyahey no kawakwak da am macita da rana o na cirain ni Ama ta do to a mapatazadang sira."

language1_text: From that time Jesus began to preach, and to say, Repent: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
language2_text: Nimyapo no kanang o kapeylimwang na rana ni Yeso no nanao na. Maniring am, "Karwan nyo o peyraratenan nyo, ta yarana makeykai o yana katalamozong ninyo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And Jesus, walking by the sea of Galilee, saw two brethren, Simon called Peter, and Andrew his brother, casting a net into the sea: for they were fishers.
language2_text: Mangonong si Yeso do pasalan no rako a meybebneng a ranom a ngaranan da Cyadidi am macita na o rarwa ka tao a mangahangahahap a ngaranan da si Pite a si Simong a kano kakteh na a meyngaran so Antele a amzoyo no tawaz da.

language1_text: And he saith unto them, Follow me, and I will make you fishers of men.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Macilolo kamo jyaken, ta nanawen ko inyo. So icyakma nyoy mangahahap a tao a mapanop so tao."

language1_text: And they straightway left their nets, and followed him.
language2_text: Mamizing da am to da rana ngaroi o tawaz da a macilolo ji Yeso.

language1_text: And going on from thence, he saw other two brethren, James the son of Zebedee, and John his brother, in a ship with Zebedee their father, mending their nets; and he called them.
language2_text: Alikey pa o nyalaman na am macita na ni Yeso o anak na ni Sipitay a meyngaran so Yake a kano kakteh na si Yowani a kano ama da a si Sipitay a tomonod so nyayoma da tawaz do tatala da. Macita na sira ni Yeso am tawagan na sira.

language1_text: And they immediately left the ship and their father, and followed him.
language2_text: Nimakeykai sira komaro do tatala da kano ama da a macilolo rana ji Yeso.

language1_text: And Jesus went about all Galilee, teaching in their synagogues, and preaching the gospel of the kingdom, and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people.
language2_text: Nilivolivon ni Yeso o peycyeylilyan na do Cyadidi a kapangnanao na so tao do peyneynozyan da do dang a meylimwang no italamozong na ni Ama ta do to a kapangiwakwak na so meykeyngeyngen a tao do dang.

language1_text: And his fame went throughout all Syria: and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments, and those which were possessed with devils, and those which were lunatick, and those that had the palsy; and he healed them.
language2_text: So nipeyyamyamizngan da na do ngaran na ni Yeso do Sidiya. Am ori o nyangayan da no meykeyngeyngen a tao a kano kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan a tao a kano mamezamezay a tao a kano ji makapeygonagonay a tao. Nimimin da o akman sang a tao yangay do tangain na. So niteyteyhesan na sira niwakwakan so kataotao.

language1_text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee, and from Decapolis, and from Jerusalem, and from Judæ a, and from beyond Jordan.
language2_text: Aro tao a nimapo do Cyadidi a kado Meykasa ngarnan a ili a kado Yelosaleng a kado aro a ili do katovangan no Yotan a ayo a nimacilolo ji Yeso.

language1_text: And seeing the multitudes, he went up into a mountain: and when he was set, his disciples came unto him:
language2_text: Macita ni Yeso o aro a tao a mangay jya am tomanang do tokon. Amlisna do dang am mangay sira o macinanao jya,

language1_text: and he opened his mouth, and taught them, saying,
language2_text: kananao na sira. Maniring am,

language1_text: Blessed are the poor in spirit: for their's is the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: "O tao a omanoyong do kataotao da a ji makanet so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to am tey yapya sira. Ta macizanod sira do italamozong ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.
language2_text: "O amlavi so onowned a tao am mangay o kasaray da, ta mangay na panadnaden o nakem da ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Blessed are the meek: for they shall inherit the earth.
language2_text: "O mapanalawbo so kataotao da tao am tey yapya sira. Ta mahap da o nipanci na pa ni Ama ta do to a yazaw na sira.

language1_text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness: for they shall be filled.
language2_text: "O manoyong a komakzeb so kahap da so vazay na ni Ama ta do to am tey yapya sira. Ta mahap da o amin da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Blessed are the merciful: for they shall obtain mercy.
language2_text: "O marilaw no icyatatao da am tey yapya sira. Ta akman sang si Ama ta do to a marilaw nira.

language1_text: Blessed are the pure in heart: for they shall see God.
language2_text: "O ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao am tey yapya sira. Ta mangay kapakacita da si Ama ta do to no makwa.

language1_text: Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.
language2_text: "O mapeyyalalap so nakem no meykaoya tao am tey yapya sira. Ta abneken na sira ni Ama ta do to a akma ney anak.

language1_text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness' sake: for their's is the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: "O mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to a tao a pakakasin da am tey yapya sira. Ta macikaop rana sira do italamozong ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Blessed are ye, when men shall revile you, and persecute you, and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely, for my sake.
language2_text: "No monganay jyaken o ji da ninigan ninyo no tao a pakakasin a tamwaden no marahet a ciring am manoyong katey yapya nyo.

language1_text: Rejoice, and be exceeding glad: for great is your reward in heaven: for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you.
language2_text: Somaray kamo an. Ta yamyan do teyngato o makdeng a azaw nyo a ipasaray na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Nimakalapo no kakwa o kakman da sang no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a nipakakasi da no tao.

language1_text: Ye are the salt of the earth: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be salted? it is thenceforth good for nothing, but to be cast out, and to be trodden under foot of men.
language2_text: "Inyo rana am akma kamoy asin no tao do karawan. Am no si tomavang ori am ikongo pavowin a kapait na. So ikabo rana no angangayan na. So to rana walici nya zazasagan no tao.

language1_text: Ye are the light of the world. A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid.
language2_text: "Inyo rana am akma kamoy zezngang do karawan. Akman so vahay a nipatnek do tokon a abo so ji makacita sya tao.

language1_text: Neither do men light a candle, and put it under a bushel, but on a candlestick; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house.
language2_text: Abo o mapowzib so nipaciscisan na zampo. Ta to rana pacimalaga a izezak so tao do sahad no vahay.

language1_text: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.
language2_text: Akman kamo so zezak ang a peycitacittan da no tao. So inaran nyo si Ama ta do to a tey yapya. Ta no si macita da inyo no tao a tey yapiya so ahahapan sya am admadmain da rana si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law, or the prophets: I am not come to destroy, but to fulfil.
language2_text: "Ji nyo mancyan yaken a yambalinas so iwawalam ni Moyse a kano nanao da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. Ta yaken rana am yako patwawen o peypeypangayan na.

language1_text: For verily I say unto you, Till heaven and earth pass, one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law, till all be fulfilled.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am tana todangay do kaidan no karawan am abo asa ka ciring ni Ama ta do to a mabalinas.

language1_text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments, and shall teach men so, he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven: but whosoever shall do and teach them, the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: No si amyan so tao a to nazibo no asa ka ciring do nivatvatkan a nanao ni Ama ta do to a kacirara na so tao a akman sya to nazibo nya am imaveveh na tao do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to. Am o tao a mahap so ciring na ni Ama ta do to a mapeyvazay sya a kacirara na so tao a mangozay jya am ney meynakem ori do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For I say unto you, That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees, ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: Am ori o ko pancyan ninyo a makowyowyat pa kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay a mapeyvazay so vazay na ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori saon o ipacikaop nyo do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to am.

language1_text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time, Thou shalt not kill; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment:
language2_text: "Nimamizing nyo na o ciring da no kamanrarakehan no kakwa a manci no kaji mangapan so tao, ta o mangap so tao am to rana angayan do pacicicyan o akman sang.

language1_text: but I say unto you, That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment: and whosoever shall say to his brother, Raca, shall be in danger of the council: but whosoever shall say, Thou fool, shall be in danger of hell fire.
language2_text: Am ko ipanci jinyo am o macioya do akma ney kakteh do cinai am raraten na rana ori. Omavay so akma ney kakteh do cinai a abo so angangayan a tao am to rana angayan o akman sang a tao do pacicicyan. O mapasagsagpyan so akma ney kakteh do cinai am mangay do makotokotod a lila no apoy.

language1_text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar, and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee;
language2_text: No mapatanang ka so kingking mo ji Ama ta do to a kapakanakem mo so pacioyyan na jimo no akma moy kakteh do cinai am

language1_text: leave there thy gift before the altar, and go thy way; first be reconciled to thy brother, and then come and offer thy gift.
language2_text: to mo pamtadan o kingking mo, ta manmanma pa o kangay mo mapalap so nakem mo a kano yamacioya jimo a kakteh mo a kapiya na rana no nakenakem nyo a kapatanang mo rana so kingking mo.

language1_text: Agree with thine adversary quickly, whiles thou art in the way with him; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the officer, and thou be cast into prison.
language2_text: No amyan so tao a amrahet so kangangay mo a mangay nimo do pacicicyan am ney yapya na o kato mo rana macisirsirngan jya mapeyyalap so nakem nyo, do ji nyo pa angai do pacicicyan. Ta no si mahahay ka pa am to na rana mancyan imo do mapacici a tao a katoro na nimo do meykalsong a alyowen do pamemtengan.

language1_text: Verily I say unto thee, Thou shalt by no means come out thence, till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jimo am no si katorwan mo na o ahapen da jinyo a nizpi do kalasan mo am ori o ipakagag mo so kataotao mo.

language1_text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time, Thou shalt not commit adultery:
language2_text: "Nimamizing nyo na o ciring da no kamanrarakehan no kakwa a manci no kaji mapasagpyanan so kataotao.

language1_text: but I say unto you, That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no makacita so mavakes a kasala no nakenakem am akmey to mangononong o nakenakem jya.

language1_text: And if thy right eye offend thee, pluck it out, and cast it from thee: for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish, and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell.
language2_text: No si asa ka mata mo o nipeyraraten mo am to mo rana ngoswa a iwalit. Ta apyapya pa o kabo no asa ka mata mo a mai jyaken a kano kataotao mo a mangay do kararatan.

language1_text: And if thy right hand offend thee, cut it off, and cast it from thee: for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish, and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell.
language2_text: No wanan mo do lima mo o nipeyraraten mo am to mo ranangteba a iwalit. Ta apyapya pa o kabo no asa ka lima mo a mai jyaken a kano kataotao mo a mangay do kararatan.

language1_text: It hath been said, Whosoever shall put away his wife, let him give her a writing of divorcement:
language2_text: "Nimamizing nyo na o ciring da no kamanrarakehan no kakwa a manci no, 'O mapakaro so kadwan do vahay am meyvatvatek so itoro jya.'

language1_text: but I say unto you, That whosoever shall put away his wife, saving for the cause of fornication, causeth her to commit adultery: and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery.
language2_text: Am to ko na macitangayan jinyo am no amyan so ji na nimapanadnaji jimo no mavakes mo am ori o ipakaro mo sya. Am no abo am marahet o kato mapakarwan so kadwan do vahay. Ta no si mirwa a macivahavahay o mavakes am akmey nipya na o mavakes a mapasagpyan so kataotao na. O mapazagpit rana so akman sang a mavakes a tao am raraten na ori.

language1_text: Again, ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time, Thou shalt not forswear thyself, but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths:
language2_text: "Nimamizing nyo na o ciring da no kamanrarakehan no kakwa a manci no, 'O nipanma ciring am ji ngalalasi. O nipanma ciring do tangain ni Ama ta do to am pangononongan a peyvazain.'

language1_text: but I say unto you, Swear not at all; neither by heaven; for it is God's throne:
language2_text: Am ko pa ipanci jinyo am ji nyo panmanma o ciring nyo. Taosya o kapacipeyyeyyan nyo so nakem a paingen nyo do teyngato, ta akma ney lilisnan ni Ama ta do to o teyngato.

language1_text: nor by the earth; for it is his footstool: neither by Jerusalem; for it is the city of the great King.
language2_text: Taosya o kapacipeyyeyyan nyo so nakem do tana, ta akma ney zazasagan ni Ama ta do to o teyrahem. Taosya o kapacipeyyeyyan nyo so nakem do Yelosaleng, ta ili ori no maizay a Panirsirngen.

language1_text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head, because thou canst not make one hair white or black.
language2_text: Jya to macipeyyeyyan so nakem do oo nyo. Ta ji nyo amaog o asa ka avok nyo a mavaheng a kano malavang.

language1_text: But let your communication be, Yea, yea; Nay, nay: for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil.
language2_text: No meyzezyak kamo am manoyong am manoyong. No malas am todalas. No tey yaro rana o ciring am yapwan na rana no raraten.

language1_text: Ye have heard that it hath been said, An eye for an eye, and a tooth for a tooth:
language2_text: "Nimamizing nyo na o ciring da no kamanrarakehan no kakwa a manci no, 'No osowen da o mata mo am osowen mo o mata da. No podpoden da o ngepen mo am podpoden mo o ngepen da.'

language1_text: but I say unto you, That ye resist not evil: but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek, turn to him the other also.
language2_text: Am ko pa ipanci jinyo am taosya o kapatonggal nyo do ji makazid jinyo. No amyan so tao a somiplang so wanan a posngi mo am to mo pa norwan o asa ka posngi mo a siplangen na.

language1_text: And if any man will sue thee at the law, and take away thy coat, let him have thy cloke also.
language2_text: No myan so mangay nimo do pamemtengan a mahap so ayob mo am to mo na norwan o katapil no ayob mo jya.

language1_text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile, go with him twain.
language2_text: No amyan so tao amgacigat jimo a omapid do rara na ipangonong do maid a rarahan am marairai pa o apidan mo jya.

language1_text: Give to him that asketh thee, and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away.
language2_text: No amyan so amin da jimo am to mo na norwan jya. No myan so vooden da jimo am itoro mo jya vooden na.

language1_text: Ye have heard that it hath been said, Thou shalt love thy neighbour, and hate thine enemy.
language2_text: "Nimamizing nyo na o ciring da no kamanrarakehan no kakwa a manci no, 'Ikarilaw nyo sira o apapnan nyo a kapacioya nyo do kavosoyan nyo.'

language1_text: But I say unto you, Love your enemies, bless them that curse you, do good to them that hate you, and pray for them which despitefully use you, and persecute you;
language2_text: Am ko pa ipanci jinyo am ikarilaw nyo sira o macioya jinyo a tao a kapeynozi nyo no mapakakasi jinyo a tao.

language1_text: that ye may be the children of your Father which is in heaven: for he maketh his sun to rise on the evil and on the good, and sendeth rain on the just and on the unjust.
language2_text: Ta ori o ipeyngongyod nyo a akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to. Ta yameyyangay sira o apya so nakenakem a tao a kano marahet so nakenakem a tao a na cirain ni Ama ta do to no araw. So na icyakman sang no cimoy a na itoro do apya so nakenakem a kano marahet so nakenakem a tao.

language1_text: For if ye love them which love you, what reward have ye? do not even the publicans the same?
language2_text: No si marilaw ninyo a tao o ikarilaw nyo am ta azawan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Kakwakwan da no meyraraten a tao a makateneng do kapangarilaw da so marilaw nira.

language1_text: And if ye salute your brethren only, what do ye more than others? do not even the publicans so?
language2_text: No si apapnan nyo o peyminaminasi nyo am ikongo peytarkan nyo a kano toda ka tao. Ji da tenngi o akman sang a peyvazain no ji manaralay a tao a.

language1_text: Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.
language2_text: Inarahen nyo si Ama nyo do to a tey yapya so ahahapan sya.

language1_text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men, to be seen of them: otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven.
language2_text: "Makapzat kamo. Ji nyo mapacitacittan o kakdekdeng nyo a manaralay do tangain no tao. Ta no si makman kamo so sang am ji nyo ngakzeba o keyyan no yazaw na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms, do not sound a trumpet before thee, as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets, that they may have glory of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.
language2_text: No mangazaw ka am taosya o kapacita mo nya, akman so tanwasiwasi do peyneynozyan a kado rarahan a mapacita no kasidong da so tao. Ko ipanci pa jinyo am tana mahap da o kazwayan da do karawan am abo rana mahahap da a kadmayan da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But when thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth:
language2_text: Am ori an ji nyo meycicicyan do tao no mangazaw kamo. Tana ney yapya na kagagan nyo am ji nyo mancyan jya.

language1_text: that thine alms may be in secret: and thy Father which seeth in secret himself shall reward thee openly.
language2_text: Ta si Ama ta do to a makacita jinyo a mapowzowzib so kapangazaw nyo am amyan so yazaw na jinyo.

language1_text: And when thou prayest, thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are: for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.
language2_text: "No meynozi kamo am ji nyo nginara o tanwasiwasi so nakenakem a makza no keyyan da do peyneynozyan a kado rararahan a meynozi a amngongyod so kapacita nya do tao. To ko na macitangayan jinyo am tana mahap da o kazwayan da do karawan am abo rana o mahahap da a kadmayan da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But thou, when thou prayest, enter into thy closet, and when thou hast shut thy door, pray to thy Father which is in secret; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly.
language2_text: No meynozi kamo am somdep kamo do vahay a kapangneb nyo a mapasyasi ji Ama ta do to. Ta iya o makacita jinyo do sahad no vahay nyo. So amizngan na jinyo.

language1_text: But when ye pray, use not vain repetitions, as the heathen do: for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking.
language2_text: "No meynozi kamo am ji nyo nginara o ji manaralay a tao a omolioli so ciring da abo so peypeypangayan. Ta ipanci da o kamizing na ni Ama ta do to so anaro a ciring.

language1_text: Be not ye therefore like unto them: for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of, before ye ask him.
language2_text: Ji nyo nginara sira, ta no ji kamo pa nimeynozi am katenngan na rana ni Ama ta do to o kalahen nyo no nakem.

language1_text: After this manner therefore pray ye: Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name.
language2_text: No meynozi kamo am inarahen nyo ya an.' Mo Ama do to, inaoy no si mamimin o tao a zomwazway so meylimwang a ngaran mo.

language1_text: Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.
language2_text: Inaoy no italamozong mo o karawan. Inaoy no mai jyamen do teyrahem o apiya ahahapan mo sya do teyngato.

language1_text: Give us this day our daily bread.
language2_text: O kanen namen sicyaraw eya am itoro mo jyamen.

language1_text: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.
language2_text: Vonasen mo o raraten namen, akman jyamen a ji mapeyyan sya do onowned so raten da jyamen no icyatatao namen.

language1_text: And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil: For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever. Amen.
language2_text: Ji mo yamen amya kalittan. Apzatan mo yamen mo Ama do to, do kararatan do teyrahem. [Ta imo rana am ka tey mowyat a tey mazway a Tao do to a yatomalamozong nyamen a mangay do kaidan no karawan. Amin.]'

language1_text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses, your heavenly Father will also forgive you:
language2_text: "No si peykabobwen nyo o raraten da jinyo no icyatatao nyo am akman sang si Ama ta do to a amvonas so raraten nyo.

language1_text: but if ye forgive not men their trespasses, neither will your Father forgive your trespasses.
language2_text: No si ji nyo peykabobwa o raraten da jinyo no icyatatao nyo am akman sang si Ama ta do to a ji vonas so raraten nyo.

language1_text: Moreover when ye fast, be not, as the hypocrites, of a sad countenance: for they disfigure their faces, that they may appear unto men to fast. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.
language2_text: "No ji kamo mangakaday a meynozi am ji nyo nginara sira o tanwasiwasi a tao, do kakma dey mapasingat a mapacita no kaji da nimangakadayan a meynozi. To ko na macitangayan jinyo am tana mahap da o kazwayan da do karawan am abo rana o mahahap da a kadmayan da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But thou, when thou fastest, anoint thine head, and wash thy face;
language2_text: Am inyo rana am no ji kamo mangakaday a meynozi am meysorod kamo. Meyramon kamo.

language1_text: that thou appear not unto men to fast, but unto thy Father which is in secret: and thy Father, which seeth in secret, shall reward thee openly.
language2_text: Taosya o kapakatovil da jinyo no tao a jya nimangakaday a meynozi, ta katenngan na inyo ni Ama ta do to. So iyan no yazaw na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth, where moth and rust doth corrupt, and where thieves break through and steal:
language2_text: "Taosya o pangangagoman nyo so kangangay nyo do karawan, ta mavozsok ori, amraci ori, takawen da ori no manakaw a tao.

language1_text: but lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven, where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt, and where thieves do not break through nor steal:
language2_text: Apyapya pa o kakzan nyo no kangangay nyo do teyngato. Ta abo do dang o vozsok a koman sya. Ji raci do dang. Abo dang o manakaw a tao.

language1_text: for where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
language2_text: Ta o yanan no peymeymasaodan nyo am pacilolwan no onowned nyo an.

language1_text: The light of the body is the eye: if therefore thine eye be single, thy whole body shall be full of light.
language2_text: "O mata nyo am akmey zezngang no kataotao nyo an. No si apya o mata nyo am akmey mazngang o pangonongan nyo an.

language1_text: But if thine eye be evil, thy whole body shall be full of darkness. If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness, how great is that darkness!
language2_text: No si marahet rana o mata nyo am masari rana o citahen nyo. Akman sang, ta no si akmey mavota o onowned nyo am tey makasi o akman sang a tao.

language1_text: No man can serve two masters: for either he will hate the one, and love the other; or else he will hold to the one, and despise the other. Ye cannot serve God and mammon.
language2_text: "Abo o lamlamsoy a meyvazay do rarwa ka lawpan. No ikanig na o asa am ikaoya na o asa. No ikaoya na o asa am ikaglaw na o asa. Marahet o kapasaklang nyo ji Ama ta do to an, a tongdeng do peynizpi nyo an."

language1_text: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "Ko pa ciring jinyo am ji nyo a ratan o kanen nyo a kano ayob nyo. Ta maharahara pa o ipeyigegen nyo do karawan a kano kanen nyo. Meyneynakem pa o kataotao nyo a kano ayob nyo.

language1_text: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?
language2_text: To nyo nita o meyyasasalap an. Sira ji hakaw. Sira ji manlangi. Yabo da panonokozan so kankan da. Am na avyavyain sira ni Ama ta do to. Jyabo nyo kajyakdekdengan pa kano lapik a.

language1_text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?
language2_text: Sino jinyo o to noib nya do karawan so pintek.

language1_text: And why take ye thought for raiment? Consider the lilies of the field, how they grow; they toil not, neither do they spin:
language2_text: "Ikongo nyo kalawan no ayob nyo. Cita kamo pala o vonitan do takey. Ta yaji meyvazay a yaji ninon so ayob na.

language1_text: and yet I say unto you, That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.
language2_text: Am ko pa ciring jinyo am apyapya pa o vonitan a citahen a kano mina aywayob na no meyngaran so Solomen a panirsirngen no kakwa.

language1_text: Wherefore, if God so clothe the grass of the field, which to day is, and to morrow is cast into the oven, shall he not much more clothe you, O ye of little faith?
language2_text: O tamek am amyan pa sicyaraw eya. Am simaraw am mahayo rana a kapasleb rana sya do apoy. Tana akman sang o tamek a ji meyyonownay do tana am yana padketan ni Ama ta do to so na ikazway a savong na. Kakwakwan na rana no tamek am imanngo kamo na. Ta jyabo kaji na mantan ninyo so ayob nyo a. Am nyo kaji makanetan so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed?
language2_text: Am ori o ji nyo alawi no isovo nyo a kanen a kano yopen nyo a kano ayob nyo.

language1_text: (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek:) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things.
language2_text: Ta o akman rana sang a vazay am da kalahen no yaji manaralay a tao. Na katenngan ni Ama ta do to o nyo kakzeben a makakaday.

language1_text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
language2_text: So ikapinsan na no kakza nyo no katalamozong na ninyo ni Ama ta do to a omahap so isaray na vazay. Ta ori o torwan na nya jinyo so apyahen nyo no nakem.

language1_text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow: for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself. Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof.
language2_text: Am ori o ji nyo alawi no vazay nyo simaraw. Ta mapinpin o vazay simaraw. So ji mapazavozi so ikeykalaw do kasaraw.

language1_text: Judge not, that ye be not judged.
language2_text: "Ji kamo manraherahet so icyatatao nyo, ta no si manraherahet kamo so icyatatao nyo am akman kamo sang a raheraheten da.

language1_text: For with what judgment ye judge, ye shall be judged: and with what measure ye mete, it shall be measured to you again.
language2_text: Ta o ahahapan nyo so panraherahetan nyo so icyatatao nyo am akman sang o ahapan da sya no tao a amraherahet jinyo. To macilocilolo do kakdekdeng no iraherahet nyo so icyatatao nyo o raherahetan da jinyo.

language1_text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye?
language2_text: Ikongo nyo pacivalalan do da karatan no kadwan jinyo a yanyo kaji makalavatan so nyo karatan.

language1_text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother, Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye; and, behold, a beam is in thine own eye?
language2_text: Yanyo kapanci no kakteh nyo do cinai a amlis do marahet a nakenakem da am nyo jiblisi o yamarahet a nakenakem nyo.

language1_text: Thou hypocrite, first cast out the beam out of thine own eye; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother's eye.
language2_text: Inyo rana mapakapyapya so nakenakem a tao am manmanma o kablis nyo so karatan nyo. Ta ori o ipakacita nyo so karatan no kadwan jinyo an.

language1_text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs, neither cast ye your pearls before swine, lest they trample them under their feet, and turn again and rend you.
language2_text: "Ji norwan do ino o apya kanekanen, ta olin na imo a songiten. Jya to norwan do kois o vowawan, ta ingbeywan a saganeyan na.

language1_text: Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you:
language2_text: "Makowyat kamo a meynozi, ta ori o ipakahap nyo so apyahen nyo no nakem. Makowyat kamo a komala si Ama ta do to, ta iya o yanan no kakzeben nyo no nakem. Makowyat kamo a tomawag ji Ama ta do to, ta iya o makasidong jinyo.

language1_text: for every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
language2_text: Ta o mapasyasi jya, komala sya, tomawag jya am mahap da o isidong na sira.

language1_text: Or what man is there of you, whom if his son ask bread, will he give him a stone?Or if he ask a fish, will he give him a serpent?
language2_text: Sino jinyo o manta no minapodpod jinyo so vato a kano mavowaw no macyami sira so myanpaw a kano among. Sino jinyo o manta no minapodpod jinyo so vato a kano mavowaw no macyami sira so myanpaw a kano among.

language1_text: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children, how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him?
language2_text: Kakwakwan nyo a meyraraten a tao a yamakateneng do kapanta no anak nyo so pipya kanekanen a imanngo rana si Ama ta do to. Ta jyabo kaji na norwan nya jinyo no amin nyo o ikeykakza nyo a.

language1_text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you, do ye even so to them: for this is the law and the prophets.
language2_text: No si kakzeben nyo o kapya da so nakem jinyo no icyatatao nyo am akman kamo sang so nakem jira. Ta ori o na agagazan no nivatvatkan ni Moyse a kano panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Enter ye in at the strait gate: for wide is the gate, and broad is the way, that leadeth to destruction, and many there be which go in thereat:
language2_text: "Somdep kamo do alikey a asdesdepan. Ta o asdesdepan a rarahan a meypangay do kararatan am mowvong ori a jyasalit a pangonongan. So ikaro no tao a mangonong do dang.

language1_text: because strait is the gate, and narrow is the way, which leadeth unto life, and few there be that find it.
language2_text: O asdesdepan a rarahan a meypangay do kavyayan no pahad am meylid ori a masalit a pangonongan. Apereh o tao a makakala so sang.

language1_text: Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.
language2_text: "Azimanen nyo o malas so ipangnanao a tao. Ta akmey apiya o ipangnanao da am jyakman sang, ta tey manginanawa sira a mangalalas so ciring.

language1_text: Ye shall know them by their fruits. Do men gather grapes of thorns, or figs of thistles?
language2_text: To nyo na tovili o iwawalam da. Jyabo kato nyo mamozasan do tazici so potaw a. O tamek am ji to meyyasi so vazacinok.

language1_text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit.
language2_text: O pipya kayo o makapeyyasi so apya so kakanan. O mararahet a kayo am meyyasi so marahet so kakanan.

language1_text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.
language2_text: Ji meyyasi o pipya kayo so marahet a asi no kayo an. O marahet a kayo am ji to meyyasi so pipya asi no kayo an.

language1_text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.
language2_text: O ji meyyasi a kayo am to rananba kasleb sya do apoy.

language1_text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them.
language2_text: Am ori o to rana makatenngi do iwawalam da no malas so nanao a tao.

language1_text: Not every one that saith unto me, Lord, Lord, shall enter into the kingdom of heaven; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven.
language2_text: "O tomawag jyaken a tao a manci no, 'Mo Panirsirngen, mo Panirsirngen,' am jyamimin sira macikaop do italamozong ni Ama ta do to. Ta o mahap so nanao ni Ama ta do to o macikaop jya.

language1_text: Many will say to me in that day, Lord, Lord, have we not prophesied in thy name? and in thy name have cast out devils? and in thy name done many wonderful works?
language2_text: No masngen rana o araraw no kapeykapyapinpin na so tao ni Ama ta do to am aro o tao a manci nya jyaken so, 'Mo Panirsirngen, mo Panirsirngen, nipangozayan namen o ngaran mo asyo a meylimwang no nanao ni Ama ta do to. Nipangozayan namen o ngaran mo asyo a mamozwaw so kalamsoyan ni Satan. Aro o mapeyzokab a vazay a mina vazay namen asyo.'

language1_text: And then will I profess unto them, I never knew you: depart from me, ye that work iniquity.
language2_text: No si maniring ko jira am, 'Ko jyatenngi inyo. Kazey kamo a yameyraraten a tao.'

language1_text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man, which built his house upon a rock:
language2_text: "O tao a omamizing so ciring ko a mapeyvazay sya am akman so mapatak a tao a mapatnek so vahay na do lalitan.

language1_text: and the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not: for it was founded upon a rock.
language2_text: Tana meykawan a macimoy am ji na kava ori, ta nipatnek na do lalitan.

language1_text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them not, shall be likened unto a foolish man, which built his house upon the sand:
language2_text: Am o makamizing so ciring ko a tao a ji ngahap sya am akman so jyapatapatak a tao a mangay mapatnek so vahay na do kananayan.

language1_text: and the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell: and great was the fall of it.
language2_text: No meykawan a macimoy am ji meyyahahay o vahay a makavakava."

language1_text: And it came to pass, when Jesus had ended these sayings, the people were astonished at his doctrine:
language2_text: Mateyka ni Yeso o ciring na am isavasavak da no makamizing so nipangnanao na.

language1_text: For he taught them as one having authority, and not as the scribes.
language2_text: Ta tey rako oyowyat na no ipangnanao na, do kapacitarek na no ipangnanao na kano aro a mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: When he was come down from the mountain, great multitudes followed him.
language2_text: Omosok si Yeso a apo do tokon am onotan da no aro a tao.

language1_text: And, behold, there came a leper and worshipped him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.
language2_text: O asa ka omlabyab so kataotao am nimangay ji Yeso a meylilitod. Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, no si apyahen mo am jyabo kaji na apyan no kataotao ko a."

language1_text: And Jesus put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will; be thou clean. And immediately his leprosy was cleansed.
language2_text: So niparapongan na so lima na jya ni Yeso a kapanci na no, "Ko apyahen. Apya rana o kataotao mo." So ji na meyyahahai a nimapya no kolit na.

language1_text: And Jesus saith unto him, See thou tell no man; but go thy way, shew thyself to the priest, and offer the gift that Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
language2_text: O nipakoyokoy na pa jya ni Yeso am, "Ji mo meycicicyan an. Ta yangay mo a ipacita do mapatanatanang so nakem ta si Ama ta do to a tao a kavalivaliw na so kataotao mo a kapangozay mo do iwawalam na ni Moyse a mapatanang so nakem mo ji Ama ta do to. So anoyngan da jimo no tao a nimapya rana so kataotao."

language1_text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum, there came unto him a centurion, beseeching him,
language2_text: Makaranes do Cyapaynong si Yeso am mangay na rapongen no asa ka mimong no asa poo (100) a itaysang no Loma a kapasyasi na jya.

language1_text: and saying, Lord, my servant lieth at home sick of the palsy, grievously tormented.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, o lamlamsoy ko am yaji makapeygonagonay. So na itkeh do vahay ko a yamakaliliw so kataotao na."

language1_text: And Jesus saith unto him, I will come and heal him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mangay ko iwakwakan."

language1_text: The centurion answered and said, Lord, I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof: but speak the word only, and my servant shall be healed.
language2_text: Maniring o mimong no itaysang no Loma am, "Mo Panirsirngen, yako tey kanig imo a yamai do vahay ko. Tana asa o ciring mo am jyabo o kaji na apyan no lamlamsoy ko a.

language1_text: For I am a man under authority, having soldiers under me: and I say to this man, Go, and he goeth; and to another, Come, and he cometh; and to my servant, Do this, and he doeth it.
language2_text: Akman jyaken a yaomamizing so ciring no makarakarang pa ka nyaken a itaysang no Loma a da kamizing jyaken no yamaveveveh pa ka nyaken a itaysang. No yamyan so ko tovoin a mangay am da to ngonoci yaken. No yamyan so ko ipanci a mai am yato ngai. No ko tovoin o lamlamsoy ko a meyvazay am yato meyvazay. So na ikakman sang no ciring mo a tey mowyat a makavonas so ingingnen no tao."

language1_text: When Jesus heard it, he marvelled, and said to them that followed, Verily I say unto you, I have not found so great faith, no, not in Israel.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Yeso o ciring na am niyak na. So nipancyan na nya do macihza jya tao. Maniring am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am ji ko pa nimakacita so akman sang so onowned do Isedi a tao.

language1_text: And I say unto you, That many shall come from the east and west, and shall sit down with Abraham, and Isaac, and Jacob, in the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo an. Ta myan so aro do peycyeylilyan a mai a macihanghang ji Apolahan a kani Isa kani Yakebo do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to do teyngato.

language1_text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
language2_text: Sira rana o omavat do kapacikaop da do italamozong ni Ama ta do to a tao am powboten na sira do pantaw do kasarisaryan a kapeylavilavi da mapeygazicigit so ngepen da a maneneseh."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto the centurion, Go thy way; and as thou hast believed, so be it done unto thee. And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour.
language2_text: Makarahan am maniring do mimong no itaysang no Loma am, "Angay rana, ta yarana nimapya o lamlamsoy mo, do mo katey makdeng so nakem ji Ama ta do to." Ori o nikapya na rana no ingingnen no lamlamsoy na.

language1_text: And when Jesus was come into Peter's house, he saw his wife's mother laid, and sick of a fever.
language2_text: Mangay si Yeso do vahay da Pite am macita na o icyarwa na mavakes ni Pite a paingwaten na a miray.

language1_text: And he touched her hand, and the fever left her: and she arose, and ministered unto them.
language2_text: Parapongen ni Yeso o lima na jya am ji na rana nipaingwat. So nipeyvangon na rana a tomaotao si Yeso.

language1_text: When the even was come, they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils: and he cast out the spirits with his word, and healed all that were sick:
language2_text: Somipsip rana o araw do makoyab am yai da no aro a tao ji Yeso o aro a kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan a tao. Asa o ciring ni Yeso a kavozwaw da na no kalamsoyan ni Satan. So niwakwakan na do aro a meykeyngeyngen a tao.

language1_text: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet, saying, Himself took our infirmities, and bare our sicknesses.
language2_text: O vazay na am mina todey mangononong do mina ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran so Isayya. Ta maniring am, "Na nivonas o ingingnen ta a kano alalaw ta."

language1_text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him, he gave commandment to depart unto the other side.
language2_text: Macita ni Yeso o aro a tao a amlimot sya am ipanci na do macinanao jya o kangay da do katovangan no rako a meybebneng a ranom.

language1_text: And a certain scribe came, and said unto him, Master, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.
language2_text: Am amyan so asa ka mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao a mangay ji Yeso. Maniring jya am, "Mo Mangnanao, o angayan mo am abo ji ko macihzai jimo."

language1_text: And Jesus saith unto him, The foxes have holes, and the birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Amyan so vahay no votdak, amyan so vahay no lapik. Am yaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am abwata o ko tangnan so oo ko an."

language1_text: And another of his disciples said unto him, Lord, suffer me first to go and bury my father.
language2_text: Maniring o asa ka macinanao ji Yeso am, "Mo Panirsirngen, apyahen mo pa yaken a omonong do inawan ni ama kangay ko macilolo rana jimo an."

language1_text: But Jesus said unto him, Follow me; and let the dead bury their dead.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To mo macipanadngi sira o omonong do nimapoling so peylingalingayan a tao. Am imo rana am macilolo ka jyaken."

language1_text: And when he was entered into a ship, his disciples followed him.
language2_text: Somakay si Yeso do tataloran am macihza o macinanao jya.

language1_text: And, behold, there arose a great tempest in the sea, insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves: but he was asleep.
language2_text: Meyratateng am to na ngirasa sira no marahet a palanginan kalokolokong no paong do tataloran da. No kanang am nimitkeh si Yeso.

language1_text: And his disciples came to him, and awoke him, saying, Lord, save us: we perish.
language2_text: Makarahan am mangay da yokain si Yeso no macinanao jya. Maniring sira am, "Mo Panirsirngen, avyayey yaten, ta tamo na marahet."

language1_text: And he saith unto them, Why are ye fearful, O ye of little faith? Then he arose, and rebuked the winds and the sea; and there was a great calm.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ikongo nyo ikanyahey. Yakamo tey likey pa so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to." Makarahan am meyvangon a kasirisiring na rana so rako a pagpag a kano paopaong a karekhang na rana nya.

language1_text: But the men marvelled, saying, What manner of man is this, that even the winds and the sea obey him!
language2_text: Am ori o nisavasavakan da nya. Maniring sira do kadwan jira am, "Ikongo a tao ya. Na kato ngamizngan pa sya no palanginan a kano abkas!"

language1_text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes, there met him two possessed with devils, coming out of the tombs, exceeding fierce, so that no man might pass by that way.
language2_text: Makaranes sira do katovangan no rako a meybebneng a ranom a ili a meyngaran so Cyatala am makasinmo sira so rarwa ka tao a apo do kanitwan. Sira ori am kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan. So ikatey masozi da. Am ori o ikabo no tao a mangonong do dang.

language1_text: And, behold, they cried out, saying, What have we to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of God? art thou come hither to torment us before the time?
language2_text: Macita da si Yeso am amlololos sira. Maniring sira am, "Imo rana Anak no Tao do to am ikongo mo gogadan nyamen. Ori o mo nikasabsab a mai am mo pasingsingtan yamen?"

language1_text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding.
language2_text: No kanang am nimacinao o keyyan da do dang no aro a kois a meykoskos.

language1_text: So the devils besought him, saying, If thou cast us out, suffer us to go away into the herd of swine.
language2_text: Maniring sira o kalamsoyan ni Satan a mapasyasi ji Yeso am, "No si vozwawen mo yamen am to mo rana amya yamen a mangay komovot do kois ito."

language1_text: And he said unto them, Go. And when they were come out, they went into the herd of swine: and, behold, the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea, and perished in the waters.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Angay kamo." Makarahan am makowbot sira o kalamsoyan ni Satan a kangay da komovot do aro a kois. Am ori o niksoz da kangay da makas do alalasyas a katovoz da do rako a meybebneng a ranom a kamimin da meykehmehmes a mawakwak.

language1_text: And they that kept them fled, and went their ways into the city, and told every thing, and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils.
language2_text: O tomita so kois a tao am mina todangay rana sira do ili a kapanci da rana no vazay ang do tao do ili.

language1_text: And, behold, the whole city came out to meet Jesus: and when they saw him, they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts.
language2_text: Ori o nikamimin no tao do ili a mangay a tomita si Yeso. Macita da am to da rana novoy a komaro do ili da.

language1_text: And he entered into a ship, and passed over, and came into his own city.
language2_text: Omavang si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do tataloran am mangay rana sira do katovangan no rako a meybebneng a ranom a meysinaoli do peyvahayan ni Yeso a ili.

language1_text: And, behold, they brought to him a man sick of the palsy, lying on a bed: and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy; Son, be of good cheer; thy sins be forgiven thee.
language2_text: Amyan sira so tao a mangay no ji makapeyvangon a tao no ireyrayan na do tangain ni Yeso. Macita ni Yeso o kakdeng no onowned da am maniring do meyngen a tao am, "Manganako, cyaha ta kangay mo. Yarana nimavonas o raraten mo."

language1_text: And, behold, certain of the scribes said within themselves, This man blasphemeth.
language2_text: Onowned da no tatasa ka mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to am ipanci da si Yeso a komolala si Ama ta do to no ciring na.

language1_text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said, Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts?
language2_text: To na rana tenngi ni Yeso o nakenakem da. Maniring jira am, "Ikongo nyo ipacitarek so onowned.

language1_text: For whether is easier, to say, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Arise, and walk?
language2_text: Manngwa, apyapya kapanci nya do yameyngen a tao so, 'Yanimavonas rana o raraten mo an?' No apyapya o kapanci no, 'Tanek rana kalam mo rana.'

language1_text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins, (then saith he to the sick of the palsy, ) Arise, take up thy bed, and go unto thine house.
language2_text: Ta ko kakzeben inyo a makateneng do oyowyat ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a makavonas so raraten no tao." So pancyan na nya do meyngen a tao so, "Tanek rana kahap mo so ireyrayan mo a mangay rana do vahay nyo."

language1_text: And he arose, and departed to his house.
language2_text: So mina to na meytatanki rana no tao ang a mangay rana do vahay da.

language1_text: But when the multitudes saw it, they marvelled, and glorified God, which had given such power unto men.
language2_text: Macita da no tao am nisavasavak da a kazwazway da si Ama ta do to, ta nipakemkem na do tao o oyowyat na.

language1_text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence, he saw a man, named Matthew, sitting at the receipt of custom: and he saith unto him, Follow me. And he arose, and followed him.
language2_text: Karwan na do dang ni Yeso am macita na o mapeyvazay so deyking a tao a meyngaran si Matay a omlisna do torotorwan no deyking a vahay. Maniring jya am, "Sijya, kapacilolo mo jyaken." Meyratateng am meytatanek a kapacilolo na rana jya.

language1_text: And it came to pass, as Jesus sat at meat in the house, behold, many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples.
language2_text: Koman si Yeso do vahay ni Matay am aro sira mina kararay na mapeyvazay so deyking a tao a kano meyraraten a tao a mai a macihanghang ji Yeso a kano macinanao jya.

language1_text: And when the Pharisees saw it, they said unto his disciples, Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners?
language2_text: Macita da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay am maniring sira do macinanao ji Yeso am, "Ikongo na ipacihanghang no sinsi nyo do mangangap so deyking a kano aro a yameyraraten a tao ang."

language1_text: But when Jesus heard that, he said unto them, They that be whole need not a physician, but they that are sick.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Yeso o ciring da am maniring jira am, "O apiya so kataotao a tao am ji da ngala o mangavavaw a tao. Ta o meyngen a tao o komala so koysang.

language1_text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth, I will have mercy, and not sacrifice: for I am not come to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.
language2_text: O ciring do Seysyo am, 'O kakdain ko am karilaw nyo no icyatatao nyo. So ikabeken a patanangen nyo a makakaday.' Angay kamo na kanakenakem nyo pala so peypeypangayan no ciring ang. Ta o ko nyai am beken a ko manara so ji meyraraten a tao. Ta o yameyraraten a tao am ori o yako nyai."

language1_text: Then came to him the disciples of John, saying, Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft, but thy disciples fast not?
language2_text: Ipisa am mangay sira o macinanao ji Yowani do tangain ni Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Yamen rana kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am namen masangib a yaji mangakaday a meynozi. Am o yamacinanao jimo am yabo yakman sang a vazay da."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto them, Can the children of the bridechamber mourn, as long as the bridegroom is with them? but the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken from them, and then shall they fast.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No mamaring so kanen o mahakay a matarek so vahay a tao am manngwa, amlavi sira o nipanoyon na tao? Jyabo kakman da sang a. Am no marateng o araraw no irakep da so mahakay ang am manoyong rana o kaji da mangakadayan, do kasinalaw da nya.

language1_text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment, for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment, and the rent is made worse.
language2_text: "Abo tao a mapatapang so vayo a milakayob do adan a ayob. Ta ji macimangno. So ikapising no adan a ayob ang. So ikarakorako na pa no kazamitan na.

language1_text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles: else the bottles break, and the wine runneth out, and the bottles perish: but they put new wine into new bottles, and both are preserved.
language2_text: Abo tao a mangap so vayo a potaw cyo a paglowen do adan a kolit no baka, ta zombak. Am ori o paglowan so vayo a potaw cyo do vayo a kolit no baka an. Ta ori o ikapya na."

language1_text: While he spake these things unto them, behold, there came a certain ruler, and worshipped him, saying, My daughter is even now dead: but come and lay thy hand upon her, and she shall live.
language2_text: Macisirsiring pa jira si Yeso am mai o asa ka meymatmatngeh no peyneynozyan a tao a meylilitod do tangain na ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Na kawakwak pa no anak ko a mavakes. Kapakamo mo am mangay mo pa parapongen o lima mo do anak ko a kavyay na rana."

language1_text: And Jesus arose, and followed him, and so did his disciples.
language2_text: Makarahan am meytatanek si Yeso a omonot jya mangay. O macinanao jya am nimacilolo sira.

language1_text: And, behold, a woman, which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years, came behind him, and touched the hem of his garment:
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka mavakes a makadwa so icyarwa (12) so awawan a to makaliliw so kataotao na gomcin no rala. Iya rana am nimangay a manlikod ji Yeso a kapinan na do seysayan no talili na.

language1_text: for she said within herself, If I may but touch his garment, I shall be whole.
language2_text: Manakenakem o mavakes am, "Tana kabnek ko a minan do ayob na am jya todapya rana o kataotao ko a."

language1_text: But Jesus turned him about, and when he saw her, he said, Daughter, be of good comfort; thy faith hath made thee whole. And the woman was made whole from that hour.
language2_text: Meyvazingowngaw si Yeso am macita na o mavakes ang. Maniring jya am, "Manganako, ka manoyong a meyhanhan nyaken. Am ori o to na rana apyai no ingingnen mo." Makarahan am mina todapya rana o ingingnen no mavakes ang.

language1_text: And when Jesus came into the ruler's house, and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise,
language2_text: Mangay si Yeso do vahay no meymatmatngeh no peyneynozyan a tao am macita na omonong do inawan a tao a kano aro a meykalalavi a tao.

language1_text: he said unto them, Give place: for the maid is not dead, but sleepeth. And they laughed him to scorn.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Pakowbot kamo, ta yamitkeh o kanakan eya. Yamakongo kwan nyo." Mamizing da o ciring ni Yeso am no mangay o kaming da am mangay o kapeyoyaoya da.

language1_text: But when the people were put forth, he went in, and took her by the hand, and the maid arose.
language2_text: Makarahan am powboten na sira ni Yeso o aro a tao. Somdep si Yeso do itkehan na no kanakan a kahap na so lima na a kapeyvangon na rana.

language1_text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land.
language2_text: Nimakeykai o vazay a nimeylimwang do dang.

language1_text: And when Jesus departed thence, two blind men followed him, crying, and saying, Thou Son of David, have mercy on us.
language2_text: Karwan na do dang ni Yeso am amyan so rarwa ka mavota tao a macilolo jya. Maniring sira am, "Imo rana sivovoong ni Tawey am ikarilaw mo pa yamen!"

language1_text: And when he was come into the house, the blind men came to him: and Jesus saith unto them, Believe ye that I am able to do this? They said unto him, Yea, Lord.
language2_text: Somdep si Yeso do asa ka vahay a kai da no rarwa ka mavota tao do tangain na. Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Nyo anoyngan yaken a makeywakwak jinyo an?" Maniring sira am, "Mo Panirsirngen, namen anoyngan."

language1_text: Then touched he their eyes, saying, According to your faith be it unto you.
language2_text: Meyratateng am pinanan ni Yeso o mata da. Maniring jira am, "To ko mangozai o nakenakem nyo jyaken a omiwakwak jinyo."
