language2_text: Ikazyak da no macinanao o ciring ni Yeso ang. Maniring sira do kadwan jira am, "Ala ta kajya nimapalolwan so kanen ta o na peycirngan so sang ang!"

language1_text: Which when Jesus perceived, he said unto them, O ye of little faith, why reason ye among yourselves, because ye have brought no bread?
language2_text: Ikongo do katenngan na rana ni Yeso o ipanci da, am ori o nipancyan na nya jira so, "Ikongo nyo kazyakan no nyo kajya nimapalolwan so kanen. Yatey likey pa o onowned nyo jyaken a manta ninyo so kanen nyo.

language1_text: Do ye not yet understand, neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand, and how many baskets ye took up?
language2_text: Manngwa, nyo jyazab? Manngwa, nyo na todahamangi o mina kakcikcil ko so alima ka myanpaw a nibsoy ko so kakaliman a ranaw (5000) a tao? Apira ka yala no kano nang o nimapanpan.

language1_text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand, and how many baskets ye took up?
language2_text: A kano apito a ka myanpaw a nibsoy ko so kakapatan a ranaw (4000) a tao. Apira ka yala o nipeysinsinmo nyo a nimapanpan.

language1_text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread, that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees?
language2_text: Ikongo nyo pa ji makatenngi do nipanci ko na jinyo. Beken a ko pagazen do myanpaw o ciring ko, ta ko pagazen do marahet a onowned da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano macyagom do Satokay."

language1_text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread, but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees.
language2_text: Ori o nipakatenngan da rana ji Yeso no macinanao jya do kaji na ngaingan do kosozi no odong. Ta pakacirngen na do marahet a nanao da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano macyagom do Satokay.

language1_text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Cæ sarea Philippi, he asked his disciples, saying, Whom do men say that I the Son of man am?
language2_text: To da ji makaranes si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do Kaysadiya Veydipi a ili am pacicin na o macinanao jya. Maniring am, "Sino kwan da yaken no tao a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao."

language1_text: And they said, Some say that thou art John the Baptist: some, Elias; and others, Jeremias, or one of the prophets.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Yamyan so tao a yamanci nimo a nimanaktak a si Yowani. Yamyan so tao a yamanci nimo a Idiya. Yamyan so tao a yamanci nimo a Yedimi. Yamyan so tao a yamanci nimo a asa jira do panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: He saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Manngwa, sino kwan nyo yaken."

language1_text: And Simon Peter answered and said, Thou art the Christ, the Son of the living God.
language2_text: Maniring si Simong Pite am, "Imo rana am Misayya ka, Anak no yato meyyonong a mavyay a Tao do to."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Blessed art thou, Simon Bar-jona: for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee, but my Father which is in heaven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Imo rana Simong a anak ni Yowani am ka tey yapya so ngilin. Ta o nanao rana ya am beken a tao yanimapahap sya jimo. Ta si Ama ta do to o yanimapatwaw sya jimo.

language1_text: And I say also unto thee, That thou art Peter, and upon this rock I will build my church; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jimo am imo rana am si Pite ka. So icyakma moy lalitan a patnekan ko so kyokay. So ji na rana makagogaji nya ni Satan. Ta akman rana sang am jyagogad no oyowyat ni Satan.

language1_text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.
language2_text: Itoro ko jimo o ipangingiwang do italamozong ni Ama ta do to. O ji mo mya do teyrahem am akman sang a ji mya do teyngato. O apyahen mo do teyrahem am akman sang a apyahen do teyngato."

language1_text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ.
language2_text: Karahan am ipanci na ni Yeso do macinanao jya o kaji da meycicicyan nya do tao so ka Misayya na.

language1_text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples, how that he must go unto Jerusalem, and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be killed, and be raised again the third day.
language2_text: Nimacipinda no kanang o kato na rana mapazimakmakan so ciring na do macinanao jya a manci no kangay na do Yelosaleng. So ikaro na do dang no alalaw na itoro da jya no kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay a kano panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kawakwak da sya. Am ikatlo na araw am mirwa pa mavyay.

language1_text: Then Peter took him, and began to rebuke him, saying, Be it far from thee, Lord: this shall not be unto thee.
language2_text: Kalain ni Pite si Yeso a pasyain jira a omza sya. Maniring am, "Ji kakman sang mo Panirsirngen. Jyabo kato ney meydednan jimo no akman sang a vazay a."

language1_text: But he turned, and said unto Peter, Get thee behind me, Satan: thou art an offence unto me: for thou savourest not the things that be of God, but those that be of men.
language2_text: Meyvazingowngaw si Yeso am maniring ji Pite am, "Kazey mo Satan. Ta mo zazatan o ko pangonongan. Ta o nakenakem mo am beken a nakenakem ni Ama ta do to. Ta monganay do tao."

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.
language2_text: Karahan am maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "No amyan so tao a omonot jyaken am to na pangawawan o kataotao na a somabway no jyojika na macihza jyaken.

language1_text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it: and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it.
language2_text: Ta o amnakenakem so kataotao na am maraherahet, ta mawakwak ori. Am o tao a to ngawaw pa no kataotao na a mahap so vazay ko am mahap na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na.

language1_text: For what is a man profited, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul?
language2_text: Tana to na mimin o masaod no karawan na mahap a kaji na makahapan so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na am ikongo peypeypangayan no akman sang. Ikongo pa o ipalit na pa so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na.

language1_text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels; and then he shall reward every man according to his works.
language2_text: Yaken rana a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am maciralay ko do azwazway na ni Ama kano aro a tinsi a meygegcin. To ko palololwa o yazaw ko so mina vazay da jyaken no tao.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, There be some standing here, which shall not taste of death, till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o tao a yatomanek do jya am amyan jira ang so makapis pa jyaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a mai a tomalamozong no karawan, do ikamavyay da pa."

language1_text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter, James, and John his brother, and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart,
language2_text: Ikanem na araw am palolwen ni Yeso si Pite a kani Yake a kani Yowani a meyketeh a mangay do makarang a tokon.

language1_text: and was transfigured before them: and his face did shine as the sun, and his raiment was white as the light.
language2_text: No kanang am todablis o keyteytawan ni Yeso do tangain da. So nicyakma ney araw no moing na maniray. Akman sang o talili na.

language1_text: And, behold, there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him.
language2_text: Makarahan am macita da no tatlo a ka macinanao jya si Moyse a kani Idiya a tao no kakwa pa, a macisirsiring ji Yeso.

language1_text: Then answered Peter, and said unto Jesus, Lord, it is good for us to be here: if thou wilt, let us make here three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite ji Yeso am, "Mo Panirsirngen, yata tey yapya do jya. No si apyahen mo am to ko na mamaring do jya so atlo a ka sarwap, asa jimo a asa ji Moyse a asa ji Idiya."

language1_text: While he yet spake, behold, a bright cloud overshadowed them: and behold a voice out of the cloud, which said, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased; hear ye him.
language2_text: Ji na pa teyka ni Pite o ciring na am to ngyan so cinalab a ombengbeng sira a keyyan no ciring a maciralay do cinalab ang. Maniring am, "Iya rana am ney kaglaw ko Anak ko. So sarayan ko nya. Amizngan nyo sya."

language1_text: And when the disciples heard it, they fell on their face, and were sore afraid.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring no macinanao jya am to rana sira meyrorokma do teyrahem a manyahey.

language1_text: And Jesus came and touched them, and said, Arise, and be not afraid.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay jira si Yeso a mapadnadna so nakem da. Maniring am, "Tanek kamo na. Ji kamo anyahey."

language1_text: And when they had lifted up their eyes, they saw no man, save Jesus only.
language2_text: Citahen da am si Yeso rana o macita da.

language1_text: And as they came down from the mountain, Jesus charged them, saying, Tell the vision to no man, until the Son of man be risen again from the dead.
language2_text: Omosok sira apo do tokon am maniring jira si Yeso am, "Do ji ko pa nimirwai a mavyay a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am ji nyo pa meycicicyan o yanyo nimacita vazay an."

language1_text: And his disciples asked him, saying, Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come?
language2_text: Karahan am pacicin da no macinanao jya si Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Ikongo da pancyan nya no yamangnanao no iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to o kapanmanma na mai ni Idiya."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Elias truly shall first come, and restore all things.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Si Idiya rana am manmanma mai a mapeyyalalap so nakem no meykaoya tao.

language1_text: But I say unto you, That Elias is come already, and they knew him not, but have done unto him whatsoever they listed. Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them.
language2_text: Am ko ipanci pa jinyo am yarana nimai si Idiya am da jyatenngi no tao. Am ori o to da naziboi nya no tao. So ikakman na sang no Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a peyraraheten da."

language1_text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist.
language2_text: Ori rana o nipakateneng da rana jya no macinanao ji Yeso so pakacirngen na do nimanaktak a si Yowani.

language1_text: And when they were come to the multitude, there came to him a certain man, kneeling down to him, and saying,
language2_text: Makaranes sira do aro a tao am amyan so asa ka tao a nimai a mangay meylilitod do tangain na ni Yeso.

language1_text: Lord, have mercy on my son: for he is lunatick, and sore vexed: for ofttimes he falleth into the fire, and oft into the water.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, ikarilaw mo pa o anak ko. Ta yamamezamezay. So na ipangasi a yamaleklektek do apoy a kado ranom.

language1_text: And I brought him to thy disciples, and they could not cure him.
language2_text: Nyangay ko na do macinanao jimo am ji da vonas jya."

language1_text: Then Jesus answered and said, O faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you? how long shall I suffer you? bring him hither to me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Kamo tey yalikey pa so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to a tao sicyaikwaya do yanyo kapeyraraten. Akman rana so wanjin o kownownay ko a macikaop jinyo. Akman ko rana so wanjin a marilaw ninyo. Ayyan kamo o kanakan do jya."

language1_text: And Jesus rebuked the devil; and he departed out of him: and the child was cured from that very hour.
language2_text: Karahan am ioya na o kalamsoyan ni Satan a kapakowbot na rana. So nikapiya na rana no anak na.

language1_text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart, and said, Why could not we cast him out?
language2_text: Karahan am pacicin da si Yeso no macinanao jya. Maniring sira am, "Ikongo namen ji makavozwawi so kalamsoyan ni Satan ang."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto them, Because of your unbelief: for verily I say unto you, If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed, ye shall say unto this mountain, Remove hence to yonder place; and it shall remove; and nothing shall be impossible unto you.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O nyo ikakman sang am yaji makanet pa o nakenakem nyo si Ama ta do to. To ko na macitangayan jinyo am tana akman kamo so alikey a vettow no nappa so kakdekdeng no nakem am tana to nyo nirsirnga o tokon a meylis do yanan na kangay na do kwang am meylis ori an. So ikabo no ji nyo a peyvazay a vazay.

language1_text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting.
language2_text: [To nyo peykakasa o onowned nyo a meynozi a ji mangakaday. Ta ori o ikavozwaw no akman so sang a kalamsoyan ni Satan."]

language1_text: And while they abode in Galilee, Jesus said unto them, The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men:
language2_text: Malovot o macinanao ji Yeso do Cyadidi am maniring si Yeso jira am, "Itoro da o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao do macioya jya tao,

language1_text: and they shall kill him, and the third day he shall be raised again. And they were exceeding sorry.
language2_text: a kawakwak da sya. Am ikatlo na araw am mirwa pa mavyay." Mamizing da ori no macinanao jya am marahet sira so aktokto.

language1_text: And when they were come to Capernaum, they that received tribute money came to Peter, and said, Doth not your master pay tribute?
language2_text: Makaranes si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do Cyapaynong am amyan so mangangap so deyking no rako a panaralayan a tao a mangay ji Pite. Maniring sira jya am, "Manngwa, tomoro so deyking do rako a panaralayan o Sinsi nyo an?"

language1_text: He saith, Yes. And when he was come into the house, Jesus prevented him, saying, What thinkest thou, Simon? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute? of their own children, or of strangers?
language2_text: Maniring si Pite jira am, "Ta ji na noroi." Somdep do vahay si Pite am panmahen na pacicin ni Yeso. Maniring jya am, "Mo Simong, sino o pangangapan no panirsirngen do karawan so deyking. Mangap do anak na? No mangap do karwan no tao. Manngo ka dang."

language1_text: Peter saith unto him, Of strangers. Jesus saith unto him, Then are the children free.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Mangap do karwan no tao." Maniring si Yeso jya am, "No ori o nakem mo am ji noroi saon o anak na am.

language1_text: Notwithstanding, lest we should offend them, go thou to the sea, and cast an hook, and take up the fish that first cometh up; and when thou hast opened his mouth, thou shalt find a piece of money: that take, and give unto them for me and thee.
language2_text: Am taosya o kakma tey mapasobsobna. So to mo rana angai a mamasil. Si citahen mo o ngoso no ney manma na among mo am makacita ka so asa ka nizpi. Makanet rana ori a itoro ta deyking do rako a panaralayan."

language1_text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus, saying, Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven?
language2_text: No kanang am pacicin da no macinanao si Yeso. Maniring sira jya am, "Sino pakarakehen a tao do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And Jesus called a little child unto him, and set him in the midst of them,
language2_text: Karahan am manara si Yeso so asa ka kanakan a kapatanek na sya do tangain da.

language1_text: and said, Verily I say unto you, Except ye be converted, and become as little children, ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no si mamlis kamo akman so kanakan eya am ori o ipacikaop nyo do tao a italamozong na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child, the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: O akman so kanakan eya ji makazyazyak am ney rakeh na do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me.
language2_text: O mapanadnad jyaken a tomaotao so likta kanakan eya am kataotao ko na ori a taotawwen na.

language1_text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me, it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea.
language2_text: "No amyan so tao a tomirara so pakananaken da tao a meyraraten a kapeymakaro na jyaken am apyapya rana kato rana milan do zagaw na itbong do awa a wakwaken.

language1_text: Woe unto the world because of offences! for it must needs be that offences come; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh!
language2_text: To sira makasi o tao do karawan a kalittan a meyraraten. O raraten no tao am kangay na ori. Am o tao a yapwan no kapeyraraten na am ney rako o oyaoyyan na no akman sang a tao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee, cut them off, and cast them from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed, rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire.
language2_text: No si asa ka lima mo no beken a ai mo o ipeyraraten mo am to ranangteba kawalit nya. Tana abo lima kano ai a kapakahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad am apyapya pa o akman sang, a kano meynanod so lima kano ai a mangay payongben do jyahesep a lila no apoy.

language1_text: And if thine eye offend thee, pluck it out, and cast it from thee: it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye, rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire.
language2_text: No si asa ka mata mo o nipeyraraten mo am to rana ngoswa iwalit. Tana asa rana o mata mo a kapakahap mo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad mo am apyapya o akman sang a kano meynanod so mata mangay do apoy do kararatan.

language1_text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones; for I say unto you, That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven.
language2_text: "Makapzat kamo. Ji nyo ngolala sira o pakananaken da tao. To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o tinsi a yasomidong sira am yamyan sira do tangain ni Ama ta do to do teyngato.

language1_text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost.
language2_text: [O Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am nimai a mapatazadang so meyraraten a tao.]

language1_text: How think ye? if a man have an hundred sheep, and one of them be gone astray, doth he not leave the ninety and nine, and goeth into the mountains, and seeketh that which is gone astray?
language2_text: "Naknakmen nyo pala. No amyan so tao a mapalam so yasa poo (100) a kagling a kavozaw no asa am jyabo kaji na to macyozayan do asyam so ipakapoo (99) a kagling a mangay komala so asa ka kagling a nimavozaw a.

language1_text: And if so be that he find it, verily I say unto you, he rejoiceth more of that sheep, than of the ninety and nine which went not astray.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no si makala na o nimavozaw a asa ka kagling am jyabo kaji na noyotan a makacita so nimavozaw a kagling a kano asyam so ipakapoo (99) a kagling a.

language1_text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven, that one of these little ones should perish.
language2_text: Akman sang si Ama ta do to, a ji mamyapya no pakananaken da tao a mavozaw so onowned ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee, go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone: if he shall hear thee, thou hast gained thy brother.
language2_text: "No amyan so malas a vazay na jimo no akma moy kakteh do cinai am to ka nangay a macitangay jya a manci no kalasan na. Am no maveyvow kamo am ori ikakman mo sang. No amizngen na imo am manoyong kamo na meypyapya so nakem do tangain ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But if he will not hear thee, then take with thee one or two more, that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established.
language2_text: Am no si ji na ngamiznga imo am to ka na manara so rarwa a mangay jya. O ikakman na sang am akma ney yongkad o rarwa am tatlo a ka tao do kanoyong da kalas da no mina ciring da.

language1_text: And if he shall neglect to hear them, tell it unto the church: but if he neglect to hear the church, let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican.
language2_text: No ji na pa ngamiznga am to mo nangayan do tangain no aro a sinjya a manci no cinapowapwan na no vazay. No ji na pa ngamiznga sira am to nyo rana ngopas o ngaran na, kaji na rana macibedbedan jinyo.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.
language2_text: "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o raten nyo do teyrahem am raten ni Ama ta do teyngato. O apyahen nyo do teyrahem am akman sang a apyahen na do teyngato.

language1_text: Again I say unto you, That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask, it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven.
language2_text: Ko pa ipanci jinyo am tana rarwa kamo a kakma nyoy yasa so nakenakem a mapasyasi ji Ama ta do to am itoro na o amin nyo jya.

language1_text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
language2_text: Tana teyrararwa, teytatatlo o mapasyasi jyaken am macilovot ko jira."

language1_text: Then came Peter to him, and said, Lord, how oft shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? till seven times?
language2_text: No kano nang am pacicin ni Pite si Yeso. Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, no amyan so oyyan ko no kakteh ko am ipira ko a paoyowan. Manet rana o ipipito?"

language1_text: Jesus saith unto him, I say not unto thee, Until seven times: but, Until seventy times seven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Beken a ipipito, ta to meyyonong o kapaoyo mo jya.

language1_text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king, which would take account of his servants.
language2_text: Ta o italamozong ni Ama ta do to am akman so pehngehngayan ko so ciring eya. Ipisa o panirsirngen a omami so nivood da nizpi na no lamlamsoy na am,

language1_text: And when he had begun to reckon, one was brought unto him, which owed him ten thousand talents.
language2_text: yai da do tangain na o asa do lamlamsoy na a nimamood jya so meykalaklaksa nizpi.

language1_text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay, his lord commanded him to be sold, and his wife, and children, and all that he had, and payment to be made.
language2_text: Ikongo do abo o paolin na do nivood na no tao ang, am ori o to na rana manazangi nya do tao a lamlamsoy da, kapazanod na pa so mavakes na kano ananak na kano aro a peymasaodan na itbos na so nivood na nizpi.

language1_text: The servant therefore fell down, and worshipped him, saying, Lord, have patience with me, and I will pay thee all.
language2_text: Karahan am to rana meylilitod o lamlamsoy na do tangain na a mapasyasi jya. Maniring am, 'Ikasi mo pa yaken an. Cyaha, ta paolin ko o ko nivood jimo a nizpi.'

language1_text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion, and loosed him, and forgave him the debt.
language2_text: Ikarilaw no panirsirngen na am to na ranangbowa o nivood na jya a kapasaway na rana sya.

language1_text: But the same servant went out, and found one of his fellowservants, which owed him an hundred pence: and he laid hands on him, and took him by the throat, saying, Pay me that thou owest.
language2_text: "Makowbot o lamlamsoy na am masazi na o kararay na a nimamood jya so to makangarnan a nizpi. Karahan am rakpen na kavitkeh na so zagaw na. Maniring am, 'Inney jya o nivood mo jyaken a nizpi asyo.'

language1_text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet, and besought him, saying, Have patience with me, and I will pay thee all.
language2_text: To rana meylilitod o kararay na a mapasyasi jya. Maniring am, 'Ikasi mo pa yaken an. Cyaha, ta paolin ko o nivood ko jimo a nizpi.'

language1_text: And he would not: but went and cast him into prison, till he should pay the debt.
language2_text: Am ji na mya paronoronen na. Am ori o nyangayan na do pamemtengan a mangay do ipaoli na rana so nizpi ang.

language1_text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done, they were very sorry, and came and told unto their lord all that was done.
language2_text: Macita da o vazay na no karwan da am marahet sira so aktokto. Ori o nyangay da do panirsirngen a kapanci da no vazay ang.

language1_text: Then his lord, after that he had called him, said unto him, O thou wicked servant, I forgave thee all that debt, because thou desiredst me:
language2_text: Karahan am rarahen no panirsirngen o lamlamsoy na a mai. Maniring jya am, 'Imo rana ya am ka tey marahet a lamlamsoy ko! No kapasyasi mo jyaken asyo am ko tongbowa o mo nivood jyaken a nizpi.

language1_text: shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant, even as I had pity on thee?
language2_text: Ikeykongo ka ya, yajyarilaw no kararay mo akman jyaken a yamarilaw nimo.'

language1_text: And his lord was wroth, and delivered him to the tormentors, till he should pay all that was due unto him.
language2_text: Ori o nipeyoyaoya na no panirsirngen. Karahan am alyowen na do pamemtengan a mangay do miminan na rana so nizpi a nivood a paolin."

language1_text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you, if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso am, "Si ji monganay do onowned nyo o to nyo peykaboboi so oyyan nyo no kakteh nyo am akman sang si Ama ta do to jinyo."

language1_text: And it came to pass, that when Jesus had finished these sayings, he departed from Galilee, and came into the coasts of Judæ a beyond Jordan;
language2_text: Teyka mangononong si Yeso am karwan na do Cyadidi a kangay na do katovangan no Yotan a ayo a meypangay do Yotay.

language1_text: And great multitudes followed him; and he healed them there.
language2_text: Aro o tao a omonot jya. Am ori o to na rana ngiwakwaki do meykeyngeyngen a tao do dang.

language1_text: The Pharisees also came unto him, tempting him, and saying unto him, Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause?
language2_text: O tatasa ka tao a macyagom do Vadisay a nimangay ji Yeso am naknakmen da o keyleylamdam da sya. Am ori o nipancyan da no, "Manngwa, apya do iwawalam ta o kapakaro ta so kahanghangan ta an?"

language1_text: And he answered and said unto them, Have ye not read, that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female,
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Manngwa, ji nyo pa nivilangan o ciring do Seysyo? Ta maniring am, 'No kavayo na pa mangamaog so karawan ni Ama ta do to am nimangamaog so mahakay a kano mavakes.'

language1_text: and said, For this cause shall a man leave father and mother, and shall cleave to his wife: and they twain shall be one flesh?
language2_text: Maniring pa am, 'Ori o karwan da na do inyapwan da no mapapapen a tao a matarek so vahay. So icyakma dey yasa ka tao rana meyyaven do vahay.'

language1_text: Wherefore they are no more twain, but one flesh. What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.
language2_text: So icyakma dey yasa rana so kataotao. Am ori o jya to meysyai no meyyaven do vahay. Ta nimeysinmo rana sira do tangain ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: They say unto him, Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement, and to put her away?
language2_text: Maniring o tao a macyagom do Vadisay jya am, "No ori am to na mancii nya ni Moyse do ineynapo ta so sang a iwawalam a manci no kapya no kapeyvatvatek so vakong a itoro do pakarwen a mavakes."

language1_text: He saith unto them, Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives: but from the beginning it was not so.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Nipya ni Moyse sira o ineynapo nyo a yamapakaro so katovong da do vahay. Am o na nipyan sira am sira akman jinyo a tey rahet, jya pasovoy a tao. Ta no ka ori pa so kapangamaog ni Ama ta do to so karawan am jya nimakman so sang.

language1_text: And I say unto you, Whosoever shall put away his wife, except it be for fornication, and shall marry another, committeth adultery: and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no ji da panadnada inyo no kataned nyo do vahay a mavakes am ori o ikakman nyo so sang. Am no abo a kato nyo pakarwan so kataned nyo do vahay a kangay nyo pa mapasakay so asa ka tao am raraten nyo rana ori."

language1_text: His disciples say unto him, If the case of the man be so with his wife, it is not good to marry.
language2_text: Maniring o macinanao jya am, "No yakman sang o yahahapan sya no meyyaven do vahay am apyapya rana o kaji mapasakayan."

language1_text: But he said unto them, All men cannot receive this saying, save they to whom it is given.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O akman rana sang a nanao am beken a todamimin o tao a makahap sya. Ta o nioyatan ni Ama ta do to a tao o makahap so sang.

language1_text: For there are some eunuchs, which were so born from their mother's womb: and there are some eunuchs, which were made eunuchs of men: and there be eunuchs, which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven's sake. He that is able to receive it, let him receive it.
language2_text: Ta aro peypeypangayan no kaji mapasakayan no tao. Ta tatasa ka tao o nimeycicinda no kalyalikey da o kasalit na jira no kapasakasakay da. Am o tatasa ka tao am amyan so peypeypangayan no kaji da mapasakasakayan. O tatasa ka tao am to da rana mamneki o kaji da mapasakasakayan, do kahap da so vazay ni Ama ta do to. So ipeykataretarek no tao a omahap so nanao eya."

language1_text: Then were there brought unto him little children, that he should put his hands on them, and pray: and the disciples rebuked them.
language2_text: Amyan so tao a mangay no kanakan do tangain ni Yeso a komakzeb so kapanlanlag na nira ni Yeso a meynozi nira. Macita da sira no macinanao jya am azahen da sira ioya.

language1_text: But Jesus said, Suffer little children, and forbid them not, to come unto me: for of such is the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Pancyan sira o kanakan a mai jyaken. Ji nyo ngaza sira. Ta o italamozong na ni Ama ta do to am akman sira so sang."

language1_text: And he laid his hands on them, and departed thence.
language2_text: Karahan am ipanlanlag na sira ni Yeso a kakaro na rana do dang.

language1_text: And, behold, one came and said unto him, Good Master, what good thing shall I do, that I may have eternal life?
language2_text: Ipisa am amyan so tao a mangay ji Yeso. Maniring am, "Mo Mangnanao, makongo ko so wanjin a meyvazay so apya vazay a kapakahap ko so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ko."

language1_text: And he said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God: but if thou wilt enter into life, keep the commandments.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ikongo mo panahsan nya jyaken so apya vazay. Yasa saon o yapya so vazay am. Am no si kakzeben mo o kapakahap mo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad mo am ahapen mo o iwawalam ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: He saith unto him, Which? Jesus said, Thou shalt do no murder, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness,
language2_text: Maniring o tao ori am, "Ikongo do iwawalam ni Ama ta do to ang." Maniring si Yeso am, "Ji mangap so tao. Ji pasagpyana o aktokto. Ji manakaw. Ji mangamaog so malas a ciring.

language1_text: Honour thy father and thy mother: and, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
language2_text: Ikaglaw nyo a ikanig o inyapwan nyo. Akman so aryarilaw so kataotao o karilawan no icyatatao."

language1_text: The young man saith unto him, All these things have I kept from my youth up: what lack I yet?
language2_text: Maniring o mowva tao am, "Ko na nimamimin o aro a iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to a yanipeyvazay. Ikongo pa o peyvazain koo."

language1_text: Jesus said unto him, If thou wilt be perfect, go and sell that thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come and follow me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No si kakzeben mo o kapyapya na pa no ahahapan mo sya am to mo na mimina ipanazang o kangangay mo a ipanidong so makasi a tao. Ta ori iyan no kangangay mo do teyngato, a kapacilolo mo rana jyaken."

language1_text: But when the young man heard that saying, he went away sorrowful: for he had great possessions.
language2_text: Mamizing na ori no mowva tao am to na ligaligana o oo na, do kapakanakem na so karo no peymeymasaodan na.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples, Verily I say unto you, That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven.
language2_text: Karahan am maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am tey masalit o aro so peymeymasaodan a tao a macikaop do italamozong ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And again I say unto you, It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Ko pa ipanci jinyo am mowwamek pa o meykavokovokoz so likod a baka a lomyos do lala no rayom a kano aro so peymeymasaodan a macikaop do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: When his disciples heard it, they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring na no macinanao jya am mina to ogto sira. Maniring rana sira ji Yeso am, "No akman sang am sino o patazadangen na ni Ama ta do to do teyngato."

language1_text: But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso a tomita sira am, "O masalit do tao am mowwamek ji Ama ta do to. Ta abo ji na peyvazay ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Then answered Peter and said unto him, Behold, we have forsaken all, and followed thee; what shall we have therefore?
language2_text: Makarahan am maniring rana si Pite am, "Cita pala yamen a yarana nimamimin a yanikomaro do peymeymasaodan namen a yamacilolo jimo. Ikongo kakownongan na no akman sang."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto them, Verily I say unto you, That ye which have followed me, in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory, ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no makwa am no amlisna o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao do lilisnan na do teyngato am inyo rana yanimacilolo jyaken am amlisna kamo do adwa so icyarwa lilisnan no panirsirngen a tomalamozong no sivosivovoong da no rarwa so ikakarwan a ananak ni Yakebo.

language1_text: And every one that hath forsaken houses, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my name's sake, shall receive an hundredfold, and shall inherit everlasting life.
language2_text: O mahap so vazay ko a to rana ngaro do kavavahay da kano kakakteh da kano inyapwan da kano minapodpod jya kano nihakawan da am arwaro pa o makadpeh jira a kapakahap da so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: But many that are first shall be last; and the last shall be first.
language2_text: Am o macipanmanma sicyaikwaya am masipanownowji rana no makwa do teyngato. Sira rana o nimasipanownowji am masipanmanma rana sira do teyngato.

language1_text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard.
language2_text: "O italamozong ni Ama ta do to am akman so yamalavat a yapehngehngain a ciring eya. Amyan so tao a mangay a meykala so peyvazain na tao do nihakawan na.

language1_text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day, he sent them into his vineyard.
language2_text: Ipanci na jira o kateyhesa ka nizpi no ipanizpi na sira do kateyhesa araw. Makarahan am ipanci na rana sira mangay meyvazay.

language1_text: And he went out about the third hour, and saw others standing idle in the marketplace,
language2_text: Ikasyam na no vatvatek do apnezak am mangay pa meykala so tao. Karahan am to na cita sira o tatasa ka tao a abo so vazavazay.

language1_text: and said unto them; Go ye also into the vineyard, and whatsoever is right I will give you. And they went their way.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, 'Mai kamo a meyvazay do nihakawan ko an. Cyaha, ta panizpin ko inyo.'

language1_text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour, and did likewise.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay sira meyvazay. Meyigen o araw a kado ikatlo no vatvatek do makoyab am makakala pa so tao a meyvazay do nihakawan na.

language1_text: And about the eleventh hour he went out, and found others standing idle, and saith unto them, Why stand ye here all the day idle?
language2_text: Ikalima no vatvatek do ikakoyab na rana am nimakacita so tao a meytatanek a abo so vazay. Maniring jira am, 'Ikongo nyo to meytatanki do jya yabo so vazay.'

language1_text: They say unto him, Because no man hath hired us. He saith unto them, Go ye also into the vineyard; and whatsoever is right, that shall ye receive.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, 'Yabo yamanci nyamen a yameyvazay.' Maniring jira am, 'No komwan am to kamo nangai a meyvazay do nihakawan ko.'

language1_text: So when even was come, the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward, Call the labourers, and give them their hire, beginning from the last unto the first.
language2_text: "Maseyrem rana am ipanci no mapeynihakawan sya o lamlamsoy na. Maniring am, 'Rarahen mo sira o yanimeyvazay a tao, katoro mo nya jira so nizpi da. Papwen mo do ney manowji na nimeyvazay o torwan mo, kato mo ngatwatontonan sira do ney manmanma na nimeyvazay.'

language1_text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour, they received every man a penny.
language2_text: O nimapapo so kapeyvazay da do ikalima no vatvatek am maponged sira no teyhesa ka nizpi.

language1_text: But when the first came, they supposed that they should have received more; and they likewise received every man a penny.
language2_text: Itoro na o nizpi da no ney manma na nimeyvazay a tao am masaray sira, ta ipanci da o kapahama na so nizpi da. Am jya nimakman sang, ta to sira meyyangangay a teyhesa ka nizpi.

language1_text: And when they had received it, they murmured against the goodman of the house,
language2_text: Mahap da o nizpi da am maoya sira so aktokto.

language1_text: saying, These last have wrought but one hour, and thou hast made them equal unto us, which have borne the burden and heat of the day.
language2_text: Maniring rana sira do mapeynihakawan sya am, 'Yasa ka vatvatek da nipeyvazay no yanimanownowji a ka nyamen. Am yamen am namen kasaraw a yameyzizikna no vazay mo. Am mo todey pehngaya sira jyamen so nizpi.'

language1_text: But he answered one of them, and said, Friend, I do thee no wrong: didst not thou agree with me for a penny?
language2_text: Maniring rana o mapeynihakawan sya do asa ka tao jira am, 'Mo kahakay, jyabo ko kaniomapit jinyo a. O nipamnekan ko a nizpi nyo no kapeysirsiring tamo asyo am asa ka nizpi o itoro ko jinyo.

language1_text: Take that thine is, and go thy way: I will give unto this last, even as unto thee.
language2_text: So ahapan nyo so nizpi nyo an. Ta nakenakem ko o ko to peyyangangain jinyo a yanimeyvazay a tao.

language1_text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own? Is thine eye evil, because I am good?
language2_text: Manngwa, abo onowned ko komakaday so angayan no nizpi ko? Nyo kazyakan nyaken a yamangazaw no nizpi ko.'"

language1_text: So the last shall be first, and the first last: for many be called, but few chosen.
language2_text: Karahan am maniring si Yeso am, "O yamasipanownowji sicyaikwaya am masipanmanma rana sira no makwa do teyngato. O nimasipanomanoma am masipanownowji rana sira."

language1_text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way, and said unto them,
language2_text: Mangay sira do Yelosaleng am lovoten na ni Yeso o rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya. Maniring jira am,

language1_text: Behold, we go up to Jerusalem; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes, and they shall condemn him to death,
language2_text: "Amizngen nyo an, do tamo ipeypangay do Yelosaleng sicyaikwaya an, da kapanazang nyaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao no panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to, kapanci da no tao a omzakat jyaken,

language1_text: and shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock, and to scourge, and to crucify him: and the third day he shall rise again.
language2_text: a katoro da nyaken do beken a tao do Yotay. So peyyaliliman da jyaken a bakbakan a padketen do jyojika. Ikatlo na araw am mirwa ko pa a mavyay."

language1_text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee's children with her sons, worshipping him, and desiring a certain thing of him.
language2_text: O mavakes ni Sipitay a kano rarwa ka anak na mahakay am mangay sira ji Yeso a kapeylilitod no mavakes do tangain ni Yeso a mapasyasi jya.

language1_text: And he said unto her, What wilt thou? She saith unto him, Grant that these my two sons may sit, the one on thy right hand, and the other on the left, in thy kingdom.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Ikongo mo kakzeben." Maniring am, "No si amyan ka do peypanirsirngen mo am to mo na mancyan o anak ko a macipeyvik do wanan mo a kado ozi mo a meypanirsirngen."

language1_text: But Jesus answered and said, Ye know not what ye ask. Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of, and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with? They say unto him, We are able.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Nyo jyatenngi o yanyo kakzeben. Manngwa, mahap nyo o rako a alalaw ko an?" Maniring sira am, "Noon, mahap namen."

language1_text: And he saith unto them, Ye shall drink indeed of my cup, and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with: but to sit on my right hand, and on my left, is not mine to give, but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Manoyong kahap nyo so alalaw ko. Am beken a yaken o mamnek do tao a omlisna do wanan ko a kado ozi ko a meypanirsirngen. Ta si Ama ta do to o mamnek do amlisna do dang."

language1_text: And when the ten heard it, they were moved with indignation against the two brethren.
language2_text: Mamizing da ori no asa ngarnan a macinanao jya am ikaoya da sira o meyketeh ang.

language1_text: But Jesus called them unto him, and said, Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them, and they that are great exercise authority upon them.
language2_text: Karahan am lovoten na sira do tangain na ni Yeso o macinanao jya. Maniring jira am, "O panirsirngen rana do teyrahem am abo ji ngamizing sya a tao an. So pancyan da no nang a makayokod nira a tao.

language1_text: But it shall not be so among you: but whosoever will be great among you, let him be your minister;
language2_text: Am inyo rana am ji nyo nginara o akman sang. No si amyan jinyo so makza no kaizay na am pavevehen nyo o kataotao nyo a manidong so icyatatao nyo an.

language1_text: and whosoever will be chief among you, let him be your servant:
language2_text: Si myan so tao a makza no kaizay na am inarahen na o lamlamsoy a mapeylamnay so tao.

language1_text: even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
language2_text: Akman so Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao. Ta o na nyai am beken a ilamnain no tao. Ta mapeylamnay so aro a tao a kangay na mapasansan so kataotao na yagag na sira do peyraratenan da."

language1_text: And as they departed from Jericho, a great multitude followed him.
language2_text: Karwan da do Yedike a ili am aro tao a omonot ji Yeso.

language1_text: And, behold, two blind men sitting by the way side, when they heard that Jesus passed by, cried out, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou Son of David.
language2_text: Amyan so rarwa ka mavota tao a omlisna do siri no rarahan. Mamizing da si Yeso a meyliktaw do dang am amlololos sira. Maniring sira am, "Imo rana macikownongan ji Tawey am ikarilaw mo pa yamen."

language1_text: And the multitude rebuked them, because they should hold their peace: but they cried the more, saying, Have mercy on us, O Lord, thou Son of David.
language2_text: Ikaoya da sira no aro a tao. Ji da mya sira meyzezyak. Am ikeykavevek da amlololos a manci no, "Mo Panirsirngen a macikownongan ji Tawey, ikarilaw mo pa yamen."

language1_text: And Jesus stood still, and called them, and said, What will ye that I shall do unto you?
language2_text: Mina to neyked si Yeso a kapanci na nira mai. Maniring jira am, "Ikongo o nyo kakzeben a sidongan ko jinyo."

language1_text: They say unto him, Lord, that our eyes may be opened.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Mo Panirsirngen, sidongen mo pa yamen do mata namen a kapakacita namen rana."

language1_text: So Jesus had compassion on them, and touched their eyes: and immediately their eyes received sight, and they followed him.
language2_text: Ikarilaw na sira ni Yeso. Am ori o nipinanan na do mata da. Karahan am jya nimeyyahahay sira nimakacita a kapacihza da rana ji Yeso.

language1_text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem, and were come to Bethphage, unto the mount of Olives, then sent Jesus two disciples,
language2_text: Masngen rana sira do Yelosaleng am mangay sira do Peyvake a ili do asa ka tokon a meyngaran so Kanlan. Nimanovoy si Yeso so rarwa ka macinanao jya manma mangay do ili.

language1_text: saying unto them, Go into the village over against you, and straightway ye shall find an ass tied, and a colt with her: loose them, and bring them unto me.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Angay kamo do ili eyto. Si makacita kamo so meyina baka makedked do dang am ovain nyo sira yai do jya.

language1_text: And if any man say ought unto you, ye shall say, The Lord hath need of them; and straightway he will send them.
language2_text: No si amyan so macisirsiring jinyo am ipanci nyo o, 'Yamyan so na patakan nya no Panirsirngen.' No si mamizing na o ciring nyo am cyaha, ta itoro na jinyo."

language1_text: All this was done, that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, saying,
language2_text: O icyakman na so sang am yatodey mangononong o ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. Ta maniring am,

language1_text: Tell ye the daughter of Sion, Behold, thy King cometh unto thee, Meek, and sitting upon an ass, And a colt the foal of an ass.
language2_text: "Si maniring kamo do tao do Yelosaleng am, Cita kamo o Panirsirngen nyo a mai. Iya rana am na ji pakaranga o kataotao na a omavang do anak no baka."

language1_text: And the disciples went, and did as Jesus commanded them,
language2_text: So to da mangozai do ciring ni Yeso no rarwa ka macinanao jya.

language1_text: and brought the ass, and the colt, and put on them their clothes, and they set him thereon.
language2_text: So nyalakan da so meyina baka yai a kaparasay da so ayob da do likod no baka a kapanci da rana ni Yeso a omapon do baka.

language1_text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way; others cut down branches from the trees, and strawed them in the way.
language2_text: Aro tao a tomeytay so ayob da do rarahan. O karwan da am mangap sira so yangaw no nitba da kayo a teytain da do rarahan.

language1_text: And the multitudes that went before, and that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna to the son of David: Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord; Hosanna in the highest.
language2_text: O omanop sya aro a tao am amlololos rana sira a manci no, "Inaoy si omaing o admadmay do sivovoong ni Tawey! Inaoy si ipanlanlag na ni Ama ta do to o nitovoy na a yarana nimai do teyrahem! Inaoy si mangay ji Ama ta do to o azwazway na!"

language1_text: And when he was come into Jerusalem, all the city was moved, saying, Who is this?
language2_text: Mangay si Yeso do Yelosaleng am mina todagnoz o tao do ili ang. Maniring rana sira o tao am, "Sino o tao ang."

language1_text: And the multitude said, This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee.
language2_text: Maniring sira o aro a tao a macihza ji Yeso am, "Iya rana am yapo do Cyadidi a yameyvahay do Nasale a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran so Yeso."

language1_text: And Jesus went into the temple of God, and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves,
language2_text: Somdep si Yeso do rako a panaralayan am powboten na sira o tao a manazang no makakaday a warawara do dang a kapasakeb na sya ibokbok so peypalipalitan da so nizpi a kavangan a kano lilisnan da no manazang no hato a tao.

language1_text: and said unto them, It is written, My house shall be called the house of prayer; but ye have made it a den of thieves.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "O domket do Seysyo a ciring na ni Ama ta do to am, 'O raralayan nyo nyaken a vahay am peyneynozyan ori no aro a tao.' Am nyo to peyvaliw a da peyvahayan no manakaw a tao."

language1_text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple; and he healed them.
language2_text: Amyan so mavota kano makasapa tao a nimangay do tangain ni Yeso. Ori o niwakwakan na jira.

language1_text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did, and the children crying in the temple, and saying, Hosanna to the son of David; they were sore displeased,
language2_text: Macita da si Yeso no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a nimapeyvazay so aro a mapeyzokab a vazay a kapakamizing da pa so aro a kanakan a amlololos do rako a panaralayan a manci no, "Inaoy si omaing o admadmay do sivovoong ni Tawey!" Mamizing da ori am ori o nipeyoyaoya da.

language1_text: and said unto him, Hearest thou what these say? And Jesus saith unto them, Yea; have ye never read, Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise?
language2_text: Maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Mo mamizing sira yamlololos a yameyzezyak ang?" Maniring si Yeso am, "Noon, ko mamizing. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, 'Ninanao mo o kanakan a kano si Kekey pa so ngaran a mapatwaw so ney yapya na yadmadmay da si Ama ta do to.' Manngwa, ji nyo pa nivilangan o akman sang a ciring?"

language1_text: And he left them, and went out of the city into Bethany; and he lodged there.
language2_text: Karahan am karwan na rana sira ni Yeso a meypangay do Potani a keysan na do dang.

language1_text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city, he hungered.
language2_text: Apnezak do ikadwa na araw am mangonong sira meysinaoli do ili. No kanang am makcin si Yeso.

language1_text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way, he came to it, and found nothing thereon, but leaves only, and said unto it, Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever. And presently the fig tree withered away.
language2_text: Macita na o meyngaran so ovako a kayo amyan do siri no rarahan am mangay a meykala so asi na. Am aboo, ta voong na o macita na. Karahan am to na rana manircirngi o kayo ang. Maniring am, "To ka rana meyyonong a ji rana malasi." Meyratateng am jya nimeyyahahay o kayo a nimaoto.

language1_text: And when the disciples saw it, they marvelled, saying, How soon is the fig tree withered away!
language2_text: Macita da no macinanao jya am isavasavak da. Maniring sira am, "Asyo o kayo eya yaji ngahay a yamaoto."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto them, Verily I say unto you, If ye have faith, and doubt not, ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree, but also if ye shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; it shall be done.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no manoyong kamo a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to a ji meykarwa so nakem am akman kamo sang a makapeyvazay so yako mina vazay ang. Am beken a ori an. Ta tana to nyo nirsirnga o tokon a mangay do awa am mangay ori an.

language1_text: And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.
language2_text: No makdeng kamo so nakem ji Ama ta do to am o amin nyo do inozi nyo am mahap nyo."

language1_text: And when he was come into the temple, the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching, and said, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority?
language2_text: Somdep do rako a panaralayan si Yeso am mangnanao so tao do dang. O panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay am mai sira ji Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Asyo oyowyat mo a yamapeyvazay so aro a vazay eya. Sino o yanitomoro nya jimo so sang."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I also will ask you one thing, which if ye tell me, I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ko inyo pacicin no asa ka ciring. No si katenngan nyo yaken a tovisan am ori o pancyan ko no na nikapwan no oyowyat ko a yamapeyvazay so aro a vazay.

language1_text: The baptism of John, whence was it? from heaven, or of men? And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say unto us, Why did ye not then believe him?
language2_text: Wanjin o nikapwan no oyowyat no nimanaktak a si Yowani. Yapo ji Ama ta do to an? No yapo do tao." Makarahan am meykalakalavaten rana sira. Maniring sira am, "Ikongo o itovis ta dang. No si ipanci ta o kapo na ji Ama ta do to am ji na panenesha yaten ni Yeso a ji nganoyong ni Yowani a.

language1_text: But if we shall say, Of men; we fear the people; for all hold John as a prophet.
language2_text: No si kwan ta o kapo na do tao am jyabo kaji da oyyan nyaten no aro a tao a, do da kanoyong ji Yowani a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a."

language1_text: And they answered Jesus, and said, We cannot tell. And he said unto them, Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things.
language2_text: Karahan am maniring rana sira ji Yeso am, "Namen jyatenngi." Maniring si Yeso jira am, "No ori vata nyo am ji ko mancyan jinyo o na nikapwan no oyowyat ko a yameyvazay so aro a vazay."

language1_text: But what think ye? A certain man had two sons; and he came to the first, and said, Son, go work to day in my vineyard.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Naknakmen nyo pala o ko pehngehngain a ciring. Ikongo ahahapan nyo sya. Amyan so asa ka tao a rarwa so anak. Maniring do rakerakeh am, 'Mangay ka, manganako, do nihakawan ta an.'

language1_text: He answered and said, I will not: but afterward he repented, and went.
language2_text: Maniring ori am, 'Sino mangay.' Manakenakem am, 'Jyabo kaji ko angayan a.' Karahan am mangay ori.

language1_text: And he came to the second, and said likewise. And he answered and said, I go, sir: and went not.
language2_text: Akman sang o ciring no ama na do ananak. Maniring o ananak am, 'Noon. Mangay ko,' am jya nimangay.

language1_text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father? They say unto him, The first. Jesus saith unto them, Verily I say unto you, That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you.
language2_text: Manngwa, sino jira ang o nimahap so ciring no ama da." Maniring sira am, "O rakerakeh ang." Maniring si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am manmanma pa sira ka ninyo o mapeyvazay so deyking a tao a kano somagpyan a mavakes a macikaop do italamozong ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness, and ye believed him not: but the publicans and the harlots believed him: and ye, when ye had seen it, repented not afterward, that ye might believe him.
language2_text: Ta yarana nimai o nimanaktak a si Yowani. Na rana nipanci jinyo o manoyong a rarahan nyo. Am nyo ji nganoyngi. Am sira rana mapeyvazay so deyking a tao a kano somagpyan a mavakes am da nyanoyngan. Tana nimacita nyo o mapeyvazay so deyking a tao a kano somagpyan a mavakes a yarana nimamlis am kamo ji mamlis a yaji nganoyong jya."

language1_text: Hear another parable: There was a certain householder, which planted a vineyard, and hedged it round about, and digged a winepress in it, and built a tower, and let it out to husbandmen, and went into a far country:
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso am, "Amizngey nyo pala o pehngehngayan ko so ciring ko. Amyan so asa ka tao a nimeymowa so asa lan a potaw. Karahan am zazacitan na a kapamaring na do sahad na no nihakawan na so pangangatesan na so potaw a kapatnek na so makarang a tagakal a pamozimozyan na. Karahan am itoro na do tao a vooden da a kangay na rana do marai a ili.

language1_text: and when the time of the fruit drew near, he sent his servants to the husbandmen, that they might receive the fruits of it.
language2_text: Mazako o asi na no mowamowa na am manovoy so lamlamsoy na omami so akma ney vonong.

language1_text: And the husbandmen took his servants, and beat one, and killed another, and stoned another.
language2_text: Karahan am vitkehen da o zagaw no nitovoy na lamlamsoy no nimvood so nihakawan na tao a kapakakasi da so asa, kazakat da so asa a kacikcik da do asa.

language1_text: Again, he sent other servants more than the first: and they did unto them likewise.
language2_text: Karahan am manovoy pa o mapeynihakawan sya so arwaro pa lamlamsoy na a kano nimanmanma mangay ang. Am akman sang o vazay da sira no nimvood so nihakawan na.

language1_text: But last of all he sent unto them his son, saying, They will reverence my son.
language2_text: Manowji rana am to na rana novoya o anak na. Manakenakem am, 'Jyabo kaji dasnekan no minapodpod jyaken a.'

language1_text: But when the husbandmen saw the son, they said among themselves, This is the heir; come, let us kill him, and let us seize on his inheritance.
language2_text: Am macita da o anak na no nimvood so nihakawan na am maniring sira do kadwan jira am, 'Iya ya o omamoon so nihakawan na. To ta na wakwaka kamoon ta so nihakawan na.'

language1_text: And they caught him, and cast him out of the vineyard, and slew him.
language2_text: Karahan am vitkehen da a yangay do asked no nihakawan da a kawakwak da sya.

language1_text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh, what will he do unto those husbandmen?
language2_text: "No mai o meyngongyod a mapeynihakawan sya am kongwen na paro sira o nimvood so nihakawan na tao."

language1_text: They say unto him, He will miserably destroy those wicked men, and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen, which shall render him the fruits in their seasons.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Jyabo o kaji na wakwakan sira a katoro na no peymowamowan na do apiya so nakenakem a tao a omvood sya."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto them, Did ye never read in the scriptures, The stone which the builders rejected, The same is become the head of the corner: This is the Lord's doing, And it is marvellous in our eyes?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ji nyo nivilangan pa o ciring do Seysyo? Maniring am, 'O Vato a niwalit da no mapatnek so vahay am yarana nimeyvaliw a ney makdeng na aslet no ai no vahay. So ikanoyong no vazay ni Ama ta do to a mapeyzokab.'

language1_text: Therefore say I unto you, The kingdom of God shall be taken from you, and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof.
language2_text: "Am ori o ko pancyan nya jinyo so kaji na rana nalamozongan ninyo ni Ama ta do to, ta italamozong na o mangononong do ciring na a tao.

language1_text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken: but on whomsoever it shall fall, it will grind him to powder.
language2_text: O meyhabak rana do Vato ori am to rana zemek o tototowang na. O kakasan no Vato a tao am akman sang, ta to meyramis o kataotao na."

language1_text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables, they perceived that he spake of them.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring ni Yeso no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am makazazap da rana o kapakaciring na sya jira ni Yeso so ciring ang.

language1_text: But when they sought to lay hands on him, they feared the multitude, because they took him for a prophet.
language2_text: Am ori o naknakman da rana so karakep da sya. Am kanyahey da no aro a tao. Ta anoyngan da no aro a tao si Yeso a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables, and said,
language2_text: Amyan pa so pehngehngain na ni Yeso a asa ka ciring na. Maniring am,

language1_text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king, which made a marriage for his son,
language2_text: "O italamozong na ni Ama ta do to am akman so asa ka panirsirngen a mamaring so kanen do katarek na rana so vahay no anak na.

language1_text: and sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding: and they would not come.
language2_text: So nipanovoy na so lamlamsoy na mangay a mapeykatokatoyo rana so nitaidan na tao a mai rana koman. Am ji sira key.

language1_text: Again, he sent forth other servants, saying, Tell them which are bidden, Behold, I have prepared my dinner: my oxen and my fatlings are killed, and all things are ready: come unto the marriage.
language2_text: Ji makamyamya am manovoy pa so lamlamsoy na mangay a tomirara pa sira do kanimapeypanam na rana so kanekanen do kateyka da rana nimariparing so nyahap da vinyay da. Am ori o pabezbezan na sira mai.

language1_text: But they made light of it, and went their ways, one to his farm, another to his merchandise:
language2_text: Am to da nazibwan no nitaidan na tao, do kasanga da no vazay da. O asa am nimangay do nihakawan na. O asa am nimangay a tomita so pananazangan na.

language1_text: and the remnant took his servants, and entreated them spitefully, and slew them.
language2_text: O karwan da nitaidan na am rakpen da sira o lamlamsoy no panirsirngen a kapakakasi da sira wakwaken.

language1_text: But when the king heard thereof, he was wroth: and he sent forth his armies, and destroyed those murderers, and burned up their city.
language2_text: Mamizing no panirsirngen am nimakapya meyoyaoya. Am ori o nipanovoy na so itaysang a mangay a omwakwak so nimwakwak so lamlamsoy na tao a kasleb da so ili da.

language1_text: Then saith he to his servants, The wedding is ready, but they which were bidden were not worthy.
language2_text: Meyratateng am maniring do lamlamsoy na am, 'Ko rana nipeypanam o kanekanen am sira rana o yaney manma ko nipanoyon a tao am abo nakenakem ko rana sira a mangay a koman.

language1_text: Go ye therefore into the highways, and as many as ye shall find, bid to the marriage.
language2_text: Inyo rana am mangay kamo sicyaikwaya do rako a rarahan a o masazisazi nyo na a aro a tao o rarahen nyo.'

language1_text: So those servants went out into the highways, and gathered together all as many as they found, both bad and good: and the wedding was furnished with guests.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangay rana o lamlamsoy na do rako a rarahan a kacirara da so masazi da tao. Tana apya so nakenakem a tana marahet so nakenakem a tao am miminen da sira ipanci a mai a karo da no tao a nimai a koman.

language1_text: And when the king came in to see the guests, he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment:
language2_text: "Makowbot o panirsirngen a amrapong so nitaidan na tao am macita na o jya nimanglit a tao.

language1_text: and he saith unto him, Friend, how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment? And he was speechless.
language2_text: Maniring jya am, 'Mo kahakay, mo na ji nimanglici a mai.' Am ji meyzezyak o tao ang.

language1_text: Then said the king to the servants, Bind him hand and foot, and take him away, and cast him into outer darkness; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
language2_text: Maniring rana o panirsirngen do lamlamsoy na am, 'To nyo na vaoda o lima na kano ai na kapowbot nyo sya do pantaw a kasarisaryan a kalavi na meygazicigit so ngepen a maneneseh.'"

language1_text: For many are called, but few are chosen.
language2_text: Maniring rana si Yeso am, "Aro tao a rarahen a macikaop do italamozong ni Ama ta do to am tatasa ka tao o omonot jya."

language1_text: Then went the Pharisees, and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk.
language2_text: Makowbot o tao a macyagom do Vadisay am maniring sira do kadwan jira am, "Makongo tamo a meykala do ciring ni Yeso so karatan na."

language1_text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians, saying, Master, we know that thou art true, and teachest the way of God in truth, neither carest thou for any man: for thou regardest not the person of men.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mapahanhan sira so macinanao jira tao a macihza do macikagom ji Helote a tao a mangay ji Yeso. Maniring sira jya am, "Mo Mangnanao, namen katenngan imo a yaji mangalalas a tao. Ka ji mapeypilipili so tao no jyangowa Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Tell us therefore, What thinkest thou? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Cæ sar, or not?
language2_text: Pancyan pala jyamen o mo ahahapan sya. Manngwa, apya do iwawalam ta o katoro so deyking ji Kaysa panirsirngen no Loma an?"

language1_text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness, and said, Why tempt ye me, ye hypocrites?
language2_text: To na rana tenngi ni Yeso o keyleylamdam da sya. Am ori o nipancyan na no, "Inyo rana yatanwasiwasi a tao am ikongo nyo ileylamdaman jyaken.

language1_text: Shew me the tribute money. And they brought unto him a penny.
language2_text: Inney kamo pala so nizpi, ta citahen ko." Karahan am ipanta da so asa ka nizpi.

language1_text: And he saith unto them, Whose is this image and superscription?
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Sino o ngaran a kano asyasing a yadomket do nizpi ya."

language1_text: They say unto him, Cæ sar's. Then saith he unto them, Render therefore unto Cæ sar the things which are Cæ sar's; and unto God the things that are God's.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Si Kaysa." Maniring si Yeso jira am, "No komwan am o monganay ji Kaysa am itoro ji Kaysa. O monganay ji Ama ta do to am itoro ji Ama ta do to."

language1_text: When they had heard these words, they marvelled, and left him, and went their way.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring na am isavasavak da a kangay da rana.

language1_text: The same day came to him the Sadducees, which say that there is no resurrection, and asked him,
language2_text: Araw no nang am o ji nganoyong do keypirwa mavyay no tao a macyagom do Satokay am mangay sira ji Yeso. Maniring sira jya am,

language1_text: saying, Master, Moses said, If a man die, having no children, his brother shall marry his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
language2_text: "Mo Mangnanao, o nanao ni Moyse am no mawakwak o tao a kabo no anak na am pasakain no kakteh na o mavakes na a keyyan no komownongan no kakteh na rakeh do karawan.

language1_text: Now there were with us seven brethren: and the first, when he had married a wife, deceased, and, having no issue, left his wife unto his brother:
language2_text: No kakwa am amyan so papito a meyketeketeh. Mapapapen o rakeh jira am mawakwak am abo o mataid na do karawan.

language1_text: likewise the second also, and the third, unto the seventh.
language2_text: Karahan am papenen no tomonton jira. Mawakwak ori am akman sang a abo so taodtod. O ikatatlo da meyketeketeh am akman sang, a kato da twatontonan a meyketeketeh a mahap so mina kahanghangan no mina rakeh jira. Am mamimin sira abo so taid do karawan.

language1_text: And last of all the woman died also.
language2_text: Mownay am mawakwak rana o mavakes ang.

language1_text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven? for they all had her.
language2_text: Manngwa, no marateng o araraw no ikeypirwa mavyay no tao am sino jira ang o manoyong a mapeykahanghangan so sang, do kanimamimin da nimapasakay sya."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto them, Ye do err, not knowing the scriptures, nor the power of God.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Yamalas nyo ahapan sya. Ta nyo jyatenngi o Seysyo. Nyo jyatenngi o oyowyat ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For in the resurrection they neither marry, nor are given in marriage, but are as the angels of God in heaven.
language2_text: No marateng o araraw no ikeypirwa mavyay no tao am meyyangay rana sira kano tinsi do teyngato a ji macivahavahay.

language1_text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead, have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God, saying,
language2_text: O vazay rana omagaz do keypirwa mavyay no tao am manngwa, ji nyo pa nivilangan o Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to?

language1_text: I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob? God is not the God of the dead, but of the living.
language2_text: O ciring na ni Ama ta do to am, 'Yaken rana am Tao do to ko ni Apolahan a kani Isa kani Yakebo.' O peypeypangayan no nang am Tao do to da si Ama ta do to no mavyay a tao a omanoyong jya. Ta o tao rana do tangain ni Ama ta do to am mamimin a mavyay sira."

language1_text: And when the multitude heard this, they were astonished at his doctrine.
language2_text: Mamizing da no tao o nanao na ni Yeso am isavasavak da.

language1_text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence, they were gathered together.
language2_text: Mamizing da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay si Yeso a ji da tenngi a pasapan so ciring no macyagom do Satokay am malovot sira.

language1_text: Then one of them, which was a lawyer, asked him a question, tempting him, and saying,
language2_text: Amyan jira so asa ka mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a amnakenakem so keyleylamdam na si Yeso no asa ka ciring.

language1_text: Master, which is the great commandment in the law?
language2_text: Maniring ji Yeso am, "Mo Mangnanao, ikongo do iwawalam ni Moyse o ney makdeng na nanao."

language1_text: Jesus said unto him, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "'Onowned mo a kano pahad mo a kano nakenakem mo am to mo peykasa a omraralay ni Ama ta do to a Tao do to mo.'

language1_text: This is the first and great commandment.
language2_text: Ta ori rana am ney makdeng na nanao.

language1_text: And the second is like unto it, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
language2_text: O ikadwa na am akman sang so kakdekdeng an. 'Ikarilaw mo o icyatatao mo. To mo peyyangaya kano aryarilaw mo so kataotao mo o karilawan mo no icyatatao mo.'

language1_text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets.
language2_text: Yatodamimin o iwawalam ni Moyse a kano nanao no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a yamangozay do yameykadwa a nanao ang."

language1_text: While the Pharisees were gathered together, Jesus asked them,
language2_text: Malovot sira o tao a macyagom do Vadisay am pacicin na sira ni Yeso.

language1_text: saying, What think ye of Christ? whose son is he? They say unto him, The son of David.
language2_text: "Ikongo o nakenakem nyo do Misayya. Sino yamapeysivovoong sya." Maniring sira am, "Iya rana am sivovoong ni Tawey."

language1_text: He saith unto them, How then doth David in spirit call him Lord, saying,
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No manoyong ori am ikongo nioyatan na ji Tawey no Seyzi a manci no, 'Mo Panirsirngen.' Ta maniring si Tawey am,

language1_text: The LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand, Till I make thine enemies thy footstool?
language2_text: 'Maniring si Ama ta do to do Panirsirngen ko am: Amlisna ka do wanan ko mangay si balinasen ko sira o macioya jimo a tao.'

language1_text: If David then call him Lord, how is he his son?
language2_text: No ipanci ni Tawey a Panirsirngen am ikongo o peysivovoongan na so Misayya ni Tawey."

language1_text: And no man was able to answer him a word, neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions.
language2_text: Abo o asa ka tao a makateneng do ciring ni Yeso a pasapan. Nimacipinda no kanang o kaji da rana makadketan ji Yeso a pacicin.

language1_text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude, and to his disciples,
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do aro a tao a kano macinanao jya am,

language1_text: saying, The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses' seat:
language2_text: "Sira rana mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am manoyong ori a vazay da a yamangnanao so iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a nitaid na ji Moyse.

language1_text: all therefore whatsoever they bid you observe, that observe and do; but do not ye after their works: for they say, and do not.
language2_text: Inyo rana am amizngen nyo o nanao da. Am ji nyo ngapa o icicirawat da. Ta sira rana am o ciring da yajyapsa a yada ji peyvazaya.

language1_text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne, and lay them on men's shoulders; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers.
language2_text: Sira rana am da nanawen sira o tao a mahap so tey masalit a nanao ni Moyse. Am sira am da ji mangozai.

language1_text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men: they make broad their phylacteries, and enlarge the borders of their garments,
language2_text: O yamakakaday a vazay da am yamamimin a yada ipacita do tao. Pangain da do kataotao da o akmey kavangan a adketan no ciring do Seysyo. Da kangednged do aywayob da yapadketan so azwazong na.

language1_text: and love the uppermost rooms at feasts, and the chief seats in the synagogues,
language2_text: No macyakakan sira am amlisna sira do pamanongan na. No somdep sira do peyneynozyan am mangay sira amlisna do lilisnan no meynakem a tao.

language1_text: and greetings in the markets, and to be called of men, Rabbi, Rabbi.
language2_text: Ikakza da o kararalay da nira no tao do karwarwan no tao. Ikakza da o kapanci da nira a mangnanao.

language1_text: But be not ye called Rabbi: for one is your Master, even Christ; and all ye are brethren.
language2_text: Am ji nyo akzan o kapanci da ninyo a mangnanao. Ta sira rana kadwan jinyo am akma nyoy kakteh do cinai sira. Yasa saon o yamanoyong a Sinsi nyo am.

language1_text: And call no man your father upon the earth: for one is your Father, which is in heaven.
language2_text: Ji nyo mancyan o tao do karawan a ama nyo, ta yasa o Ama nyo a Tao do to.

language1_text: Neither be ye called masters: for one is your Master, even Christ.
language2_text: Malas o kapanci da ninyo a panirsirngen, ta si Kizisto o meyngongyod a Panirsirngen nyo.

language1_text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant.
language2_text: No si myan jinyo so ney rakeh na am inarahen na o kakma ney lamlamsoy a omilamnay jinyo.

language1_text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted.
language2_text: Pavevehen na ni Ama ta do to o mapahama so nakem a tao a kakatkat na sira so ji makazyazyak a tao.

language1_text: But woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men: for ye neither go in yourselves, neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in.
language2_text: "Inyo rana yatanwasiwasi a yamangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am to kamo makasi. Ta inyo rana am nyo taywen o oyowyat ni Ama ta do to do tangain no tao. Nyo ji mya o kataotao nyo a macikaop do italamozong ni Ama ta do to. Akman sang o tao a nyo ji mya a yamacikaop do italamozong ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayer: therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation.
language2_text: [To kamo makasi an. Nyo littan o vao a mavakes a yahapen so kangangay. Nyo to ngida o inozi nyo a to napyapya so nakem. So ikanoyong nyo a peydednan no rako a peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.]

language1_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte, and when he is made, ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves.
language2_text: Inyo rana yamangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am to kamo makasi. Ta inyo rana am kamo amlivolivon do peycyavanovanwan na yamapanod so tao. No sira omanod rana am nyo abwangen sira yaominara jinyo. So da ikaraherahet pa ka ninyo. So ikaraherahet da pa ioya na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Woe unto you, ye blind guides, which say, Whosoever shall swear by the temple, it is nothing; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple, he is a debtor!
language2_text: "Inyo rana yakmey mavota tao a yatomirara so tao am to kamo makasi. No kamo maniring am, 'No amyan so tao a macipeyyeyyan so nakem do rako a panaralayan am jyanoyong o akman sang. Am no si pagazen da do vowawan a yamyan do panaralayan am pangononongan da o ciring da.'

language1_text: Ye fools and blind: for whether is greater, the gold, or the temple that sanctifieth the gold?
language2_text: Inyo rana yakmey mavota tao am manngwa, yamakdekdeng o vowawan an? No yamakdekdeng o rako a panaralayan a yanan no vowawan.

language1_text: And, Whosoever shall swear by the altar, it is nothing; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it, he is guilty.
language2_text: No kamo maniring pa am, 'No amyan so tao a macipeyyeyyan so nakem do patanatanangan so nakem ji Ama ta do to am jyanoyong o akman sang. Am no si pagazen da o ciring da do akma dey nakem ori a makakaday am pangononongan da o akman sang.'

language1_text: Ye fools and blind: for whether is greater, the gift, or the altar that sanctifieth the gift?
language2_text: Inyo rana yakmey mavota tao am manngwa, yamakdekdeng o nakem nyo ori an? Ano yamakdekdeng o nyo pangayan so akma nyoy nakem si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar, sweareth by it, and by all things thereon.
language2_text: Am ori an, no myan so macipeyyeyyan so nakem a tao a kapagaz da so ciring da do patanatanangan so nakem ji Ama ta do to am akmey to da pazanoda o makakaday a nipatanang da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And whoso shall swear by the temple, sweareth by it, and by him that dwelleth therein.
language2_text: No myan so macipeyyeyyan so nakem a tao a da pagazen do rako a panaralayan am akmey to da pazagoma si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And he that shall swear by heaven, sweareth by the throne of God, and by him that sitteth thereon.
language2_text: Akman sang, ta no myan so macipeyyeyyan so nakem a tao a kapagaz da sya do teyngato am akmey to da pazagoma o amyan do teyngato a Tao do to.

language1_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin, and have omitted the weightier matters of the law, judgment, mercy, and faith: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.
