language2_text: "Inyo rana yatanwasiwasi a yamangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am to kamo makasi. Tana mapasina kamo so ipeykingking nyo ji Ama ta do to so meykamadadayan a monganay jinyo am yanyo to nazibwan o yamanoyong a yamakdeng a nanao ni Ama ta do to a ji mapeycyakaban a kano pangangasyan a kano ji mangalalas. Ahapen nyo o akman sang a nanao, ta yamakekdeng ori a nanao. Akman sang o karwan na, ta ji nyo ngolala.

language1_text: Ye blind guides, which strain at a gnat, and swallow a camel.
language2_text: Inyo rana yakmey mavota a yatomirara so tao am nyo katenngan a peyvazain o todalapit a iwawalam ni Moyse. Am o ney makdeng na am nyo jyatenngi. Am ori o nyo ji peyvazai sya.

language1_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter, but within they are full of extortion and excess.
language2_text: "Inyo rana yatanwasiwasi a yamangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am to kamo makasi. Inyo rana am nyo ji peylolita o kakanan nyo. Am onowned nyo am yamapno no yamakakaday a nyo peyraratenan.

language1_text: Thou blind Pharisee, cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter, that the outside of them may be clean also.
language2_text: Inyo rana yakmey mavota tao a macyagom do Vadisay am apyapya pa o kayavayo nyo so onowned nyo. Ta ori o ikapiya na rana no icicirawat nyo.

language1_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres, which indeed appear beautiful outward, but are within full of dead men's bones, and of all uncleanness.
language2_text: "Inyo rana yatanwasiwasi a yamangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am to kamo makasi. Ta inyo rana am kamo akmey niwadwadan a heseb no tao a yarana mawadwad, apiya do mata. Am o teyrahem na am kasongisongyan no totowang no nimawakwak a tao.

language1_text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men, but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity.
language2_text: Kamo akman sang, ta no kamo citahen so kataotao am yabo nyo karatan. Am onowned nyo am yamangalalas a yameysaod so raraten.

language1_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! because ye build the tombs of the prophets, and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous,
language2_text: "Inyo rana yatanwasiwasi a yamangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am to kamo makasi. Ta inyo rana am nyo peyveyveknen o heseb da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa a nyo kapatnek nira so ngaran da

language1_text: and say, If we had been in the days of our fathers, we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets.
language2_text: a nyo kapanci no, 'No nimyan ta pa no kapeyigegen no ineynapo ta am jyabo kaniominara ta sira nimwakwak so panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a.'

language1_text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves, that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets.
language2_text: So nyo na to nganoyngi do kataotao nyo a ineynapo da no nimwakwak so panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers.
language2_text: No komwan am tongtongan nyo pa o raraten da no ineynapo nyo no kakwa.

language1_text: Ye serpents, ye generation of vipers, how can ye escape the damnation of hell?
language2_text: Inyo rana yakmey katonodan no tokza am jyabo kapakaliklik nyo so pasingsingtan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to do kararatan a.

language1_text: Wherefore, behold, I send unto you prophets, and wise men, and scribes: and some of them ye shall kill and crucify; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues, and persecute them from city to city:
language2_text: Amizngen nyo an, ta manovoy ko so panoyonoywan ko so ciring a kano yanan no teneng na ni Ama ta do to a tao a kano mangnanao a tao a mangay jinyo. So iyan na jira ang no wakwaken nyo. Amyan jira ang so padketen nyo do jyojika. Amyan jira ang so bakbakan nyo do peyneynozyan nyo a paksozen do teyhesa ka ili.

language1_text: that upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth, from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias, whom ye slew between the temple and the altar.
language2_text: So yangay na meydedna jinyo no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to, do kanimwakwak da sira no ineynapo nyo so ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao. So ikapo na ji Yapo a kato nangayan do anak ni Peylecya a meyngaran so Sacyadiya a niwakwak da do panaralayan a masngen do patanatanangan so nakem si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, All these things shall come upon this generation.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o pasingsingtan ko do nimwakwak sira tao am mangay do tao sicyaikwaya!

language1_text: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, thou that killest the prophets, and stonest them which are sent unto thee, how often would I have gathered thy children together, even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings, and ye would not!
language2_text: "Inyo rana tao do Yelosaleng am nyo niwakwak o panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a nyo kabhebhes jira wakwaken so yana nitovoy jinyo ni Ama ta do to a lamlamsoy na. Ko ikakza o kapahawa ko jinyo do kanginanawan nyo, akman so manok a komalopkop so ananak na no panid na. Am nyo jyakzan.

language1_text: Behold, your house is left unto you desolate.
language2_text: So peymakarwan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For I say unto you, Ye shall not see me henceforth, till ye shall say, Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord.
language2_text: Am ko pa ciring jinyo am ji nyo rana cita yaken an, todangay do pancyan nyo no, 'Azwazwain ta o mai a nitovoy ni Ama ta do to.'"

language1_text: And Jesus went out, and departed from the temple: and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple.
language2_text: Makowbot si Yeso a apo do rako a panaralayan am mangay sira o macinanao jya do tangain na kapanci da no katey yapya no kamamaogan na no rako a panaralayan.

language1_text: And Jesus said unto them, See ye not all these things? verily I say unto you, There shall not be left here one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "O nyo macita panaralayan eya am to ko na macitangayan jinyo am mamimin o vato a da nyamaog sya mazdazday a kabwata na rana no asa ka veysen a mavezed do dang."

language1_text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives, the disciples came unto him privately, saying, Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign of thy coming, and of the end of the world?
language2_text: Amyan si Yeso do tokon a meyngaran so Kanlan am mangay sira o macinanao jya a mapacici sya. Maniring sira am, "Ipanci mo pala jyamen o araraw no ipakaranes no nang. Akman so wanjin no mai ka. Akman so wanjin o pangavosan no karawan."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Take heed that no man deceive you.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Makapzat kamo an. Ji kamo a litai an.

language1_text: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.
language2_text: Ta aro o tao a amvood so ngaran ko a manci no, 'Yaken am si Kizisto ko,' a ilita da do aro a tao.

language1_text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all these things must come to pass, but the end is not yet.
language2_text: Makamizing kamo na do katangked no ili nyo so meyyarap a kapakamizing nyo do marai a ili so meyyarap. No si manoyong o kakman na so sang am ji kamo anyahey, ta kangay na no akman sang a vazay. Am beken a pangavosan na ori no karawan.

language1_text: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be famines, and pestilences, and earthquakes, in divers places.
language2_text: Meyyarap sira o meytarek so iteytetngehan a kapeyyarap da no teyhesa ka mahataw. So iyan na no rako a kanini a kano abcil do karawan.

language1_text: All these are the beginning of sorrows.
language2_text: Am ori rana am papwan na rana so kapakaranes na rana no alalaw.

language1_text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted, and shall kill you: and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name's sake.
language2_text: "No marateng ori am rakpen da inyo a pakakasin a kawakwak da jinyo. So pacioyyan da jinyo a mahap so vazay ko.

language1_text: And then shall many be offended, and shall betray one another, and shall hate one another.
language2_text: Aro o tao a ji rana manaralay. O karwan da am masipatwatolin do kapanaralay da kaji da manaralayan. So ipeykaokaoya da rana omalalas so kadwan jira.

language1_text: And many false prophets shall rise, and shall deceive many.
language2_text: Meyparo sira o malas so ipangnanao a tao a mapeycyakawad so onowned no tao.

language1_text: And because iniquity shall abound, the love of many shall wax cold.
language2_text: Ikongo do to meyzangkap o meyraraten a tao, am ori o ikabo na rana no pangangarilawan no tao.

language1_text: But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
language2_text: Am o to ngotokot a jyahayo so nakem a omraralay nyaken am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come.
language2_text: O Mapasaray a Ciriciring a omaing do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to am manmanma a meylimwang do karawan a peyyamyamizngan da no tao do peycyamahamahatawan na a kapakaranes na rana no pangavosan no karawan.

language1_text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, stand in the holy place, (whoso readeth, let him understand:)
language2_text: "Macita nyo no makwa o nipanci ni Taniar a mapaoya a somazovaz si Ama ta do to a mangay da patneken do ji nyo mamyapyan a tankan na. (No vilangan nyo o ciring eya am to nyo na naknakma o peypeypangayan na.)

language1_text: then let them which be in Judæ a flee into the mountains:
language2_text: O meyvahay do Yotay am mangay sira do takey a somazok.

language1_text: let him which is on the house top not come down to take any thing out of his house:
language2_text: So ji da ranandepi no tao do vahay da a mangap so apzapzatan da.

language1_text: neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes.
language2_text: O amyan do nihakawan da am ji rana ngoli sira mangap so ayob da.

language1_text: And woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!
language2_text: Do araraw no nang am to sira makasi o mamlis so kanen a kano mangahanas a mavakes.

language1_text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter, neither on the sabbath day:
language2_text: Mapasyasi kamo ji Ama ta do to a kaji na mapasarawan sya do ahemyan a kado ipeywalam no tao.

language1_text: for then shall be great tribulation, such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time, no, nor ever shall be.
language2_text: Ta o alalaw rana ori am ney makdeng na pa ori a alalaw do na cinamaog no karawan. No makwa am ji rana meytotoro o akman so sang a vazay.

language1_text: And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved: but for the elect's sake those days shall be shortened.
language2_text: No ji na pazikenkeni ni Ama ta do to o araraw no alalaw no tao ori am abo o tao a mavyay. Am na kapakanakem so na nipamnekan a tao a yamraralay nya. Am ori o na pazikenkenan do araraw no ipakaranes no alalaw ang.

language1_text: Then if any man shall say unto you, Lo, here is Christ, or there; believe it not.
language2_text: "No amyan so tao a manci nya jinyo so, 'Oya si Kizisto do jya,' 'Ori do kwang si Kizisto,' am ji nyo nganoyngi.

language1_text: For there shall arise false Christs, and false prophets, and shall shew great signs and wonders; insomuch that, if it were possible, they shall deceive the very elect.
language2_text: Ta amyan so tao no makwa a manci no ka si Kizisto da tao a kano malas so ipangnanao a tao. Sira rana am meyvazay sira so mapangyangyalak a vazay a ipeycyakawad da so tao. So icyakman da so sang a mapeycyakawad so nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a yamraralay nya tao.

language1_text: Behold, I have told you before.
language2_text: No makwa am manakem nyo o ko rana nipaziman jinyo a ciring eya.

language1_text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you, Behold, he is in the desert; go not forth: behold, he is in the secret chambers; believe it not.
language2_text: "No amyan so tao a manci nya jinyo so, 'Yamyan si Kizisto do kabwan no nihakawan no tao,' am ji kamo angay. No amyan so manci no, 'Yamyan si Kizisto do sahad no vahay,' am ji nyo to nganoyngi.

language1_text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east, and shineth even unto the west; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
language2_text: Ta no mai o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am abo ji makacita sya tao akmey meycicilat a maniray.

language1_text: For wheresoever the carcase is, there will the eagles be gathered together.
language2_text: O yanan no nimawakwak a omalalam am ori o pacilolwan da no meyyasasalap.

language1_text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light, and the stars shall fall from heaven, and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken:
language2_text: "No si mavitos rana o aro a alalaw do teyrahem am to rana kedep o araw. Ji rana manikap o vehan. Makas rana o mata no hanit. Mablis rana o masamasaod no hanit.

language1_text: and then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven: and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn, and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory.
language2_text: No si marateng ori am meytotwaw rana o tovil no Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a meygegcin do karawan. Amzikzik rana sira manyahey o aro a tao do karawan. Ta macita da rana yaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a meygegcin do cinalab no rako a oyowyat ko a kano azwazway ko.

language1_text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet, and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from one end of heaven to the other.
language2_text: Manovoy ko so aro a tinsi a meyzapa a ipatao ko so tao do peycyavanovanwan na a mapeylovolovot so nipanop ni Ama ta do to a tao do teyhesa ka mahataw.

language1_text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When his branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is nigh:
language2_text: "To nyo na nita o ovako a kayo. No to naod rana do yangayangaw na o tomyok am to nyo na tenngi o ka teyteyka na rana.

language1_text: so likewise ye, when ye shall see all these things, know that it is near, even at the doors.
language2_text: Akman sang, ta no macita nyo o makakaday a alalaw do teyrahem am to nyo na tenngi o kakeykai ko na mai.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass, till all these things be fulfilled.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo an. Amyan so tao sicyaikwaya a makapis pa so vazay ang.

language1_text: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.
language2_text: Mabalinas o hanit a kano teyrahem. Am jyablis o ciring ko a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels of heaven, but my Father only.
language2_text: "Abo o tao a makateneng do araraw no yai ko. Tana tinsi do teyngato a tana Anak na ni Ama ta do to am ji da tenngi. Ta si Ama ta do to o makateneng jya.

language1_text: But as the days of Noe were, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
language2_text: No meygegcin o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am akman so cinasasaodan da da Noya no kakwa.

language1_text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day that Noe entered into the ark,
language2_text: No kaji na pa meykehnepan am to sirangned so ninyakan a mapazagzagpit, mangay do araraw no isdep da rana da Noya do avang da.

language1_text: and knew not until the flood came, and took them all away; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
language2_text: Ji da azyaziman o kapakaranes rana no henep. Am ori o nikabalinas da rana. Akman sang o araraw no yai ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a jyaziman.

language1_text: Then shall two be in the field; the one shall be taken, and the other left.
language2_text: Si marateng ori am o rarwa ka mahakay a amyan do nihakawan da am asa jira o ahapen ko. Asa o vezeden ko do dang.

language1_text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill; the one shall be taken, and the other left.
language2_text: O rarwa ka mavakes a manworod so kanen da am asa o ahapen ko. Asa o vezeden ko.

language1_text: Watch therefore: for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come.
language2_text: Am ori o ipeytataziman nyo, ta ji nyo a tenngi o araraw no yai ko a Panirsirngen nyo.

language1_text: But know this, that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come, he would have watched, and would not have suffered his house to be broken up.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo o yameykasayan. Ta no katenngan no mapeyvahay sya o araraw no yai na no manakaw a tao am jyabo kaji na nazimanan jya kaji na makasdepan no manakaw a tao.

language1_text: Therefore be ye also ready: for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh.
language2_text: Am ori o ipeytataziman nyo an. Ta no ji nyo aktoktwan am makaranes ko rana a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant, whom his lord hath made ruler over his household, to give them meat in due season?
language2_text: "Sino ipeyhanhan a tey mapatak a lamlamsoy. Iya rana am ipeyhanhan no lawpan a omaponged no vahay na do kapeyyangangay na so isovo da kanen no karwan no lamlamsoy na.

language1_text: Blessed is that servant, whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing.
language2_text: No mai o lawpan a kapakacita na so lamlamsoy na a makapeyvazay so vazay na am manoyong ori o ipanlanlag na.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, That he shall make him ruler over all his goods.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am manoyong rana o akman so sang a lamlamsoy a pahanhanen no lawpan a tomalamozong no peymeymasaodan na.

language1_text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming;
language2_text: Am no maniring o onowned no lamlamsoy na am, 'Cyaha, ta yapa mahay o lawpan ko a yamai.

language1_text: and shall begin to smite his fellowservants, and to eat and drink with the drunken;
language2_text: So sipsipzotan ko do aro a lamlamsoy na a kapaciyoyop ko so saki,'

language1_text: the lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him, and in an hour that he is not aware of,
language2_text: am ji na aktoktwan am to rana makaranes o lawpan.

language1_text: and shall cut him asunder, and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
language2_text: Jyabo kaji na bakbakan do dang a pazanoden do yatanwasiwasi a tao a yamlavi a mapeygazicigit so ngepen a maneneseh.

language1_text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins, which took their lamps, and went forth to meet the bridegroom.
language2_text: "O ipakaranes no araraw no italamozong ni Ama ta do to am akman so asa ngarnan a mavakes a meypinan so zampo a mangay a omrapong so mapazagpit a tao.

language1_text: And five of them were wise, and five were foolish.
language2_text: O lalima jira am ji sira patapatak. O lalima am tey mapatak sira.

language1_text: They that were foolish took their lamps, and took no oil with them:
language2_text: O jyapatapatak a tao am nimapalolo sira so peyzazampwan da am ji sira nimapalolo so atkaw da abyab.

language1_text: but the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps.
language2_text: O mapatapatak a tao am nimapalolo sira so peyzazampwan da a kapalolo da pa so atkaw da abyab.

language1_text: While the bridegroom tarried, they all slumbered and slept.
language2_text: Ikongo do mahay a nimai o mapazagpit a tao, am ori o nipeykaititkeh da no mavavakes.

language1_text: And at midnight there was a cry made, Behold, the bridegroom cometh; go ye out to meet him.
language2_text: Avak no ahep am amyan so tao a amlololos a manci no, 'Oyto rana o yamatarek so vahay a tao. Pakowbot kamo rana omrapong sya.'

language1_text: Then all those virgins arose, and trimmed their lamps.
language2_text: So nipeykayokayokay da no asa ngarnan a mavakes a manoik so abyab no zampo da.

language1_text: And the foolish said unto the wise, Give us of your oil; for our lamps are gone out.
language2_text: No kanang am maniring sira o jyapatapatak a mavakes do mapatapatak a mavakes am, 'Ipanta nyo pa yamen so abyab an, ta yarana toda jyahesep o zampo namen.'

language1_text: But the wise answered, saying, Not so; lest there be not enough for us and you: but go ye rather to them that sell, and buy for yourselves.
language2_text: Maniring sira o mapatapatak a mavakes am, 'Yamasalit, ta yarana ji makanet jyamen. Am ori o namen ji makaktoi sya jinyo. To kamo rana angay do pananazangan a manazang.'

language1_text: And while they went to buy, the bridegroom came; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage: and the door was shut.
language2_text: Mangay sira manazang so abyab do pananazangan o jyapatapatak a mavakes am pakaransan na rana no mapazagpit a tao a kapacihza da rana jya somdep no lalima ka mapatapatak a mavakes a macihanghang jya kaneb da rana do pangengneban.

language1_text: Afterward came also the other virgins, saying, Lord, Lord, open to us.
language2_text: Mownay am makaranes rana sira o jyapatapatak a mavakes. Maniring sira to rana lololos am, 'Mo kahakay, iwangan mo pa yamen an.'

language1_text: But he answered and said, Verily I say unto you, I know you not.
language2_text: Maniring o mapasakasakay a tao am, 'Ko inyo jyatenngi.'"

language1_text: Watch therefore, for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh.
language2_text: Maniring rana si Yeso am, "Ori an, ipeytataziman nyo an. Ta ji nyo a tenngi o araraw na no yai ko.

language1_text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country, who called his own servants, and delivered unto them his goods.
language2_text: "O italamozong ni Ama ta do to am akman so asa ka tao a mangilili. Karahan am rarahen na o lamlamsoy na a katoro na no peymasaodan na jira.

language1_text: And unto one he gave five talents, to another two, and to another one; to every man according to his several ability; and straightway took his journey.
language2_text: To na palololwa do kowyowyat da pongden sira no nizpi na. O asa am nipanta na so alima zivo. O asa am nipanta na so adwa zivo. O asa am nipanta na so asa zivo. Karahan am karwan na rana sira.

language1_text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same, and made them other five talents.
language2_text: Mahap na o alima zivo no asa ka tao ori am mangay na ipanazang so makakaday a apzapzatan a ipeynizpi na. Karahan am makanizpi so alima zivo.

language1_text: And likewise he that had received two, he also gained other two.
language2_text: Akman sang o nimakahap so adwa zivo a nizpi, ta nimangay na nipeynizpi a kapakanizpi na so adwa zivo.

language1_text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth, and hid his lord's money.
language2_text: Am o nimakahap so asa zivo a nizpi ori am nimeykali so nibobwan na nya.

language1_text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh, and reckoneth with them.
language2_text: Mownay am mai rana o lawpan da omami so nizpi jira.

language1_text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents, saying, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me five talents: behold, I have gained beside them five talents more.
language2_text: Mai o nipanta na so alima zivo am paciralayan na o alima zivo a nipeyparwan na no nizpi na. Maniring do lawpan am, 'O nitoro mo jyaken a alima zivo asyo am nimeyparo so yalima zivo.'

language1_text: His lord said unto him, Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
language2_text: Maniring o lawpan am, 'Imo rana am ka tey yapya ipeyhanhan a lamlamsoy. Tana yapereh o yako nitoro jimo am yamo ji ngolala. So to ko rana mapahanhani jimo a tomalamozong no arwaro pa kano nang. So ipacizanod mo jyaken a somaray.'

language1_text: He also that had received two talents came and said, Lord, thou deliveredst unto me two talents: behold, I have gained two other talents beside them.
language2_text: "Mai o nipanta na so adwa zivo am maniring do lawpan am, 'O mo nitoro jyaken a yadwa zivo am yadwa zivo o na nipeyparwan.'

language1_text: His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
language2_text: Maniring o lawpan am, 'Ka tey yapya ipeyhanhan a lamlamsoy. Tana yapereh o yako nitoro jimo am mo ji ngolala. So to ko na meyhanhani nimo a tomalamozong no arwaro paha kano nang. So ipacizanod mo jyaken a somaray.'

language1_text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said, Lord, I knew thee that thou art an hard man, reaping where thou hast not sown, and gathering where thou hast not strawed:
language2_text: "Mai o nipanta na so asa zivo am maniring do lawpan am, 'Ko imo katenngan a tey malanlansoken a tao. O ji mo nipeymowan am kakdain mo o asi na.

language1_text: and I was afraid, and went and hid thy talent in the earth: lo, there thou hast that is thine.
language2_text: Ikongo do ko ikanyahey imo, am ori o ko na to meykalii so nibobwan ko no nizpi mo. So na iyan pa jya no nizpi mo.'

language1_text: His lord answered and said unto him, Thou wicked and slothful servant, thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not, and gather where I have not strawed:
language2_text: Maniring o lawpan am, 'Imo rana am tana ka marahet pa ka jyalma a lamlamsoy am no mo katenngan yaken a yakomakzeb so keyyan no mahap ko do kabwan no nimowa ko am

language1_text: thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers, and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.
language2_text: mo na jya todey pangain sya do pangapangayan so nizpi a peyyananaken. Ta no mai ko na am peralain mo o ananak na a itoro mo jyaken.'

language1_text: Take therefore the talent from him, and give it unto him which hath ten talents.
language2_text: Meyratateng am maniring do karwan da lamlamsoy na am, 'Ayyaney kamo o nizpi na a katoro nyo nya do yasa laksa so nizpi ang.

language1_text: For unto every one that hath shall be given, and he shall have abundance: but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath.
language2_text: Ta o yanan na am arwaro pa o padpehen jya a kato na meypanpanan jya. O kabwan na am pehsen jya o apereh a amyan jya.

language1_text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
language2_text: Iya rana ya yabo so yakapsepsekan a lamlamsoy am powbot kamo na do pantaw a keyyan na do kasarisaryan a meylavilavi a meygazicigit so ngepen a maneneseh.'

language1_text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory, and all the holy angels with him, then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory:
language2_text: "No si meypanirsirngen o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a macihza do tinsi ni Ama ta do to am amlisna do mazway a lilisnan na.

language1_text: and before him shall be gathered all nations: and he shall separate them one from another, as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats:
language2_text: Mamimin o tao a malovot do tangain na a kapeykapyapinpin na sira akman so mangonong so kagling a mapeykapyapinpin so kagling na.

language1_text: and he shall set the sheep on his right hand, but the goats on the left.
language2_text: Pain na o ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao do wanan na a kapangay na so meyraraten a tao do ozi na.

language1_text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world:
language2_text: Karahan am maniring o panirsirngen do amyan do wanan na tao am, 'Inyo rana yana nipanlanlag ni Ama am sijya kamo do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to, ta amoonen nyo o nakem na jinyo no kapangamaog na pa so karawan.

language1_text: for I was an hungred, and ye gave me meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me drink: I was a stranger, and ye took me in:
language2_text: Ta no kakcin ko am nipakan nyo yaken. No kawaw ko am nipeyyop nyo yaken. No kapangilili ko am nitaotao nyo yaken do vahay nyo.

language1_text: naked, and ye clothed me: I was sick, and ye visited me: I was in prison, and ye came unto me.
language2_text: No kabo no ayob ko am nipanta nyo yaken so ayob. No keyngen ko am nipeyveyveken nyo yaken. No kapteng da jyaken am nimai kamo a meyminaminasi nyaken.'

language1_text: Then shall the righteous answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, and fed thee? or thirsty, and gave thee drink?
language2_text: Maniring sira o ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao am, 'Mo Panirsirngen, no kango o kapakacita namen jimo a makcin a kapakan namen jimo. No kango o kapakacita namen jimo a mawaw a kapeyyop namen jimo.

language1_text: When saw we thee a stranger, and took thee in? or naked, and clothed thee?
language2_text: No kango o kapakacita namen jimo a nimangilili a kataotao namen jimo do vahay namen. No kango o kapakacita namen jimo a abo so ayob a kapanta namen nimo so ayob.

language1_text: Or when saw we thee sick, or in prison, and came unto thee?
language2_text: No kango o kapakacita namen jimo a meyngen. No kango o kapakacita namen jimo do pamemtengan a kangay namen a meyminaminasi nimo.'

language1_text: And the King shall answer and say unto them, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren, ye have done it unto me.
language2_text: Maniring o Panirsirngen am, 'To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no manidong kamo so akma nyoy kakteh do cinai a ipangoyongoyod no tao am kataotao ko na sira ori.'

language1_text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand, Depart from me, ye cursed, into everlasting fire, prepared for the devil and his angels:
language2_text: "Karahan am maniring o Panirsirngen do tao a amyan do ozi na am, 'Kazey kamo a yana panircirngan ni Ama ta do to. Ji kamo macisngen jyaken. Angay kamo a pacilovot do na sokzan si Satan a kano kararay na a yamyan do to meyyonong a yajyahesep a makotokotod a lila no apoy.

language1_text: for I was an hungred, and ye gave me no meat: I was thirsty, and ye gave me no drink:
language2_text: Ta no kakcin ko am ji nyo nipakan yaken. No kawaw ko am ji nyo nipeyyop yaken.

language1_text: I was a stranger, and ye took me not in: naked, and ye clothed me not: sick, and in prison, and ye visited me not.
language2_text: No kapangilili ko am ji nyo nitaotao yaken do vahay nyo. No abo ayob ko am ji nyo nipanta yaken so ayob ko. No keyngen ko a no kapteng da jyaken am ji kamo nimai a meyminaminasi nyaken.'

language1_text: Then shall they also answer him, saying, Lord, when saw we thee an hungred, or athirst, or a stranger, or naked, or sick, or in prison, and did not minister unto thee?
language2_text: No maniring rana sira am, 'Mo Panirsirngen, no kango o kapakacita namen jimo a makcin. No kango o kapakacita namen jimo a mawaw am mangilili. No kango o kabo no ayob mo. No kango o keyngen mo. No kango o kapteng da jimo. No kango o kato namen macipanadngan jimo a ji nidonga.'

language1_text: Then shall he answer them, saying, Verily I say unto you, Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these, ye did it not to me.
language2_text: No maniring rana o Panirsirngen am, 'To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no ji nyo nidonga o ipangoyongoyod no tao am yaken rana ori a ikasekeh nyo a sidongen.'

language1_text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment: but the righteous into life eternal.
language2_text: O akman rana sang a tao am todangay no makwa o pasingsingtan jira. Am sira rana o ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da."

language1_text: And it came to pass, when Jesus had finished all these sayings, he said unto his disciples,
language2_text: Teyka na ni Yeso o ciring na am maniring do macinanao jya am,

language1_text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover, and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified.
language2_text: "Nyo katenngan o na kadwa rana araw no yakapamaring so kanen do Iyeci. Mangay o kapanazang da no Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a padketen do jyojika."

language1_text: Then assembled together the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders of the people, unto the palace of the high priest, who was called Caiaphas,
language2_text: No kano nang am o panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem a kano kamanrarakehan da am malovot sira meysirisiring do vahay no kabtekan da panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a meyngaran so Keyava.

language1_text: and consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty, and kill him.
language2_text: Naknakmen da o karakep da si Yeso a wakwaken da do ikabo no tao.

language1_text: But they said, Not on the feast day, lest there be an uproar among the people.
language2_text: Am maniring sira am, "Ji ta pa peyvazaya do ipamarimaring so kanen no tao, ta meyvonag sira o tao."

language1_text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany, in the house of Simon the leper,
language2_text: Amyan si Yeso do Potani a ili am nimyan do vahay da da Simong. Iya o nimlabyab so kolit no kakwa.

language1_text: there came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment, and poured it on his head, as he sat at meat.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka mavakes a nimangai so asa ka tagaw a kapnowan no masingat a mahangno a haneng. Macihanghang jira koman si Yeso am paglowen na do oo ni Yeso.

language1_text: But when his disciples saw it, they had indignation, saying, To what purpose is this waste?
language2_text: Macita da no macinanao jya am maoya sira so onowned. Maniring sira am, "To na gagidan ori am

language1_text: For this ointment might have been sold for much, and given to the poor.
language2_text: ikongo peypeypangayan no akman sang. Jingbeywani o yatey masingat a haneng ang. Apyapya rana o kapamalit nya so nizpi a ipanidong so ikasi a tao."

language1_text: When Jesus understood it, he said unto them, Why trouble ye the woman? for she hath wrought a good work upon me.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso do pakamizngan na sya am, "Nyo kazyakan no mavakes ang. O vazay na jyaken am ney yapya na vazay.

language1_text: For ye have the poor always with you; but me ye have not always.
language2_text: Ta yamasangib sira o makasi a tao a yamacikaop jinyo. So ji na salici jinyo no kasidong nyo sira. Am yaken am ko jyasangib, ta yalikey rana o ipacikaop ko jinyo.

language1_text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body, she did it for my burial.
language2_text: O na paglowan do oo ko no mavakes so mahangno a haneng am yavat na ori do bobwan da jyaken.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world, there shall also this, that this woman hath done, be told for a memorial of her.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no ipeylimwang o Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do karawan eya am abo ji makalavat so mina vazay na jyaken no mavakes eya."

language1_text: Then one of the twelve, called Judas Iscariot, went unto the chief priests,
language2_text: Amyan do rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao ji Yeso so asa ka tao a meyngaran so Yota a tao do Isecyadi. Iya rana am nimangay do panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and said unto them, What will ye give me, and I will deliver him unto you? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver.
language2_text: Maniring am, "No si itoro ko jinyo si Yeso am amyan so nakem nyo jyaken an?" Karahan am mangap sira so atlo a poo (30) a nizpi a itoro da jya.

language1_text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him.
language2_text: Nimacipinda do dang o ji na rana pehmai ji Yeso a itoro jira.

language1_text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus, saying unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover?
language2_text: Omanam o kasaraw do ipamaring da so kanen a iyakan da so ji nimimway a pang am pacicin da si Yeso no macinanao jya. Maniring sira am, "Do wanjin mo tovoyan jyamen a tomalakanen so pamaringan ta so kanen do Iyeci."

language1_text: And he said, Go into the city to such a man, and say unto him, The Master saith, My time is at hand; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Angay kamo do ili. Si makasinmo kamo so tao am si maniring kamo jya am, 'Kwan na no yamnanao jyamen am: Yarana marateng o araraw no ikawakwak ko. So yana raran so macinanao jya yamangay do vahay nyo a yamamaring so kanen do Iyeci.'"

language1_text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them; and they made ready the passover.
language2_text: Karahan am to da mangozai o ciring ni Yeso a somdep do vahay a mapeykakasa so yaven da.

language1_text: Now when the even was come, he sat down with the twelve.
language2_text: Maseyrem am macihanghang si Yeso do rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya.

language1_text: And as they did eat, he said, Verily I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
language2_text: Koman sira am maniring si Yeso jira am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am yamyan jinyo so yasa ka tao a yamanazang nyaken."

language1_text: And they were exceeding sorrowful, and began every one of them to say unto him, Lord, is it I?
language2_text: Mamizing da ori am marahet o aktokto da no macinanao jya. Am ori o nikateyteyras da manangangay nya ji Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Mo Panirsirngen, yaken ori an?"

language1_text: And he answered and said, He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish, the same shall betray me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O yamapazanod so lima na jyaken a yatomahem so kanen na do kakanan am iya ori o yamanazang nyaken.

language1_text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him: but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! it had been good for that man if he had not been born.
language2_text: Akman so ciring do Seysyo, ta mangay o kawakwak da so Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao. Am o manazang nya tao am to makasi. Apyapya rana o kaji na nimatazakan a tao do karawan."

language1_text: Then Judas, which betrayed him, answered and said, Master, is it I? He said unto him, Thou hast said.
language2_text: O manazang ni Yeso a tao a meyngaran so Yota am maniring am, "Mo Mangnanao, yaken ori an?" Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo na to yoyoi o na ka imo."

language1_text: And as they were eating, Jesus took bread, and blessed it, and brake it, and gave it to the disciples, and said, Take, eat; this is my body.
language2_text: Koman sira am ahapen ni Yeso o pang a isaray na ji Ama ta do to a kakcikcil na sya a itoro do macinanao jya. Maniring am, "Ahap kamo a kakan nyo sya, ta kataotao ko ya."

language1_text: And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and gave it to them, saying, Drink ye all of it;
language2_text: Makarahan am ahapen na o kopo a yanan no potaw cyo a isaray ji Ama ta do to a katoro na rana nya jira. Maniring am, "To kamo a mimin a amyop sya.

language1_text: for this is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many for the remission of sins.
language2_text: Oya rana am rala ko a nimvoyog a omaing do aro a tao a omvonas so raraten da. O rala ko rana ya am yongkad nyo do vayo a pangozayan nyo a ciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But I say unto you, I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine, until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father's kingdom.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am ji ko na ngyop so potaw cyo a mangay do araraw no ikeypirwa ko a macikaop jinyo do teyngato, no si papwen na ni Ama ta do to o katalamozong na no vayo a karawan."

language1_text: And when they had sung an hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.
language2_text: Meyyanwanood sira so asa ka anwanood a sarayan da ni Ama ta do to a kapakowbot da rana a mangay do meyngaran so Kanlan a tokon.

language1_text: Then saith Jesus unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad.
language2_text: Makarahan am maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "Sicyamahep eya am mamimin kamo a amlikolikod jyaken a peymakarwan. Ta maniring do Seysyo am 'Wakwaken ko o mapamangan so kagling a kapeyvwak da no kagling.'

language1_text: But after I am risen again, I will go before you into Galilee.
language2_text: Am no si mirwa ko a mavyay am manmanma ko a ka ninyo a mangay do Cyadidi."

language1_text: Peter answered and said unto him, Though all men shall be offended because of thee, yet will I never be offended.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite ji Yeso am, "Tana peymakarwan da imo no karwan no tao am jyabo kakaro ko jimo a."

language1_text: Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, That this night, before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso ji Pite am, "To ko na macitangayan jimo am sicyamahep eya am no si omanam o manok a tomazokokok am ipitlo ka omalalas jyaken."

language1_text: Peter said unto him, Though I should die with thee, yet will I not deny thee. Likewise also said all the disciples.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Tana macizanod ko na jimo a mawakwak am jyabo kato ko ngalalasan jimo a." O karwan da no macinanao jya am akman sang o ciring da.

language1_text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane, and saith unto the disciples, Sit ye here, while I go and pray yonder.
language2_text: Nimangay si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do meyngaran so Kesimani. Maniring si Yeso jira am, "To kamo ngyan do jya, ta mangay ko meynozi do kwang ito."

language1_text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee, and began to be sorrowful and very heavy.
language2_text: Karahan am palolwen na si Pite a kano rarwa ka anak no meyngaran so Sipitay. So niyapo na rana dang no keyngen na rana so onowned ni Yeso.

language1_text: Then saith he unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful, even unto death: tarry ye here, and watch with me.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Yako toda jyangay so inawan a yamazabab so onowned. So ipacizanod nyo jyaken do jya meytataziman."

language1_text: And he went a little further, and fell on his face, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if it be possible, let this cup pass from me: nevertheless not as I will, but as thou wilt.
language2_text: Omalam a meypanam am meyrorokma. Maniring do inozi na am, "Mo Ama, no si apyahen mo am ji mo norwan jyaken o yatey rako a alalaw ko. Am ji mo na mangozai o nakenakem ko, ta ahahapan mo na sya."

language1_text: And he cometh unto the disciples, and findeth them asleep, and saith unto Peter, What, could ye not watch with me one hour?
language2_text: Meysinaoli a mangay do tatlo a ka macinanao jya am macita na sira mitkeh. Maniring ji Pite am, "Manngwa, ji nyo nahap o asa ka vatvatek a ipacizanod nyo jyaken a meytataziman?

language1_text: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.
language2_text: Meytataziman kamo a meynozi an, ta kalittan kamo an. Tana nyo apyahen do onowned nyo am nyo jyapakongo o nyo kapeynozi."

language1_text: He went away again the second time, and prayed, saying, O my Father, if this cup may not pass away from me, except I drink it, thy will be done.
language2_text: Maniring do ipidwa na kangay a meynozi ni Yeso am, "Mo Ama, no ji mo amya o alalaw ko a komaro jyaken am to mo na mangozai o nakenakem mo."

language1_text: And he came and found them asleep again: for their eyes were heavy.
language2_text: Meysinaoli do macinanao jya am macita na pa sira mitkeh, ta tey makaha rana sira.

language1_text: And he left them, and went away again, and prayed the third time, saying the same words.
language2_text: Karwan na sira am ikeypitlo na rana ori a mangay meynozi. To meyyangay o ciring na kano kapanmanma na meynozi.

language1_text: Then cometh he to his disciples, and saith unto them, Sleep on now, and take your rest: behold, the hour is at hand, and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.
language2_text: Karahan am meysinaoli do macinanao jya am maniring am, "Kamo pa mitkeh? Kamo pa meywalam? Cita kamo o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a yarana makeykai a ipanazang do meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: Rise, let us be going: behold, he is at hand that doth betray me.
language2_text: Kayokay kamo na, ta mangay tamo na. Cita kamo o yamanazang nyaken a tao a yarana mai."

language1_text: And while he yet spake, lo, Judas, one of the twelve, came, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and elders of the people.
language2_text: Ji pa vitos o ciring na ni Yeso am mai rana si Yota a ikararwa da so ikakarwan no macinanao jya a kapacilolo da no aro a tao a meyhavit so takzes a kano sisipzot da kayo. Sira ori am nitovoy da no panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he: hold him fast.
language2_text: Amyan so nipaziman na sira no manazang ni Yeso a tao. Maniring am, "O rapongen ko a tao am ori o rakpen nyo."

language1_text: And forthwith he came to Jesus, and said, Hail, master; and kissed him.
language2_text: Makaranes si Yota am to meytopos a mangay do tangain ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Mo Mangnanao, kokay." Karahan am rapongen na rana si Yeso.

language1_text: And Jesus said unto him, Friend, wherefore art thou come? Then came they, and laid hands on Jesus, and took him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo kahakay, peyvazay rana o yamo ipeynanakem a vazay mo." Karahan am paciralayan da na no tao a omrakep si Yeso.

language1_text: And, behold, one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand, and drew his sword, and struck a servant of the high priest's, and smote off his ear.
language2_text: O nimacihza ji Yeso a tao am amyan jira so asa to rana ngahap so takzes na pacipasen do talinga na no lamlamsoy no panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kakas na no asa ka talinga na.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto him, Put up again thy sword into his place: for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Pasoot rana o takzes mo, ta o mangap so tao no takzes am akman sang a mangay da wakwaken no takzes.

language1_text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father, and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels?
language2_text: Manngwa, mo jyatenngi yaken? Ta si tawagan ko si Ama am jyabo kaji na manovoyan so makazivo a tinsi a somidong jyaken a.

language1_text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled, that thus it must be?
language2_text: Am ji kongmana so sang o nakem ko. Ta makongo so wanjin a yatodey mangononong do ciring a yadomket do Seysyo, do keyyan no makdeng a vazay a mangay jyaken."

language1_text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes, Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple, and ye laid no hold on me.
language2_text: Karahan am maniring si Yeso do aro a tao am, "Kamo mapalolo so takzes a kano sisipzot a yamrakep jyaken? Nyo patpehen yaken do manakaw a tao? Ko mangday a yamangnanao so tao do rako a panaralayan am nyo ji rakpa yaken.

language1_text: But all this was done, that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled. Then all the disciples forsook him, and fled.
language2_text: Am o na todey mangononongi no aro a vazay eya am manoyong o ciring da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to do Seysyo a yatodey mangononong." Karahan am peykarokarwan da rana si Yeso no macinanao jya a meyvwak.

language1_text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest, where the scribes and the elders were assembled.
language2_text: O nimrakep si Yeso a tao am yangay da si Yeso do vahay no panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a meyngaran so Keyava. Amyan sira do dang o mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan a meykaygi.

language1_text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest's palace, and went in, and sat with the servants, to see the end.
language2_text: To na macyazizazawi si Yeso ni Pite. Makaranes sira do tezantehed no vahay no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am somdep si Pite a kapacihezsad na do pamzaten da tao a tomita so vazay da ji Yeso no aro a tao.

language1_text: Now the chief priests, and elders, and all the council, sought false witness against Jesus, to put him to death;
language2_text: O panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano aro a meykaygi a tao am meykala sira so tao a mangamaog so iraherahet da si Yeso a ciring a iwakwak da sya.

language1_text: but found none: yea, though many false witnesses came, yet found they none. At the last came two false witnesses,
language2_text: Tana aro tao a meykala so iraherahet sya am ji sya makakala. Mownay am maniring o rarwa ka tao am,

language1_text: and said, This fellow said, I am able to destroy the temple of God, and to build it in three days.
language2_text: "Nipanci no tao ang o kabalinas na so yata raralayan ni Ama ta do to a kapatnek na rana sya do ikatlo na araw."

language1_text: And the high priest arose, and said unto him, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
language2_text: To rana meytatanek o panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. Maniring ji Yeso am, "Manngwa, yamyan so yamo pasapahen do ciring da no tao a yada iraherahet jimo ang?"

language1_text: But Jesus held his peace. And the high priest answered and said unto him, I adjure thee by the living God, that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ, the Son of God.
language2_text: Am abo o asa ka ciring a pasapahen na jya ni Yeso. Ipirwa na pacicin no panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am maniring ji Yeso am, "Ko na to mancyan o ngaran ni Ama ta do to a yamanci nimo a manci nya jyamen so manoyong rana ciring mo. Manngwa, manoyong ka ya Misayya, Anak na ni Ama ta do to an?"

language1_text: Jesus saith unto him, Thou hast said: nevertheless I say unto you, Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yamanoyong o mo ipanci ang. Am ko pa ipanci jinyo am macipinda sicyaikwaya o kapakacita nyo jyaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a amlisna do wanan na ni Ama ta do to a maciralay do cinalab a meygegcin do karawan."

language1_text: Then the high priest rent his clothes, saying, He hath spoken blasphemy; what further need have we of witnesses? behold, now ye have heard his blasphemy.
language2_text: Mamizing na ori no panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am to na rana misipisinga o ayob na. Maniring am, "Na to ngolala si Ama ta do to no ciring na. Taosya rana o kakala ta so karatan na. Tamo nimamimin a yanimakamizing so na iraherahet si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: What think ye? They answered and said, He is guilty of death.
language2_text: Manngo kamo." Maniring sira am, "Na kakzeben na kawakwak."

language1_text: Then did they spit in his face, and buffeted him; and others smote him with the palms of their hands,
language2_text: Karahan am cicippan da o moing na a kapatoki da pa jya kasiplang da sya. Maniring sira am,

language1_text: saying, Prophesy unto us, thou Christ, Who is he that smote thee?
language2_text: "Pancyaney, mo Misayya. Sino o yanimbakbak jimo ang."

language1_text: Now Peter sat without in the palace: and a damsel came unto him, saying, Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee.
language2_text: Amhezsad si Pite do pantaw am amyan so lamlamsoy da a mavakes a mangay jya. Maniring am, "Imo asyo o yamacihcihza do tao do Cyadidi a Yeso?"

language1_text: But he denied before them all, saying, I know not what thou sayest.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite a omalalas jya do tangain no aro a tao am, "Ko jyatenngi o mo ipanci ang."

language1_text: And when he was gone out into the porch, another maid saw him, and said unto them that were there, This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay do ngoso no pazezevngen am macita na pa no asa ka mavakes a lamlamsoy da. Maniring do aro a tao a amyan dang am, "O tao eyto am kararay na ori no tao do Nasale a meyngaran si Yeso."

language1_text: And again he denied with an oath, I do not know the man.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite do ikeypirwa na omalalas jya am, "Ko jyatenngi o tao a nyo ipanci ang."

language1_text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by, and said to Peter, Surely thou also art one of them; for thy speech bewrayeth thee.
language2_text: Mownay am to da rana limota si Pite no meytatanek do dang a tao. Maniring sira ji Pite am, "Ka manoyong a kararay da nira ori. Ta yameyyangay o ciriciring nyo."

language1_text: Then began he to curse and to swear, saying, I know not the man. And immediately the cock crew.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Ko jyatenngi o tao ang. No yamalas o ciring ko am cyaha, ta amyan si Ama ta do to a mapasingsingkad jyaken." Teyka na ori a ciring am tomazokokok o manok.

language1_text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus, which said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice. And he went out, and wept bitterly.
language2_text: Karahan am manakem na rana ni Pite o mina ciring na ni Yeso a manci no, "Do yanam no manok a tomazokokok am ipitlo ka omalalas jyaken." Karahan am makowbot rana si Pite a kapeykaoo na omzezezeng rana amlavi.

language1_text: When the morning was come, all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death:
language2_text: Apnezak am malovot sira o panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay a meykaygi no kawakwak da si Yeso.

language1_text: and when they had bound him, they led him away, and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor.
language2_text: Ahapen da si Yeso am vaoden da yangay a itoro do panirsirngen da no Loma a meyngaran so Pilato.

language1_text: Then Judas, which had betrayed him, when he saw that he was condemned, repented himself, and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders,
language2_text: Katenngan na rana si Yeso no nimanazang nya a meyngaran so Yota a wakwaken da am maneneseh rana. Karahan am mangay na paolin o atlo a poo (30) a nizpi do panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: saying, I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood. And they said, What is that to us? see thou to that.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Ko meyraraten a yatodey manazang no inawan no yabo so raraten a tao." Maniring sira am, "Vazay mo saon am. Namen macivazay jimo."

language1_text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple, and departed, and went and hanged himself.
language2_text: Karahan am iwalit na o nizpi do rako a panaralayan a kapakowbot na rana amvitkeh so kataotao na lalavicinen do kayo.

language1_text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces, and said, It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury, because it is the price of blood.
language2_text: O panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am peysinsinmowen da rana o nizpi. Maniring sira am, "Ngina no inawan na ya. Am ori o ji palovoci sya do kingking a itoro ji Ama ta do to, ta marahet."

language1_text: And they took counsel, and bought with them the potter's field, to bury strangers in.
language2_text: Meykaygi sira am akmey yasa sira ommya so kasazang da do nihakawan no meyteytanatana tao a mangay da bobwan no ji macikeylyan jira tao.

language1_text: Wherefore that field was called, The field of blood, unto this day.
language2_text: So na todangai sicyaikwaya no yada pancyan no nihakawan ori a "Nivoyogan no rala no tao."

language1_text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet, saying, And they took the thirty pieces of silver, the price of him that was valued, whom they of the children of Israel did value;
language2_text: O vazay rana ya am yatodey mangononong do mina ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran so Yedimi. Ta maniring am, "Nyahap da o atlo a poo (30) a nizpi a nipamnekan da no Isedi a ipalit da so inawan no tao,

language1_text: and gave them for the potter's field, as the Lord appointed me.
language2_text: a nipamalit da so nihakawan no meyteytanatana tao. Ori rana am nakenakem na jyaken ori ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And Jesus stood before the governor: and the governor asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And Jesus said unto him, Thou sayest.
language2_text: Yangay da si Yeso do tangain ni Pilato. Maniring jya am, "Manngwa, panirsirngen da imo no tao do Yotay?" Maniring si Yeso am, "Noon, manoyong ori."

language1_text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders, he answered nothing.
language2_text: O iraherahet da sya no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan am abo nipasapa na ni Yeso.

language1_text: Then said Pilate unto him, Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee?
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato jya am, "Yabo cicilwan mo do da iraherahet jimo a vazay ang?"

language1_text: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
language2_text: Akman sang ta abo o asa ka ciring a pasapahen na ni Yeso. Ori o nisavasavakan na nya ni Pilato.

language1_text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner, whom they would.
language2_text: Mangday do Iyeci o kato na mangozayan jya no panirsirngen do pamnekan da no tao a mapasaway so asa ka nyaneban da tao.

language1_text: And they had then a notable prisoner, called Barabbas.
language2_text: No kanang am amyan so asa ka nyaneban da meyngaran so Palapa katenngan da ori no tao a tey marahet so iyangay.

language1_text: Therefore when they were gathered together, Pilate said unto them, Whom will ye that I release unto you? Barabbas, or Jesus which is called Christ?
language2_text: Nimalovot o aro a tao. Maniring si Pilato jira am, "Sino nyo kakzeben a pasawain ko. Si Palapa o pasawain ko an? No si Yeso a ipanci da Misayya o pasawain ko."

language1_text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him.
language2_text: Katenngan ni Pilato o nyahapan da si Yeso a itoro jya do keynanahet da nya.

language1_text: When he was set down on the judgment seat, his wife sent unto him, saying, Have thou nothing to do with that just man: for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him.
language2_text: Pacicin ni Pilato am manovoy o mavakes na so tao a mangay manci nya jya so kaji na manaptan do abo so kararatan a tao, ta tey manganyahey o tatateynep na.

language1_text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas, and destroy Jesus.
language2_text: Am kapasozisozi da so aro a tao no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan a manci ni Pilato a mapasaway si Palapa a kawakwak da si Yeso.

language1_text: The governor answered and said unto them, Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you? They said, Barabbas.
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato jira am, "Sira rana o yararwa eya am sino jira ya o apyapyahen nyo a pasawain ko." Maniring sira am, "Si Palapa."

language1_text: Pilate saith unto them, What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ? They all say unto him, Let him be crucified.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Pilato am, "Kongwen ko so wanjin si Yeso a da ipanci no tao a Misayya."

language1_text: And the governor said, Why, what evil hath he done? But they cried out the more, saying, Let him be crucified.
language2_text: Maniring sira o aro a tao am, "Padketen do jyojika." Maniring si Pilato am, "Ikongo na mina vazay a marahet." Meyratateng am ikeykavevek da amlololos no aro a tao a manci no kapadket sya do jyojika.

language1_text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing, but that rather a tumult was made, he took water, and washed his hands before the multitude, saying, I am innocent of the blood of this just person: see ye to it.
language2_text: Ileylamdamen na sira ni Pilato am katenngan na rana o kabo na rana no pasapahen na jira ciring, ta ikanyahey na kapeyzavozavoz da no aro a tao. Meyratateng am mangap so ranom a pangain na do tangain no aro a tao a kapavanaw na. Maniring am, "No si mawakwak ya am cyaha, ta beken a raraten ko, ta monganay jinyo."

language1_text: Then answered all the people, and said, His blood be on us, and on our children.
language2_text: Karahan am akma sirey asa o tao a manci no, "No si mawakwak o tao ori am cyaha, ta monganay jyamen a kano sivosivovoong namen o mapeyraraten sya."

language1_text: Then released he Barabbas unto them: and when he had scourged Jesus, he delivered him to be crucified.
language2_text: Meyratateng am pasawain na ni Pilato si Palapa a kapanci na rana no tao a somipsipzot ji Yeso a katoro na rana nya jira a padketen do jyojika.

language1_text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall, and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers.
language2_text: O imong ni Pilato a itaysang no Loma am yangay da na si Yeso do pantaw no vahay ni Pilato a limoten.

language1_text: And they stripped him, and put on him a scarlet robe.
language2_text: Meyratateng am opsowen da o ayob ni Yeso a kapayob da jya so akmey ayob no panirsirngen,

language1_text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns, they put it upon his head, and a reed in his right hand: and they bowed the knee before him, and mocked him, saying, Hail, King of the Jews!
language2_text: kapamalikawag da so tazici a pasakopen da jya a kapakemkem da sya do wanan na so vazit a kapeylilitod da do tangain na meykeykaming nya. Maniring sira am, "Makapintek a Panirsirngen da no tao do Yotay,"

language1_text: And they spit upon him, and took the reed, and smote him on the head.
language2_text: a kacicipa da jya a sipsipzotan no vazit so oo.

language1_text: And after that they had mocked him, they took the robe off from him, and put his own raiment on him, and led him away to crucify him.
language2_text: Teyka da peyyaliliman am opsowen da o nipeyyayob da sya akmey ayob no panirsirngen a kapayob da rana so meyngongyod a ayob na a kangay da rana mapadket sya do jyojika.

language1_text: And as they came out, they found a man of Cyrene, Simon by name: him they compelled to bear his cross.
language2_text: Makowbot sira am makasinmo sira so tao do Cidinay a meyngaran so Simong. Karahan am gacigatan da somabway no jyojika ni Yeso,

language1_text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha, that is to say, a place of a skull,
language2_text: a kangay da nya do meyngaran so Keketa. O peypeypangayan na am Yanga no oo no tao.

language1_text: they gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall: and when he had tasted thereof, he would not drink.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangap sira so nipazavozan da so kosozi a makopad a ranom a ipeyyop da si Yeso. Am mina kataham na jya a ji na niyop.

language1_text: And they crucified him, and parted his garments, casting lots: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, They parted my garments among them, and upon my vesture did they cast lots.
language2_text: Padketen da rana si Yeso do jyojika am macipangoyongoyot sira amvonong so mina ayob na.

language1_text: And sitting down they watched him there;
language2_text: Karahan am amlisna sira do dang a omzat jya.

language1_text: and set up over his head his accusation written, THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS.
language2_text: Amyan so nivatvatkan da do kayo a nipayoray da do jyojika a raraten na. O nivatvatkan da ciring am, "Iya ya am Panirsirngen da no tao do Yotay,"

language1_text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him, one on the right hand, and another on the left.
language2_text: a kapazasing da so rarwa nimanakaw a tao do wanan na kado ozi na a padketen do jyojika.

language1_text: And they that passed by reviled him, wagging their heads,
language2_text: O meyhatay jya tao am to da ligaligana o oo da mapasnesnek si Yeso.

language1_text: and saying, Thou that destroyest the temple, and buildest it in three days, save thyself. If thou be the Son of God, come down from the cross.
language2_text: "Ipanci mo asyo o kakava mo so rako a panaralayan a kapakatlo na araw no ipatnek mo sya. No ka manoyong a Anak ni Ama ta do to am avyay pala o kataotao mo. Peyhekas pala do jyojika."

language1_text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him, with the scribes and elders, said,
language2_text: O panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan am akman sang sira meykeykaming nya. Maniring sira am,

language1_text: He saved others; himself he cannot save. If he be the King of Israel, let him now come down from the cross, and we will believe him.
language2_text: "Na mavyay o karwan no tao a na jyatenngi o kataotao na na avyain. No manoyong a Panirsirngen no Isedi am na ji meyhekasi do jyojika. Ta ori o anoyngan ta jya.

language1_text: He trusted in God; let him deliver him now, if he will have him: for he said, I am the Son of God.
language2_text: Na ipeyhanhan si Ama ta do to. Na ipanci o kataotao na Anak no Tao do to. No komwan am citahen ta pala. Manngwa, ala avyain na ni Ama ta do to an?"

language1_text: The thieves also, which were crucified with him, cast the same in his teeth.
language2_text: Akman sang sira o yamacitazing jya do jyojika nimanakaw a tao a mapeyleylak sya.

language1_text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour.
language2_text: Meyigen o araw am mina todakedep o teyrahem so atlo a ka vatvatek.

language1_text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eli, Eli, lama sabachthani? that is to say, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
language2_text: Ikatlo na ka vatvatek do makoyab am amlololos si Yeso. Maniring am, "Idi, Idi, lama sapahetani." O peypeypangayan na am, "Mo Ama do to, mo Ama do to, mo peymakarwan jyaken."

language1_text: Some of them that stood there, when they heard that, said, This man calleth for Elias.
language2_text: Maniring sira o makamizing sya tao am, "Na tawagan si Idiya."

language1_text: And straightway one of them ran, and took a spunge, and filled it with vinegar, and put it on a reed, and gave him to drink.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tao a mina to malalayo a mangay mangap so akmey tapaik a katahem na sya do makopad a ranom a kapalibed na sya do anaro a avyao a itoro ji Yeso a ipeyyop na sya.

language1_text: The rest said, Let be, let us see whether Elias will come to save him.
language2_text: Maniring sira o karwan no tao am, "Nanalahen ta pala. Ala mai si Idiya mahap sya ang."

language1_text: Jesus, when he had cried again with a loud voice, yielded up the ghost.
language2_text: Ipirwa na kalolos ni Yeso am mazavat o inawan na.

language1_text: And, behold, the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom; and the earth did quake, and the rocks rent;
language2_text: No kanang am o bengbeng no rako a panaralayan a milakayob am mina todapising a kapeykanini na kapeykezi no pongow.

language1_text: and the graves were opened; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose,
language2_text: So mina to na iwangi no heseb da a mina todavyai rana no amraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: and came out of the graves after his resurrection, and went into the holy city, and appeared unto many.
language2_text: Mirwa mavyay si Yeso am karwan da o heseb da a mangay rana do Yelosaleng. So ikaro no tao a nimakacita sira ang.

language1_text: Now when the centurion, and they that were with him, watching Jesus, saw the earthquake, and those things that were done, they feared greatly, saying, Truly this was the Son of God.
language2_text: Macita na no panirsirngen no itaysang no Loma kano kararay na nimamzat ji Yeso o nimeykanini a kano makakaday a vazay am manyahey sira. Maniring sira am, "Yamanoyong ya Anak no Tao do to."

language1_text: And many women were there beholding afar off, which followed Jesus from Galilee, ministering unto him:
language2_text: Amyan dang so aro a mavakes a makacita sya a macyatovang jya. Sira rana am apo sira do Cyadidi a nimacihza ji Yeso a mapeyveyveken sya.

language1_text: among which was Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James and Joses, and the mother of Zebedee's children.
language2_text: O amyan do dang am Matelyan Madiya kano asa ka Madiya a ina da Yake a kani Yoseyvo a kano mavakes ni Sipitay.

language1_text: When the even was come, there came a rich man of Arimathæ a, named Joseph, who also himself was Jesus' disciple:
language2_text: Maseyrem rana am amyan so meynakem a tao a nimapo do Adimatay a meyngaran so Yoseyvo. Iya rana am nimacinanao ori ji Yeso.

language1_text: he went to Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus. Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered.
language2_text: So nyangay na ji Pilato a manci no kakas na so kataotao ni Yeso. Karahan am manovoy si Pilato so lamlamsoy na a manci no kapya na mangay da hapen no kataotao ni Yeso,

language1_text: And when Joseph had taken the body, he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth,
language2_text: a kahap na rana sya ni Yoseyvo a kapongos na jya no malavang a milakayob,

language1_text: and laid it in his own new tomb, which he had hewn out in the rock: and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre, and departed.
language2_text: a mey pakakasahen do nidokdokan da rako a mao a akmey azcip. Ori rana am vayo pa ori a nidokdokan na, a kalolog na so rako a vato a pazevngen na do ngoso na a kangay na rana.

language1_text: And there was Mary Magdalene, and the other Mary, sitting over against the sepulchre.
language2_text: Si Matelyan Madiya kano asa ka tao a meyngaran si Madiya am amhezsad sira do katovangan no ngoso no heseb ni Yeso.

language1_text: Now the next day, that followed the day of the preparation, the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate,
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am araraw no ipeywalam no tao do Yotay. O panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am mangay sira ji Pilato.

language1_text: saying, Sir, we remember that that deceiver said, while he was yet alive, After three days I will rise again.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Mo maran, namen pa manakem o ciring no yamangalalas a tao no kavyay na pa manci no, 'Ikatlo na araw am mavyay ko pa.'

language1_text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day, lest his disciples come by night, and steal him away, and say unto the people, He is risen from the dead: so the last error shall be worse than the first.
language2_text: Am ori o pancyan mo no tao a makapzat do heseb na so katlo araw a kaji da makatakawan so kataotao na no macinanao jya, ta todey mancyan do tao o kanimirwa na mavyay. Ta manginanawa o ciring da a malalas pa kano ciring na no kakwa."

language1_text: Pilate said unto them, Ye have a watch: go your way, make it as sure as ye can.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Pilato am, "Palolo kamo so mamzamzat a itaysang kapakapya nyo a mamzat do heseb na."

language1_text: So they went, and made the sepulchre sure, sealing the stone, and setting a watch.
language2_text: Karahan am pangayan da so itovil da jya do vato a somengseng do ngoso no heseb na a kato da rana vezedan do dang no itaysang a mamzat do heseb na.

language1_text: In the end of the sabbath, as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week, came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre.
language2_text: Madagdag do niciyo do nikavitos no ipeywalam no tao am meyheza sira Matelyan Madiya kano asa ka tao a meyngaran si Madiya mangay do heseb ni Yeso a mangay tomita sya.

language1_text: And, behold, there was a great earthquake: for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven, and came and rolled back the stone from the door, and sat upon it.
language2_text: Makarahan am to meykanini a kapeygegcin no tinsi ni Ama ta do to a apo do teyngato a kalolog na no rako a vato a nipasengseng da do heseb na, kalisna na jya.

language1_text: His countenance was like lightning, and his raiment white as snow:
language2_text: O kataotao na am to maniray. O talili na am akma raney otab no awa so kalavalavang.

language1_text: and for fear of him the keepers did shake, and became as dead men.
language2_text: Pandan da rana amzikzik a manyahey no mamzat do heseb na tao. So nikazyazikaz da do teyrahem a akmey nimawakwak a tao.

language1_text: And the angel answered and said unto the women, Fear not ye: for I know that ye seek Jesus, which was crucified.
language2_text: Maniring o tinsi do mavavakes am, "Ji kamo anyahey. Ko katenngan inyo a yakomala si Yeso a nipadket da do jyojika.

language1_text: He is not here: for he is risen, as he said. Come, see the place where the Lord lay.
language2_text: Yarana ji ngyan do jya, ta na nipangononongan o ciring na a yanimirwa rana yamavyay. Sijya kamo a kacita nyo so yada nipangayan sya,

language1_text: And go quickly, and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead; and, behold, he goeth before you into Galilee; there shall ye see him: lo, I have told you.
language2_text: a kangay nyo na manci nya do macinanao jya, ta yarana nimirwa mavyay. So ipanmanma na mangay do Cyadidi a ka ninyo. Cyaha, ta to nyo na cita do dang. Peyyanen nyo do onowned nyo o ko nipanci jinyo a ciring ang."

language1_text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy; and did run to bring his disciples word.
language2_text: Karahan am meybebezbezan sira komaro rana do heseb na ang. No mangay kasaray da am mangay kanyahey da a malalayo a mangay do macinanao jya.

language1_text: And as they went to tell his disciples, behold, Jesus met them, saying, All hail. And they came and held him by the feet, and worshipped him.
language2_text: Meyratateng am to da cita si Yeso do rarahan. Maniring jira am, "Kokay kamo." Am ori o nipeypanam da mangay a omyapet so ai na amraralay nya.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto them, Be not afraid: go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee, and there shall they see me.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Ji kamo anyahey. Angay kamo na kapanci nyo nya do karwan nyo a mangay do Cyadidi. Cyaha, ta macita da yaken do dang."

language1_text: Now when they were going, behold, some of the watch came into the city, and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done.
language2_text: Amyan pa sira do rarahan o mavavakes am o tatasa jira do nimzat do heseb na itaysang am nimangay sira do ili a kapanci da no niyapoyapwan no vazay na ni Yeso do panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And when they were assembled with the elders, and had taken counsel, they gave large money unto the soldiers,
language2_text: Teyka sira meysirisiring o panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay am ipanta da sira so aro a nizpi.

language1_text: saying, Say ye, His disciples came by night, and stole him away while we slept.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Si maniring kamo am, 'O macinanao ji Yeso am sira nimai no kamahep a da katayo so kataotao ni Yeso do namen itkeh.'

language1_text: And if this come to the governor's ears, we will persuade him, and secure you.
language2_text: Cyaha, ta si mamizing no panirsirngen am yagom namen inyo kaji na oyyan ninyo."

language1_text: So they took the money, and did as they were taught: and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ahapen da o nizpi no itaysang. So to da mangozai do ciring da. O akman rana sang a ciring am yatodavangovangon a yada peyyamyamizngan no tao do Yotay a yato ngai sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee, into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them.
language2_text: Makaranes sira o asa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya do Cyadidi am mangay sira do nipamnekan ni Yeso a angayan da tokon.

language1_text: And when they saw him, they worshipped him: but some doubted.
language2_text: Macita da si Yeso am meylilitod sira amraralay nya. Am tatasa pa jira o mapeykarwa pa so onowned.

language1_text: And Jesus came and spake unto them, saying, All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth.
language2_text: Omasngen jira si Yeso am maniring jira am, "Na rana nimimin ni Ama ta do to o oyowyat do teyngato a kado teyrahem a yanitoro jyaken.

language1_text: Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost:
language2_text: Am ori o yangay nyo do peycyamahamahatawan na a mapanop so tao a omanoyong jyaken, a kahap nyo so ngaran ni Ama ta do to a kano Anak na kano Seyzi a tomaktak jira,

language1_text: teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you: and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world. Amen.
language2_text: a kananao nyo sira a omahap so makakaday a yako ninanao jinyo. Am manakem nyo o kaji ko macisyayan jinyo a mangay do kaidan no karawan."

language1_text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ, the Son of God;
language2_text: O Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Yeso Kizisto a Anak na ni Ama ta do to am oya o niyapoyapwan na.

language1_text: As it is written in the prophets, Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, Which shall prepare thy way before thee.
language2_text: O panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a tao a meyngaran so Isayya am maniring do nivatvatkan na vakong am, "Cita pala o yako tovoin a meylimwang no ciring ko an. Iya rana ori am mamanong nimo a meywadwad so rarahan mo.

language1_text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, Make his paths straight.
language2_text: Amyan so tao a omlololos do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a manci no, 'Inyo rana am wadwadan nyo o rarahan no Panirsirngen ta, ikatazineng na rana no pangonongan na.'"

language1_text: John did baptize in the wilderness, and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.
language2_text: So niyan na ni Yowani do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a manaktak so tao a kapangnanao na. Maniring am, "Karwan nyo o peyraratenan nyo a kataktak ko jinyo. Ta ori o vonasan na sya ni Ama ta do to so raraten nyo."
