language2_text: Makarahan am yai da no tao o ji makamizing a ji makabnebnek a tao do tangain ni Yeso. Ta ipanci da si Yeso a mapaopta so lima na jya.

language1_text: And he took him aside from the multitude, and put his fingers into his ears, and he spit, and touched his tongue;
language2_text: Makarahan am rarahen na do aro a tao a kapasyay na sya jira a kapasdep na so tanoro na do talinga na a kapeycicipa na kapalinas na sya do lila no tao ang,

language1_text: and looking up to heaven, he sighed, and saith unto him, Ephphatha, that is, Be opened.
language2_text: katangara na so hanit ni Yeso a omhangsak. Maniring do tao ori am, "Ivata." O peypeypangayan na am, "Kacyangi rana."

language1_text: And straightway his ears were opened, and the string of his tongue was loosed, and he spake plain.
language2_text: Makarahan am jya nimeyyahahay a makamizing a makabnebnek.

language1_text: And he charged them that they should tell no man: but the more he charged them, so much the more a great deal they published it;
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do aro a tao am, "Ji nyo meycicicyan do tao." Am ikeykavevek da no aro a tao a meylimwang nya.

language1_text: and were beyond measure astonished, saying, He hath done all things well: he maketh both the deaf to hear, and the dumb to speak.
language2_text: Abo ji navasavak a makamizing sya. Maniring sira am, "Yateywara o vazay na a yato makapeypapya so yamateleh a kano yaji makabnebnek."

language1_text: In those days the multitude being very great, and having nothing to eat, Jesus called his disciples unto him, and saith unto them,
language2_text: Ji meyyonownay am amyan pa so aro a tao a mangay do tangain ni Yeso. Meyratateng am abo rana o kanen da. Maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am,

language1_text: I have compassion on the multitude, because they have now been with me three days, and have nothing to eat:
language2_text: "Ko ikabo no nakem sira o aro a tao. Ta yamakatlo rana araw sira a yanimacilovot jyaken am yabo rana o kanen da sicyaraw eya.

language1_text: and if I send them away fasting to their own houses, they will faint by the way: for divers of them came from far.
language2_text: No si to ko na novoya sira mangay am jyabo kajya lingowngawan jira makcin a. Ta yatatasa jira o yapo do yamarai a ili."

language1_text: And his disciples answered him, From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness?
language2_text: Maniring o macinanao jya am, "Do wanjin o mangay ta pangapan so kanen da ibsoy ta sira, do yabo panazangan do jya."

language1_text: And he asked them, How many loaves have ye? And they said, Seven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Yapira myanpaw o yamyan jinyo." Maniring sira am, "Yapito a ka myanpaw."

language1_text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground: and he took the seven loaves, and gave thanks, and brake, and gave to his disciples to set before them; and they did set them before the people.
language2_text: Makarahan am ipanci na o aro a tao a amlisna kahap na rana so apito a myanpaw a isaray ji Ama ta do to a kakcikcil na rana sya itoro do macinanao jya a kavonong da rana sya do aro a tao.

language1_text: And they had a few small fishes: and he blessed, and commanded to set them also before them.
language2_text: Amyan so ji makanateng a lilikta among. Akman sang ta isaray na ji Ama ta do to ni Yeso a kapanci na rana no macinanao jya amvonong sya do aro a tao.

language1_text: So they did eat, and were filled: and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets.
language2_text: Abo jya nimabsoy a nikoman do aro a tao ang. O vilang da no nikoman a tao am kakapatan sira ranaw (4000).

language1_text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand: and he sent them away.
language2_text: Peykakasahen da no macinanao ji Yeso o atda da am nipno da o apito a ka rako a yala. Makarahan am tovoin na rana sira ni Yeso a mangay rana do vahay da,

language1_text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples, and came into the parts of Dalmanutha.
language2_text: a kapacyavang na rana do macinanao jya meypangay do meyngaran so Tamanota.

language1_text: And the Pharisees came forth, and began to question with him, seeking of him a sign from heaven, tempting him.
language2_text: Amyan so tao a macyagom do Vadisay a nimangay ji Yeso a macinekad jya. Naknakmen da o keyleylamdam da sya. Am ori o pasonsonan da sya mapeyvazay so mapeyzokab a vazay. Ta yongkad na no kanoyong na apo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit, and saith, Why doth this generation seek after a sign? verily I say unto you, There shall no sign be given unto this generation.
language2_text: Am ori o nikarahet na so aktokto. Maniring jira am, "Ikeykongo kamo a tao sicyaikwaya yakomakzeb so yamapeyzokab a vazay. To ko na macitangayan jinyo am abo o ipacita ko jinyo a mapeyzokab a vazay."

language1_text: And he left them, and entering into the ship again departed to the other side.
language2_text: Makarahan am karwan na rana sira a kasakay na rana do vazangay a meypangay do katovangan no rako a meybebneng a ranom.

language1_text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread, neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf.
language2_text: Nikahamangan da no macinanao ji Yeso o kapalolo da so kanen no kanang. So ikasa na myanpaw amyan do vazangay da.

language1_text: And he charged them, saying, Take heed, beware of the leaven of the Pharisees, and of the leaven of Herod.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Azimanen nyo o akmey kosozi no odong a yamyan do tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kani Helote."

language1_text: And they reasoned among themselves, saying, It is because we have no bread.
language2_text: Makarahan am ikazyak da. Maniring sira do kadwan jira am, "Ala na pakacirngen ori do yata kajya nimapalolwan so kanen eya."

language1_text: And when Jesus knew it, he saith unto them, Why reason ye, because ye have no bread? perceive ye not yet, neither understand? have ye your heart yet hardened?
language2_text: To na rana tenngi ni Yeso o amyan do onowned da. Maniring jira am, "Ikongo nyo kazyakan no nyo kajya nimapalolwan so kanen. Manngwa, nyo jyazab? Nyo jyatenngi o na nikapwan no oyowyat ko? Kamo manoyong a yajyapatapatak a tao.

language1_text: Having eyes, see ye not? and having ears, hear ye not? and do ye not remember?
language2_text: Manoyong ta yamyan so mata nyo am kamo ji makacita. Yamyan so talinga nyo am kamo ji makamizing. Manngwa, nyo na todahamangi?

language1_text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? They say unto him, Twelve.
language2_text: No kakcikcil ko so alima ka myanpaw a nibsoy ko so kakaliman a ranaw (5000) a tao am apira ka yala o nikpeh nyo a atda da." Maniring sira am, "Adwa o icyarwa na."

language1_text: And when the seven among four thousand, how many baskets full of fragments took ye up? And they said, Seven.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso am, "No kakcikcil ko so apito a ka myanpaw a ipakan so kakapatan a ranaw (4000) a tao am apira ka yala o nikpeh nyo a atda da." Maniring sira am, "Apito a ka yala."

language1_text: And he said unto them, How is it that ye do not understand?
language2_text: Makarahan am maniring si Yeso jira am, "No manoyong ori am manngwa, nyo pa jyatenngi o na nikapwan no oyowyat ko?"

language1_text: And he cometh to Bethsaida; and they bring a blind man unto him, and besought him to touch him.
language2_text: Makaranes sira do Peysayta ili am amyan so tao a omalak so mavota tao a mangay do tangain ni Yeso a komakzeb sya minan jya no lima na.

language1_text: And he took the blind man by the hand, and led him out of the town; and when he had spit on his eyes, and put his hands upon him, he asked him if he saw ought.
language2_text: Makarahan am kalain na o mavota tao ni Yeso a mangay do siri no ili a kacipa na do mata na a kapaopta na so lima na jya. Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Manngwa, yamyan so mo macita an?"

language1_text: And he looked up, and said, I see men as trees, walking.
language2_text: Citahen na am maniring am, "Ko makacita rana so tao. Am sira akmey kayo a yaomalam."

language1_text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes, and made him look up: and he was restored, and saw every man clearly.
language2_text: Makarahan am pinanan na ni Yeso o mata no tao am to rana makacita a kabo na rana no ji na pengpengkad a makakaday.

language1_text: And he sent him away to his house, saying, Neither go into the town, nor tell it to any in the town.
language2_text: Makarahan am tovoin na rana ni Yeso do vahay da kapanci na nya ji rana meysinaoli do ili ang.

language1_text: And Jesus went out, and his disciples, into the towns of Cæ sarea Philippi: and by the way he asked his disciples, saying unto them, Whom do men say that I am?
language2_text: Meypangay si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do Kaysadiya Veydipi a ili am pacicin na sira do rarahan o macinanao jya. Maniring jira am, "Sino kwan da yaken no tao."

language1_text: And they answered, John the Baptist: but some say, Elias; and others, One of the prophets.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Yamyan so tao a yamanci nimo a nimanaktak a si Yowani. Yamyan so tao a yamanci nimo a Idiya. Yamyan so tao a yamanci nimo a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa pa."

language1_text: And he saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am? And Peter answereth and saith unto him, Thou art the Christ.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso jira am, "Sino kwan nyo yaken." Maniring si Pite am, "Misayya ka."

language1_text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him.
language2_text: Makarahan am ipanci na jira o kaji da meycicicyan nya do tao so ka Misayya na.

language1_text: And he began to teach them, that the Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected of the elders, and of the chief priests, and scribes, and be killed, and after three days rise again.
language2_text: Makarahan am papwen na rana o kananao na so macinanao jya ni Yeso do kakeykai na rana no alalaw na makaranes jya. Maniring jira am, "Mangay o kapakasazi ko so aro a alalaw ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao, do kataosya da jyaken no kamanrarakehan a kano panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kawakwak da rana jyaken. Am no ikatlo na araw am mirwa ko a mavyay."

language1_text: And he spake that saying openly. And Peter took him, and began to rebuke him.
language2_text: So ji na rana nitomayoi so akman sang a vazay a nipanci jira. Am ori o to na ranay ngalai sya ni Pite a pasyain jira a omza sya.

language1_text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples, he rebuked Peter, saying, Get thee behind me, Satan: for thou savourest not the things that be of God, but the things that be of men.
language2_text: Meyvazingowngaw si Yeso a tomita so macinanao jya am maniring ji Pite am, "Kazey mo Satan. O nakenakem mo am beken a nakenakem ni Ama ta do to, ta monganay do tao."

language1_text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also, he said unto them, Whosoever will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross, and follow me.
language2_text: Makarahan am lovoten na rana ni Yeso o aro a tao a kano macinanao jya do tangain na. Maniring jira am, "No amyan so tao a omonot jyaken am to na pangawawan o kataotao na a somabway no jyojika na macihza jyaken.

language1_text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel's, the same shall save it.
language2_text: Ta o amnakenakem so kataotao na am maraherahet, ta mawakwak ori. Am o tao a to ngawaw pa no kataotao na a mahap so vazay ko a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am mahap na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na.

language1_text: For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
language2_text: Tana mahap no tao o peymeymasaodan do karawan a kaji na makahapan so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na am ikongo peypeypangayan no nang!

language1_text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul?
language2_text: Ikongo ipalit na pa so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na.

language1_text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels.
language2_text: O tao rana do karawan sicyaikwaya am yatey yaro rana o raraten da. No amyan so tao a macimanig nyaken a kano ciring ko am no meysinaoli ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a macihza do azwazway ni Ama ta do to a kano aro a tinsi am abo nakenakem ko sya.

language1_text: And he said unto them, Verily I say unto you, That there be some of them that stand here, which shall not taste of death, till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power.
language2_text: "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o yameytatanek do jya tao am amyan jira so makapis pa so azwazway na ni Ama ta do to a meygegcin do karawan do ikamavyay da pa."

language1_text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter, and James, and John, and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves: and he was transfigured before them.
language2_text: Mavitos o ikanem na araw am palolwen na ni Yeso si Pite a kani Yake a kani Yowani a mangay do makarang a tokon. Makarahan am todablis o keyteytawan na ni Yeso do tangain da.

language1_text: And his raiment became shining, exceeding white as snow; so as no fuller on earth can white them.
language2_text: So mina to na lavangi a maniray so ayob. Abo tao a makataha so ayob na so kalavalavang.

language1_text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses: and they were talking with Jesus.
language2_text: O tatlo a macinanao ji Yeso am to da rana cita si Idiya kani Moyse a tao no kakwa pa, a macisirsiring ji Yeso.

language1_text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite ji Yeso am, "Mo Mangnanao, yata tey yapya do jya. Mamaring namen so atlo a ka sarwap an. Asa am imo a asa am si Moyse, asa am si Idiya."

language1_text: For he wist not what to say; for they were sore afraid.
language2_text: Tey manyahey si Pite a kano kararay na. Am ori o ji da rana tenngi a meyzezyak.

language1_text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them: and a voice came out of the cloud, saying, This is my beloved Son: hear him.
language2_text: Makarahan am to ngyan so cinalab a macita da a ambengbeng do teyngato da. Meyratateng am to ngyan so ciring a meyzezyak. Maniring am, "Iya rana am ney kaglaw ko a Anak. Amizngen nyo o ciring na."

language1_text: And suddenly, when they had looked round about, they saw no man any more, save Jesus only with themselves.
language2_text: Makarahan am kalahen da do sirisiri da am abo macita da tao. Si Yeso o macita da macikaop jira.

language1_text: And as they came down from the mountain, he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen, till the Son of man were risen from the dead.
language2_text: Omosok rana sira apo do tokon am maniring si Yeso jira am, "Do ji ko pa nimirwai a mavyay a Nipamnekan na tao ni Ama ta do to am ji nyo meycicicyan o yanyo nimacita a vazay do tokon ang."

language1_text: And they kept that saying with themselves, questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean.
language2_text: Am ori o mina to da mangozai do ciring ni Yeso. Maniring sira do kadwan jira am, "Ikongo o peypeypangayan no kapirwa na mavyay."

language1_text: And they asked him, saying, Why say the scribes that Elias must first come?
language2_text: Maniring pa sira ji Yeso am, "Ikongo pancyan da nya no mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao so kapanmanma na mai ni Idiya."

language1_text: And he answered and told them, Elias verily cometh first, and restoreth all things; and how it is written of the Son of man, that he must suffer many things, and be set at nought.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Manoyong kapanmanma ni Idiya a mapeyyalalap so nakem no makaoya tao. Am ji da raralayan no tao. Am ikongo na idket do Seysyo no keyyan no rako a alalaw na no Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a kapeymakaro da jya no tao.

language1_text: But I say unto you, That Elias is indeed come, and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed, as it is written of him.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am yarana nimai si Idiya. Am da to ngolala, akman so ciring do Seysyo a yana pakacirngen jya."

language1_text: And when he came to his disciples, he saw a great multitude about them, and the scribes questioning with them.
language2_text: Meysinaoli rana sira a macilovot do karwan da macinanao ji Yeso am macita da o aro a tao a omlimot sira. Am no kanang am macinekanekad sira o mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to do macinanao ji Yeso.

language1_text: And straightway all the people, when they beheld him, were greatly amazed, and running to him saluted him.
language2_text: Macita da si Yeso no aro a tao am to da ngyakan. Am ori o nipalalayo da a mangay omrapong sya.

language1_text: And he asked the scribes, What question ye with them?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "Ikongo o ciring a yanyo ipacinekad jira."

language1_text: And one of the multitude answered and said, Master, I have brought unto thee my son, which hath a dumb spirit;
language2_text: Amyan do aro a tao ang so asa ka tao. Maniring am, "Mo Mangnanao, yako nipalolo o anak ko a yamangay tomita jimo. Ta yana kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan. Am ori o yana ji makabnebneki.

language1_text: and wheresoever he taketh him, he teareth him: and he foameth, and gnasheth with his teeth, and pineth away: and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out; and they could not.
language2_text: No yana kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan am yamalektek do teyrahem a yana kapeyotaotab no ngongoy na yameygazicigit so ngepen a yana kapanigzang no kataotao na. Ko nipanci o macinanao jimo a yamvozwaw sya am yada jyavozwaw."

language1_text: He answereth him, and saith, O faithless generation, how long shall I be with you? how long shall I suffer you? bring him unto me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Kamo manoyong pa yaji makanet so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to a tao sicyaikwaya. Akman rana so wanjin o kownownay ko a macikaop jinyo. Akman ko rana so wanjin a marilaw ninyo. Ayyan kamo do jya o kanakan."

language1_text: And they brought him unto him: and when he saw him, straightway the spirit tare him; and he fell on the ground, and wallowed foaming.
language2_text: Makarahan am yai da o kanakan. Macita na si Yeso no kalamsoyan ni Satan am mina to na panigzanga o kanakan a kapeykolikolingtad na do teyrahem a kapeyotaotab no ngongoy na.

language1_text: And he asked his father, How long is it ago since this came unto him? And he said, Of a child.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do ama na am, "Yana rana mownay ya an?" Maniring o ama na am, "Nimakalapo ya no kalyalikey na.

language1_text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire, and into the waters, to destroy him: but if thou canst do any thing, have compassion on us, and help us.
language2_text: Masangib ya civtan so inawan no kalamsoyan ni Satan a payongben do apoy, hemesen do ranom. No si myan so vazay mo am ikarilaw mo pa yamen an. Sidongen mo pa yamen an."

language1_text: Jesus said unto him, If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No si manoyong kapeyhanhan mo ni Ama ta do to am abo sapan a vazay."

language1_text: And straightway the father of the child cried out, and said with tears, Lord, I believe; help thou mine unbelief.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amlololos o ama na. Maniring am, "Ko anoyngan am yapa ji makanet o onowned ko. So sidongan mo pa jyaken."

language1_text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together, he rebuked the foul spirit, saying unto him, Thou dumb and deaf spirit, I charge thee, come out of him, and enter no more into him.
language2_text: Macita ni Yeso o aro a tao a mangay omlimot sya am maniring do kalamsoyan ni Satan am, "Imo rana a na ikateleh a kalamsoyan ni Satan am yako imo sirsirngen a ji ka na meyyahahay a komaro do kataotao no kanakan. So ji mo na peyneynami so kapeysinaoli mo."

language1_text: And the spirit cried, and rent him sore, and came out of him: and he was as one dead; insomuch that many said, He is dead.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amlololos o kalamsoyan ni Satan a kapanigzang na rana no kanakan do nipakowbot na no kalamsoyan ni Satan. Am ori o icyakma ney nimawakwak no kanakan. Maniring o aro a tao am, "Yarana nimawakwak!"

language1_text: But Jesus took him by the hand, and lifted him up; and he arose.
language2_text: Makarahan am pinanan na rana o lima na no kanakan a vangonen. Meyratateng am makatanek rana.

language1_text: And when he was come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, Why could not we cast him out?
language2_text: Somdep si Yeso do vahay am pacicin da si Yeso no macinanao jya. Maniring sira am, "Ikongo namen ji makavozwawi so kalamsoyan ni Satan ang."

language1_text: And he said unto them, This kind can come forth by nothing, but by prayer and fasting.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To nyo peykasa o onowned nyo a meynozi. Ta ori saon o makavozwaw so akman so sang a kalamsoyan ni Satan am."

language1_text: And they departed thence, and passed through Galilee; and he would not that any man should know it.
language2_text: Karwan da rana do dang am meyhavas sira rana do Cyadidi, ta taywen na do tao o yanan na.

language1_text: For he taught his disciples, and said unto them, The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men, and they shall kill him; and after that he is killed, he shall rise the third day.
language2_text: Ta nanawen na pa sira o macinanao jya. Maniring jira am, "Itoro da o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao do macioya jya tao a kawakwak da sya. Si ikatlo na araw no niwakwak da sya am mirwa mavyay."

language1_text: But they understood not that saying, and were afraid to ask him.
language2_text: Am ji da tenngi no macinanao jya o peypeypangayan no ciring na. Am ji dadkeci si Yeso a pacicin.

language1_text: And he came to Capernaum: and being in the house he asked them, What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way?
language2_text: Makaranes sira do Cyapaynong am somdep sira do asa ka vahay. Maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "Ikongo nyo nikazyak do rarahan ang."

language1_text: But they held their peace: for by the way they had disputed among themselves, who should be the greatest.
language2_text: Abo jira tomovis jya, ta nikazyak da do rarahan o sino jira o pakarakehen da.

language1_text: And he sat down, and called the twelve, and saith unto them, If any man desire to be first, the same shall be last of all, and servant of all.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amlisna si Yeso karara na so rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya mai do tangain na. Maniring jira am, "O amnakenakem so keyyan na do kakarangan na am masipanownowji ori a omilamnay so aro a tao an."

language1_text: And he took a child, and set him in the midst of them: and when he had taken him in his arms, he said unto them,
language2_text: Makarahan am manara so kanakan kapatanek na sya do tangain da sapopowen na. Maniring jira am,

language1_text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name, receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me, receiveth not me, but him that sent me.
language2_text: "O tomaotao so kanakan eya no ngaran ko am yaken o taotawwen da. O tomaotao jyaken am beken a yakehen o taotawwen da, ta taotawwen da pa o yanimapahanhan jyaken a Tao do to."

language1_text: And John answered him, saying, Master, we saw one casting out devils in thy name, and he followeth not us: and we forbad him, because he followeth not us.
language2_text: Maniring si Yowani ji Yeso am, "Namen nimakacita mo Mangnanao, so yamamozwaw no ngaran mo so kalamsoyan ni Satan. Am ori o namen nyazan sya, ta iya rana am beken a kararay ta."

language1_text: But Jesus said, Forbid him not: for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name, that can lightly speak evil of me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ji nyo ngaza, ta abo o tao a mangozay do ngaran ko a mapeyvazay so mapeyzokab a vazay a kaoli na jyaken a avain.

language1_text: For he that is not against us is on our part.
language2_text: O ji mapasobna jyaten am macikabong jyaten.

language1_text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name, because ye belong to Christ, verily I say unto you, he shall not lose his reward.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o manta ninyo so ranom a yopen nyo do kanoyong nyo jyaken am tey saray na ori ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me, it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck, and he were cast into the sea.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No myan so tao a tomirara so pakananaken da a tao a meyraraten a kapeymakaro na rana jyaken am apyapya rana o kapila jya mangay itbong do awa.

language1_text: And if thy hand offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter into life maimed, than having two hands to go into hell, into the fire that never shall be quenched:
language2_text: No si lima mo o nipeyraraten mo am to ranangteba. Tana abo rana o asa ka lima a kapakasalap ji Ama ta do to am apyapya pa ori a kano meynanod so lima mangay do kararatan a matemtem no jyahesep a lila no apoy.

language1_text: where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.
language2_text: [Do kararatan rana am amyan dang so aowed a jyawakwak a kano jyahesep a lila no apoy.]

language1_text: And if thy foot offend thee, cut it off: it is better for thee to enter halt into life, than having two feet to be cast into hell, into the fire that never shall be quenched:
language2_text: No si ai mo o nipeyraraten mo am to ranangteba. Tana abo o asa ka ai mo a kapakahap mo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad mo am apyapya pa ori a kano meynanod so ai a mangay do kararatan.

language1_text: where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.
language2_text: [Do kararatan rana am amyan dang so aowed a jyawakwak a kano jyahesep a lila no apoy.]

language1_text: And if thine eye offend thee, pluck it out: it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye, than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire:
language2_text: No si asa ka mata mo o nipeyraraten mo am to rana ngoswa. Tana asa mata a kapakasalap do italamozong ni Ama ta do to am apyapya pa ori a kano meynanod so mata mangay do kararatan.

language1_text: where their worm dieth not, and the fire is not quenched.
language2_text: Do kararatan rana am amyan dang so aowed a jyawakwak a kano jyahesep a lila no apoy.

language1_text: For every one shall be salted with fire, and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt.
language2_text: "O tao a makanakenakem so kapacilovot na do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to am amyan so masazi na alalaw a iskad na jya.

language1_text: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his saltness, wherewith will ye season it? Have salt in yourselves, and have peace one with another.
language2_text: O asin rana am tey yapya. Am no jyapait rana am ikongo pavowin do dang a kapait na. So inaran nyo so akman so asin a mapeypyapya so nakenakem no icyatatao nyo."

language1_text: And he arose from thence, and cometh into the coasts of Judæ a by the farther side of Jordan: and the people resort unto him again; and, as he was wont, he taught them again.
language2_text: Karwan na rana ni Yeso do dang a kapeyhavas na do ayo a meyngaran so Yotan a meypangay do Yotay. Macita da sira no aro a tao am meysinsinmo sira do tangain ni Yeso. Akman sang a amnanao sira.

language1_text: And the Pharisees came to him, and asked him, Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife? tempting him.
language2_text: O tatasa ka tao a macyagom do Vadisay am mangay sira ji Yeso. Naknakmen da o keyleylamdam da sya. Maniring sira jya am, "Ikongo yadomket do iwawalam ta do mahakay a mapakaro so kataned na do vahay. Pancyan pala jyamen."

language1_text: And he answered and said unto them, What did Moses command you?
language2_text: Makarahan am olin na sira pacicin ni Yeso. Maniring jira am, "Ikongo o ciring na ni Moyse."

language1_text: And they said, Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement, and to put her away.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Apyahen ni Moyse o kapeyvatvatek so vakong a itoro do pakarwen a mavakes a kapya na rana no akman sang a vazay."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "O nipadketan na so sang ni Moyse am tey rahet kamo jyapasovoy.

language1_text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female.
language2_text: Am no kavayo na pa ni Ama ta do to a mangamaog so karawan am nimangamaog so mahakay a kano mavakes.

language1_text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and cleave to his wife;
language2_text: Am ori rana o karwan da na do inyapwan da no mapapapen a tao a matarek so vahay.

language1_text: and they twain shall be one flesh: so then they are no more twain, but one flesh.
language2_text: So icyakma dey yasa ka tao rana meyyaven do vahay.

language1_text: What therefore God hath joined together, let not man put asunder.
language2_text: Am ori o jya to meysyai no meyyaven do vahay. Ta nimeysinmo rana sira do tangain ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter.
language2_text: Somdep sira do vahay am malavat da pa o vazay ang no macinanao jya.

language1_text: And he saith unto them, Whosoever shall put away his wife, and marry another, committeth adultery against her.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "O mahakay rana to mapakaro so kataned na do vahay a kapasakay na pa so kadwan am manoyong rana o akman sang a raraten na, do kaji na mapanadnaden so kadwan na do vahay.

language1_text: And if a woman shall put away her husband, and be married to another, she committeth adultery.
language2_text: No togcin o mavakes do mahakay na kangay na someksek do kadwan am raraten o akman sang, do kaji na mapanadnaden so kahanghangan na mahakay."

language1_text: And they brought young children to him, that he should touch them: and his disciples rebuked those that brought them.
language2_text: Tatasa ka tao o mangay no kanakan ji Yeso a kapanci da nya a omapwapo sira. Macita da sira no macinanao jya am azahen da sira ioya.

language1_text: But when Jesus saw it, he was much displeased, and said unto them, Suffer the little children to come unto me, and forbid them not: for of such is the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Macita na sira ni Yeso o macinanao jya omza sira am maoya o aktokto na. Maniring jira am, "Pancyan kamo sira o kanakan a mai jyaken. Ji nyo ngaza sira, ta o italamozong na ni Ama ta do to a tao am akman sira so kanakan eya.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child, he shall not enter therein.
language2_text: Ko pa ipanci jinyo am o tao a makza no katalamozong na nira ni Ama ta do to am inarahen da o kanakan a meyhanhan no inyapwan da."

language1_text: And he took them up in his arms, put his hands upon them, and blessed them.
language2_text: Makarahan am sapopowen na o kanakan, kateyteyhesa na sira apwapwen no lima na a ipanlanlag.

language1_text: And when he was gone forth into the way, there came one running, and kneeled to him, and asked him, Good Master, what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life?
language2_text: To rana jyangay si Yeso am to ngyan so asa ka tao a malayo a mangay a meylilitod do tangain na. Maniring jya am, "Mo Mangnanao a tey yapya so nakenakem. Makongo ko so wanjin a kapakahap ko so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ko."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto him, Why callest thou me good? there is none good but one, that is, God.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Ikongo mo pancyan nyaken a apya so nakenakem. Si Ama ta do to o apya so nakenakem am.

language1_text: Thou knowest the commandments, Do not commit adultery, Do not kill, Do not steal, Do not bear false witness, Defraud not, Honour thy father and mother.
language2_text: Mo katenngan o iwawalam ni Ama ta do to do kaji mangapan so tao. Ji mangzakza. Ji manakaw. Ji mangamaog so malas a ciring. Ji manlita. Ikaglaw nyo a ikanig o inyapwan nyo."

language1_text: And he answered and said unto him, Master, all these have I observed from my youth.
language2_text: Maniring o tao am, "Mo Mangnanao, ko na nimamimin o akman sang a yanimapeyvazay no kalyalikey ko pa."

language1_text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him, and said unto him, One thing thou lackest: go thy way, sell whatsoever thou hast, and give to the poor, and thou shalt have treasure in heaven: and come, take up the cross, and follow me.
language2_text: Citahen ni Yeso o tao ori am ikarilaw na. Maniring am, "Yasa pa mo jya nimapeyvazay. Ipanazang mo o peymeymasaodan mo. O ngina na nizpi am ipangarilaw mo so makasi a tao. Ta ori o iyan no kangangay mo do teyngato a kapacihza mo na jyaken."

language1_text: And he was sad at that saying, and went away grieved: for he had great possessions.
language2_text: Mamizing na ori no tao ori am to rana meykaraherahet o moing na mangay rana. Ta tey yaro o kangangay na.

language1_text: And Jesus looked round about, and saith unto his disciples, How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God!
language2_text: Citahen na ni Yeso o amyan do livolivon na tao am maniring jira am, "Tey masalit sira o aro so kangangay a tao a italamozong ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And the disciples were astonished at his words. But Jesus answereth again, and saith unto them, Children, how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God!
language2_text: Yeyyak da no macinanao jya o ciring ni Yeso. Maniring pa si Yeso am, "Manoyong, manga keypong, o kaji na to macitapatapasan no italamozong ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God.
language2_text: O aro so peymeymasaodan am masalit a italamozong ni Ama ta do to. Mowwamek pa o meykavokovokoz so likod a baka a lomyos do lala no rayom, a kano aro so peymeymasaodan a tao a macikaop do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And they were astonished out of measure, saying among themselves, Who then can be saved?
language2_text: Makarahan am isavasavak da no macinanao jya. Maniring sira do kadwan jira am, "No akman sang am sino o patazadangen na ni Ama ta do to do teyngato."

language1_text: And Jesus looking upon them saith, With men it is impossible, but not with God: for with God all things are possible.
language2_text: Citahen na pa sira ni Yeso. Maniring jira am, "O masalit do tao am mowwamek ji Ama ta do to. Ta abo ji na peyvazay ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Then Peter began to say unto him, Lo, we have left all, and have followed thee.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Cita pala yamen a yato ngaro do yamakakaday a vazay namen a namen kapacilolo jimo."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said, Verily I say unto you, There is no man that hath left house, or brethren, or sisters, or father, or mother, or wife, or children, or lands, for my sake, and the gospel's,
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o mahap so vazay ko a kano meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring ko a to rana ngaro do vahay da kano kakakteh na kano inyapwan na kano minapodpod jya kano nihakawan da am

language1_text: but he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time, houses, and brethren, and sisters, and mothers, and children, and lands, with persecutions; and in the world to come eternal life.
language2_text: arwaro pa o makadpeh jya do karawan a vahay na kano kakakteh na kano inyapwan na kano minapodpod jya kano nihakawan na. Am amyan so alalaw na do karawan. Am cyaha, ta mahap na no makwa o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na.

language1_text: But many that are first shall be last; and the last first.
language2_text: Am o macipanmanma sicyaikwaya am masipanownowji rana no makwa do teyngato. Sira rana nimasipanownowji am masipanmanma rana sira do teyngato."

language1_text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem; and Jesus went before them: and they were amazed; and as they followed, they were afraid. And he took again the twelve, and began to tell them what things should happen unto him,
language2_text: Amyan sira do rarahan a meypangay do Yelosaleng am nimamanong dang si Yeso. Makarahan am meytataziman sira o macinanao jya. So icyakman da sang no macihza jira a tao a manyahey. Meyratateng am lovoten na sira o rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya, kapanci na nya jira so omanam a vazay do kataotao na.

language1_text: saying, Behold, we go up to Jerusalem; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests, and unto the scribes; and they shall condemn him to death, and shall deliver him to the Gentiles:
language2_text: Maniring am, "Citahey kamo, do tamo ipeypangay do Yelosaleng an, da kapanazang nyaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao no panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao. Ipanci da o kawakwak da jyaken, katoro da nyaken do beken a tao do Yotay.

language1_text: and they shall mock him, and shall scourge him, and shall spit upon him, and shall kill him: and the third day he shall rise again.
language2_text: Ji da ninigan a cicippan a kasipsipzot da jyaken a kawakwak da jyaken. Am si ikatlo na araw am mirwa ko pa a mavyay."

language1_text: And James and John, the sons of Zebedee, come unto him, saying, Master, we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire.
language2_text: O anak ni Sipitay a meyngaran so Yake a kani Yowani am mangay sira ji Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Mo Mangnanao, yamyan so yasa ka vazay a namen kakzeben jimo. Inaoy si apyahen mo."

language1_text: And he said unto them, What would ye that I should do for you?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ikongo nyo kakzeben jyaken."

language1_text: They said unto him, Grant unto us that we may sit, one on thy right hand, and the other on thy left hand, in thy glory.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "No si amyan ka do peypanirsirngen mo am peysaviken mo yamen do wanan mo a kado ozi mo a palisnahen a meypanirsirngen an."

language1_text: But Jesus said unto them, Ye know not what ye ask: can ye drink of the cup that I drink of? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Nyo jyatenngi o yanyo kakzeben. Manngwa, mahap nyo o rako a alalaw ko an? Manngwa, meynaran nyo yaken a mangay a mawakwak an?"

language1_text: And they said unto him, We can. And Jesus said unto them, Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized:
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Noon, mahap namen." Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Manoyong o kapakahap nyo so alalaw ko. Manoyong o kapakeynaran nyo jyaken a wakwaken da.

language1_text: but to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.
language2_text: Am beken a yaken o mamnek do omlisna do ozi ko a kado wanan ko a meypanirsirngen. Ta o pamnemnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao o amlisna do dang."

language1_text: And when the ten heard it, they began to be much displeased with James and John.
language2_text: Mamizing da ori no asa ngarnan a macinanao jya am ikaoya da si Yake a kani Yowani.

language1_text: But Jesus called them to him, and saith unto them, Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and their great ones exercise authority upon them.
language2_text: Am ori o nilovotan na ni Yeso so macinanao jya do tangain na. Maniring jira am, "O panirsirngen rana do teyrahem am abo ji ngamizing so akman sang a tao an. So pancyan da no nang a makayokod nira tao.

language1_text: But so shall it not be among you: but whosoever will be great among you, shall be your minister:
language2_text: Am inyo rana am ji nyo nginara o akman sang. No si myan jinyo so tao a makza no kaizay na am pavevehen nyo o kataotao nyo a manidong so icyatatao nyo an.

language1_text: and whosoever of you will be the chiefest, shall be servant of all.
language2_text: O makza no kaizay na am inarahen na o lamlamsoy a mapeylamnay so aro a tao.

language1_text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto, but to minister, and to give his life a ransom for many.
language2_text: Ta o na nyai no Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am beken a ilamnain no tao. Ta mapeylamnay so aro a tao a kangay na mapasansan so kataotao na yagag na sira do peyraratenan da."

language1_text: And they came to Jericho: and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people, blind Bartimæ us, the son of Timæ us, sat by the highway side begging.
language2_text: Karwan da o yanan da ili a meyngaran so Yedike ni Yeso a kano macinanao jya kano aro a tao am amyan so mavota tao a anak ni Timay a meyngaran so Patimay a omlisna do siri no rarahan a macikakanen.

language1_text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth, he began to cry out, and say, Jesus, thou Son of David, have mercy on me.
language2_text: Mamizing na o keyyan na ni Yeso a tao do Nasale am amlololos. Maniring am, "Mo Yeso a sivovoong ni Tawey, ikarilaw mo pa yaken an."

language1_text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace: but he cried the more a great deal, Thou Son of David, have mercy on me.
language2_text: Meyratateng am aro tao a omwoya nya do kagalagal na. Am ikeykavevek na amlololos. Maniring am, "Imo rana sivovoong ni Tawey am ikarilaw mo pa yaken an."

language1_text: And Jesus stood still, and commanded him to be called. And they call the blind man, saying unto him, Be of good comfort, rise; he calleth thee.
language2_text: Makarahan am mina to neyked si Yeso. Maniring am, "Rarrey kamo jya." Maniring sira do mavota tao am, "Cyaha, tanek rana, ta na ipanci imo."

language1_text: And he, casting away his garment, rose, and came to Jesus.
language2_text: Am ori o mina to na walici no ayob na a katanek na a mangay do tangain ni Yeso.

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto him, What wilt thou that I should do unto thee? The blind man said unto him, Lord, that I might receive my sight.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Ikongo mo kakzeben jyaken." Maniring o mavota tao am, "Mo Mangnanao, ko ikakza o yako kapakacita."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto him, Go thy way; thy faith hath made thee whole. And immediately he received his sight, and followed Jesus in the way.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Angay rana, ta mo rana nikapya o mo kapeyhanhan ni Ama ta do to." So ji na nimeyyahahai a makacita no mavota tao. Makarahan am macihza rana ji Yeso.

language1_text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem, unto Bethphage and Bethany, at the mount of Olives, he sendeth forth two of his disciples,
language2_text: Masngen rana sira do Yelosaleng am mangay sira do tokon a meyngaran so Kanlan. O tokon rana am masngen ori do Peyvake a kado Potani a ili. Karahan am manovoy si Yeso so rarwa ka macinanao jya manma mangay.

language1_text: and saith unto them, Go your way into the village over against you: and as soon as ye be entered into it, ye shall find a colt tied, whereon never man sat; loose him, and bring him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Angay kamo do ili. Si mangay kamo am amyan dang so asa ka baka ji pa nikaoranan no tao a makedked do dang. Si macita nyo am ovain nyo a kai nyo nya jya.

language1_text: And if any man say unto you, Why do ye this? say ye that the Lord hath need of him; and straightway he will send him hither.
language2_text: No si amyan so tao a manci no, 'Nyo kongwen ori.' Si maniring kamo jya am, 'Yamyan so na patakan nya no Panirsirngen. Cyaha, ta makeykai na paolin jimo.'"

language1_text: And they went their way, and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met; and they loose him.
language2_text: Makaranes sira am macita da do siri no rarahan o makedked a likta baka, kaovay da sya.

language1_text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them, What do ye, loosing the colt?
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao a meytatanek do dang am, "Ikongo nyo ovayan so likta baka ang."

language1_text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded: and they let them go.
language2_text: Karahan am to da mangozai o ciring ni Yeso a itovis da jira. Am ori o nipyan da sira omovay sya.

language1_text: And they brought the colt to Jesus, and cast their garments on him; and he sat upon him.
language2_text: Meyratateng am yangay da ji Yeso o likta baka a kaparasay da so ayob da do baka, a kaoran na rana ni Yeso do baka.

language1_text: And many spread their garments in the way: and others cut down branches off the trees, and strawed them in the way.
language2_text: Aro o tao a tomeytay so ayob da do rarahan. Aro o nimanyangaw so yangaw no kayo a teytain da do rarahan.

language1_text: And they that went before, and they that followed, cried, saying, Hosanna; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord:
language2_text: Maniring sira o macihza jya tao am, "Azwazwain ta si Ama ta do to. Inaoy si ipanlanlag ni Ama ta do to o na nitovoy a tao.

language1_text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David, that cometh in the name of the Lord: Hosanna in the highest.
language2_text: Inaoy si ipanlanlag na ni Ama ta do to o yamakaranes a meypanirsirngen a macipalit do ineynapo ta si Tawey. Inaoy si mangay ji Ama ta do to o azwazway na."

language1_text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem, and into the temple: and when he had looked round about upon all things, and now the eventide was come, he went out unto Bethany with the twelve.
language2_text: Makaranes si Yeso do Yelosaleng am mangay do rako a panaralayan a tomita so makakaday a amyan do dang. Ikongo do mahep rana, am ori o nikarwan da rana do dang ni Yeso a kano macinanao jya mangay do Potani.

language1_text: And on the morrow, when they were come from Bethany, he was hungry:
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am karwan da na o Potani a kapeysinaoli da rana do Yelosaleng. Amyan sira do rarahan am makcin si Yeso.

language1_text: and seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves, he came, if haply he might find any thing thereon: and when he came to it, he found nothing but leaves; for the time of figs was not yet.
language2_text: Macita na do anamen da angayan o meyngaran so ovako a kayo a mapka no voong na. Mangay do kayo a meykala so asi na am voong na o macita na. Ta beken pa vehavehan no ipalasi na.

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto it, No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever. And his disciples heard it.
language2_text: Maniring do kayo si Yeso am, "Ko imo sirsirngen am macipinda sicyaraw eya o kabo rana no tao a koman so asi mo." So nikamimin da no macinanao jya nimakamizing so ciring na.

language1_text: And they come to Jerusalem: and Jesus went into the temple, and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves;
language2_text: Makaranes sira do Yelosaleng am mangay si Yeso do rako a panaralayan a mapowbot so manazang no makakaday a apzapzatan da a kapasakeb na sya ibokbok so peypalipalitan da so nizpi a kavangan a kano lilisnan da no manazang no hato a tao.

language1_text: and would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple.
language2_text: So ji na nimyai so tao do pantaw no rako a panaralayan a somdep no makakaday a warawara da ipanazang da do reryan no rako a panaralayan.

language1_text: And he taught, saying unto them, Is it not written, My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer? but ye have made it a den of thieves.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "O domket do Seysyo a ciring na ni Ama ta do to am, 'O raralayan nyo nyaken a vahay am peyneynozyan ori no aro a tao.' Am nyo to peyvaliw a da peyvahayan no manakaw a tao."

language1_text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it, and sought how they might destroy him: for they feared him, because all the people was astonished at his doctrine.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring na no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to am naknakmen da o kawakwak da si Yeso. Am ikanyahey da si Yeso, ta tey yaro o tao a omanod do ciring na.

language1_text: And when even was come, he went out of the city.
language2_text: Maseyrem rana am karwan da o ili ang ni Yeso a kano macinanao jya.

language1_text: And in the morning, as they passed by, they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots.
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw do apnezak am mangonong pa si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do rarahan ang. Karahan am macita da o ovako a kayo to rana hayo so voong a maoto.

language1_text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him, Master, behold, the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away.
language2_text: So pakanakman na ni Pite so mina vazay na ni Yeso do kayo ang. Maniring ji Yeso am, "Mo Mangnanao, cita pala o kayo a nipanircirngan mo a yarana todaoto."

language1_text: And Jesus answering saith unto them, Have faith in God.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no manoyong kamo a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to am

language1_text: For verily I say unto you, That whosoever shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; and shall not doubt in his heart, but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass; he shall have whatsoever he saith.
language2_text: apya kapanci nyo no tokon a meylis a mangay do awa. No manoyong kamo a ji meykarwa so nakem ji Ama ta do to a omanoyong do ciring na am manoyong keyyan no akman sang a vazay nyo.

language1_text: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
language2_text: Am ori o ko pancyan nya jinyo. No meynozi kamo a keyyan no amin nyo am anoyngan nyo o kapakahap nyo so sang. So ikabo no ji na norwan jinyo a amin nyo.

language1_text: And when ye stand praying, forgive, if ye have ought against any: that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses.
language2_text: No meytatanek kamo a meynozi am manmanma o kato nyongbowan so oyaoyyan nyo no maoya ninyo a tao. Ta ori o vonasan na ni Ama ta do to so raraten nyo.

language1_text: But if ye do not forgive, neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses.
language2_text: [No ji nyo peykabobwa o oyaoyyan nyo no icyatatao nyo am akman sang si Ama ta do to a ji vonas so raraten nyo.]"

language1_text: And they come again to Jerusalem: and as he was walking in the temple, there come to him the chief priests, and the scribes, and the elders,
language2_text: Mirwa sira mangay do Yelosaleng. Omalam si Yeso do reryan no rako a panaralayan am mai sira o panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano panipanirsirngen da.

language1_text: and say unto him, By what authority doest thou these things? and who gave thee this authority to do these things?
language2_text: Maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Asyo oyowyat mo a yamapeyvazay so aro a vazay ang. Sino o yanitomoro no oyowyat jimo a yamapeyvazay so aro a vazay ang."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I will also ask of you one question, and answer me, and I will tell you by what authority I do these things.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Pacicin ko pala inyo no asa ka ciring. No si tovisan nyo yaken am ori o pancyan ko no na nikapwan no oyowyat ko a yamapeyvazay so aro a vazay.

language1_text: The baptism of John, was it from heaven, or of men? answer me.
language2_text: Pancyan kamo pala jyaken o yana nikapwan no oyowyat ni Yowani a nimanaktak so tao. Yapo ji Ama ta do to oyowyat ori an? No yapo do tao."

language1_text: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then did ye not believe him?
language2_text: Karahan am meykalakalavaten rana sira. Maniring sira am, "Kongwen tamo ori a tovisan. No si ipanci ta o kapo na ji Ama ta do to am ji na panenesha yaten ni Yeso a ji nganoyong ji Yowani a.

language1_text: But if we shall say, Of men; they feared the people: for all men counted John, that he was a prophet indeed.
language2_text: No si kwan ta o kapo na do tao am jyabo kaji da oyyan nyaten no aro a tao, do da kanoyong ji Yowani a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a."

language1_text: And they answered and said unto Jesus, We cannot tell. And Jesus answering saith unto them, Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things.
language2_text: Meyratateng am maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Namen jyatenngi." Maniring si Yeso jira am, "No komwan am ji ko mancyan jinyo o na nikapwan no oyowyat ko a yamapeyvazay so aro a vazay."

language1_text: And he began to speak unto them by parables. A certain man planted a vineyard, and set an hedge about it, and digged a place for the winefat, and built a tower, and let it out to husbandmen, and went into a far country.
language2_text: Nanawen na sira ni Yeso am mangononong so pehngehngayan na so ciring na. Maniring am, "Amyan so asa ka tao a nimeymowa so asa lan a potaw. Makarahan am zazacitan na o livolivon na a kapamaring na so pangatesan na so potaw a kapatnek na so tagakal a panitan na so manakaw a tao. Mateyka na am itoro na do tao a vooden da peymowan a kangay na rana do marai a ili.

language1_text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant, that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard.
language2_text: Marateng rana o araraw na no ikazako no asi no kayo am manovoy so asa ka lamlamsoy na mangay mahap so akma ney vonong.

language1_text: And they caught him, and beat him, and sent him away empty.
language2_text: Macita da no nimvood so nihakawan na tao o lamlamsoy na am vitkehen da o zagaw na a kabakbak da jya. So nikabo no nimahap na a meysinaoli do nitomovoy sya tao.

language1_text: And again he sent unto them another servant; and at him they cast stones, and wounded him in the head, and sent him away shamefully handled.
language2_text: Makarahan am manovoy pa o mapeymowamowa sya so asa ka lamlamsoy na mangay. Mangay ori am cikcikan da a peyleylaken.

language1_text: And again he sent another; and him they killed, and many others; beating some, and killing some.
language2_text: Makarahan am manovoy pa so asa ka lamlamsoy na mangay. Mangay ori am zakaten da. So nikamimin da no nitovoy na tao a nibakbakan da a kapakakasi da so karwan da a wakwaken.

language1_text: Having yet therefore one son, his wellbeloved, he sent him also last unto them, saying, They will reverence my son.
language2_text: Ney manowji na am to na rana novoya o ney kaglaw na anak a mangay a macisirsiring do nimvood so nihakawan na, ta manakenakem o mapeymowamowa sya am, 'Jyabo kaji dasnekan no minapodpod jyaken a.'

language1_text: But those husbandmen said among themselves, This is the heir; come, let us kill him, and the inheritance shall be our's.
language2_text: Meysirisiring rana sira o nimvood so hakawan na tao am maniring rana sira am, 'Iya ya o yaomamoon so nihakawan na. To ta na wakwaka kamoon ta so nihakawan na.'

language1_text: And they took him, and killed him, and cast him out of the vineyard.
language2_text: Karahan am rakpen da o anak na a kawakwak da sya, kawasik da nya do asked no nihakawan da."

language1_text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do? he will come and destroy the husbandmen, and will give the vineyard unto others.
language2_text: Maniring rana si Yeso am, "Meypeypanngonngo paro o meyngongyod a mapeymowamowa sya tao. Jyabo kavyay na sira so nimvood so nihakawan na tao a ji na ngaolya jira o peymowamowan na, katoro na nya vooden da no matarek a tao a.

language1_text: And have ye not read this scripture; The stone which the builders rejected Is become the head of the corner:
language2_text: Nyo pa jyatenngi o akman sya ciring do Seysyo?' O Vato a niwalit da no mapakapya so vahay am yarana meyvoga a ney makdeng na aslet no ai no vahay.

language1_text: This was the Lord's doing, And it is marvellous in our eyes?
language2_text: So ikanoyong no vazay ni Ama ta do to a mapeyzokab.'"

language1_text: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
language2_text: Makazazap da no panipanirsirngen no tao do Yotay o pakacirngen na jira. Am ori o naknakman da si Yeso a rakpen. Am kanyahey da no aro a tao. Ori o to da rana angai.

language1_text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians, to catch him in his words.
language2_text: O tatasa ka tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano macikagom ji Helote a tao am nipahanhan da sira mangay ji Yeso. Naknakmen da o kapeykala da so malas a ciring na ipatwaw da so kalasan na.

language1_text: And when they were come, they say unto him, Master, we know that thou art true, and carest for no man: for thou regardest not the person of men, but teachest the way of God in truth: Is it lawful to give tribute to Cæ sar, or not?
language2_text: Maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Mo Mangnanao, namen katenngan imo a yaji mangalalas a tao. Namen katenngan imo a yamapeyyangangay so tao a nanawen, do mo kapeylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Am pancyan pala jyamen. Manngwa, apya do iwawalam ta o katoro ta do panirsirngen no Loma si Kaysa an? Manngwa, tomoro namen an? No ji namen noro."

language1_text: Shall we give, or shall we not give? But he, knowing their hypocrisy, said unto them, Why tempt ye me? bring me a penny, that I may see it.
language2_text: To na rana tenngi ni Yeso o keyleylamdam da sya. Maniring jira am, "Ikongo nyo ileylamdaman jyaken. Inya kamo pala so asa ka nizpi. Ta citahen ko."

language1_text: And they brought it. And he saith unto them, Whose is this image and superscription? And they said unto him, Cæ sar's.
language2_text: Karahan am ipanta da so asa ka nizpi. Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Sino o asyasing a kano ngaran a yadomket do nizpi eya." Maniring sira am, "Si Kaysa."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said unto them, Render to Cæ sar the things that are Cæ sar's, and to God the things that are God's. And they marvelled at him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No komwan am o monganay ji Kaysa am itoro nyo jya. Akman sang ta o monganay ji Ama ta do to am itoro nyo ji Ama ta do to." Mamizing da o ciring ni Yeso am isavasavak da.

language1_text: Then come unto him the Sadducees, which say there is no resurrection; and they asked him, saying,
language2_text: O tao a macyagom do Satokay a ji nganoyong do kavyay pa no nimawakwak a tao am mangay sira ji Yeso.

language1_text: Master, Moses wrote unto us, If a man's brother die, and leave his wife behind him, and leave no children, that his brother should take his wife, and raise up seed unto his brother.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Mo Mangnanao, o nanao ni Moyse am no mawakwak o tao a kabo no anak na am pasakain no kakteh na o mavakes na a keyyan no komownongan no kakteh na rakeh do karawan.

language1_text: Now there were seven brethren: and the first took a wife, and dying left no seed.
language2_text: No kakwa am amyan so papito a meyketeketeh. Mapapapen o rakeh jira am abo taodtod na no kawakwak na.

language1_text: And the second took her, and died, neither left he any seed: and the third likewise.
language2_text: Karahan am papenen no tomonton jira. Mawakwak ori am akman sang a abo so taodtod. O ikatlo da am akman sang,

language1_text: And the seven had her, and left no seed: last of all the woman died also.
language2_text: a kato da twatontonan a meyketeketeh a mapapapen so mina mavakes no rakeh jira. Am abo taodtod da. Mownay am mawakwak rana o mavakes ang.

language1_text: In the resurrection therefore, when they shall rise, whose wife shall she be of them? for the seven had her to wife.
language2_text: Manngwa, no marateng o araraw no ikeypirwa mavyay no tao am sino jira ang o manoyong a mapeykahanghangan so sang. Ta nimamimin sira o papito a meyketeketeh ori a nimapasakay sya."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said unto them, Do ye not therefore err, because ye know not the scriptures, neither the power of God?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Kamo tey malas an. Ta nyo jyatenngi o Seysyo. Nyo jyatenngi o oyowyat ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For when they shall rise from the dead, they neither marry, nor are given in marriage; but are as the angels which are in heaven.
language2_text: No si mirwa a mavyay o tao a apo do heseb da am akman sira so tinsi do teyngato a ji macivahavahay.

language1_text: And as touching the dead, that they rise: have ye not read in the book of Moses, how in the bush God spake unto him, saying, I am the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob?
language2_text: O vazay rana ano mirwa a mavyay o nimawakwak a tao am manngwa, nyo jya nivilangan o vakong ni Moyse do jyasleb a kayo? Maniring ji Moyse si Ama ta do to am, 'Yaken rana am Tao do to na yaken ni Apolahan a kani Isa kani Yakebo.'

language1_text: He is not the God of the dead, but the God of the living: ye therefore do greatly err.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no nang am Tao do to da si Ama ta do to no mavyay a tao a omanoyong jya. Ta o tao rana do tangain ni Ama ta do to am mamimin a mavyay sira. So yanyo ikanoyong a yamalas a manci no kaji da mirwan a mavyay no nimawakwak rana tao."

language1_text: And one of the scribes came, and having heard them reasoning together, and perceiving that he had answered them well, asked him, Which is the first commandment of all?
language2_text: Mamizing na no asa ka mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao o ciring da am isaray na o nitovis ni Yeso do tao a macyagom do Satokay. Am ori o nyangay na mapacici si Yeso. Maniring am, "Ikongo ney makdeng na do nanao ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And Jesus answered him, The first of all the commandments is , Hear, O Israel; The Lord our God is one Lord:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O ney makdeng na am, 'Inyo rana Isedi a tao am amizngen nyo. O Panirsirngen ta Tao do to ta am yabo ikararwa na a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: and thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind, and with all thy strength: this is the first commandment.
language2_text: O onowned mo a kano pahad mo a kano nakenakem mo a kano oyowyat mo am to mo peykasa a omraralay ni Ama ta do to a Tao do to mo.'

language1_text: And the second is like, namely this, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself. There is none other commandment greater than these.
language2_text: Ikadwa na am, 'Ikarilaw mo o icyatatao mo. So to mo peyyangai so aryarilaw mo so kataotao mo a marilaw no icyatatao mo.' So ikabo na rana no makataha so sya so kakdekdeng."

language1_text: And the scribe said unto him, Well, Master, thou hast said the truth: for there is one God; and there is none other but he:
language2_text: Maniring ji Yeso o mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao am, "Mo Mangnanao, yabo mo kalasan. So na ikanoyong no ciring mo, do yana kasa ka tao ni Ama ta do to a yabo so ikararwa.

language1_text: and to love him with all the heart, and with all the understanding, and with all the soul, and with all the strength, and to love his neighbour as himself, is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices.
language2_text: So raralayan ta ni Ama ta do to no onowned ta kano nakenakem ta kano oyowyat ta, a kato peyyangayan so aryarilaw so kataotao a marilaw no icyatatao. So ikakdekdeng no nya kano nakem ta sya vinyay a kano makakaday a patanangen ji Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly, he said unto him, Thou art not far from the kingdom of God. And no man after that durst ask him any question.
language2_text: Meylamdam na ni Yeso o tao ori a mateneng a mapasapa jya am maniring jya si Yeso am, "Ka na makeykai a macikaop do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to." Nimacipinda no kanang o kabo rana no makadket ji Yeso a pacicin.

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said, while he taught in the temple, How say the scribes that Christ is the son of David?
language2_text: Mangnanao si Yeso do rako a panaralayan am mapacici no asa ka ciring. Maniring am, "Ikongo da pancyan no mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to so kapeysivovoong na so Misayya ni Tawey.

language1_text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost, The LORD said to my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand, Till I make thine enemies thy footstool.
language2_text: Oyatan no Seyzi si Tawey am maniring am, 'Yamaniring si Ama ta do to do Panirsirngen ko am: Amlisna ka do wanan ko mangay si balinasen ko sira o macioya jimo a tao.'

language1_text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord; and whence is he then his son? And the common people heard him gladly.
language2_text: Abneken na ni Tawey a Panirsirngen na o Misayya. Am ikongo peysivovoongan na syaha." So ikatey yaro no tao a masaray a omamizing so ciring ni Yeso.

language1_text: And he said unto them in his doctrine, Beware of the scribes, which love to go in long clothing, and love salutations in the marketplaces,
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso do nanawan na sira am, "Azimanen nyo sira o mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao. Sira rana am da ikakza o da kapeyyayob so pipya ayob a yamangonong do rarahan. Ikakza da o kararalay da nira no tao do karwarwan no tao.

language1_text: and the chief seats in the synagogues, and the uppermost rooms at feasts:
language2_text: No mangay sira do peyneynozyan a kado pamarmarngan so kanen am ikakza da o kalisna da do pamanongan na.

language1_text: which devour widows' houses, and for a pretence make long prayers: these shall receive greater damnation.
language2_text: Littan da sira o vao a mavakes ahapen so iheyhakaw a kato da ngidan so inozi da. Mangay o kapeydedna na jira no makdeng a ipasingsingkad na sira ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury, and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury: and many that were rich cast in much.
language2_text: Amlisna si Yeso do rako a panaralayan a tomita so aro a meykingking a tao a mapangay so kingking da do kavangan. Aro sira o meynizpi a tao a komozong so aro a kingking da.

language1_text: And there came a certain poor widow, and she threw in two mites, which make a farthing.
language2_text: Karahan am amyan so asa ka vao a mavakes a mangay mapangay so adwa ka nizpi.

language1_text: And he called unto him his disciples, and saith unto them, Verily I say unto you, That this poor widow hath cast more in, than all they which have cast into the treasury:
language2_text: Karahan am lovoten ni Yeso o macinanao jya. Maniring jira am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am yarwaro pa o na nipangay a kingking na no vao a kano aro a tao.

language1_text: for all they did cast in of their abundance; but she of her want did cast in all that she had, even all her living.
language2_text: O karwan no tao am da ipeykingking o hepan da. Am tana yamavak o velek no vao ori am na to mimina o na ipangakaday a nizpi na yaipeykingking."

language1_text: And as he went out of the temple, one of his disciples saith unto him, Master, see what manner of stones and what buildings are here!
language2_text: Makowbot si Yeso a apo do rako a panaralayan am maniring jya o asa ka macinanao jya am, "Cita pala o yatey yapya da nyamaog no vato a panaralayan."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said unto him, Seest thou these great buildings? there shall not be left one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Nyo ikalak o yatey yapya so kamamaogan a vahay am mangay o kazdazday da so vato a yada nyamaog sya. So ikabo na rana no vato a mavezed do dang."

language1_text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple, Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately,
language2_text: Amyan si Yeso do tokon a meyngaran so Kanlan do katovangan na no rako a panaralayan. Omlisna si Pite a kani Yake a kani Yowani a kani Antele am pacicin da si Yeso.

language1_text: Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Si mango am makaranes o akman sang a vazay. Makongo so wanjin ori si makaranes."

language1_text: And Jesus answering them began to say, Take heed lest any man deceive you:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Azimanen nyo o littan da jinyo no tao.

language1_text: for many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.
language2_text: Ta amyan so tao a amvood so ngaran ko a manci no ka Kizisto da a ilita da do aro a tao.

language1_text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars, be ye not troubled: for such things must needs be; but the end shall not be yet.
language2_text: No mamizing nyo o meyyarap do livolivon no pongso nyo am ji kamo anyahey. Ta amyan so akman sang a vazay. Am beken a kavosan na ori no karawan.

language1_text: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be earthquakes in divers places, and there shall be famines and troubles: these are the beginnings of sorrows.
language2_text: Meyyarap sira o meytarek so itetngehan a kapeyyarap da no teyhesa ka mahataw. So iyan na no rako a kanini a kano abcil do karawan. Am ori rana am papwan na rana so kapakaranes na rana no alalaw do teyrahem.

language1_text: But take heed to yourselves: for they shall deliver you up to councils; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten: and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake, for a testimony against them.
language2_text: "Azimanen nyo, ta rakpen da inyo a yangay do pacicicyan a kabakbak da jinyo do peyneynozyan, do kararalay nyo nyaken. So ikanoyong nyo a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do tangain da no panirsirngen a kano meymatmatngeh no teyhesa ka mahataw.

language1_text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations.
language2_text: Am manmanma kapeylimwang na no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do tao do peycyamahamahatawan a kakavos na rana no karawan.

language1_text: But when they shall lead you, and deliver you up, take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak, neither do ye premeditate: but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour, that speak ye: for it is not ye that speak, but the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: No rakpen da inyo a yangay do pacicicyan am ji nyo a ratan o ciring nyo a ipasapa nyo jira. Ta sidongen na inyo ni Ama ta do to a mapasapa jira. Ta o ipasapa nyo jira am beken a monganay jinyo. Ta omaing do Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a ciriciring a pasapahen nyo.

language1_text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death, and the father the son; and children shall rise up against their parents, and shall cause them to be put to death.
language2_text: No si marateng o araraw no nang am ipanazang da no tao o meysinogat a kakteh da a wakwaken no tao. So icyakman na sang no ama da do ananak da. O ananak da am ioya da sira o inyapwan da manci no kawakwak da sira no tao.

language1_text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake: but he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
language2_text: Pacioyyan da inyo a omraralay nyaken. Am o to ngotokot a jyahayo so nakem a omraralay nyaken am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, standing where it ought not, (let him that readeth understand, ) then let them that be in Judæ a flee to the mountains:
language2_text: "Macita nyo o mapaoya a somazovaz si Ama ta do to a mangay da patneken do ji nyo mamyapyan a tankan na. (No vilangan nyo a ciring eya am to nyo na naknakma o peypeypangayan na.) No si marateng ori am o meyvahay do Yotay am mangay sira tomayo do takey.

language1_text: and let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house, neither enter therein, to take any thing out of his house:
language2_text: So ji da ranandepi no tao do vahay da a mangap so apzapzatan.

language1_text: and let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment.
language2_text: O amyan do nihakawan da am ji rana ngoli a mangap so ayob da.

language1_text: But woe to them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!
language2_text: No marateng o araraw ori am to sira makasi o mamlis so kanen a kano mangahanas a mavakes.

language1_text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter.
language2_text: Mapasyasi kamo ji Ama ta do to a kaji na makaransan no akman sang a vazay do ahemyan.

language1_text: For in those days shall be affliction, such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time, neither shall be.
language2_text: Ta o akman rana sang a alalaw do araraw am abo pa o akman sang no kamaog na so karawan ni Ama ta do to. So ikabo na no akman sang no makwa.

language1_text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days, no flesh should be saved: but for the elect's sake, whom he hath chosen, he hath shortened the days.
language2_text: No ji na pazikenkeni ni Ama ta do to o araraw no akman sang a alalaw do teyrahem am abo tao a mavyay. Am na kapakanakem so na nipamnekan a yamraralay nya a tao. Ori o na pazikenkenan do araraw no alalaw do teyrahem.

language1_text: And then if any man shall say to you, Lo, here is Christ; or, lo, he is there; believe him not:
language2_text: "No amyan so tao a manci nya jinyo so, 'Oya do jya si Kizisto. Ori do kwang si Kizisto,' am ji nyo nganoyngi.

language1_text: for false Christs and false prophets shall rise, and shall shew signs and wonders, to seduce, if it were possible, even the elect.
language2_text: Ta amyan so tao no makwa a manci no ka si Kizisto da kano malas so ipangnanao a tao. Sira rana am meyvazay sira so mapangyangyalak a vazay a ipeycyakawad da do nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a yamraralay nya tao.

language1_text: But take ye heed: behold, I have foretold you all things.
language2_text: Azimanen nyo. Ta ko rana nipanmanma a ipanci jinyo o akman sang a vazay.

language1_text: But in those days, after that tribulation, the sun shall be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light,
language2_text: "No mavitos rana o aro a alalaw ori do araraw am to rana kedep o araw. Ji rana manikap o vehan.

language1_text: and the stars of heaven shall fall, and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken.
language2_text: Makas rana o mata no hanit. Mablis rana o masamasaod no hanit."

language1_text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory.
language2_text: No si marateng rana ori am meytotwaw ko rana a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao do cinalab a meygegcin no rako a oyowyat ko a kano azwazway ko.

language1_text: And then shall he send his angels, and shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven.
language2_text: Pasonsonen ko o tinsi a mangay do peycyamahamahatawan a kalovot ko sira so nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a apo do teyhesa ka mahataw.

language1_text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When her branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is near:
language2_text: "To nyo na nita o voovoong no ovako a kayo. No to naod rana do yangayangaw na am to nyo na tenngi o ka teyteyka na.

language1_text: so ye in like manner, when ye shall see these things come to pass, know that it is nigh, even at the doors.
language2_text: Akman sang an, ta no macita nyo o makakaday a alalaw do teyrahem am makeykai ko rana a mai.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, that this generation shall not pass, till all these things be done.
language2_text: Manakem nyo an, ta amyan kamo pa tao sicyakwaya am makaranes rana o akman sang a vazay.

language1_text: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
language2_text: Mabalinas o hanit a kano teyrahem. Am jyablis o ciring ko a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels which are in heaven, neither the Son, but the Father.
language2_text: "Am abo tao a makateneng do araraw no yai ko. Tana tinsi am ji da tenngi. Akman sang o Anak na ni Ama ta do to a ji makateneng jya. Ta si Ama ta do to o makateneng jya.

language1_text: Take ye heed, watch and pray: for ye know not when the time is.
language2_text: Azimanen nyo. Yokain nyo o onowned nyo. Ta ji nyo a tenngi o ipakaranes no araraw ang.

language1_text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey, who left his house, and gave authority to his servants, and to every man his work, and commanded the porter to watch.
language2_text: Akman so tao a mangay mangilili a tomoro no makakaday a vazay do lamlamsoy na peyvazain da a kapanci na rana no mangiwangiwang so pazevngen a lamlamsoy na a ji mapaitkeh so kataotao na.

language1_text: Watch ye therefore: for ye know not when the master of the house cometh, at even, or at midnight, or at the cockcrowing, or in the morning:
language2_text: Am ori an ipeytataziman nyo. Ta ji nyo a tenngi o yai no mapeyvahay sya tao. Ala mai do maseyrem. Ala mai do avak no ahep. Ala mai do ikaraw na rana. Ala mai do peysibwen no tao.

language1_text: lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping.
language2_text: No si ji mapaziman a mai a kapakacita na jimo a mitkeh am jyabo kapya mo a.

language1_text: And what I say unto you I say unto all, Watch.
language2_text: O yako ipanci jinyo am inyo a aro a tao o ko peycirngan sya. So ipeytataziman nyo!"

language1_text: After two days was the feast of the passover, and of unleavened bread: and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft, and put him to death.
language2_text: Kadwa araw pa kapamaring da so kanen a koman so ji nimimway a pang do Iyeci. Am o panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to am naknakmen da o ahahapan da si Yeso, do rakpan da sya do ikabo no tao a wakwaken.

language1_text: But they said, Not on the feast day, lest there be an uproar of the people.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Taosya o karakep ta sya do ipamaring so kanen, ta meyvonag sira o aro a tao."

language1_text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper, as he sat at meat, there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious; and she brake the box, and poured it on his head.
language2_text: Amyan si Yeso do Potani do vahay da da Simong a omlabyab so kolit no kakwa. Koman sira am mangai o asa ka mavakes so tagaw a kapnowan no masingat a mahangno a haneng. Karahan am aspin na o tagaw a kapaglo na sya do oo ni Yeso.

language1_text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves, and said, Why was this waste of the ointment made?
