language2_text: Macita da no maciwalam ji Yeso a tao am maoya sira so aktokto. Maniring rana sira am, "To na gagidan ori am ikongo peypeypangayan no akman sang.

language1_text: For it might have been sold for more than three hundred pence, and have been given to the poor. And they murmured against her.
language2_text: Jingbeywani o yatey masingat a haneng ang. Apyapya rana o kapamalit nya so nizpi a ipanidong so ikasi a tao am." Am ori o nioyyan da no mavakes ang.

language1_text: And Jesus said, Let her alone; why trouble ye her? she hath wrought a good work on me.
language2_text: Am maniring si Yeso am, "To nyo macipanadngi. Nyo kazyakan no yapiya vazay na jyaken.

language1_text: For ye have the poor with you always, and whensoever ye will ye may do them good: but me ye have not always.
language2_text: Yamasangib sira o makasi a tao a yamacikaop jinyo. Jyasalit jinyo o kasidong nyo sira. Am yaken am ko jyasangib, ta yalikey rana o ipacikaop ko jinyo.

language1_text: She hath done what she could: she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying.
language2_text: Am iya rana am na paminmindan rana ya no nakem na jyaken an, a yamapaglo do kataotao ko so yamahangno a haneng. Ta ori rana am yavat na ori do bobwan da jyaken.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world, this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no ipeylimwang o Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do karawan eya am abo ji makalavat so mina vazay na jyaken no mavakes eya."

language1_text: And Judas Iscariot, one of the twelve, went unto the chief priests, to betray him unto them.
language2_text: O rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao ji Yeso am amyan so asa ka tao a meyngaran so Yota a tao do Isecyadi. Iya rana am mangay ori do panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a manazang ni Yeso jira.

language1_text: And when they heard it, they were glad, and promised to give him money. And he sought how he might conveniently betray him.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring ni Yota am masaray sira. Karahan am ninoon da o kapanta da nya so nizpi. Ori o nipacipinda na rana no sapan na so araraw a torwan na rana ni Yeso jira.

language1_text: And the first day of unleavened bread, when they killed the passover, his disciples said unto him, Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover?
language2_text: Omanam o kasaraw do ipamaring da so kanen a iyakan da so ji nimimway a pang am manwakwak sira so kagling. Maniring sira ji Yeso o macinanao jya am, "Do wanjin mo tovoyan jyamen a tomalakanen so pamaringan ta so kanen do Iyeci."

language1_text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples, and saith unto them, Go ye into the city, and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water: follow him.
language2_text: Karahan am mapahanhan si Yeso so rarwa ka macinanao jya. Maniring jira am, "Angay kamo do ili. Si makasinmo kamo so asa ka mahakay a omoli rana no ranom da am macihza kamo jya.

language1_text: And wheresoever he shall go in, say ye to the goodman of the house, The Master saith, Where is the guestchamber, where I shall eat the passover with my disciples?
language2_text: No si somdep do asa ka vahay am somdep kamo do asdepan na. No si maniring kamo do mapeyvahay sya am, 'Na ipanci no yamnanao jyamen am: Wanjin o vahay a kalovotan namen a yamamaring so kanen do Iyeci,' kwan nyo an,

language1_text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared: there make ready for us.
language2_text: a kangay na ninyo do cinavat no vahay na nipingsanan na. So to nyo rana ngyani do dang a mapeykakasa so kanen ta."

language1_text: And his disciples went forth, and came into the city, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.
language2_text: Mangay sira do ili o rarwa ka macinanao jya am todey mangononong o ciring na jira ni Yeso. Am ori o niyan da rana do dang a mapeykakasa so yaven da.

language1_text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve.
language2_text: Maseyrem rana am malovot rana sira Yeso a kano rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya.

language1_text: And as they sat and did eat, Jesus said, Verily I say unto you, One of you which eateth with me shall betray me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do ikalimot da koman am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am yamyan jinyo so yasa ka tao a yamacihanghang jyaten a yamanazang nyaken."

language1_text: And they began to be sorrowful, and to say unto him one by one, Is it I? and another said, Is it I?
language2_text: Mamizing da ori am marahet sira so onowned o macinanao jya. Am ori o nikateyteyras da manangangay nya ji Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Yaken an?"

language1_text: And he answered and said unto them, It is one of the twelve, that dippeth with me in the dish.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O yasa ka tao jinyo do yararwa so ikakarwan o macizanod jyaken a tomahem so kanen na am iya ori.

language1_text: The Son of man indeed goeth, as it is written of him: but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed! good were it for that man if he had never been born.
language2_text: O ciring rana do Seysyo am wakwaken da o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao. Am o manazang nya tao am to makasi. Apyapya rana kaji na nimatazakan a tao do karawan."

language1_text: And as they did eat, Jesus took bread, and blessed, and brake it, and gave to them, and said, Take, eat: this is my body.
language2_text: Koman sira am ahapen na ni Yeso o pang a isaray na ji Ama ta do to a kakcikcil na sya a itoro do macinanao jya. Maniring am, "Kanen nyo ya, ta kataotao ko ya."

language1_text: And he took the cup, and when he had given thanks, he gave it to them: and they all drank of it.
language2_text: Karahan am ahapen na rana o kopo a yanan no potaw cyo a kasaray na nya ji Ama ta do to a katoro na rana nya do macinanao jya a keyyop da rana sya.

language1_text: And he said unto them, This is my blood of the new testament, which is shed for many.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Oya rana am rala ko a nimvoyog a omaing do aro a tao. O rala ko rana ya am yongkad nyo do avayo a pangozayan nyo a ciring na ni Ama ta do to a mapatastas so omanoyong jya tao.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine, until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am ji ko rana ngyop so potaw cyo mangay no marateng o araraw na no kapacikaop ko jinyo a omyop do teyngato, no si papwen na ni Ama ta do to o katalamozong na no vayo a karawan."

language1_text: And when they had sung an hymn, they went out into the mount of Olives.
language2_text: Teyka da o asa ka anwanood a sarayan da ni Ama ta do to a peyyanwanooden am mangay rana sira do tokon a meyngaran so Kanlan.

language1_text: And Jesus saith unto them, All ye shall be offended because of me this night: for it is written, I will smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Mangay o kapacisyay nyo jyaken. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, 'Wakwaken ko o mapamangan so kagling a tao a kapeyvwak da no kagling.'

language1_text: But after that I am risen, I will go before you into Galilee.
language2_text: Am si mirwa ko a mavyay am manmanma ko a ka ninyo a mangay do Cyadidi."

language1_text: But Peter said unto him, Although all shall be offended, yet will not I.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Tana peymakarwan da imo no tao am jyabo kakaro ko jimo a."

language1_text: And Jesus saith unto him, Verily I say unto thee, That this day, even in this night, before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso ji Pite am, "To ko na macitangayan jimo am si ipidwa o manok a tomazokokok do ji na pa araw eya am mangay keypitlo mo a omalalas jyaken."

language1_text: But he spake the more vehemently, If I should die with thee, I will not deny thee in any wise. Likewise also said they all.
language2_text: Karahan am mavezkat si Pite a meyzezyak. Maniring am, "Ji ko macizanod jimo a mawakwak a. Jyabo kato ko ngalalasan jimo a." So nikakman da sang so ciring no kadwan jira macinanao jya.

language1_text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane: and he saith to his disciples, Sit ye here, while I shall pray.
language2_text: Makaranes sira do meyngaran so Kesimani a peymowamowan da am maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "To kamo ngyan jya, ta mangay ko pa meynozi."

language1_text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John, and began to be sore amazed, and to be very heavy;
language2_text: Karahan am rarahen na si Pite a kani Yake a kani Yowani. So nyapo na rana dang no keyngen na rana so onowned.

language1_text: and saith unto them, My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death: tarry ye here, and watch.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Ko mazabab so onowned a toda jyawakwak. To kamo ngyan do jya. Am meytataziman kamo an."

language1_text: And he went forward a little, and fell on the ground, and prayed that, if it were possible, the hour might pass from him.
language2_text: Meyratateng am karwan na sira ni Yeso so kabneng no keytan so karairai a kapeyrorokma na a mapasyasi ji Ama ta do to. Maniring am, "No si apyahen mo am pakarwen mo o yatey rako a alalaw ko an."

language1_text: And he said, Abba, Father, all things are possible unto thee; take away this cup from me: nevertheless not what I will, but what thou wilt.
language2_text: Maniring pa am, "Mo Ama, yabo mo jya peyvazay. So pakarwan mo so alalaw eya an. Am ji mo na mangozai o nakenakem ko. Ta ahahapan mo na sya."

language1_text: And he cometh, and findeth them sleeping, and saith unto Peter, Simon, sleepest thou? couldest not thou watch one hour?
language2_text: Meysinaoli a mangay jira am macita na o tatlo a ka macinanao jya makapya mitkeh. Maniring rana ji Pite am, "Mo Simong, ka mitkeh? Manngwa, ji nyo nahap o asa ka vatvatek a ji nyo ngitkehi?"

language1_text: Watch ye and pray, lest ye enter into temptation. The spirit truly is ready, but the flesh is weak.
language2_text: Maniring pa jira am, "Meytataziman kamo a meynozi. Ta kalittan kamo an. Tana nyo apyahen do onowned nyo am nyo jyapakongo o nyo kapeynozi."

language1_text: And again he went away, and prayed, and spake the same words.
language2_text: Akman sang a komaro jira mangay a meynozi. Am akman sang o ciring na ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And when he returned, he found them asleep again, (for their eyes were heavy, ) neither wist they what to answer him.
language2_text: Karahan am meysinaoli a mangay do macinanao jya. Am akman sang, ta mitkeh sira, ta tey makaha rana sira. Am ori o ji da makatenngi ji Yeso a pacisirsirngan.

language1_text: And he cometh the third time, and saith unto them, Sleep on now, and take your rest: it is enough, the hour is come; behold, the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners.
language2_text: Ipitlo si Yeso a mangay jira am maniring jira am, "Yakamo pa mitkeh? Cyana, manga ovay. Ta yarana makeykai o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a ipanazang da do meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: Rise up, let us go; lo, he that betrayeth me is at hand.
language2_text: Kayokay kamo na, kangay tamo rana. Cita kamo o yamanazang nyaken a tao a yarana mai."

language1_text: And immediately, while he yet spake, cometh Judas, one of the twelve, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders.
language2_text: Ji pa vitos o ciring ni Yeso am mai rana si Yota a pacihzan da no meyhavit so takzes a kano sisipzot a tao. Sira ori am nitovoy da no panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan.

language1_text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token, saying, Whomsoever I shall kiss, that same is he; take him, and lead him away safely.
language2_text: O manazang ni Yeso a tao am nipanci na rana jira o ahahapan na sya. Maniring si Yota jira am, "O rapongen ko a tao am iya ori. So rakpan nyo sya a kangay nyo na nya."

language1_text: And as soon as he was come, he goeth straightway to him, and saith, Master, master; and kissed him.
language2_text: Kapakaranes na ni Yota am mangay na rapongen si Yeso a manci no, "Mo Mangnanao."

language1_text: And they laid their hands on him, and took him.
language2_text: Karahan am rakpen da na si Yeso.

language1_text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword, and smote a servant of the high priest, and cut off his ear.
language2_text: O meytatanek do katangked da tao am amyan so asa ka tao a to baba so takzes na kangay na mapacipas so talinga no kalamsoyan no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kakas na no asa ka talinga na.

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Are ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and with staves to take me?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Kamo mapalolo so takzes nyo a kano sisipzot nyo a yakomala jyaken? Nyo ipanci yaken a manakaw a tao?

language1_text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching, and ye took me not: but the scriptures must be fulfilled.
language2_text: Ko mangday so araw a yamangnanao so tao do rako a panaralayan. Kamo masangib a yamacikaop jyaken am nyo ji rakpi jyaken. Am kangay na mangononong no ciring do Seysyo."

language1_text: And they all forsook him, and fled.
language2_text: No kano nang am nimamimin sira o macinanao jya nikomaro jya a meyvwak.

language1_text: And there followed him a certain young man, having a linen cloth cast about his naked body; and the young men laid hold on him:
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka mowva tao a mapayob sya do kataotao na so zaping a nimacilolo ji Yeso. Naknakmen da o karakep da sya.

language1_text: and he left the linen cloth, and fled from them naked.
language2_text: Am to na rana wasikan o ayob na zaping kapalalayo na rana mangay somazok.

language1_text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest: and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes.
language2_text: Yangay da si Yeso do vahay na no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. O amyan rana do dang am panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And Peter followed him afar off, even into the palace of the high priest: and he sat with the servants, and warmed himself at the fire.
language2_text: To na macyazizazawi si Yeso ni Pite a mangay do tezantehed no vahay no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. Meyratateng am to rana macizavoz do mamzat a tao a omlisna macipanangdang jira.

language1_text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death; and found none.
language2_text: O panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano aro a meykaygi a tao am meykala sira so tao a mangamaog so iraherahet da si Yeso a ciring a iwakwak da sya. Am ji sira makakala.

language1_text: For many bare false witness against him, but their witness agreed not together.
language2_text: Tana aro sira o tao a mangitao nya so malas a ciring a iraherahet da sya am ji meyyangangay o ipanci da.

language1_text: And there arose certain, and bare false witness against him, saying,
language2_text: Karahan am tatasa ka tao jira o to rana meytatanek a mangamaog so malas a ciring a iraherahet da si Yeso. Maniring sira am,

language1_text: We heard him say, I will destroy this temple that is made with hands, and within three days I will build another made without hands.
language2_text: "Namen nimamizing ori a yanimanci no yana kakavakava so yanyamaog no lima no tao a rako a panaralayan. Si katlo araw am mapatnek so asa ka panaralayan a jya nyamaog no lima no tao."

language1_text: But neither so did their witness agree together.
language2_text: Am tana akman rana sang a ciring a iraherahet da si Yeso am ji sira meyyangangay so ciriciring.

language1_text: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
language2_text: Karahan am meytatanek o panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. Maniring ji Yeso am, "Manngwa, yamyan so ciring mo do da iraherahet jimo ang?"

language1_text: But he held his peace, and answered nothing. Again the high priest asked him, and said unto him, Art thou the Christ, the Son of the Blessed?
language2_text: Abo o asa ka ciring a nipanci na ni Yeso. Maniring pa ji Yeso o panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am, "Manngwa, manoyong ka ya Misayya a Anak ni Ama ta do to?"

language1_text: And Jesus said, I am: and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power, and coming in the clouds of heaven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Noon. Manoyong. Mamimin kamo a makacita so Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a omlisna do wanan na ni Ama ta do to a meygegcin do cinalab a mai do teyrahem."

language1_text: Then the high priest rent his clothes, and saith, What need we any further witnesses?
language2_text: Mamizing na no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am to na rana misipisinga o talili na. Maniring am, "Tana abo rana tao a manci no karatan na am cyaha.

language1_text: Ye have heard the blasphemy: what think ye? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death.
language2_text: Ta nyo na nimamizing o ciring na na iraherahet si Ama ta do to. Pancyan kamo pala, kongwen takamo ya." Mamimin sira manci no kawakwak sya.

language1_text: And some began to spit on him, and to cover his face, and to buffet him, and to say unto him, Prophesy: and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands.
language2_text: O tatasa jira am cicippan da si Yeso a kabengbeng da so mata na a bakbakan. Maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Pancyan pala. Sino yanimbakbak jimo ang." O tatasa ka mamzat a tao am siplangen da si Yeso.

language1_text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace, there cometh one of the maids of the high priest:
language2_text: Amyan pa si Pite do pantaw no vahay no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am amyan so lamlamsoy da a mavakes a mai.

language1_text: and when she saw Peter warming himself, she looked upon him, and said, And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth.
language2_text: Macita na si Pite a manangdang am to na ningkaji. Maniring ji Pite am, "Imo asyo o kararay na no tao do Nasale a si Yeso?"

language1_text: But he denied, saying, I know not, neither understand I what thou sayest. And he went out into the porch; and the cock crew.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Ko jyasingkaji o yamo ipanci a tao ang." Teyka na o ciring na am meyparai jira.

language1_text: And a maid saw him again, and began to say to them that stood by, This is one of them.
language2_text: Makarahan am macita na pa si Pite no mavakes ang. Maniring do meytatanek do katangked da tao am, "Iya rana ito am yamacinanao jya ori."

language1_text: And he denied it again. And a little after, they that stood by said again to Peter, Surely thou art one of them: for thou art a Galilæ an, and thy speech agreeth thereto.
language2_text: Mamizing ni Pite am alalasan na. Makarahan am o meytatanek do siri da tao am maniring sira ji Pite am, "Ji mo naywa o mo kapacikaop jira. Ta imo rana am tao ka do Cyadidi."

language1_text: But he began to curse and to swear, saying, I know not this man of whom ye speak.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Tana to ko mangavay am ko jyatenngi o tao a nyo ipanci ang. No yamalas o ciring ko am cyaha, ta yamyan si Ama ta do to a mapasingesinget jyaken."

language1_text: And the second time the cock crew. And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him, Before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice. And when he thought thereon, he wept.
language2_text: Teyka na ori a ciring am ipirwa na so katazokokok no manok. Karahan am manakem na rana ni Pite o mina ciring ni Yeso do keypitlo na omalalas jya no keypidwa na tomazokokok o manok. Ji na pariparing o onowned na am to rana zezezeng a omlavi.

language1_text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council, and bound Jesus, and carried him away, and delivered him to Pilate.
language2_text: Apnezak do ikadwa na araw am meykaygi rana sira o panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano aro a panipanirsirngen. Karahan am pamnekan da na o vazay da. Meyratateng am vaoden da na si Yeso a yangay ji Pilato.

language1_text: And Pilate asked him, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answering said unto him, Thou sayest it .
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato jya am, "Panirsirngen da imo no tao do Yotay?" Maniring si Yeso am, "Noon, manoyong ori."

language1_text: And the chief priests accused him of many things: but he answered nothing.
language2_text: So nikaro no marahet a vazay a iraherahet da si Yeso no panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And Pilate asked him again, saying, Answerest thou nothing? behold how many things they witness against thee.
language2_text: Am ori o nipacicyan na pa si Yeso ni Pilato. Maniring am, "Amizing pala o aro a vazay a da iraherahet jimo. Manngwa, yabo ciring mo a yamo ipasapa jira?"

language1_text: But Jesus yet answered nothing; so that Pilate marvelled.
language2_text: Akman sang ta abo o asa ka ciring a nipasapa na jira ni Yeso. Am ori o savasavakan na nya ni Pilato.

language1_text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner, whomsoever they desired.
language2_text: Mangday no mamaring sira so kanen do Iyeci o kato na mangozayan jya ni Pilato do kapamnekan da no tao a mapasaway so asa ka tao a nipteng da.

language1_text: And there was one named Barabbas, which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him, who had committed murder in the insurrection.
language2_text: Nimacinao o meyngaran so Palapa a macizavoz do aptengen da. Iya rana ori am mapasobsobna do seyvo a kapanwakwak na so tao.

language1_text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them.
language2_text: Malovot sira o aro a tao a manci ni Pilato so kapasaway na so asa ka tao.

language1_text: But Pilate answered them, saying, Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews?
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato jira am, "Manngo kamo a apyapya kapasaway ko so panirsirngen nyo a tao do Yotay an?"

language1_text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy.
language2_text: Am katenngan na rana ni Pilato o nyahapan da si Yeso a itoro jya no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to do keynanahet da nya. Am ori o nyangayan da nya jya.

language1_text: But the chief priests moved the people, that he should rather release Barabbas unto them.
language2_text: Am kapasozisozi da so aro a tao no panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a manci ni Pilato a mapasaway si Palapa.

language1_text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them, What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews?
language2_text: Ipidwa na pacicin sira o aro a tao ni Pilato am maniring jira am, "Kongwen ko so wanjin o nyo ipanci a panirsirngen nyo a tao do Yotay ang."

language1_text: And they cried out again, Crucify him.
language2_text: Maniring sira o aro a tao a amlololos am, "Padketen do jyojika!"

language1_text: Then Pilate said unto them, Why, what evil hath he done? And they cried out the more exceedingly, Crucify him.
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato am, "Ikongo na mina vazay a yamarahet." Ikeykavevek da amlololos no aro a tao. Maniring sira am, "Padketen do jyojika!"

language1_text: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.
language2_text: Ji na pasovoy o aro a tao ni Pilato am to na rana norwan jira si Palapa a kapanci na rana no tao a somipsipzot ji Yeso a katoro na rana ni Yeso jira yangay da padketen do jyojika.

language1_text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall, called Præ torium; and they call together the whole band.
language2_text: Karahan am yangay da no itaysang no Loma si Yeso do tezantehed no vahay ni Pilato a kapeylovolovot da na so aro a itaysang.

language1_text: And they clothed him with purple, and platted a crown of thorns, and put it about his head,
language2_text: Meyratateng am payoben da si Yeso so akmey ayob no panirsirngen a kapamalikawag da so akmey tazici a pasakopen da jya,

language1_text: and began to salute him, Hail, King of the Jews!
language2_text: a kalogologod da nya. Maniring sira am, "Makapintek ka Panirsirngen no tao do Yotay an."

language1_text: And they smote him on the head with a reed, and did spit upon him, and bowing their knees worshipped him.
language2_text: Karahan am bakbakan da no vazit o oo na a kacicipa da jya a kapeylilitod da amlogologod nya.

language1_text: And when they had mocked him, they took off the purple from him, and put his own clothes on him, and led him out to crucify him.
language2_text: Teyka da peyyaliliman am opsowen da na o nipeyyayob da sya akmey ayob no panirsirngen a kapayob da na jya so meyngongyod a ayob na a kangay da rana nya padketen do jyojika.

language1_text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian, who passed by, coming out of the country, the father of Alexander and Rufus, to bear his cross.
language2_text: Makanavak do rarahan na am masinmo da o asa ka tao a meyngaran si Simong a omoli a apo do takey. Masinmo da ori am pahanhanen da ori a somabway no jyojika ni Yeso. (Si Simong rana am tao do Cidinay a inyapwan da ni Yadisanta kani Lovo.)

language1_text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha, which is, being interpreted, The place of a skull.
language2_text: Yangay da si Yeso do meyngaran so Keketa. O peypeypangayan no nang am Yanga no oo no tao.

language1_text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh: but he received it not.
language2_text: Amyan sira do dang am peyyopen da si Yeso so nipazavozan da so kosozi a makopad a ranom. Am ji na ngyopa ni Yeso.

language1_text: And when they had crucified him, they parted his garments, casting lots upon them, what every man should take.
language2_text: Padketen da rana si Yeso do jyojika am macipangoyongoyot sira amvonong so mina ayob na.

language1_text: And it was the third hour, and they crucified him.
language2_text: Ikasyam no vatvatek do apnezak am padketen da si Yeso do jyojika.

language1_text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over, THE KING OF THE JEWS.
language2_text: O nivatvatkan da raraten na am, "Iya ya am Panirsirngen da no tao do Yotay,"

language1_text: And with him they crucify two thieves; the one on his right hand, and the other on his left.
language2_text: a kapazanod da so rarwa nimanakaw a tao ji Yeso a padketen do jyojika. Asa am pain da do wanan na. O asa am pain da do ozi na.

language1_text: And the scripture was fulfilled, which saith, And he was numbered with the transgressors.
language2_text: [So na nipangononong rana no akman sang a ciring do Seysyo. Ta o domket dang am, "Nipazasing da do meyraraten a tao."]

language1_text: And they that passed by railed on him, wagging their heads, and saying, Ah, thou that destroyest the temple, and buildest it in three days,
language2_text: O meyhatay do dang a tao am to da ligaligana o oo da mapasnesnek si Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Ka jyapya yamanci no kakavakava mo so rako a panaralayan a kapakatlo na araw no ipatnek mo sya.

language1_text: save thyself, and come down from the cross.
language2_text: Peyhekas do jyojika sicyaikwaya kavyay mo so kataotao mo am."

language1_text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes, He saved others; himself he cannot save.
language2_text: Akman sang sira o panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a meykeykaming nya. Maniring sira am, "Na mavyay o karwan no tao a na jyatenngi o kataotao na avyain.

language1_text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross, that we may see and believe. And they that were crucified with him reviled him.
language2_text: Kizisto a Panirsirngen no Isedi, peyhekas pala do jyojika, ta citahen namen, ta ori o anoyngan namen jimo." Akman sang sira o kararay na nipadket da do jyojika mapeyleylak sya.

language1_text: And when the sixth hour was come, there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour.
language2_text: Meyigen o araw am mina todakedep o teyrahem so atlo a ka vatvatek.

language1_text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice, saying, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabachthani? which is, being interpreted, My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me?
language2_text: Ikatlo na ka vatvatek do makoyab am amlololos si Yeso. Maniring am, "Idi, Idi, lama sapahetani." O peypeypangayan na am, "Mo Ama do to, mo Ama do to, mo peymakarwan jyaken."

language1_text: And some of them that stood by, when they heard it, said, Behold, he calleth Elias.
language2_text: Mamizing da no tao am maniring sira am, "Na tawagan si Idiya."

language1_text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar, and put it on a reed, and gave him to drink, saying, Let alone; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tao a mangay omahap so nitahem do makopad a ranom a akmey tapaik a palibden do anaro a avyao a itoro ji Yeso ipeyyop na sya. Maniring am, "Nanalahen ta pala ang, ta ala mai si Idiya mangay mapakas sya do jyojika an."

language1_text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice, and gave up the ghost.
language2_text: Ipisa kalolos na ni Yeso am mazavat o inawan na.

language1_text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom.
language2_text: O bengbeng no rako a panaralayan a milakayob am mina todapising.

language1_text: And when the centurion, which stood over against him, saw that he so cried out, and gave up the ghost, he said, Truly this man was the Son of God.
language2_text: O amyan do tangain no jyojika a panirsirngen no itaysang no Loma am macita na si Yeso a amlololos a mawakwak am maniring am, "Manoyong o tao eya Anak no Tao do to."

language1_text: There were also women looking on afar off: among whom was Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses, and Salome;
language2_text: Amyan so aro a mavakes a makacita sya a macyatovang jya. Sira rana am Matelyan Madiya kano ina na ni Yake a kani Yoseyvo a Madiya kani Salomey a kano karwan da icyamavavakes da.

language1_text: (who also, when he was in Galilee, followed him, and ministered unto him;) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem.
language2_text: No keyyan ni Yeso do Cyadidi am sira ori o nimacilolo jya a mapeyveyveken sya. Amyan pa sira so aro a mavavakes a nimacihza jya do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: And now when the even was come, because it was the preparation, that is, the day before the sabbath, Joseph of Arimathæ a, an honourable counsellor, which also waited for the kingdom of God, came, and went in boldly unto Pilate, and craved the body of Jesus.
language2_text: Maseyrem rana do vekhas na no ipeywalam da no tao do Yotay am nimai si Yoseyvo. Iya rana am tao do Adimatay a tey kanig da ori no panipanirsirngen a kararay na. Iya rana am tey saray na no nang o kapananala na so katalamozong na nyaten ni Ama ta do to. Ji na mamman si Pilato. Am ori o yangay na a manci nya ji Pilato so kakas na so kataotao ni Yeso a pakakasahen. Maseyrem rana do vekhas na no ipeywalam da no tao do Yotay am nimai si Yoseyvo. Iya rana am tao do Adimatay a tey kanig da ori no panipanirsirngen a kararay na. Iya rana am tey saray na no nang o kapananala na so katalamozong na nyaten ni Ama ta do to. Ji na mamman si Pilato. Am ori o yangay na a manci nya ji Pilato so kakas na so kataotao ni Yeso a pakakasahen.

language1_text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead: and calling unto him the centurion, he asked him whether he had been any while dead.
language2_text: Nisavasavak na ni Pilato o mina kapakamizing na rana si Yeso a nimawakwak. Am ori o nipancyan na no asa ka panirsirngen no itaysang no Loma a mai. Maniring jya am, "Manngwa, yarana nimawakwak si Yeso?"

language1_text: And when he knew it of the centurion, he gave the body to Joseph.
language2_text: Mamizing na do panirsirngen da no itaysang no Loma o kanimawakwak na rana ni Yeso am ori o nipyan na si Yoseyvo a mahap rana so kataotao na ni Yeso.

language1_text: And he bought fine linen, and took him down, and wrapped him in the linen, and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock, and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre.
language2_text: Karahan am manazang si Yoseyvo so milakayob a kangay na rana omkas so kataotao ni Yeso a pongosan no milakayob a mangay pakakasahen do nidokdokan na rana mao a kalolog na so rako a veysen a pazevngen na do heseb na.

language1_text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid.
language2_text: Si Matelyan Madiya kano ina na ni Yoseyvo a Madiya am nimacilolo sira. So pakatenngan da do nipakakasan da si Yeso.

language1_text: And when the sabbath was past, Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James, and Salome, had bought sweet spices, that they might come and anoint him.
language2_text: Komavos o ipeywalam no tao am manazang si Matelyan Madiya kani Madiya a ina na ni Yake a kani Salomey so mahangno a haneng, mangay da ikoris do kataotao ni Yeso.

language1_text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week, they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun.
language2_text: Apnezak do niciyo do ipeyzengazengang na rana am mangay sira do nipayan da so kataotao ni Yeso.

language1_text: And they said among themselves, Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre?
language2_text: Amyan sira do rarahan am naknakmen da o kabo no tao a somidong sira a mapeylis so rako a veysen a nipaneb da.

language1_text: And when they looked, they saw that the stone was rolled away: for it was very great.
language2_text: Am citahen da am nimalolog rana o rako a vato.

language1_text: And entering into the sepulchre, they saw a young man sitting on the right side, clothed in a long white garment; and they were affrighted.
language2_text: Somdep sira do heseb na am macita da o mowva tao a omlisna do kawanan no nipayan da si Yeso a meyyayob so malavang a ayob. Ori o niogto da.

language1_text: And he saith unto them, Be not affrighted: Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth, which was crucified: he is risen; he is not here: behold the place where they laid him.
language2_text: Maniring o mowva tao ori am, "Ji kamo ogto a mavokahaw. Ta ko katenngan inyo a yakomala so yada nipadket do jyojika tao do Nasale a si Yeso. Am yana ji ngyan do jya, ta yarana nimirwa mavyay. To nyo nita o yada nipayan sya ito,

language1_text: But go your way, tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee: there shall ye see him, as he said unto you.
language2_text: a kangay nyo na manci nya do macinanao jya. Ipanci nyo ji Pite, ta o ciring na ni Yeso am manmanma pa ka nira a mangay do Cyadidi. So ipakacita da sya do dang. So na ipangononong no mina ciring na jira."

language1_text: And they went out quickly, and fled from the sepulchre; for they trembled and were amazed: neither said they any thing to any man; for they were afraid.
language2_text: No mangay kanyahey da am mangay keyyak da nya a malalayo a komaro rana do heseb na. Am ji da nipanci do tao. Ta manyahey sira.

language1_text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week, he appeared first to Mary Magdalene, out of whom he had cast seven devils.
language2_text: [Apnezak do niciyo am mirwa mavyay si Yeso. O ney manma na nipacittan na no kataotao na am si Matelyan Madiya. Iya rana am nipamozwawan na ni Yeso so apito a kalamsoyan ni Satan.

language1_text: And she went and told them that had been with him, as they mourned and wept.
language2_text: Iya am nimangay manci nya do mazabab so onowned a mina kararay ni Yeso.

language1_text: And they, when they had heard that he was alive, and had been seen of her, believed not.
language2_text: Mamizing da si Yeso a nimavyay rana a kapakamizing da pa si Madiya nimakacita rana sya am ji da nganoyngi.

language1_text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them, as they walked, and went into the country.
language2_text: Mavitos o vazay ori am macitarek rana o pacittan na no kataotao na ni Yeso do rarwa ka mina kararay na a meypangay do ili da.

language1_text: And they went and told it unto the residue: neither believed they them.
language2_text: Ipanci da do karwan da macinanao ji Yeso am ji da pa nganoyngi.

language1_text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat, and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart, because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen.
language2_text: Ney manowji na am mapacita si Yeso do koman a asa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya. Am nioya na sira, ta malma sira so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to a akmey vato so onowned a ji nganoyong do ciring da no tao a nimakacita sya a nimirwa a mavyay.

language1_text: And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Mangay kamo do peycyamahamahatawan na a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do tao do karawan.

language1_text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved; but he that believeth not shall be damned.
language2_text: O omanoyong jyaken a omya so kataktak do kataotao da am patazadangen ko sira. Am o ji manganoyong a tao am pasyain ko sira a pasingsingtan.

language1_text: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues;
language2_text: O manganoyong a tao am ipanta na sira ni Ama ta do to so oyowyat da mapeyvazay so mapeyzokab a vazay. No pangozayan da o ngaran ko am mavozwaw da o kalamsoyan ni Satan a kapeyzezyak da so macitarek a ciring.

language1_text: they shall take up serpents; and if they drink any deadly thing, it shall not hurt them; they shall lay hands on the sick, and they shall recover.
language2_text: Tana to da minani o tokza, omyop so makazazakat a kosozi am apya sira. No paoptahen da o lima da so meyngen a tao am todapya sira."

language1_text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them, he was received up into heaven, and sat on the right hand of God.
language2_text: Teyka na ni Yeso o aro a ciring a ipanci jira am meycyakavat rana mangay do teyngato a omlisna do wanan na ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: And they went forth, and preached every where, the Lord working with them, and confirming the word with signs following. Amen.
language2_text: kangay da rana no nimacinanao ji Yeso a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do peycyeylilyan na. So ikanoyong ni Yeso a macikaop jira a manta nira so oyowyat da a mapeyvazay so mapeyzokab a vazay. Ori rana am yongkad no kanoyong no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a ipeylimwang da.]

language1_text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us,
language2_text: Kokay mo Tiawveylo. Amyan so aro a tao a nimvatvatek do mina vazay da no kadwan jyaten.

language1_text: even as they delivered them unto us, which from the beginning were eyewitnesses, and ministers of the word;
language2_text: O nivatvatkan da am nipayapo da do nimacita da vazay ni Yeso a kano nimamizing da ciriciring da no nimeylimwang nya.

language1_text: it seemed good to me also, having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first, to write unto thee in order, most excellent Theophilus,
language2_text: O akman rana sya vazay am ko na nimanlolok a nyapo do atngeh na kangay na do pinangavosan na a ko nipakapya a nipacinanawan. Am ori o ko pancyan ya jimo, mo Tiawveylo.

language1_text: that thou mightest know the certainty of those things, wherein thou hast been instructed.
language2_text: O yako pancyan ya am yamanoyong o mo nimamizing a ninanao da jimo.

language1_text: There was in the days of Herod, the king of Judæ a, a certain priest named Zacharias, of the course of Abia: and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron, and her name was Elisabeth.
language2_text: O mina panirsirngen do Yotay no kano nang am meyngaran si Helote. Am amyan so asa ka tao a mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a meyngaran si Sacyadiya macyanod do Apiya, asa ka lipenpenan. O kahanghangan na no nang am meyngaran si Idisapay. Sivosivovoong da ni Yalon a mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And they were both righteous before God, walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless.
language2_text: Acyacilban na ni Ama ta do to am katenngan na sira meyyaven do vahay apiya so nakenakem a tao a omahap so inanao na sira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And they had no child, because that Elisabeth was barren, and they both were now well stricken in years.
language2_text: Am sira rana ori am abo anak da, ta ji meytaodtod o kahanghangan na si Idisapay a mangay do kararakehan da.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that while he executed the priest's office before God in the order of his course,
language2_text: Ipisa katalamozong na ni Sacyadiya so nakem da patanangen ji Ama ta do to am,

language1_text: according to the custom of the priest's office, his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord.
language2_text: ahapen na rana o iwawalam da macipangoyongoyot. So nisdep na do rako a panaralayan da do Yelosaleng a mapatanatanang so nakem da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense.
language2_text: Patanangen na o nakem da si Ama ta do to am amyan so aro a tao do pantaw a meynozi.

language1_text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.
language2_text: So niyan na no asa ka tinsi ni Ama ta do to a nimangay mapacita no kataotao na jya a meytatanek do kawanan no patanangan so nakem da si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And when Zacharias saw him, he was troubled, and fear fell upon him.
language2_text: Macita na ni Sacyadiya am akmey to nalap o pahad na manyahey nya.

language1_text: But the angel said unto him, Fear not, Zacharias: for thy prayer is heard; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son, and thou shalt call his name John.
language2_text: Maniring o tinsi jya am, "Sacyadiya, ji ka nyahey, ta o inozi mo am na nyamizing rana ni Ama ta do to. So peytaodtod na no kahanghangan mo a si Idisapay so mahakay. So ngaranan nyo jya si Yowani.

language1_text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness; and many shall rejoice at his birth.
language2_text: So ikasaray mo na a kasaray da nya no aro a tao so anak mo a minalikey.

language1_text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord, and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost, even from his mother's womb.
language2_text: Ta iya rana am katenngan a tao do tangain na ni Ama ta do to. So ji na ngyopi so saki. No kaji na tazakan a tao pa am nipabedbed na rana ni Ama ta do to o oyowyat na jya Seyzi.

language1_text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God.
language2_text: Ta iya o mapeysinaoli sira so aro a Isedi a tao a omraralay ni Ama ta do to a manoyong a Tao do to da.

language1_text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias, to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children, and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord.
language2_text: Ta iya rana am manmanma a mai a kano Panirsirngen nyo. Ta oyatan na no Seyzi akman si Idiya. So peypeypapyan na so nakenakem no nimeyrahet so nakem a malama. Ipeysinaoli da mamlis so nakem no meyraraten a tao. So icyakma dey mina tazak a tao so onowned. So ikanoyong na somidong so tao a omnanala sya."

language1_text: And Zacharias said unto the angel, Whereby shall I know this? for I am an old man, and my wife well stricken in years.
language2_text: Maniring si Sacyadiya do tinsi am, "Ikongo pakatenngan ko do ciring mo. Namen rana rarakeh eya meyyaven do vahay. Jyabo kapacinadnadnad na pa no kahanghangan ko a."

language1_text: And the angel answering said unto him, I am Gabriel, that stand in the presence of God; and am sent to speak unto thee, and to shew thee these glad tidings.
language2_text: Maniring o tinsi am, "Yaken rana ya am lamlamsoy na yaken ni Ama do to a meyngaran si Cyapaydi a yana nitovoy a mangay a manci nya jimo so rako a vazay eya.

language1_text: And, behold, thou shalt be dumb, and not able to speak, until the day that these things shall be performed, because thou believest not my words, which shall be fulfilled in their season.
language2_text: Am yamo ji nganoyngi o ciriciring ko. Sicyaraw rana ya am papwen mo na o kaji mo makabnebnekan, mangay ori do ikatazak na tao no anak mo."

language1_text: And the people waited for Zacharias, and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple.
language2_text: So kangsahan da nya a ninanala no aro a tao do niyan na do sahad na kapeyzokab da nya nimownay do rako a panaralayan dang.

language1_text: And when he came out, he could not speak unto them: and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple: for he beckoned unto them, and remained speechless.
language2_text: Makowbot am ji rana makabnebnek. Ori o ipakateneng da jya nimakacita so niyak na no mata do rako a panaralayan. So nika lima na no nipacisirsiring na do tao.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that, as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished, he departed to his own house.
language2_text: Komavos o vazay na mapatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am mangay rana do vahay da.

language1_text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived, and hid herself five months, saying,
language2_text: Kadadayan na rana so araraw am mamlis rana so kanen o kahanghangan na si Idisapay. Mina kalima na vehan am jya nimakowbot do vahay da.

language1_text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me, to take away my reproach among men.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Manoyong an si Ama ta do to a yanimvonas so da tamwadan jyaken no icyatatao ko an, do kabo no minapodpod jyaken."

language1_text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee, named Nazareth,
language2_text: Ikanem na vehan ni Idisapay am tovoin na ni Ama ta do to o tinsi a meyngaran si Cyapaydi a mangay do ili a meyngaran so Nasale a macinapnap do Cyadidi,

language1_text: to a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph, of the house of David; and the virgin's name was Mary.
language2_text: a mangay do asa ka mavakes a nitamtamkan da rana no macikownongan ji Tawey, asa ka mahakay a meyngaran si Yoseyvo. O ngaran no mavakes am si Madiya.

language1_text: And the angel came in unto her, and said, Hail, thou that art highly favoured, the Lord is with thee: blessed art thou among women.
language2_text: So nyangay na no tinsi do mavakes ang. Maniring am, "Kokay. Makapiya ka so onowned an. Manoyong o na kapacilovot jimo ni Ama ta do to a yameypalanginan nimo. So yana ikatey rako no aryarilaw na jimo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And when she saw him, she was troubled at his saying, and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be.
language2_text: Mamizing na o ciring no tinsi ni Madiya am mina to na ogtwan, do kaji na makatenngan do peypeypangayan na no ciring na. So to na rana naknakmi so agagazan na no mina ciring na jya.

language1_text: And the angel said unto her, Fear not, Mary: for thou hast found favour with God.
language2_text: Maniring o tinsi jya am, "Madiya, ji ka nyaheyan, ta na ikarilaw imo ni Ama ta do to an.

language1_text: And, behold, thou shalt conceive in thy womb, and bring forth a son, and shalt call his name JESUS.
language2_text: Citahen mo an. Mangalavat ka so anak mo a mahakay. So ngaranan mo jya si Yeso.

language1_text: He shall be great, and shall be called the Son of the Highest: and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David:
language2_text: Iya rana am meyngongyod a katenngan a tao. So pancyan da nya Anak ni Ama ta do to. So torwan na nya ni Ama ta do to jya so azwazway na no ineynapo na ni Tawey.

language1_text: and he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever; and of his kingdom there shall be no end.
language2_text: So peypanirsirngan da sya no sivosivovoong na ni Yakebo mangay no kaidan no karawan. So ikabo na no tao a makataha sya panirsirngen."

language1_text: Then said Mary unto the angel, How shall this be, seeing I know not a man?
language2_text: Maniring si Madiya do tinsi am, "To ko akman sang, do ko jyasingkaji o mahakay."

language1_text: And the angel answered and said unto her, The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee, and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee: therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God.
language2_text: Maniring o tinsi am, "O Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to o peyhekasen na jimo a kano oyowyat na. So na apzatan jimo ni Ama do to. Am ori o ikatazak na tao no Anak na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And, behold, thy cousin Elisabeth, she hath also conceived a son in her old age: and this is the sixth month with her, who was called barren.
language2_text: Cita pala o zipos mo si Idisapay. Ta kakwakwan na rarakeh rana am macinadnadnad pa. Am do nakenakem no tao am jyabo kapeytaodtod no nang. Am yajyakman sang an. Ta ikanem na rana vehan eya yamamlis so kanen.

language1_text: For with God nothing shall be impossible.
language2_text: Ta abo ji na hap a vazay ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And Mary said, Behold the handmaid of the Lord; be it unto me according to thy word. And the angel departed from her.
language2_text: Maniring si Madiya am, "Yaken rana am lamlamsoy na yaken ni Ama ta do to. So to ko na nooni so ciring na ni Ama ta do to." Meyratateng am karwan na rana no tinsi.

language1_text: And Mary arose in those days, and went into the hill country with haste, into a city of Juda;
language2_text: Meyratateng am tomanggeh a meypangay si Madiya do ili da Sacyadiya a macinapnap do Yotay.

language1_text: and entered into the house of Zacharias, and saluted Elisabeth.
language2_text: Somdep do vahay da am peyminaminasi na si Idisapay.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that, when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary, the babe leaped in her womb; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost:
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Idisapay si Madiya am mina to meygonagonay o alavaten na a kowyat na ji Idisapay no Seyzi.

language1_text: and she spake out with a loud voice, and said, Blessed art thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb.
language2_text: Am ori o nilolos na manci no, "Imo rana ya am ney manokdwan ka do icyamamavakes ta, ta o yamo alavaten am yamonganay ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And whence is this to me, that the mother of my Lord should come to me?
language2_text: Mazavak eya yamai a tomita jyaken a ina no Panirsirngen ko.

language1_text: For, lo, as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears, the babe leaped in my womb for joy.
language2_text: Ko mamizing o ciring mo am yato meygonagonay o ko alavaten a somaray.

language1_text: And blessed is she that believed: for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord.
language2_text: Mo anoyngan o ciring na jimo ni Ama ta do to a mangononong. So mo ikanoyong a tey yapya."

language1_text: And Mary said, My soul doth magnify the Lord,
language2_text: Maniring si Madiya am, "Ko isaray o rako a nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.
language2_text: a manoyong a Tao do to, do yana mapatazadang jyaken do teyngato,

language1_text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden: For, behold, from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed.
language2_text: ta yana manakem o ji mamayok a lamlamsoy na. So papwan da sya sicyaraw eya mangay do kaidan no karawan o kabnek da jyaken a apiya so ngilin a mavakes,

language1_text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things; And holy is his name.
language2_text: ta yamyan so rako a vazay na do kataotao ko ni Ama ta do to. Mazway o ngaran na.

language1_text: And his mercy is on them that fear himFrom generation to generation.
language2_text: O pangangarilawan na am jyablis sicyakwaya, kangay na do kaidan no karawan a itoro na do omraralay nya tao.

language1_text: He hath shewed strength with his arm; He hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts.
language2_text: Tey mowyat si Ama ta do to a mapeyvwak so nakenakem da no mapahama a tao.

language1_text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats, And exalted them of low degree.
language2_text: Na nipeypaveveh sira o panipanirsirngen. So ji da rana makazyazyaki. Na nikatkat sira o ji makazyazyak a tao.

language1_text: He hath filled the hungry with good things; And the rich he hath sent empty away.
language2_text: Na absoin sira o makcin a tao a kapteng na sira so mabsoy a tao.

language1_text: He hath holpen his servant Israel, In remembrance of his mercy;
language2_text: So ninaknakman na so pangangarilawan na kasidong na so omraralay nya Isedi a tao,

language1_text: As he spake to our fathers, To Abraham, and to his seed for ever.
language2_text: akman so nipanci na do ineynapo ta, aryarilaw na si Apolahan a kano apwapo na, mangay rana do kaidan no karawan."

language1_text: And Mary abode with her about three months, and returned to her own house.
language2_text: So niyan na ni Madiya do vahay da Idisapay so katlo a vehan a kangay na rana do vahay da.

language1_text: Now Elisabeth's full time came that she should be delivered; and she brought forth a son.
language2_text: Marateng rana o vehan ni Idisapay am malikey rana o anak na mahakay.

language1_text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her; and they rejoiced with her.
language2_text: Mamizing da no katakataib da kano zipozipos da o karilaw na nira ni Ama ta do to am masaray sira so nakenakem ji Idisapay.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child; and they called him Zacharias, after the name of his father.
language2_text: Ikawao na araw am mai rana o aro a tao a kayongkad da no kanakan a meyngongyod a Isedi a tao. So kakzan da no ngaran na ni ama na Sacyadiya a ingaran da jya.

language1_text: And his mother answered and said, Not so; but he shall be called John.
language2_text: Am maniring o ina na am, "Beken. Ingaran ta jya si Yowani."

language1_text: And they said unto her, There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name.
language2_text: Am maniring o aro a tao do ina na am, "Yabo do zipos nyo o akman sang so ngaran."

language1_text: And they made signs to his father, how he would have him called.
language2_text: So nisirsirngan da no lima da so ama na, do kapamnek na do ngaran no anak na.

language1_text: And he asked for a writing table, and wrote, saying, His name is John. And they marvelled all.
language2_text: Am ori o nipacyami na jira so peyvatvatkan na. Meyratateng am vatvatkan na o ngaran na no anak na si Yowani. So nisavasavakan da nya.

language1_text: And his mouth was opened immediately, and his tongue loosed, and he spake, and praised God.
language2_text: No kanang am nimakeykai a meyzezyak o ama na. So nisarayan na rana nya ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them: and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judæ a.
language2_text: Am ori o nisavasavakan da nya no katakataib da. So peylimwangan da rana nya do tao do peycyeylilyan na do Yotay.

language1_text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts, saying, What manner of child shall this be! And the hand of the Lord was with him.
language2_text: O makamizing sya tao am abo ji mapeyyan sya do onowned da kapanci da no, "Si makaveyvow am ikongo paro o angayan no kanakan eya." Ta to da nahaw o kowyat na jya ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost, and prophesied, saying,
language2_text: So nioyatan na ji Sacyadiya no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a manci no,

language1_text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel; For he hath visited and redeemed his people, And hath raised up an horn of salvation for usIn the house of his servant David;
language2_text: "Manoyong a isaray o Tao do to da no Isedi a tao a tomalamozong nyaten an. Ta tovoin na o sivovoong ni Tawey a omyavayo so onowned ta a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato."Manoyong a isaray o Tao do to da no Isedi a tao a tomalamozong nyaten an. Ta tovoin na o sivovoong ni Tawey a omyavayo so onowned ta a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato.

language1_text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets, which have been since the world began:
language2_text: Akman so nipaziman ni Ama ta do to no kakwa pa nitoyo na jira do panoyonoywan na so ciring,

language1_text: That we should be saved from our enemies, and from the hand of all that hate us;
language2_text: a kapahawa na jyaten do kavosoyan ta tao a kano maoya nyaten a tao.

language1_text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers, And to remember his holy covenant;
language2_text: So nikarilawan na no ineynapo ta, do na kahap sya do kanitomoyotoyon na sira.

language1_text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham,
language2_text: Akman so kanitomoyotoyon na so ineynapo ta si Apolahan no ciriciring na,

language1_text: That he would grant unto us, that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemiesMight serve him without fear, In holiness and righteousness before him, all the days of our life.
language2_text: a kangay na mapahawa jyaten do kavosoyan ta tao. So ikabo no ikanyahey ta. Am ori o to ta ngavosi nya do karawan so kahap ta so apya nakenakem na, kahap ta so vazay na omraralay nya.a kangay na mapahawa jyaten do kavosoyan ta tao. So ikabo no ikanyahey ta. Am ori o to ta ngavosi nya do karawan so kahap ta so apya nakenakem na, kahap ta so vazay na omraralay nya.

language1_text: And thou, child, shalt be called the prophet of the Highest: For thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways;
language2_text: Imo rana manganako am abneken da rana imo a manoyonoyo so ciriciring no ney manokdwan na Tao do to an. Ta imo rana am manmanma ka mapaziman sya do tao so kai na no Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his peopleBy the remission of their sins,
language2_text: Ipanci mo do omraralay nya tao o yana kavonas so raraten da ni Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong na mapatazadang sira do teyngato an,

language1_text: Through the tender mercy of our God; Whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us,
language2_text: ta oya rana am omaing ya do pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a tomiray jyaten,

language1_text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, To guide our feet into the way of peace.
language2_text: a kaciray na so ji pa makateneng ji Ama ta do to a manyahey no kawakwak da tao, a kapangonong na nyaten do kapyapyan."

language1_text: And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel.
language2_text: Makaveyvow rana o anak na ni Sacyadiya am meypakatkat o nakenakem na. Nimeyvahay do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a mangay do nipeytotwaw na rana mangnanao so Isedi a tao.

language1_text: And it came to pass in those days, that there went out a decree from Cæ sar Augustus, that all the world should be taxed.
language2_text: No kano nang am amyan so ciring na no panirsirngen da no Loma a meyngaran si Kaysa Awkoseto. Maniring am, "Inyo rana ko italamozong a tao do Loma am mamimin kamo a mangay a mapadket so ngaran nyo."

language1_text: (And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria.)
language2_text: Ori pa so kapadket da so ngaran da no kapeypanirsirngen da si Cidino do Sidiya.

language1_text: And all went to be taxed, every one into his own city.
language2_text: So nikamimin da no tao a mangay do ili da mapadket so ngaran da.

language1_text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee, out of the city of Nazareth, into Judæ a, unto the city of David, which is called Bethlehem; (because he was of the house and lineage of David:)
language2_text: So nikapo na ni Yoseyvo do ili da do Nasale a macinapnap do Cyadidi a mangay do Yotay. So nipakaranes na rana do Podiheng a cinatazakan na tao ni Tawey, ta si Yoseyvo rana am sivovoong na ni Tawey.

language1_text: to be taxed with Mary his espoused wife, being great with child.
language2_text: So ipacihza ni Madiya ji Yoseyvo a mangay a mapadket so ngaran da, ta nitoro na rana o tamtamek da jira. Am no kano nang am mamlis so kanen rana si Madiya.

language1_text: And so it was, that, while they were there, the days were accomplished that she should be delivered.
language2_text: Amyan sira do Podiheng am vehan na rana ni Madiya.

language1_text: And she brought forth her firstborn son, and wrapped him in swaddling clothes, and laid him in a manger; because there was no room for them in the inn.
language2_text: So nikatazak na rana no kabnekan na anak a mahakay. Am ori o nivangnan da sya no milakayob a kapangay da sya do pamangamanganan so baka, ta abo rana o yanan da do iseysanan.

language1_text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field, keeping watch over their flock by night.
language2_text: O mapamangamangan so kagling a tao do ahep a amzat do kagling da do masngen do Podiheng am,

language1_text: And, lo, the angel of the Lord came upon them, and the glory of the Lord shone round about them: and they were sore afraid.
language2_text: to ngyan so tinsi na ni Ama ta do to a mapacita jira. So nicirayan na sira no oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o nikanyahey da.

language1_text: And the angel said unto them, Fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy, which shall be to all people.
language2_text: Am maniring jira o tinsi am, "Ji kanyo anyaheyan, ta yamyan so apiya ciriciring a ko ipanci jinyo. O ciriciring rana ya am rako a sarasaray no tao do karawan an.

language1_text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord.
language2_text: Sicyaraw rana ya am yanimatazak a tao o asa ka Panirsirngen nyo do karawan eya do ili ni Tawey. Iya rana am si Kizisto a mapatazadang jinyo do teyngato.

language1_text: And this shall be a sign unto you; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes, lying in a manger.
language2_text: So ipakacita nyo so asa ka minalikey a kanakan a mivangen so milakayob a miray do pamangamanganan so baka. Ori rana o tovilan nyo jya."

language1_text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God, and saying,
language2_text: Meyratateng am amyan so aro a tinsi do hanit a macizanod do tinsi ang a somaray ni Ama ta do to. So peycirngan da so,

language1_text: Glory to God in the highest, And on earth peace, good will toward men.
language2_text: "Azwazwain takamo si Ama ta do to. Inaoy si itoro na jira do omraralay nya tao do teyrahem o ikapiya no onowned da."

language1_text: And it came to pass, as the angels were gone away from them into heaven, the shepherds said one to another, Let us now go even unto Bethlehem, and see this thing which is come to pass, which the Lord hath made known unto us.
language2_text: Karwan da sira no tinsi a mangay do teyngato am ipeysirsiring da no mapamangamangan so kagling a manci no, "Mangay tamo do Podiheng a tomita so na nipaziman jyaten ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And they came with haste, and found Mary, and Joseph, and the babe lying in a manger.
language2_text: Ori o nikakeykai da nimangay a komala si Madiya kani Yoseyvo a kano miray do pamangamanganan so baka kanakan.

language1_text: And when they had seen it, they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child.
language2_text: So nipakacita da rana sya kavahangso da so mina ciring da jira no tinsi.

language1_text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds.
language2_text: O makamizing sya tao am abo ji meyzokab no ciring da sira.

language1_text: But Mary kept all these things, and pondered them in her heart.
language2_text: Si Madiya rana am to na peyyana do onowned na o aro a vazay na kanakenakem na sya do onowned na.

language1_text: And the shepherds returned, glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen, as it was told unto them.
language2_text: Ikongo do mina to mangononong o mina ciring da sira no tinsi, am ori o nisarayan da rana nya ji Ama ta do to no mapamangamangan so kagling a kangay da rana.

language1_text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child, his name was called JESUS, which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb.
language2_text: Mablit o ikawao na araw no kanakan am yongkadan da a meyngongyod a Isedi a tao a kangaran da rana jya si Yeso. O ngaran na rana am nibnek na rana no tinsi no kaji na pa nganan sospa na ni Madiya.

language1_text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished, they brought him to Jerusalem, to present him to the Lord;
language2_text: Marateng rana o araraw na no hapan da so iwawalam na ni Moyse do nimangahanas rana mavakes. Am ori o nyangayan da no anak da ni Yoseyvo a kani Madiya do Yelosaleng a patanangen da ji Ama ta do to a mahap so vazay na, ta ori o nitaid na pa ni Moyse a iwawalam da,

language1_text: (as it is written in the law of the Lord, Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord;)
language2_text: akman so nivatvatkan da iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to, "O kabnekan nyo mahakay anak am akmanen nyo so sang a patanangen nyo ji Ama ta do to,"

language1_text: and to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord, A pair of turtledoves, or two young pigeons.
language2_text: kapangozay da do ipanci na ni Ama ta do to a iwawalam na a mangap so adwa ka voit. No beken a voit am adwa ka hato.

language1_text: And, behold, there was a man in Jerusalem, whose name was Simeon; and the same man was just and devout, waiting for the consolation of Israel: and the Holy Ghost was upon him.
language2_text: No kano nang do Yelosaleng am amyan so asa ka tao a meyngaran si Simoyang. Iya rana ori am makdeng so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to a oyatan no Seyzi. So to na pananalai so makayokod no Isedi a tao.

language1_text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost, that he should not see death, before he had seen the Lord's Christ.
language2_text: Nipanta na no Seyzi si Simoyang so ipakateneng na do kapakapis na pa so tovoin na ni Ama ta do to a Kizisto.

language1_text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple: and when the parents brought in the child Jesus, to do for him after the custom of the law,
language2_text: Ikongo do nioyatan na no Seyzi, am ori o nisdep na do rako a panaralayan. Nimacinao no kano nang o kangay da ni Yeso no inyapwan na mangay a mangozay do iwawalam da.

language1_text: then took he him up in his arms, and blessed God, and said,
language2_text: Meyratateng am sapopowen na ni Simoyang o kanakan a kasaray na nya ji Ama ta do to. So nipancyan na no,

language1_text: Lord, now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace, According to thy word:
language2_text: "Mo Ama do to, manoyong o ciriciring mo an. Tana to ko na ngaroi o karawan am,

language1_text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation,
language2_text: cyaha, ta ko na nimacita o mapatazadang jyamen do teyngato.

language1_text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people;
language2_text: Ta iya o nitovoy mo a somidong so tao do karawan.

language1_text: A light to lighten the Gentiles, And the glory of thy people Israel.
language2_text: Iya rana am akmey araw a tomiray so beken a tao do Yotay. So torwan mo no azwazway mo jyamen a Isedi a tao."

language1_text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him.
language2_text: Am ori o niogtwan da nya no inyapwan na no kanakan so ciring na ni Simoyang.

language1_text: And Simeon blessed them, and said unto Mary his mother, Behold, this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel; and for a sign which shall be spoken against;
language2_text: So nitoyotoyonan na sira ni Simoyang a kapanci na nya ji Madiya so, "Manoyong o kanakan eya na nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to. Aro omanoyong jya tao. Aro ji nganoyong jya. So ikaro da no tao a maoya nya.

language1_text: (yea, a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also, ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed.
language2_text: Am ori rana o ipatwaw so aro a marahet a nakenakem no tao. Imo rana am akma dey to patovozey so ipangan o onowned mo."

language1_text: And there was one Anna, a prophetess, the daughter of Phanuel, of the tribe of Aser: she was of a great age, and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity;
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka mavakes a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran si Anna, anak ni Vanoar a sivovoong ni Asiar. Am rarakeh rana ori. Ikapito na kawan nizagpit na do kahanghangan na am mawakwak o mahakay na.

language1_text: and she was a widow of about fourscore and four years, which departed not from the temple, but served God with fastings and prayers night and day.
language2_text: O kakawakawan na rana am apat o ikasyam na ngarnan (84). Iya rana am tey makdeng a omraralay ni Ama ta do to. So ipangday na do maraw a kado mahep a ji na mangakaday a meynozi ji Ama ta do to. So ji na ngaroi do rako a panaralayan da.

language1_text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord, and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem.
language2_text: So nipeypasngen na mangay jira a somaray no kanakan ji Ama ta do to a kapeylimwang na rana nya do omnanala sya tao, do kanimalikey na rana no mapatazadang sira do teyngato.

language1_text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord, they returned into Galilee, to their own city Nazareth.
language2_text: Mateyka da rana da Yoseyvo a kani Madiya tomoyotoyon sya no iwawalam da am meysinaoli rana sira do Cyadidi do ili da do Nasale.

language1_text: And the child grew, and waxed strong in spirit, filled with wisdom: and the grace of God was upon him.
language2_text: Meyparako rana o kanakan am meypakatkat rana o teneng na, ta oyatan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover.
language2_text: Mangday so awawan o kangay da no inyapwan na ni Yeso a mamaring so kanen do Yelosaleng. O ingaran da do araraw ori am Iyeci.

language1_text: And when he was twelve years old, they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast.
language2_text: Marateng rana o ikadwa na so ikarwa (12) no kakawakawan na ni Yeso am macihza do inyapwan na.

language1_text: And when they had fulfilled the days, as they returned, the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it.
language2_text: Teyka sira mamaring so kanen am meysinaoli sira mangay do ili da. Am ji da nikatenngan no inyapwan na o kanimavezed na do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: But they, supposing him to have been in the company, went a day's journey; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance.
language2_text: "Ala yamacihza si Yeso do karwan no tao," kwan da no inyapwan na. Ori ji da ngezsangi nya. Kasaraw rana sira niomalam. Am ori o nikalan da rana sya do zipozipos da kano masingkad da tao.

language1_text: And when they found him not, they turned back again to Jerusalem, seeking him.
language2_text: Ji da kala am to sira rana meysinaoli do Yelosaleng a mangay komala sya.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that after three days they found him in the temple, sitting in the midst of the doctors, both hearing them, and asking them questions.
language2_text: Ikatlo na araw am makala da si Yeso do rako a panaralayan da amlisna do avak da omamizing so mangnanao a kapacici na sira.

language1_text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers.
language2_text: O makamizing so ciring na tao am abo o ji meyzokab no teneng na do tovisan na jira.

language1_text: And when they saw him, they were amazed: and his mother said unto him, Son, why hast thou thus dealt with us? behold, thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing.
language2_text: Macita da si Yeso no inyapwan na am ipeyzokab da. Am ori o nipancyan na nya jya no ina na so, "Manganako, yaka nimeypanngonngo ya. Yamo jyacita yamen si ama mo a yato ngala jimo?"

language1_text: And he said unto them, How is it that ye sought me? wist ye not that I must be about my Father's business?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ikongo nyo kalan jyaken. Yanyo jyatenngi yaken a yameyvazay so vazay ni Ama do vahay na?"

language1_text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them.
language2_text: Am ji da azab o peypeypangayan no mina ciring na sira.

language1_text: And he went down with them, and came to Nazareth, and was subject unto them: but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart.
language2_text: So nipacihza na rana jira mangay do Nasale a omamizing so ipanci da jya. Am to na peyyana no ina na do onowned na o akman so sang a mina vazay na.

language1_text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favour with God and man.
language2_text: To macihza o nakem na ni Yeso do kataotao na a meycyakatkat. So sarayan na nya ni Ama ta do to a kano tao.

language1_text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Cæ sar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judæ a, and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituræ a and of the region of Trachonitis, and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene,
language2_text: Ikalima na so icyarwa na (15) no awawan na no kapeypanirsirngen da sya no Loma tao so meyngaran si Tipilyo am panirsirngen da si Pangsyo Pilato do Yotay a kapeypanirsirngen da do Cyadidi si Helote. O kakteh ni Helote a meyngaran si Veydipo am panirsirngen da do Itodiya kado Telakeni. O meyngaran si Disaniya am panirsirngen da do Apidini.

language1_text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests, the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness.
language2_text: O meyngaran si Annase a kani Keyava am panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. No kano nang am nioyatan na o ciring na ni Ama ta do to do meyvahay do kabwan no nihakawan a meyngaran si Yowani a anak na ni Sacyadiya.

language1_text: And he came into all the country about Jordan, preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins;
language2_text: Nilivolivon na rana ni Yowani o macitangked do ayo a meyngaran so Yotan a ili a pancyan na no, "Peymakarwan nyo rana o peyraratenan nyo a kataktak jinyo. Ta ori o vonasan na so raraten nyo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: as it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet, saying, The voice of one crying in the wilderness, Prepare ye the way of the Lord, Make his paths straight.
language2_text: Akman so domket do vakong no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran si Isayya. Maniring am, "Amyan so tao a omlololos do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a manci no, 'Inyo rana am wadwadan nyo o rarahan no Panirsirngen ta. So ikatazineng na rana no pangonongan na.

language1_text: Every valley shall be filled, And every mountain and hill shall be brought low; And the crooked shall be made straight, And the rough ways shall be made smooth;
language2_text: Apnowen nyo o peykabangbangbangan na, kapeysanasanap na rana. O meygilogilo a rarahan am peytazitazinngen nyo. O meycyatokotokon a rarahan am peysanasanapen nyo an.

language1_text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God.
language2_text: So ikamimin no tao a makacita so pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to an.'"

language1_text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him, O generation of vipers, who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come?
language2_text: Meyratateng am ipanci ni Yowani do aro a nimai a tomaktak do kataotao da so, "Inyo a yakmey mavowaw, sino nipanci jinyo o yanyo katayo no oyaoya na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance, and begin not to say within yourselves, We have Abraham to our father: for I say unto you, That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham.
language2_text: Ta si mamlis kamo na so icicirawat am ori o ikanoyong nyo rana nikomaro do peyraratenan nyo. Ji nyo peycirnga o kapeysivosivovoong na jinyo ni Apolahan a ji na oyyan ni Ama ta do to. Ko pakoyokoin jinyo am makamaog si Ama ta do to do vato ito so sivosivovoong na ni Apolahan.

language1_text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees: every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.
language2_text: Yana mazomtad o zaig do atngeh no kayo. O ji meyyasi a kayo am miminen na atbahen a kapasleb na sya do apoy."

language1_text: And the people asked him, saying, What shall we do then?
language2_text: Maniring o aro a tao jya am, "Makongo namen so wanjin."

language1_text: He answereth and saith unto them, He that hath two coats, let him impart to him that hath none; and he that hath meat, let him do likewise.
language2_text: Maniring si Yowani jira am, "O adwa so ayob am ipangazaw nyo o asa ka ayob do abo so ayob a tao. O mabsoy a tao am akman kamo so sang an."

language1_text: Then came also publicans to be baptized, and said unto him, Master, what shall we do?
language2_text: Aro a mapeyvazay so deyking a tao am kakzeben da o kataktak na jira. Am ori o nipacicyan da nya ji Yowani, "Mo Mangnanao, makongo namen so wanjin."

language1_text: And he said unto them, Exact no more than that which is appointed you.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Ji nyo peyparwa o ahapen nyo a nizpi an, do tovoyan da jinyo no seyvo."

language1_text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him, saying, And what shall we do? And he said unto them, Do violence to no man, neither accuse any falsely; and be content with your wages.
language2_text: Maniring jya o itaysang no Loma am, "Makongo namen so wanjin." Maniring jira si Yowani am, "Ji kanyo mangap so nizpi no tao an. Ji kanyo manlita an. Ikabsoy nyo rana o ipanizpi da jinyo an."

language1_text: And as the people were in expectation, and all men mused in their hearts of John, whether he were the Christ, or not;
language2_text: No kano nang am patolinen da si Yowani do nanalahen da Misayya.

language1_text: John answered, saying unto them all, I indeed baptize you with water; but one mightier than I cometh, the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose: he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire:
language2_text: Am ori o pancyan na nya ni Yowani do tao so, "Ranom o itaktak ko jinyo an. Am amyan pa so mahamahama ka nyaken a mai. Ta abwata o pacicingayan ko jya. Ta iya rana am Seyzi a kano apoy o itaktak na jinyo.
