language1_text: whose fan is in his hand, and he will throughly purge his floor, and will gather the wheat into his garner; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable.
language2_text: Yamyan do lima na so ipaninigi. So cigyan na so kadai a kapangay na so pipya kadai do peyvokavokan na a kapasleb na so ata na do jyahesep a lila no apoy."

language1_text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people.
language2_text: Abwata o ji na manmancyan ni Yowani a ivavaga na jira a kapangnanao na no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do aro a tao.

language1_text: But Herod the tetrarch, being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip's wife, and for all the evils which Herod had done,
language2_text: No kanang rana am nioya na o panirsirngen a meyngaran si Helote. Ta nitakaw na o kahanghangan ni wari na a meyngaran si Helotiya kapeyvazay na pa so aro a marahet a vazay.

language1_text: added yet this above all, that he shut up John in prison.
language2_text: So iyan na pa no makdekdeng pa raraten na, ta nyaneban na si Yowani do pamemtengan.

language1_text: Now when all the people were baptized, it came to pass, that Jesus also being baptized, and praying, the heaven was opened,
language2_text: Teyka manaktak si Yowani so aro a tao am mai si Yeso a kataktak na jya. Meynozi si Yeso am todacyangi o hanit.

language1_text: and the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him, and a voice came from heaven, which said, Thou art my beloved Son; in thee I am well pleased.
language2_text: So niyan na no Seyzi akman so hato a someyked do kataotao na. Am ori o niyan no ciriciring a nimapo do teyngato. Maniring am, "Manoyong ka Anak ko an. So sarayan ko nimo an."

language1_text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age, being (as was supposed) the son of Joseph, which was the son of Heli,
language2_text: Papwen na ni Yeso Kizisto o kapangnanao na am sikatlo (30) rana o kakawakawan na. O ipanci da no tao am anak na ni Yoseyvo si Yeso. Si Yoseyvo am anak ni Idi.

language1_text: which was the son of Matthat, which was the son of Levi, which was the son of Melchi, which was the son of Janna, which was the son of Joseph,
language2_text: Si Idi am anak ni Mata. Si Mata am anak ni Diwey. Si Diwey am anak ni Mayci. Si Mayci am anak ni Yanay. Si Yanay am anak ni Yoseyvo.

language1_text: which was the son of Mattathias, which was the son of Amos, which was the son of Naum, which was the son of Esli, which was the son of Nagge,
language2_text: Si Yoseyvo rana am anak ni Matatiya. Si Matatiya am anak ni Yamose. Si Yamose am anak ni Nahong. Si Nahong am anak ni Isdi. Si Isdi am anak ni Nakay.

language1_text: which was the son of Maath, which was the son of Mattathias, which was the son of Semei, which was the son of Joseph, which was the son of Juda,
language2_text: Si Nakay am anak ni Maat. Si Maat am anak ni Matatiya. Si Matatiya am anak ni Simey. Si Simey am anak ni Yoseke. Si Yoseke am anak ni Yeta.

language1_text: which was the son of Joanna, which was the son of Rhesa, which was the son of Zorobabel, which was the son of Salathiel, which was the son of Neri,
language2_text: Si Yeta am anak ni Yeanan. Si Yeanan am anak ni Disa. Si Disa am anak ni Solopapey. Si Solopapey am anak ni Salati. Si Salati am anak ni Nidi.

language1_text: which was the son of Melchi, which was the son of Addi, which was the son of Cosam, which was the son of Elmodam, which was the son of Er,
language2_text: Si Nidi am anak ni Mayci. Si Mayci am anak ni Ati. Si Ati am anak ni Kesang. Si Kesang am anak ni Imatan. Si Imatan am anak ni Iar.

language1_text: which was the son of Jose, which was the son of Eliezer, which was the son of Jorim, which was the son of Matthat, which was the son of Levi,
language2_text: Si Iar am anak ni Jyesoya. Si Jyesoya am anak ni Idiisya. Si Idiisya am anak ni Yeding. Si Yeding am anak ni Mata. Si Mata am anak ni Diwey.

language1_text: which was the son of Simeon, which was the son of Juda, which was the son of Joseph, which was the son of Jonan, which was the son of Eliakim,
language2_text: Si Diwey am anak ni Simoyang. Si Simoyang am anak ni Yoda. Si Yoda am anak ni Yoseyvo. Si Yoseyvo am anak ni Yenan. Si Yenan am anak ni Idiacing.

language1_text: which was the son of Melea, which was the son of Menan, which was the son of Mattatha, which was the son of Nathan, which was the son of David,
language2_text: Si Idiacing am anak ni Midiya. Si Midiya am anak ni Menna. Si Menna am anak ni Matata. Si Matata am anak ni Natan. Si Natan am anak ni Tawey.

language1_text: which was the son of Jesse, which was the son of Obed, which was the son of Booz, which was the son of Salmon, which was the son of Naasson,
language2_text: Si Tawey am anak ni Yesi. Si Yesi am anak ni Opeyte. Si Opeyte am anak ni Poatse. Si Poatse am anak ni Saarmen. Si Saarmen am anak ni Nason.

language1_text: which was the son of Aminadab, which was the son of Aram, which was the son of Esrom, which was the son of Phares, which was the son of Juda,
language2_text: Si Nason am anak ni Aminata. Si Aminata am anak ni Ateming. Si Ateming am anak ni Ani. Si Ani am anak ni Heselon. Si Heselon am anak ni Veyletse. Si Veyletse am anak ni Yoda.

language1_text: which was the son of Jacob, which was the son of Isaac, which was the son of Abraham, which was the son of Thara, which was the son of Nachor,
language2_text: Si Yoda am anak ni Yakebo. Si Yakebo am anak ni Isa. Si Isa am anak ni Apolahan. Si Apolahan am anak ni Tala. Si Tala am anak ni Nahe.

language1_text: which was the son of Saruch, which was the son of Ragau, which was the son of Phalec, which was the son of Heber, which was the son of Sala,
language2_text: Si Nahe am anak ni Silo. Si Silo am anak ni Leo. Si Leo am anak ni Veyle. Si Veyle am anak ni Sipoar. Si Sipoar am anak ni Sela.

language1_text: which was the son of Cainan, which was the son of Arphaxad, which was the son of Sem, which was the son of Noe, which was the son of Lamech,
language2_text: Si Sela am anak ni Kaynan. Si Kaynan am anak ni Avasa. Si Avasa am anak ni San. Si San am anak ni Noya. Si Noya am anak ni Lamay.

language1_text: which was the son of Mathusala, which was the son of Enoch, which was the son of Jared, which was the son of Maleleel, which was the son of Cainan,
language2_text: Si Lamay am anak ni Matosela. Si Matosela am anak ni Inok. Si Inok am anak ni Yacin. Si Yacin am anak ni Maledi. Si Maledi am anak ni Kaynan.

language1_text: which was the son of Enos, which was the son of Seth, which was the son of Adam, which was the son of God.
language2_text: Si Kaynan am anak ni Inose. Si Inose am anak ni Sete. Si Sete am anak ni Adam. Si Adam am nyamamaog ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,
language2_text: Meysinaoli si Yeso a nimapo do Yotan a ayo am oyatan no Seyzi. So nipalolwan na sya no Seyzi a yangay do kabwan no nihakawan no tao,

language1_text: being forty days tempted of the devil. And in those days he did eat nothing: and when they were ended, he afterward hungered.
language2_text: a kasikapat na ngarnan (40) so araraw do dang a littan ni Satan. So ji na nikomani do araraw. Am ori o nikakcin na.

language1_text: And the devil said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, command this stone that it be made bread.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Satan am, "No ka manoyong a Anak no Tao do to am pancyan pala o vato eya a kapeyvaliw na myanpaw."

language1_text: And Jesus answered him, saying, It is written, That man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word of God.
language2_text: Tovisan ni Yeso am, "Maniring do Seysyo am, 'Beken a kanehen o ikavyay no tao an.'"

language1_text: And the devil, taking him up into an high mountain, shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time.
language2_text: Am ori o nitanggahan na ni Yeso ni Satan do makarang a tokon a kapacita na nya jya so peykamahamahatawan na,

language1_text: And the devil said unto him, All this power will I give thee, and the glory of them: for that is delivered unto me; and to whomsoever I will I give it.
language2_text: a kapanci na nya jya so, "O yamo macita rana eya aro a peymasaodan no karawan eya am mamimin a monganay jyaken. Am cyaha, ta itoro ko jimo.

language1_text: If thou therefore wilt worship me, all shall be thine.
language2_text: Am si ilogod mo yaken a iraralay am to ko rana mimina ori a itoro jimo."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Get thee behind me, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.
language2_text: Tovisan na ni Yeso am, "Yamaniring do Seysyo am, 'Iraralay nyo o Panirsirngen a Tao do to nyo. So ika iya na no iraralay nyo. Ta abo o ikararwa na a iraralay nyo an.'"

language1_text: And he brought him to Jerusalem, and set him on a pinnacle of the temple, and said unto him, If thou be the Son of God, cast thyself down from hence:
language2_text: So niraran na pa sya yangay do Yelosaleng a kangay na nya do toktok na no rako a panaralayan da kapanci na nya jya so, "No ka manoyong a Anak no Tao do to am okso pala do teyrahem ito.

language1_text: for it is written, He shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee:
language2_text: Ta maniring do Seysyo am, 'Manovoy o Tao do to so tinsi a mangay omzat jimo.

language1_text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up, lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone.
language2_text: So tazapyan da jimo no lima da kaji na meyzazan no ai mo do vato.'"

language1_text: And Jesus answering said unto him, It is said, Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Maniring do Seysyo am, 'Ji nyo to ngileylamdama o Panirsirngen a Tao do to nyo an.'"

language1_text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation, he departed from him for a season.
language2_text: Tana to na ngakadaya ni Satan o ilita na jya am jyalitai si Yeso. Am ori o nikarwan na pa jya ni Satan.

language1_text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee: and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about.
language2_text: Meysinaoli si Yeso a mangay do Cyadidi am oyatan no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o nipeylimwang na rana no ngaran na do dang.

language1_text: And he taught in their synagogues, being glorified of all.
language2_text: So nipangnanao na rana so aro a tao do peyneynozyan da. Ori o nisarayan da nya.

language1_text: And he came to Nazareth, where he had been brought up: and, as his custom was, he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and stood up for to read.
language2_text: Makaranes si Yeso do nikarakwan na ili a meyngaran so Nasale am pangozayan na o iwawalam da. Ori o nisdep na do peyneynozyan da do araw na no ipeywalam no tao a kapeytatanek na omvilang do Seysyo.

language1_text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias. And when he had opened the book, he found the place where it was written,
language2_text: Am ori o nitorwan da nya no tao so vakong ni Isayya a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a kavezay na rana sya. So nipakakala na so asa ka ciring. O domket do dang am,

language1_text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me, Because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor; He hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted, to preach deliverance to the captives, And recovering of sight to the blind, To set at liberty them that are bruised,
language2_text: "Yanimeygegcin jyaken o Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to. Ta yana nipamnekan yaken a mangay meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do makasi a tao. Nitovoy na yaken a meylimwang no kasaway da rana no akmey kaneban a tao a kapakacita da rana no mavota tao a kasaliway da rana no peylamlamsoin da tao.

language1_text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord.
language2_text: Ipanci ko pa jira o araraw na no karilawan na nira ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And he closed the book, and he gave it again to the minister, and sat down. And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him.
language2_text: Kakookoo na rana so vakong a katoro na rana ya do tomalamozong no peyneynozyan da tao a kalisna na rana ni Yeso. So ji da meykazyazyaki no myan do sahad na tomita sya.

language1_text: And he began to say unto them, This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears.
language2_text: Am ori o iyan na rana no ciriciring na ni Yeso. Maniring jira am, "O nyo nimamizing rana nivatvatkan da do Seysyo am yamina to mangononong rana sicyaraw eya."

language1_text: And all bare him witness, and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth. And they said, Is not this Joseph's son?
language2_text: Abo tao a ji ngyak no tey yapya ciring na. So pancyan da no, "Beken a oya asyo o anak ni Yoseyvo an?"

language1_text: And he said unto them, Ye will surely say unto me this proverb, Physician, heal thyself: whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum, do also here in thy country.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ko katenngan inyo a yamapaing so ciring nyo do kamanrarakehan no kakwa a manci no, 'No ka manoyong a koysang am avavaw pala o kataotao mo.' Ta ko nimamizing do ciriciring nyo jyaken a yamanci no, 'Peyvazay pala do jya o mina vazay mo do Cyapaynong.'

language1_text: And he said, Verily I say unto you, No prophet is accepted in his own country.
language2_text: Am ko pakoyokoin pa jinyo am yabwata o yasa ka panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to do macikeylyan a yada amizngan so ciriciring.

language1_text: But I tell you of a truth, many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias, when the heaven was shut up three years and six months, when great famine was throughout all the land;
language2_text: So amizngan nyo sya an. Ta no keyyan na pa ni Idiya panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to am aro do Isedi o vao a mavakes. No kanang rana am kakteb no awan o ikapat na kawan (3½) a ji nimacimoy. Am ori o nipeykabcil na.

language1_text: but unto none of them was Elias sent, save unto Sarepta, a city of Sidon, unto a woman that was a widow.
language2_text: Am ji na novoya ni Ama ta do to si Idiya mangay do kadwan jira ang. Ta asa ka vao do Saleva a ili a macinapnap do Siton o nyangayan na.

language1_text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet; and none of them was cleansed, saving Naaman the Syrian.
language2_text: No keyyan na pa ni Idisa a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to am aro do Isedi o omlabyab so kolit. Am o meyngaran so Naman a tao do Sidiya am ori o nikeywakwakan so kataotao."

language1_text: And all they in the synagogue, when they heard these things, were filled with wrath,
language2_text: Mamizing da no aro a tao do sahad no peyneynozyan am maoya sira so aktokto.

language1_text: And rose up, and thrust him out of the city, and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built, that they might cast him down headlong.
language2_text: Am ori o nyalakan da sya a ji ngeypeypepzaci a yangay do alalasyas a vovwan a padondonen. Ta o ili da rana am amyan do toktok no tokon.

language1_text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way,
language2_text: Am kanimasabsab na ni Yeso a nikomaro do aro a tao.

language1_text: and came down to Capernaum, a city of Galilee, and taught them on the sabbath days.
language2_text: Makaranes si Yeso do Cyapaynong a macinapnap do Cyadidi am mangnanao do dang so tao do araraw no ipeywalam no tao.

language1_text: And they were astonished at his doctrine: for his word was with power.
language2_text: Abo ji meyzokab no ipangnanao na ciriciring. Ta o ciring na am tey mowyat.

language1_text: And in the synagogue there was a man, which had a spirit of an unclean devil, and cried out with a loud voice,
language2_text: Amyan do peyneynozyan da so asa ka tao amlololos a kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan. Maniring am,

language1_text: saying, Let us alone; what have we to do with thee, thou Jesus of Nazareth? art thou come to destroy us? I know thee who thou art; the Holy One of God.
language2_text: "Mo Yeso, tao do Nasale, ikongo vazay mo jyamen. Mo yamen balinasen an? Ko katenngan imo, ta imo rana am nitovoy na no Tao do to a tey yapya so nakenakem a tao."

language1_text: And Jesus rebuked him, saying, Hold thy peace, and come out of him. And when the devil had thrown him in the midst, he came out of him, and hurt him not.
language2_text: Am ori o nioyyan na nya ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Ji ka meyzezyak. Pakowbot rana do kataotao na." Ori o mina to na pazsii sya no kalamsoyan ni Satan a kazyazikaz na no kovotan a tao ang do tangain da no aro a tao. So nipakowbot na rana no kalamsoyan ni Satan am abwata o nipeyzazan na sya.

language1_text: And they were all amazed, and spake among themselves, saying, What a word is this! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits, and they come out.
language2_text: Abo tao ji meyzokab nya. So nipancyan da no, "Asyosyo o ciriciring na ang. A ikongo ori a tao, yana katey rako no oyowyat na yamamozwaw so kalamsoyan ni Satan."

language1_text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about.
language2_text: Am ori o nipeylimwangan na rana do dang no ngaran ni Yeso.

language1_text: And he arose out of the synagogue, and entered into Simon's house. And Simon's wife's mother was taken with a great fever; and they besought him for her.
language2_text: Karwan na ni Yeso o peyneynozyan da am mangay do vahay da no meyngaran so Simong. O mavakes a icyarwa ni Simong am nipadpes na. So nipasyasyan da ji Yeso.

language1_text: And he stood over her, and rebuked the fever; and it left her: and immediately she arose and ministered unto them.
language2_text: Am ori o nyangay na tomita sya. So nipeytatanek na do katangked na kasirisiring na so ingingnen na am ji na rana nipaingwat. So nipeyvangon na rana tomaotao sira.

language1_text: Now when the sun was setting, all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him; and he laid his hands on every one of them, and healed them.
language2_text: Somipsip o araw do makoyab am yai da no aro a tao o meykeyngeyngen ji Yeso kapaopta na so lima na jira ni Yeso a kapya da rana.

language1_text: And devils also came out of many, crying out, and saying, Thou art Christ the Son of God. And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak: for they knew that he was Christ.
language2_text: Meyratateng am to ngyan pa so kalamsoyan ni Satan a nimapo do kataotao da no aro a tao a omlololos a manci no, "Imo rana am Anak ka no Tao do to an." So nioyyan na nira ni Yeso a ji na mya sira meyzezyak. Ta da katenngan o ka Misayya na.

language1_text: And when it was day, he departed and went into a desert place: and the people sought him, and came unto him, and stayed him, that he should not depart from them.
language2_text: Meyzengazengang am makowbot si Yeso a kangay na do kabwan no tao. Am ori o nikalan da sya no aro a tao. So nyangay da jya, do kaji da myan sya a komaro jira.

language1_text: And he said unto them, I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also: for therefore am I sent.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Beken a inyoo an, ta pasaklangen ko o kadwan no ili a pancyan ko no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to, do kakeykai na rana tomalamozong ninyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori o peypeypangayan no na nitovoyan jyaken."

language1_text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee.
language2_text: Am ori o nyangay na mangnanao do peyneynozyan da do peycyeylilyan na do Yotay.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that, as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God, he stood by the lake of Gennesaret,
language2_text: Ipisa am meytatanek si Yeso do pamsan na no rako a meybebneng a ranom a ngaranan da so Kenisale. Am meysilisilin sira o aro a tao a omamizing so ononongan na ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and saw two ships standing by the lake: but the fishermen were gone out of them, and were washing their nets.
language2_text: Meyratateng am macita na o adwa ka vazangay do pamsan na nipeygegcinan no nimangahahap a tao a omoyas do tawaz da.

language1_text: And he entered into one of the ships, which was Simon's, and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land. And he sat down, and taught the people out of the ship.
language2_text: Meyratateng am somakay si Yeso do vazangay na ni Simong a kapanci na nya komaod sya. Am ori o nikaodan na sya a mapahawang sya do pamsan na so alikey. Meyratateng am amlisna si Yeso do vazangay a kananao na sira so aro a tao.

language1_text: Now when he had left speaking, he said unto Simon, Launch out into the deep, and let down your nets for a draught.
language2_text: Iptad na o ciring na am maniring ji Simong am, "Pakarairain mo pa o kaodan mo sya kazoyo nyo no tawaz nyo."

language1_text: And Simon answering said unto him, Master, we have toiled all the night, and have taken nothing: nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net.
language2_text: Maniring si Simong am, "Mo Mangnanao, namen todazikna yakasahep a yameytawaz am yabwata namen nimamong. Am tana amizngen ko pala o ciring mo amzoyo no tawaz ko."

language1_text: And when they had this done, they inclosed a great multitude of fishes: and their net brake.
language2_text: Am ori o nizoywan da rana no tawaz da. So nipakatawaz da so aro among a kaji na pisipisingan rana no tawaz da.

language1_text: And they beckoned unto their partners, which were in the other ship, that they should come and help them. And they came, and filled both the ships, so that they began to sink.
language2_text: Am ori o niraran da so kararay da somidong sira. Meyratateng am nipno da o adwa ka vazangay kaji na ranangnedan rana.

language1_text: When Simon Peter saw it, he fell down at Jesus' knees, saying, Depart from me; for I am a sinful man, O Lord.
language2_text: Macita na ori ni Simong Pite am meylilitod do tangain na ni Yeso a manci no, "Mo Panirsirngen, to mo na ngaroi yaken an. Ta ko meyraraten a tao an."

language1_text: For he was astonished, and all that were with him, at the draught of the fishes which they had taken:
language2_text: Si Simong rana kano kararay na tao am niyak da no mata o nimatawaz da aro among.

language1_text: and so was also James, and John, the sons of Zebedee, which were partners with Simon. And Jesus said unto Simon, Fear not; from henceforth thou shalt catch men.
language2_text: O anak ni Sipitay a meyngaran si Yake a kani Yowani am akman sira so sang a omyak nya. Maniring si Yeso ji Simong am, "Ji ka nyahey an, ta papwen mo sicyaraw eya o kakma moy mangahahap a tao a mapanop so aro a tao."

language1_text: And when they had brought their ships to land, they forsook all, and followed him.
language2_text: So nipangid da rana kakaro da do aro a ipangahap da a macilolo rana ji Yeso.

language1_text: And it came to pass, when he was in a certain city, behold a man full of leprosy: who seeing Jesus fell on his face, and besought him, saying, Lord, if thou wilt, thou canst make me clean.
language2_text: Ipisa si Yeso amyan do asa ka ili am makacita so omlabyab so kolit a tao. Macita na si Yeso am mangay meylilitod do tangain na mapasyasi jya. Maniring am, "No si apyahen mo am jyabo kaji na apyan no kataotao ko a."

language1_text: And he put forth his hand, and touched him, saying, I will: be thou clean. And immediately the leprosy departed from him.
language2_text: So niparapongan na so lima na jya ni Yeso a kapanci na no, "Ko apyahen. Apya rana o kataotao mo." So ji na meyyahahai a nimapya no kolit na.

language1_text: And he charged him to tell no man: but go, and shew thyself to the priest, and offer for thy cleansing, according as Moses commanded, for a testimony unto them.
language2_text: Pakoyokoin ni Yeso do tao ori am, "Ji mo meycicicyan an. Ta yangay mo ipacita do mapatanatanang so nakem ta si Ama ta do to a tao a kavalivaliw na so kataotao mo a kapangozay mo do iwawalam na ni Moyse a mapatanang so nakem mo ji Ama ta do to. So anoyngan da jimo no tao a nimapya rana so kataotao."

language1_text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him: and great multitudes came together to hear, and to be healed by him of their infirmities.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ori o nipeylimwang na rana no ngaran na ni Yeso do dang. So nipeylovolovot da no aro a tao a omamizing so nanao na makza no keywakwak do kataotao da.

language1_text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness, and prayed.
language2_text: Am masangib si Yeso a komaro jira mangay a meynozi do kabwan no tao.

language1_text: And it came to pass on a certain day, as he was teaching, that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by, which were come out of every town of Galilee, and Judæ a, and Jerusalem: and the power of the Lord was present to heal them.
language2_text: Ipisa mangnanao si Yeso am amyan so makanateng a tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to. Sira rana ori am nimapo sira do Yelosaleng a kado peycyeylilyan na do Cyadidi a kado Yotay. Ikongo do nioyatan na ni Ama ta do to si Yeso, am ori o nipangiwakwak na so meykeyngeyngen a tao.

language1_text: And, behold, men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy: and they sought means to bring him in, and to lay him before him.
language2_text: Amyan so nyai da a ji makapeyvangon a tao do ireyrayan na. So vovwan da jya isdep do tangain na ni Yeso.

language1_text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude, they went upon the housetop, and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus.
language2_text: Ikongo do tey yaro tao, am ori o ji da makasdepi nya. Meyratateng am to da rana ngalatan do atep no vahay a kakabkab da so atep na katonton da sya pazomtaden do tangain na ni Yeso.

language1_text: And when he saw their faith, he said unto him, Man, thy sins are forgiven thee.
language2_text: Makazazap na ni Yeso o onowned da a omanoyong jya. Am ori o nipancyan na nya jya so, "Imo rana am yarana nimavonas o raraten mo."

language1_text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason, saying, Who is this which speaketh blasphemies? Who can forgive sins, but God alone?
language2_text: Am ori o nikazyakan da nya no tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to. So nipancyan da no, "Sinosino o tao eya a yato nazovaz si Ama ta do to. Ta si Ama ta do to saon o makavonas so raraten no tao."

language1_text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts, he answering said unto them, What reason ye in your hearts?
language2_text: Katenngan na ni Yeso o nakenakem da. Am ori o nipeycirngan na jira so, "Ikongo nyo ikakman sang so nakenakem.

language1_text: Whether is easier, to say, Thy sins be forgiven thee; or to say, Rise up and walk?
language2_text: Manngwa, apyapya o kapanci nya do meyngen a tao so, 'Yanimavonas rana o raraten mo'? No apyapya o kapanci no, 'Tanek rana kalam mo rana.'

language1_text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins, (he said unto the sick of the palsy, ) I say unto thee, Arise, and take up thy couch, and go into thine house.
language2_text: Ta ko kakzeben inyo a makateneng do oyowyat ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a makavonas so raraten no tao. So pancyan ko nya do meyngen a tao so, 'Tanek rana kahap mo so ireyrayan mo a mangay rana do vahay nyo.'"

language1_text: And immediately he rose up before them, and took up that whereon he lay, and departed to his own house, glorifying God.
language2_text: So mina to na meytatanki no tao ang do tangain da no aro a tao a kahap na rana so ireyrayan na somaray nya ji Ama ta do to a mangay rana do vahay da.

language1_text: And they were all amazed, and they glorified God, and were filled with fear, saying, We have seen strange things to day.
language2_text: So nipeyzokaban da nya no aro a tao a isaray ji Ama ta do to a manci no, "Sicyaraw rana ya am yanamen nimakacita so yamapeyzokab a vazay."

language1_text: And after these things he went forth, and saw a publican, named Levi, sitting at the receipt of custom: and he said unto him, Follow me.
language2_text: Makowbot si Yeso am makacita so asa ka mapeyvazay so deyking a tao a meyngaran si Diwey a amlisna do torotorwan no deyking a vahay. Maniring jya am, "Macilolo ka jyaken an."

language1_text: And he left all, rose up, and followed him.
language2_text: So nikarwan na rana do vazay na kapacilolo na rana jya.

language1_text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house: and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them.
language2_text: Meyratateng am taotawwen na si Yeso do vahay da. So ikaro no macitovong jira mapeyvazay so deyking a kano karwan no tao a macyakan jira.

language1_text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples, saying, Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners?
language2_text: Ori o nikazyakan da nya no tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o nipancyan da nya do macinanao ji Yeso so, "Ikongo nyo ipacihanghang do mangangap so deyking a kano aro a meyraraten a tao."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said unto them, They that are whole need not a physician; but they that are sick.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "O apiya so kataotao am ji da ngala o koysang an. Ta o meyngen a tao am ori o komala sya.

language1_text: I came not to call the righteous, but sinners to repentance.
language2_text: Ta yaken rana am beken a ko manara so ji meyraraten a tao an. Ta vazay ko o kapanci ko no meyraraten a tao a mamlis so nakenakem an."

language1_text: And they said unto him, Why do the disciples of John fast often, and make prayers, and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees; but thine eat and drink?
language2_text: Yamyan so tao a manci nya ji Yeso. Maniring am, "O macinanao ji Yowani am masangib sira ji mangakaday a meynozi. Yakman sang o yamacinanao do tao a macyagom do Vadisay. Am o yamacinanao jimo mo Yeso am yabo da ji nganakanna."

language1_text: And he said unto them, Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast, while the bridegroom is with them?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Manngwa, no mamaring sira so kanen o matarek so vahay a tao am ji nyo mya sira o tao da koman? Jyabo kakman na sang a.

language1_text: But the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them, and then shall they fast in those days.
language2_text: No marateng rana o araraw na no irakep da so mahakay am, ori rana o ikanoyong da ji mangakaday."

language1_text: And he spake also a parable unto them; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old; if otherwise, then both the new maketh a rent, and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old.
language2_text: Mangononong pa jira so pehngehngayan na sya so ciring. Maniring am, "Abo o tao a mising so vayo ayob a mangay mapatapang sya do adan na ayob. Ta ikaraherahet na no vayo ayob a mapisipising. Jyabo kapacingay no adan a ayob do vayo a ayob a.

language1_text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles; else the new wine will burst the bottles, and be spilled, and the bottles shall perish.
language2_text: Yabo tao a mangap so vayo a potaw cyo a paglowen do adan a niparing a kolit no baka, ta zombak.

language1_text: But new wine must be put into new bottles; and both are preserved.
language2_text: Am ori an, o paglowan so vayo a potaw cyo do vayo a kolit no baka an.

language1_text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new: for he saith, The old is better.
language2_text: Abo tao a nimyop rana so adan a potaw cyo a keyyop na pa so vayo a potaw cyo. Ta ji na tahamtam o kapyapya pa no adan a potaw cyo."

language1_text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first, that he went through the corn fields; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn, and did eat, rubbing them in their hands.
language2_text: Ipisa kapeywalam no tao am mangonong sira Yeso a kano macinanao jya do nihakawan a mogi. Am to sira mangoztod so aknatahen da no macinanao ji Yeso.

language1_text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them, Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days?
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao a macyagom do Vadisay am, "Adan rana o akman sang a vazay do ipeywalam no tao?"

language1_text: And Jesus answering them said, Have ye not read so much as this, what David did, when himself was an hungred, and they which were with him;
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Manngwa, ji nyo pa nivilangan o vazay da da Tawey a kano kararay na tao no kakcin da?

language1_text: how he went into the house of God, and did take and eat the shewbread, and gave also to them that were with him; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone?
language2_text: Ta nisomdep si Tawey do raralayan da ni Ama ta do to a kapangap na so nipatanang da myanpaw a kanen a katoro na pa nya do kararay na. So nyakanan da sya. Ta o myanpaw rana ori am ji da mya kanen no tao. O mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to o apya koman sya. Am beken a raraten da o mina kakan da sya."

language1_text: And he said unto them, That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath.
language2_text: Maniring pa jira si Yeso am, "O Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao o meymatmatngeh no araraw no ipeywalam no tao."

language1_text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath, that he entered into the synagogue and taught: and there was a man whose right hand was withered.
language2_text: Ipisa kapeywalam no tao am somdep si Yeso do peyneynozyan da mangnanao so tao. Am amyan dang so asa ka tao a meykazakazain so lima do wanan na.

language1_text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him, whether he would heal on the sabbath day; that they might find an accusation against him.
language2_text: O mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am kalahen da o karatan na ni Yeso. "Manngo paro, ala mangiwakwak so meykeyngeyngen do ipeywalam no tao ang. Ta no si myan am ipanci ta do karwan no tao."

language1_text: But he knew their thoughts, and said to the man which had the withered hand, Rise up, and stand forth in the midst. And he arose and stood forth.
language2_text: Ikongo do mahaw na ni Yeso o onowned da, am ori o nipancyan na nya do meykazakazain so lima tao. Maniring am, "Peytatanek rana kangay mo do tangain da no aro a tao." Am ori o nipeytatanek na rana.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto them, I will ask you one thing; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good, or to do evil? to save life, or to destroy it?
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Ko inyo pacicyan am ikongo iwawalam ta do ipeywalam no tao. Ikongo ciriciring da jyaten do ipeywalam no tao. Apyapya o kapanidong so tao do ipeywalam no tao an? No apyapya o kaji mamyayan so tao. Avyain sira? No wakwaken sira."

language1_text: And looking round about upon them all, he said unto the man, Stretch forth thy hand. And he did so: and his hand was restored whole as the other.
language2_text: Am ori o nicittan na so aro a tao a kapanci na nya do tao ang so, "Zanet pala o lima mo." Zaneten na am todapya rana.

language1_text: And they were filled with madness; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus.
language2_text: Ori o nikarakorako na pa no kaoyyan da ni Yeso. Am ori o nipeysirisiring da do ahapan da sya.

language1_text: And it came to pass in those days, that he went out into a mountain to pray, and continued all night in prayer to God.
language2_text: Ipisa mangay meynozi do tokon si Yeso. So mina to na ngyani rana do dang a kasahep.

language1_text: And when it was day, he called unto him his disciples: and of them he chose twelve, whom also he named apostles;
language2_text: Apnezak am lovoten na sira o macinanao jya kapamnek na jira so rarwa so ikakarwan (12) a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: Simon, (whom he also named Peter, ) and Andrew his brother, James and John, Philip and Bartholomew,
language2_text: Sira rana ori am si Simong a ningaranan na si Pite a kani wari na meyngaran si Antele a kani Yake a kani Yowani a kani Veydipo a kani Patolomaw,

language1_text: Matthew and Thomas, James the son of Alphæ us, and Simon called Zelotes,
language2_text: a kani Matay a kani Tomase a kano anak ni Alevey a meyngaran si Yake a kano ipanci da macyagom do macioya do Loma a meyngaran si Simong,

language1_text: and Judas the brother of James, and Judas Iscariot, which also was the traitor.
language2_text: a kano anak ni Yake a meyngaran si Yota kano nimanazang ni Yeso a tao do Isecyadi a meyngaran si Yota.

language1_text: And he came down with them, and stood in the plain, and the company of his disciples, and a great multitude of people out of all Judæ a and Jerusalem, and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon, which came to hear him, and to be healed of their diseases;
language2_text: Omosok rana sira am meytatanek sira do rako a karatayan. So niyan da do dang no aro a macilocilolo jya kano aro a nimapo do Yelosaleng a kano peycyeylilyan na do Yotay a kano masngen do awa a ili a meyngaran so Tayar a kano Siton,

language1_text: and they that were vexed with unclean spirits: and they were healed.
language2_text: a mai a omamizing so ipangnanao na, kapangiwakwak na so ingingnen no tao. O nikovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan am mai sira. Ori o nikapya da rana.

language1_text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him: for there went virtue out of him, and healed them all.
language2_text: Ori o naknakman da sya no aro a tao so kapinan da jya. Ta amyan so oyowyat na do kataotao na mangiwakwak so tao. So nikamimin da mapya rana so ingingnen.

language1_text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples, and said, Blessed be ye poor: for your's is the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Citahen na ni Yeso o macinanao jya am ipanci na jira, "Inyo rana a ipangoyongoyod da tao am rakorako rana o sarasaray nyo, ta inyo o italamozong na ni Ama ta do to an.

language1_text: Blessed are ye that hunger now: for ye shall be filled. Blessed are ye that weep now: for ye shall laugh.
language2_text: "Inyo rana yamakcin sicyakwaya am manoyong o kasaray nyo, ta mabsoy kamo na." Inyo rana yamlavi sicyakwaya am manoyong o kasaray nyo an, ta mangay na pasarain inyo ni Ama ta do to an.

language1_text: Blessed are ye, when men shall hate you, and when they shall separate you from their company, and shall reproach you, and cast out your name as evil, for the Son of man's sake.
language2_text: "No ikaoya da inyo a ji da raralayan a kapanyanig da jinyo do kararalay nyo nyaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am manoyong o kasaray nyo an.

language1_text: Rejoice ye in that day, and leap for joy: for, behold, your reward is great in heaven: for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets.
language2_text: Ta akman so sang o nakenakem da no ineynapo da no kakwa do panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. Magaga kamo a somaray so onowned an. Ta amyan so arakorako pa ipasaray na jinyo ni Ama ta do to do teyngato an.

language1_text: But woe unto you that are rich! for ye have received your consolation.
language2_text: "Am inyo rana aro so peymeymasaodan sicyakwaya am to kamo makasi no makwa an. Ta yanyo na nimataptap o ileylamnay nyo an.

language1_text: Woe unto you that are full! for ye shall hunger. Woe unto you that laugh now! for ye shall mourn and weep.
language2_text: "Inyo rana mabsoy sicyakwaya am to kamo makasi no makwa an, ta mangay o kakcin nyo an." Inyo rana yasomaray sicyakwaya am to kamo makasi no makwa an, ta mangay o kalavi no onowned nyo an.

language1_text: Woe unto you, when all men shall speak well of you! for so did their fathers to the false prophets.
language2_text: "No azwazwain da inyo no aro a tao am to kamo makasi no makwa an, ta akman sang o nyazwayan da no ineynapo nyo so nimalas so ipangnanao a tao no kakwa an.

language1_text: But I say unto you which hear, Love your enemies, do good to them which hate you,
language2_text: "Am inyo rana yaomamizing so ciring ko am ko pa pakoyokoin jinyo am ikarilaw nyo o macioya jinyo a tao a kapakapya nyo so nakenakem nyo jira an.

language1_text: bless them that curse you, and pray for them which despitefully use you.
language2_text: Ipeynozi nyo o maniriciring jinyo a tao an. So peynozyan nyo no tomamwad jinyo a tao an.

language1_text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also.
language2_text: No myan so tao a somiplang so posngi mo am itoro mo o asa ka posngi mo an. No myan so tao a mehes so ayob mo am itoro mo o katapil na an.

language1_text: Give to every man that asketh of thee; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again.
language2_text: No myan so amin da jimo am itoro mo an. No myan so mahap so apzapzatan mo am ji mo ngamya jira an.

language1_text: And as ye would that men should do to you, do ye also to them likewise.
language2_text: No si kakzeben mo o kapya da so nakem jimo no icyatatao mo am akman sang o nakem mo jira an.

language1_text: For if ye love them which love you, what thank have ye? for sinners also love those that love them.
language2_text: "Ta ikongo angangayan na no karilaw nyo no marilaw ninyo a tao. Kakwakwan no meyraraten a tao a marilaw no marilaw nira tao.

language1_text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you, what thank have ye? for sinners also do even the same.
language2_text: Ikongo angangayan na no kaveyvow nyo sya ikarilaw so makasidong jinyo a tao. Kakwakwan na no meyraraten a tao a marilaw no makasidong sira tao.

language1_text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive, what thank have ye? for sinners also lend to sinners, to receive as much again.
language2_text: Ikongo angangayan na no kaveyvow nyo so makanizpi a tao a omvood so nizpi nyo. Kakwakwan da no meyraraten a tao a tomoro no nizpi da vooden no icyatatao da. Ta katenngan da o kapaoli da pa jira.

language1_text: But love ye your enemies, and do good, and lend, hoping for nothing again; and your reward shall be great, and ye shall be the children of the Highest: for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil.
language2_text: So karilawan nyo no macioya jinyo a tao an. Makapya kamo so nakem jira an. O nivood da jinyo am ji nyo naknakma o kapaoli da sya jinyo an. Ta arakorako rana o nakem na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. So ipeyngongyod nyo anak na no tey mazway a Tao do to. Ta ikarilaw na ni Ama ta do to o ji naray no itoro na jira. Ikarilaw na o meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: Be ye therefore merciful, as your Father also is merciful.
language2_text: So inaran nyo si Ama nyo do to a tey yapya so nakenakem an.

language1_text: Judge not, and ye shall not be judged: condemn not, and ye shall not be condemned: forgive, and ye shall be forgiven:
language2_text: "Ji kamo manraherahet so icyatatao nyo an. No si manraherahet kamo so icyatatao nyo am akman kamo sang a raheraheten da. Ji nyo mancyan o karatan no tao, ta ori o icyakman nyo sang a ji da raheraheta no tao. Peykabobwen nyo o raraten da jinyo an. So icyakman nyo so sang a peykabobwen da so raraten no tao an.

language1_text: give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again.
language2_text: Mazonos kamo do tao an. Ta ori o ikazonos da jinyo no tao. So ikaharahara na pa no itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta o nakenakem nyo so tao am akman sang o nakenakem na jinyo ni Ama ta do to an."

language1_text: And he spake a parable unto them, Can the blind lead the blind? shall they not both fall into the ditch?
language2_text: So nipancyan na nya jira so pehngehngayan na sya. Maniring am, "Jyabo o kapangalay no mavota tao so mavotaha. Ta jyabo kaji da meynanodan a matazangeb a.

language1_text: The disciple is not above his master: but every one that is perfect shall be as his master.
language2_text: O macyamizing rana am jyakarakarang a kano mangnanao. Am no gomcin rana ori am ori o ipacingay da do mangnanao so teneteneng.

language1_text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother's eye, but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye?
language2_text: "Ikongo nyo pacivalalan do da karatan no kadwan jinyo a yanyo kaji makalavatan so nyo karatan.

language1_text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother, Brother, let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye, when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye? Thou hypocrite, cast out first the beam out of thine own eye, and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother's eye.
language2_text: Yanyo kapanci no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai a omlis do marahet a nakenakem da am nyo jiblisi o marahet a nakenakem nyo. Inyo rana mapakapyapya so nakenakem a tao am manmanma o kablis nyo so karatan nyo. Ta ori o ipakacita nyo so karatan no kadwan jinyo an.

language1_text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.
language2_text: "Ji meyyasi o pipya kayo so marahet an. O marahet a kayo am ji to meyyasi so pipya asyasi no kayo an.

language1_text: For every tree is known by his own fruit. For of thorns men do not gather figs, nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes.
language2_text: Ta to macilocilolo do kakayokayo na o asi na. Jyabo kato nyo mamozasan do tazici so potaw a.

language1_text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil: for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh.
language2_text: O apya so nakenakem a tao am apya o iwawalam na. O marahet so nakenakem a tao am marahet o iwawalam na. Ta to macilocilolo do onowned no tao o ipanci na ciring an.

language1_text: And why call ye me, Lord, Lord, and do not the things which I say?
language2_text: "Ikongo nyo pancyan no nyo kanoyong jyaken a Panirsirngen nyo a yanyo ji mangozay do ciring ko jinyo.

language1_text: Whosoever cometh to me, and heareth my sayings, and doeth them, I will shew you to whom he is like:
language2_text: Omamizing so ciring ko kapeyvazay na sya am ipanci ko jinyo o akman sang so nakenakem a tao an.

language1_text: he is like a man which built an house, and digged deep, and laid the foundation on a rock: and when the flood arose, the stream beat vehemently upon that house, and could not shake it: for it was founded upon a rock.
language2_text: Ori rana am akman so mamaring so vahay a tao a mapakarahem so patakadan na so soil na. So ikehni no vahay a paringen na. Tana meyyagaganas am ji na gonagonay o vahay ang, ta mehni o nipakapyan na sya.

language1_text: But he that heareth, and doeth not, is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth; against which the stream did beat vehemently, and immediately it fell; and the ruin of that house was great.
language2_text: Am omamizing so ciring ko a ji mangozay jya am akman so tao a mamaring so vahay a ji mapangay so soil na. No meyyagaganas am makeykai a balinasen na. So ikabwata no angangayan na rana."

language1_text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people, he entered into Capernaum.
language2_text: Mavitos o ciring na ni Yeso do aro a tao am mangay rana do Cyapaynong.

language1_text: And a certain centurion's servant, who was dear unto him, was sick, and ready to die.
language2_text: Amyan dang so mimong no asa poo (100) a itaysang no Loma. Iya rana am amyan so asa ka ney kaglaw na lamlamsoy na meyngen a toda jyangangay so inawan.

language1_text: And when he heard of Jesus, he sent unto him the elders of the Jews, beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant.
language2_text: Mamizing no mimong no itaysang no Loma o vazay na ni Yeso am tovoin na o makanateng a kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay a mangay manci ni Yeso a omiwakwak do lamlamsoy na.

language1_text: And when they came to Jesus, they besought him instantly, saying, That he was worthy for whom he should do this:
language2_text: Makaranes sira ji Yeso am mapasyasi rana sira jya. Maniring sira am, "Manoyong o mimong no itaysang no Loma a sidongen mo pa an.

language1_text: for he loveth our nation, and he hath built us a synagogue.
language2_text: Ta na apzatan yamen a tao do Yotay. Nipamaring na yamen so peyneynozyan namen."

language1_text: Then Jesus went with them. And when he was now not far from the house, the centurion sent friends to him, saying unto him, Lord, trouble not thyself: for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof:
language2_text: Meyratateng am macihza rana jira si Yeso. Alikey rana kapakaranes da am manovoy o mimong no itaysang no Loma so kagagan na manci ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, to mo a zikziknan o kai mo do vahay namen mo keypong.

language1_text: wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee: but say in a word, and my servant shall be healed.
language2_text: Am ori o namen ikasnek a manci nimo. Tana asa o ciring mo am jyabo o kaji na apyan no lamlamsoy ko a.

language1_text: For I also am a man set under authority, having under me soldiers, and I say unto one, Go, and he goeth; and to another, Come, and he cometh; and to my servant, Do this, and he doeth it.
language2_text: Akman jyaken a yaomamizing so ciring no makarakarang pa ka nyaken a itaysang no Loma a da kamizing jyaken no yamavevevehan pa ka nyaken a itaysang. No yamyan so ko tovoin a mangay am da to ngonoci yaken. No yamyan so ko ipanci a mai am yato ngai. No ko tovoin o lamlamsoy ko a meyvazay am yato meyvazay. So na ikakman sang no ciring mo a tey mowyat a makavonas so ingingnen no tao."

language1_text: When Jesus heard these things, he marvelled at him, and turned him about, and said unto the people that followed him, I say unto you, I have not found so great faith, no, not in Israel.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Yeso o ciriciring na am niyak na. So nipancyan na nya do macihza jya tao. Maniring am, "Ji ko pa nimakacita so akman sang so kakdekdeng no onowned do Isedi a tao."

language1_text: And they that were sent, returning to the house, found the servant whole that had been sick.
language2_text: Meysinaoli sira o nitovoy no meynakem a tao do vahay da am macita da o lamlamsoy na makownong rana jya.

language1_text: And it came to pass the day after, that he went into a city called Nain; and many of his disciples went with him, and much people.
language2_text: Ji meyyonownay am mangay si Yeso do Nain a ili a onotan da no macinanao jya kano aro a tao.

language1_text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city, behold, there was a dead man carried out, the only son of his mother, and she was a widow: and much people of the city was with her.
language2_text: Makaranes do samorangan no ili da am masinmo na o somibo no nimawakwak a tao. O nimawakwak rana mahakay am veyvowen na anak no vao a mavakes. So nikaro no tao a niomonong do inawan na.

language1_text: And when the Lord saw her, he had compassion on her, and said unto her, Weep not.
language2_text: Macita na ni Yeso o vao a mavakes amlavi so onowned. Am ori o nikasyan na nya. Maniring jya am, "Ji ka lavi an."

language1_text: And he came and touched the bier: and they that bare him stood still. And he said, Young man, I say unto thee, Arise.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangay na rana pinanan o nipayan da sya. Ori o niseyked da no niomonong do inawan na. Maniring si Yeso am, "Imo rana malavayo a tao am peyvangon rana."

language1_text: And he that was dead sat up, and began to speak. And he delivered him to his mother.
language2_text: Ori o nipeyvangon na rana mavyay kapeyzezyak na rana kangay na rana nya ni Yeso do ina na.

language1_text: And there came a fear on all: and they glorified God, saying, That a great prophet is risen up among us; and, That God hath visited his people.
language2_text: Ori o nisavasavakan da nya no aro a tao a kasaray da nya ji Ama ta do to. So peycirngan da so, "Oyod a myan jyaten so panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to." Maniring sira pa am, "Yanimakaranes rana o yamapatazadang jyaten."

language1_text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judæ a, and throughout all the region round about.
language2_text: Ori o nipeylimwangan da nya no akman sang a vazay na ni Yeso do peycyeylilyan na do Yotay a kado livolivon no pongso da.

language1_text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things.
language2_text: O aro a vazay ni Yeso am nipanci da ji Yowani no macinanao jya. So niraran na so rarwa jira,

language1_text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus, saying, Art thou he that should come? or look we for another?
language2_text: katovoy na sira mangay ji Yeso a manci no, "Manngwa, imo o nipanci ni Yowani a mai? No namen pa nanalahen."

language1_text: When the men were come unto him, they said, John Baptist hath sent us unto thee, saying, Art thou he that should come? or look we for another?
language2_text: Maniring sira o rarwa do tangain ni Yeso am, "Na nitovoy yamen no nimanaktak a si Yowani a mai a mapacici jimo. Manngwa, imo o nipanci ni Yowani a mai? No namen pa nanalahen."

language1_text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues, and of evil spirits; and unto many that were blind he gave sight.
language2_text: Nimacinao no kano nang o kaniomiwakwak na ni Yeso so aro a meykeyngeyngen a kano kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan a tao a kano mavota a tao.

language1_text: Then Jesus answering said unto them, Go your way, and tell John what things ye have seen and heard; how that the blind see, the lame walk, the lepers are cleansed, the deaf hear, the dead are raised, to the poor the gospel is preached.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do nitovoy ni Yowani am, "Angay kamo pancyan ji Yowani o nyo nimacita kano nyo nimamizing, do yada kapakacita rana no nimavota tao. Da kapakalam rana no nimakasapa a tao. Yada kapya rana no niomlabyab so kolit a tao. Da kapakamizing rana no nimateleh a tao. Da kavyay rana no nimawakwak a tao. Da kapakamizing rana so Mapasaray a Ciriciring no ipangoyongoyod da tao.

language1_text: And blessed is he, whosoever shall not be offended in me.
language2_text: Omanoyong jyaken a ji meykarwa so nakem am tey yapya ori."

language1_text: And when the messengers of John were departed, he began to speak unto the people concerning John, What went ye out into the wilderness for to see? A reed shaken with the wind?
language2_text: Mangay rana o nitovoy ni Yowani am ipanci na ni Yeso o vazay na ni Yowani do aro a tao. Maniring jira am, "No kangay nyo no kakwa komala si Yowani do kabwan no nihakawan no tao am sino dang mangay nyo amizngen. Manngwa, nyo ipanci si Yowani a todapliplin so onowned?

language1_text: But what went ye out for to see? A man clothed in soft raiment? Behold, they which are gorgeously apparelled, and live delicately, are in kings' courts.
language2_text: Manngwa, nyo mangay citahen o meyyayob so apiya ayob a tao? Ta o meyyayob rana so pipya ayob am myan sira do vahay no panirsirngen.

language1_text: But what went ye out for to see? A prophet? Yea, I say unto you, and much more than a prophet.
language2_text: Ikongo nyo yangay do dang. Manngwa, nyo mangay citahen o panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to? Ko pa ciring jinyo am manoyong ori. Am naknakmen nyo an, ta yamahamahama si Yowani a kano panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa an.

language1_text: This is he, of whom it is written, Behold, I send my messenger before thy face, which shall prepare thy way before thee.
language2_text: Iya rana am yamyan so yamonganay jya a yadomket do Seysyo. O ciring do dang am, 'Cita pala o yako tovoin a omwadwad do rarahan mo.'

language1_text: For I say unto you, Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist: but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he.
language2_text: O ko ipanci jinyo am yabo o tao no kakwa a makahap si Yowani. Am yawara sicyakwaya am yarana maizaizay o ney maveveh na tao do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yowani an."

language1_text: And all the people that heard him, and the publicans, justified God, being baptized with the baptism of John.
language2_text: Omamizing so nanao ni Yeso aro a tao a kano mapeyvazay so deyking a tao am isaray da ji Ama ta do to. Sira rana ori am nitaktakan na sira ni Yowani no kakwa pa.

language1_text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves, being not baptized of him.
language2_text: Am o tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a jya nimya so kataktak na jira ni Yowani am nitaosya da o nakenakem na sira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And the Lord said, Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation? and to what are they like?
language2_text: Maniring pa jira si Yeso am, "Ikongo o pehngehngayan ko so tao sicyakwaya.

language1_text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace, and calling one to another, and saying, We have piped unto you, and ye have not danced; we have mourned to you, and ye have not wept.
language2_text: Sira ori am akmey kanakan a meyyalalam do rarahan a manci no, 'Namen ipeyyanwanood inyo am kanyo ji maganam. Namen amlavi am kanyo ji lavi.'

language1_text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine; and ye say, He hath a devil.
language2_text: Mai rana o nimanaktak a si Yowani am ji mangakaday no tomakatakaw do kanakenakem na si Ama ta do to a jya nimyop so saki. So nipancyan nyo nya zomyak.

language1_text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking; and ye say, Behold a gluttonous man, and a winebibber, a friend of publicans and sinners!
language2_text: Yaken rana Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am ko koman a ko keyyop. Am no kamo maniring am, 'Yamatetehnan a yameyyeyyopen a yamacizavoz do mapeyvazay so deyking a tao a kano meyraraten a tao.'

language1_text: But wisdom is justified of all her children.
language2_text: Am o teneteneng na ni Ama ta do to am manoyong a meytotwaw do makza nya tao an."

language1_text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him. And he went into the Pharisee's house, and sat down to meat.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tao a macyagom do Vadisay a tomaotao si Yeso do vahay da.

language1_text: And, behold, a woman in the city, which was a sinner, when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee's house, brought an alabaster box of ointment,
language2_text: No kanang am amyan do ili da so asa ka mavakes a meyraraten. Mamizing na si Yeso amyan do vahay da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay am mangai so asa ka tagaw a mahangno a ipeykeykoris,

language1_text: and stood at his feet behind him weeping, and began to wash his feet with tears, and did wipe them with the hairs of her head, and kissed his feet, and anointed them with the ointment.
language2_text: a meytatanek do likod ni Yeso a omoton do ai na amlavi. So nipeyranap na no kaoo na do ai ni Yeso. Meyratateng am linasan na no avok na kahangno na so ai na kakoris na rana jya no mahangno a ipeykeykoris.

language1_text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it, he spake within himself, saying, This man, if he were a prophet, would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him: for she is a sinner.
language2_text: Macita na no tomaotao si Yeso a tao a macyagom do Vadisay am naknakmen na do onowned na am, "No yamanoyong o tao eya yapo ji Ama ta do to am jyabo na kaji makatenngan do vazay na no yaminan jya mavakes eya."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said unto him, Simon, I have somewhat to say unto thee. And he saith, Master, say on.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo Simong, yamyan so ko ipanci jimo." Maniring si Simong ji Yeso am, "Pancyan pala."

language1_text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors: the one owed five hundred pence, and the other fifty.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Amyan so rarwa ka tao a nimamood so nizpi do asa ka lawpan. O asa ka tao am mamood so alima ranaw (500). O karwan na am mamood so alima poo (50).

language1_text: And when they had nothing to pay, he frankly forgave them both. Tell me therefore, which of them will love him most?
language2_text: Ikongo do abwata o nizpi da paolin da do nivood da, am ikasi na sira no lawpan, kato na rana mapeykabobowan so nivood da. Naknakmen nyo pala. Sino jira ori omaglaglaw pa no lawpan da."

language1_text: Simon answered and said, I suppose that he, to whom he forgave most. And he said unto him, Thou hast rightly judged.
language2_text: Maniring si Simong am, "Ko naknakmen am o nimamood so arwaro ang. Ta nipeykabobo na o nivood na." Maniring si Yeso am, "Ka manoyong so ipanci."

language1_text: And he turned to the woman, and said unto Simon, Seest thou this woman? I entered into thine house, thou gavest me no water for my feet: but she hath washed my feet with tears, and wiped them with the hairs of her head.
language2_text: So nicittan na so mavakes a kapanci na nya ji Simong so, "Mo macita o mavakes eya? Am ko somdep do vahay nyo am mo ji nipanta yaken so ranom a pangoyowyasan ko. Am iya am yana nioyasan no kaoo na o ai ko a na kalinas jya no avok na.

language1_text: Thou gavest me no kiss: but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet.
language2_text: Mo ji nihangno yaken am iya rana am yanimakalapo no kasdep ko o na kahangno so ai ko.

language1_text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint: but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment.
language2_text: Imo am yabwata o haneng a mo nikoris do oo ko. Am iya am na nikorisan o ai ko no mahangno a ipeykeykoris.

language1_text: Wherefore I say unto thee, Her sins, which are many, are forgiven; for she loved much: but to whom little is forgiven, the same loveth little.
language2_text: Am ori o ko pancyan nya jimo an. Ta o na ikarako no pangarilawan na am yaro nimavonas rana raraten na. O alikey so nikavonasan so raraten am apereh o karilawan na jyaken an."

language1_text: And he said unto her, Thy sins are forgiven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do mavakes am, "Yana nimavonas o raraten mo."

language1_text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves, Who is this that forgiveth sins also?
language2_text: Maniring o onowned da no macyakan jya am, "Sinosino ya yato vonas so raraten no tao."

language1_text: And he said to the woman, Thy faith hath saved thee; go in peace.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do mavakes am, "Makapiya ka so onowned an. Ta yana rana nipatastas imo ni Ama ta do to, do yamo kanoyong a meyhanhan nya."

language1_text: And it came to pass afterward, that he went throughout every city and village, preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God: and the twelve were with him,
language2_text: Meyratateng am nimlivolivon do peycyeylilyan na si Yeso a pangananawan na no Mapasaray a Ciriciring do katalamozong na nyaten ni Ama ta do to. O macihza jya am rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya,

language1_text: and certain women, which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities, Mary called Magdalene, out of whom went seven devils,
language2_text: kano aro a mavakes a nivozwawan na so kalamsoyan ni Satan a kano niwakwakan na so kataotao. Amyan jira so meyngaran so Matelyan Madiya pinamozwawan ni Yeso so papito a kalamsoyan ni Satan a nikomovot jya,

language1_text: and Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod's steward, and Susanna, and many others, which ministered unto him of their substance.
language2_text: kani Yeanna a mavakes ni Vosa asa ka meynakem a lamlamsoy ni Helote a kani Sosanna kano aro a mavavakes a nisomidong si Yeso a kano macinanao jya.

language1_text: And when much people were gathered together, and were come to him out of every city, he spake by a parable:
language2_text: Nimapo o aro a tao do peycyeylilyan na tomita si Yeso. Meylovolovot o aro a tao am nipanci na jira o payyaingan na sya.

language1_text: A sower went out to sow his seed: and as he sowed, some fell by the way side; and it was trodden down, and the fowls of the air devoured it.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Amyan so asa ka tao a mangay a manokos. Manokos am amyan so mangay zomsi do rarahan. So zazasagan da jya, toktokan da jya no meyyasasalap.

language1_text: And some fell upon a rock; and as soon as it was sprung up, it withered away, because it lacked moisture.
language2_text: Amyan so zomsi do kavatovatwan am makeykai a mahayo, ta abo tana.

language1_text: And some fell among thorns; and the thorns sprang up with it, and choked it.
language2_text: Amyan so nizomsi do katamtamkan am amlida am ji makapamno, ta kaongongan no aro a tamek.

language1_text: And other fell on good ground, and sprang up, and bare fruit an hundredfold. And when he had said these things, he cried, He that hath ears to hear, let him hear.
language2_text: Amyan so nizomsi do apya so tanatana am ori o ney yapya na so ininsyan. Omsi am nikaranaranaw o asi na." Pakavosen na o kapangnanao na am amlololos a manci no, "Amizngen nyo an, peyyanen nyo do onowned nyo ori an."

language1_text: And his disciples asked him, saying, What might this parable be?
language2_text: Meyratateng am ipanahes da no macinanao jya o peypeypangayan no ciriciring na.

language1_text: And he said, Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God: but to others in parables; that seeing they might not see, and hearing they might not understand.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "O ji na nipatwaw pa peypeypangayan na no katalamozong na ninyo ni Ama ta do to o ipanci ko jinyo an. Am o karwan da no tao am nanawen ko sira no payyaingan ko sya ciring. Ta tana citacitahen da am akma dey jyacita. Tana amyamizngen da am ji da tenngi.

language1_text: Now the parable is this: The seed is the word of God.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no manokos am akman so Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Those by the way side are they that hear; then cometh the devil, and taketh away the word out of their hearts, lest they should believe and be saved.
language2_text: O nimakas do rarahan am akman so tao a omamizing so ciring ni Ama ta do to a kangay na mahap sya ni Satan do onowned da. So ji da nganoyngi jya, ji da makahapi so karilawan na nira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: They on the rock are they, which, when they hear, receive the word with joy; and these have no root, which for a while believe, and in time of temptation fall away.
language2_text: O nimakas do kavatovatwan am akman so masasaray a omamizing so ciring na ni Ama ta do to am ji makayamot do onowned da. No myan so alalaw da am makeykai sira kalittan. Am ori o ji da rana meyhanhani ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And that which fell among thorns are they, which, when they have heard, go forth, and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life, and bring no fruit to perfection.
language2_text: O nimakas do katamtamkan am akman so tao a omamizing so ciring na ni Ama ta do to am aro o ikalaw da kano ikakza da nizpi a kano meykamadadayan a ikakza no tao. Am ori o ji na meypakatkaci no onowned da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But that on the good ground are they, which in an honest and good heart, having heard the word, keep it, and bring forth fruit with patience.
language2_text: O nimakas do apya so tanatana am akman so tao a omamizing so ciring na ni Ama ta do to a meyngongyod a meyhanhan nya do onowned da.

language1_text: No man, when he hath lighted a candle, covereth it with a vessel, or putteth it under a bed; but setteth it on a candlestick, that they which enter in may see the light.
language2_text: "Abo o tao a tomoong so nipaciscisan na zampo a kapangay sya do teyrahem no ireyrayan. Ta o zampo rana am pacimalagen a kapakacita da sya no somdep a tao.

language1_text: For nothing is secret, that shall not be made manifest; neither any thing hid, that shall not be known and come abroad.
language2_text: Ta abo o matayo a vazay a jyababa. Akman sang, ta tana nyo jyatenngi sicyakwaya o nanao ko jinyo am katenngan nyo no makwa.

language1_text: Take heed therefore how ye hear: for whosoever hath, to him shall be given; and whosoever hath not, from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have.
language2_text: Am ori o amizngan nyo sya an. Ta o mamizing so ciring na ni Ama ta do to am arwaro pa o makarapa jira ciring. Am o ji ngamizing so ciring na ni Ama ta do to am tana myan so alikey a katenngan da am to meykabobo pa jira ori."

language1_text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren, and could not come at him for the press.
language2_text: Mangay da citahen si Yeso no ina na kada wari na a mahakay. Ikongo do tey yaro tao, ori o ji da macikasngeni jya.

language1_text: And it was told him by certain which said, Thy mother and thy brethren stand without, desiring to see thee.
language2_text: So iyan no tao a manci nya jya so, "Yanimai si ina mo a kada wari mo a yakomala jimo."

language1_text: And he answered and said unto them, My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God, and do it.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Omamizing so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a kapeyyan da sya do onowned da kapangozay da jya peyvazain am ori o abnekan ko a inyapwan a kano kakakteh ko."

language1_text: Now it came to pass on a certain day, that he went into a ship with his disciples: and he said unto them, Let us go over unto the other side of the lake. And they launched forth.
language2_text: Ipisa si Yeso a kano macinanao jya somakay do vazangay am ipanci na jira o kangay da do katovangan na no rako a meybebneng a ranom. So nikaodan da so vazangay a mangay rana.

language1_text: But as they sailed he fell asleep: and there came down a storm of wind on the lake; and they were filled with water, and were in jeopardy.
language2_text: Amyan sira do avak no rako a meybebneng a ranom am to ngitkeh rana si Yeso. Meyratateng am to na ngirasa sira no rako a pagpag a kalokong na jira no paopaong na do vazangay da so cinapodaro.

language1_text: And they came to him, and awoke him, saying, Master, master, we perish. Then he arose, and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water: and they ceased, and there was a calm.
language2_text: Am ori o nyangay da amyokay si Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Mo Mangnanao, mo Mangnanao, tanyo na marahet!" Mayokay si Yeso am sirsirngen na o rako a pagpag a kano paopaong am nikakeykai na rana meyhanahanang.

language1_text: And he said unto them, Where is your faith? And they being afraid wondered, saying one to another, What manner of man is this! for he commandeth even the winds and water, and they obey him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Nyo ji meyhanhanan nyaken." So nisavasavakan da nya. Maniring sira do kadwan jira am, "Sinosino ya tao. Ta na to nirsirnga o rako a pagpag am na to ngamiznga."

language1_text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes, which is over against Galilee.
language2_text: Makaranes sira do meyngaran so Kelasen a ili a katovangan no Cyadidi am,

language1_text: And when he went forth to land, there met him out of the city a certain man, which had devils long time, and ware no clothes, neither abode in any house, but in the tombs.
language2_text: nigomcin rana si Yeso a makasinmo so asa ka kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan a tao do dang. Iya rana am ji meyyayob. Ji meyvahay do ili, ta meyvahay do kanitwan.

language1_text: When he saw Jesus, he cried out, and fell down before him, and with a loud voice said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of God most high? I beseech thee, torment me not.
language2_text: Macita na si Yeso am omlololos a kapeylilitod na do tangain na ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Mo Yeso a Anak no ney manokdwan na Tao do to, ikongo mo gogadan nyaken. Ji mo pasingsingci yaken an."

language1_text: (For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man. For oftentimes it had caught him: and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters; and he brake the bands, and was driven of the devil into the wilderness.)
language2_text: O pancyan na no nang am nivozwaw na ni Yeso o komovot do dang a aro a kalamsoyan ni Satan. Masangib ori a kovotan da no kalamsoyan ni Satan. No kaneb da jya am to na zavazavata o nivaod da so ai na vahalang a kapaksoz da sya no kalamsoyan ni Satan a yangay do kabwan no tao.

language1_text: And Jesus asked him, saying, What is thy name? And he said, Legion: because many devils were entered into him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Sino ngaran mo." Pasapan na am, "Si Malavong." Ta aro a kalamsoyan ni Satan a komovot jya.

language1_text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep.
language2_text: So nipasyasi da no aro a kalamsoyan ni Satan ji Yeso a manci no kaji na paksozan sira a tovoin do abo so takadan a gazawagaw.

language1_text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain: and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them. And he suffered them.
language2_text: O macitangked jira tokon am macinao o keyyan da dang no aro a kois. Am ori o nipasyasi da no kalamsoyan ni Satan ji Yeso do katovoy na sira do aro a kois. Meyratateng am tovoin na sira ni Yeso.

language1_text: Then went the devils out of the man, and entered into the swine: and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake, and were choked.
language2_text: Am ori o nikarwan da do kataotao no tao a mangay do aro a kois kaksoz da do alalasyas a katovoz da do rako a meybebneng a ranom. Ori o nipeykehmehmes da a mawakwak.

language1_text: When they that fed them saw what was done, they fled, and went and told it in the city and in the country.
language2_text: Macita da no tomalamozong no kois am malalayo sira manci nya do aro a tao do ili a kano meyvahay do takey.

language1_text: Then they went out to see what was done; and came to Jesus, and found the man, out of whom the devils were departed, sitting at the feet of Jesus, clothed, and in his right mind: and they were afraid.
language2_text: So nipeygonoz no tao a mangay a tomita so vazay ang. Makaranes sira ji Yeso am macita da o tao a nikovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan a meyyaywayob rana apya rana so aktokto a omlisna do tangain ni Yeso. Am ori o nikarahet da so onowned a to rana nyahey a tomita sya, ta tey arako oyowyat ni Yeso.

language1_text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed.
language2_text: O nimakacita so vazay ori a tao am ononongan da rana do aro a tao o panpandan na. Maniring sira am, "Yanimapya rana o nikovotan no aro a kalamsoyan ni Satan asyo."

language1_text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them; for they were taken with great fear; and he went up into the ship, and returned back again.
language2_text: O tao do Kelasen am ipanci da si Yeso a komaro jira. Ta manyahey sira. So nisakay na rana do vazangay a mangay rana.

language1_text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him: but Jesus sent him away, saying,
language2_text: O nimapya nikovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan a tao am ikakza na o kapacikavang na ji Yeso am ji na mya. So nipancyan na nya,

language1_text: Return to thine own house, and shew how great things God hath done unto thee. And he went his way, and published throughout the whole city how great things Jesus had done unto him.
language2_text: "Mangay ka rana do vahay nyo a kapanci mo no mina vazay na jimo ni Ama ta do to." So nyangay na rana do ili a meylimwang no mina vazay na jya ni Yeso.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that, when Jesus was returned, the people gladly received him: for they were all waiting for him.
language2_text: Meysinaoli si Yeso do katovangan na no rako a meybebneng a ranom am mangay da rapongen no nimnanala sya aro a tao.

language1_text: And, behold, there came a man named Jairus, and he was a ruler of the synagogue: and he fell down at Jesus' feet, and besought him that he would come into his house:
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tomalamozong no peyneynozyan a meyngaran so Yalo a mai a mapasyasi do tangain ni Yeso karara na si Yeso a mangay do vahay da,

language1_text: for he had one only daughter, about twelve years of age, and she lay a dying. But as he went the people thronged him.
language2_text: ta makeykai rana mawakwak o veyvowen na anak a mavakes. O kakawakawan no nang am adwa so ikarwa (12). Mangonong si Yeso do rarahan am meysilisilin o aro a tao a macihza jya.

language1_text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years, which had spent all her living upon physicians, neither could be healed of any,
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka mavakes adwa so ikarwa so awawan a makaliliw so kataotao na gomcin no rala. Nimimin na o kangangay na yangay na do mangavavaw am abo angangayan na.

language1_text: came behind him, and touched the border of his garment: and immediately her issue of blood stanched.
language2_text: So nyangay na do likod na ni Yeso a kapinan na do seysayan no talili na. Am ori o nikapya na rana no ingingnen na.

language1_text: And Jesus said, Who touched me? When all denied, Peter and they that were with him said, Master, the multitude throng thee and press thee, and sayest thou, Who touched me?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Sino ya niminan jyaken ang." Abo o tao a manci nya. Maniring si Pite am, "Mo Mangnanao, mo panangangayan nya. Mo jyacita sira o aro a tao a yameysilisilin a yamangay jimo?"

language1_text: And Jesus said, Somebody hath touched me: for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yamyan so yaniminan jyaken, ta ko nimaliliw o oyowyat ko a makowbot jyaken."

language1_text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid, she came trembling, and falling down before him, she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him, and how she was healed immediately.
language2_text: Meylamdam na no mavakes o kaji na rana makapowziban so kanimapya na rana am to zikzik a mangay a meylilitod do tangain ni Yeso kapanci na no peypeypangayan no mina kapinan na jya, na kapya rana no ingingnen na. So nimiminan na sya patwawen do aro a tao.

language1_text: And he said unto her, Daughter, be of good comfort: thy faith hath made thee whole; go in peace.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Manganako, ka manoyong a meyhanhan nyaken. Makapiya ka so onowned a mangay rana. Ta yarana apya o ingingnen mo."

language1_text: While he yet spake, there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue's house, saying to him, Thy daughter is dead: trouble not the Master.
language2_text: Ji na pa teyka o ciring na am amyan so tao a nimapo do vahay da Yalo a manci no, "Ji mo na rara si Yeso, ta yanimaliman rana o anak mo."

language1_text: But when Jesus heard it, he answered him, saying, Fear not: believe only, and she shall be made whole.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Yeso am ipanci na ji Yalo. Maniring am, "Ji ka nyaheyan. Si manoyong o kapeyhanhan mo nyaken am apya rana ori a."

language1_text: And when he came into the house, he suffered no man to go in, save Peter, and James, and John, and the father and the mother of the maiden.
language2_text: Makaranes sira Yeso do vahay da ni Yalo am si Pite a kani Yowani a kani Yake a kano inyapwan no kanakan o nipya na macisdep jya.

language1_text: And all wept, and bewailed her: but he said, Weep not; she is not dead, but sleepeth.
language2_text: Lavyan da no aro a tao o kanakan. Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ji kanyo lavi, ta yamitkeh ori. Yamakongo kwan nyo."
