language1_text: And they laughed him to scorn, knowing that she was dead.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring ni Yeso am no mangay o kaming da am mangay o kapeyoyaoya da, do kapakateneng da jya a nimawakwak rana.

language1_text: And he put them all out, and took her by the hand, and called, saying, Maid, arise.
language2_text: Meyratateng am pinanan na o lima na kalolos na manci no, "Mo ovay, peyvangon rana."

language1_text: And her spirit came again, and she arose straightway: and he commanded to give her meat.
language2_text: So nipeysinaoli no pahad na kapeyvangon na rana. Meyratateng am ipanci na sira ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Pantaney kamo so kanen na."

language1_text: And her parents were astonished: but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done.
language2_text: Yeyyak da no inyapwan no kanakan. Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ji nyo meyvehvehyan o ko mina vazay do tao an."

language1_text: Then he called his twelve disciples together, and gave them power and authority over all devils, and to cure diseases.
language2_text: Lovoten na ni Yeso sira o rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya kapanta na nira so oyowyat da ipamozwaw da so kalamsoyan ni Satan a kano ipangiwakwak da so meykeyngeyngen a tao,

language1_text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God, and to heal the sick.
language2_text: katovoy na sira mangay a meylimwang no ciriciring na do katalamozong na nyaten ni Ama ta do to a kapangiwakwak da so meyngen a tao.

language1_text: And he said unto them, Take nothing for your journey, neither staves, nor scrip, neither bread, neither money; neither have two coats apiece.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "No mangay kamo na am ji kamo meyyaomas. Ji kamo mapalolo so sisikod nyo a kano kanen nyo a kano nizpi nyo an. Ji nyo peytapila o ayob nyo.

language1_text: And whatsoever house ye enter into, there abide, and thence depart.
language2_text: No somdep kamo do asa ka vahay am to kamo na ngiseysan do dang an, mangay do ikaro nyo na jira.

language1_text: And whosoever will not receive you, when ye go out of that city, shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them.
language2_text: No ji da naotawwa inyo am karwan nyo o ili da katoktok nyo so tana do ai nyo. Ta itovil nyo jira meyraraten a tao a ji mamlis so nakenakem."

language1_text: And they departed, and went through the towns, preaching the gospel, and healing every where.
language2_text: So nyangay da omlivolivon do peycyeylilyan na a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a kapangiwakwak da so ingingnen no tao.

language1_text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him: and he was perplexed, because that it was said of some, that John was risen from the dead;
language2_text: Mamizing no panirsirngen no Cyadidi a meyngaran si Helote o aro a vazay ni Yeso am marahet o onowned na. Ta ji na tenngi o kapwan na no vazay na ni Yeso. Ta patolinen da si Yeso ji Yowani a nimirwa a mavyay.

language1_text: and of some, that Elias had appeared; and of others, that one of the old prophets was risen again.
language2_text: Amyan so tao a manci nya si Idiya a nimai. So iyan no tao a manci no kanimavyay no asa ka panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa pa.

language1_text: And Herod said, John have I beheaded: but who is this, of whom I hear such things? And he desired to see him.
language2_text: Maniring si Helote am, "Jyabo ka si Yowani na. Nipotowan ko na o oo na asyoo. Sinosino tao ang. Asyo o aro a vazay na paha." Am ori o to na naknakmi so kapakacita na sya.

language1_text: And the apostles, when they were returned, told him all that they had done. And he took them, and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida.
language2_text: No kapeysinaoli da no rarwa so ikakarwan a nipamnekan na ni Yeso a amlivolivon no ciriciring na am kakadain da o mina vazay da ipanci jya, kapalolo na sira ni Yeso a komaro do dang a kangay na nira do asa ka ili a meyngaran so Peysayta.

language1_text: And the people, when they knew it, followed him: and he received them, and spake unto them of the kingdom of God, and healed them that had need of healing.
language2_text: Katenngan da no aro a tao am macihza sira mangay. So nirapongan na sira ni Yeso kapanci na nya so katalamozong na nyaten ni Ama ta do to a kapangiwakwak na so aro a meykeyngeyngen a tao.

language1_text: And when the day began to wear away, then came the twelve, and said unto him, Send the multitude away, that they may go into the towns and country round about, and lodge, and get victuals: for we are here in a desert place.
language2_text: Somipsip o araw am mangay o rarwa so ikakarwan do tangain ni Yeso. Maniring sira jya am, "To ta na mancyan o aro a tao a mangay an, kangay da meykala do ili so kanen da kano isanan da. Ikongo to ta kamet a ipakan ta sira do takey eya."

language1_text: But he said unto them, Give ye them to eat. And they said, We have no more but five loaves and two fishes; except we should go and buy meat for all this people.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Pantan kamo sira so kanen da." Maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Yalima ka myanpaw a kano yadwa ka among o yamyan jyamen. Manngwa, apyapya kangay namen manazang no aro a tao eya so kanen da?"

language1_text: For they were about five thousand men. And he said to his disciples, Make them sit down by fifties in a company.
language2_text: O mahakay rana no kano nang am kakaliman sira ranaw (5000). Maniring do macinanao jya am, "Peykalyalipenpenen nyo sira palisnahen. Kakaliman (50) sira o teyhesa ka lipenpenan."

language1_text: And they did so, and made them all sit down.
language2_text: So nionotan da do ciring na no macinanao jya. So nilisna da rana no aro a tao.

language1_text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes, and looking up to heaven, he blessed them, and brake, and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ahapen na rana o alima ka myanpaw a kano adwa ka among a katangara na so hanit a kasaray na nya ji Ama ta do to a kakcikcil na sya patodahen do macinanao jya kavonong da rana sya do aro a tao.

language1_text: And they did eat, and were all filled: and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets.
language2_text: Ori o nikamimin da rana nimabsoy. Peysinsinmowen da rana no macinanao jya o nimapanpan am adwa o ikarwa na no ka yalayala na.

language1_text: And it came to pass, as he was alone praying, his disciples were with him: and he asked them, saying, Whom say the people that I am?
language2_text: Ipisa maveyvow si Yeso a meynozi am mangay da citahen no macinanao jya. Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Sino kwan da yaken no aro a tao."

language1_text: They answering said, John the Baptist; but some say, Elias; and others say, that one of the old prophets is risen again.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Yamyan so tao a manci nimo a nimanaktak a si Yowani. Yamyan so yamanci nimo a si Idiya. Yamyan so manci nimo a nimirwa mavyay a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa pa."

language1_text: He said unto them, But whom say ye that I am? Peter answering said, The Christ of God.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Manngo kamo. Sino kwan nyo yaken." Maniring si Pite am, "Imo rana am Kizisto ka apo ji Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And he straitly charged them, and commanded them to tell no man that thing;
language2_text: O nipakoyokoy na pa jira am, "Ji nyo meycicicyan o akman sang a vazay do tao an."

language1_text: saying, The Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes, and be slain, and be raised the third day.
language2_text: Maniring pa jira am, "Yamai o aro alalaw ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to an, a peymakarwan da no kamanrarakehan a kano kabedbedan da rana panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao so iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao a kawakwak da rana jyaken. Am ikatlo na araw am mirwa ko a mavyay."

language1_text: And he said to them all, If any man will come after me, let him deny himself, and take up his cross daily, and follow me.
language2_text: Maniring pa jira si Yeso am, "No myan so tao a macilolo jyaken am to na pangawawan o kataotao na somabway no jyojika na a macihza jyaken. Tana wakwaken da am cyaha, ta o akman rana sang a tao am manoyong a omonot jyaken.

language1_text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it: but whosoever will lose his life for my sake, the same shall save it.
language2_text: Ta o tao a makza no kasaray na do karawan am beken a ikapya na ori. Am o to ngawaw pa no kataotao na a mahap so vazay ko am mahap na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na.

language1_text: For what is a man advantaged, if he gain the whole world, and lose himself, or be cast away?
language2_text: Tana abwata ji ngyangyan jinyo a makadpeh jinyo a tao do karawan, a kangay no pahad nyo do kararatan am ikongo angangayan na no nang.

language1_text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words, of him shall the Son of man be ashamed, when he shall come in his own glory, and in his Father's, and of the holy angels.
language2_text: No myan so macimanig nyaken a kano ciring ko am no meysinaoli ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a macihza do azwazway ni Ama ta do to a kano aro a tinsi am abo nakenakem ko sya.

language1_text: But I tell you of a truth, there be some standing here, which shall not taste of death, till they see the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Ko pa ipanci jinyo am inyo rana yameytatanek do jya am amyan jinyo so makapis pa so sang a mavyay pa tao. So ipakacittan nyo so talamozongan na ninyo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings, he took Peter and John and James, and went up into a mountain to pray.
language2_text: Ikawao na araw no nipancyan na no aro a ciriciring am palolwen na si Pite a kani Yowani a kani Yake a mangay do tokon a meynozi.

language1_text: And as he prayed, the fashion of his countenance was altered, and his raiment was white and glistering.
language2_text: Meynozi si Yeso am todablis o keyteytawan na. So mina to na lavangi a maniray so ayob.

language1_text: And, behold, there talked with him two men, which were Moses and Elias:
language2_text: Meyratateng am meyhekas o rarwa ka tao a macisirsiring jya. Sira rana o rarwa am si Moyse a kani Idiya,

language1_text: who appeared in glory, and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem.
language2_text: nimablis so keyteytawan. Ipeysirsiring da kani Yeso o kawakwak na do Yelosaleng a mapakavos so nitoro na jya ni Ama ta do to a vazay na.

language1_text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep: and when they were awake, they saw his glory, and the two men that stood with him.
language2_text: Si Pite a kano kararay na am makapya sira mitkeh. Mayokay sira am macita da si Yeso a kano rarwa a meytatanek a macitazing jya a mablis so keyteytawan.

language1_text: And it came to pass, as they departed from him, Peter said unto Jesus, Master, it is good for us to be here: and let us make three tabernacles; one for thee, and one for Moses, and one for Elias: not knowing what he said.
language2_text: To da ji ngaroi si Yeso no rarwa ori am maniring si Pite ji Yeso am, "Mo Mangnanao, tanyo tey yapya do jya. So ipamaring namen so atlo a ka sarwap, asa imo, asa si Moyse, asa si Idiya." Akmey ji na onongi o ipanci na ciring.

language1_text: While he thus spake, there came a cloud, and overshadowed them: and they feared as they entered into the cloud.
language2_text: Ji pa ngavos o ciring na am amyan so asa ka cinalab a ombengbeng sira. So nikanyahey da Pite.

language1_text: And there came a voice out of the cloud, saying, This is my beloved Son: hear him.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amyan so ciriciring do cinalab a manci no, "Iya rana am nipamnekan ko Anak ko. So amizngan nyo sya an."

language1_text: And when the voice was past, Jesus was found alone. And they kept it close, and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen.
language2_text: Amizngen da o ciring ori am si Yeso o macita da asa ka tao. Do araraw no nang am ji da meycicicyan o nimacita da vazay do tao.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that on the next day, when they were come down from the hill, much people met him.
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am omosok sira apo do tokon. So nirapongan da sya no aro a tao.

language1_text: And, behold, a man of the company cried out, saying, Master, I beseech thee, look upon my son: for he is mine only child.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amyan dang so asa ka tao amlololos. Maniring am, "Mo Mangnanao, ikasi mo pa o anak ko an. Ta iya rana am yako veyvowen a anak ko.

language1_text: And, lo, a spirit taketh him, and he suddenly crieth out; and it teareth him that he foameth again, and bruising him hardly departeth from him.
language2_text: Yamasangib ori a na kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan. Ori o to na lololosi a mamezamezay a meyotaotab so ngongoy. Ji na ngaroi no kalamsoyan ni Satan. So to na makasii a meyzaza so kataotao.

language1_text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out; and they could not.
language2_text: Nipanci ko o macinanao jimo a omvozwaw sya am da jyavozwaw."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said, O faithless and perverse generation, how long shall I be with you, and suffer you? Bring thy son hither.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ikongo nyo ji meyhanhani ni Ama ta do to. Akman rana so wanjin o kownownay ko a macikaop jinyo. Akman ko rana so wanjin a marilaw ninyo." Maniring do tao ori am, "Ayyan o anak mo do jya."

language1_text: And as he was yet a coming, the devil threw him down, and tare him. And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit, and healed the child, and delivered him again to his father.
language2_text: Makaranes o anak na am paleklekteken na no kalamsoyan ni Satan a kapamezamezay na. Ori o nioyyan na nya ni Yeso so kalamsoyan ni Satan. Am ori o nikapya na rana no kanakan a katoro na rana nya do ama na.

language1_text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God. But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did, he said unto his disciples,
language2_text: Am ori o nisavasavakan da no oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to no aro a tao. Isavasavak da o mina vazay ni Yeso. So niyan no ciring na do macinanao jya.

language1_text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears: for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Ji nyo ngawawan o ipanci ko a ciring an. Yaken rana a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to am makeykai da yaken a itoro do macioya jyaken an."

language1_text: But they understood not this saying, and it was hid from them, that they perceived it not: and they feared to ask him of that saying.
language2_text: Am ji da tenngi o peypeypangayan no ciriciring na, ta masalit o ayyaingan na. Am ori o ji da makatenngi jya. Am ji dadkeci a ipanahes o peypeypangayan no nipanci na vazay.

language1_text: Then there arose a reasoning among them, which of them should be greatest.
language2_text: Ikazyak da no macinanao jya sino jira o pakarakehen a tao.

language1_text: And Jesus, perceiving the thought of their heart, took a child, and set him by him,
language2_text: Katenngan na ni Yeso o nakenakem da. Am ori o nipancyan na no asa ka kanakan a mai, kapanci na nya meytatanek do katangked na.

language1_text: and said unto them, Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me: and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me: for he that is least among you all, the same shall be great.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "O mahap so vazay ko a tomaotao so kanakan eya am yaken an o taotawwen da an. O tomaotao jyaken am akma dey taotawwen o nitomovoy jyaken an. Sino paro jinyo o to mapownot so nakenakem na mangarilaw so icyatatao na. Ta ori o pakarakehen a tao."

language1_text: And John answered and said, Master, we saw one casting out devils in thy name; and we forbad him, because he followeth not with us.
language2_text: Maniring si Yowani ji Yeso am, "Mo Mangnanao, namen nimakacita so tao a mamozwaw no ngaran mo so kalamsoyan ni Satan am namen nizazatan. Ta beken a kararay namen ori."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto him, Forbid him not: for he that is not against us is for us.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ji nyo oyyan an. Ta o ji rahet jinyo am macyanod jinyo."

language1_text: And it came to pass, when the time was come that he should be received up, he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem,
language2_text: Makeykai rana o kapeysinaoli na ni Yeso do teyngato am ji na ngaolii o kangay na do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: and sent messengers before his face: and they went, and entered into a village of the Samaritans, to make ready for him.
language2_text: So nitovoyan na so tao a manma mangay do asa ka ili da no Samadiya kapeykala da ni Yeso so itkehan na.

language1_text: And they did not receive him, because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem.
language2_text: Am ji da mya no tao do dang a misan, ta katenngan da si Yeso a meypangay do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: And when his disciples James and John saw this, they said, Lord, wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven, and consume them, even as Elias did?
language2_text: Macita da Yake a kani Yowani am ipanci da o, "Mo Panirsirngen, manngwa, apyahen mo yamen a mapakas so apoy do hanit a itemtem sira an?"

language1_text: But he turned, and rebuked them, and said, Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of.
language2_text: Citahen na pa sira ni Yeso a kaoya na nira.

language1_text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men's lives, but to save them. And they went to another village.
language2_text: So nipeypangay da do matarek a ili.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that, as they went in the way, a certain man said unto him, Lord, I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest.
language2_text: Mangonong sira do rarahan am amyan so asa ka tao a manci nya ji Yeso, "O angayan mo am abo ji ko macihzai jimo."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto him, Foxes have holes, and birds of the air have nests; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Amyan so vahay no votdak, amyan so vahay no lapik am yaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am abwata o tangnan ko so oo ko an."

language1_text: And he said unto another, Follow me. But he said, Lord, suffer me first to go and bury my father.
language2_text: Maniring do asa ka tao am, "Macihza ka jyaken an." Maniring o tao ori am, "Mo Panirsirngen, apyahen mo pa yaken a omonong do inawan ni ama kangay ko macilolo rana jimo an?"

language1_text: Jesus said unto him, Let the dead bury their dead: but go thou and preach the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To mo macipanadngi sira o omonong do nimapoling so peylingalingayan a tao. Am imo rana am apyapya pa kangay mo meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring do na katalamozong ninyo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And another also said, Lord, I will follow thee; but let me first go bid them farewell, which are at home at my house.
language2_text: Maniring pa o asa ka tao am, "Mo Panirsirngen, ko ikakza o kapacilolo ko jimo. Am mangay ko pa taitaiden sira o inyapwan ko an."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto him, No man, having put his hand to the plough, and looking back, is fit for the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Omhakakaw no baka tao am ji to paolya o mata, ta meycyagilogilo o kowzowzitan na. Akman sang, ta no naknakmen o kapacikaop do italamozong ni Ama ta do to am ji peykarwa o nakenakem jya an."

language1_text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also, and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place, whither he himself would come.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mamnek si Yeso so rarwa so ikakawaowan (72) a tao a katovoy na sira teyrararwa mangay do omanam na angayan a peycyeylilyan na.

language1_text: Therefore said he unto them, The harvest truly is great, but the labourers are few: pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest, that he would send forth labourers into his harvest.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Yaro o mowamowa am yapeleh o tao a meyvazay jya. Am ori o pancyan nyo no mapeymowamowa sya manovoy so arwaro pa mangay amvozas so mowamowa na.

language1_text: Go your ways: behold, I send you forth as lambs among wolves.
language2_text: Angay kamo na do tovoyan ko jinyo. So icyakman nyo so anak no kagling a mangay a patovongen do aro a vozaw a kokoman so kagling a ino.

language1_text: Carry neither purse, nor scrip, nor shoes: and salute no man by the way.
language2_text: Ji kanyo mapalolo so nizpi a kano ayob nyo a kano tokap. Ji kanyo to neyked a meyminaminasi no masinmo nyo a tao.

language1_text: And into whatsoever house ye enter, first say, Peace be to this house.
language2_text: No asdepen nyo o teyhesa ka vahay am ipanci nyo jira o, 'Makapiya kamo so onowned an.'

language1_text: And if the son of peace be there, your peace shall rest upon it: if not, it shall turn to you again.
language2_text: No myan dang so ji meyrahet so nakem a tao am o nipanci nyo jira a 'Makapiya kamo so onowned an,' am mangay dompeh jira an. Am si ji da ngamiznga am abo angangayan no mina ciring nyo sira ang.

language1_text: And in the same house remain, eating and drinking such things as they give: for the labourer is worthy of his hire. Go not from house to house.
language2_text: Ji kanyo meylilis a mangay do teyhesa ka vahay an. Ta to kanyo ngyan do vahay da no tomaotao jinyo a kato nyo novwan no peypanamen da jinyo an. Ta o meyvazay a tao am adan kapanizpi sira an.

language1_text: And into whatsoever city ye enter, and they receive you, eat such things as are set before you:
language2_text: No mangay kamo do teyhesa ka ili a keyyan no tao a tomaotao jinyo a kapeypanam da so kanekanen nyo am kanen nyo an,

language1_text: and heal the sick that are therein, and say unto them, The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you.
language2_text: a kapangiwakwak nyo so meykeyngeyngen a tao do dang an, kapanci nyo nya do aro a tao so na kakeykai rana a yatomalamozong ninyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But into whatsoever city ye enter, and they receive you not, go your ways out into the streets of the same, and say,
language2_text: No si makaranes kanyo do ili a kaji da naotawwan jinyo am to kamo na makowbot a kangay nyo do rarahan a manci no,

language1_text: Even the very dust of your city, which cleaveth on us, we do wipe off against you: notwithstanding be ye sure of this, that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you.
language2_text: 'O yadomket do ai namen a tana do ili nyo am toktoken namen an, a tovilan jinyo a meyraraten a tao a ji mamlis so nakenakem. Am naknakmen nyo an, o kakeykai na rana no katalamozong na no meyhanhan nya tao ni Ama ta do to an,' kwan nyo sira an."

language1_text: But I say unto you, that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom, than for that city.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso jira am, "Ko pa ciring jinyo am no marateng o araraw no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to am makdekdeng pa o oyaoyyan na do ji naotao jinyo a kano nipasingsingkad na do tao do Sotoma no kakwa pa.

language1_text: Woe unto thee, Chorazin! woe unto thee, Bethsaida! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon, which have been done in you, they had a great while ago repented, sitting in sackcloth and ashes.
language2_text: "Inyo rana tao do Kelasin a kado Peysayta am to kanyo makasi an. Ta o mina vazay ko jinyo do dang am no nimyan pa ori do Tayar a kado Siton am jyabo kaji da nimamlisan so nakenakem a komaro do peyraratenan da.

language1_text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment, than for you.
language2_text: Am yakanyo ji mamlis. No marateng o araraw no peykapyapinpinan ni Ama ta do to so tao am alikelikey pa o nipasingsingkad na so tao do Tayar a kado Siton a kano oyyan na ninyo an.

language1_text: And thou, Capernaum, which art exalted to heaven, shalt be thrust down to hell.
language2_text: Inyo rana tao do Cyapaynong am manngwa, ipanci nyo o kapakaranes nyo do teyngato? Jyabo kaji nyo akasan do kararatan a."

language1_text: He that heareth you heareth me; and he that despiseth you despiseth me; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "O omamizing jinyo am omamizing jyaken. O mapasobna jinyo am mapasobna jyaken. O mapasobna jyaken am pasobnan da o nitomovoy jyaken an."

language1_text: And the seventy returned again with joy, saying, Lord, even the devils are subject unto us through thy name.
language2_text: Makanateng so araraw am masasaray sira o rarwa so ikakawaowan (72) a meysinaoli a manci no, "Mo Panirsirngen, yabo yaji ngamizing jyamen a kalamsoyan ni Satan, do namen pangozayan do ngaran mo."

language1_text: And he said unto them, I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Ko katenngan, ta ko nimacita rana si Satan a nimakeykai a nimakas do teyrahem a niharag na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy: and nothing shall by any means hurt you.
language2_text: Amizngen nyo an, ta ko na nitoro jinyo oyowyat ko an. So ikanoyong nyo makazazat do oyowyat ni Satan. So ikabo no matarek a oyowyat a makataha jinyo. Tana to kanyo meyzasag so mavowaw am ji da peyzaza inyo.

language1_text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not, that the spirits are subject unto you; but rather rejoice, because your names are written in heaven.
language2_text: Am ji nyo narayan o kamizing da jinyo no kalamsoyan ni Satan an. Ta isaray nyo o na kapadket rana so ngaran nyo do teyngato ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit, and said, I thank thee, O Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent, and hast revealed them unto babes: even so, Father; for so it seemed good in thy sight.
language2_text: No kanang am nipasaray no Seyzi si Yeso. So nipancyan na no, "Mo Ama a Panirsirngen do teyngato a kado karawan, ko isaray jimo. Ta mo nibengbeng do mapakateneteneng a tao o aro a vazay mo, a mo kapatwaw sya do yamapehbo so nakem da tao, mo Ama do to. Ta o akman rana sang am monganay do nakenakem mo."

language1_text: All things are delivered to me of my Father: and no man knoweth who the Son is, but the Father; and who the Father is, but the Son, and he to whom the Son will reveal him.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso jira am, "Yamamimin o meycyamadadayan a na nitoro jyaken ni Ama. So na ikabo no tao a makateneng jyaken. Ta si Ama o yamakateneng jyaken a Anak na. Yabwata o tao a makateneng ji Ama. Ta yaken a kano nipamnekan ko o makateneng jya. So ikabo no matarek a tao a makateneng jya."

language1_text: And he turned him unto his disciples, and said privately, Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see:
language2_text: Meyvazingowngaw si Yeso do macinanao jya am veyvowen na sira pancyan na no, "Tey yapya kamo a makacita so macita nyo no mata.

language1_text: for I tell you, that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see, and have not seen them; and to hear those things which ye hear, and have not heard them.
language2_text: Ta ko pa ciring jinyo am aro o panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a kano panipanirsirngen no kakwa a makza no kapakacita da so nyo macita kano nyo mamizing am da jya nimacita. Da jya nimamizing."

language1_text: And, behold, a certain lawyer stood up, and tempted him, saying, Master, what shall I do to inherit eternal life?
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao a nimai a somkad ji Yeso. Maniring am, "Mo Mangnanao, makongo ko a kapakahap ko so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ko."

language1_text: He said unto him, What is written in the law? how readest thou?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ikongo nivilangan mo a nivatvatkan a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And he answering said, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy strength, and with all thy mind; and thy neighbour as thyself.
language2_text: Maniring ori am, "'Onowned mo a kano pahad mo a kano oyowyat mo a kano nakenakem mo am to mo peykasa a omraralay ni Ama ta do to a Tao do to mo a karilaw mo no icyatatao mo akman so aryarilaw mo so kataotao mo.'"

language1_text: And he said unto him, Thou hast answered right: this do, and thou shalt live.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Yamanoyong ori. So pangozayan mo jya. Ta ori o ipakahap mo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad mo."

language1_text: But he, willing to justify himself, said unto Jesus, And who is my neighbour?
language2_text: Ikongo do jyalpid, am ori o nipacicyan na pa si Yeso. Maniring jya am, "Sino ikarilaw ko a icyatatao ko."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said, A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho, and fell among thieves, which stripped him of his raiment, and wounded him, and departed, leaving him half dead.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Amyan so asa ka tao a nimapo do Yelosaleng a meypangay do Yedike. Amyan do avak no rarahan am makasazi so manakaw a tao. Meyratateng am ahapen da o aywayob na kano nizpi na kaji na wakwakan a nipakakasi da kapazyazikaz da sya do dang.

language1_text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way: and when he saw him, he passed by on the other side.
language2_text: Ikongo do nimacinao o asa ka mapatanatanang so nakem si Ama ta do to a mangonong do dang. Macita na o tao ori am to na liklika a kangay na rana.

language1_text: And likewise a Levite, when he was at the place, came and looked on him, and passed by on the other side.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amyan pa so asa ka Diwey a tao a mangonong dang. Macita na o tao ori am to na pa nita kakaro na rana jya.

language1_text: But a certain Samaritan, as he journeyed, came where he was: and when he saw him, he had compassion on him,
language2_text: Meyratateng am amyan so asa ka tao do Samadiya a mangonong do siri na. Macita na am ikarilaw na,

language1_text: and went to him, and bound up his wounds, pouring in oil and wine, and set him on his own beast, and brought him to an inn, and took care of him.
language2_text: kangay na komoris do nipeyzazan na so kosozi a kahap na sya mangay peyveyveknen do asa ka vahay.

language1_text: And on the morrow when he departed, he took out two pence, and gave them to the host, and said unto him, Take care of him; and whatsoever thou spendest more, when I come again, I will repay thee.
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am mangap so adwa ka nizpi itoro na do mapeyvahay sya. Maniring jira am, 'Peyveyveknen nyo pa ya an. Ta si ipisa kai ko am itoro ko karwan no nizpi an.'"

language1_text: Which now of these three, thinkest thou, was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a tao am, "Naknakmen mo pala o tatlo a ka tao ang. Sino jira ori o manoyong a marilaw no icyatatao na."

language1_text: And he said, He that shewed mercy on him. Then said Jesus unto him, Go, and do thou likewise.
language2_text: Maniring o tao ori am, "O nimarilaw nya ang." Maniring si Yeso am, "Angay rana keynara mo sya mangarilaw so tao."

language1_text: Now it came to pass, as they went, that he entered into a certain village: and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house.
language2_text: Meypangay si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do asa ka ili am amyan so asa ka mavakes a meyngaran si Marta a tomaotao si Yeso do vahay da.

language1_text: And she had a sister called Mary, which also sat at Jesus' feet, and heard his word.
language2_text: Si Marta rana am amyan so wari na meyngaran si Madiya. Iya rana am amlisna do tangain ni Yeso a omamizing so ciring na.

language1_text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving, and came to him, and said, Lord, dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone? bid her therefore that she help me.
language2_text: Ikongo do masanga si Marta, am ori o nikarahet no onowned na. Am ori o nipancyan na no, "Mo Panirsirngen, mo jyaratan si wari a yato mapaveyvow jyaken a yatomaotao jimo? Pancyaney pa, ta mai a somidong jyaken."

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said unto her, Martha, Martha, thou art careful and troubled about many things:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo Marta, ka masanga no aro a vazay.

language1_text: but one thing is needful: and Mary hath chosen that good part, which shall not be taken away from her.
language2_text: Am yasa ka vazay pa yamo jya nyahap. Ta si wari mo si Madiya am na nipamnekan o ney yapiya na vazay. So ikabo no tao a makapehes sya jya."

language1_text: And it came to pass, that, as he was praying in a certain place, when he ceased, one of his disciples said unto him, Lord, teach us to pray, as John also taught his disciples.
language2_text: Ipisa kapateyka na ni Yeso so inozi na am amyan so asa ka macinanao jya a manci nya jya so, "Mo Panirsirngen, nanawen mo yamen a meynozi an, akman si Yowani a nimnanao so macinanao jya."

language1_text: And he said unto them, When ye pray, say, Our Father which art in heaven, Hallowed be thy name. Thy kingdom come. Thy will be done, as in heaven, so in earth.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "No meynozi kamo am inarahen nyo ya an.' Mo Ama do to, inaoy ano si mamimin o tao a zomwazway so meylimwang a ngaran mo. Inaoy si italamozong mo o karawan.

language1_text: Give us day by day our daily bread.
language2_text: O kanen namen sicyaraw eya am itoro mo jyamen.

language1_text: And forgive us our sins; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us. And lead us not into temptation; but deliver us from evil.
language2_text: Vonasen mo o raraten namen akman jyamen a ji mapeyyan sya do onowned so raten da jyamen no icyatatao namen. Ji mo yamen amya kalittan.'"

language1_text: And he said unto them, Which of you shall have a friend, and shall go unto him at midnight, and say unto him, Friend, lend me three loaves;
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "No si myan jinyo so mangay do kagagan na do avak no ahep a kapanci na no, 'Mo kahakay, mamood ko pa jinyo so atlo a ka myanpaw an.

language1_text: for a friend of mine in his journey is come to me, and I have nothing to set before him?
language2_text: Ta na kapakaranes pa no kagagan ko. So na ikabo no ko itaotao sya.'

language1_text: And he from within shall answer and say, Trouble me not: the door is now shut, and my children are with me in bed; I cannot rise and give thee.
language2_text: No si maniring o kagagan na amyan do sahad am, 'Kapakamo mo am ji mo yokaya yaken. Ta yamaneb rana o pangengneban, ta namen mitkeh kano anak ko. Am ori o ko ji makarawarawai so kapeyvangon a manta nimo.'

language1_text: I say unto you, Though he will not rise and give him, because he is his friend, yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth.
language2_text: No si akman sang am meypanngonngo ka. Ko pa ciring jinyo am beken a kapeykagagan da o kapanta na nya. Ta na ahapen do kaji na nimtadan a mapasyasi jya. So nipantan na nya.

language1_text: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
language2_text: Am ori o ko pancyan nya jinyo an. Makowyat kamo a meynozi, ta ori o ipakahap nyo so apyahen nyo no nakem. Makowyat kamo a komala si Ama ta do to, ta iya o yanan no kakzeben nyo no nakem. Makowyat kamo a tomawag ji Ama ta do to, ta iya o makasidong jinyo.

language1_text: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
language2_text: Ta o mapasyasi jya kano komala sya kano tomawag jya am sidongen na sira.

language1_text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father, will he give him a stone? or if he ask a fish, will he for a fish give him a serpent?Or if he shall ask an egg, will he offer him a scorpion?
language2_text: Sino jinyo o manta no minapodpod jinyo so mavowaw a kano alilipwan no macyami sira jinyo so among a kano icyoy. Sino jinyo o manta no minapodpod jinyo so mavowaw a kano alilipwan no macyami sira jinyo so among a kano icyoy.

language1_text: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children: how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him?
language2_text: Kakwakwan nyo a meyraraten a tao a yamakateneng do kapanta no anak nyo so ney pipya a kanekanen a imanngo rana si Ama ta do to. Ta jyabo kaji na mantan ninyo no amin nyo jya o Seyzi a."

language1_text: And he was casting out a devil, and it was dumb. And it came to pass, when the devil was gone out, the dumb spake; and the people wondered.
language2_text: Nivozwaw ni Yeso o asa ka kalamsoyan ni Satan. Iya rana ori am vazay na kakovot na do ji makabnebnek a tao. Vozwawen na ori am makabnebnek rana o tao. Ori o nisavasavakan da nya no aro a tao.

language1_text: But some of them said, He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils.
language2_text: Am amyan jira ori so tao a manci no, "Iya rana ori am na nioyatan ni Satan a ngaranan da Peysepo. Ori o na ipakavozwaw so kalamsoyan ni Satan a komovot do tao."

language1_text: And others, tempting him, sought of him a sign from heaven.
language2_text: O karwan da am naknakmen da o keyleylamdam da sya. Am ori o kakzeban da si Yeso a mapacita no oyowyat na manoyong a nimapo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But he, knowing their thoughts, said unto them, Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation; and a house divided against an house falleth.
language2_text: Katenngan na ni Yeso o keyleylamdam da sya. Maniring jira am, "Abwata asa ka mahataw a macizakazakat. So icyakman na sang no asa ka vahay a ji macizakazakat.

language1_text: If Satan also be divided against himself, how shall his kingdom stand? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub.
language2_text: No si masyakakan ni Satan a kano kalamsoyan na am ji da rana pakongo o kabedbed da. To da ranavwaki. Nyo ipanci yaken a na oyatan ni Peysepo.

language1_text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils, by whom do your sons cast them out? therefore shall they be your judges.
language2_text: Ikongo nyo ji manci no kararay nyo a nipanta ni Peysepo so oyowyat.

language1_text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils, no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you.
language2_text: No si manoyong ko a mamozwaw no oyowyat ni Ama ta do to am yamanoyong rana si Ama ta do to a tomalamozong no omanoyong jya tao sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace, his goods are in peace:
language2_text: "No si apzatan no tao no voovoo o peymeymasaodan da kano kavavahay da am jyabo kaji na makapzatan jya.

language1_text: but when a stronger than he shall come upon him, and overcome him, he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted, and divideth his spoils.
language2_text: Am no si myan so mowyowyat pa tao a mangay omrapong sya am jyabo kaji na makavozcinan so voovoo na katakaw na so warawara na."

language1_text: He that is not with me is against me: and he that gathereth not with me scattereth.
language2_text: Nipanci na pa ni Yeso am, "O ji nganod jyaken am mapasobna jyaken an. O ji nidong jyaken am zazatan na o vazay ko an.

language1_text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man, he walketh through dry places, seeking rest; and finding none, he saith, I will return unto my house whence I came out.
language2_text: "Mavozwaw o kalamsoyan ni Satan do tao am omlivolivon a meykala so peywalaman na. Am ji makakala. Maniring am, 'Yapyapya rana o kapeysinaoli ko pa mangay komovot do nikovotan ko a tao.'

language1_text: And when he cometh, he findeth it swept and garnished.
language2_text: Meysinaoli am macita na o tao ang a makownong rana jya. Ta abo nimacipalit a nikomovot jya.

language1_text: Then goeth he, and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself; and they enter in, and dwell there: and the last state of that man is worse than the first.
language2_text: So nyangay na manara so papito a masozisozi pa ka nya a kalamsoyan ni Satan a mangay komovot jya. Manngo tao ori a. Jyabo kaji na rehrehtan pa sicyaikwaya no nakenakem na kano kakwa."

language1_text: And it came to pass, as he spake these things, a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice, and said unto him, Blessed is the womb that bare thee, and the paps which thou hast sucked.
language2_text: Kapyahen na meyzezyak si Yeso am to ngyan do aro a tao so asa ka mavakes. Maniring am, "O niomalavat jimo a kano niomazwazovo jimo am tey yapya."

language1_text: But he said, Yea rather, blessed are they that hear the word of God, and keep it.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Manoyong ori am omamizing so ciring na ni Ama ta do to a kapeyvazay na sya am tey yapya o akman sang a tao!"

language1_text: And when the people were gathered thick together, he began to say, This is an evil generation: they seek a sign; and there shall no sign be given it, but the sign of Jonas the prophet.
language2_text: Rapongen da si Yeso no aro a tao am amyan so ciring na ni Yeso. Maniring jira am, "Yatey rako o raraten no tao sicyaikwaya. Ikongo da kakzeban so da kapakacita so oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to. Am o akman so mina vazay ni Ama ta do to do meyngaran so Yena o macita nyo. So ikabo no maharahara pa kano nang a macita nyo.

language1_text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites, so shall also the Son of man be to this generation.
language2_text: O nimacita da ji Yena a oyowyat ni Ama ta do to no tao do Niniwey am akman sang o oyowyat ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a macita da no tao sicyakwaya.

language1_text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation, and condemn them: for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon; and, behold, a greater than Solomon is here.
language2_text: No marateng o araraw no ipacici na mapeykapyapinpin so tao ni Ama ta do to am o mavakes a panirsirngen da do Siba a ili no kakwa pa am meytatanek a omraherahet jinyo a tao sicyakwaya. Ta iya rana ori am nimapo do marai a ili mangay a omamizing so ciring na no panirsirngen a meyngaran si Solomen. Ko pa ciring jinyo am yamyan do jya so rakorako pa so vazay a kani Solomen am nyo ji ngamiznga.

language1_text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for they repented at the preaching of Jonas; and, behold, a greater than Jonas is here.
language2_text: No marateng o ipacici na mapeykapyapinpin so tao ni Ama ta do to am meytatanek sira o tao do Niniwey a omraherahet jinyo a tao sicyaikwaya. Ta mamizing da o ciring ni Yena am mamlis rana sira. Ko pa ciring jinyo am yamyan do jya so yarakorako pa so vazay a kani Yena am yanyo ji ngapa o nanao na jinyo."

language1_text: No man, when he hath lighted a candle, putteth it in a secret place, neither under a bushel, but on a candlestick, that they which come in may see the light.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Abwata o tao a tomayo so nipaciscisan a zampo a katoong na sya. O pinaciscisan a zampo am pangain do pakacittan sya. So ipakacita da no somdep a tao.

language1_text: The light of the body is the eye: therefore when thine eye is single, thy whole body also is full of light; but when thine eye is evil, thy body also is full of darkness.
language2_text: O mata nyo am akmey zezngang no kataotao nyo an. No si apiya o mata nyo am akmey mazngang o pangonongan nyo an. No si marahet rana o mata nyo am masari rana o citahen nyo.

language1_text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness.
language2_text: Am ori o azimanan nyo so onowned nyo. Ta si mablis o zezak no onowned nyo am mangay o kangay nyo do kasarisaryan.

language1_text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light, having no part dark, the whole shall be full of light, as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light.
language2_text: No si apya o nakenakem nyo a abo so karatan am akman kamo so sang a to maniray an. Akman so mazngang a apoy a somoo jinyo."

language1_text: And as he spake, a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him: and he went in, and sat down to meat.
language2_text: Mateyka a meyzezyak si Yeso am amyan so asa ka tao a macyagom do Vadisay a amrara sya koman do vahay da. Ori o nyangay na ni Yeso.

language1_text: And when the Pharisee saw it, he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner.
language2_text: Macita no tao a macyagom do Vadisay si Yeso am yeyyak na do kaji na mavanawan a todey angan.

language1_text: And the Lord said unto him, Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Inyo rana tao a macyagom do Vadisay am nyo ji peylolita o kakanan nyo am onowned nyo am yamapno no yamakakaday a nyo peyraratenan.

language1_text: Ye fools, did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also?
language2_text: Inyo rana ji mamayok a tao am manngwa, nyo jyatenngi na kapakateneng do kataotao nyo a kano onowned nyo ni Ama ta do to?

language1_text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have; and, behold, all things are clean unto you.
language2_text: So ikazonos nyo a manta no ji makahakaw a tao. Ta ori o akma ney ikatnaw no onowned nyo an.

language1_text: But woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs, and pass over judgment and the love of God: these ought ye to have done, and not to leave the other undone.
language2_text: "To kanyo makasi a tao a macyagom do Vadisay. Tana mapasina kamo so ipeykingking nyo ji Ama ta do to so meykamadadayan a monganay jinyo am yanyo to nazibwan o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a kano nakenakem nyo so icyatatao nyo. Ta ori rana am ji to nazibwan o akman sang a vazay an.

language1_text: Woe unto you, Pharisees! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues, and greetings in the markets.
language2_text: Inyo rana tao a macyagom do Vadisay am to kanyo makasi an. Ta nyo ikakza o nyo kalisna do pamanongan no peyneynozyan a kado karwarwan no tao a komakzeb so da kararalay ninyo no tao.

language1_text: Woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye are as graves which appear not, and the men that walk over them are not aware of them.
language2_text: Am ori o to nyo makasi an! Ta yakanyo akman so jyasingkaji a heseb no tao a jyaziman no mangonong a tao. Tana hapen da o icicirawat nyo no tao am ji da tenngi o karahet no onowned nyo."

language1_text: Then answered one of the lawyers, and said unto him, Master, thus saying thou reproachest us also.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a mapacici si Yeso. Maniring am, "Mo Mangnanao, o ciring mo rana am yamo to mimina yamen a pazagomen?"

language1_text: And he said, Woe unto you also, ye lawyers! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne, and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Inyo rana ya am tey makasi kanyo an. Ta yatey yaro o yamasalit a vazay a nyo ipanci do tao a peyvazain da. Am inyo am yanyo ji patodotodwa o yasa ka tanoro nyo a yanyo isidong sira.

language1_text: Woe unto you! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets, and your fathers killed them.
language2_text: So to nyo makasi an! Ta nyo peyveyveknen o heseb da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa a niweywakwak da no ineynapo nyo.

language1_text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers: for they indeed killed them, and ye build their sepulchres.
language2_text: Am ori o nyo icyakmey macizanod so nakenakem do ineynapo nyo a yanimwakwak so aro a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God, I will send them prophets and apostles, and some of them they shall slay and persecute:
language2_text: Am o mina ciring na ni Ama ta do to am, 'Manovoy ko so panoyonoywan ko so ciring ko a kano nipamnekan ko a tao a omlivolivon no ciriciring ko a mangay jira. Am wakwaken da sira o karwan da. Am o karwan da am peyraraheten da sira.'

language1_text: that the blood of all the prophets, which was shed from the foundation of the world, may be required of this generation;
language2_text: Inyo rana a tao sicyakwaya am mamwamoon jinyo o peyoyaoyyan ni Ama ta do to do aro a panoyonoywan na so ciring na a niwakwak da a nikapo na do nikamaog no karawan an,

language1_text: from the blood of Abel unto the blood of Zacharias, which perished between the altar and the temple: verily I say unto you, It shall be required of this generation.
language2_text: a nimapo ji Yapo kangay na do meyngaran si Sacyadiya a niwakwak da do panaralayan a masngen do patanatanangan so nakem si Ama ta do to. Ko pa ciring jinyo am mamwamoon do tao sicyakwaya o oyaoyyan na nira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Woe unto you, lawyers! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge: ye entered not in yourselves, and them that were entering in ye hindered.
language2_text: Inyo rana yamangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to am to kanyo makasi an! Ta nyo to ngimongan o teneteneng ni Ama ta do to an. Am nyo jyakzan am nyo ji mya o tao a makateneng jya."

language1_text: And as he said these things unto them, the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently, and to provoke him to speak of many things:
language2_text: Karwan na do dang ni Yeso am ikazyak da rana no tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to si Yeso. Am ori o nipacicyan da si Yeso no masasalit a vazay,

language1_text: laying wait for him, and seeking to catch something out of his mouth, that they might accuse him.
language2_text: do kapeynakem da so kasozib da jya.

language1_text: In the mean time, when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people, insomuch that they trode one upon another, he began to say unto his disciples first of all, Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees, which is hypocrisy.
language2_text: No kanang am meycyalaklaksa o tao a meysilisilin. Am ori o nipacizasazasag da so ai. Meyratateng am panomanomahen na ni Yeso o kananao na so macinanao jya. Maniring am, "Azimanen nyo o iyangay da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay. Ta akmey yapya do cittan sya am beken a manoyong sira an.

language1_text: For there is nothing covered, that shall not be revealed; neither hid, that shall not be known.
language2_text: O taywen rana vazay am abwata o ji meytotwaw. O ji meycicicyan a vazay am akman sang a katenngan da no tao.

language1_text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops.
language2_text: O taywen nyo a ciring nyo am akmey ciring nyo do maraw, apya amyamizngan da no tao. O ciriciring nyo do kavahayan nyo am ipeylimwang da a patwawen no aro a tao.

language1_text: And I say unto you my friends, Be not afraid of them that kill the body, and after that have no more that they can do.
language2_text: "Ko pa ciring jinyo manga keypong am ji nyo anyaheyan o omwakwak so kataotao nyo a tao an. Ta ji da wakwak o pahad nyo. So ji nyo a mogawi.

language1_text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear: Fear him, which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell; yea, I say unto you, Fear him.
language2_text: Ko pa ciring jinyo am sino manoyong a ikanyahey nyo. O ikanyahey nyo am o mahap so pahad nyo a kawalit na pa nya do kararatan. Ori rana am si Ama ta do to ori. So ika iya na no ikanyahey nyo.

language1_text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings, and not one of them is forgotten before God?
language2_text: Jyabo kahamang na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a. Kakwakwan da no likta meyyasasalap ori a na manakem ni Ama ta do to am imanngo kamo.

language1_text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered. Fear not therefore: ye are of more value than many sparrows.
language2_text: Am ori an, ji nyo anyaheyan. Ta yarakorako o nakenakem na jinyo a kano meyyasasalap. Tana avok nyo am na nimimin rana nivilangan.

language1_text: Also I say unto you, Whosoever shall confess me before men, him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God:
language2_text: "Ko pa ciring jinyo am omanoyong jyaken do tangain no tao am anoyngan ko ori do tangain ni Ama ta do to a kano aro a tinsi.

language1_text: but he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God.
language2_text: Omalalas jyaken do tangain no tao am alalasan ko ori do tangain ni Ama ta do to a kano aro a tinsi.

language1_text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man, it shall be forgiven him: but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven.
language2_text: Omraherahet jyaken no ciring a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to am mavonas pa ori. Am o omraherahet sya no ciring so Seyzi am to rana meyyonong a jyavonas o akman sang a raraten.

language1_text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues, and unto magistrates, and powers, take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer, or what ye shall say:
language2_text: "Tana rakpen da inyo a yangay do peyneynozyan a kangay da ninyo a pacicin do tangain no panipanirsirngen am ji nyo alawan o ipasapa nyo jira an.

language1_text: for the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say.
language2_text: Ta nanawen na inyo no Seyzi a mapasapa jira."

language1_text: And one of the company said unto him, Master, speak to my brother, that he divide the inheritance with me.
language2_text: Amyan do aro a tao so asa a mapacici si Yeso. Maniring am, "Mo Mangnanao, ipanci mo pa o kakteh ko a kavonong namen so nimataid ji ama icyalaw an."

language1_text: And he said unto him, Man, who made me a judge or a divider over you?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo kahakay, sino yamanci nimo a tomeneng jyaken a omvonong so kangangay nyo."

language1_text: And he said unto them, Take heed, and beware of covetousness: for a man's life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Azimanen nyo kaji nyo mangagoman so meykamadadayan an. Ta tana meynakem o tao ori am beken a ikapintek na do karawan ori."

language1_text: And he spake a parable unto them, saying, The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully:
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangononong si Yeso so payyaingan na sya. Maniring am, "Amyan so asa ka katenngan a tao. Iya rana ori am tey yaro nihakawan na.

language1_text: and he thought within himself, saying, What shall I do, because I have no room where to bestow my fruits?
language2_text: Manakenakem do onowned na am, 'Meypanngonngo ko ya, ta jyabo kapakangay no asyasi no nihakawan ko do vahay ko a.

language1_text: And he said, This will I do: I will pull down my barns, and build greater; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods.
language2_text: No komwan am peyparakwen ko saon o vahay ko a sokzan ko so asyasi no nihakawan ko a kano aro a warawara ko,

language1_text: And I will say to my soul, Soul, thou hast much goods laid up for many years; take thine ease, eat, drink, and be merry.
language2_text: a kanakenakem ko sya do onowned ko so, Yajyarahet o aro a peymasaodan ko a. O yamasokoz do vahay ko am tana to ko na valivalyat do awawan a kakan so naknakmen am ikongo ikarahet ko pa.'

language1_text: But God said unto him, Thou fool, this night thy soul shall be required of thee: then whose shall those things be, which thou hast provided?
language2_text: Am no maniring si Ama ta do to jya am, 'Oyod mo kasagpyan a tao. Sicyamahep rana ya am komavos rana o allag no kataotao mo. Manngwa, sino omamoon so aro a peymeymasaodan mo a yamasokoz do kavavahay mo ang.'"

language1_text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself, and is not rich toward God.
language2_text: Pakavosen ni Yeso o ciring na am ipanci na o, "Sira rana o yamanokoz no kataotao da so peymeymasaodan da am beken a katenngan a tao do tangain ni Ama ta do to o akman sang a tao an."

language1_text: And he said unto his disciples, Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat; neither for the body, what ye shall put on.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "Ko pa ciring jinyo am ji nyo a ratan o kanen nyo a kano ayob nyo.

language1_text: The life is more than meat, and the body is more than raiment.
language2_text: Ta maharahara pa o ipeyigegen nyo do karawan a kano kanen nyo. Meyneynakem pa o kataotao nyo a kano ayob nyo.

language1_text: Consider the ravens: for they neither sow nor reap; which neither have storehouse nor barn; and God feedeth them: how much more are ye better than the fowls?
language2_text: To nyo nita o meyyasasalap an. Ta sira ji hakaw, sira ji manlangi, yabo da panonokozan so kankan da. Ta na avyavyain sira ni Ama ta do to an. Jyabo nyo kajyakdekdengan pa kano meyyasasalap a.

language1_text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit?
language2_text: Manngwa, ikapintek nyo o kalaw nyo no kawakwak nyo?

language1_text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least, why take ye thought for the rest?
language2_text: No si anoyngan nyo ori am ikongo peypeypangayan no kaozoz nyo no makakaday a vazay nyo.

language1_text: Consider the lilies how they grow: they toil not, they spin not; and yet I say unto you, that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these.
language2_text: Citahen nyo pala o vonitan. Ta yaji meyvazay a yaji ninon so ayob na. Am ko pa ciring jinyo am apyapya pa o vonitan a citahen a kano mina aywayob na no meyngaran so Solomen a panirsirngen no kakwa.

language1_text: If then God so clothe the grass, which is to day in the field, and to morrow is cast into the oven; how much more will he clothe you, O ye of little faith?
language2_text: O tamek rana am amyan pa sicyaraw eya. Am simaraw am mahayo rana a kapasleb rana sya do apoy. Tana akman sang o tamek a ji meyyonownay do tana am yana padketan ni Ama ta do to so na ikazway a savong na. Kakwakwan na rana no tamek am imanngo kamo na. Ta jyabo kaji na mantan ninyo so ayob nyo a. Am nyo kaji makanetan so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink, neither be ye of doubtful mind.
language2_text: Am ori o ji nyo alawi no kanen nyo a kano yopen nyo.

language1_text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after: and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things.
language2_text: Ta ori rana am naknakmen da no ji manaralay a tao. Am inyo rana am na katenngan ni Ama ta do to o nyo kakzeben no nakem.

language1_text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God; and all these things shall be added unto you.
language2_text: So ikapinsan na no kakza nyo no katalamozong na ninyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori o torwan na nya jinyo so apyahen nyo no nakem.

language1_text: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
language2_text: "Inyo rana a macilolo jyaken am ji kanyo anyahey an. Ta isaray na ni Ama ta do to o katalamozong na ninyo.

language1_text: Sell that ye have, and give alms; provide yourselves bags which wax not old, a treasure in the heavens that faileth not, where no thief approacheth, neither moth corrupteth.
language2_text: Ipanazang nyo o peymeymasaodan nyo a isidong nyo so ji makahakaw a tao. So ikanoyong nyo amyan do teyngato so peymasaodan a kano kangangay, ta abo dang o tao a tomakaw sya. Abo dang o vozsok a koman sya. So ikanoyong na no peymeymasaodan do dang a ji nyo a giji.

language1_text: For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
language2_text: Ta o yanan no peymeymasaodan nyo am pacilolwan no onowned nyo an.

language1_text: Let your loins be girded about, and your lights burning;
language2_text: "Inyo rana am azimanen nyo o iwawalam nyo,

language1_text: and ye yourselves like unto men that wait for their lord, when he will return from the wedding; that when he cometh and knocketh, they may open unto him immediately.
language2_text: akman so lamlamsoy a tao a omnanala so lawpan da nimapo do mamaring so kanen a nimeysinmo a tao. Ta no makaranes do vahay na o lawpan am iwangan da no lamlamsoy na o pazevngen.

language1_text: Blessed are those servants, whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching: verily I say unto you, that he shall gird himself, and make them to sit down to meat, and will come forth and serve them.
language2_text: Meysinaoli o lawpan am macita na o lamlamsoy na a yapiya so nakenakem. Ori o nisarayan na nira. Ko pa ciring jinyo am jyabo kaji na meyyaywayob no lawpan a mapalisna sira a kangay na tomaotao so lamlamsoy na.

language1_text: And if he shall come in the second watch, or come in the third watch, and find them so, blessed are those servants.
language2_text: Tana mahay o lawpan a mai kapiya no nakenakem da am isaray na sira a ipanlanlag an.

language1_text: And this know, that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come, he would have watched, and not have suffered his house to be broken through.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo o yameykasayan. Ta no katenngan no mapeyvahay sya o araraw no yai no manakaw a tao am jyabo kapakatakaw no manakaw ang.

language1_text: Be ye therefore ready also: for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not.
language2_text: Am ori o ipeytataziman nyo an. Ta ji nyo a tenngi o araraw no ipeysinaoli ko do teyrahem a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao."

language1_text: Then Peter said unto him, Lord, speakest thou this parable unto us, or even to all?
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Mo pakacirngen jyamen ori an? No mo pakacirngen do karwan no tao."

language1_text: And the Lord said, Who then is that faithful and wise steward, whom his lord shall make ruler over his household, to give them their portion of meat in due season?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Sino o ipeyhanhan a tey mapatak a lamlamsoy. Iya rana am ipeyhanhan no lawpan a omaponged no vahay na do kapeyyangangay na so isovo da kanen no karwan no lamlamsoy na.

language1_text: Blessed is that servant, whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing.
language2_text: No mai o lawpan a kapakacita na so lamlamsoy na makapeyvazay so vazay na am manoyong ori a ipanlanlag na.

language1_text: Of a truth I say unto you, that he will make him ruler over all that he hath.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am manoyong rana o akman sang a lamlamsoy a pahanhanen no lawpan a tomalamozong no peymeymasaodan na.

language1_text: But and if that servant say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens, and to eat and drink, and to be drunken;
language2_text: Am no maniring o onowned no lamlamsoy na am, 'Cyaha, ta yapa mahay o lawpan ko a yamai. Sipsipzotan ko o aro a lamlamsoy na a kapaciyoyop ko so saki.'

language1_text: the lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him, and at an hour when he is not aware, and will cut him in sunder, and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers.
language2_text: No to ngai o lawpan do araw no nang am jyabo kaji na pakarwan so lamlamsoy na. Ji na bakbaki ori a pazanoden do ji na meyhanhanan a tao a.

language1_text: And that servant, which knew his lord's will, and prepared not himself, neither did according to his will, shall be beaten with many stripes.
language2_text: Ta o ji ngonot do ciring na no lawpan a lamlamsoy am tey rako oyaoyyan na no akman sang.

language1_text: But he that knew not, and did commit things worthy of stripes, shall be beaten with few stripes. For unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required: and to whom men have committed much, of him they will ask the more.
language2_text: Am o ji makateneng do ciring no lawpan a keyyan no marahet a vazay na am alikelikey o oyyan na nya. Akman sang, ta no aro nipahanhan na jimo a vazay ni Ama ta do to am aro kakdain na jimo.

language1_text: I am come to send fire on the earth; and what will I, if it be already kindled?
language2_text: "O ko nyai am ko peyhekasen o apoy do teyrahem. Inaoy no si manoyong rana masleb.

language1_text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished!
language2_text: Ko akmey todaliliw o yamai jyaken a rako a alalaw ko. Do na yanam pa no alalaw ko am yako tey mazikna so onowned.

language1_text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth? I tell you, Nay; but rather division:
language2_text: Nyo ipanci yaken a yameygegcin no ikapya nyo so nakem do icyatatao nyo an? Beken a ori o ko nyai, ta ko nyai do karawan o ikasyasyay nyo.

language1_text: for from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided, three against two, and two against three.
language2_text: Ta papwen sicyakwaya o ikasyasyay da no lalima do vahay da. O tatlo am ji sira macipaswasovoy do rarwa jira.

language1_text: The father shall be divided against the son, and the son against the father; the mother against the daughter, and the daughter against the mother; the mother in law against her daughter in law, and the daughter in law against her mother in law.
language2_text: So yanam no kapeyrahet da so nakenakem. O meyyama kano meyina kano meycyeycyarwa do vahay am ji sira macipaswasovoy."

language1_text: And he said also to the people, When ye see a cloud rise out of the west, straightway ye say, There cometh a shower; and so it is.
language2_text: Maniring do aro a tao si Yeso am, "No macita nyo o rako a cinalab a apo do keylawdan am makeykai nyo a katenngan o kacimoy na rana.

language1_text: And when ye see the south wind blow, ye say, There will be heat; and it cometh to pass.
language2_text: No malangin do kapyan na am katenngan nyo kapamseng na.

language1_text: Ye hypocrites, ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth; but how is it that ye do not discern this time?
language2_text: Inyo rana a mapakateneteneng a tao am nyo katenngan o kacita nyo so palapalanginan am ikongo nyo ji makatenngi do vazay ni Ama ta do to sicyakwaya.

language1_text: Yea, and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right?
language2_text: "Ikongo nyo ji naknakmi so apipya vazay nyo.

language1_text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate, as thou art in the way, give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him; lest he hale thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the officer, and the officer cast thee into prison.
language2_text: No makasinmo ka so tao a pacioyyan mo am apyapya o to nyongbowa so marahet a vazay nyo do pangonongan nyo. Ta maraherahet o kangay na nimo do mapacici a tao a kaneb da jimo do pamemtengan.

language1_text: I tell thee, thou shalt not depart thence, till thou hast paid the very last mite.
language2_text: Ko pa ciring jinyo am no si katorwan mo na o ahapen da jimo a nizpi do kalasan mo am ori o ipakagag mo so kataotao mo."

language1_text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilæ ans, whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices.
language2_text: No kano nang am amyan so tao a manci nya ji Yeso so, "Yamapatanang sira o Cyadidi a tao so nakem da si Ama ta do to am na to wakwaka sira ni Pilato."

language1_text: And Jesus answering said unto them, Suppose ye that these Galilæ ans were sinners above all the Galilæ ans, because they suffered such things?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Manngwa, nyo ipanci sira o tao do Cyadidi a yarakorako so raraten a kano karwan da? Ori da ikakman sang?

language1_text: I tell you, Nay: but, except ye repent, ye shall all likewise perish.
language2_text: Beken a akman sang. Ko pa ciring jinyo am no si ji kamo mamlis am akman kamo so sang a mawakwak.

language1_text: Or those eighteen, upon whom the tower in Siloam fell, and slew them, think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem?
language2_text: No kazday na no makarang a nyatoy da no tao do Siloya am wao so ikakarwan (18) sira o nikazdayan a kapacitopos da. Ji nyo akwan o karakorako no raraten da kano meyvahay do Yelosaleng a tao an.

language1_text: I tell you, Nay: but, except ye repent, ye shall all likewise perish.
language2_text: Ko pa ciring jinyo am no si ji nyo ablisi o kapeyraraten nyo am akman kamo so sang a macitopos."

language1_text: He spake also this parable; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard; and he came and sought fruit thereon, and found none.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangononong si Yeso so pehngehngayan na sya. Maniring am, "Amyan so asa ka tao a meymowa so ovako a kayo. Mownay am naknakmen na o kapeykala na so asi na am ji makakala.

language1_text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard, Behold, these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree, and find none: cut it down; why cumbereth it the ground?
language2_text: Maniring do lamlamsoy na am, 'Yana katlo a kawan o kayo eya yako nimowa am yapa ji nimeyyasi. So to mo nanbai sya, ta yamanlin.'

language1_text: And he answering said unto him, Lord, let it alone this year also, till I shall dig about it, and dung it:
language2_text: Maniring o lamlamsoy na am, 'Ji kakman sang so nakenakem. Aidan ta pala so kasa kawan a peyveyveknen.

language1_text: and if it bear fruit, well: and if not, then after that thou shalt cut it down.
language2_text: Simakseysawan a kapeyyasi na am ori o vezedan ta sya. No si ji meyyasi am ori o atbahan ta na sya.'"

language1_text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath.
language2_text: Ipisa kapeywalam no tao am mangnanao do peyneynozyan si Yeso.

language1_text: And, behold, there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years, and was bowed together, and could in no wise lift up herself.
language2_text: Amyan dang so asa ka mavakes a kovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan. Nimeyngen a mina kawao so ikarwa (18) so awawan. Am ori o ipeyvovokoz na a ji rana meysonong so likod a tomanek.

language1_text: And when Jesus saw her, he called her to him, and said unto her, Woman, thou art loosed from thine infirmity.
language2_text: Macita na ni Yeso am tawagan na. Maniring jya am, "Mo kavakes, na nikarwan imo rana no ingingnen mo."

language1_text: And he laid his hands on her: and immediately she was made straight, and glorified God.
language2_text: Paoptahen na o lima na ni Yeso am ji nimeyyahahay ori a matazineng rana so kataotao. Ori o nisarayan na nya ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation, because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day, and said unto the people, There are six days in which men ought to work: in them therefore come and be healed, and not on the sabbath day.
language2_text: Macita na no tomalamozong no peyneynozyan si Yeso a mangiwakwak so ingingnen do ipeywalam no tao am meyoyaoya. Maniring do aro a tao am, "Yakanem araw o tamo ipeyvazay. O mangiwakwak so ingingnen rana ya am vazay do kanem araw eya. Am ori o ji pazavozi sya do ipeywalam no tao."

language1_text: The Lord then answered him, and said, Thou hypocrite, doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall, and lead him away to watering?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Inyo rana a mapakapyapya so nakem a tao am manngwa, nyo ji pakana o makakaday a vinyay nyo do ipeywalam no tao?

language1_text: And ought not this woman, being a daughter of Abraham, whom Satan hath bound, lo, these eighteen years, be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day?
language2_text: Yamyan do jya so sivovoong ni Apolahan a yana wao so ikarwa (18) so awawan a na nivaod ni Satan. Manngwa, marahet o kowvay so sang do ipeywalam no tao?"

language1_text: And when he had said these things, all his adversaries were ashamed: and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring ni Yeso no maoya nya tao am meylatlatlat sira. Am nisaray da no aro a tao o mina vazay na jira.

language1_text: Then said he, Unto what is the kingdom of God like? and whereunto shall I resemble it?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Akman so wanjin paro o italamozong na ni Ama ta do to. Ikongo payyaingen ko sya.

language1_text: It is like a grain of mustard seed, which a man took, and cast into his garden; and it grew, and waxed a great tree; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it.
language2_text: Oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to do talamozongan na ninyo am akman so likta vettow no nappa a mowahen no tao do peymowamowan na. No amlida rana am akma raney kayo a peyvahayan no meyyasasalap."

language1_text: And again he said, Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ikongo o payyaingan ko so italamozong na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: It is like leaven, which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal, till the whole was leavened.
language2_text: Oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to do talamozongan na ninyo am akman so kosozi no odong a ahapen no mavakes a pazavozen do odong a ipeymway na sya."

language1_text: And he went through the cities and villages, teaching, and journeying toward Jerusalem.
language2_text: Kakadain na ni Yeso o aro a ili a pangnanawan na a meypangay do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: Then said one unto him, Lord, are there few that be saved? And he said unto them,
language2_text: Pacicin na no asa ka tao. Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, manngwa, apeleh o tao a patazadangen na ni Ama ta do to do teyngato?" Maniring si Yeso jya am,

language1_text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate: for many, I say unto you, will seek to enter in, and shall not be able.
language2_text: "Makowyat kamo a omyavayo so macicya onowned nyo. Ko pa ciring jinyo am aro tao a makza no kasdep da macikaop do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to. Am ji sira makasdep a macikaop jira.

language1_text: When once the master of the house is risen up, and hath shut to the door, and ye begin to stand without, and to knock at the door, saying, Lord, Lord, open unto us; and he shall answer and say unto you, I know you not whence ye are:
language2_text: No aneban na rana no mapeyvahay sya am meytatanek kamo do pantaw a mapaktoktow a manci no, 'Mo kahakay, iwangan mo pa yamen an.' Jyabo kaji na mapeyciringan sya jinyo so, 'Ji kamo makamo am ko jyatenngi o nyo kapwan.'

language1_text: then shall ye begin to say, We have eaten and drunk in thy presence, and thou hast taught in our streets.
language2_text: No maniring kamo am, 'Nimaciyop namen jimo asyo a kapangnanao mo do ili namen asyo.'

language1_text: But he shall say, I tell you, I know you not whence ye are; depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity.
language2_text: O itovis na jinyo am, 'Ko jyatenngi o nyo kapwan. Kazey kamo a yameyraraten a tao!'

language1_text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth, when ye shall see Abraham, and Isaac, and Jacob, and all the prophets, in the kingdom of God, and you yourselves thrust out.
language2_text: No si macita nyo si Apolahan a kani Isa kani Yakebo a kano aro a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a yamacikaop do italamozong ni Ama ta do to am inyo o tovoin da do pantaw a kapeylavilavi nyo a mapeygazicigit so ngepen nyo a maneneseh.

language1_text: And they shall come from the east, and from the west, and from the north, and from the south, and shall sit down in the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Amyan so aro a nimapo do peycyeylilyan na a macihanghang do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And, behold, there are last which shall be first, and there are first which shall be last.
language2_text: O nimacipanownowji a tao am panomanomahen na sira an. O nimacipanomanoma tao am pangain na sira do panowjyan na an."

language1_text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees, saying unto him, Get thee out, and depart hence: for Herod will kill thee.
language2_text: No kano nang am amyan so tao a macyagom do Vadisay a mangay ji Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Apyapya o kakaro mo do jya a mangay do matarek a ili. Ta na vovwan ni Helote o na kawakwak jimo."

language1_text: And he said unto them, Go ye, and tell that fox, Behold, I cast out devils, and I do cures to day and to morrow, and the third day I shall be perfected.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Mangay nyo ipanci do yakmey votdak ang, ta sicyaraw a ka simaraw am mamozwaw ko so kalamsoyan ni Satan a kapangiwakwak ko so meykeyngeyngen a tao. Ikatlo na araw am pakavosen ko o vazay ko.

language1_text: Nevertheless I must walk to day, and to morrow, and the day following: for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem.
language2_text: Tana akman sang am sicyaraw a ka simaraw na ka simakseysaraw na am jyabo kaji ko angayan do Yelosaleng a. Ta do dang o nikawakwakan da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. So ikakman ko sang.

language1_text: O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, which killest the prophets, and stonest them that are sent unto thee; how often would I have gathered thy children together, as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings, and ye would not!
language2_text: "Inyo rana tao do Yelosaleng am nyo niwakwak o panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a nyo kabhebhes jira wakwaken so yana nitovoy ni Ama ta do to a lamlamsoy na jinyo. Ko ikakza o kapahawa ko jinyo do kanginanawan nyo akman so manok a komalopkop so anak na no panid na. Am nyo jyakzan.

language1_text: Behold, your house is left unto you desolate: and verily I say unto you, Ye shall not see me, until the time come when ye shall say, Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord.
language2_text: So peymakarwan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Am ko pa ciring jinyo am ji nyo rana cita yaken an, todangay do pancyan nyo no, 'Azwazwain ta o mai a nitovoy ni Ama ta do to.'"

language1_text: And it came to pass, as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day, that they watched him.
language2_text: Ipisa kapeywalam no tao am mangay macyakan si Yeso do asa ka tao a macyagom do Vadisay do vahay da. Am ori o nileylamdaman da sya no maoya nya tao.

language1_text: And, behold, there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy.
language2_text: Amyan do tangain na so asa ka tao a meycyalipalipad so limalima a kano aiyai.

language1_text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees, saying, Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day?
language2_text: So nipacicyan na sya ni Yeso so aro a mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay. Maniring am, "Manngwa, iwawalam ta o kapangiwakwak so tao do ipeywalam no tao an."

language1_text: And they held their peace. And he took him, and healed him, and let him go;
language2_text: Am ji sira meyzezyak. Am ori o nipinanan na ni Yeso do tao a keywakwak na jya katovoy na sya mangay rana.

language1_text: and answered them, saying, Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit, and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day?
language2_text: Maniring do aro a tao am, "Sino jinyo o to macipanadeng do nimakas do tovong a minapodpod do kataotao nyo a kano vinyay nyo a ji ngapa do ipeywalam no tao."

language1_text: And they could not answer him again to these things.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring ni Yeso am ji da na tenngi a pasapan.

language1_text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden, when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms; saying unto them,
