language1_text: But before all these, they shall lay their hands on you, and persecute you, delivering you up to the synagogues, and into prisons, being brought before kings and rulers for my name's sake.
language2_text: Am do ji na sasnaji pa no alalaw eya am o mahap so ngaran ko a tao am rakpen da sira no tao a kapakakasi da sira, kangay da nira do peyneynozyan a kaneb da jira a kangay da nira do tangain no panipanirsirngen.

language1_text: And it shall turn to you for a testimony.
language2_text: Am ipeylimwang nyo do dang o Mapasaray a Ciriciring ko.

language1_text: Settle it therefore in your hearts, not to meditate before what ye shall answer:
language2_text: Ji nyo alawan o kaji nyo makatenngan do itovis nyo jira an.

language1_text: for I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which all your adversaries shall not be able to gainsay nor resist.
language2_text: Ta ipanta ko inyo so teneng nyo, kaji da makatenngan do ciring nyo a tovisan no maoya ninyo a tao.

language1_text: And ye shall be betrayed both by parents, and brethren, and kinsfolks, and friends; and some of you shall they cause to be put to death.
language2_text: Am ipanazang da inyo no inyapwan nyo a kano kakakteh nyo a kano zipozipos nyo a kano kagagan nyo. So iyan da jinyo no tatasa wakwaken da.

language1_text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name's sake.
language2_text: Mangay o kaoya da ninyo a mahap so vazay ko.

language1_text: But there shall not an hair of your head perish.
language2_text: Am cyaha, ta apzatan na inyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: In your patience possess ye your souls.
language2_text: Ipakowyowyat nyo pa a meyhanhan nyaken. Ta ori o ipakahap nyo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: And when ye shall see Jerusalem compassed with armies, then know that the desolation thereof is nigh.
language2_text: "No si macita nyo o aro a itaysang amlimot so Yelosaleng am to nyo na tenngi o kasngen na rana no alalaw nyo an.

language1_text: Then let them which are in Judæ a flee to the mountains; and let them which are in the midst of it depart out; and let not them that are in the countries enter thereinto.
language2_text: No si makaranes ori am o tao do Yotay am somazok sira. O tao do Yelosaleng am meypakokowbot sira. O amyan do takey a tao am ji sira ngoli.

language1_text: For these be the days of vengeance, that all things which are written may be fulfilled.
language2_text: Ta ori rana o araraw na no oyaoya na nira ni Ama ta do to, do kapangononong na rana no nivatvatkan a mina ciriciring na.

language1_text: But woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck, in those days! for there shall be great distress in the land, and wrath upon this people.
language2_text: O mapasoso a kano mangalavat do araraw no nang am to makasi sira an. Ta amyan so rako a alalaw a mangay domna do Isedi a tao.

language1_text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword, and shall be led away captive into all nations: and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles, until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled.
language2_text: So ikawakwak da do tarem no ipangan a karakep da so tatasa jira yangay do matarek a pongso. So to da makasii no tao na no Yelosaleng a peyyaliliman da no beken a tao do Yotay, mangay no si ipanci na ni Ama ta do to sira omtad no kazapas da so tao do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: And there shall be signs in the sun, and in the moon, and in the stars; and upon the earth distress of nations, with perplexity; the sea and the waves roaring;
language2_text: "O araw a kano vehan a kano mata no hanit am macitarek rana. Do teyrahem rana ya am mamimin sira o tao a manyahey no omhakehakeb a rako awa.

language1_text: men's hearts failing them for fear, and for looking after those things which are coming on the earth: for the powers of heaven shall be shaken.
language2_text: Am ori o nikahamang da manyahey amnanala so akman sang a meydedna jira alalaw. Ta meygonagonay o masamasaod no hanit.

language1_text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.
language2_text: So ipakacita da jyaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao do cinalab a meygegcin no azwazway a kano rako a oyowyat ko.

language1_text: And when these things begin to come to pass, then look up, and lift up your heads; for your redemption draweth nigh.
language2_text: No makaranes rana o alalaw am makowyowyat kamo pa so onowned a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to, ta masngen rana omahap jinyo."

language1_text: And he spake to them a parable; Behold the fig tree, and all the trees;
language2_text: Meyratateng am nanawen na pa sira so payyaingen na so ciring na. Maniring am, "No macita nyo o kayo

language1_text: when they now shoot forth, ye see and know of your own selves that summer is now nigh at hand.
language2_text: a tomyok am katenngan nyo rana o kapeypateyteyka na rana.

language1_text: So likewise ye, when ye see these things come to pass, know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand.
language2_text: Akman sang ta no macita nyo o meykamadadayan a yeyyak nyo no mata am to nyo na tenngi o kakeykai na rana tomalamozong ninyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass away, till all be fulfilled.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo an. Amyan so tao a makapis so vazay eya a meygegcin jinyo.

language1_text: Heaven and earth shall pass away: but my words shall not pass away.
language2_text: Mabalinas o hanit a kano teyrahem am o ciring ko am jyabalinas.

language1_text: And take heed to yourselves, lest at any time your hearts be overcharged with surfeiting, and drunkenness, and cares of this life, and so that day come upon you unawares.
language2_text: "Am ori o apzatan nyo do onowned nyo an. Ta ji kamo to ngyop so saki a maozoz no meykamadadayan a ikeykakza nyo. Ta ji nyo a tenngi o araraw na no ipeydedna na jinyo.

language1_text: For as a snare shall it come on all them that dwell on the face of the whole earth.
language2_text: Ta o araraw na no nang am akman so tawaz a tomawaz so tao do karawan.

language1_text: Watch ye therefore, and pray always, that ye may be accounted worthy to escape all these things that shall come to pass, and to stand before the Son of man.
language2_text: Ori o ikakdekdeng nyo pa meynozi an. Ta ori o ipakahatas nyo so yaomanam a alalaw. So ikabo no ikeykarahet nyo do tangain ko."

language1_text: And in the day time he was teaching in the temple; and at night he went out, and abode in the mount that is called the mount of Olives.
language2_text: No maraw am mangnanao do rako a panaralayan si Yeso. No mahep am mangay do Kanlan a tokon a kaitkeh na do dang.

language1_text: And all the people came early in the morning to him in the temple, for to hear him.
language2_text: Mayokay o aro a tao am mangay sira do tangain na do rako a panaralayan a omamizing so nanao na.

language1_text: Now the feast of unleavened bread drew nigh, which is called the Passover.
language2_text: Masngen rana o ngaranan da Iyeci a ipamaring da so kanen am koman rana sira so ji nimimway a pang.

language1_text: And the chief priests and scribes sought how they might kill him; for they feared the people.
language2_text: O panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to am naknakmen da o ahahapan da si Yeso do limanan da sya. Am ikanyahey da o aro a tao.

language1_text: Then entered Satan into Judas surnamed Iscariot, being of the number of the twelve.
language2_text: No kano nang am nikovotan ni Satan o onowned na no tao do Isecyadi a meyngaran so Yota. Iya rana am ikararwa da so ikakarwan no macinanao ji Yeso.

language1_text: And he went his way, and communed with the chief priests and captains, how he might betray him unto them.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangay si Yota do panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano panipanirsirngen no omzat do rako a panaralayan a macisirsiring no kahap na si Yeso a itoro jira.

language1_text: And they were glad, and covenanted to give him money.
language2_text: So nisarayan da nya. Meyratateng am ipeysirsiring da o itoro da jya nizpi.

language1_text: And he promised, and sought opportunity to betray him unto them in the absence of the multitude.
language2_text: Apyahen na ni Yota o kapanta da nya so nizpi am sapahen na rana do araraw do ikabo no tao a irakep da si Yeso.

language1_text: Then came the day of unleavened bread, when the passover must be killed.
language2_text: No mamaring sira so kanen do ngaranan da Iyeci am koman sira so ji nimimway a pang a kapangap da so asa ka kagling.

language1_text: And he sent Peter and John, saying, Go and prepare us the passover, that we may eat.
language2_text: Am ori o nitovoyan na ni Yeso si Pite a kani Yowani. Maniring jira am, "Mangay kamo pa manita so pamaringan ta so kanen an."

language1_text: And they said unto him, Where wilt thou that we prepare?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Do wanjin mo pancyan nyamen a tomalakanen so pamaringan ta so kanen."

language1_text: And he said unto them, Behold, when ye are entered into the city, there shall a man meet you, bearing a pitcher of water; follow him into the house where he entereth in.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mangay kamo do ili a kapakasinmo nyo so asa ka mahakay a misson so peraranom. Si masinmo nyo ori am to nyo ngonoci ori a kasdep nyo do vahay da.

language1_text: And ye shall say unto the goodman of the house, The Master saith unto thee, Where is the guestchamber, where I shall eat the passover with my disciples?
language2_text: Si maniring kamo do mapeyvahay sya am, 'Na ipanahes jimo no amnanao jyamen do wanjin o pamaringan namen so kanen a vahay,' kwan nyo an,

language1_text: And he shall shew you a large upper room furnished: there make ready.
language2_text: a kangay na ninyo do cinavat no vahay na a kapeysinsinmo nyo do dang so pamaringan ta so kanen."

language1_text: And they went, and found as he had said unto them: and they made ready the passover.
language2_text: Mangay sira am todey mangononong o ciring ni Yeso. Am ori o niyan da rana do dang a mapeykakasa so yaven da.

language1_text: And when the hour was come, he sat down, and the twelve apostles with him.
language2_text: Maseyrem am macihanghang si Yeso do nipamnekan na amlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: And he said unto them, With desire I have desired to eat this passover with you before I suffer:
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Ko isaray o ko kapacihanghang jinyo do na yanam no alalaw ko.

language1_text: for I say unto you, I will not any more eat thereof, until it be fulfilled in the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Ko pa ciring jinyo am jyabo kapacihanghang ko pa jinyo a mamaring so kanen do ji na pa mangononongi no peypeypangayan no tanyo kapamaring so kanen do talamozongan na ninyo ni Ama ta do to a."

language1_text: And he took the cup, and gave thanks, and said, Take this, and divide it among yourselves:
language2_text: Ahapen na ni Yeso o kopo a yanan no potaw cyo am isaray na ji Ama ta do to. Meyratateng am maniring jira am, "Oya rana ya am ahapen nyo a kavonong nyo sya ayopen.

language1_text: for I say unto you, I will not drink of the fruit of the vine, until the kingdom of God shall come.
language2_text: Ko ipanci jinyo am papwen ko sicyaraw eya o kaji ko na ngyopan so potaw cyo mangay no si papwen na ni Ama ta do to o katalamozong na rana ninyo."

language1_text: And he took bread, and gave thanks, and brake it, and gave unto them, saying, This is my body which is given for you: this do in remembrance of me.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ahapen na o pang a kasaray na nya ji Ama ta do to a kakcikcil na sya vonongen jira. Maniring am, "Oya rana am kataotao ko ya a mapatazadang jinyo do teyngato. So to nyo na amwamooni sya a iyapapaw nyo jyaken."

language1_text: Likewise also the cup after supper, saying, This cup is the new testament in my blood, which is shed for you.
language2_text: Mateyka sira koman am akman so sang, ta ahapen na ni Yeso o kopo a yanan no potaw cyo. Maniring am, "Oya rana am rala ko a nimvoyog a omaing jinyo a yongkad no vayo a pangozayan a ciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But, behold, the hand of him that betrayeth me is with me on the table.
language2_text: Am cittey kamo o yamanazang nyaken a tao a yamacihanghang jyaten.

language1_text: And truly the Son of man goeth, as it was determined: but woe unto that man by whom he is betrayed!
language2_text: Ta to ko mangozai a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to do kawakwak da jyaken. Am o manazang nyaken a tao am to makasi an."

language1_text: And they began to enquire among themselves, which of them it was that should do this thing.
language2_text: Am ori o nipeysingsingkad da do keyyan no tao jira a mapeyvazay so akman sang.

language1_text: And there was also a strife among them, which of them should be accounted the greatest.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ikazyak da no macinanao jya, "Sino paro jyaten o pakarakehen ta."

language1_text: And he said unto them, The kings of the Gentiles exercise lordship over them; and they that exercise authority upon them are called benefactors.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "O panirsirngen rana do karawan am abo ji ngamizing so akman sang a tao an. So pancyan da no nang makayokod nira tao.

language1_text: But ye shall not be so: but he that is greatest among you, let him be as the younger; and he that is chief, as he that doth serve.
language2_text: Am ji kamo akman so sang an. Ta o pakarakehen nyo am ji na pahama o nakem na. O panirsirngen am inarahen na o kakma ney lamlamsoy a manidong so tao.

language1_text: For whether is greater, he that sitteth at meat, or he that serveth? is not he that sitteth at meat? but I am among you as he that serveth.
language2_text: Omlisna koman a kano peylamlamsoin da tao am sino meyneynakem jira. O amlisna am ori. Am yaken rana am yako akmey kahanhanan nyo a tao.

language1_text: Ye are they which have continued with me in my temptations.
language2_text: "No myan so alalaw ko am kamo macikaop jyaken.

language1_text: And I appoint unto you a kingdom, as my Father hath appointed unto me;
language2_text: Am ori o torwan ko nya jinyo so na nitoro jyaken ni Ama oyowyat na.

language1_text: that ye may eat and drink at my table in my kingdom, and sit on thrones judging the twelve tribes of Israel.
language2_text: So ipacihanghang nyo jyaken do teyngato no makwa a kalisna nyo do lilisnan no pakaizain a tomalamozong no sivosivovoong da no rarwa so ikakarwan a ananak na ni Yakebo."

language1_text: And the Lord said, Simon, Simon, behold, Satan hath desired to have you, that he may sift you as wheat:
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso am, "Mo Simong, cittey si Satan a nipya ni Ama ta do to a mangay a omlita jinyo.

language1_text: but I have prayed for thee, that thy faith fail not: and when thou art converted, strengthen thy brethren.
language2_text: Am ko na nipeynozi imo. So ji na ablisi no nakenakem mo jyaken. No mamlis ka so nakenakem am vavagan mo sira o akma moy kakteh do cinai an."

language1_text: And he said unto him, Lord, I am ready to go with thee, both into prison, and to death.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite jya am, "Mo Panirsirngen, ko na ninakenakem o kapacihza ko jimo do pamemtengan, kapeynanod ta mawakwak do dang."

language1_text: And he said, I tell thee, Peter, the cock shall not crow this day, before that thou shalt thrice deny that thou knowest me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo Pite, ko pa ciring jimo am sicyamahep rana do itazokokok no manok am ipitlo ka omalalas jyaken."

language1_text: And he said unto them, When I sent you without purse, and scrip, and shoes, lacked ye any thing? And they said, Nothing.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso jira am, "No kakwa pa am nitovoy ko inyo a ji mapalolo so peyninizpyan a kano aywayob nyo a kano tokap nyo. Am ikongo pa yabo jinyo." Maniring sira am, "Yabo rana o namen kalahen."

language1_text: Then said he unto them, But now, he that hath a purse, let him take it, and likewise his scrip: and he that hath no sword, let him sell his garment, and buy one.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Am o na yanan no peyninizpyan na kano ayob sicyaikwaya am palolwen da. O abo so ipangan am ipanazang da o aywayob da kapangap da so ipangan.

language1_text: For I say unto you, that this that is written must yet be accomplished in me, And he was reckoned among the transgressors: for the things concerning me have an end.
language2_text: Ko pa ciring jinyo am o ciriciring rana do Seysyo am, 'Iya am da nipavilang do meyraraten a tao.' O ciriciring rana ori am mangay do kataotao ko ori. Ta o nivatvatkan da ciriciring da jyaken am yamasasnad rana jyaken."

language1_text: And they said, Lord, behold, here are two swords. And he said unto them, It is enough.
language2_text: Maniring o macinanao jya am, "Mo Panirsirngen, cittey o yadwa ka cinalolot do jya." Maniring si Yeso am, "Cyana ori."

language1_text: And he came out, and went, as he was wont, to the mount of Olives; and his disciples also followed him.
language2_text: Makowbot si Yeso do ili am akman sang a mangay do Kanlan a tokon a kapacihza da no macinanao jya.

language1_text: And when he was at the place, he said unto them, Pray that ye enter not into temptation.
language2_text: Makaranes sira do dang am ipanci na jira ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Meynozi kamo an, ta kalittan kamo an."

language1_text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone's cast, and kneeled down, and prayed,
language2_text: Meyratateng am karwan na sira ni Yeso so kabneng no keytan so karairai a kapeylilitod na meynozi.

language1_text: saying, Father, if thou be willing, remove this cup from me: nevertheless not my will, but thine, be done.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Mo Ama, no si apyahen mo am pakarwen mo o yamasagpaw a alalaw ko an. Am ji mo mangozai o nakenakem ko, ta kapangozay mo do nakenakem mo."

language1_text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven, strengthening him.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tinsi a nimapo do teyngato a nimangay a omait do oyowyat na.

language1_text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly: and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground.
language2_text: Ta no kapeynozi na am tey meyngen o onowned na. So icyakman na so rala no anngennget na amiteng. Am arakorako pa o pasyasyan na ni Yeso ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And when he rose up from prayer, and was come to his disciples, he found them sleeping for sorrow,
language2_text: Teyka meynozi am meytatanek si Yeso a mangay do macinanao jya. Makaranes jira am macita na sira meycyaititkeh, ta mapoo sira do kapakanakem da so yaomanam a alalaw ni Yeso.

language1_text: and said unto them, Why sleep ye? rise and pray, lest ye enter into temptation.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Ikongo nyo ipeykaititkeh. Kayokay kamo na kapeynozi nyo, ta kalittan kamo."

language1_text: And while he yet spake, behold a multitude, and he that was called Judas, one of the twelve, went before them, and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him.
language2_text: Ji pa nikomavos o ciring ni Yeso am mangay sira o aro a tao a palolwen na no asa ka macinanao jya a meyngaran so Yota. Iya rana am to manmanma a mangay omrapong si Yeso.

language1_text: But Jesus said unto him, Judas, betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Mo Yota, mo rapongen yaken a mo kapanazang rana nyaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to?"

language1_text: When they which were about him saw what would follow, they said unto him, Lord, shall we smite with the sword?
language2_text: Macita da no karwan da no macinanao ji Yeso am ipanci da, "Mo Panirsirngen, apya kapanavaz namen no takzes?"

language1_text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest, and cut off his right ear.
language2_text: Patavazen no asa ka tao jira o takzes na do lamlamsoy na no panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. Am ori o nikakteb no talinga na do wanan na.

language1_text: And Jesus answered and said, Suffer ye thus far. And he touched his ear, and healed him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ji mo macilimanan nyaken." Meyratateng am pinanan na o talinga no tao ori am apya rana.

language1_text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests, and captains of the temple, and the elders, which were come to him, Be ye come out, as against a thief, with swords and staves?
language2_text: Meyratateng am maniring si Yeso do amrakep sya panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano panipanirsirngen da no omzat do rako a panaralayan a kano kamanrarakehan da am, "Kamo mapalolo so takzes nyo a kano sisipzot nyo a yamrakep jyaken? Nyo patpehan jyaken do manakaw a tao?

language1_text: When I was daily with you in the temple, ye stretched forth no hands against me: but this is your hour, and the power of darkness.
language2_text: Ko mangday so araraw a yamacitovong jinyo do rako a panaralayan am yanyo ji ngapa yaken. Am na karateng rana no araraw a yanyo yahap jyaken do na katalamozong ninyo ni Satan."

language1_text: Then took they him, and led him, and brought him into the high priest's house. And Peter followed afar off.
language2_text: No kanang am rakpen da si Yeso a kangay da nya do vahay da no panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. To na macyazizazawi si Yeso ni Pite.

language1_text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall, and were set down together, Peter sat down among them.
language2_text: Meyratateng am manangdang sira do inaorod no vahay da amlimot so apoy. Si Pite rana am macikaop do aro a tao a manangdang.

language1_text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire, and earnestly looked upon him, and said, This man was also with him.
language2_text: Macita na no asa ka tobang da si Pite a macipanangdang am to na ningkaji. Maniring am, "Kapacihcihza no nya ji Yeso asyo am."

language1_text: And he denied him, saying, Woman, I know him not.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Ko jyasingkaji ori."

language1_text: And after a little while another saw him, and said, Thou art also of them. And Peter said, Man, I am not.
language2_text: Ji pa meyyonownay am to ngyan pa so tao a tomita sya. Maniring am, "Kapacihcihza mo ji Yeso asyo am." Maniring si Pite am, "Ko jyatenngi mo ipanci ang."

language1_text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed, saying, Of a truth this fellow also was with him: for he is a Galilæ an.
language2_text: Hatasen na o asa ka vatvatek no toki am to ngyan pa so asa ka tao a to rana mapatopos so ciring na a manci no, "Jyabo kalas na. Beken a imo eya o yanimacihza ji Yeso? Ta ka macikeylyan jya."

language1_text: And Peter said, Man, I know not what thou sayest. And immediately, while he yet spake, the cock crew.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Ko jyatenngi o mo ipanci ang." Ji na pa teyka o ciring na am nitazokokokan na rana no manok.

language1_text: And the Lord turned, and looked upon Peter. And Peter remembered the word of the Lord, how he had said unto him, Before the cock crow, thou shalt deny me thrice.
language2_text: Meyvazingowngaw si Yeso a tomita si Pite am manakem na o mina ciring na jya ni Yeso a manci no, "Do itazokokok no manok am ipitlo ka omalalas jyaken."

language1_text: And Peter went out, and wept bitterly.
language2_text: Manakem na ori ni Pite am makowbot rana omzezezeng a amlavi.

language1_text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him, and smote him.
language2_text: O tomita si Yeso a tao am peyyaliliman da kasipsipzot da jya,

language1_text: And when they had blindfolded him, they struck him on the face, and asked him, saying, Prophesy, who is it that smote thee?
language2_text: kabengbeng da so mata na a pacicin. Maniring sira am, "Pancyan pala. Sino jyamen o yambakbak jimo ang."

language1_text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him.
language2_text: Aro ciring da a ipeyleylak da sya.

language1_text: And as soon as it was day, the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together, and led him into their council, saying,
language2_text: Madagdag am meysinsinmo rana sira o kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay a meysirisiring nya. Sira rana ori am panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to, kangay da ni Yeso do peykeykaygyan da.

language1_text: Art thou the Christ? tell us. And he said unto them, If I tell you, ye will not believe:
language2_text: Maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Pancyan pala jyamen. Manngwa, ka manoyong a si Kizisto an?" Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Tana ipeypanci ko jinyo am jyabo kanoyong nyo jyaken a.

language1_text: and if I also ask you, ye will not answer me, nor let me go.
language2_text: No si myan so ipacici ko jinyo am jyabo kapasapa nyo jyaken a.

language1_text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God.
language2_text: Am makeykai ko rana amlisna do wanan na ni Ama ta do to a ney mowyat na an."

language1_text: Then said they all, Art thou then the Son of God? And he said unto them, Ye say that I am.
language2_text: Maniring sira o aro a tao am, "Anak na imo saon ni Ama ta do to?" Maniring si Yeso jira am, "O nipanci nyo rana am yamanoyong."

language1_text: And they said, What need we any further witness? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Tana ji ta makakala so ciring a iraherahet ta sya am cyaha, ta ta na nimamizing o na iraherahet si Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And the whole multitude of them arose, and led him unto Pilate.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mamimin sira o tao a mangay ni Yeso do tangain na ni Pilato,

language1_text: And they began to accuse him, saying, We found this fellow perverting the nation, and forbidding to give tribute to Cæ sar, saying that he himself is Christ a King.
language2_text: a kalavat da rana so iraherahet da sya. Maniring sira am, "Namen nimacita ya yamapasozisozi so keylyan ta a na kapanci pa no ji noro so deyking do panirsirngen a na kapanci no kataotao na si Kizisto a panirsirngen."

language1_text: And Pilate asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered him and said, Thou sayest it.
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato ji Yeso am, "Panirsirngen da imo no tao do Yotay?" Maniring si Yeso am, "Noon, manoyong ori."

language1_text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people, I find no fault in this man.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ipanci na ni Pilato do panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano aro a tao. Maniring am, "Ko ji makakala so yamakdeng a raraten no tao eya."

language1_text: And they were the more fierce, saying, He stirreth up the people, teaching throughout all Jewry, beginning from Galilee to this place.
language2_text: Am ikavevevek da amlololos no tao a manci no, "Yanimangnanao ori do Yotay eya. Am na papwen do Cyadidi yana kangay nya do jya so na pasozisozyan so aro a tao."

language1_text: When Pilate heard of Galilee, he asked whether the man were a Galilæ an.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Pilato o aro a ciring da am ipanci na jira. Maniring am, "Yameyvahay do Cyadidi o tao eya?"

language1_text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod's jurisdiction, he sent him to Herod, who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time.
language2_text: Katenngan na si Yeso a nimapo do yaponged na ni Helote a ili am ori o nyangayan da nya ji Helote. No kano nang am amyan si Helote do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: And when Herod saw Jesus, he was exceeding glad: for he was desirous to see him of a long season, because he had heard many things of him; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him.
language2_text: Macita na ni Helote si Yeso am masaray. Ta nimamizing na rana o aro a vazay na ni Yeso. Am ori o nikakzeban na sya a citahen so mapangyangyalak a vazay na.

language1_text: Then he questioned with him in many words; but he answered him nothing.
language2_text: Am ori o nipacicyan na si Yeso no aro a ciriciring. Am abwata o asa ka ciring a nitovis na jya ni Yeso.

language1_text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him.
language2_text: Sira rana o panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to am arakorako pa o patwawen da iraherahet da sya.

language1_text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought, and mocked him, and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe, and sent him again to Pilate.
language2_text: Am ori rana o nipeyyaliliman da jya ni Helote a kano aro a itaysang do dang. So nipeymetdehan da sya, kapayob da jya so akmey ayob no panirsirngen, kangay da rana nya ji Pilato.

language1_text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together: for before they were at enmity between themselves.
language2_text: O araraw na no nang am niyapwan no kapeykagagan da ni Helote a kani Pilato. No kabo na pa no vazay ori am ji sira masyakan so kanekanen sira ang.

language1_text: And Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,
language2_text: Nilovot na sira ni Pilato o panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan da tao a kano aro a tao.

language1_text: said unto them, Ye have brought this man unto me, as one that perverteth the people: and, behold, I, having examined him before you, have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him:
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "O nyo nyai jyaken a tao eya am yakmey yamapasozisozi so aro a tao. Am ko pacicin do nyo tangain am ko ji makakala so yasa ka raraten na.

language1_text: No, nor yet Herod: for I sent you to him; and, lo, nothing worthy of death is done unto him.
language2_text: Si Helote rana am akman sang, ta abo makala na raraten na. Am ori o nyayyan na nya do jya. So na ikabwata no raraten na a iwakwak ta sya.

language1_text: I will therefore chastise him, and release him.
language2_text: Kapanci ko no tao a somipsipzot jya kapasaway ko rana sya."

language1_text: (For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast.)
language2_text: [Mangday no akman sang kapamaring da so kanen o kato na mangozayan do pamnekan da no tao a mapasaway so asa ka nipteng da tao.]

language1_text: And they cried out all at once, saying, Away with this man, and release unto us Barabbas:
language2_text: Mamizing da no aro a tao o ciriciring na am ikavevek da amlololos a manci no, "Zakaten nyo a kapasaway mo si Palapa a itoro mo jyamen."

language1_text: (who for a certain sedition made in the city, and for murder, was cast into prison.)
language2_text: Si Palapa rana am mapasobsobna do seyvo a kapanwakwak na so tao. Am ori o niptengan da sya.

language1_text: Pilate therefore, willing to release Jesus, spake again to them.
language2_text: Naknakmen na ni Pilato o kapasaway na si Yeso. Am ori o nipakekan na so aro a tao.

language1_text: But they cried, saying, Crucify him, crucify him.
language2_text: Am ikavevevek da amlololos no aro a tao a manci no, "Padketen do jyojika! Padketen do jyojika!"

language1_text: And he said unto them the third time, Why, what evil hath he done? I have found no cause of death in him: I will therefore chastise him, and let him go.
language2_text: Ipitlo na sira pacicin ni Pilato am ipanci na jira o, "Ikeykongo raraten na no nya. Jyabo ko kapakakala so iwakwak ta sya raraten na. Am ori o pancyan ko no tao a somipsipzot jya kapasaway ko na sya."

language1_text: And they were instant with loud voices, requiring that he might be crucified. And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed.
language2_text: Mamizing da no aro a tao am ikavevevek da amlololos a manci no, "Padketen si Yeso do jyojika!" Ji na pasovoy sira am to na rana ngonoci sira,

language1_text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required.
language2_text: kapangozay na ni Pilato do mina ciring da jya no aro a tao.

language1_text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison, whom they had desired; but he delivered Jesus to their will.
language2_text: Meyratateng am pasawain na si Palapa a nipteng da nimapasobsobna do seyvo a nimanwakwak so tao a katoro na ni Yeso jira a peyyaliliman da.

language1_text: And as they led him away, they laid hold upon one Simon, a Cyrenian, coming out of the country, and on him they laid the cross, that he might bear it after Jesus.
language2_text: Yangay da si Yeso no itaysang no Loma am masinmo da o asa ka tao do Cidinay a meyngaran si Simong a omalam a omoli a apo do takey a karakep da sya a pahanhanen da a somabway no jyojika kapacilolo na ji Yeso.

language1_text: And there followed him a great company of people, and of women, which also bewailed and lamented him.
language2_text: O macilolo ji Yeso a aro a tao am amyan so aro a mavakes a ji ngoring amlavi jya.

language1_text: But Jesus turning unto them said, Daughters of Jerusalem, weep not for me, but weep for yourselves, and for your children.
language2_text: Meyvazingowngaw si Yeso am ipanci na jira. Maniring am, "Inyo rana mavavakes do Yelosaleng am ji nyo lavii yaken. Apyapya kalavi nyo do kataotao nyo a kano ananak nyo.

language1_text: For, behold, the days are coming, in the which they shall say, Blessed are the barren, and the wombs that never bare, and the paps which never gave suck.
language2_text: Ta makeykai rana o kasasnad no araraw no arako a alalaw nyo. So iyan no tao a manci no, 'O ji nimeytaodtod a tao a kabwata no ananak da am tey yapya o ngilin da no akman sang a tao.'

language1_text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains, Fall on us; and to the hills, Cover us.
language2_text: No marateng ori am amyan so tao a manci nya do rako a tokon so: 'Kazday jyamen,' a kapanci da nya do likta tokon so: 'Bonbonyey yamen.'

language1_text: For if they do these things in a green tree, what shall be done in the dry?
language2_text: No si akman sang a vazay da jyaken abo so raraten am mapanepanes pa o vazay da jinyo."

language1_text: And there were also two other, malefactors, led with him to be put to death.
language2_text: No kano nang am mangap sira so rarwa ka meyraraten a tao pehzahen da ji Yeso a wakwaken.

language1_text: And when they were come to the place, which is called Calvary, there they crucified him, and the malefactors, one on the right hand, and the other on the left.
language2_text: Makaranes sira do angayan da ngaranan da Yanga no oo no tao am padketen da dang si Yeso do jyojika a kapadket da so rarwa ka meyraraten a tao. O asa am amyan do wanan na. O asa am amyan do ozi na.

language1_text: Then said Jesus, Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do. And they parted his raiment, and cast lots.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo Ama, vonasen mo o raraten da no yamapadket jyaken a tao an. Ta da jyatenngi o vazay da jyaken." Meyratateng am masipangoyongoyot sira o itaysang no Loma amvonong so mina ayob na ni Yeso.

language1_text: And the people stood beholding. And the rulers also with them derided him, saying, He saved others; let him save himself, if he be Christ, the chosen of God.
language2_text: Aro tao a meytatanek a tomangara sya. O panipanirsirngen no tao do Yotay am meykeykaming sira manci no, "Na mavyay sira o tao am no yamanoyong a na nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a Kizisto am na ji vyai so kataotao na."

language1_text: And the soldiers also mocked him, coming to him, and offering him vinegar,
language2_text: Akman sang o aro a itaysang no Loma a meykeykaming nya a kapakasngen da tomoro no makopad a saki jya.

language1_text: and saying, If thou be the king of the Jews, save thyself.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "No ka manoyong a panirsirngen no tao do Yotay am mo ji vyai so kataotao mo?"

language1_text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek, and Latin, and Hebrew, THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS.
language2_text: O nivatvatkan da do teyngato no oo na kayo am, "Iya ya am Panirsirngen da no tao do Yotay."

language1_text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him, saying, If thou be Christ, save thyself and us.
language2_text: O rarwa nimeyraraten a nipazasing da jya nipadket da am amyan so asa a manci no, "Beken a si Kizisto ka? Mo ji vyai so kataotao mo a kavyay mo jyamen!"

language1_text: But the other answering rebuked him, saying, Dost not thou fear God, seeing thou art in the same condemnation?
language2_text: Mamizing na no asa ka meyraraten a tao am ioya na. Maniring am, "Yata meyyangay a yada wakwaken. Manngwa, mo jyanyaheyan si Ama ta do to?

language1_text: And we indeed justly; for we receive the due reward of our deeds: but this man hath done nothing amiss.
language2_text: Manoyong ta ya da wakwaken do katey marahet ta tao. Am iya rana am yabwata o yasa ka raraten na."

language1_text: And he said unto Jesus, Lord, remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom.
language2_text: Meyratateng am maniring ori ji Yeso am, "Mo Yeso, no si ipirwa ka mai a meypanirsirngen am manakem mo yaken an."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto him, Verily I say unto thee, To day shalt thou be with me in paradise.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Ko pa ciring jimo am macihza ka jyaken sicyaraw eya mangay do teyngato."

language1_text: And it was about the sixth hour, and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour.
language2_text: Aknamen na o mararaw am todabo o araw a kapeysarisari na no karatayan mangay do ikatlo na vatvatek do makoyab.

language1_text: And the sun was darkened, and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst.
language2_text: Mina todapising o myan do rako a panaralayan a nibengbeng da sya rako a milakayob.

language1_text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice, he said, Father, into thy hands I commend my spirit: and having said thus, he gave up the ghost.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amlololos si Yeso a manci no, "Mo Ama, itoro ko jimo o pahad ko." Teyka na o ciring na am mazavat o inawan na.

language1_text: Now when the centurion saw what was done, he glorified God, saying, Certainly this was a righteous man.
language2_text: Macita na no panirsirngen da no itaysang no Loma o aro a vazay am iraralay na si Ama ta do to a manci no, "Manoyong o tao eya ji meyraraten an."

language1_text: And all the people that came together to that sight, beholding the things which were done, smote their breasts, and returned.
language2_text: Macita da o akman sang a vazay no tomangara sya a tao am to sira na lavi so onowned a meypangay rana do vahay da.

language1_text: And all his acquaintance, and the women that followed him from Galilee, stood afar off, beholding these things.
language2_text: O makasingkad si Yeso a tao a kano nimapo do Cyadidi a macihcihza jya mavakes am meytatanek sira macyatovang a marai a tomita so vazay ang.

language1_text: And, behold, there was a man named Joseph, a counsellor; and he was a good man, and a just: (the same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them;) he was of Arimathæ a, a city of the Jews: who also himself waited for the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tao a meyngaran si Yoseyvo a tao do Yotay a meyvahay do ili a meyngaran so Adimatay. Iya rana ori am tey yapya o iyangay na no nang so icyatatao na a mapapanala so katalamozong na nyaten ni Ama ta do to. Tana mina saod na so keyyan na do asa ka panirsirngen am ji na nipya no nang o mina vazay da si Yeso. Amyan so asa ka tao a meyngaran si Yoseyvo a tao do Yotay a meyvahay do ili a meyngaran so Adimatay. Iya rana ori am tey yapya o iyangay na no nang so icyatatao na a mapapanala so katalamozong na nyaten ni Ama ta do to. Tana mina saod na so keyyan na do asa ka panirsirngen am ji na nipya no nang o mina vazay da si Yeso.

language1_text: This man went unto Pilate, and begged the body of Jesus.
language2_text: Mangay ori a macisirsiring ji Pilato so kakas na so kataotao na ni Yeso.

language1_text: And he took it down, and wrapped it in linen, and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone, wherein never man before was laid.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangay na rana pakasen o kataotao na ni Yeso do jyojika a kapongos na jya no milakayob a yangay do nidokdokan na rana rako a mao. Am abo pa do dang o nimrakeh a tao a.

language1_text: And that day was the preparation, and the sabbath drew on.
language2_text: O araraw na no nang am ikalima na zezak a ipeypanam na no kapeywalam no tao.

language1_text: And the women also, which came with him from Galilee, followed after, and beheld the sepulchre, and how his body was laid.
language2_text: O nimapo do Cyadidi a nimacihza ji Yeso a mavavakes am macilolo sira ji Yoseyvo a mangay tomita so nipakakasan na sya.

language1_text: And they returned, and prepared spices and ointments; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment.
language2_text: Omoli sira do vahay da am mapeysinsinmo sira so mahangno a haneng a kato da mangozayan do iwawalam da a meywalam do ipeyweywalam no tao.

language1_text: Now upon the first day of the week, very early in the morning, they came unto the sepulchre, bringing the spices which they had prepared, and certain others with them.
language2_text: Madagdag do niciyo am palolwen da na no mavavakes ang o nipeysinsinmo da mahangno a haneng a mangay do nipakakasan da si Yeso.

language1_text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre.
language2_text: Makaranes sira am to da cita o rako a vato a aneb na a nimalolog.

language1_text: And they entered in, and found not the body of the Lord Jesus.
language2_text: Somdep sira am abo rana o kataotao ni Yeso.

language1_text: And it came to pass, as they were much perplexed thereabout, behold, two men stood by them in shining garments:
language2_text: Naknakmen da o akman sang a vazay am to ngyan so rarwa ka tinsi a maniray so ayob a meytatanek do katangked da.

language1_text: and as they were afraid, and bowed down their faces to the earth, they said unto them, Why seek ye the living among the dead?
language2_text: So nikanyahey da ambengbeng so moing da. Maniring o rarwa ka tinsi jira am, "Ikongo nyo ipeykala so mavyay a tao do yanan no nimawakwak a tao.

language1_text: He is not here, but is risen: remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee,
language2_text: Yaji ngyan do jya, ta yana nimavyay. Naknakmen nyo an o mina ciring na jinyo do Cyadidi an. Ta maniring asyo am,

language1_text: saying, The Son of man must be delivered into the hands of sinful men, and be crucified, and the third day rise again.
language2_text: 'Iya rana am itoro da do lima no ji manaralay a tao a kapadket da sya do jyojika a kavyay na rana do ikatlo na araw.'"

language1_text: And they remembered his words,
language2_text: Am ori o nipakanakman da rana sya no mavavakes so mina ciring na ni Yeso,

language1_text: and returned from the sepulchre, and told all these things unto the eleven, and to all the rest.
language2_text: a kakaro da rana do dang a mangay manci nya do asa so ikakarwan a macinanao ji Yeso a kano aro a tao so nimacita da vazay.

language1_text: It was Mary Magdalene, and Joanna, and Mary the mother of James, and other women that were with them, which told these things unto the apostles.
language2_text: O ngarangaran da no mavavakes am Matelyan Madiya kani Yeanna kano ina na ni Yake a meyngaran si Madiya kano karwan da mavakes.

language1_text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales, and they believed them not.
language2_text: Am o mina ciring da jira no mavavakes am ji da nganoyngi no nipamnekan na ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na, ta ala da to ngamaoga a ciring, kwan da.

language1_text: Then arose Peter, and ran unto the sepulchre; and stooping down, he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves, and departed, wondering in himself at that which was come to pass.
language2_text: Si Pite am mina to malalayo a mangay do nipakakasan da sya a kapeylologod na tomita sya. Am o nivaovaod da rana sya milakayob o nimacita na. Am ori o nioli na a somavasavak no nimacita na vazay.

language1_text: And, behold, two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus, which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs.
language2_text: Do araraw no kano nang am amyan so rarwa ka tao a meypangay do asa ka ili. O ngaran no ili ori am Imao. O karairai na no ili ori do Yelosaleng am atlo a ka vatvatek o yalam sya.

language1_text: And they talked together of all these things which had happened.
language2_text: Sira rana ori do nyalaman da am malavat da o mina vazay do araraw no nang.

language1_text: And it came to pass, that, while they communed together and reasoned, Jesus himself drew near, and went with them.
language2_text: Kapyahen da meysirisiring am macisngen si Yeso jira a kapacihza na jira omalam.

language1_text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him.
language2_text: Macita da si Yeso am ji da na tovili.

language1_text: And he said unto them, What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another, as ye walk, and are sad?
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Ikongo nyo malavat ang." Mamizing da am mina to neyked sira a marahet nya so onowned.

language1_text: And the one of them, whose name was Cleopas, answering said unto him, Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem, and hast not known the things which are come to pass there in these days?
language2_text: O asa ka tao jira meyngaran so Kelopa a mapacici si Yeso. Maniring am, "Manngwa, mo pa jya nimamizing o vazay do Yelosaleng a yamiseysan do dang?"

language1_text: And he said unto them, What things? And they said unto him, Concerning Jesus of Nazareth, which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ikongo a vazay." Maniring sira am, "Vazay na ni Yeso a tao do Nasale. Iya rana am panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to, tey mowyat so ciriciring do tangain ni Ama ta do to a kano aro a tao.

language1_text: and how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death, and have crucified him.
language2_text: Iya rana ori am da todey ngapa no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem ta si Ama ta do to a kano aro a panipanirsirngen a wakwaken a kapadket da rana sya do jyojika.

language1_text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel: and beside all this, to day is the third day since these things were done.
language2_text: Namen nipanci ya a nimai a mapatastas so Isedi a tao. Am yajyakman sang, ta ikatlo na araw ya no akman sang a vazay.

language1_text: Yea, and certain women also of our company made us astonished, which were early at the sepulchre;
language2_text: Da nipaogto yamen no yamakanateng a mavavakes, ta sira niomhep a yanimangay do nipakakasan da sya.

language1_text: and when they found not his body, they came, saying, that they had also seen a vision of angels, which said that he was alive.
language2_text: Am yada jya nimacita do dang o kataotao na. Am ori o da nipeysinaoli a manci no, 'Yamyan so namen nimacita a tinsi, na kapanci nya jyamen so na kanimavyay rana ni Yeso.'

language1_text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre, and found it even so as the women had said: but him they saw not.
language2_text: Yamangay sira o karwan jyamen do nipakakasan da sya a tomita sya am yajyalas o ciring da no mavavakes, ta yabo rana si Yeso."

language1_text: Then he said unto them, O fools, and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Manoyong kamo a yajyateteneng a tao an. Ta ikongo nyo ji nganoyngi do ciring da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa.

language1_text: ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory?
language2_text: Manngwa, nyo jyatenngi o kangay no akman sang a alalaw no Misayya a kai na rana no azwazway na?"

language1_text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets, he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself.
language2_text: Meyratateng am pangozayan na o nivatvatkan ni Moyse a kano panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a kaononong na rana do mina ciring da sya do Seysyo a omagaz do kataotao na.

language1_text: And they drew nigh unto the village, whither they went: and he made as though he would have gone further.
language2_text: Masngen rana kapakaranes da do angayan da a ili am to mangonong pa si Yeso.

language1_text: But they constrained him, saying, Abide with us: for it is toward evening, and the day is far spent. And he went in to tarry with them.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ipanci da si Yeso a macisan jira, ta makeykai rana o kahep na. Am ori o nionotan na jira ni Yeso.

language1_text: And it came to pass, as he sat at meat with them, he took bread, and blessed it, and brake, and gave to them.
language2_text: Amhezsad a macihanghang jira si Yeso am ahapen na o myanpaw kasaray na nya ji Ama ta do to a kapeyketeb na sya a itoro na jira.

language1_text: And their eyes were opened, and they knew him; and he vanished out of their sight.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mina todeywangi o mata da. Am ori o nipakasingkadan da ji Yeso. Am todabo rana si Yeso.

language1_text: And they said one to another, Did not our heart burn within us, while he talked with us by the way, and while he opened to us the scriptures?
language2_text: Maniring sira do kadwan jira am, "Yanimacisirsiring jyaten do ta pangonongan a na kapangononong jyaten so Seysyo no kano nang am ta mina todeyrasi so onowned a yamasaray a omamizing sya!"

language1_text: And they rose up the same hour, and returned to Jerusalem, and found the eleven gathered together, and them that were with them,
language2_text: So nikakeykai da nimeysinaoli do Yelosaleng. Makaranes sira do dang am macita da o asa so ikakarwan a macinanao ji Yeso a kano aro a kararay da a malovot do dang,

language1_text: saying, The Lord is risen indeed, and hath appeared to Simon.
language2_text: a makalavat so kanoyong ni Yeso a nimeyvangon rana a kanimapacita na rana ji Simong.

language1_text: And they told what things were done in the way, and how he was known of them in breaking of bread.
language2_text: O rarwa ori am malavat da o mina vazay da do rarahan no kapeypangay da do Imao a kapakalavat da so kanimapeyketeb na ni Yeso so myanpaw a itoro na jira. Am ori o nipakatovilan da rana jya. Ori o mina ciring da do aro a tao no rarwa ori.

language1_text: And as they thus spake, Jesus himself stood in the midst of them, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.
language2_text: Malavat da o aro a vazay am to meytatanek si Yeso do tangain da a manci nya jira so, "Kokay kamo."

language1_text: But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.
language2_text: Am ori o niogtwan da nya a mapatolin sya do anito.

language1_text: And he said unto them, Why are ye troubled? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ikongo nyo ikanyahey a ji meyhanhan nyaken.

language1_text: Behold my hands and my feet, that it is I myself: handle me, and see; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones, as ye see me have.
language2_text: Cittey kamo o lima ko a kano ai ko so ika yaken na. Beken a kadwan. Pinaney kamo yaken. Ori o ipakateneng nyo jya, ta ji sira meyyasisi. Ji sira meytotowang o anito. Cittey kamo. Ta yamyan so asisi ko a kano totowang ko!"

language1_text: And when he had thus spoken, he shewed them his hands and his feet.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ipacita na jira o lima na kano ai na.

language1_text: And while they yet believed not for joy, and wondered, he said unto them, Have ye here any meat?
language2_text: Am katenngan da o kasaray da am ipeyzokab da. Am ori o ji da pa nganoyngi jya. So peycirngan na jira so, "Yamyan so kanen nyo do jya?"

language1_text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish, and of an honeycomb.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangap sira so asa cilad a nisazaban a among a patodahen jya.

language1_text: And he took it, and did eat before them.
language2_text: Todahen na jira kakan na rana sya do tangain da.

language1_text: And he said unto them, These are the words which I spake unto you, while I was yet with you, that all things must be fulfilled, which were written in the law of Moses, and in the prophets, and in the psalms, concerning me.
language2_text: Meyratateng am maniring jira si Yeso am, "O aro a vazay rana ya am nimalavat ko na jinyo no kakwa pa. O nivatvatkan ni Moyse a kano panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a kano nivatvatkan a Anwanood a yaomagaz jyaken am yarana nimangononong."

language1_text: Then opened he their understanding, that they might understand the scriptures,
language2_text: Ori o icyakma dey mababa so nakenakem. So ipakateneng da do Ciriciring no Seysyo.

language1_text: and said unto them, Thus it is written, and thus it behoved Christ to suffer, and to rise from the dead the third day:
language2_text: Maniring pa jira am, "O nivatvatkan da do Seysyo a ciriciring am amyan so alalaw ni Kizisto. Ikatlo na araw am mirwa pa mavyay.

language1_text: and that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations, beginning at Jerusalem.
language2_text: Am ori o papwen sya do Yelosaleng a meylimwang no mamlis a kano manvonas so raraten a ciriciring a kangay na do peycyamahamahatawan na.

language1_text: And ye are witnesses of these things.
language2_text: Inyo o yongkad no vazay ko a nidomket do Seysyo, do mina kapakacita nyo so akman sya a vazay a nimangononong rana.

language1_text: And, behold, I send the promise of my Father upon you: but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem, until ye be endued with power from on high.
language2_text: Tovoin ko jinyo o Seyzi a nipanci na a itoro na jinyo ni Ama. Am to kamo ngyan do ili eya amnanala sya mangay no si parawaten na jinyo o oyowyat apo do teyngato."

language1_text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany, and he lifted up his hands, and blessed them.
language2_text: Meyratateng am palolwen na sira ni Yeso a mangay do meyngaran so Potani a ili. Amyan sira do dang am ipanlanlag na sira no lima na.

language1_text: And it came to pass, while he blessed them, he was parted from them, and carried up into heaven.
language2_text: Ipanlanlag na sira am karwan na rana sira a meycyakavat a mangay do teyngato.

language1_text: And they worshipped him, and returned to Jerusalem with great joy:
language2_text: Ori o niraralayan da nya masasaray so onowned a meysinaoli do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: and were continually in the temple, praising and blessing God. Amen.
language2_text: So nikasangib da rana do rako a panaralayan a omazwazway si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.
language2_text: No kaji na pa amaogan no karawan am amyan rana o Ciring ni Ama ta do to. O Ciring rana am macilovot ji Ama ta do to. O Ciring am manoyong a Tao do to.

language1_text: The same was in the beginning with God.
language2_text: Nimakalapo no kakwa o kapacilovot no Ciring eya ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: All things were made by him; and without him was not any thing made that was made.
language2_text: Ciring o nyamaog na ni Ama ta do to so makakaday. So ikabo no asa ka maoran no karawan a ji na nyamaog no Ciring eya.

language1_text: In him was life; and the life was the light of men.
language2_text: O Ciring ni Ama ta do to am ori o yapwan no inawan no tao. O inawan rana am zezngang a ikavyay no tao.

language1_text: And the light shineth in darkness; and the darkness comprehended it not.
language2_text: O zezak am cirain na o kasarisaryan. So ji na makahespi so mazngang no masari.

language1_text: There was a man sent from God, whose name was John.
language2_text: O meyngaran so Yowani a tao am nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to a lamlamsoy na.

language1_text: The same came for a witness, to bear witness of the Light, that all men through him might believe.
language2_text: Iya rana am ipanci na do tao o zezngang a kamimin no tao a makamizing sya kapanganoyong da rana.

language1_text: He was not that Light, but was sent to bear witness of that Light.
language2_text: Am beken a iya ori o zezak ang, ta o kapangnanao na no zezak ang.

language1_text: That was the true Light, which lighteth every man that cometh into the world.
language2_text: O zezak rana am manoyong a zezngang apo do teyngato a tomiray so tao do karawan.

language1_text: He was in the world, and the world was made by him, and the world knew him not.
language2_text: O Ciring rana am amyan rana do karawan a nipangamaog na ni Ama ta do to so karawan. Am kaji da makatenngan jya no tao do karawan.

language1_text: He came unto his own, and his own received him not.
language2_text: Mangay do pacikeylyan na am to da nazibwan no tao do dang.

language1_text: But as many as received him, to them gave he power to become the sons of God, even to them that believe on his name:
language2_text: Sira rana ji nazibo nya tao a kano omanoyong jya tao am abneken na sira akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: which were born, not of blood, nor of the will of the flesh, nor of the will of man, but of God.
language2_text: Am beken a meyngongyod sira ori a nimapodpod so kataotao ji Ama ta do to, ta omaing do kanoyong da ji Ama ta do to. Am ori o abnekan na sira akma ney anak.

language1_text: And the Word was made flesh, and dwelt among us, (and we beheld his glory, the glory as of the only begotten of the Father, ) full of grace and truth.
language2_text: So nipeyvaliw no Ciring a tao a macikaop jyaten a tey rako so pangangarilawan a tey manoyong. So nipakacittan namen rana so azwazway na. So ikanoyong na abo so ikararwa angayan no azwazway. Ta iya rana am veyvowen na Anak ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: John bare witness of him, and cried, saying, This was he of whom I spake, He that cometh after me is preferred before me: for he was before me.
language2_text: Iya o ipeylimwang ni Yowani amlololos a manci no, "Iya o nimalavat ko na a manownowji pa a mai a ka nyaken. Am mahamahama pa ori ka nyaken. Ta amyan rana no kaji ko pa tazakan do karawan."

language1_text: And of his fulness have all we received, and grace for grace.
language2_text: Yateywara o pangangarilawan na a na itoro jyaten. O aryarilaw na jyaten am yabo yakasaraw a na ipeywalam.

language1_text: For the law was given by Moses, but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ.
language2_text: O iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to o nipangnanao na ni Moyse a onotan ta. Am o pangangarilawan na kano manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to am ori o nyai na ni Yeso Kizisto do tao do karawan.

language1_text: No man hath seen God at any time; the only begotten Son, which is in the bosom of the Father, he hath declared him.
language2_text: Abo pa o tao a nimakacita si Ama ta do to. O Anak na yamacikto ji Ama ta do to a yamlisna do katangked na am ori o nipakateneng ta ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And this is the record of John, when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him, Who art thou?
language2_text: No kano nang am o meynakem a tao do Yotay do Yelosaleng am nimanovoy sira so mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano Diwey a tao a mangay a tomita si Yowani. Maniring sira jya am, "Sino ka ya."

language1_text: And he confessed, and denied not; but confessed, I am not the Christ.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am beken a Misayya ko."

language1_text: And they asked him, What then? Art thou Elias? And he saith, I am not. Art thou that prophet? And he answered, No.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Si Idiya ka ya an?" Maniring jira si Yowani am, "Beken a yaken nyo ipanci ang." Maniring sira pa am, "Manngwa, panoyonoywan na imo so ciring ni Ama ta do to a namen nanalahen a mai?" Maniring am, "Beken."

language1_text: Then said they unto him, Who art thou? that we may give an answer to them that sent us. What sayest thou of thyself?
language2_text: Maniring pa sira am, "Pancyan pa jyamen, sino ka. Ta itovis namen do yanimapahanhan jyamen. Pancyan pala wanjin mo kapwan."

language1_text: He said, I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness, Make straight the way of the Lord, as said the prophet Esaias.
language2_text: Maniring si Yowani am, "Yaken o nipanci ni Isayya a omlololos do kabwan no nihakawan no tao. Ta maniring am, 'Ipeywadwad nyo o Panirsirngen so rarahan na.'"

language1_text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees.
language2_text: Karahan am pacicin da pa si Yowani no nitovoy da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay.

language1_text: And they asked him, and said unto him, Why baptizest thou then, if thou be not that Christ, nor Elias, neither that prophet?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Beken a Misayya ka? Beken a si Idiya ka? Beken a panoyonoywan na imo so ciring ni Ama ta do to? Am ikongo mo ipanaktak so tao."

language1_text: John answered them, saying, I baptize with water: but there standeth one among you, whom ye know not;
language2_text: Maniring si Yowani am, "Yako manaktak no ranom. Am amyan so asa ka tao a yamacikaop jinyo a yanyo jyatenngi.

language1_text: he it is, who coming after me is preferred before me, whose shoe's latchet I am not worthy to unloose.
language2_text: Iya rana am manownowji pa a mai ka nyaken. Am tana manownowji pa mai ka nyaken am yabo pacicingayan ko jya."

language1_text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan, where John was baptizing.
language2_text: O vazay rana ya am no keyyan da do katovangan no Yotan a ayo a ili da do Potani. Do dang rana am nipanaktakan ni Yowani.

language1_text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him, and saith, Behold the Lamb of God, which taketh away the sin of the world.
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am macita ni Yowani si Yeso a mai. Maniring si Yowani am, "Oya rana am akmey kagling a nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to a omahap so tao do peyraratenan da.

language1_text: This is he of whom I said, After me cometh a man which is preferred before me: for he was before me.
language2_text: Iya rana ya am nipanci ko rana jinyo a manownowji a mai. Am arakorako pa oyowyat na ka nyaken. Ta ji ko pa nimatazak a tao am amyan rana.

language1_text: And I knew him not: but that he should be made manifest to Israel, therefore am I come baptizing with water.
language2_text: No kakwa am ji ko pa tenngi ori. O yako ipanaktak no ranom sicyaikwaya am ko panopen sira o Isedi a tao a kapakateneng da na jya."

language1_text: And John bare record, saying, I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove, and it abode upon him.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yowani am, "Ko nimacita o Seyzi a yakmey hato a yameyhekas do teyrahem a yamangay someyked do kataotao na.

language1_text: And I knew him not: but he that sent me to baptize with water, the same said unto me, Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending, and remaining on him, the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Ji ko a tenngi no kakwa o nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to. Am yamaniring jyaken si Ama ta do to a mapahanhan jyaken a manaktak no ranom am, 'O macita mo a peyhekasan no Seyzi a tao am iya o manaktak no Seyzi.'

language1_text: And I saw, and bare record that this is the Son of God.
language2_text: Ko na nimacita. Am ori o ko pancyan nya jinyo o na kanoyong a Anak na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Again the next day after John stood, and two of his disciples;
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am mirwa pa mangay si Yowani a kano rarwa ka macinanao jya.

language1_text: and looking upon Jesus as he walked, he saith, Behold the Lamb of God!
language2_text: Macita na si Yeso a meyhatay am maniring si Yowani am, "Iya rana am akmey kagling ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And the two disciples heard him speak, and they followed Jesus.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring eya no rarwa ka macinanao ji Yowani am to sira na macihza ji Yeso.

language1_text: Then Jesus turned, and saw them following, and saith unto them, What seek ye? They said unto him, Rabbi, (which is to say, being interpreted, Master, ) where dwellest thou?
language2_text: Meyvazingowngaw si Yeso am to na cita o rarwa ka tao a macilolo jya. Maniring jira am, "Ikongo nyo kakzeben." Maniring sira am, "Do wanjin o vahay mo, mo Lapi." (O peypeypangayan no Lapi am Mangnanao so tao.)

language1_text: He saith unto them, Come and see. They came and saw where he dwelt, and abode with him that day: for it was about the tenth hour.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Sijya kamo a kapakateneng nyo jya." So nipacihza da jya kapakacita da na so yanan na. So nipacisan da jya, ta makoyab rana.

language1_text: One of the two which heard John speak, and followed him, was Andrew, Simon Peter's brother.
language2_text: O rarwa nimacihza ji Yeso a tao am asa ka tao o kakteh na ni Simong Pite a meyngaran si Antele.

language1_text: He first findeth his own brother Simon, and saith unto him, We have found the Messias, which is, being interpreted, the Christ.
language2_text: So nyangay na ni Antele a mangay komala si Simong. Maniring jya am, "Ko na nimacita o Misayya." (O peypeypangayan no Misayya am Kizisto.)

language1_text: And he brought him to Jesus. And when Jesus beheld him, he said, Thou art Simon the son of Jona: thou shalt be called Cephas, which is by interpretation, A stone.
language2_text: Makarahan am yangay na si Simong ji Yeso. So nisingkadan na jya ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Imo rana mo Simong am anak na imo ni Yowani. O ngaran mo na am si Civa." (O peypeypangayan no Civa am Pite. O Pite rana am lalitan.)

language1_text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee, and findeth Philip, and saith unto him, Follow me.
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am naknakmen na ni Yeso o kangay na do Cyadidi. Meyratateng am to na sazi si Veydipo. Maniring jya am, "Macihza ka jyaken."

language1_text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida, the city of Andrew and Peter.
language2_text: Si Veydipo rana am meyvahay do Peysayta. Macikeylyan ji Antele a kani Pite.

language1_text: Philip findeth Nathanael, and saith unto him, We have found him, of whom Moses in the law, and the prophets, did write, Jesus of Nazareth, the son of Joseph.
language2_text: Makala ni Veydipo si Natannay. Maniring jya am, "Namen rana nimacita o yadomket do iwawalam ni Moyse a kano ciring da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to do Seysyo. Ori rana am si Yeso anak ni Yoseyvo a yameyvahay do Nasale a ili."

language1_text: And Nathanael said unto him, Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth? Philip saith unto him, Come and see.
language2_text: Maniring si Natannay am, "Sino ipanci a kato na ngyanan no meynakem a tao do Nasale." Maniring si Veydipo am, "Sijya, kacita mo sya."

language1_text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him, and saith of him, Behold an Israelite indeed, in whom is no guile!
language2_text: Macita ni Yeso si Natannay mangay jya am maniring jya am, "Yameysinogat ori a Isedi a tao. Yabo do onowned na o yamalahet."

language1_text: Nathanael saith unto him, Whence knowest thou me? Jesus answered and said unto him, Before that Philip called thee, when thou wast under the fig tree, I saw thee.
language2_text: Maniring si Natannay ji Yeso am, "Ikongo mo to makatenngi jyaken." Maniring si Yeso jya am, "No kaji na pa mancyan nimo ni Veydipo am ko na nimacita imo a yamyan do teyrahem no ovako a kayo."

language1_text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him, Rabbi, thou art the Son of God; thou art the King of Israel.
language2_text: Maniring si Natannay am, "Mo Mangnanao, ka manoyong a Anak ni Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen no Isedi a tao."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto him, Because I said unto thee, I saw thee under the fig tree, believest thou? thou shalt see greater things than these.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O mo anoyngan jyaken am ko nipanci jimo no kapakacita ko jimo no keyyan mo pa do teyrahem no ovako a kayo? Naknakmen mo no makwa an, ta arakorako pa o yeyyak mo no mata a vazay ko."

language1_text: And he saith unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Hereafter ye shall see heaven open, and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man.
language2_text: Maniring pa jira si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am macita nyo na o teyngato a kacyangan a kapakacita nyo na so aro a tinsi ni Ama ta do to a meygegcin jyaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a meysisinaoli sira do teyngato."

language1_text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee; and the mother of Jesus was there:
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am amyan do Cyadidi do meyngaran so Cyana a ili so tao a meysinmo. Amyan dang o ina na ni Yeso.

language1_text: and both Jesus was called, and his disciples, to the marriage.
language2_text: Si Yeso rana kano macinanao jya am nipanoyon da sira no matarek so vahay a tao. Am ori o nyangay da.

language1_text: And when they wanted wine, the mother of Jesus saith unto him, They have no wine.
language2_text: Ikongo do nimagid rana o yopen da potaw cyo, am ori o nipancyan na ni ina na ji Yeso so, "Apya sira ito a yabo rana so yopen."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, what have I to do with thee? mine hour is not yet come.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo ina, ji mo to gacigaci yaken an. Ta beken pa ya araraw na no yako ipeyvazay."

language1_text: His mother saith unto the servants, Whatsoever he saith unto you, do it.
language2_text: Maniring o ina na do lamlamsoy no meysinmo a tao am, "To nyo ngamiznga o pahanhanan na jinyo."

language1_text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone, after the manner of the purifying of the Jews, containing two or three firkins apiece.
language2_text: Amyan dang so anem a peraranom. Ori rana am iwawalam da no tao do Yotay a pavavanawan da. O kazomzomyan no peraranom am akman so makanateng a rarako a kama.

language1_text: Jesus saith unto them, Fill the waterpots with water. And they filled them up to the brim.
language2_text: Maniring do lamlamsoy da no meysinmo a tao si Yeso am, "Apno kamo no ranom o peraranom." Karahan am kakadain da apnowen no ranom o peraranom.

language1_text: And he saith unto them, Draw out now, and bear unto the governor of the feast. And they bare it.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso am, "Patwaw kamo na katoro nyo nya do yameymatmatngeh no vazay a tao." Makarahan am yangay da na.

language1_text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine, and knew not whence it was: (but the servants which drew the water knew;) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom,
language2_text: Tahaman no meymatmatngeh nya tao o nipeyvaliw na ni Yeso a potaw cyo am isavasavak na o nyahapan da sya. Am katenngan da no lamlamsoy na. Am ori o nipancyan na no nimapasakay a tao.

language1_text: and saith unto him, Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine; and when men have well drunk, then that which is worse: but thou hast kept the good wine until now.
language2_text: Maniring jya am, "Mamimin o tao a yamapanoma so apya potaw cyo. No mabsoy rana sira am ori o patwawan da so todna ka potaw cyo. Am imo am mo panowjin o ney yapya na potaw cyo."

language1_text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee, and manifested forth his glory; and his disciples believed on him.
language2_text: Oya rana am ney manma na vazay ni Yeso a yongkad no kayapo na ji Ama ta do to. Ori rana am mina vazay na ori ni Yeso do Cyana do Cyadidi. O vazay rana ya am ipacita na o admadmay na do tao. Nimacipinda do dang o nyanoyngan da rana jya no macinanao jya.

language1_text: After this he went down to Capernaum, he, and his mother, and his brethren, and his disciples: and they continued there not many days.
language2_text: Mateyka o vazay ori am macihza si Yeso do ina na kada wari na kano macinanao jya mangay do Cyapaynong a miseysan so makanateng so araraw.

language1_text: And the Jews' passover was at hand, and Jesus went up to Jerusalem,
language2_text: Masngen rana o ipamaring da so kanen a Iyeci am mangay si Yeso do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: and found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves, and the changers of money sitting:
language2_text: Do livolivon no rako a panaralayan da am makacita so tao a manazang no baka kano kagling a kano hato a kano aro a tao a amlisna dang a mamalit so nizpi.

language1_text: and when he had made a scourge of small cords, he drove them all out of the temple, and the sheep, and the oxen; and poured out the changers' money, and overthrew the tables;
language2_text: Karahan am mangap si Yeso so kolili a kapaksoz na so baka kano kagling do rako a panaralayan a powboten, a kapasakeb na so pamalimalitan da no tao so nizpi a kavangan, a kapeyvwak no nizpi do teyrahem.

language1_text: and said unto them that sold doves, Take these things hence; make not my Father's house an house of merchandise.
language2_text: Maniring do manazang no hato a tao am, "Powbot kamo na o nyo ipanazang. Ji kamo todey meypananazangan do yararalayan ni Ama a vahay."

language1_text: And his disciples remembered that it was written, The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up.
language2_text: Karahan am manakem da no macinanao jya o ciring do Seysyo. O ciring rana am, "Mo Ama do to. Yakmey apoy o onowned ko so kakwakwat a yamnakenakem so yararalayan nimo."

language1_text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him, What sign shewest thou unto us, seeing that thou doest these things?
language2_text: Pacicin da no panipanirsirngen no tao do Yotay. Maniring sira am, "Pacittan pala o yongkad mo a vazay a apo ji Ama ta do to, do mo kato mapeyvwakan so tao do rako a panaralayan."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto them, Destroy this temple, and in three days I will raise it up.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Tana kavakavahen nyo o panaralayan eya am cyaha, ta si katlo na araw am patanken ko."

language1_text: Then said the Jews, Forty and six years was this temple in building, and wilt thou rear it up in three days?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Yanem o ikasikalima na (46) kawan no nipatnek so rako a panaralayan am ikongo mo pancyan no kapakatlo mo a araw a mapatanek sya."

language1_text: But he spake of the temple of his body.
language2_text: Am o paingan ni Yeso so ciring na am kataotao na.

language1_text: When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.
language2_text: Mirwa mavyay si Yeso am manakem da na no macinanao jya o mina ciring na. Ori o nyanoyngan da na do Seysyo a kano ciring na ni Yeso.

language1_text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover, in the feast day, many believed in his name, when they saw the miracles which he did.
language2_text: Amyan si Yeso do Yelosaleng a macipamaring so kanen do Iyeci am aro tao a nimakacita so vazay na a yongkad no kapo na ji Ama ta do to. Am ori o nyanoyngan da rana jya.

language1_text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them, because he knew all men,
language2_text: Am ji na meyhanhanan sira ni Yeso, ta katenngan na o kalas no onowned da.

language1_text: and needed not that any should testify of man: for he knew what was in man.
language2_text: Tana ji da mancyan no tao ji Yeso o aktokto da am to na rana tenngi ni Yeso o onowned da.

language1_text: There was a man of the Pharisees, named Nicodemus, a ruler of the Jews:
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tao a macyagom do Vadisay a meyngaran so Niketemo a panirsirngen no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: the same came to Jesus by night, and said unto him, Rabbi, we know that thou art a teacher come from God: for no man can do these miracles that thou doest, except God be with him.
language2_text: Ipisa kahep na am mangay ji Yeso. Maniring jya am, "Mo Mangnanao, namen katenngan imo a mangnanao a nitovoy ni Ama ta do to a yamangnanao so tao. No yabo si Ama ta do to a yasomidong jimo a meyvazay a mapatwaw so kayapo mo jya am abo tao a makapeyvazay sya."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto him, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born again, he cannot see the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jimo am no si ji mirwa a matazak a tao o tao am ji macikaop do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to a tao."

language1_text: Nicodemus saith unto him, How can a man be born when he is old? can he enter the second time into his mother's womb, and be born?
language2_text: Maniring si Niketemo ji Yeso am, "Makongo so wanjin o rarakeh rana mangay pa matazak a tao. Manngwa, meysinaoli pa malikey ahanasen da?"

language1_text: Jesus answered, Verily, verily, I say unto thee, Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit, he cannot enter into the kingdom of God.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jimo am no jya nimalikey o tao do ranom a kano Seyzi am ji macikaop do italamozong na tao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit.
language2_text: O nimapodpod do tao am tao saon am. Am no si mapodpod o tao do Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to am manoyong o akman sang a anak na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Marvel not that I said unto thee, Ye must be born again.
language2_text: Ji mo ngyakan o kapanci ko no katazak mo a tao an.

language1_text: The wind bloweth where it listeth, and thou hearest the sound thereof, but canst not tell whence it cometh, and whither it goeth: so is every one that is born of the Spirit.
language2_text: Na to ngonongonongi o na pabzotan sya no pagpag. No nyo mamizing o na pavyoten a pagpag am nyo jyatenngi o na kapwan. Nyo jyatenngi o na angayan. O nimapodpod do Seyzi am akman sang an."

language1_text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him, How can these things be?
language2_text: Maniring si Niketemo am, "Ta to na akmani so sang!"

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto him, Art thou a master of Israel, and knowest not these things?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Imo am ka mangnanao do Isedi a tao. Manngwa, tolang ori a ji mo a tenngi a vazay?

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto thee, We speak that we do know, and testify that we have seen; and ye receive not our witness.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jimo am o namen katenngan a kano namen nimacita o namen patwawen. Am yanyo ji ngapa o yakman sang a yanamen patwawen.

language1_text: If I have told you earthly things, and ye believe not, how shall ye believe, if I tell you of heavenly things?
language2_text: O yako ipanci jinyo a vazay do karawan am nyo ji nganoyngi. No si ipanci ko jinyo o vazay do teyngato am jyabo kanoyong nyo jya.

language1_text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven, but he that came down from heaven, even the Son of man which is in heaven.
language2_text: Abo pa o tao a nimangay do teyngato. O Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am ori o nimapo do teyngato."

language1_text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness, even so must the Son of man be lifted up:
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso am, "No kakwa pa am nimapatnek si Moyse do kayo so nipariparing da mavowaw do kabwan no nihakawan no tao. So icyakman ko sang a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a padketen da do kayo a patneken no makwa.

language1_text: that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have eternal life.
language2_text: So ikamimin no omanoyong jyaken a tao a makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
