language2_text: Yatey rako na karilawan no tao do karawan ni Ama ta do to. Mangay do na veyvowen a Anak na o yana nitoro. So ikamimin da no omanoyong jya tao a ji rana meydednai no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to, ta mahap da rana o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.
language2_text: Ta o nitovoyan na so Anak na do teyrahem am beken a pasingsingtan na o tao do teyrahem. Ta patazadangen na sira do teyngato.

language1_text: He that believeth on him is not condemned: but he that believeth not is condemned already, because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God.
language2_text: "Omanoyong do Anak ni Ama ta do to a tao am ji na mancyan sira meyraraten. O ji nganoyong jya am ori o ipanci na amyan so raraten. Ta ji da nganoyngi o veyvowen na Anak ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And this is the condemnation, that light is come into the world, and men loved darkness rather than light, because their deeds were evil.
language2_text: O Anak ni Ama ta do to am akmey zezak a nimai do teyrahem a amzezak so tao do karawan. Am ji dakzan no tao o kazngangan, ta ikeykakza da pa o kasarisaryan. Ta meyraraten pa sira. Ori o peypeypangayan no na pancyan nira a meyraraten.

language1_text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light, neither cometh to the light, lest his deeds should be reproved.
language2_text: O meyraraten a tao am ikaoya da o mazngang. Am ori o ji da macisngeni do kazngangan, ta ikanyahey da o kapakateneng da jira meyraraten.

language1_text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light, that his deeds may be made manifest, that they are wrought in God.
language2_text: Am o apya so icicirawat a ji meyraraten a tao am ikakza da o kazngangan a mapatwaw so apya vazay da do kownot da ji Ama ta do to."

language1_text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judæ a; and there he tarried with them, and baptized.
language2_text: Mavitos ori am meypangay si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do Yotay. So niseysan da dang so makanateng so araraw a manaktak so tao.

language1_text: And John also was baptizing in Æ non near to Salim, because there was much water there: and they came, and were baptized.
language2_text: Akman sang si Yowani, ta manaktak do meyngaran so Aynon a masngen do Saleng, ta arako do dang o ranom. So ikaro no tao a mangay jya kataktak na jira.

language1_text: For John was not yet cast into prison.
language2_text: No kano nang am ji da pa nipteng si Yowani.

language1_text: Then there arose a question between some of John's disciples and the Jews about purifying.
language2_text: Tatasa ka macinanao ji Yowani o macinekanekad do asa ka tao do Yotay. O ikazyak da am kataktak do tao.

language1_text: And they came unto John, and said unto him, Rabbi, he that was with thee beyond Jordan, to whom thou barest witness, behold, the same baptizeth, and all men come to him.
language2_text: Maniring sira ji Yowani am, "Mo pa manakem, mo Mangnanao, o mina kararay mo do Yotan a ayo asyo, a ipeylimwang mo so ngaran asyo? Ta iya rana am yamanaktak sicyaikwaya. Da karo no tao a yamangay komala sya."

language1_text: John answered and said, A man can receive nothing, except it be given him from heaven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yowani am, "No abo si Ama ta do to a omoyat do tao am abo do tao o makapakavos so vazay.

language1_text: Ye yourselves bear me witness, that I said, I am not the Christ, but that I am sent before him.
language2_text: Kamo mamimin a makateneng jyaken a beken a Misayya. Ta nipanci ko na jinyo. Ta yaken rana am nitovoy na yaken ni Ama ta do to a meywadwad so rarahan na.

language1_text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom: but the friend of the bridegroom, which standeth and heareth him, rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom's voice: this my joy therefore is fulfilled.
language2_text: Akman so meysinmo a tao. No mapasakay o tao am masaray sira o kagagan na makamizing sya. Am o nitomamtamek jya tao o angayan no mavakes ang. Yaken rana am yako akman so kagagan na yatey masaray a makamizing sya.

language1_text: He must increase, but I must decrease.
language2_text: Mangay o kapeyparo da no tao a mangay amrapong si Yeso. Mangay o kapeypapereh no tao a omanod jyaken."

language1_text: He that cometh from above is above all: he that is of the earth is earthly, and speaketh of the earth: he that cometh from heaven is above all.
language2_text: O nimapo do teyngato am to na pa meyhavasi o makakaday do karawan. O nimapo do karawan am teyrahem o malavat na. Am o apo do teyngato am to na pa meyhavasi o makakaday.

language1_text: And what he hath seen and heard, that he testifieth; and no man receiveth his testimony.
language2_text: Patwawen na o nimacita na kano nimamizing na. Am to da nazibwan no tao o nanao na.

language1_text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true.
language2_text: Am o mahap so nanao na tao am pacyanoyngan da si Ama ta do to a tey manoyong.

language1_text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God: for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him.
language2_text: O nitovoy ni Ama ta do to o mapatwaw so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta oyatan no Seyzi.

language1_text: The Father loveth the Son, and hath given all things into his hand.
language2_text: O Ama na am marilaw no Anak na. So na nitorwan no makakaday jya a italamozong na.

language1_text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life: and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life; but the wrath of God abideth on him.
language2_text: Omanoyong do Anak na am mahap na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na. O ji nganoyong do Anak na am abo jya o ikavyay no pahad na, ta meydedna jya o peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John,
language2_text: Mamizing da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay si Yeso a manara so macilocilolo jya a kapakamizing da sya arwaro pa so nitaktakan a kani Yowani.

language1_text: (though Jesus himself baptized not, but his disciples, )
language2_text: Am beken a si Yeso o manaktak, ta o macinanao jya am ori o manaktak.

language1_text: he left Judæ a, and departed again into Galilee.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Yeso o akman sang a ciring am karwan na rana do Yotay a kangay na rana do Cyadidi,

language1_text: And he must needs go through Samaria.
language2_text: a kapeyliktaw na do Samadiya.

language1_text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria, which is called Sychar, near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph.
language2_text: Makaranes do Samadiya am amyan dang so asa ka ili a meyngaran so Siha. O ili rana ori am masngen ori do hakawan ni Yoseyvo a nyamoon na ji ama na a meyngaran so Yakebo.

language1_text: Now Jacob's well was there. Jesus therefore, being wearied with his journey, sat thus on the well: and it was about the sixth hour.
language2_text: Amyan dang o atbod a imong na ni Yakebo no kakwa. Ikongo do nimazikna si Yeso a omalam, am ori o nilisna na do katangked no atbod ang. No kano nang am akmey meyigen o araw.

language1_text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water: Jesus saith unto her, Give me to drink.
language2_text: Amyan so Samadiya mavakes a mangay tomavo. Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Ney pa dang so ranom a inomen ko."

language1_text: (For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat.)
language2_text: O macinanao jya am nimangay sira manazang so kanen da do ili.

language1_text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him, How is it that thou, being a Jew, askest drink of me, which am a woman of Samaria? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans.
language2_text: Maniring o mavakes am, "Imo am tao do Yotay ka. Yaken am tao do Samadiya ko. Ikongo o mo to macyami jyaken so ranom." (O tao do Yotay a kano tao do Samadiya am ji sira masyakan so kanekanen.)

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No mo katenngan o itoro na jimo ni Ama ta do to a mo kapakateneng do yamacyami jimo so ranom am ka ji mapasyasi jya. Ji na mantan imo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad mo a ranom a."

language1_text: The woman saith unto him, Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: from whence then hast thou that living water?
language2_text: Maniring o mavakes am, "Mo kahakay, yamarahem o tovong eya a yabo o tatano mo. Makongo ka mangap so to meyyonong a ikavyay a ranom.

language1_text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob, which gave us the well, and drank thereof himself, and his children, and his cattle?
language2_text: O tovong rana ya am nyamoon namen ji Yakebo a inapo namen. Sira rana am nimamimin sira asa ka vahay a kano vinyay da a niminom so ranom do jya. Manngwa, ka mahamahama pa ka nya?"

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto her, Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O amyop so ranom eya am mawaw pa sira.

language1_text: but whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.
language2_text: Am o amyop so itoro ko a ranom am to sira meyyonong a ji rana awaw. O itoro ko jya ranom am akmey atbod do onowned na a komalangboy. So ikanoyong na makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na."

language1_text: The woman saith unto him, Sir, give me this water, that I thirst not, neither come hither to draw.
language2_text: Maniring o mavakes am, "Mo kahakay, itoro mo jyaken o ranom mo ori an, kato ko meyyonongan a jyawaw a kaji ko na ngayyan do jya tomavo."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, Go, call thy husband, and come hither.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Angay pancyaney o kahanghangan mo a kai nyo do jya."

language1_text: The woman answered and said, I have no husband. Jesus said unto her, Thou hast well said, I have no husband:
language2_text: Maniring o mavakes am, "Yabo kahanghangan ko." Maniring si Yeso am, "Yamanoyong na kabo no kahanghangan mo.

language1_text: for thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.
language2_text: Am imo rana am yalalima rana sira o kahanghangan mo. O katovong mo sicyaikwaya am beken a meyngongyod a katovong mo do vahay. Yamanoyong o ciring mo jyaken."

language1_text: The woman saith unto him, Sir, I perceive that thou art a prophet.
language2_text: Maniring o mavakes am, "Mo kahakay, ko imo citahen eya am ala panoyonoywan na imo so ciring ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain; and ye say, that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship.
language2_text: O ineynapo namen a Samadiya am niraralay da si Ama ta do to do tokon eya. Am kwan nyo a tao do Yotay am do Yelosaleng o raralayan ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, believe me, the hour cometh, when ye shall neither in this mountain, nor yet at Jerusalem, worship the Father.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Mo kavakes, anoyngan mo yaken. No si marateng rana o araraw na am jyabo rana o tao a mai do tokon eya kado Yelosaleng a amraralay ni Ama ta do to a.

language1_text: Ye worship ye know not what: we know what we worship: for salvation is of the Jews.
language2_text: Inyo rana tao do Samadiya am nyo jyatenngi o yanyo iraralay. Yamen a tao do Yotay am namen katenngan o namen iraralay. Ta o mapatazadang so tao a mangay do teyngato am apo do tao do Yotay.

language1_text: But the hour cometh, and now is, when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth: for the Father seeketh such to worship him.
language2_text: So na ikanoyong sicyaikwaya yanimakaranes. O manoyong a omraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao am oyatan no Seyzi o onowned na omraralay ni Ama ta do to. Ta o akman rana sang a tao am isaray na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: God is a Spirit: and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth.
language2_text: Jyakman so tao si Ama ta do to a amyan so kataotao. Am ori o iyapo na do Seyzi no omoyat do tao a manoyong a omraralay ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: The woman saith unto him, I know that Messias cometh, which is called Christ: when he is come, he will tell us all things.
language2_text: Maniring o mavakes jya am, "Ko katenngan na kai no Misayya. No si mai ori am miminen na o vazay a ipanci jyaten."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, I that speak unto thee am he.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yaken o mo ipanci ang. So na ika iya no yamacisirsiring jimo."

language1_text: And upon this came his disciples, and marvelled that he talked with the woman: yet no man said, What seekest thou? or, Why talkest thou with her?
language2_text: Mai rana sira o macinanao ji Yeso am macita da si Yeso a macisirsiring do asa ka mavakes. Am ori o nyeyyakan da nya. Am abo o asa ka tao jira a manci nya do mavakes so, "Ikongo mo icyakza." Abo jira o manci nya ji Yeso so, "Ikongo mo sirsirngan sya."

language1_text: The woman then left her waterpot, and went her way into the city, and saith to the men,
language2_text: Iptad na no mavakes o peraranom na kangay na rana do ili a manci nya do aro a tao.

language1_text: Come, see a man, which told me all things that ever I did: is not this the Christ?
language2_text: Maniring am, "Citahey kamo o yasa ka tao a yato mimin so mina vazay ko a yapatwawen. Ala Misayya o ito."

language1_text: Then they went out of the city, and came unto him.
language2_text: Karahan am karwan da o ili da no aro a tao a mangay tomita si Yeso.

language1_text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him, saying, Master, eat.
language2_text: Meyratateng am gacigatan da si Yeso no macinanao jya a omoran do velek na.

language1_text: But he said unto them, I have meat to eat that ye know not of.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yana myan so kanen ko, am nyo jyatenngi ori."

language1_text: Therefore said the disciples one to another, Hath any man brought him ought to eat?
language2_text: Maniring sira do ipeykalakalavaten da am, "Ala yamyan so tao a yanimanta nya so kanen na an?"

language1_text: Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "O kanen ko am onotan ko a pakavosen o vazay no yanitomovoy jyaken.

language1_text: Say not ye, There are yet four months, and then cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.
language2_text: No kamo maniring am, 'Yamakapat rana vehan a yakapanlangi.' Am to ko na macitangayan jinyo am cita kamo pala o nihakawan nyo a yarana mazako. Jyapiya rana ori a langin a.

language1_text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages, and gathereth fruit unto life eternal: that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together.
language2_text: O mapanop so tao a omanoyong do nanao ko am arako o nakem ko jya. Sira rana omonot do nanao ko am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da. Katonodan no nang o amhakakaw a tao. Ta o pamowahen no asa ka tao am macivonong sira o karwan tao. So ikanoyong da tey masaray a tomaham do nihakawan da. Akman so meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a kano omanop so tao a omanoyong jya an, ta tey masaray sira an.

language1_text: And herein is that saying true, One soweth, and another reapeth.
language2_text: O ciriciring da no tao no kakwa am, 'Pamowahen no asa ka tao. Macivonong sira o tao do nihakawan na.' So ikatey manoyong no akman sang a ciring da.

language1_text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour: other men laboured, and ye are entered into their labours.
language2_text: Ko inyo ipanoyon a yamangay omlangi so beken a zikna nyo. Am manoyong kamo a macivonong do zikna da no tao."

language1_text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman, which testified, He told me all that ever I did.
language2_text: Aro do ili ang o niomanoyong rana ji Yeso. Ta maniring o mavakes do aro a tao am, "Na to mimina rana o mina vazay ko a yapatwawen."

language1_text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him, they besought him that he would tarry with them: and he abode there two days.
language2_text: Macita da no aro a tao do Samadiya si Yeso am gacigatan da macisan jira. Ori o nisan na dang so kadwa araw.

language1_text: And many more believed because of his own word;
language2_text: Nikarapan o tao a omanoyong do nanao na ni Yeso.

language1_text: and said unto the woman, Now we believe, not because of thy saying: for we have heard him ourselves, and know that this is indeed the Christ, the Saviour of the world.
language2_text: Ta maniring sira do mavakes am, "Beken a ciring mo an o namen ipanganoyong rana sicyaikwaya. Ta namen nipacimatan a yaniomamizing so ciring na. Am ori o namen anoyngan rana jya a mapatazadang so tao do karawan."

language1_text: Now after two days he departed thence, and went into Galilee.
language2_text: Kadwa araw si Yeso a nimisan dang a kangay na rana do Cyadidi.

language1_text: For Jesus himself testified, that a prophet hath no honour in his own country.
language2_text: Nipanci na rana ni Yeso no kakwa o kaji da panadnadan so panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no macikeylyan jya.

language1_text: Then when he was come into Galilee, the Galilæ ans received him, having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast: for they also went unto the feast.
language2_text: Am makaranes si Yeso do Cyadidi am aro tao a somaray nya. Ta no kangay da do Yelosaleng a macipamaring so kanen do Iyeci am nimacita da o vazay na.

language1_text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee, where he made the water wine. And there was a certain nobleman, whose son was sick at Capernaum.
language2_text: Meysinaoli si Yeso do Cyana a macinapnap do Cyadidi. Do dang rana am nipeyvaliw na so ranom a potaw cyo. Am amyan so asa ka meynakem a tao. O anak no nang am meyngen do Cyapaynong.

language1_text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judæ a into Galilee, he went unto him, and besought him that he would come down, and heal his son: for he was at the point of death.
language2_text: Mamizing na si Yeso a nimakaranes rana do Cyadidi apo do Yotay am mangay ji Yeso a manci nya a mangay do Cyapaynong a omiwakwak do anak na a toda jyangangay so inawan.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto him, Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "No si macita nyo o vazay a yongkad no kayapo ko ji Ama ta do to am, ori o ipanganoyong nyo."

language1_text: The nobleman saith unto him, Sir, come down ere my child die.
language2_text: Maniring o meynakem a tao ori am, "Mo kahakay, macihza ka pa jyaken do yana ikavyay pa no anak ko."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto him, Go thy way; thy son liveth. And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him, and he went his way.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Angay rana. Ta yarana nimapya o anak mo." So nyanoyngan na rana no tao ang do ciring ni Yeso a mangay rana.

language1_text: And as he was now going down, his servants met him, and told him, saying, Thy son liveth.
language2_text: Amyan pa do rarahan am masinmo na rana o lamlamsoy na. Maniring sira do meynakem a tao am, "Yapya rana o anak mo."

language1_text: Then enquired he of them the hour when he began to amend. And they said unto him, Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him.
language2_text: Karahan am pacicin na sira. Maniring am, "No kango o kapya na no anak ko." Maniring sira am, "Ikasa na vatvatek no kakyab do makoyab am nimacipinda dang o kaji na rana paingwatan sya."

language1_text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour, in the which Jesus said unto him, Thy son liveth: and himself believed, and his whole house.
language2_text: Naknakmen na am todey meyyangay o cinapya na no kapacisirsiring na jya. Ta maniring si Yeso jya no kano nang am, "Yapya rana o anak mo." Am ori o nipacipindan no kanoyong da na jya nira ori a asa ka vahay.

language1_text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did, when he was come out of Judæ a into Galilee.
language2_text: O vazay rana ori am ikadwa na no vazay ni Yeso do Cyadidi no kapo na do Yotay a yongkad no kayapo na ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: After this there was a feast of the Jews; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem.
language2_text: Makanateng so araraw am macinao do pamarmarngan da so kanen no tao do Yotay o yangay na ni Yeso do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool, which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda, having five porches.
language2_text: Amyan do Yelosaleng so ngaranan da Pazezevngen no kagling. Am amyan do siri na so meybebneng a ranom. O ingaran da jya no Sipolay a tao am Peyseta. O livolivon no meybebneng a ranom am meykalima o tezantehed do dang.

language1_text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk, of blind, halt, withered, waiting for the moving of the water.
language2_text: O tezantehed rana ori am meycyeyreyray sira dang o meykeyngeyngen a tao. Sira rana ori am amyan jira ang so mavota kano ji makakalam a kano ji makapeygonagonay a tao. [Sira rana ori am panalahen da o kapeygonagonay no ranom.

language1_text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool, and troubled the water: whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had.
language2_text: Ta o tinsi ni Ama ta do to am mangay na gonagonain o ranom ang. Anoyngan da o kato na rana apyan no ingingnen no ney manma a somivoz do ranom ang.]

language1_text: And a certain man was there, which had an infirmity thirty and eight years.
language2_text: Amyan dang so asa ka tao a nimeyngen so wao so ikasikapat (38) so awawan.

language1_text: When Jesus saw him lie, and knew that he had been now a long time in that case, he saith unto him, Wilt thou be made whole?
language2_text: Macita na ori ni Yeso a ji meyvangon am katenngan na o kownay na rana nimeyngen. Maniring jya am, "Kokay. Mo ikakza o kavonas rana no ingingnen mo an?"

language1_text: The impotent man answered him, Sir, I have no man, when the water is troubled, to put me into the pool: but while I am coming, another steppeth down before me.
language2_text: Maniring o meyngen a tao ori am, "Mo kahakay, no kapeygonagonay no ranom am yabo yamarilaw nyaken a yamapangay jyaken do ranom. Yako naknakmen o yako kagonagonay so peyvongvongwan ko a somivoz do ranom am yarana myan so tao a yanimanmanma pa ka nyaken a nisomivoz."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto him, Rise, take up thy bed, and walk.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Tanek rana kahap mo na so atpil mo a omalam."

language1_text: And immediately the man was made whole, and took up his bed, and walked: and on the same day was the sabbath.
language2_text: Makarahan am jya nimeyyahahay a mapya o tao ang, kahap na rana so atpil na omalam rana. No kanang am nimacinao do araraw no ipeywalam no tao.

language1_text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured, It is the sabbath day: it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed.
language2_text: Maniring sira o panipanirsirngen no tao do Yotay do nimapya rana tao ori am, "Sicyaraw eya am ipeywalam no tao. So ji mo ngapi so atpil mo."

language1_text: He answered them, He that made me whole, the same said unto me, Take up thy bed, and walk.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Yamaniring jyaken o tao a niomiwakwak jyaken am, 'Ahap rana o atpil mo a kangay mo rana.'"

language1_text: Then asked they him, What man is that which said unto thee, Take up thy bed, and walk?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Sino o yanimanci nimo a yamahap so atpil a mangay rana."

language1_text: And he that was healed wist not who it was: for Jesus had conveyed himself away, a multitude being in that place.
language2_text: Am ji na tenngi no nimapya rana a tao ang o niomiwakwak jya. Ta nikarwan na rana sira o aro a tao do dang ni Yeso.

language1_text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple, and said unto him, Behold, thou art made whole: sin no more, lest a worse thing come unto thee.
language2_text: Mownay am masinmo ni Yeso o tao a nikeywakwakan rana do rako a panaralayan. Maniring jya am, "Yaka na manoyong a yapya rana. Ji mo na peyneynama o kapeyraraten mo. Ta arakorako pa o alalaw a mangay jimo."

language1_text: The man departed, and told the Jews that it was Jesus, which had made him whole.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay rana o tao ori a manci nya do tao do Yotay o mina keywakwak na jya ni Yeso.

language1_text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus, and sought to slay him, because he had done these things on the sabbath day.
language2_text: Nimacipinda no kano nang o kapacioya da rana ji Yeso do kato na mangiwakwakan do ipeyweywalam no tao.

language1_text: But Jesus answered them, My Father worketh hitherto, and I work.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Yato meyvazay si Ama. So ko to nginarai sya."

language1_text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him, because he not only had broken the sabbath, but said also that God was his Father, making himself equal with God.
language2_text: To da na mamneki no tao do Yotay o kawakwak da si Yeso do kapakamizing da so ciring na. Ta ji na ngahapa o icicirawat da, do kaji meyvazayan do ipeyweywalam no tao. Maciyoman pa o kapakamizing da so ciring na manci no kapeyyama na si Ama ta do to a mapakto so kataotao na ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, The Son can do nothing of himself, but what he seeth the Father do: for what things soever he doeth, these also doeth the Son likewise.
language2_text: Maniring pa jira si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no ko to mangozai o kataotao ko am abo mahap ko a vazay. Am ko na nimacita o vazay ni Ama. Am ori o ko to ngamooni sya peyvazain. O vazay ni Ama na am vazay no Anak na.

language1_text: For the Father loveth the Son, and sheweth him all things that himself doeth: and he will shew him greater works than these, that ye may marvel.
language2_text: Am yatey rako o aryarilaw na jyaken ni Ama. Yana mamimin o vazay na yana nipacita jyaken, mangay katoro na nya jyaken so arakorako pa vazay a isavasavak nyo.

language1_text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead, and quickeneth them; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will.
language2_text: O vazay na ni Ama mapeyvangon so nimawakwak a tao am akman ko sang a to mangozay do nakenakem ko a omvyay so tao.

language1_text: For the Father judgeth no man, but hath committed all judgment unto the Son:
language2_text: Beken a si Ama o mapacici a mapeykapyapinpin so tao. Ta na nitoro rana jyaken o oyowyat a mapacici a mapeykapyapinpin so tao do karawan,

language1_text: that all men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father. He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him.
language2_text: mangay kazwazway da jyaken no tao do karawan. Akman sang si Ama a azwazwain da. Am o to nazibo nyaken a Anak na ni Ama am akman sang si Ama a da to nazibwan.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that heareth my word, and believeth on him that sent me, hath everlasting life, and shall not come into condemnation; but is passed from death unto life.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am omamizing so ciring ko a tao a omanoyong do yanitomovoy jyaken am mahap na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na. So ikanoyong na ji na meydednai no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta nimaliklik na rana o apwa kawakwakan no pahad na.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The hour is coming, and now is, when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God: and they that hear shall live.
language2_text: "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am oya rana o araraw na. So na rana ikanoyong a yarana nimakaranes no ipakamizing da so ciring ko no kabwan na pa no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da a tao. Am o mahap so ciring ko o makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: For as the Father hath life in himself; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself;
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to o yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad no tao. So icyakman na sang no Anak na.

language1_text: and hath given him authority to execute judgment also, because he is the Son of man.
language2_text: Na nitoro jyaken ni Ama ta do to o oyowyat a yamapacici a mapeykapyapinpin so tao. Ta yaken rana am Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: Marvel not at this: for the hour is coming, in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice,
language2_text: Ji nyo ngyakan, ta no marateng rana o araraw am mamimin sira o nibobo a tao a makamizing so ciring ko,

language1_text: and shall come forth; they that have done good, unto the resurrection of life; and they that have done evil, unto the resurrection of damnation.
language2_text: a kapeyvangon da do heseb da. O apya so mina vazay no kamavyay da pa am mavyay sira a kapacitovong da rana ji Ama ta do to do teyngato. O nimeyraraten no kamavyay da pa am peyvangonen ko sira kapanci ko no raraten da.

language1_text: I can of mine own self do nothing: as I hear, I judge: and my judgment is just; because I seek not mine own will, but the will of the Father which hath sent me.
language2_text: "Abo angangayan ko ya no si to ko mangozai o nakenakem ko. Ko to mangozai o ciring na jyaken ni Ama ta do to a mapacici a mapeykapyapinpin so tao. So na ikanoyong no ko ahahapan sya. Ta ko ji mangozai o nakenakem ko do kataotao ko, do ko kahap so vazay no yanitomovoy jyaken.

language1_text: If I bear witness of myself, my witness is not true.
language2_text: No si ipeylimwang ko o kataotao ko am ji makanet ori a ipanop so tao.

language1_text: There is another that beareth witness of me; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true.
language2_text: Am na keyyan no yameylimwang nyaken. So ko pakatenngan do na kanoyong no ciring na yamacyanoyong jyaken.

language1_text: Ye sent unto John, and he bare witness unto the truth.
language2_text: Nimanovoy kamo so tao a mangay ji Yowani. So nipakamizngan nyo so ciring na meylimwang no manoyong a ciring na jyaken.

language1_text: But I receive not testimony from man: but these things I say, that ye might be saved.
language2_text: Ko ji ngakzeba o keyyan no tao a macyanoyong jyaken. O ko pakalavatan so mina vazay ni Yowani am ipakateneng nyo jyaken a kapakahap nyo rana so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: He was a burning and a shining light: and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light.
language2_text: Kapalangayan no zampo si Yowani a amlila maniray. Am ji meyyonownay o sarayan nyo no zezak na.

language1_text: But I have greater witness than that of John: for the works which the Father hath given me to finish, the same works that I do, bear witness of me, that the Father hath sent me.
language2_text: Am patwawen ko pala o makdekdeng pa vazay ko a kano mina ciring ni Yowani. O vazay rana ori am nitoro na jyaken ni Ama a pakavosen ko. O vazay rana ori am yongkad ko ori a nitovoy ni Ama.

language1_text: And the Father himself, which hath sent me, hath borne witness of me. Ye have neither heard his voice at any time, nor seen his shape.
language2_text: Na ipeylimwang yaken ni Ama a nitomovoy jyaken. Abo pa jinyo o nimakamizing so ciring na. Abo pa jinyo o nimakacita so moing na.

language1_text: And ye have not his word abiding in you: for whom he hath sent, him ye believe not.
language2_text: O nyo ji mapeyyani so ciriciring na do onowned nyo am nyo ji nganoyngi o yana nitovoy a yasa ka tao.

language1_text: Search the scriptures; for in them ye think ye have eternal life: and they are they which testify of me.
language2_text: O nyo ipeyvilang a Seysyo am nyo naknakmen o nyo kapakahap do dang so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo. Am na malavat no Seysyo am yaken.

language1_text: And ye will not come to me, that ye might have life.
language2_text: Am yatey masalit o onowned nyo a yaji nganoyong jyaken a yamanta ninyo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: I receive not honour from men.
language2_text: "Ko jyakzan o da kazwazway jyaken no tao.

language1_text: But I know you, that ye have not the love of God in you.
language2_text: Ko katenngan o onowned nyo a yajyakza ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I am come in my Father's name, and ye receive me not: if another shall come in his own name, him ye will receive.
language2_text: O ko nyai do teyrahem eya am nakenakem na ni Ama. Am nyo ji ngonoci yaken. Am o yamacitarek a tao a yamangozay do ngaran da am nyo onotan.

language1_text: How can ye believe, which receive honour one of another, and seek not the honour that cometh from God only?
language2_text: Nyo ikeykakza pa o da kazwazway jinyo no kadwan jinyo. Nyo jyakzan o azwazway a yapo ji Ama ta do to. Ori o yanyo ji nganoyngi jyaken.

language1_text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father: there is one that accuseth you, even Moses, in whom ye trust.
language2_text: Ji nyo mancyan o ka yaken no mapatwaw so raraten nyo do tangain ni Ama ta do to. Ta o iwawalam ni Moyse yanyo pangozayan am ori o yamapatwaw so raraten nyo.

language1_text: For had ye believed Moses, ye would have believed me: for he wrote of me.
language2_text: No si anoyngan nyo si Moyse am akman kamo sang a omanoyong jyaken. Ta o ciriciring na yadomket do Seysyo am yaken na paingan sya.

language1_text: But if ye believe not his writings, how shall ye believe my words?
language2_text: No nyo ji nganoyngi o ciriciring na ni Moyse a yadomket do Seysyo am makongo kamo a omanoyong jyaken."

language1_text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee, which is the sea of Tiberias.
language2_text: Karahan am meypangay si Yeso do katovangan na no rako a meybebneng a ranom a meyngaran so Cyadidi. O ikadwa no ngaran no nang am Tipilyo.

language1_text: And a great multitude followed him, because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased.
language2_text: Macita da no aro a tao si Yeso a nimangiwakwak so tao am onotan da.

language1_text: And Jesus went up into a mountain, and there he sat with his disciples.
language2_text: Mangay si Yeso a kano macinanao jya do tokon a mawalawalam do dang.

language1_text: And the passover, a feast of the Jews, was nigh.
language2_text: No kanang am masngen rana o kapamaring da so kanen no tao do Yotay do Iyeci.

language1_text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes, and saw a great company come unto him, he saith unto Philip, Whence shall we buy bread, that these may eat?
language2_text: Macita ni Yeso o aro a tao a mangay jya. Maniring ji Veydipo am, "Do wanjin pakasazangan ta so kanen no aro a tao ang a ipakan ta sira."

language1_text: And this he said to prove him: for he himself knew what he would do.
language2_text: O peycirngan na sang am ileylamdam na si Veydipo. Ta katenngan ni Yeso rana o ahahapan na sya.

language1_text: Philip answered him, Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them, that every one of them may take a little.
language2_text: Maniring si Veydipo am, "Tana meyvazay ko so kasisi no awan am ji pa makanet a ipanazang so ipakan so aro a tao ito."

language1_text: One of his disciples, Andrew, Simon Peter's brother, saith unto him,
language2_text: Maniring o asa ka macinanao jya meyngaran so Antele a kakteh ni Simong Pite am,

language1_text: There is a lad here, which hath five barley loaves, and two small fishes: but what are they among so many?
language2_text: "Yamyan jya so asa ka kanakan a yanimeyotwan so yalima ka myanpaw a kano yadwa ka among. Am no si pongden do aro a tao am jyabo kaponged na jira."

language1_text: And Jesus said, Make the men sit down. Now there was much grass in the place. So the men sat down, in number about five thousand.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Pancyan kamo sira amlisna." Am katamtamkan o yanan da. Karahan am mamimin rana sira amlisna. O vilang da no mahakay am kakaliman a ranaw (5000) sira.

language1_text: And Jesus took the loaves; and when he had given thanks, he distributed to the disciples, and the disciples to them that were set down; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would.
language2_text: Hapen na ni Yeso o myanpaw a kasaray na nya ji Ama ta do to. Karahan am pongden da rana no macinanao jya do meykalyalipenpen a amlisna tao. Akman sang o among a nivonong da, kapakapya da rana koman.

language1_text: When they were filled, he said unto his disciples, Gather up the fragments that remain, that nothing be lost.
language2_text: Mabsoy rana sira am maniring si Yeso do macinanao jya am, "Peykakasa kamo na o atda da. Ta ingbeywan."

language1_text: Therefore they gathered them together, and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves, which remained over and above unto them that had eaten.
language2_text: Karahan am peykakasahen da na o atda da do alima ka myanpaw ang. Peysinsinmowen da o ji da nimimina am nipno da o adwa so ikarwa a yala.

language1_text: Then those men, when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did, said, This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world.
language2_text: Macita da o mina vazay ni Yeso a yongkad no kayapo na ji Ama ta do to am maniring sira am, "Oya saon o da ipanci a yamai do teyrahem a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force, to make him a king, he departed again into a mountain himself alone.
language2_text: Katenngan na ni Yeso sira toda ji ngamaog sya a panirsirngen da. Am ori o nikaveyvow na nimangay do tokon a tomayo nira.

language1_text: And when even was now come, his disciples went down unto the sea,
language2_text: Maseyrem rana am mangay sira o macinanao jya do rako a meybebneng a ranom,

language1_text: and entered into a ship, and went over the sea toward Capernaum. And it was now dark, and Jesus was not come to them.
language2_text: a kasakay da do tataloran a mangay do katovangan na ili a meyngaran so Cyapaynong. Mahep rana no kano nang am ji pa nimakaranes si Yeso jira.

language1_text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew.
language2_text: Makarahan am to na nangsangan. To rana maciralay o paopaong na.

language1_text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs, they see Jesus walking on the sea, and drawing nigh unto the ship: and they were afraid.
language2_text: Amyan sira do karakwan no rako a meybebneng a ranom a mangaod o macinanao jya am macita da si Yeso a omalam do ranom a meypasngen jira. Macita da am manyahey sira.

language1_text: But he saith unto them, It is I; be not afraid.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ji kamo anyahey, ta yaken."

language1_text: Then they willingly received him into the ship: and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went.
language2_text: Karahan am masaray sira mapazagpit si Yeso do tataloran da. So ji da nimeyyahahai a makaranes do angayan da hevek.

language1_text: The day following, when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there, save that one whereinto his disciples were entered, and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat, but that his disciples were gone away alone;
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am katenngan da no aro a tao si Yeso a jya nimacihza do macinanao jya. Ta nimacita da si Yeso a jya nimacikavang jira do tataloran no kakaod da sya no macinanao jya. Ta asa o tataloran a nimacita da do dang.

language1_text: (howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread, after that the Lord had given thanks:)
language2_text: Amyan so nimapo do Tipilyo a tataloran a manbong do masngen do nyahapan na ni Yeso so myanpaw a isaray ji Ama ta do to a nibsoyan na so aro a tao.

language1_text: when the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there, neither his disciples, they also took shipping, and came to Capernaum, seeking for Jesus.
language2_text: Katenngan da no aro a tao o kabo ni Yeso a kano macinanao jya am mavang sira do tataloran a mangay do Cyapaynong a komala sya.

language1_text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea, they said unto him, Rabbi, when camest thou hither?
language2_text: Makala da si Yeso no aro a tao do katovangan no rako a meybebneng a ranom am maniring sira jya am, "Mo Mangnanao, no kango kai mo do jya."

language1_text: Jesus answered them and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Ye seek me, not because ye saw the miracles, but because ye did eat of the loaves, and were filled.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o nyo kalan jyaken am beken a nyo kanimakacita so ko nipatwaw a yongkad do kanimapo ko ji Ama ta do to an. Ta nyo kakzeben o nyo kabsoy.

language1_text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth, but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life, which the Son of man shall give unto you: for him hath God the Father sealed.
language2_text: Taosya o kaziknan nyo no ji mamayok a kanekanen. Ta apyapya pa o kaziknan nyo no kanen a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo. O kanen rana ori am yaken o yatomoro nya jinyo. Ta yaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao o tomoro no akman sang jinyo. Ta yarana amyan jyaken so oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to. Ori rana am yongkad na no yanitomovoy jyaken."

language1_text: Then said they unto him, What shall we do, that we might work the works of God?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Makongo namen a kanoyong namen a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto them, This is the work of God, that ye believe on him whom he hath sent.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O na kakzeben jinyo a vazay nyo ni Ama ta do to am anoyngan nyo yaken a nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: They said therefore unto him, What sign shewest thou then, that we may see, and believe thee? what dost thou work?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "No komwan am patwaw pala so yongkad mo a nimapo ji Ama ta do to. Ta ori o anoyngan namen jimo.

language1_text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert; as it is written, He gave them bread from heaven to eat.
language2_text: Nikoman sira o ineynapo namen so mana do kabwan no nihakawan no tao. Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Ta maniring am, 'Nimapakas so kanen a apo do teyngato a nyakan da.'"

language1_text: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Moses gave you not that bread from heaven; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am jya nimapakas so kanen si Moyse, ta o apo do teyngato a kanen am si Ama ta do to o nitomoro nya.

language1_text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world.
language2_text: O kanen rana yana nipakas ni Ama ta do to a yapo do teyngato am yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad no tao do karawan."

language1_text: Then said they unto him, Lord, evermore give us this bread.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Mo kahakay, inaoy si masangib mo a itoro jyamen o akman sang a kanen."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Yaken rana am akma koy kanen a ikavyay no pahad nyo. O mai jyaken a tao am to meyyonong rana jyakcin. Omanoyong jyaken am to meyyonong a jyawaw.

language1_text: But I said unto you, That ye also have seen me, and believe not.
language2_text: Nipanci ko na jinyo. Nimacita nyo na yaken am nyo ji nganoyngi yaken.

language1_text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out.
language2_text: O pasngenen na jyaken ni Ama a tao am anoyngan da yaken a onotan. O mai jyaken a tao am ji ko likoji sira.

language1_text: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.
language2_text: Ta yaken rana am ko apo do teyngato. So ko ji to mangozai do nakenakem ko. Ta ko pangozayan o nakenakem no yanitomovoy jyaken.

language1_text: And this is the Father's will which hath sent me, that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing, but should raise it up again at the last day.
language2_text: O nakenakem no yanitomovoy jyaken am apzatan ko sira o nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a macikaop jyaken. Sira rana ori am avyain ko sira no marateng rana o araraw no kapeykapyapinpin na ni Ama ta do to so tao.

language1_text: And this is the will of him that sent me, that every one which seeth the Son, and believeth on him, may have everlasting life: and I will raise him up at the last day.
language2_text: Ta o nakenakem ni Ama am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da no makateneng jyaken a kano omanoyong jyaken a tao, a kapeyvangon ko pa sira no makaranes rana o araraw no kapeykapyapinpin na ni Ama ta do to so tao."

language1_text: The Jews then murmured at him, because he said, I am the bread which came down from heaven.
language2_text: Ikazyak da si Yeso no tao do Yotay do kapeyciring na so kakma ney kanen a apo do teyngato.

language1_text: And they said, Is not this Jesus, the son of Joseph, whose father and mother we know? how is it then that he saith, I came down from heaven?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Beken a oya o anak ni Yoseyvo asyo? Tamo katenngan o inyapwan na. Am ikongo na pancyan no na kapo do teyngato."

language1_text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them, Murmur not among yourselves.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ji nyo a zyakan.

language1_text: No man can come to me, except the Father which hath sent me draw him: and I will raise him up at the last day.
language2_text: No beken a si Ama a nitomovoy jyaken o yatomirara so tao am abo tao a mai jyaken. O mai jyaken a tao am avyain ko sira no makaranes rana o araraw no kapeykapyapinpin na ni Ama ta do to so tao.

language1_text: It is written in the prophets, And they shall be all taught of God. Every man therefore that hath heard, and hath learned of the Father, cometh unto me.
language2_text: O ciring da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to am, 'Mamimin o tao a vavagan ni Ama ta do to.' Omamizing so nanao ni Ama a mapeyyan sya do onowned na am mamimin sira ori a mai jyaken.

language1_text: Not that any man hath seen the Father, save he which is of God, he hath seen the Father.
language2_text: Am abo tao a nimakacita si Ama ta do to. O nimapo ji Ama ta do to am ori o nimakacita sya.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that believeth on me hath everlasting life.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am omanoyong jyaken a tao am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: I am that bread of life.
language2_text: Yaken am akma koy kanen a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness, and are dead.
language2_text: Tana nikoman sira o ineynapo nyo so mana do kabwan no nihakawan no tao am nimawakwak sira.

language1_text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven, that a man may eat thereof, and not die.
language2_text: Am o apo do teyngato a kanen am no kanen no tao am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live for ever: and the bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.
language2_text: Yaken rana am akma koy kanen a apo do teyngato a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo. O koman so kanen eya a tao am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da do teyngato. O itoro ko do tao a kanen da am kataotao ko, ta yangay ko inyo no inawan. Ori rana am ipakahap no tao so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da."

language1_text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves, saying, How can this man give us his flesh to eat?
language2_text: O ciring ni Yeso am nikazyak da no tao do Yotay. Maniring sira am, "Ikongo a kato na norwan no kataotao na jyaten a kanen ta."

language1_text: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man, and drink his blood, ye have no life in you.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no si ji nyo nganna o kataotao ko a ji ngyop so rala ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao am abo jinyo o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: Whoso eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, hath eternal life; and I will raise him up at the last day.
language2_text: O koman so kataotao ko a kano amyop so rala ko am amyan jira rana so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da. No makaranes rana o araraw no kapeykapyapinpin na ni Ama ta do to so tao am peyvangonen ko sira.

language1_text: For my flesh is meat indeed, and my blood is drink indeed.
language2_text: Ta o kataotao ko a kano rala ko am manoyong a kanen nyo am yopen nyo.

language1_text: He that eateth my flesh, and drinketh my blood, dwelleth in me, and I in him.
language2_text: O koman so kataotao ko a kano amyop so rala ko a tao am macikaop sira jyaken. So ikanoyong ko na macirapa do onowned da.

language1_text: As the living Father hath sent me, and I live by the Father: so he that eateth me, even he shall live by me.
language2_text: Yamacikaop jyaken si Ama a yanitomovoy jyaken do teyrahem a yana yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad no tao. So icyakman da sang no koman so kataotao ko a macirapa jyaken so inawan.

language1_text: This is that bread which came down from heaven: not as your fathers did eat manna, and are dead: he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever.
language2_text: O ko ipanci a kanen a apo do teyngato am ji meyyangay a kano nyakan da no ineynapo nyo a mana. Ta nimawakwak sira a yanikoman so sang. Am o koman so kanen a apo do teyngato am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da."

language1_text: These things said he in the synagogue, as he taught in Capernaum.
language2_text: O ciring rana ori am ciring ni Yeso no kapangnanao na do peyneynozyan do Cyapaynong.

language1_text: Many therefore of his disciples, when they had heard this, said, This is an hard saying; who can hear it?
language2_text: Mamizing da ori no macinanao jya am maniring sira am, "Asyo nanao eya a yajyazab. Sino makateneng do dang."

language1_text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it, he said unto them, Doth this offend you?
language2_text: Katenngan ni Yeso sira mazyak nya am maniring jira am, "Nyo ikarahet o ciring ang?

language1_text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before?
language2_text: Mangay kapeyzokab nyo nyaken si macita nyo yaken a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a meysinaoli do teyngato.

language1_text: It is the spirit that quickeneth; the flesh profiteth nothing: the words that I speak unto you, they are spirit, and they are life.
language2_text: O yamanta no tao so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na am Seyzi. So ikabo no oyowyat no tao a ipakahap sya. O ko ipanci jinyo a ciriciring am apo do Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to. Ori rana am ikavyay ori.

language1_text: But there are some of you that believe not. For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not, and who should betray him.
language2_text: Am yamyan jinyo so yaji manganoyong a tao." O peycirngan na sang ni Yeso am nimeycicinda o kapakateneng na do ji manganoyong a tao a kano manazang nya a tao.

language1_text: And he said, Therefore said I unto you, that no man can come unto me, except it were given unto him of my Father.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Ori o ko peycirngan so, 'No beken a si Ama ta do to o yatomirara sira am abo tao a mai jyaken.'"

language1_text: From that time many of his disciples went back, and walked no more with him.
language2_text: Nimacipinda no kano nang o kapeymakaro da jya rana no aro a tao a ji rana nganop sya.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve, Will ye also go away?
language2_text: Maniring do rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao jya am, "Manngo kamo. Akman kamo sira ori a mangay rana an?"

language1_text: Then Simon Peter answered him, Lord, to whom shall we go? thou hast the words of eternal life.
language2_text: Maniring si Simong Pite am, "Mo Panirsirngen, imo saon na yanan no nanao no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad namen. Sino pa o pacilolwan namen.

language1_text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ, the Son of the living God.
language2_text: Namen anoyngan o yamo kanimapo ji Ama ta do to a ji meylimoteng so onowned."

language1_text: Jesus answered them, Have not I chosen you twelve, and one of you is a devil?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ko inyo nipamnekan a yararwa so ikakarwan am yamyan jinyo so yasa ka tao a yana italamozong ni Satan."

language1_text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon: for he it was that should betray him, being one of the twelve.
language2_text: O ciring rana ori am pakacirngen na ni Yeso do tao do Isecyadi a anak ni Simong a meyngaran so Yota. Iya rana am ikararwa da so ikakarwan a omanam pa o kapanazang na ni Yeso.

language1_text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee: for he would not walk in Jewry, because the Jews sought to kill him.
language2_text: Makarahan am nilivolivon ni Yeso o peycyeylilyan na do Cyadidi. So ji na rana kei no kangay na do Yotay, ta naknakmen da no tao do Yotay si Yeso a zakaten.

language1_text: Now the Jews' feast of tabernacles was at hand.
language2_text: Makeykai rana o ipamarimaring da so kanen no tao do Yotay do kapakanakem da so ineynapo da a nimeyvahay do sarwap no kakwa pa am

language1_text: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judæ a, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.
language2_text: maniring sira wari na ni Yeso jya am, "To mo na ngaroi do jya kangay mo do Yotay, ta pakacittan da no macilocilolo jimo dang so vazay mo.

language1_text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret, and he himself seeketh to be known openly. If thou do these things, shew thyself to the world.
language2_text: No kakzeben o kapakateneng da do kataotao no tao am ji naywa o vazay. No si manoyong o kapeyvazay mo so mapeyzokab a vazay am patwawen mo do karwarwan no tao. Ta ori o ipakateneng da jimo no aro a tao."

language1_text: For neither did his brethren believe in him.
language2_text: O ikakman da sang da wari na am ji da pa nganoyngi si Yeso.

language1_text: Then Jesus said unto them, My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "Beken a araraw na pa ya no kapatwaw ko so vazay ko. Am inyo am apya jinyo.

language1_text: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.
language2_text: Ji da macioyai inyo no tao do karawan. Am pacioyyan da yaken, ta ji ko nitayo o ciring ko jira do raraten da.

language1_text: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast; for my time is not yet full come.
language2_text: Angay kamo a mamaring so kanen. Jyabo kangay ko sicyaikwaya. Ta beken a araraw na pa ya no yangay ko."

language1_text: When he had said these words unto them, he abode still in Galilee.
language2_text: Mateyka ni Yeso o ciring na ipanci jira am todavezed pa do Cyadidi.

language1_text: But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.
language2_text: Mangay rana sira wari na ni Yeso am mangay macipamarimaring so kanen si Yeso. Am ji mapacita do tao.

language1_text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast, and said, Where is he?
language2_text: No kapamaring da so kanen no tao do Yotay am nimakapya sira komala si Yeso.

language1_text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.
language2_text: Tatasa o meyyahhahes do aro a tao a mazyak ni Yeso. Amyan so manci nya apya. Amyan so manci nya yamanlita so tao.

language1_text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews.
language2_text: Am ji dadkeci do karwarwan no tao a patwawen o apya vazay na, ta ikanyahey da o panipanirsirngen da no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.
language2_text: Ji pa ngavos o ipamaring da so kanen am mangay si Yeso do rako a panaralayan a mangnanao so tao.

language1_text: And the Jews marvelled, saying, How knoweth this man letters, having never learned?
language2_text: Isavasavak da no panipanirsirngen da no tao do Yotay. Maniring sira am, "Asyo o tao eya yateywara so ciring a yajya nimeyvatvatek asyo."

language1_text: Jesus answered them, and said, My doctrine is not mine, but his that sent me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Beken a monganay jyaken o yako ipangnanao, ta yamonganay ori do yanitomovoy jyaken.

language1_text: If any man will do his will, he shall know of the doctrine, whether it be of God, or whether I speak of myself.
language2_text: No manoyong o tao a mangononong do apyahen ni Ama ta do to am katenngan na o ka yaken na, ka si Ama ta do to no nanao.

language1_text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory: but he that seeketh his glory that sent him, the same is true, and no unrighteousness is in him.
language2_text: O mapagaz so ciring do kataotao na am manoyong o akman sang a mapazway. Am o tao a makza no kazwazway da so nimapahanhan sya am manoyong o akman sang a jyalas.

language1_text: Did not Moses give you the law, and yet none of you keepeth the law? Why go ye about to kill me?
language2_text: Si Moyse rana am nitoro na jinyo o iwawalam ni Ama ta do to. Am yabo jinyo o yamanoyong a yamangozay jya. Ikongo nyo naknakman so nyo kawakwak jyaken."

language1_text: The people answered and said, Thou hast a devil: who goeth about to kill thee?
language2_text: Maniring sira o aro a tao am, "Ka kovotan eya an? Sino yamwakwak jimo."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto them, I have done one work, and ye all marvel.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ipisa ko pa nimeyvazay so rako a vazay do ipeywalam no tao am niyak nyo.

language1_text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.
language2_text: Am nipanci na inyo ni Moyse a amyongkad do kataotao nyo. Am beken a nimapo ji Moyse o kayongkad do kataotao, ta nimapo do ineynapo nyo. Ta yanyo yongkadan o ananak nyo do yaipeywalam no tao.

language1_text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision, that the law of Moses should not be broken; are ye angry at me, because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day?
language2_text: No si myan so tao a amyongkad do anak na do ipeywalam no tao, do kahap na so iwawalam ni Moyse am ikongo nyo oyyan nyaken no yako mangiwakwak so tao do ipeywalam no tao.

language1_text: Judge not according to the appearance, but judge righteous judgment.
language2_text: Iptad nyo na o kapanci nyo nyaken a meyraraten a tao. Ta to nyo na peyyana do onowned nyo o kapya na, karahet na no vazay ko."

language1_text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem, Is not this he, whom they seek to kill?
language2_text: Maniring o tatasa ka tao do Yelosaleng am, "Beken a oya o yada naknakmen eya wakwaken asyo?

language1_text: But, lo, he speaketh boldly, and they say nothing unto him. Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ?
language2_text: Asyo yabo tao a yamwoya nya. Yameyzezyak do karwarwan no tao. Ala da katenngan no panipanirsirngen o na ka Misayya an?

language1_text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is: but when Christ cometh, no man knoweth whence he is.
language2_text: Am no mai o Misayya am jyabo tao a makateneng do kapwan na. Am si Yeso rana am tamo todamimin a yakatenngan o yana nikapwan."

language1_text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught, saying, Ye both know me, and ye know whence I am: and I am not come of myself, but he that sent me is true, whom ye know not.
language2_text: No kano nang am mangnanao si Yeso do rako a panaralayan. Maniring a amlolos am, "Kamo manoyong a yamakateneng jyaken? So nyo ipakateneng do yako nikapwan? Beken a ko to meynakman ko kai. Ta yana nitovoy yaken ni Ama ta do to. So na jyalasi ni Ama ta do to. Am yanyo jyatenngi si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But I know him: for I am from him, and he hath sent me.
language2_text: Ko katenngan si Ama ta do to, do yako kanimapo jya. So ika iya na no yanitomovoy jyaken."

language1_text: Then they sought to take him: but no man laid hands on him, because his hour was not yet come.
language2_text: Karahan am naknakmen da rakpen am abo tao a manapet jya, ta beken a araraw na pa no irakep da sya.

language1_text: And many of the people believed on him, and said, When Christ cometh, will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done?
language2_text: Am amyan do aro a tao ang so omanoyong jya. Maniring sira am, "No si mai o Misayya am arwaro pa o peyvazain na vazay a yongkad no kayapo na ji Ama ta do to a kano tao eya?"

language1_text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him.
language2_text: Mamizing da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay o kazyak da ni Yeso am mapahanhan sira kano panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to so mamzamzat a mangay amrakep si Yeso.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto them, Yet a little while am I with you, and then I go unto him that sent me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yalikey rana o ipacikaop ko jinyo a kapeysinaoli ko na mangay do yanitomovoy jyaken do karawan.

language1_text: Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come.
language2_text: Kalahen nyo yaken am ji nyo a kala yaken, ta o angayan ko am ji nyo angai."

language1_text: Then said the Jews among themselves, Whither will he go, that we shall not find him? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles, and teach the Gentiles?
language2_text: Maniring sira o panipanirsirngen da no tao do Yotay do kadwan jira am, "Do wanjin na angayan a ji tamo makakalai sya. Yamangay saon a yameyvahay do Sila a amnanao sira so kasina ta no inawan?

language1_text: What manner of saying is this that he said, Ye shall seek me, and shall not find me: and where I am, thither ye cannot come?
language2_text: Na ipanci tamo kakala sya am ji tamo a kala. Ji tamo a tokod kono o angayan na. Ikeykongo peypeypangayan no ciring na ang."

language1_text: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.
language2_text: Ney makdeng na o pangavosan da mamaring so kanen. No kano nang am meytatanek si Yeso. Maniring a amlolos am, "No mawaw a tao am mai jyaken amyop.

language1_text: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.
language2_text: Ta akman so domket do Seysyo a ciring, 'Omanoyong jyaken am amyan so akmey atbod a ranom a jyates a amvoyog do onowned na pakahapan da no tao so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.'"

language1_text: (But this spake he of the Spirit, which they that believe on him should receive: for the Holy Ghost was not yet given; because that Jesus was not yet glorified.)
language2_text: O ciring ni Yeso am pakacirngen na do omanoyong jya do kapakahap da so Seyzi. No kano nang am ji pa nimeygegcin o Seyzi do omanoyong jya tao, ta ji pa nimakaranes o azwazway na a nimirwa a mavyay a meycyakavat do teyngato si Yeso.

language1_text: Many of the people therefore, when they heard this saying, said, Of a truth this is the Prophet.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring ni Yeso no aro a tao am maniring o karwan da am, "Yamanoyong oya tamo nanalahen a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Others said, This is the Christ. But some said, Shall Christ come out of Galilee?
language2_text: Amyan jira ang so manci nya Misayya. Am maniring sira o kadwan jira am, "Ta to na apoi no Misayya do Cyadidi!

language1_text: Hath not the scripture said, That Christ cometh of the seed of David, and out of the town of Bethlehem, where David was?
language2_text: Ta maniring do Seysyo am macikownongan ji Tawey o Misayya. Am mangay malikey do mina ili na ni Tawey a meyngaran so Podiheng."

language1_text: So there was a division among the people because of him.
language2_text: Ori o nipeyhatay da so onowned a ji macipaswasovoy.

language1_text: And some of them would have taken him; but no man laid hands on him.
language2_text: Naknakmen da no karwan da rakpen si Yeso am abo tao a manapet jya.

language1_text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees; and they said unto them, Why have ye not brought him?
language2_text: Meysinaoli sira o mamzamzat a tao do panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay am maniring sira am, "Ikongo nyo ji maciralai ji Yeso a yai."

language1_text: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.
language2_text: Maniring sira o mamzamzat am, "Ji namen pa nimakamizing so akman sito so ciriciring."

language1_text: Then answered them the Pharisees, Are ye also deceived?
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao a macyagom do Vadisay am, "Na to litai pa inyo no nang?

language1_text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?
language2_text: Manngwa, yamyan so panipanirsirngen a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay a yaomanod jya?

language1_text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed.
language2_text: Peydednan na sira no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to omanoyong jya tao. Ta da jyatenngi o iwawalam ni Moyse."

language1_text: Nicodemus saith unto them, (he that came to Jesus by night, being one of them, )
language2_text: Amyan jira ang so meyngaran so Niketemo. Iya rana ori am nimangay na nipacici si Yeso no kakwa pa. Maniring jira am,

language1_text: Doth our law judge any man, before it hear him, and know what he doeth?
language2_text: "Beken a iwawalam ta o kato mancyan no tao a meyraraten a jya nimamizing so ciring a jya nimacita meyraraten."

language1_text: They answered and said unto him, Art thou also of Galilee? Search, and look: for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Yaka tao do Cyadidi saon. Cita pala do Seysyo. Jyabo o yasa ka panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a nimapo do Cyadidi a."

language1_text: And every man went unto his own house.
language2_text: [Mamimin sira o aro a tao amrateng rana do kavahayan da.

language1_text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives.
language2_text: Am nimangay si Yeso do meyngaran so Kanlan a tokon.

language1_text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple, and all the people came unto him; and he sat down, and taught them.
language2_text: Apnezak do ikadwa na araw am meysinaoli a mangay do rako a panaralayan. Aro sira tao a mangay komala sya. Karahan am amlisna si Yeso amnanao sira.

language1_text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery; and when they had set her in the midst,
language2_text: No kanang am nyangay da no mangnanao no iwawalam ni Moyse a tao a kano tao a macyagom do Vadisay o asa ka mavakes. Iya rana am nisomagpyan a nyapisan da. Karahan am patanken da ori do tangain ni Yeso.

language1_text: they say unto him, Master, this woman was taken in adultery, in the very act.
language2_text: Maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Mo Mangnanao, yanisomagpyan o mavakes eya. Namen nyapisan.

language1_text: Now Moses in the law commanded us, that such should be stoned: but what sayest thou?
language2_text: Maniring do iwawalam ni Moyse am to rana abhebhesi a patoposen o somagpyan a akman so mavakes eya. Manngo ka do akman sang, mo Yeso."

language1_text: This they said, tempting him, that they might have to accuse him. But Jesus stooped down, and with his finger wrote on the ground, as though he heard them not.
language2_text: O peycirngan da sang am ileylamdamen da si Yeso. Ta no si ori pa o ipakakala da so iraherahet da sya am. Karahan am meylologod si Yeso a kapeyvatvatek na no tanoro na do tana.

language1_text: So when they continued asking him, he lifted up himself, and said unto them, He that is without sin among you, let him first cast a stone at her.
language2_text: Am ji da kwan si Yeso a pacicin. Karahan am meytatanek si Yeso. Maniring jira am, "Sino jinyo o yabo so raraten, ta manma gomseh jya no veysen."

language1_text: And again he stooped down, and wrote on the ground.
language2_text: Teyka na ori a ciring ni Yeso am mirwa pa meylologod a meyvatvatek no tanoro na do tana.

language1_text: And they which heard it, being convicted by their own conscience, went out one by one, beginning at the eldest, even unto the last: and Jesus was left alone, and the woman standing in the midst.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring na am to sira teyteyras a mangay rana, amyapo do ney rakeh na kangay na do ney anak na a to rana teyteyras a mangay, a kararwa da rana ni Yeso a kano mavakes ang nimavezed.

language1_text: When Jesus had lifted up himself, and saw none but the woman, he said unto her, Woman, where are those thine accusers? hath no man condemned thee?
language2_text: Karahan am meytatanek si Yeso. Maniring do mavakes ori am, "Wanjin da nyangayan no aro a tao ang. Yabo rana sira o yamakalavat so raraten mo ang?"

language1_text: She said, No man, Lord. And Jesus said unto her, Neither do I condemn thee: go, and sin no more.
language2_text: Maniring o mavakes ori am, "Jyabo rana." Maniring si Yeso am, "Ko na to peykabobwa o raraten mo. So to mo na angai. Am ji mo na peyneynama o kapeyraraten mo an."]

language1_text: Then spake Jesus again unto them, saying, I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness, but shall have the light of life.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Yaken rana am zezak no karawan. O macilolo jyaken a tao am amyan jira o zezak no onowned da. So ji da rana ngyani do kasarisaryan."

language1_text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him, Thou bearest record of thyself; thy record is not true.
language2_text: Maniring jya o tao a macyagom do Vadisay am, "Mo ipeylimwang o kataotao mo. Ikongo na angangayan no ciring mo."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto them, Though I bear record of myself, yet my record is true: for I know whence I came, and whither I go; but ye cannot tell whence I come, and whither I go.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Tana ipeylimwang ko o kataotao ko am ikongo na kalasan no ciring ko. Ko katenngan o ko kapwan. Ko katenngan o ko angayan. Am inyo am nyo jyatenngi o ko kapwan a kano ko angayan.

language1_text: Ye judge after the flesh; I judge no man.
language2_text: No kamo manita so tao am nyo citahen o kapyapyan no iwawalam no tao. Am yaken am ko jingwana sang.

language1_text: And yet if I judge, my judgment is true: for I am not alone, but I and the Father that sent me.
language2_text: No si amyan so oyaoyyan ko no tao am abo kalasan no ahahapan ko sya. Ta beken a ko asa ka tao a yamamnek jya. Ta namen rarwa si Ama a nimapahanhan jyaken do teyrahem.

language1_text: It is also written in your law, that the testimony of two men is true.
language2_text: O iwawalam nyo a yadomket do vakong am no rarwa rana o tao a meyyanoyong jya am ori o ikanoyong na, ta nimacita da no rarwa.

language1_text: I am one that bear witness of myself, and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me.
language2_text: Ko ipeylimwang o kataotao ko am yakman sang si Ama a yanitomovoy jyaken a yamacyanoyong jyaken."

language1_text: Then said they unto him, Where is thy Father? Jesus answered, Ye neither know me, nor my Father: if ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Wanjin na yanan ni Ama mo." Maniring si Yeso am, "Nyo jyatenngi yaken a kani Ama. Ta no si katenngan nyo yaken am akman sang si Ama katenngan nyo."

language1_text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury, as he taught in the temple: and no man laid hands on him; for his hour was not yet come.
language2_text: O ciring rana ya am mina ciring ni Yeso do pangapangayan da so kingking da a kavangan do rako a panaralayan da. No kanang am abo tao a amrakep sya. Ta beken pa araw na no irakep da si Yeso.

language1_text: Then said Jesus again unto them, I go my way, and ye shall seek me, and shall die in your sins: whither I go, ye cannot come.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso jira am, "Ko na mangay. So ikanoyong nyo a komala jyaken. Mangay kawakwak nyo a jyavonas so raraten no si ji nyo a hamangi o peyraratenan nyo. O angayan ko am ji kamo angay dang."

language1_text: Then said the Jews, Will he kill himself? because he saith, Whither I go, ye cannot come.
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao do Yotay am, "Yamaniring am, 'O angayan ko am ji kamo angay dang.' Manngwa, na rana to manmai o kataotao na saon?"

language1_text: And he said unto them, Ye are from beneath; I am from above: ye are of this world; I am not of this world.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Inyo am tao kamo do teyrahem. Am yaken am tao ko do teyngato. O nakenakem nyo am nakenakem no tao do teyrahem. Am yaken am yamacitarek.

language1_text: I said therefore unto you, that ye shall die in your sins: for if ye believe not that I am he, ye shall die in your sins.
language2_text: Am ori o ko pancyan no kawakwak nyo a jyavonas so raraten, no si ji nyo a hamangi o peyraratenan nyo. No si ji nyo nganoyngi yaken a meyngongyod a Tao do to am manoyong o kawakwak nyo a jyavonas so raraten."

language1_text: Then said they unto him, Who art thou? And Jesus saith unto them, Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning.
language2_text: Maniring sira ji Yeso am, "Sino sino ka ya." Maniring si Yeso am, "Nipeycicinda ko rana jinyo a nipanci.

language1_text: I have many things to say and to judge of you: but he that sent me is true; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him.
language2_text: Yaro pa yako ipanci jinyo a vazay a ipamizing ko so marahet a icicirawat nyo. So ikanoyong na no yanitomovoy jyaken do teyrahem. Ta o ko nimamizing jya am ipeylimwang ko do tao do teyrahem."

language1_text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father.
language2_text: Ji da tenngi no tao o malavat na ni Yeso a si Ama na do to.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto them, When ye have lifted up the Son of man, then shall ye know that I am he, and that I do nothing of myself; but as my Father hath taught me, I speak these things.
language2_text: Am ori o nipancyan na nya jira ni Yeso. Maniring jira am, "No si marateng o araraw no padketan nyo so Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao do jyojika am katenngan nyo rana yaken a meyngongyod ko a Tao do to. So ko ji mangozai do nakenakem ko. Ta ko pangozayan o nakenakem no yanimapahanhan jyaken a si Ama.

language1_text: And he that sent me is with me: the Father hath not left me alone; for I do always those things that please him.
language2_text: Yabo na ji nidongi jyaken ni Ama a yanitomovoy jyaken do teyrahem. Ko peyvazain o na isaray ni Ama. Am ori o na jya to paveyvowi jyaken."

language1_text: As he spake these words, many believed on him.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring ni Yeso no aro a tao am anoyngan da rana.

language1_text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him, If ye continue in my word, then are ye my disciples indeed;
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do omanoyong jya tao do Yotay am, "No si hapen nyo o nanao ko am manoyong kamo na omonot jyaken.

language1_text: and ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
language2_text: Mangay kapakateneng nyo do manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong nyo na a somaliway."

language1_text: They answered him, We be Abraham's seed, and were never in bondage to any man: how sayest thou, Ye shall be made free?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Yamen rana am komownongan ji Apolahan. So na ikabo pa no yanimapeylamsoy jyamen. Mo ipanci o kasaliway namen no makwa. Ikongo peypeypangayan no ciring mo ang."

language1_text: Jesus answered them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o meyraraten a tao am mamimin sira ori a lamlamsoy no raraten.

language1_text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever: but the Son abideth ever.
language2_text: O pavahain a lamlamsoy do vahay am abo o panadnaden so akman sang. Ta o meyngongyod a anak o panadnaden.

language1_text: If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.
language2_text: O Anak ni Ama ta do to o amvonas so raraten nyo. So ikanoyong nyo na somaliway a abo rana so raraten.

language1_text: I know that ye are Abraham's seed; but ye seek to kill me, because my word hath no place in you.
language2_text: Ko inyo katenngan a komownongan ji Apolahan am inyo am nyo naknakmen o nyo kawakwak jyaken. Ta nyo ji ngapa o nanao ko.

language1_text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father: and ye do that which ye have seen with your father.
language2_text: O yako ipanci am nipakoyokoy na pa jyaken ni Ama. Am o yanyo vazay am nyo hapen o ciring na jinyo no ama nyo."

language1_text: They answered and said unto him, Abraham is our father. Jesus saith unto them, If ye were Abraham's children, ye would do the works of Abraham.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Si Apolahan am ineynapo namen." Maniring si Yeso am, "No kamo manoyong a komownongan ji Apolahan am ahapen nyo o vazay ni Apolahan.

language1_text: But now ye seek to kill me, a man that hath told you the truth, which I have heard of God: this did not Abraham.
language2_text: O ko vahangsowen jinyo am nimahap ko ji Ama ta do to a nanao. Am inyo am nyo naknakmen o nyo kawakwak jyaken. Abo o akman sang a mina vazay ni Apolahan.

language1_text: Ye do the deeds of your father. Then said they to him, We be not born of fornication; we have one Father, even God.
language2_text: O nyo peyvazain a vazay am vazay no ama nyo." Maniring sira am, "Yabo na ikararwa ni Ama ta do to a ama namen. So namen ikanoyong a anak na."

language1_text: Jesus said unto them, If God were your Father, ye would love me: for I proceeded forth and came from God; neither came I of myself, but he sent me.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "No yamanoyong si Ama ta do to a ama nyo am ikongo nyo jyarilawi nyaken. Yaken rana am ko apo ji Ama ta do to. Ko na nimai do teyrahem. Am beken a nakenakem ko o ko kai, ta si Ama ta do to a yanimapahanhan jyaken.

language1_text: Why do ye not understand my speech? even because ye cannot hear my word.
language2_text: Ikongo nyo ji makatenngi do ciring ko. O na ikakman sang am nyo jyakzan a amizngen o ciriciring ko.

language1_text: Ye are of your father the devil, and the lusts of your father ye will do. He was a murderer from the beginning, and abode not in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaketh a lie, he speaketh of his own: for he is a liar, and the father of it.
