language2_text: Inyo am anak kamo ni Satan. Ta nyo pangozayan o nakenakem no ama nyo a nimakalapo no kakwa o kapangap na so tao. Ji nakzan o manoyong a nanao, ta abo jya o manoyong a nanao. Cinatao na o kapangalalas na, ta iya rana am kapangalalas na a yapwan no makakaday a malas.

language1_text: And because I tell you the truth, ye believe me not.
language2_text: O nyo ji nganoyngi jyaken am ko malavat o manoyong a nanao.

language1_text: Which of you convinceth me of sin? And if I say the truth, why do ye not believe me?
language2_text: Pancyan kamo pala o yongkad no raraten ko. Ikongo nyo ji nganoyngi jyaken a yamanci no yamanoyong a nanao.

language1_text: He that is of God heareth God's words: ye therefore hear them not, because ye are not of God.
language2_text: O akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to a tao am ori omamizing so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Inyo rana am beken a akma ney anak inyo ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o nyo ji ngamizngi sya."

language1_text: Then answered the Jews, and said unto him, Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan, and hast a devil?
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao do Yotay ji Yeso am, "Namen ipanci imo a tao do Samadiya a yakovotan. Manngwa, yamalas ori?"

language1_text: Jesus answered, I have not a devil; but I honour my Father, and ye do dishonour me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yabo a yakomovot jyaken. Ko ikanig si Ama. Am inyo am nyo jyasnesnekan yaken.

language1_text: And I seek not mine own glory: there is one that seeketh and judgeth.
language2_text: Ko ji ngakzeba o ko kazwayan. Ta si Ama o yazomwazway jyaken a yameylimwang nyaken.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, If a man keep my saying, he shall never see death.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o mahap so nanao ko am to meyyonong o akman sang a tao a ji rana wakwak."

language1_text: Then said the Jews unto him, Now we know that thou hast a devil. Abraham is dead, and the prophets; and thou sayest, If a man keep my saying, he shall never taste of death.
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao do Yotay jya am, "Namen rana katenngan imo a yakovotan. Yarana nimawakwak si Apolahan a kano panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. Am no ka maniring am, 'O mahap so nanao ko am to meyyonong o akman sang a tao a ji rana wakwak.'

language1_text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham, which is dead? and the prophets are dead: whom makest thou thyself?
language2_text: Yamo kadketan a ipanci o mo kahamahama pa kani Apolahan a inapo namen? Yana nimawakwak si Apolahan a kano panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. Ikongo mo ahahapan so kataotao mo."

language1_text: Jesus answered, If I honour myself, my honour is nothing: it is my Father that honoureth me; of whom ye say, that he is your God:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No si azwain ko o kataotao ko am abo peypeypangayan no akman sang a azwazway. O yazomwazway jyaken am si Ama a yanyo abneken a Tao nyo do to.

language1_text: yet ye have not known him; but I know him: and if I should say, I know him not, I shall be a liar like unto you: but I know him, and keep his saying.
language2_text: Iya rana am nyo jyatenngi. Am ko katenngan. No si ipanci ko o kaji ko makatenngan jya am akman ko jinyo ori a mangalalas. Am ko katenngan a yamahap so nanao na.

language1_text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day: and he saw it, and was glad.
language2_text: Tod na ji nala o araraw no yai ko ni Apolahan a inapo nyo. Katenngan na o kai ko am masaray rana."

language1_text: Then said the Jews unto him, Thou art not yet fifty years old, and hast thou seen Abraham?
language2_text: Maniring sira jya o tao do Yotay am, "Ala yaka pa jyanet a yasikalima (50) so kakawakawan eya an. Manngwa, manoyong kanimakacita mo rana si Apolahan an?"

language1_text: Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Before Abraham was, I am.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am ji pa nimatazak a tao si Apolahan am amyan ko rana."

language1_text: Then took they up stones to cast at him: but Jesus hid himself, and went out of the temple, going through the midst of them, and so passed by.
language2_text: Mangap sira so veysen a igseh da ji Yeso am kanitomayo na makowbot do rako a panaralayan.

language1_text: And as Jesus passed by, he saw a man which was blind from his birth.
language2_text: Mangonong si Yeso do rarahan am makacita so nimeycicinda no kalyalikey na mavota tao.

language1_text: And his disciples asked him, saying, Master, who did sin, this man, or his parents, that he was born blind?
language2_text: Maniring sira o macinanao ji Yeso am, "Mo Mangnanao, nimeycicinda ya nimavota no kalyalikey na. Sino raraten a na kakman sang. Manngwa, kataotao na an? No inyapwan na."

language1_text: Jesus answered, Neither hath this man sinned, nor his parents: but that the works of God should be made manifest in him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Beken a raraten na. Beken a inyapwan na o na ikavota. Ta peymatamatan da jya no tao so vazay na ni Ama ta do to do yamavota a tao eya.

language1_text: I must work the works of him that sent me, while it is day: the night cometh, when no man can work.
language2_text: Ahapen ta o vazay na no yanimapahanhan jyaken do ikavyay ta pa. Ta no si mawakwak ta rana am ji ta na makapeyvazay.

language1_text: As long as I am in the world, I am the light of the world.
language2_text: No keyyan ko pa do teyrahem eya am zezak nyo yaken a tao do karawan."

language1_text: When he had thus spoken, he spat on the ground, and made clay of the spittle, and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay,
language2_text: Iptad na o ciring na am meycicipa si Yeso do tana a kapazavoz na sya do tana a kapakoris na sya do mata no mavota tao.

language1_text: and said unto him, Go, wash in the pool of Siloam, (which is by interpretation, Sent.) He went his way therefore, and washed, and came seeing.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Angay oyasi do nibneng da ranom a yameyngaran so Siloya." O peypeypangayan no Siloya am Nipahanhan. Karahan am mangay na rana oyasan. Meysinaoli am makacita rana.

language1_text: The neighbours therefore, and they which before had seen him that he was blind, said, Is not this he that sat and begged?
language2_text: Macita da no katakataib na kano kararay na am maniring sira am, "Beken a oya asyo o yamyamyan do jya yamacikakanen asyo?"

language1_text: Some said, This is he: others said, He is like him: but he said, I am he.
language2_text: Maniring o kadwan jira am, "Iya saon am." Am tatasa jira o manci no, "Beken a iya. Na kakman sya so kamamagenan." Maniring o nimavota ori am, "Yaken o yanyo malavat ang."

language1_text: Therefore said they unto him, How were thine eyes opened?
language2_text: Maniring sira do tao ori am, "Yanimakongo so wanjin o mata mo a yamo kato makacittan rana ang."

language1_text: He answered and said, A man that is called Jesus made clay, and anointed mine eyes, and said unto me, Go to the pool of Siloam, and wash: and I went and washed, and I received sight.
language2_text: Maniring o tao ori am, "O yasa ka tao a meyngaran so Yeso am yanimapakoris do mata ko so tana, na kapanci nya jyaken so, 'Angay oyasi mata mo do nibneng da ranom a yameyngaran so Siloya.' Ko mangay oyasan am ko na to makacita rana."

language1_text: Then said they unto him, Where is he? He said, I know not.
language2_text: Maniring sira do tao ori am, "Wanjin na yanan." Maniring o tao ori am, "Ko na jyatenngi."

language1_text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind.
language2_text: Yangay da o mavota tao a nimapya rana do tao a macyagom do Vadisay.

language1_text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay, and opened his eyes.
language2_text: No keywakwak na ni Yeso do mavota tao am ipeywalam no tao o araraw na.

language1_text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight. He said unto them, He put clay upon mine eyes, and I washed, and do see.
language2_text: Ipirwa da pacicin no tao a macyagom do Vadisay o nimapya rana so mata tao am maniring o tao ori am, "Na nipakorisan so tana o mata ko. Ko kangay moyas jya am ori o ko ipakacita rana."

language1_text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees, This man is not of God, because he keepeth not the sabbath day. Others said, How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles? And there was a division among them.
language2_text: Maniring o tatasa ka tao a macyagom do Vadisay am, "O yanimapeyvazay so sang a tao am jyabo na kanimapo ji Ama ta do to a. Ta ikongo na ji mangozai do nanao do ipeywalam no tao." Am maniring sira o karwan da am, "O meyraraten a tao am ikongo na to mapeyvazai so yamapeyzokab a vazay." Am ori o peyhatay da so onowned a ji macipaswasovoy.

language1_text: They say unto the blind man again, What sayest thou of him, that he hath opened thine eyes? He said, He is a prophet.
language2_text: Makarahan am pacicin da pa o tao ori. Maniring sira am, "Yana imo niwakwakan so mata am ikongo o ciring mo so tao ang." Maniring o tao ori am, "Iya rana am panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him, that he had been blind, and received his sight, until they called the parents of him that had received his sight.
language2_text: Sira rana aro a tao do Yotay am ji da nganoyngi o kanimavota no tao ang. Ipanci da o inyapwan na.

language1_text: And they asked them, saying, Is this your son, who ye say was born blind? how then doth he now see?
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Anak nyo ya? Manngwa, nimeycicinda o anak nyo ya nimavota? Ikongo na to makacitai rana sicyaikwaya."

language1_text: His parents answered them and said, We know that this is our son, and that he was born blind:
language2_text: Maniring o inyapwan na am, "Yamanoyong a anak namen. Iya rana am nimakalapo no kalyalikey na o kaji na makacittan. So namen ipakateneng jya.

language1_text: but by what means he now seeth, we know not; or who hath opened his eyes, we know not: he is of age; ask him: he shall speak for himself.
language2_text: Am namen jyatenngi o na to makacitai rana sicyaikwaya. Namen jyatenngi o yaniomiwakwak jya. To kamo nangay a mapacici sya. Cyaha, ta yarana makaveyvow. Jyabo kaji na mancyan nya jinyo a."

language1_text: These words spake his parents, because they feared the Jews: for the Jews had agreed already, that if any man did confess that he was Christ, he should be put out of the synagogue.
language2_text: O pancyan da no akman sang no inyapwan na am ikanyahey da o panipanirsirngen da no tao do Yotay. Ta maniring sira am, "No si myan so tao a omanoyong ji Yeso a Misayya am to na pagcina do peyneynozyan."

language1_text: Therefore said his parents, He is of age; ask him.
language2_text: Ori o to da rana mancii nira no inyapwan na mangay mapacici so anak da.

language1_text: Then again called they the man that was blind, and said unto him, Give God the praise: we know that this man is a sinner.
language2_text: Karahan am ipirwa sira mangay manci no nimapya so mata tao ang. Maniring sira jya am, "Ji ka mangononong so malas do tangain ni Ama ta do to. Ta namen katenngan na kapeyraraten a tao ni Yeso."

language1_text: He answered and said, Whether he be a sinner or no, I know not: one thing I know, that, whereas I was blind, now I see.
language2_text: Maniring o nimavota tao ori am, "Ko jyatenngi na kapeyraraten a tao. Am ko katenngan o kanimavota ko am ko na makacita sicyaikwaya."

language1_text: Then said they to him again, What did he to thee? how opened he thine eyes?
language2_text: Maniring sira jya am, "Ikongo na mina vazay jimo. Yanimakongo so wanjin a yaniomiwakwak do mata mo."

language1_text: He answered them, I have told you already, and ye did not hear: wherefore would ye hear it again? will ye also be his disciples?
language2_text: Maniring o tao ori am, "Ko na nipanci jinyo am nyo kaji ngamizngan sya. Ikongo nyo kakdayan pa sya amizngen. Nyo ikakza saon a kabnek jinyo a macilocilolo jya?"

language1_text: Then they reviled him, and said, Thou art his disciple; but we are Moses' disciples.
language2_text: Am ori o nyavayan da sya. Maniring sira am, "Imo o na abneken a yamacilocilolo jya. Yamen am namen macilocilolo ji Moyse.

language1_text: We know that God spake unto Moses: as for this fellow, we know not from whence he is.
language2_text: Namen katenngan o kanimacisirsiring ni Ama ta do to ji Moyse. Am o tao ori am tamo jyatenngi o na nikapwan."

language1_text: The man answered and said unto them, Why herein is a marvellous thing, that ye know not from whence he is, and yet he hath opened mine eyes.
language2_text: Maniring ori am, "Asyo ori nyo jyatenngi na kapwan no yaniomiwakwak do mata ko ang.

language1_text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners: but if any man be a worshipper of God, and doeth his will, him he heareth.
language2_text: Tamo katenngan o kaji na ngamizngan so pasyasyan da ji Ama ta do to no meyraraten a tao. Ta omraralay nya kano mahap so apyahen na vazay o amizngen na.

language1_text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind.
language2_text: No kamaog no karawan eya am abo pa o tao a to mangiwakwak so mata no nimeycicinda a mavota tao.

language1_text: If this man were not of God, he could do nothing.
language2_text: Jyabo na kaji nimapwan ji Ama ta do to no nya. Ta ikongo na to makapeyvazay so akman sang a vazay."

language1_text: They answered and said unto him, Thou wast altogether born in sins, and dost thou teach us? And they cast him out.
language2_text: Karahan am ioya da o tao ang. Maniring sira jya am, "Si mangnanao ka yameyraraten eya am makongo." Karahan am pagcinen da do peyneynozyan da.

language1_text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out; and when he had found him, he said unto him, Dost thou believe on the Son of God?
language2_text: Mamizing ni Yeso sira nimapagcin sya do peyneynozyan am mangay na kalahen. Karahan am pacicin ni Yeso. Maniring jya am, "Mo anoyngan o Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao an?"

language1_text: He answered and said, Who is he, Lord, that I might believe on him?
language2_text: Maniring am, "Pancyaney jyaken. Sino o tao ang. Ta anoyngan ko."

language1_text: And Jesus said unto him, Thou hast both seen him, and it is he that talketh with thee.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Mo rana nimacita. O yamacisirsiring jimo am iya ori."

language1_text: And he said, Lord, I believe. And he worshipped him.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, ko anoyngan imo." Karahan am meylilitod do tangain ni Yeso a omraralay nya.

language1_text: And Jesus said, For judgment I am come into this world, that they which see not might see; and that they which see might be made blind.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O peypeypangayan no yako nyai do teyrahem am ko mapeykapyapinpin so tao. Ko iwangan o mata da no yakmey mavota so pahad a tao a kapakacita da rana. O mapakateneteneng do nanao na ni Ama ta do to am meyvaliw rana sira akmey mavota, abo so katentenngan."

language1_text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words, and said unto him, Are we blind also?
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring eya no amyan dang a tao a macyagom do Vadisay am pacicin da si Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Manngwa, mo patpehen yamen do mavota tao?"

language1_text: Jesus said unto them, If ye were blind, ye should have no sin: but now ye say, We see; therefore your sin remaineth.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "No kamo manoyong a makateneng do na kakmey mavota no pahad nyo am abo raraten nyo. Am si pazwain nyo o kapakateneng nyo rana jya am kamo manoyong a yamyan so raraten."

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold, but climbeth up some other way, the same is a thief and a robber.
language2_text: Maniring pa jira si Yeso am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o jindep do aneb no amaot no kagling a kangay na meysopo jya am manakaw o akman sang.

language1_text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep.
language2_text: O somdep do aneb no amaot no kagling am manoyong a mapeyvinyay sya.

language1_text: To him the porter openeth; and the sheep hear his voice: and he calleth his own sheep by name, and leadeth them out.
language2_text: Iwangan na o aneb no amaot no vinyay na no pamzamzaten da a kasdep na no mapamangamangan so kagling na. Katovilan no kagling na o itawag na jira no mapeyvinyay sira. Teyteyhesahen na sira tawagan a powboten.

language1_text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep, he goeth before them, and the sheep follow him: for they know his voice.
language2_text: Powboten na sira am mangay do panoman da mamanong nira kapacihza da jya no kagling na, ta katovilan da o itawag na jira.

language1_text: And a stranger will they not follow, but will flee from him: for they know not the voice of strangers.
language2_text: Ji sira macihza do ji da singkaji so itawag jira, ta ikeywam da, do kaji da makatovilan do igagan na sira."

language1_text: This parable spake Jesus unto them: but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them.
language2_text: Ipanci na jira ori a pehngehngayan na sya ni Yeso. Am ji da azab o peypeypangayan no ciring na.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto them again, Verily, verily, I say unto you, I am the door of the sheep.
language2_text: Am ori o nipancyan na nya jira. Maniring am, "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am yaken am akma koy asdesdepan do peyyamaotan so kagling.

language1_text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers: but the sheep did not hear them.
language2_text: O manmanma pa ka nyaken a macitarek so ipangnanao am akman sira so manakaw a tao. Am ori o ji da ngamizngi so nanao da no tao.

language1_text: I am the door: by me if any man enter in, he shall be saved, and shall go in and out, and find pasture.
language2_text: Yaken rana am akma koy asdesdepan. O somdep jyaken am patazadangen ko sira do teyngato. So ikanoyong da tey yapya, to ngonongonong do kasdep da, kapakowbot da a kapakakala da so apyahen da no nakem.

language1_text: The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.
language2_text: O isdep da no manakaw am manakaw sira, kapanwakwak da ambalinas sira. Am o peypeypangayan no ko nyai do teyrahem am ko ipanta inyo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo, kasasaray nyo rana abo so kalahen.

language1_text: I am the good shepherd: the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep.
language2_text: "Yaken rana am akma koy mapamangamangan so kagling a makapzat do omanop jyaken a tao. Ta mangay o kangay ko no inawan no omanop jyaken a tao.

language1_text: But he that is an hireling, and not the shepherd, whose own the sheep are not, seeth the wolf coming, and leaveth the sheep, and fleeth: and the wolf catcheth them, and scattereth the sheep.
language2_text: O torwan da mapamangamangan so kagling am ji na pakapya apzatan o kagling, ta ji meyngongyod ori a mapeyvinyay sira. No myan so vozaw a ino a macisngen do kagling am to na rana ngaroi o kagling, a kakan na so kagling a peyvwaken no vozaw a ino.

language1_text: The hireling fleeth, because he is an hireling, and careth not for the sheep.
language2_text: O ikaro da do kagling no torwan da mapamangamangan so kagling am ji meyngongyod a mapeyvinyay sya. Am ori o ji na makakdengi jira apzatan.

language1_text: I am the good shepherd, and know my sheep, and am known of mine.As the Father knoweth me, even so know I the Father: and I lay down my life for the sheep.
language2_text: Yaken rana am akma koy mapamangamangan so kagling a makapzat jira. Si Ama ka nyaken am namen katenngan o kadwan jyamen. Yakman sang o kagling ko yamabwang jyaken. Yaken rana am ikakza ko o kangay ko nira no inawan. Yaken rana am akma koy mapamangamangan so kagling a makapzat jira. Si Ama ka nyaken am namen katenngan o kadwan jyamen. Yakman sang o kagling ko yamabwang jyaken. Yaken rana am ikakza ko o kangay ko nira no inawan.

language1_text: And other sheep I have, which are not of this fold: them also I must bring, and they shall hear my voice; and there shall be one fold, and one shepherd.
language2_text: O kagling ko a yapa ji macyamaot do jya am mangay ko kalahen sira kapakamizing da so itawag ko jira. So icyakma dey yasa a onongan ko.

language1_text: Therefore doth my Father love me, because I lay down my life, that I might take it again.
language2_text: "Ikarilaw na yaken ni Ama. Ta ko ji macimamman o kangay ko no inawan nira. O ikakman na sang am meysinaoli pa jyaken o inawan ko.

language1_text: No man taketh it from me, but I lay it down of myself. I have power to lay it down, and I have power to take it again. This commandment have I received of my Father.
language2_text: Abo o tao a makapehes so inawan ko, ta yaken o yatomalamozong no kawakwak ko, kaji ko a wakwakan. Nakenakem ko kangay no inawan ko. To ko ngonongonongi o keypirwa ko a mavyay, ta nakenakem ni Ama o kahap ko so akman sang a vazay."

language1_text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings.
language2_text: Mamizing da o aro a ciring ori no tao do Yotay am meyhatay sira so onowned a ji macipaswasovoy.

language1_text: And many of them said, He hath a devil, and is mad; why hear ye him?
language2_text: Aro jira manci no, "Yakovotan ori. Yazomyak. Nyo amizngan sya."

language1_text: Others said, These are not the words of him that hath a devil. Can a devil open the eyes of the blind?
language2_text: Maniring o karwan da am, "Mapatwaw na o akman sang a ciring no kovotan? Ta to na makeywangi do mata no mavota tao no yakovotan ang."

language1_text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication, and it was winter.
language2_text: Teyka sira mamaring so kanen do Yelosaleng do kaniomyavayo da so rako a panaralayan da no kakwa pa am zosok no ahemyan no kano nang.

language1_text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon's porch.
language2_text: Mangonong si Yeso do tezantehed no rako a panaralayan do ngaranan da Solomen am,

language1_text: Then came the Jews round about him, and said unto him, How long dost thou make us to doubt? If thou be the Christ, tell us plainly.
language2_text: limoten da no tao do Yotay. Maniring sira jya am, "Yanamen ipeykawad imo. Pancyan pala jyamen o mo ka Misayya."

language1_text: Jesus answered them, I told you, and ye believed not: the works that I do in my Father's name, they bear witness of me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Nipanci ko na jinyo am nyo ji nganoyngi. To nyo na novili o vazay a na nitoro jyaken ni Ama, ta ori o yongkad ko a yapo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But ye believe not, because ye are not of my sheep, as I said unto you.
language2_text: O nyo ji nganoyngi jyaken am beken a kagling ko inyo.

language1_text: My sheep hear my voice, and I know them, and they follow me:
language2_text: O kagling ko am katenngan da o izezyak ko. So ipakateneng ko jiraha. So da ipacilolo jyaken.

language1_text: and I give unto them eternal life; and they shall never perish, neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand.
language2_text: Ipanta ko sira so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da. So ji rana meydednai jira no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to. So ikabo no tao a makapehes sira do lima ko.

language1_text: My Father, which gave them me, is greater than all; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father's hand.
language2_text: Si Ama a yanitomoro nira jyaken am abo makahad sya. So ikabo no tao a makapehes sira do lima na.

language1_text: I and my Father are one.
language2_text: Namen akmey yasa si Ama."

language1_text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him.
language2_text: Karahan am mangap sira o tao do Yotay so veysen a igseh da jya.

language1_text: Jesus answered them, Many good works have I shewed you from my Father; for which of those works do ye stone me?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Yaro rana o yanyo nimacita a ko pangarilawan a na nitoro a vazay na ni Ama. Am ikongo yamarahet dang a vazay ko a yanyo kato meyvatwan nyaken."

language1_text: The Jews answered him, saying, For a good work we stone thee not; but for blasphemy; and because that thou, being a man, makest thyself God.
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao do Yotay am, "Beken a vazay ang o namen agsahan jimo. Ta imo rana am mo jyasnesnekan si Ama ta do to. Ta yamo paka Tao do towen o kataotao mo a todna ka tao."

language1_text: Jesus answered them, Is it not written in your law, I said, Ye are gods?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yadomket do vakong nyo o ciring na ni Ama ta do to. Maniring am, 'Inyo am tao do to kamo.'

language1_text: If he called them gods, unto whom the word of God came, and the scripture cannot be broken;
language2_text: Tamo katenngan o kato na meyyonongan a jyablis no Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do Seysyo. Ipanci ni Ama ta do to o kakma dey tao do to no mahap so ciriciring na no kakwa pa.

language1_text: say ye of him, whom the Father hath sanctified, and sent into the world, Thou blasphemest; because I said, I am the Son of God?
language2_text: Am yaken rana am na nitovoy yaken ni Ama do teyrahem. Ko ipanci pa am Anak na yaken ni Ama ta do to. Ikongo nyo pancyan nyaken a yajyaninig ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: If I do not the works of my Father, believe me not.
language2_text: No ko ji ngapa o vazay ni Ama am ji nyo nganoyngi yaken.

language1_text: But if I do, though ye believe not me, believe the works: that ye may know, and believe, that the Father is in me, and I in him.
language2_text: Am tana ji nyo nganoyngi yaken am anoyngan nyo o vazay ko an. Ta ori o ipakateneng nyo ji Ama yamacikaop jyaken. Ta yako macikaop jya."

language1_text: Therefore they sought again to take him: but he escaped out of their hand,
language2_text: Makarahan am naknakmen da o karakep da sya am kanikomaro na rana jira.

language1_text: and went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized; and there he abode.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay si Yeso do katovangan no meyngaran so Yotan a ayo do nipanaktakan ni Yowani a miseysan.

language1_text: And many resorted unto him, and said, John did no miracle: but all things that John spake of this man were true.
language2_text: Aro tao a mangay komala sya. Maniring sira am, "Abo o mapeyzokab a vazay ni Yowani am manoyong o ciring na pakacirngen na do tao eya."

language1_text: And many believed on him there.
language2_text: Aro tao do dang a niomanoyong ji Yeso.

language1_text: Now a certain man was sick, named Lazarus, of Bethany, the town of Mary and her sister Martha.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tao a meyngaran so Lasalo a tey makdeng so ingingnen a meyvahay do Potani. Do dang rana am peyilyan da Madiya kano kaka na a meyngaran so Marta.

language1_text: (It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment, and wiped his feet with her hair, whose brother Lazarus was sick.)
language2_text: Si Madiya rana am iya o nimapaglo so mahangno a haneng do ai ni Yeso a kalinas na jya no avok na so ai ni Yeso. O meyngen a si Lasalo am kakteh na no nang.

language1_text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him, saying, Lord, behold, he whom thou lovest is sick.
language2_text: O rarwa kakteh na am mapasonson sira so tao a mangay ji Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Mo Panirsirngen, yameyngen o ney malipetpet na jimo a kagagan mo."

language1_text: When Jesus heard that, he said, This sickness is not unto death, but for the glory of God, that the Son of God might be glorified thereby.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso do pakamizngan na sya am, "Jyabo kato na rana wakwakan ni Lasalo no ingingnen na ori a. O ikakman na sang am azwain si Ama ta do to a kapacyazway na no Anak na."

language1_text: Now Jesus loved Martha, and her sister, and Lazarus.
language2_text: Ikaglaw ni Yeso si Marta kano kakteh na a si Madiya. Akman sang si Lasalo a ikaglaw na.

language1_text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick, he abode two days still in the same place where he was.
language2_text: Mamizing na si Lasalo a meyngen am todavezed pa dang si Yeso a miseysan so kadwa araw.

language1_text: Then after that saith he to his disciples, Let us go into Judæ a again.
language2_text: Karahan am maniring do macinanao jya am, "Meyoli tamo pa do Yotay a pongso."

language1_text: His disciples say unto him, Master, the Jews of late sought to stone thee; and goest thou thither again?
language2_text: Maniring o macinanao jya am, "Mo Mangnanao, no kano nang asyo am apwa agsahan da imo no veysen no tao do Yotay. Ikongo mo kakzan no mo kapeysinaoli pa do dang."

language1_text: Jesus answered, Are there not twelve hours in the day? If any man walk in the day, he stumbleth not, because he seeth the light of this world.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yadwa o ikarwa no vatvatek no na ikazngang. No malam o tao do maraw am jyabo kacikad na, do kapakacita na so zezak a amzezak so karawan a.

language1_text: But if a man walk in the night, he stumbleth, because there is no light in him.
language2_text: Am no mangonong do mahep am jyabo kaji na nikadan, do kaji na makacittan so mazngang a."

language1_text: These things said he: and after that he saith unto them, Our friend Lazarus sleepeth; but I go, that I may awake him out of sleep.
language2_text: Iptad na o ciring na ni Yeso am maniring pa am, "Yamitkeh si Lasalo a kagagan ta. Mangay ko pa yokain."

language1_text: Then said his disciples, Lord, if he sleep, he shall do well.
language2_text: Maniring o macinanao jya am, "Mo Panirsirngen, no si manoyong a mitkeh am ji meyvangon pa ori a."

language1_text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death: but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no ciring ni Yeso am yarana nimawakwak si Lasalo. Am ji da tenngi no tao o ciring na. Ta ipanci da yato ngitkeh.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly, Lazarus is dead.
language2_text: Karahan am ji na rana naywa o ciring na ni Yeso jira. Maniring am, "Yarana nimawakwak si Lasalo.

language1_text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there, to the intent ye may believe; nevertheless let us go unto him.
language2_text: Apyapya o kaji ko ngyanan do dang. Ta si macita nyo na o vazay ko am ji nyo nganoyngi rana yaken a. So yangay tamo pala."

language1_text: Then said Thomas, which is called Didymus, unto his fellowdisciples, Let us also go, that we may die with him.
language2_text: O meyngaran so Tomase a ngaranan da si Nimeytovong a nimatazak a tao am maniring do karwan da macinanao ji Yeso am, "Macihza tamo jya, kapacikawakwak ta jya."

language1_text: Then when Jesus came, he found that he had lain in the grave four days already.
language2_text: Makaranes si Yeso do Potani am katenngan na rana si Lasalo a kapat araw a nibobo da.

language1_text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem, about fifteen furlongs off:
language2_text: Masngen o Potani do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: and many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary, to comfort them concerning their brother.
language2_text: Aro o tao do Yotay a nimapo do Yelosaleng a mangay mapadnadna so pahad da Marta kani Madiya, do kanimawakwak no kakteh da.

language1_text: Then Martha, as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming, went and met him: but Mary sat still in the house.
language2_text: Mamizing ni Marta si Yeso a nimai am makowbot a mangay amrapong sya. Si Madiya am to ngyan do sahad no vahay da.

language1_text: Then said Martha unto Jesus, Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother had not died.
language2_text: Maniring si Marta ji Yeso am, "Mo Panirsirngen, no ka mina to ngyan do jya am jyabo na mina kawakwak a.

language1_text: But I know, that even now, whatsoever thou wilt ask of God, God will give it thee.
language2_text: Am ko katenngan o kamizing na jimo ni Ama ta do to do pasyasyan mo jya sicyaikwaya."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, Thy brother shall rise again.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "O kakteh mo ori am mirwa pa ori a mavyay."

language1_text: Martha saith unto him, I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day.
language2_text: Maniring si Marta am, "Ko katenngan o keypirwa na mavyay no marateng o araraw no keypirwa da meyvangon no nimawakwak rana tao do ikavos rana no karawan."

language1_text: Jesus said unto her, I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yaken o mapeyvangon so nimawakwak a tao. Yaken o yapwan no inawan no tao. Tana nimawakwak rana sira o omanoyong jyaken am mirwa pa sira mavyay.

language1_text: and whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die. Believest thou this?
language2_text: O mavyay pa omanoyong jyaken am amyan rana jira so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da. So ji da rana wakwaki no pahad da. Anoyngan mo ori an?"

language1_text: She saith unto him, Yea, Lord: I believe that thou art the Christ, the Son of God, which should come into the world.
language2_text: Maniring si Marta am, "Mo Panirsirngen, ko anoyngan. Ko anoyngan imo a Misayya a mai do karawan a Anak na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And when she had so said, she went her way, and called Mary her sister secretly, saying, The Master is come, and calleth for thee.
language2_text: Teyka na o ciring na ni Marta am mangay rana do vahay da a kahes na si Madiya. Maniring am, "Yana nimai o Mangnanao. Yana ipanci imo."

language1_text: As soon as she heard that, she arose quickly, and came unto him.
language2_text: Mamizing na o ciring na am meybezbez a mangay ji Yeso.

language1_text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town, but was in that place where Martha met him.
language2_text: No kano nang am ji pa nimangay si Yeso do ili da, ta todavezed pa do niyanan da da Marta.

language1_text: The Jews then which were with her in the house, and comforted her, when they saw Mary, that she rose up hastily and went out, followed her, saying, She goeth unto the grave to weep there.
language2_text: O aro a tao do Yotay a nimangay mapadnadna so pahad da Madiya meyketeh am macita da si Madiya meybezbez a makowbot. Karahan am onotan da. Ta ipanci da mangay amlavi do heseb no kakteh na.

language1_text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was, and saw him, she fell down at his feet, saying unto him, Lord, if thou hadst been here, my brother had not died.
language2_text: Makaranes ji Yeso si Madiya am meylilitod do tangain na. Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, no ka mina to ngyan do jya am jyabo na kanimawakwak no kakteh namen a."

language1_text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping, and the Jews also weeping which came with her, he groaned in the spirit, and was troubled,
language2_text: Macita na si Madiya kano aro a tao do Yotay amlavi am meyngen onowned na do pakacittan na sira.

language1_text: and said, Where have ye laid him? They said unto him, Lord, come and see.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Do wanjin nyo nibobwan nya." Maniring sira am, "Mo Panirsirngen, sijya pala, kacita mo sya."

language1_text: Jesus wept.
language2_text: Karahan am mina to meykaoo a amlavi si Yeso.

language1_text: Then said the Jews, Behold how he loved him!
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao do Yotay am, "Asyo na tey karilaw si Lasalo eya."

language1_text: And some of them said, Could not this man, which opened the eyes of the blind, have caused that even this man should not have died?
language2_text: Maniring o tatasa jira am, "Niwakwakan na o mata na no mavota tao am ikongo na ji ngiwakwaki ji Lasalo no keyngen na kaji na rana limanan."

language1_text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave. It was a cave, and a stone lay upon it.
language2_text: Makaranes si Yeso do heseb na am meyngen o onowned na amnakenakem sya. O heseb rana ori am asa ka azcip ori. O ngoso no nang am nipasengsengan da so rako a veysen.

language1_text: Jesus said, Take ye away the stone. Martha, the sister of him that was dead, saith unto him, Lord, by this time he stinketh: for he hath been dead four days.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Peylis kamo o veysen." Maniring o kakteh na meyngaran si Marta am, "Mo Panirsirngen, yajya kapat araw rana yanibobo a jyabo na kajyangotan no kataotao na."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, Said I not unto thee, that, if thou wouldest believe, thou shouldest see the glory of God?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Nipanci ko na jimo asyo o, 'No si anoyngan mo am macita mo o mapeyzokab a oyowyat ni Ama ta do to,' kwan ko imo asyoo."

language1_text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid. And Jesus lifted up his eyes, and said, Father, I thank thee that thou hast heard me.
language2_text: Karahan am peylisen da o rako a veysen. Maniring si Yeso a tomangara so hanit am, "Mo Ama, ko isaray jimo an. Ta yamo na nyamizing o ciring ko.

language1_text: And I knew that thou hearest me always: but because of the people which stand by I said it, that they may believe that thou hast sent me.
language2_text: Ko katenngan mo kapangday a yaomamizing so ciring ko. O ko peycirngan so sang am ko ipamizing so aro a tao a yamyan do katangked ko ito. Ta no si ori pa o anoyngan da jyaken a yamo nipahanhan do teyrahem."

language1_text: And when he thus had spoken, he cried with a loud voice, Lazarus, come forth.
language2_text: Mateyka na o ciring na am amlolos a manci no, "Pakowbot rana mo Lasalo."

language1_text: And he that was dead came forth, bound hand and foot with graveclothes: and his face was bound about with a napkin. Jesus saith unto them, Loose him, and let him go.
language2_text: Karahan am makowbot rana si Lasalo. O ai na kano lima na am mabedbed pa no milakayob. O moing na am nipongosan da no milakayob. Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Ovai kamo rana kalam na rana."

language1_text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary, and had seen the things which Jesus did, believed on him.
language2_text: Macita da o vazay ni Yeso no aro a tao do Yotay a nimangay tomazogaw ni Madiya am anoyngan da rana.

language1_text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees, and told them what things Jesus had done.
language2_text: Am amyan so karwan da mangay manci no vazay ni Yeso do tao a macyagom do Vadisay.

language1_text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council, and said, What do we? for this man doeth many miracles.
language2_text: Am ori o nipeykaygi da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. Maniring sira do kaygi da am, "Yatey yaro o mapeyzokab a vazay na mina vazay. Meypanngonngo tamo.

language1_text: If we let him thus alone, all men will believe on him: and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation.
language2_text: No si to ta amyapya o tao ori a kato da miminan no tao a omanod jya am jyabo kaji da angayan no Loma mangay komavakava so rako a panaralayan ta kabalinas da rana jyaten a."

language1_text: And one of them, named Caiaphas, being the high priest that same year, said unto them, Ye know nothing at all,
language2_text: Amyan jira ang so asa ka tao a meyngaran so Keyava. Iya rana ori am panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to no kano nang. Maniring ori am, "Yabo nyo katenngan.

language1_text: nor consider that it is expedient for us, that one man should die for the people, and that the whole nation perish not.
language2_text: Manngwa, nyo jyatenngi o kapyapya na pa no keyyan no asa ka tao a mawakwak nyaten aro a tao do Yotay? No si jyakman sang am jyabo kaji ta miminan a mabalinas a."

language1_text: And this spake he not of himself: but being high priest that year, he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation;
language2_text: Am o ciring eya am beken a meyngongyod a ciring na. Ta iya rana am panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to no kano nang. Am ori o nicyakma ney manoyonoyo so ciring ni Ama ta do to a manci ni Yeso a mangay mawakwak no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: and not for that nation only, but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad.
language2_text: Beken a tao do Yotay o ikawakwak na, ta mangay na peylovolovoten o mavonong do peycyavanovanwan na omraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao akmey yasa rana.

language1_text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death.
language2_text: Nimakalapo no kano nang o kanakenakem da no panipanirsirngen no tao do Yotay o kawakwak da si Yeso.

language1_text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness, into a city called Ephraim, and there continued with his disciples.
language2_text: Am ori o ji na rana mangilili ni Yeso do Yotay. So nimangay ni Yeso a kano macinanao jya do asa ka ili a meyngaran so Ivalyan a masngen do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a miseysan dang.

language1_text: And the Jews' passover was nigh at hand: and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover, to purify themselves.
language2_text: Omanam o Iyeci am aro tao a mangay do Yelosaleng a mangay mahap so iwawalam da omoyas do kataotao da.

language1_text: Then sought they for Jesus, and spake among themselves, as they stood in the temple, What think ye, that he will not come to the feast?
language2_text: No kanang am to da ngala si Yeso. Maniring sira do kalwalovotan da rako a panaralayan am, "Ala yaji ngai si Yeso a yamacipamaring so kanen ang."

language1_text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment, that, if any man knew where he were, he should shew it, that they might take him.
language2_text: Nipanci da na no tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to do aro a tao o kapanci da no yanan ni Yeso, ta mangay da rakpen.

language1_text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany, where Lazarus was which had been dead, whom he raised from the dead.
language2_text: Kanem pa araw o awang na do Iyeci am nimangay si Yeso do Potani. Do dang rana am peyvahayan no nipeyvangon ni Yeso a si Lasalo.

language1_text: There they made him a supper; and Martha served: but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him.
language2_text: Amyan do dang so tao a nimapowyab sya. Am o meyngaran so Marta kakteh ni Lasalo a mavakes am manaotao. Si Lasalo a kano aro a tao am macihanghang ji Yeso.

language1_text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard, very costly, and anointed the feet of Jesus, and wiped his feet with her hair: and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment.
language2_text: Karahan am mangai si Madiya so mahangno a haneng. Ori rana am tey masingat ori. Karahan am to na rana mimina paglowen do ai ni Yeso a kalinas na jya no avok na. So nikahangno no sahad a yanan da.

language1_text: Then saith one of his disciples, Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, which should betray him,
language2_text: Maniring o asa ka macinanao ji Yeso a meyngaran so Yota a tao do Isecyadi a omavat do kapanazang na ni Yeso am,

language1_text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence, and given to the poor?
language2_text: "Apyapya rana o kapamalit nya so nizpi a ipanidong so ikasi a tao am. Ta tey masingat ori."

language1_text: This he said, not that he cared for the poor; but because he was a thief, and had the bag, and bare what was put therein.
language2_text: To na mancyan ori am beken a meyngongyod o karilaw na no makasi a tao. Ta iya rana am manakaw a tao. Ta iya rana am masangib a tomakaw so italamozong na nizpi no kararay na.

language1_text: Then said Jesus, Let her alone: against the day of my burying hath she kept this.
language2_text: Am maniring si Yeso am, "To mo macyozai, ta ori rana am yavat na jyaken no ibobo da yaken.

language1_text: For the poor always ye have with you; but me ye have not always.
language2_text: Yamasangib sira o makasi a tao a yamacikaop jinyo. Am yaken am yalikey rana ipacikaop ko jinyo."

language1_text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there: and they came not for Jesus' sake only, but that they might see Lazarus also, whom he had raised from the dead.
language2_text: Mamizing da si Yeso no aro a tao a amyan do Potani am mangay sira jya. Beken a kanakenakem da so kangay da ji Yeso, ta naknakmen da pa o kangay da tomita si Lasalo a nyavyay na ni Yeso.

language1_text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death;
language2_text: Karahan am naknakmen da no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to o kapazanod da si Lasalo a wakwaken.

language1_text: because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away, and believed on Jesus.
language2_text: Ta tey yaro o tao do Yotay a ji rana ngonot do mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a omanoyong rana ji Yeso, do kanimapeyvangon na si Lasalo do heseb na.

language1_text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast, when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem,
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am o macipamarimaring so kanen a aro a tao am mamizing da si Yeso a mangay do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: took branches of palm trees, and went forth to meet him, and cried, Hosanna: Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord.
language2_text: Am ori o nipangap da so akmey voong no anyoy a mangay amrapong sya. Maniring sira amlololos am, "Isaray ta si Ama ta do to. Inaoy si ipanlanlag na o nitovoy na a yarana nimai. Inaoy si ipanlanlag na ni Ama ta do to o Panirsirngen no Isedi a tao."

language1_text: And Jesus, when he had found a young ass, sat thereon; as it is written,
language2_text: Makakala si Yeso so asa ka baka kavang na jya. So toney macipayoki no ciring do Seysyo. Ta maniring am,

language1_text: Fear not, daughter of Sion: behold, thy King cometh, sitting on an ass's colt.
language2_text: "Inyo a tao do Yelosaleng am ji kamo anyahey. Cita kamo o Panirsirngen nyo a yamavang do likta baka a yarana mai."

language1_text: These things understood not his disciples at the first: but when Jesus was glorified, then remembered they that these things were written of him, and that they had done these things unto him.
language2_text: No kano nang am ji da tenngi no macinanao jya o peypeypangayan na. Makaranes rana o azwazway na ni Yeso a nimirwa a mavyay a kapeycyakavat na rana a mangay do teyngato am manakem da rana o ciring a domket do Seysyo a manoyong a pakacirngen na jya, do kapeyyangay na kano vazay da jya no tao.

language1_text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave, and raised him from the dead, bare record.
language2_text: Tawagan ni Yeso si Lasalo apo do heseb na am amyan dang so aro a tao. So nipeylimwang da no akman sang a nimacita da vazay.

language1_text: For this cause the people also met him, for that they heard that he had done this miracle.
language2_text: Ori o nyangay da no aro a tao a mangay amrapong sya. Ta nimamizing da o kanimapeyvangon na si Lasalo.

language1_text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves, Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing? behold, the world is gone after him.
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao a macyagom do Vadisay do kadwan jira am, "Asyo tamo eya yabo so oyowyat a amzazat jira. Cita pala yatodamimin rana o tao do karawan a omanod jya."

language1_text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast:
language2_text: Amyan so tao do Sila a nimangay do Yelosaleng a mamaring so kanen a omraralay ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: the same came therefore to Philip, which was of Bethsaida of Galilee, and desired him, saying, Sir, we would see Jesus.
language2_text: Sira rana am mangay da citahen si Veydipo a tao do Peysayta a ili a macinapnap do Cyadidi. Maniring sira jya am, "Mo kahakay, namen kakdain si Yeso a macita."

language1_text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew: and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay na ipanci ni Veydipo ji Antele a kapeyheza da mangay manci nya ji Yeso.

language1_text: And Jesus answered them, saying, The hour is come, that the Son of man should be glorified.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yarana makaranes o araraw no ikazway no Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta to a tao.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die, it abideth alone: but if it die, it bringeth forth much fruit.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no ji pamowa do tana o mowahen am jyablis ori a asaha. Am no si pamowahen do tana am amlida rana kapalasi na rana.

language1_text: He that loveth his life shall lose it; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal.
language2_text: O ambeywan do inawan na a tao am mapehes jya o inawan na. O tongbo so inawan na do karawan eya am mahap na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na do teyngato.

language1_text: If any man serve me, let him follow me; and where I am, there shall also my servant be: if any man serve me, him will my Father honour.
language2_text: O mahap so vazay ko am macilocilolo jyaken. O yanan ko am amyan sira dang o kahanhanan ko. O mahap so vazay ko am azwain na ni Ama.

language1_text: Now is my soul troubled; and what shall I say? Father, save me from this hour: but for this cause came I unto this hour.
language2_text: "Yako meyngen so onowned sicyaikwaya. Ikongo pa o ciring ko. Manngwa, apya o kapanci ko ni Ama mapaliklik so yaomanam a alalaw ko? Am o peypeypangayan no ko nyai do karawan am ahapen ko o alalaw ko ang.

language1_text: Father, glorify thy name. Then came there a voice from heaven, saying, I have both glorified it, and will glorify it again.
language2_text: Mo Ama, inaoy si macita da no tao oyowyat mo." Mina to ngyan so ciring apo do teyngato no kano nang. Maniring am, "Ko na nipatwaw o oyowyat ko. So pirwan ko paha mapatwaw sya."

language1_text: The people therefore, that stood by, and heard it, said that it thundered: others said, An angel spake to him.
language2_text: Mamizing da o ciring ori no aro a tao am maniring sira am, "Ori am nimeykadey." Am maniring o kadwan jira am, "Yamyan so tinsi a yanimacisirsiring jya."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said, This voice came not because of me, but for your sakes.
language2_text: Am maniring si Yeso jira am, "Beken a yaken o na aingan no ciring, ta inyo o na pamizngen.

language1_text: Now is the judgment of this world: now shall the prince of this world be cast out.
language2_text: Oya rana o ipacici so tao do karawan. Oya rana o isakeb ni Satan a yatomalamozong no tao do karawan.

language1_text: And I, if I be lifted up from the earth, will draw all men unto me.
language2_text: No si padketen da rana yaken do jyojika keypirwa ko na a mavyay am panopen ko o aro a tao do karawan."

language1_text: This he said, signifying what death he should die.
language2_text: O peycirngan na sang am ipakateneng da jya no tao o kangay na mawakwak do jyojika.

language1_text: The people answered him, We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever: and how sayest thou, The Son of man must be lifted up? who is this Son of man?
language2_text: Maniring o aro a tao am, "O domket do Seysyo am to meyyonong a mavyay o Misayya. Am ikongo mo pancyan no kapadket sya do jyojika so Nipamnekan na tao ni Ama ta do to. Sino tao mo ipanci ang."

language1_text: Then Jesus said unto them, Yet a little while is the light with you. Walk while ye have the light, lest darkness come upon you: for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Alikey o iyan na jinyo no zezak. Makabezbez kamo a omalam do iyan na pa no zezak. Ta no masari rana am ji nyo na cita o pangonongan nyo.

language1_text: While ye have light, believe in the light, that ye may be the children of light. These things spake Jesus, and departed, and did hide himself from them.
language2_text: No myan pa o zezak am anoyngan nyo ori an. So ikanoyong nyo na mazngang so onowned." Iptad na ni Yeso o ciring na am karwan na sira kangay na rana matarek do kabwan no tao.

language1_text: But though he had done so many miracles before them, yet they believed not on him:
language2_text: Tana aro o yongkad na apo ji Ama ta do to am ji da nganoyngi si Yeso.

language1_text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled, which he spake, Lord, who hath believed our report? And to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed?
language2_text: O ikakman na sang am mangononong o mina ciring ni Isayya. Ta maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, sino o to nganoyong do ipeylimwang namen. Sino o to makacita so oyowyat na no Tao do to."

language1_text: Therefore they could not believe, because that Esaias said again,
language2_text: Nimalavat na rana ni Isayya o kaji da manganoyngan. Ta maniring am,

language1_text: He hath blinded their eyes, and hardened their heart; That they should not see with their eyes, nor understand with their heart, And be converted, And I should heal them.
language2_text: "Si Ama ta do to o icyakma dey mavota. Icyakma ney vato o onowned da do kaji da mamlisan. Maniring si Ama ta do to am, 'Yabo da kasngesngenan jyaken. Makongo ko so wanjin a mapatastas sira do teyngato.'"

language1_text: These things said Esaias, when he saw his glory, and spake of him.
language2_text: O peycirngan na sya ni Isayya am nipacita na ni Ama ta do to o azwazway ni Yeso jya. Am ori o peycirngan na sya jya.

language1_text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him, lest they should be put out of the synagogue:
language2_text: Tana akman sang am aro panipanirsirngen da no tao do Yotay a omanoyong ji Yeso. Am kanyahey da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay. Am ori o ji da makadkeci jya ipanci, do kanyahey da pasyain do peyneynozyan da.

language1_text: for they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God.
language2_text: Ikeykakza da pa o icyatatao da zomwazway sira. Ji dakzan o kazwazway na sira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Jesus cried and said, He that believeth on me, believeth not on me, but on him that sent me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso a amlolos am, "Omanoyong jyaken am beken a yakehen o anoyngan da. Ta akman sang si Ama a nimapahanhan jyaken o anoyngan da.

language1_text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me.
language2_text: O makacita jyaken am akman sang sira makacita si Ama a nimapahanhan jyaken.

language1_text: I am come a light into the world, that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness.
language2_text: Akma koy zezak a mai do teyrahem. So ji da na ngyani do kasarisaryan no omanoyong jyaken a tao.

language1_text: And if any man hear my words, and believe not, I judge him not: for I came not to judge the world, but to save the world.
language2_text: O makamizing so nanao ko a ji mangononong jya am ji ko pacicya. Ta o ko nyai do teyrahem am beken a mapacici so tao do teyrahem, ta patazadangen ko sira.

language1_text: He that rejecteth me, and receiveth not my words, hath one that judgeth him: the word that I have spoken, the same shall judge him in the last day.
language2_text: O tomaosya jyaken a ji ngahap so nanao ko am pangozayan ko o ciring ko a manci no keyyan no raraten na no masasnad rana o araraw no kapeykapyapinpin na so tao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For I have not spoken of myself; but the Father which sent me, he gave me a commandment, what I should say, and what I should speak.
language2_text: Ta ko ji mangozai o kataotao ko a yamapeyciring sya. Ta ko to mangozai o ciring no yanimapahanhan jyaken.

language1_text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting: whatsoever I speak therefore, even as the Father said unto me, so I speak.
language2_text: Ta ko katenngan o ciring na yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad. O ciring ko rana am ciring na ori ni Ama."

language1_text: Now before the feast of the passover, when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father, having loved his own which were in the world, he loved them unto the end.
language2_text: Kasaraw pa kapamaring da na so kanen do ngaranan da Iyeci am katenngan na rana ni Yeso o kakeykai na rana meysinaoli ji Ama na do to. Na tey karilaw o omanoyong jya tao do karawan. Tana marateng rana o ikawakwak na am ji namtadan o karilaw na nira.

language1_text: And supper being ended, the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot, Simon's son, to betray him;
language2_text: Moyab sira do araraw no ipamaring da so kanen ni Yeso a kano macinanao jya am amyan rana si Satan do onowned no anak ni Simong a meyngaran so Yota a tao do Isecyadi. So nipamnekan na rana do kapanazang na ni Yeso.

language1_text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands, and that he was come from God, and went to God;
language2_text: Katenngan na ni Yeso o kanitomoro na nya jya ni Ama ta do to so oyowyat na. Katenngan na o kanimapo na ji Ama ta do to. So ipakateneng na do kapeysinaoli na ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: he riseth from supper, and laid aside his garments; and took a towel, and girded himself.
language2_text: Am ori o peytatanek na do yanan na kapakaro na so magorogod na a mahap so asa ka veynget a pabteken do kawakan na.

language1_text: After that he poureth water into a bason, and began to wash the disciples' feet, and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded.
language2_text: Karahan am mapaglo so ranom do simingki a kaoyas na rana do ai no macinanao jya a kalinas na do ai da no veynget.

language1_text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter: and Peter saith unto him, Lord, dost thou wash my feet?
language2_text: Oyasan na o ai ni Simong Pite am maniring si Pite am, "Mo Panirsirngen, mo oyasan o ai ko?"

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto him, What I do thou knowest not now; but thou shalt know hereafter.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo jyatenngi pa o vazay ko sicyaikwaya. Am no kadadayan no araw am katenngan mo na."

language1_text: Peter saith unto him, Thou shalt never wash my feet. Jesus answered him, If I wash thee not, thou hast no part with me.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Ji ko amya imo a omoyas do ai ko." Maniring si Yeso am, "No si ji ko ngoyasi o ai mo am ji ko imo abneka a macinanao jyaken."

language1_text: Simon Peter saith unto him, Lord, not my feet only, but also my hands and my head.
language2_text: Maniring si Simong Pite am, "Mo Panirsirngen, no komwan am oyasi ai ko a kano lima ko a kano oo ko."

language1_text: Jesus saith to him, He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet, but is clean every whit: and ye are clean, but not all.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O nimarios rana tao am todamimin rana o kataotao na manownaw. Am ori o ika ai na rana no oyasan. Inyo rana am kamo manonownaw am beken a kamo todamimin."

language1_text: For he knew who should betray him; therefore said he, Ye are not all clean.
language2_text: Katenngan na rana ni Yeso o manazang nya. Am ori o pancyan na no, "Beken a kamo todamimin a yamanownaw."

language1_text: So after he had washed their feet, and had taken his garments, and was set down again, he said unto them, Know ye what I have done to you?
language2_text: Mateyka na rana oyasan o ai da am peyyayoben na rana o magorogod na a kahezsad na rana. Maniring do macinanao jya am, "Manngwa, nyo katenngan o peypeypangayan no ko nioyasan do ai nyo an?

language1_text: Ye call me Master and Lord: and ye say well; for so I am.
language2_text: Kamo manoyong a manci nyaken a Mangnanao a Panirsirngen nyo. Manoyong ori.

language1_text: If I then, your Lord and Master, have washed your feet; ye also ought to wash one another's feet.
language2_text: Yaken am Panirsirngen nyo, yamnanao jinyo a yaniomoyas do ai nyo. Akman kamo sang a omoyas do ai no kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: For I have given you an example, that ye should do as I have done to you.
language2_text: Yamyan rana so yako nipacita jinyo. So to nyo vangovangoni sya peyvazain an.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am ji na meyhavasi no pavahain da tao o mapavahay sya an. Jyakarakarang o pahanhanen da kano mapahanhan sya an.

language1_text: If ye know these things, happy are ye if ye do them.
language2_text: No nyo na katenngan o akman sya nanao am no si pangononongan nyo am tey rako o sarasaray nyo an.

language1_text: I speak not of you all: I know whom I have chosen: but that the scripture may be fulfilled, He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me.
language2_text: "Beken a ko to zagoma inyo a yapeyciringan sya, ta ko katenngan sira o yako nitenngan a tao. Am manoyong o ciring do Seysyo an. Ta maniring am, 'O yamacihanghang jyaken a asa ka tao am yamanazang nyaken.' So ipangononong no ciring ang.

language1_text: Now I tell you before it come, that, when it is come to pass, ye may believe that I am he.
language2_text: Ko na to mancyan jinyo do na ikabo pa no vazay eya. Ta no si makaranes rana o vazay am anoyngan nyo na yaken a meyngongyod a Tao do to.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am o tomaotao so nitovoy ko am yaken o taotawwen da. O tomaotao jyaken am si Ama ta do to o taotawwen da, ta iya o yanitomovoy jyaken."

language1_text: When Jesus had thus said, he was troubled in spirit, and testified, and said, Verily, verily, I say unto you, that one of you shall betray me.
language2_text: Iptad na o ciring na ni Yeso am meyngen o onowned na. Maniring rana am, "To ko na mancyan jinyo am yamyan jinyo so yasa ka tao a yamanazang nyaken."

language1_text: Then the disciples looked one on another, doubting of whom he spake.
language2_text: Karahan am meysingsingkad sira o macinanao jya, do kaji da makatenngan do peycirngan na sya.

language1_text: Now there was leaning on Jesus' bosom one of his disciples, whom Jesus loved.
language2_text: Asa do macinanao jya o ikaglaw ni Yeso a macitangked ji Yeso.

language1_text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him, that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake.
language2_text: Maniring si Simong Pite jya am, "Panahsan pala. Sino na ipanci ang."

language1_text: He then lying on Jesus' breast saith unto him, Lord, who is it?
language2_text: Karahan am macisngen rana ori ji Yeso. Maniring ji Yeso am, "Sino mo ipanci ang, mo Panirsirngen."

language1_text: Jesus answered, He it is, to whom I shall give a sop, when I have dipped it. And when he had dipped the sop, he gave it to Judas Iscariot, the son of Simon.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O torwan ko no pang eya am iya ang." Iptad na o ciring na am mangap so asa ka pang a kapatodeh na sya ji Yota a anak ni Simong a tao do Isecyadi kahap na sya.

language1_text: And after the sop Satan entered into him. Then said Jesus unto him, That thou doest, do quickly.
language2_text: Meyratateng am bedbedan na ni Satan o onowned na. Maniring si Yeso jya am, "No yamyan so yamo ipeynanakem a vazay mo am peyvazain mo am."

language1_text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him.
language2_text: Ji da tenngi o ciring ni Yeso ji Yota no karwan da amlisna do dang.

language1_text: For some of them thought, because Judas had the bag, that Jesus had said unto him, Buy those things that we have need of against the feast; or, that he should give something to the poor.
language2_text: Si Yota rana am meymatmatngeh no nizpi da. Am ori o pancyan da no, "Ala na pahanhanen ori a yamangap so yata ipamaring so kanen an. No na ipanci a yamanidong so makasi a tao."

language1_text: He then having received the sop went immediately out: and it was night.
language2_text: Kanen na o pang ni Yota am makowbot rana a komaro jira. No kano nang am mahep rana a masari.

language1_text: Therefore, when he was gone out, Jesus said, Now is the Son of man glorified, and God is glorified in him.
language2_text: Makowbot si Yota am maniring si Yeso am, "Sicyaikwaya am macita nyo na o azwazway ko a Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao. Ta pakacittan da no tao so azwazway na ni Ama ta do to do Nipamnekan na tao.

language1_text: If God be glorified in him, God shall also glorify him in himself, and shall straightway glorify him.
language2_text: No yamanoyong kapakacita da no tao so azwazway na ni Ama ta do to do Nipamnekan na tao am akman sang si Ama ta do to a zomwazway so Nipamnekan na tao. So na ikakeykai rana no azwazway no Nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a makaranes.

language1_text: Little children, yet a little while I am with you. Ye shall seek me: and as I said unto the Jews, Whither I go, ye cannot come; so now I say to you.
language2_text: Yalikey rana, manga keypong, ko ipacikaop jinyo. Tana kalahen nyo yaken am ji nyo a kala yaken. Am ko to mancyan rana jinyo sicyaikwaya akman so mina ciring ko do panipanirsirngen da no tao do Yotay. O angayan ko am ji nyo makaranesi.

language1_text: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.
language2_text: O itoro ko a vayo a inanao ko jinyo am masicyakarilaw kamo. To nyo nita o aryarilaw ko jinyo. Ta akman kamo so sang a masicyakarilaw.

language1_text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples, if ye have love one to another.
language2_text: No si manoyong o kapasicyakarilaw nyo am katovilan da na inyo no tao do karawan a manoyong a omanop jyaken."

language1_text: Simon Peter said unto him, Lord, whither goest thou? Jesus answered him, Whither I go, thou canst not follow me now; but thou shalt follow me afterwards.
language2_text: Maniring si Simong Pite ji Yeso am, "Mo Panirsirngen, do wanjin mo angayan." Maniring si Yeso am, "O ko angayan am ji ka macihza jyaken sicyaikwaya. Am cyaha, ta no makwa am amyan ka na do yanan ko."

language1_text: Peter said unto him, Lord, why cannot I follow thee now? I will lay down my life for thy sake.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Mo Panirsirngen, ikongo ikarahet na no kapacihza ko jimo sicyaikwaya. Tana yangay ko imo no inawan am ji ko manesehan."

language1_text: Jesus answered him, Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake? Verily, verily, I say unto thee, The cock shall not crow, till thou hast denied me thrice.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Manngwa, manoyong o kangay mo nyaken so inawan an? Am to ko na macitangayan jimo am si omanam a tomazokokok o manok am ipitlo ka omalalas jyaken."

language1_text: Let not your heart be troubled: ye believe in God, believe also in me.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso jira am, "Ji kamo a rahet so onowned an. Ta anoyngan nyo si Ama ta do to a ka nyaken an.

language1_text: In my Father's house are many mansions: if it were not so, I would have told you. I go to prepare a place for you.
language2_text: Yaro o yanan do vahay ni Ama. O ko yangay am ko mangay peykala inyo so yanan nyo. No si jyanoyong o akman sang am ji ko mancyan jinyo.

language1_text: And if I go and prepare a place for you, I will come again, and receive you unto myself; that where I am, there ye may be also.
language2_text: No si manoyong o kangay ko a meykala ninyo so yanan nyo am meysinaoli ko pa a mangay a omahap jinyo a kapacitovong nyo jyaken.

language1_text: And whither I go ye know, and the way ye know.
language2_text: Nyo katenngan o rarahan do yako angayan ang."

language1_text: Thomas saith unto him, Lord, we know not whither thou goest; and how can we know the way?
language2_text: Maniring jya si Tomase am, "Namen jyatenngi mo angayan, mo Panirsirngen. Am ori o namen ji makatenngi do rarahan ang."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yaken am rarahan nyo. Yaken am yanan no manoyong a nanao. Yaken am yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo. No ko abo am abo tao a makatanggeh ji Ama ta do to. So ika yaken no ipakatokod nyo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: If ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also: and from henceforth ye know him, and have seen him.
language2_text: No kamo manoyong a yamakateneng jyaken am akman sang si Ama a katenngan nyo. Papwan nyo sicyaikwaya o ipakateneng nyo na jya, ta nyo na nimacita."

language1_text: Philip saith unto him, Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us.
language2_text: Maniring si Veydipo ji Yeso am, "Pacitaney jyamen, mo Panirsirngen, si Ama ta do to, ta ori namen kakzeben."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto him, Have I been so long time with you, and yet hast thou not known me, Philip? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father; and how sayest thou then, Shew us the Father?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo Veydipo, ko na mownay a yamacikaop jinyo. Manngwa, mo pa jyatenngi yaken? O makacita jyaken am nimacita da na si Ama. Ikongo mo pancyan no kapacita ko ni Ama jinyo.

language1_text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father, and the Father in me? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself: but the Father that dwelleth in me, he doeth the works.
language2_text: Manngwa, mo anoyngan yaken, mo Veydipo an? Do ko kapacikaop ji Ama a na kapacikaop jyaken ni Ama? O ciring ko jinyo am beken a yapo jyaken. So na icyakman sang no vazay ko. Ta vazay na ori ni Ama a yamacikaop jyaken.

language1_text: Believe me that I am in the Father, and the Father in me: or else believe me for the very works' sake.
language2_text: Anoyngan nyo o ko kapacikaop ji Ama. Ta akman sang si Ama a yamacikaop jyaken. Am no si ji nyo nganoyngi am to nyo na nita o mina vazay ko an.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that believeth on me, the works that I do shall he do also; and greater works than these shall he do; because I go unto my Father.
language2_text: "To ko na macitangayan jinyo am mapeyvazay da o mina vazay ko no omanoyong jyaken a tao. So iyan no makapeyvazay so rakorakwan pa kano nang. O ikakman na sang am amyan ko na ji Ama do teyngato.

language1_text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name, that will I do, that the Father may be glorified in the Son.
language2_text: No mapasyasi kamo a meyhanhan no ngaran ko am amizngen ko inyo. So ikanoyong no azwazway ni Ama ta do to a mangay tomwaw jyaken a Anak na.

language1_text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name, I will do it.
language2_text: No mapasyasi kamo jyaken do makakaday a meyhanhan no ngaran ko am amizngen ko inyo.

language1_text: If ye love me, keep my commandments.
language2_text: "No si manoyong o kaglaw nyo nyaken am pangononongan nyo o nanao ko.

language1_text: And I will pray the Father, and he shall give you another Comforter, that he may abide with you for ever;
language2_text: Ipanci ko ji Ama a kapanta na ninyo so somidong jinyo a Seyzi, kato na rana meyyonongan a macikaop jinyo.

language1_text: even the Spirit of truth; whom the world cannot receive, because it seeth him not, neither knoweth him: but ye know him; for he dwelleth with you, and shall be in you.
language2_text: Iya rana am yamapatwaw so manoyong a nanao ni Ama ta do to. Am da to nazibwan no yaji nganoyong jyaken a tao. Ta da jyacita. Am ori o da ji makatenngi jya. Am inyo am nyo katenngan o Seyzi a macikaop jinyo a Rarey nyo a yaji macisyay jinyo.

language1_text: I will not leave you comfortless: I will come to you.
language2_text: "Ji ko mamyapyan inyo a akmey minaminasbang, ta meysinaoli ko pa jinyo.

language1_text: Yet a little while, and the world seeth me no more; but ye see me: because I live, ye shall live also.
language2_text: Alikey rana kaji da na makacittan jyaken no ji nganoyong jyaken a tao. Am inyo am macita nyo pa yaken no si mirwa ko pa a mavyay. So ikakman nyo sang a makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father, and ye in me, and I in you.
language2_text: No si marateng o araraw no nang am katenngan nyo o kapacikaop ko na ji Ama. So ikakman nyo sang a macikaop jyaken. Akman jyaken a yamacikaop jinyo.

language1_text: He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me: and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father, and I will love him, and will manifest myself to him.
language2_text: O mangononong do nanao ko am manoyong o akman sang a maglaw nyaken. O maglaw nyaken a tao am akman sang si Ama a marilaw nira. So karilawan ko nira. So ika yaken no somidong sira a manoyong a makateneng jyaken."

language1_text: Judas saith unto him, not Iscariot, Lord, how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us, and not unto the world?
language2_text: Maniring si Yota (am beken a nimanazang ni Yeso a si Yota tao do Isecyadi) am, "Mo Panirsirngen, ikongo na ika yamen no makateneng jimo a yaji zagom so tao do karawan."

language1_text: Jesus answered and said unto him, If a man love me, he will keep my words: and my Father will love him, and we will come unto him, and make our abode with him.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O maglaw nyaken am pangononongan da o nanao ko. Ta ori o karilawan na nira ni Ama. So ipacikaop namen si Ama jira.

language1_text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings: and the word which ye hear is not mine, but the Father's which sent me.
language2_text: O jyaglaw nyaken am ji da mangononongi o nanao ko. O nyo nimamizing a nanao am beken a apo jyaken, ta yanimapo ji Ama a yanimapahanhan jyaken.

language1_text: These things have I spoken unto you, being yet present with you.
language2_text: "No kapacikaop ko pa jinyo am nipanci ko na ya jinyo.

language1_text: But the Comforter, which is the Holy Ghost, whom the Father will send in my name, he shall teach you all things, and bring all things to your remembrance, whatsoever I have said unto you.
language2_text: O yasomidong jinyo a Seyzi am tovoin na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a kapalit ko a kananao na jinyo no makakaday a vazay a kapakanakem nyo na so mina ciring ko jinyo no kakwa.

language1_text: Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
language2_text: Ko itoro jinyo o ikapiya no onowned nyo. So na ikanoyong a yapo jyaken no apiya onowned nyo. Am meytarek ori a kano ipanci da no tao do karawan ikapiya no onowned. Am ori an, ji nyo a raci so onowned. Ji kamo anyahey.

language1_text: Ye have heard how I said unto you, I go away, and come again unto you. If ye loved me, ye would rejoice, because I said, I go unto the Father: for my Father is greater than I.
language2_text: Nimamizing nyo na o ciring ko an. Tana ko karwan inyo am meysinaoli ko pa jinyo. No si ikaglaw nyo yaken am isaray nyo yaken a mangay ji Ama, ta iya rana am mahamahama pa ka nyaken.

language1_text: And now I have told you before it come to pass, that, when it is come to pass, ye might believe.
language2_text: Nipanci ko na jinyo, do ji na pa makaranesi no vazay ang. Ta no si makaranes ori am anoyngan nyo na yaken.

language1_text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you: for the prince of this world cometh, and hath nothing in me.
language2_text: Alikey rana o yako ipacikaop jinyo a macisirsiring jinyo. Ta yarana myan o yamimong no karawan. Am ji na harag yaken no oyowyat na.

language1_text: But that the world may know that I love the Father; and as the Father gave me commandment, even so I do. Arise, let us go hence.
language2_text: Am katenngan da no tao do karawan o ko kaglaw ni Ama, do yako kahap so makakaday a vazay a nipanci na jyaken ni Ama." Meyratateng am maniring pa jira si Yeso am, "Mangay tamo na.

language1_text: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman.
language2_text: "Yaken rana am akma koy meyngongyod a potaw a kayo. Si Ama o omaponged nya.

language1_text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.
language2_text: O ji malasi a yangaw a macinapnap jyaken am akteben na. O malasi a yangaw na am vezeden na, kato na ngarokan no asi na.

language1_text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.
language2_text: Inyo rana am kamo na akmey manownaw so onowned no nanao ko a yako ninanao jinyo.

language1_text: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.
language2_text: Ji nyo ngaroi yaken an. Akman jyaken a ji macisyay jinyo. Abo o yangaw no kayo a to meynakem no kapalasi na no ji macinapnap do kayo na. Akman kamo sang, ta no macikaop kamo jyaken am akman kamo so kayo a malasi.

language1_text: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
language2_text: "Yaken am yakmey kayo. Inyo am yangayangaw na. O macikaop jyaken am macikaop ko jya a karo no akma ney asi. No si karwan nyo yaken am ji nyo amaog o vazay nyo.

language1_text: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.
language2_text: O komaro jyaken a tao am kapalangayan na o yangaw no kayo a nimapolcing a kawalit nya a karokop na rana a kabedbed da sya no tao a ipanotong a katemtem na rana.

language1_text: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
language2_text: No si macikaop kamo jyaken a keyyan na rana no ciriciring ko do onowned nyo am no amyan so amin nyo jyaken am itoro ko jinyo.

language1_text: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.
language2_text: O azwazway ni Ama am akmey asi no kayo a macita da jinyo. No si makman kamo sang am manoyong kamo a omanop jyaken.

language1_text: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.
language2_text: Ko ikaglaw inyo. Akman si Ama a maglaw nyaken. Peyyanen nyo do onowned nyo o pangangarilawan ko an.

language1_text: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.
language2_text: No si pangozain nyo o nanao ko am manoyong kamo na mapeyyan sya do onowned nyo so pangangarilawan ko. Akman jyaken yaomonot do ciring na ni Ama a yamapeyyan sya do onowned ko so pangangarilawan na.

language1_text: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.
language2_text: Nipanci ko na jinyo akman sang a vazay. So yangay na jinyo no sarasaray ko a kapeyngongyod nyo na a masaray.

language1_text: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
language2_text: "Masicyakarilaw kamo akman jyaken a yamarilaw ninyo. Ta ori rana am ciring ko jinyo.

language1_text: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
language2_text: Ney rako na pangangarilawan am ji macivivyai o kagagan.

language1_text: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
language2_text: No si pangononongan nyo o nanao ko am manoyong kamo na kagagan ko.

language1_text: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
language2_text: Ji ko na abneka inyo a lamlamsoy ko. Ta o lamlamsoy am ji na tenngi o vazay no mapalamsoy sya tao. Ko na to abneka inyo a kagagan ko. Ta ko na nimimin o yako nimamizing ji Ama a yanipanci jinyo.
