language1_text: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.
language2_text: Beken a inyo o yanimamnek jyaken, ta yaken o yanimamnek jinyo. So ko tovoyan jinyo a mangay meyvazay so makasidong so tao a vazay. Ta o akman rana sang a vazay am tey saray na ni Ama ta do to a mangay no makwa. Si akman kamo sang am no mapasyasi kamo ji Ama am itoro na jinyo.

language1_text: These things I command you, that ye love one another.
language2_text: Masicyakarilaw kamo an, ta ori rana am ciring ko jinyo.

language1_text: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.
language2_text: "No pacioyyan da inyo no ji nganoyong jyaken am naknakmen nyo o kanimanoma da na nimacioya jyaken.

language1_text: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.
language2_text: No kamo meyyangay pa kano ji manganoyong a tao do karawan am isaray da inyo do kapeyyangay nyo. Am kamo na ji meyyangay a ka nira. Ta ko na nipapinpin inyo a omanoyong jyaken. Am ori o da pacioyyan jinyo no yaji nganoyong jyaken a tao.

language1_text: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep your's also.
language2_text: Peyyanen nyo do onowned nyo o yako nipanci jinyo. Ji na meyhavasi no lamlamsoy o mapavahay sya tao. No si peyrarehten da yaken am akman kamo sang a peyrarehten da. No si onotan da o ciring ko am onotan da o ipangnanao nyo a ciring.

language1_text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name's sake, because they know not him that sent me.
language2_text: Mamimin o akman sang a alalaw a mangay jinyo, do kamonganay nyo jyaken. Ta ji da tenngi o nimapahanhan jyaken.

language1_text: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloke for their sin.
language2_text: No ko jya nimai do karawan a mapamizing sira no nanao ni Ama ta do to am ji da tenngi o keyyan no raraten da. Am sicyaikwaya am ji da rana tayo o raraten da. Ta ko na nipanci jira o nanao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.
language2_text: O macioya jyaken am macioya ji Ama.

language1_text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.
language2_text: No ji ko nimeyvazay so ji da pa nimapeyvazay no tao do tangain da am abo raraten da. Am da kanimakacita rana sya so vazay ko. Am da kapacioya jyaken a kani Ama.

language1_text: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.
language2_text: Am da na nimacita o vazay ko. So ikanoyong no yadomket do Seysyo a ciring. Maniring am, 'Yabo na agagazan no da kato macioyyan jyaken.'

language1_text: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:
language2_text: "O yasomidong jinyo a Seyzi am yapo ji Ama. Iya rana am mapatwaw so nanao ni Ama ta do to. So tovoyan ko sya apo ji Ama a mangay jinyo do dang a kapeylimwang na nyaken jinyo.

language1_text: and ye also shall bear witness, because ye have been with me from the beginning.
language2_text: Akman kamo sang a meylimwang nyaken. Ta nimeycicinda kamo a nimacihza jyaken no kavavayo ko pa mangnanao.

language1_text: These things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be offended.
language2_text: "Ji kamo na haha so nakem, ta nipanci ko na ya jinyo.

language1_text: They shall put you out of the synagogues: yea, the time cometh, that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service.
language2_text: Mangay kapasyay da jinyo do peyneynozyan. Amyan so araraw no iwakwak da jinyo. Am ipanci da ori a agoman da ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And these things will they do unto you, because they have not known the Father, nor me.
language2_text: O ikakman da sang so vazay jinyo no tao am ji da tenngi si Ama ka nyaken.

language1_text: But these things have I told you, that when the time shall come, ye may remember that I told you of them. And these things I said not unto you at the beginning, because I was with you.
language2_text: No makaranes rana o akman sang a vazay am cyaha, ta nipaziman ko na jinyo. Ji ko nipeycicinda nipanci jinyo o akman sang a vazay, ta macikaop ko pa jinyo.

language1_text: But now I go my way to him that sent me; and none of you asketh me, Whither goest thou?
language2_text: "Ko meysinaoli rana sicyaikwaya do yanitomovoy jyaken an. Am yabo jinyo o yanimapacici jyaken a manci no, 'Do wanjin mo angayan.'

language1_text: But because I have said these things unto you, sorrow hath filled your heart.
language2_text: Am yako ipanci rana jinyo sicyaikwaya am kamo na marahet so nakenakem.

language1_text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.
language2_text: Am to ko na macitangayan jinyo am no si mangay ko am apya ori jinyo. No si ji ko angay am ji makaranes jinyo o somidong jinyo a Rarey nyo. Am no si mangay ko am tovoin ko a mangay jinyo.

language1_text: And when he is come, he will reprove the world of sin, and of righteousness, and of judgment:
language2_text: Si mai ori am patwawen na do tao do karawan o meyngongyod a raraten a kano meyngongyod a apya vazay a kano ipasingkad na so tao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: of sin, because they believe not on me;
language2_text: O raraten da no tao do karawan am da ji nganoyngi yaken.

language1_text: of righteousness, because I go to my Father, and ye see me no more;
language2_text: Da jyatenngi o manoyong a vazay. Ta yaken rana am yako mangay ji Ama. So ji nyo rana makacitai jyaken.

language1_text: of judgment, because the prince of this world is judged.
language2_text: Yamalas o yada naknakmen a na ipasingkad so tao ni Ama ta do to. Ta yarana nimeydedna o peyoyaoyyan na do mimong no karawan.

language1_text: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.
language2_text: "Yaro pa o yako ipanci jinyo am ko ihawa kaji nyo makatenngan jya sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he will guide you into all truth: for he shall not speak of himself; but whatsoever he shall hear, that shall he speak: and he will shew you things to come.
language2_text: No mai rana o Seyzi a yamapatwaw so manoyong a nanao ni Ama ta do to am ipeypalanginan na inyo. Am ji na mangozai o oyowyat na. Ta nimamizing na o ipanci na jinyo. So pancyan na nya jinyo so omanam pa vazay.

language1_text: He shall glorify me: for he shall receive of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
language2_text: Azwain na yaken, ta ahapen na o ciring ko a ipanci jinyo.

language1_text: All things that the Father hath are mine: therefore said I, that he shall take of mine, and shall shew it unto you.
language2_text: Yatodamimin o nanao ni Ama yamyan jyaken. Am ori o ko pancyan no na kayapo jyaken no inanao na jinyo no Seyzi.

language1_text: A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me, because I go to the Father.
language2_text: "Alikey rana kaji nyo na makacittan jyaken. Am ji meyyonownay ori a kapakacita nyo na jyaken."

language1_text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves, What is this that he saith unto us, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me: and, Because I go to the Father?
language2_text: Maniring o tatasa ka macinanao jya am, "Ikongo peypeypangayan no nang. A na kapanci no kalikey na rana kaji ta na makacittan sya, a na kapanci pa no na kangay ji Ama na do to. Ikongo peypeypangayan no ciring na ang.

language1_text: They said therefore, What is this that he saith, A little while? we cannot tell what he saith.
language2_text: Ikeykongo peypeypangayan no na ipanci ori a kalikey na rana. Tamo jyatenngi o na hetehtawan no ciring na."

language1_text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him, and said unto them, Do ye enquire among yourselves of that I said, A little while, and ye shall not see me: and again, a little while, and ye shall see me?
language2_text: To na tenngi ni Yeso o kapacici da sya. Am ori o nipancyan na nya jira. Maniring am, "Nyo ikazyak o ko kapanci no na kalikey rana no kaji nyo na makacittan jyaken? A kano, 'Ji meyyonownay a kapakacita nyo na jyaken?'

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, That ye shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: and ye shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall be turned into joy.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am mangay kalavi nyo a meykaoo. Am somaray sira o tao a ji nganoyong jyaken. Am cyaha, ta o lavyan nyo am no meyvoga am sarasaray nyo na.

language1_text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but as soon as she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for joy that a man is born into the world.
language2_text: No marateng rana o araraw no kapaw no totowang no mamlis so kanen a mavakes am manoyong karako no alalaw na. Am no mapaw rana ori am kahamangan na rana o alalaw na, do katey masaray na a makacita so anak na nimatazak rana tao do karawan.

language1_text: And ye now therefore have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no man taketh from you.
language2_text: Ori an, nyo ikakman sang an. Tana kamo marahet so aktokto sicyaikwaya am cyaha, ta mai ko pa tomita jinyo a kasaray nyo a makacita jyaken. So ikabo no tao a makapehes sya jinyo so sarasaray nyo.

language1_text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing. Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name, he will give it you.
language2_text: No si marateng o araraw ori am abo rana asa ka ciring a ipacici nyo jyaken. To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no mapasyasi kamo ji Ama kapeyhanhan nyo no ngaran ko am itoro na jinyo.

language1_text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be full.
language2_text: Sicyaikwaya am yanyo pa ji meyhanhanan o ngaran ko a mapasyasi ji Ama ta do to. So amin nyo sya an, ta itoro na jinyo. Am ori o ikanoyong nyo a tey masaray rana.

language1_text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs: but the time cometh, when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs, but I shall shew you plainly of the Father.
language2_text: "Amyan rana so nipehngehngay ko a ciring ko jinyo. Am yarana makeykai o araraw na a makaranes. So ji ko rana mapowzibi so ciring ko. Ta ko na pasononga o vazay ni Ama a ipanci ko jinyo.

language1_text: At that day ye shall ask in my name: and I say not unto you, that I will pray the Father for you:
language2_text: No si marateng rana o araraw am mapasyasi kamo ji Ama ta do to a meyhanhan no ngaran ko. So ikabeken a yaken o mapasyasi ninyo.

language1_text: for the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came out from God.
language2_text: Ta na ikarilaw inyo ni Ama ta do to. O na karilawan ninyo am nyo ikaglaw yaken a yaomanoyong jyaken a apo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I came forth from the Father, and am come into the world: again, I leave the world, and go to the Father.
language2_text: Ko apo ji Ama ta do to a yanimai do teyrahem. Sicyaikwa rana ya am ko na karwan o karawan a yamangay rana ji Ama ta do to."

language1_text: His disciples said unto him, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no proverb.
language2_text: Maniring o macinanao jya am, "Ka manoyong a yaji manayotayo so ciring, ta namen katenngan rana o peypeypangayan no mo ipanci.

language1_text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.
language2_text: Namen katenngan imo a yabo so yajyatenngi. Mo katenngan o yamyan do onowned namen. Ori o namen anoyngan jimo a yapo ji Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Nyo na anoyngan yaken sicyaikwaya?

language1_text: Behold, the hour cometh, yea, is now come, that ye shall be scattered, every man to his own, and shall leave me alone: and yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo an. Ta makeykai rana o kasyasyay nyo rana mangay do peycyavakavahayan nyo a ika yaken rana no yamaveyvow. Am ko jyaveyvow, ta macikaop jyaken si Ama.

language1_text: These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
language2_text: O ko pancyan no nang jinyo am ko ipadnadna so nakem nyo a macikaop jyaken. Am mangay o kalalaw da jinyo no ji manaralay a tao. Am ji kamo a zabab so onowned an. Ta ko na niharag o yamrahet so karawan."

language1_text: These words spake Jesus, and lifted up his eyes to heaven, and said, Father, the hour is come; glorify thy Son, that thy Son also may glorify thee:
language2_text: Mateyka ni Yeso o ciring na am tangarahen na o hanit. Maniring am, "Mo Ama, oya rana o araraw. Azwazwain mo o Anak mo. So icyakman na sang no Anak mo a zomwazway jimo.

language1_text: as thou hast given him power over all flesh, that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him.
language2_text: Nitoro mo na o oyowyat jya a tomalamozong no tao do karawan. O icyakman na sang am itoro na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da no tao a nipamnekan mo a omanoyong jya.

language1_text: And this is life eternal, that they might know thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent.
language2_text: O to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da am ipakateneng da jimo a ney manoyong na Tao do to, a kapakateneng da ji Yeso Kizisto a nitovoy mo do karawan.

language1_text: I have glorified thee on the earth: I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do.
language2_text: Ko na nipacita o azwazway mo do karawan. Ta ko na nipakavos o vazay a mo nitoro jyaken.

language1_text: And now, O Father, glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was.
language2_text: Mo Ama, sicyaikwaya am itoro mo jyaken o azwazway mo do tangain mo. Paolin mo o azwazway ko no keyyan ko pa jimo do dang, no kaji na pa amaogan no karawan.

language1_text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world: thine they were, and thou gavest them me; and they have kept thy word.
language2_text: "Ko na nipeylimwang imo do aro a nipamnekan mo a tao do karawan. Sira manoyong a yamonganay jimo. Sira am mo nitoro jyaken. So da na ikanoyong a yaomonot do nanao mo.

language1_text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee.
language2_text: Da na katenngan o vazay ko a kano ciring ko a manoyong a yapo jimo.

language1_text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me; and they have received them, and have known surely that I came out from thee, and they have believed that thou didst send me.
language2_text: Ta ko ninanao sira o mo nitoro jyaken a nanao. Sira manoyong a yarana mahap sya. Da katenngan o yako kanoyong a yapo jimo. Da anoyngan o yamo kanitomovoy jyaken.

language1_text: I pray for them: I pray not for the world, but for them which thou hast given me; for they are thine.
language2_text: "Sira o ko ipeynozi. Ko ji meynozyan sira o tao a yaji nganoyong jyaken. Ta o yamo nitoro jyaken o yako ipeynozi, ta sira manoyong a yamonganay jimo.

language1_text: And all mine are thine, and thine are mine; and I am glorified in them.
language2_text: O monganay jyaken a tao am yamamimin a monganay jimo. O monganay jimo a tao am yamonganay jyakehen. O azwazway ko am yada rana patwawen.

language1_text: And now I am no more in the world, but these are in the world, and I come to thee. Holy Father, keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me, that they may be one, as we are.
language2_text: Ko na mangay jimo sicyaikwaya. So ji ko rana ngyani do karawan. O yamavezed a nitoro mo jyaken a tao am apzatan mo sira no oyowyat mo, mo Ama do to. So icyakma dey yasa a akman jyaten.

language1_text: While I was with them in the world, I kept them in thy name: those that thou gavest me I have kept, and none of them is lost, but the son of perdition; that the scripture might be fulfilled.
language2_text: No kapacikaop ko pa jira am nipzatan ko sira no oyowyat mo a nitoro mo jyaken. So ikabo no asa ka tao jira nimavozaw, do kapzat ko jira. Am o manazang nyaken a tao am nidomket rana do Seysyo o kapeyparaherahet na.

language1_text: And now come I to thee; and these things I speak in the world, that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves.
language2_text: "Sicyaikwaya am ko na mangay jimo. Ko na nipanci o aro a vazay eya do yako iyan pa do karawan. So ikanoyong da masaray so onowned do kapasaray ko sira.

language1_text: I have given them thy word; and the world hath hated them, because they are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
language2_text: Ko na nipeylimwang jira o ciring mo. Am da pacioyyan sira no yaji manaralay a tao do karawan. Ta yarana macitarek o pangtoktwan da kano ji manganoyong a tao. So ikanoyong da rana akman jyaken a ji monganay do karawan.

language1_text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world, but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil.
language2_text: Ko ji ngakdaya imo sicyaikwaya a mahap sira do teyngato. Am ko kakzeben imo a amzat jira do vazay na ni Satan.

language1_text: They are not of the world, even as I am not of the world.
language2_text: So ikanoyong da rana akman jyaken a ji monganay do karawan.

language1_text: Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is truth.
language2_text: Peyyanen mo o ciring mo do onowned da. So ikanoyong da rana ji meylimoteng so onowned. Ta o ciring mo am tey manoyong.

language1_text: As thou hast sent me into the world, even so have I also sent them into the world.
language2_text: Ko tovoin sira a meylimwang nimo do karawan, akman jyaken a yamo nitovoy do karawan.

language1_text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself, that they also might be sanctified through the truth.
language2_text: Ko itoro jimo o kataotao ko. So icyakman da sang a tomoro no kataotao da jimo a mahap so vazay mo.

language1_text: Neither pray I for these alone, but for them also which shall believe on me through their word;
language2_text: "Beken a sira ori o yako ipeynozi, ta yakman sang sira o yaomanam pa a yaomanoyong jyaken a yako ipeynozi. Ta amizngen da o ciring mo a da ipeylimwang.

language1_text: that they all may be one; as thou, Father, art in me, and I in thee, that they also may be one in us: that the world may believe that thou hast sent me.
language2_text: Ko ipeynozi sira kakma dey yasaha, mo Ama. Inaoy si macikaop sira jyaten, akman jimo a ka nyaken a yakmey yasaha. Inaoy si akmey yasa sira. So ikanoyong da no tao do karawan a makateneng do kanitomovoy mo jyaken do teyrahem.

language1_text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them; that they may be one, even as we are one:
language2_text: O nitoro mo jyaken a azwazway ko am yako nitoro jira. So ikanoyong da akmey yasa so nakenakem. Yakman jyaten a yasa so nakenakem.

language1_text: I in them, and thou in me, that they may be made perfect in one; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me, and hast loved them, as thou hast loved me.
language2_text: Ko macikaop jira. Yaka macikaop jyaken a da kakmey yasa rana. So ikanoyong da rana no tao do karawan a makateneng jimo a marilaw no omanoyong jimo a tao. Akman jyaken a yamo ikaglaw a kapakateneng da rana no tao do karawan do kanitomovoy mo jyaken do teyrahem.

language1_text: Father, I will that they also, whom thou hast given me, be with me where I am; that they may behold my glory, which thou hast given me: for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world.
language2_text: "Mo Ama, o mo nitoro jyaken a tao am inaoy si amyan sira do angayan ko. So ikanoyong da makacita so azwazway ko a nitoro mo jyaken. Ta nimanoma rana o aglaglaw mo jyaken no kaji na pa amaogan no karawan.

language1_text: O righteous Father, the world hath not known thee: but I have known thee, and these have known that thou hast sent me.
language2_text: Mo Ama do to a mapeyyangangay so tao, da pa jyatenngi imo no tao do karawan. Am ko imo katenngan. So da ikakman sang o nitoro mo jyaken a tao. Ta da katenngan o kanitomovoy mo jyaken do karawan.

language1_text: And I have declared unto them thy name, and will declare it: that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them, and I in them.
language2_text: Ko na nipeylimwang imo jira. Am ipeylimwang ko pa imo a kanoyong no aglaglaw mo jyaken amyan jira, akman jyaken a macilovot jira."

language1_text: When Jesus had spoken these words, he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron, where was a garden, into the which he entered, and his disciples.
language2_text: Teyka meynozi si Yeso am makowbot rana kano macinanao jya a kangay da do katovangan no ayo a meyngaran so Kelon. Do dang rana am yanan no asa ka peymowamowan. So nyangay da do dang.

language1_text: And Judas also, which betrayed him, knew the place: for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples.
language2_text: O meyngaran so Yota a meypanam a manazang ni Yeso am katenngan na o kalwalovotan da ni Yeso a kano macinanao jya, ta masangib si Yeso amlovot so macinanao jya do dang.

language1_text: Judas then, having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees, cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons.
language2_text: No kano nang am yangay na rana ni Yota o aro a itaysang no Loma do yanan da Yeso a kano macinanao jya. O omzat do rako a panaralayan a nitovoy da no tao a macyagom do Vadisay a kano mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am mangay sira do yanan da Yeso a meypinan so voovoo da kano soo da.

language1_text: Jesus therefore, knowing all things that should come upon him, went forth, and said unto them, Whom seek ye?
language2_text: Katenngan ni Yeso o makakaday a alalaw a mangay meydedna jya. Am ori o nipacicyan na sira. Maniring am, "Sino nyo kalahen."

language1_text: They answered him, Jesus of Nazareth. Jesus saith unto them, I am he. And Judas also, which betrayed him, stood with them.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "O tao do Nasale a meyngaran so Yeso." Maniring si Yeso am, "Yaken nyo ipanci ang." O meyngaran so Yota a manazang nya am macizasing jira.

language1_text: As soon then as he had said unto them, I am he, they went backward, and fell to the ground.
language2_text: Teyka na ori ipanci ni Yeso am mina to ngiso sira a mazkem do teyrahem.

language1_text: Then asked he them again, Whom seek ye? And they said, Jesus of Nazareth.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Yeso jira am, "Sino nyo kalahen." Maniring sira am, "O tao do Nasale a meyngaran so Yeso."

language1_text: Jesus answered, I have told you that I am he: if therefore ye seek me, let these go their way:
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ko na nipanci jinyo o na ka yaken na ang. No kamo manoyong a yakomala jyaken am ji nyo manapci sira o kararay ko."

language1_text: that the saying might be fulfilled, which he spake, Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none.
language2_text: O peycirngan na so sang ni Yeso am pangononongan na o ciring na do kapanci na no, "Mo Ama do to, ji ko liklika sira o nitoro mo jyaken a tao."

language1_text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it, and smote the high priest's servant, and cut off his right ear. The servant's name was Malchus.
language2_text: Karahan am o meyngaran so Simong Pite am nimapalolo so takzes am to na rana ngoyota o takzes na kapacipas na sya do wanan no talinga no lamlamsoy no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. O ngaran no lamlamsoy no panirsirngen am si Mahe.

language1_text: Then said Jesus unto Peter, Put up thy sword into the sheath: the cup which my Father hath given me, shall I not drink it?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso ji Pite am, "Pasoot rana o takzes mo. Mo ipanci o kaji ko ngapan so alalaw a nitoro na jyaken ni Ama ta do to?"

language1_text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus, and bound him,
language2_text: O itaysang no Loma kano panirsirngen da kano omzat do rako a panaralayan am rakpen da si Yeso a kavaod da sya.

language1_text: and led him away to Annas first; for he was father in law to Caiaphas, which was the high priest that same year.
language2_text: Ney manoma na nyangayan da nya am meyngaran si Annase. Iya rana am icyarwa no maizay a yamapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to do kasa kawan ang a meyngaran si Keyava.

language1_text: Now Caiaphas was he, which gave counsel to the Jews, that it was expedient that one man should die for the people.
language2_text: Iya o nimanci nya do tao do Yotay so kapya na sya no asa ka tao a mangay mawakwak no aro a tao.

language1_text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus, and so did another disciple: that disciple was known unto the high priest, and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest.
language2_text: Macilolo si Simong Pite a kano asa ka macinanao ji Yeso am asa jira o katovilan no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. Am ori o nipacisdep na ji Yeso a mangay do vahay no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But Peter stood at the door without. Then went out that other disciple, which was known unto the high priest, and spake unto her that kept the door, and brought in Peter.
language2_text: Si Pite am amyan do pantaw. Makowbot o asa ka macinanao ji Yeso a katovilan no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am macisirsiring do lamlamsoy da maniwangiwang so pazevngen a mavakes. Am ori o nipasdepan na si Pite.

language1_text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter, Art not thou also one of this man's disciples? He saith, I am not.
language2_text: Maniring o mavakes ji Pite am, "Beken a ka macinanao do da nirakep a tao ang?" Maniring si Pite am, "Beken."

language1_text: And the servants and officers stood there, who had made a fire of coals; for it was cold: and they warmed themselves: and Peter stood with them, and warmed himself.
language2_text: Marekmeh no kano nang. Am ori o nipeydokdok da so apoy a panangdangan da no itaysang no Loma kano omzat do rako a panaralayan. So nyangay ni Pite a macipanangdang jira.

language1_text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples, and of his doctrine.
language2_text: Pacicin na si Yeso no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. O ipacici na sya am omagaz do nanao na kano omanop jya.

language1_text: Jesus answered him, I spake openly to the world; I ever taught in the synagogue, and in the temple, whither the Jews always resort; and in secret have I said nothing.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ko masangib a yamangnanao do da kalwalovotan no tao. So yako ikasangib a yamangnanao so tao do peyneynozyan a kado rako a panaralayan. So yana ikabo no yako powziben a ciring ko.

language1_text: Why askest thou me? ask them which heard me, what I have said unto them: behold, they know what I said.
language2_text: Ikongo mo pacicyan jyaken. Apyapya rana o kangay mo mapacici so tao a yanimakamizing so nanao ko. Ta da katenngan o nipanci ko."

language1_text: And when he had thus spoken, one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand, saying, Answerest thou the high priest so?
language2_text: Teyka na ni Yeso o ciring na am siplangan na o posngi na no yasa ka mamzat a kapanci na no, "Ikongo mo to mancii no akman sang do panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Jesus answered him, If I have spoken evil, bear witness of the evil: but if well, why smitest thou me?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "No si myan so malas a ko nipanci am pancyaney do aro a tao eyto. Am no si manoyong o ciring ko am ikongo mo to niplangi jyaken."

language1_text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ipanci na ni Annase o tao a mangay ni Yeso do tao a meyngaran so Keyava a panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. Am no kanang am mavaod pa si Yeso.

language1_text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself. They said therefore unto him, Art not thou also one of his disciples? He denied it, and said, I am not.
language2_text: Meyratateng am to manangdang pa dang si Pite. Maniring jya o asa ka tao am, "Beken a macinanao ka asyo ji Yeso?" Maniring si Pite do alalasan na jya am, "Beken a yaken."

language1_text: One of the servants of the high priest, being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off, saith, Did not I see thee in the garden with him?
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka lamlamsoy no panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to. Iya rana am zipos no nipeycipas ni Pite so talinga. Maniring ori am, "Ji ko nimacita imo a nimacihza ji Yeso do peymowamowan no tao a."

language1_text: Peter then denied again: and immediately the cock crew.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Jyabo a." Am nimacinao no kano nang o katazokokok no manok.

language1_text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment: and it was early; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall, lest they should be defiled; but that they might eat the passover.
language2_text: Madagdag am hapen da si Yeso do yanan ni Keyava a vahay a kangay da nya do meymatmatngeh nira Loma tao a meyngaran so Pilato. Am ji sira nimacisdep o tao do Yotay. Ta raten da no nakem o kapacisdep da do vahay no beken a tao do Yotay do ipamaringan da so kanen a ingaran da Iyeci. Ta no si macisdep sira am ji da mya sira macipamaring so kanen jira.

language1_text: Pilate then went out unto them, and said, What accusation bring ye against this man?
language2_text: Am ori o nyangay ni Pilato do pantaw a mapacici sira. Maniring am, "Ikongo nyo oyyan no tao eya. Ikongo na karatan."

language1_text: They answered and said unto him, If he were not a malefactor, we would not have delivered him up unto thee.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "No yabo na karatan am namen jyangayan jimo do jya."

language1_text: Then said Pilate unto them, Take ye him, and judge him according to your law. The Jews therefore said unto him, It is not lawful for us to put any man to death:
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato jira am, "No komwan am angayan kamo rana. Ahahapan nyo na sya do iwawalam nyo." Maniring sira am, "Yabo oyowyat namen a to meyneynakem a manci no keyyan no raraten no tao a mangay wakwaken."

language1_text: that the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled, which he spake, signifying what death he should die.
language2_text: Ori rana am mangononong o ciring ni Yeso, do kapanci na no kataotao na mangay da padketen do jyojika a wakwaken.

language1_text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again, and called Jesus, and said unto him, Art thou the King of the Jews?
language2_text: Karahan am somdep si Pilato do vahay a manci ni Yeso. Maniring jya am, "Ka manoyong a panirsirngen da no tao do Yotay?"

language1_text: Jesus answered him, Sayest thou this thing of thyself, or did others tell it thee of me?
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yamanoyong a ciring mo ori an? No yamo nimamizing do tao."

language1_text: Pilate answered, Am I a Jew? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me: what hast thou done?
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato am, "Mo ipanci yaken a tao do Yotay? A tarek da keylyan nyo ori a kano panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to o yanimai nimo jyaken a yamanci no vazay mo jyaken. Ikongo raraten mo."

language1_text: Jesus answered, My kingdom is not of this world: if my kingdom were of this world, then would my servants fight, that I should not be delivered to the Jews: but now is my kingdom not from hence.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Yaji yapo do tao do karawan o yako ipanalamozong. Ta no si ori am jyabo kaji da ngagoman nyaken no yaomanop jyaken a tao a kaji da makahapan jyaken no panipanirsirngen no tao do Yotay a. So ko ji monganai do karawan."

language1_text: Pilate therefore said unto him, Art thou a king then? Jesus answered, Thou sayest that I am a king. To this end was I born, and for this cause came I into the world, that I should bear witness unto the truth. Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice.
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato jya am, "Ka manoyong a panirsirngen an?" Maniring si Yeso am, "Imo yamanci nyaken a panirsirngen. O ko nikatazak do karawan am yameykasa o peypeypangayan na. Ori rana am meylimwang no manoyong a nanao. O tao rana a makza no manoyong a nanao am ori o omamizing so ciring ko."

language1_text: Pilate saith unto him, What is truth? And when he had said this, he went out again unto the Jews, and saith unto them, I find in him no fault at all.
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato am, "Ikongo o manoyong a nanao." Karahan am makowbot si Pilato. Maniring do aro a tao do Yotay am, "Ko ji makakala so yasa ka raraten na a yako pangozayan a oyyan ko nya.

language1_text: But ye have a custom, that I should release unto you one at the passover: will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews?
language2_text: Am ko to mangozai o iwawalam nyo. Ori rana am mangday do ipamaring nyo so kanen do Iyeci o kapasaway ko so asa ka marahet so nakenakem a tao. Manngwa, apyahen nyo yaken a mapasaway so panirsirngen nyo a tao do Yotay an?"

language1_text: Then cried they all again, saying, Not this man, but Barabbas. Now Barabbas was a robber.
language2_text: Karahan am amlololos sira. Maniring sira am, "Taosya a pasawain si Yeso. Ta si Palapa o pasawain." (Si Palapa rana am manoyong a mangap so ahahapen.)

language1_text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus, and scourged him.
language2_text: Karahan am ipanci ni Pilato o tao a somipsipzot ji Yeso.

language1_text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns, and put it on his head, and they put on him a purple robe,
language2_text: Karahan am nimamalikawag sira o itaysang no Loma so akmey tazici a pasakopen da ji Yeso a kapeyyayob da sya so akmey ayob no panirsirngen,

language1_text: and said, Hail, King of the Jews! and they smote him with their hands.
language2_text: kangay da do tangain na ni Yeso. Maniring sira am, "Makapintek ka panirsirngen no tao do Yotay an," kasipsiplang da na sya.

language1_text: Pilate therefore went forth again, and saith unto them, Behold, I bring him forth to you, that ye may know that I find no fault in him.
language2_text: Meyratateng am makowbot pa si Pilato. Maniring do aro a tao am, "Citahen nyo an, ta to ko na powbota yangay jinyo, do ko kaji makakalan so yana karatan."

language1_text: Then came Jesus forth, wearing the crown of thorns, and the purple robe. And Pilate saith unto them, Behold the man!
language2_text: Karahan am makowbot rana si Yeso a nipasakopan da so akmey tazici a kapeyyayob na so akmey ayob no panirsirngen. Maniring si Pilato jira am, "Citahen nyo o tao eya."

language1_text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him, they cried out, saying, Crucify him, crucify him. Pilate saith unto them, Take ye him, and crucify him: for I find no fault in him.
language2_text: Macita da si Yeso no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano omzat do rako a panaralayan am amlololos sira manci no, "Padketen do jyojika. Padketen do jyojika." Maniring si Pilato jira am, "Ahap kamo na a kapadket nyo sya, ta yabo yako makala na karatan."

language1_text: The Jews answered him, We have a law, and by our law he ought to die, because he made himself the Son of God.
language2_text: Maniring sira o tao do Yotay am, "Cyaha, ta amyan so iwawalam namen pangozayan ta amwakwak sya. Ta na to mancyan o kataotao na Anak na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he was the more afraid;
language2_text: Mamizing ni Pilato am to rana nyahey.

language1_text: and went again into the judgment hall, and saith unto Jesus, Whence art thou? But Jesus gave him no answer.
language2_text: Karahan am somdep do vahay a kapacici na si Yeso. Maniring am, "Do wanjin mo kapwan." Am ji na nitovisan ni Yeso.

language1_text: Then saith Pilate unto him, Speakest thou not unto me? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee, and have power to release thee?
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato ji Yeso am, "Mo ji novisi yaken? Naknakmen mo keyyan no oyowyat ko a mapasaway jimo. So iyan no oyowyat ko a manci no kawakwak da jimo."

language1_text: Jesus answered, Thou couldest have no power at all against me, except it were given thee from above: therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "O na iyan no oyowyat mo am si Ama ta do to. Am o yanitomoro nyaken jimo a tao am to makasi, ta tey arako o raraten na."

language1_text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him: but the Jews cried out, saying, If thou let this man go, thou art not Cæ sar's friend: whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Cæ sar.
language2_text: Mamizing na ori ni Pilato am ji na rana tenngi a sidongen si Yeso a pasawain, ta yoyoywan da no tao do Yotay. Maniring sira am, "No si pasawain mo am beken a kagagan na imo ni Kaysa a rako a panirsirngen do Loma. O manci no kataotao na panirsirngen am kavosoyan na o akman sang ni Kaysa."

language1_text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying, he brought Jesus forth, and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement, but in the Hebrew, Gabbatha.
language2_text: Mamizing na o aro a ciriciring ori ni Pilato am ipakowbot na si Yeso a kalisna na rana ni Pilato do lilisnan na no mapacicici so tao a ngaranan da Niherahedan no Vato. O ingaran da jya no Sipolay a tao am Cyapata.

language1_text: And it was the preparation of the passover, and about the sixth hour: and he saith unto the Jews, Behold your King!
language2_text: Omanam o araraw no ipamaring da so kanen do Iyeci. Meyigen o araw no kano nang am maniring si Pilato do aro a tao do Yotay am, "Cita kamo pala o panirsirngen nyo."

language1_text: But they cried out, Away with him, away with him, crucify him. Pilate saith unto them, Shall I crucify your King? The chief priests answered, We have no king but Cæ sar.
language2_text: Karahan am amlololos sira o aro a tao. Maniring sira am, "Wakwaken! Wakwaken! Padketen do jyojika." Maniring si Pilato jira am, "Nyo kakzeben yaken a mapadket so panirsirngen nyo?" Maniring sira o panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am, "Si Kaysa saon o panirsirngen namen a yasa ka tao am."

language1_text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified. And they took Jesus, and led him away.
language2_text: Karahan am itoro ni Pilato si Yeso jira mangay padketen do jyojika.

language1_text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull, which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha:
language2_text: Karahan am yangay da na si Yeso, kapeyrara na rana so jyojika makowbot a meypangay do asa ka tokon a ngaranan da so Yanga no oo no tao. O ingaran da jya no Sipolay a tao am Keketa.

language1_text: where they crucified him, and two other with him, on either side one, and Jesus in the midst.
language2_text: Do dang nipadketan da si Yeso. Amyan dang so rarwa ka marahet so yangay a nipazasing da. O asa am amyan do wanan na. O asa am amyan do ozi na a keyyan na ni Yeso do avak na.

language1_text: And Pilate wrote a title, and put it on the cross. And the writing was, JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS.
language2_text: Amyan so nivatvatkan no lamlamsoy ni Pilato a nipayoray na do jyojika ni Yeso. O peypeypangayan no vatvatek am, "Si Yeso rana am tao do Nasale a Panirsirngen da no tao do Yotay."

language1_text: This title then read many of the Jews: for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city: and it was written in Hebrew, and Greek, and Latin.
language2_text: Aro tao do Yotay a nimakacita so sang, ta masngen o nipadketan da si Yeso do ili. O vatvatek ori am Sipolay a kano Lating a kano Sila o kavatvatkan na. So ipeykatlo no ciring a domket do dang.

language1_text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate, Write not, The King of the Jews; but that he said, I am King of the Jews.
language2_text: Maniring o panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to ji Pilato am, "Ji mo padketa da kapeypanirsirngen sya no tao do Yotay. Ta apyapya pa o kapadket mo so mina ciring na a manci no kataotao na Panirsirngen no tao do Yotay."

language1_text: Pilate answered, What I have written I have written.
language2_text: Maniring si Pilato am, "Ji ko na ablisi o ko nipadket a vatvatek."

language1_text: Then the soldiers, when they had crucified Jesus, took his garments, and made four parts, to every soldier a part; and also his coat: now the coat was without seam, woven from the top throughout.
language2_text: Mateyka da padketen si Yeso no itaysang no Loma am ahapen da o mina ayob na kapeykapat da sya vonongen. So nikaponged da teyhesa ka vovonongan. Karahan am ahapen da o katapil no ayob na. O ayob rana ori am ji da nitapang, ta asa ka ayob ori so kamamaogan a nicinon da.

language1_text: They said therefore among themselves, Let us not rend it, but cast lots for it, whose it shall be: that the scripture might be fulfilled, which saith, They parted my raiment among them, and for my vesture they did cast lots. These things therefore the soldiers did.
language2_text: Maniring sira o itaysang no Loma do kadwan jira am, "Ji ta misipisinga. Apyapya rana o kapasipangoyongoyot ta jya makahakahap rana sya." O ikakman na sang am mangay mangononong o ciring do Seysyo. Ta maniring am, "Da nivonong o nipeyyayob ko a da kapasipangoyongoyot do magorogod ko." So nikanoyong no nang a mina vazay da no itaysang no Loma.

language1_text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother, and his mother's sister, Mary the wife of Cleophas, and Mary Magdalene.
language2_text: O meytatanek do katangked no jyojika ni Yeso am si ina na kani kaminan na kani Madiya a mavakes ni Kelopo a kani Matelyan Madiya.

language1_text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother, and the disciple standing by, whom he loved, he saith unto his mother, Woman, behold thy son!
language2_text: Macita na ni Yeso si ina na kano ney kaglaw na a macinanao jya a meytatanek do dang am maniring ji ina na am, "Mo ina, to mo na abneka anak mo."

language1_text: Then saith he to the disciple, Behold thy mother! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home.
language2_text: Maniring do macinanao jya am, "To mo na abneka a ina mo." Nimacipinda no kano nang o kapavahay na rana so ina na ni Yeso.

language1_text: After this, Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished, that the scripture might be fulfilled, saith, I thirst.
language2_text: Katenngan na rana ni Yeso o kanikomavos no makakaday a vazay na. Maniring am, "Ko mawaw." O ikakman na sang am mangay mangononong o ciring do Seysyo.

language1_text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar: and they filled a spunge with vinegar, and put it upon hyssop, and put it to his mouth.
language2_text: Amyan dang so asa ka panay a kapnowan no nipatavayan da so makopad a ranom. Karahan am pasivozen da o akmey tapaik do makopad a ranom a kapataroy da sya do akmey kamanakaoy a pasngenen do ngongoy na.

language1_text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar, he said, It is finished: and he bowed his head, and gave up the ghost.
language2_text: To na nahamtama ni Yeso. Maniring am, "Yarana nikomavos o vazay ko," kalogod na rana a mazavat so inawan.

language1_text: The Jews therefore, because it was the preparation, that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day, (for that sabbath day was an high day, ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken, and that they might be taken away.
language2_text: Karahan am ipanci da ji Pilato no kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay o kavaci da so ai da no nipadket da do jyojika a tao a kakeykai da mawakwak a kapeypakas da rana so kataotao da do jyojika. O hapan da so akman sang a vazay am raten da o kato na ngyanan no kataotao da do jyojika do ipeywalam no tao do Yotay. Ta do ikadwa na araw am makdeng a ipamaring da so kanen.

language1_text: Then came the soldiers, and brake the legs of the first, and of the other which was crucified with him.
language2_text: Am ori o nyangay da no itaysang no Loma amvaci so ai da no rarwa ka tao a nipazasing da do jyojika ni Yeso.

language1_text: But when they came to Jesus, and saw that he was dead already, they brake not his legs:
language2_text: Am mangay sira ji Yeso am macita da na nimawakwak rana. Am ori o ji da na amvaci so ai na.

language1_text: but one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side, and forthwith came there out blood and water.
language2_text: Am asa ka itaysang no Loma o nisomobsob no cinalolot so tagtagzang ni Yeso a kavoyog no rala na kano aswasoy no kataotao na.

language1_text: And he that saw it bare record, and his record is true: and he knoweth that he saith true, that ye might believe.
language2_text: Ori rana am ciring na no nimakamatamata sya tao. So ikanoyong no akman sang a ciring na. Ta akma ney yongkad ori. So anoyngan nyo jya.

language1_text: For these things were done, that the scripture should be fulfilled, A bone of him shall not be broken.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no nang am mangay mangononong o ciring do Seysyo. Ta maniring am, "Abo asa ka totowang na mavaci."

language1_text: And again another scripture saith, They shall look on him whom they pierced.
language2_text: O asa ka ciring pa do Seysyo am, "Pacimatan da o nisobsob da tao."

language1_text: And after this Joseph of Arimathæ a, being a disciple of Jesus, but secretly for fear of the Jews, besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus: and Pilate gave him leave. He came therefore, and took the body of Jesus.
language2_text: Makarahan am o tao do Adimatay a meyngaran so Yoseyvo am ipanci na ji Pilato o kahap na so kataotao ni Yeso. Am iya rana am anoyngan na no nang si Yeso. Am ji nadkeci o kapanci na nya do tao, ta ikanyahey na o panipanirsirngen no tao do Yotay. So nipyan na sya ni Pilato a mangay omkas so kataotao na ni Yeso a kahap na rana sya.

language1_text: And there came also Nicodemus, which at the first came to Jesus by night, and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes, about an hundred pound weight.
language2_text: O meyngaran so Niketemo a nikomala si Yeso do mahep no kakwa pa am nimacihza ji Yoseyvo. O nyahap na ikoris na ji Yeso a mahangno a haneng am akmey asa ka rako a vaklit so karwaro.

language1_text: Then took they the body of Jesus, and wound it in linen clothes with the spices, as the manner of the Jews is to bury.
language2_text: Karahan am pakasen da si Yeso, kakoris da rana jya no haneng a kapongos da jya no malavang a milakayob. Ta ori rana am iwawalam da ori no tao do Yotay do nimapoling so peylingalingayan a tao.

language1_text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden; and in the garden a new sepulchre, wherein was never man yet laid.
language2_text: O nipadketan da si Yeso am masngen ori do peymowamowan no tao. Amyan dang so vayo a heseb a nidokdokan da mao. Am abo pa do dang o nimrakeh a tao a nipangay da do dang.

language1_text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews' preparation day; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand.
language2_text: Ikongo do omanam pa o araraw no ipeywalam da no tao do Yotay. Masngen o heseb do nipadketan da si Yeso. Am ori o to da rana pakakasai sya do dang.

language1_text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early, when it was yet dark, unto the sepulchre, and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre.
language2_text: Madagdag do niciyo am ji pa dada o araw. O meyngaran so Matelyan Madiya am nimangay do heseb ni Yeso. Am to na cita o rako a veysen do ngoso na nimapakaro.

language1_text: Then she runneth, and cometh to Simon Peter, and to the other disciple, whom Jesus loved, and saith unto them, They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre, and we know not where they have laid him.
language2_text: Karahan am malalayo a mangay ji Simong Pite a kano ney kaglaw na ni Yeso a macinanao jya. Maniring jira am, "Da nyahap si Yeso do heseb na. Namen jyatenngi o da nipangayan sya."

language1_text: Peter therefore went forth, and that other disciple, and came to the sepulchre.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay si Pite a kano asa ka macinanao ji Yeso do heseb na.

language1_text: So they ran both together: and the other disciple did outrun Peter, and came first to the sepulchre.
language2_text: Sira rana ori a rarwa am meyheza sira malalayo. Am magzagza pa o asa kani Pite. So nipanmanma na makaranes do heseb ni Yeso.

language1_text: And he stooping down, and looking in, saw the linen clothes lying; yet went he not in.
language2_text: Icingi na am milakayob rana o macita na. Am jya nimangay do sahad na.

language1_text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him, and went into the sepulchre, and seeth the linen clothes lie,
language2_text: Makaranes si Simong Pite am mina to meytopos a somdep do heseb na. Am o milakayob macita na,

language1_text: and the napkin, that was about his head, not lying with the linen clothes, but wrapped together in a place by itself.
language2_text: kano milakayob a nipongos da do oo ni Yeso a makowkoo pa matarek so kazomtadan.

language1_text: Then went in also that other disciple, which came first to the sepulchre, and he saw, and believed.
language2_text: O nimanmanma nimakaranes do heseb ori am somdep ori. Macita na am to na rana anoyngi do mina kapirwa na rana mavyay.

language1_text: For as yet they knew not the scripture, that he must rise again from the dead.
language2_text: Am ji da pa tenngi o peypeypangayan no ciring do Seysyo do kawakwak na keypirwa na mavyay.

language1_text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home.
language2_text: Karahan am meyoli rana sira a mangay rana do vahay da.

language1_text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping: and as she wept, she stooped down, and looked into the sepulchre,
language2_text: Meytatanek si Madiya a amlavi do pantaw na no heseb ni Yeso. Meyratateng am icingi na a meypangay do heseb na a tomita sya.

language1_text: and seeth two angels in white sitting, the one at the head, and the other at the feet, where the body of Jesus had lain.
language2_text: Am to makacita so rarwa ka tinsi ni Ama ta do to a meyyayob so malavang a amlisna do nipangayan da si Yeso. Asa am amyan do nipeypaowan da sya. Asa am amyan do niyanan no ai na.

language1_text: And they say unto her, Woman, why weepest thou? She saith unto them, Because they have taken away my Lord, and I know not where they have laid him.
language2_text: Maniring sira ji Madiya am, "Ikongo mo ilavi." Maniring si Madiya am, "Da nyahap o kataotao na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ko. Ko jyatenngi o yada nipangayan sya."

language1_text: And when she had thus said, she turned herself back, and saw Jesus standing, and knew not that it was Jesus.
language2_text: Iptad na o ciring na am to na cita si Yeso a meytatanek do tangain na. Am ji na tenngi o ka si Yeso na.

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, Woman, why weepest thou? whom seekest thou? She, supposing him to be the gardener, saith unto him, Sir, if thou have borne him hence, tell me where thou hast laid him, and I will take him away.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Ikongo mo ilavi. Sino mo kalahen." Manakenakem si Madiya am, "Ala iya o yatomalamozong no peymowamowan eya." Am ori o nipancyan na nya jya so, "No imo yanimapeylis so kataotao ni Yeso am pancyaney jyaken mo nipangayan sya, ta mangay ko hapen do jya."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, Mary. She turned herself, and saith unto him, Rabboni; which is to say, Master.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Mo Madiya." Citahen na ni Madiya am sirsirngen na no izezyak da no Sipolay. Maniring am, "Laponi!" O peypeypangayan na am, "Mangnanao."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Ji mo minani yaken, ta yako pa jya nimangay ji Ama. Angay da kakteh ko do cinai a kapanci mo nya jira so ko kapeysinaoli a mangay ji Ama a Tao do to ta. Ta iya rana am ta kalovotan a Tao do to."

language1_text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord, and that he had spoken these things unto her.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay rana si Matelyan Madiya manci nya do macinanao ji Yeso do kanimakacita na si Yeso a kapanci na no mina ciring na sya ni Yeso.

language1_text: Then the same day at evening, being the first day of the week, when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews, came Jesus and stood in the midst, and saith unto them, Peace be unto you.
language2_text: Ahep no niciyo am malovot sira o macinanao jya. No kanang am nipakapya da o pangengneban a nisletan, ta ikanyahey da o panipanirsirngen da no tao do Yotay. Karahan am to meytatanek si Yeso do tangain da. Maniring am, "Makapiya kamo so onowned an."

language1_text: And when he had so said, he shewed unto them his hands and his side. Then were the disciples glad, when they saw the Lord.
language2_text: Teyka na o ciring na am ipacita na jira o lima na kano tagtagzang na. So nikasasaray da nimakacita si Yeso a Panirsirngen da.

language1_text: Then said Jesus to them again, Peace be unto you: as my Father hath sent me, even so send I you.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Makapiya kamo so onowned an. To ko mangozai si Ama a nitomovoy jyaken. So ikakman ko sang a tomovoy jinyo."

language1_text: And when he had said this, he breathed on them, and saith unto them, Receive ye the Holy Ghost:
language2_text: Karahan am ahahan na sira. Maniring pa jira am, "Ahapen nyo o Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: whose soever sins ye remit, they are remitted unto them; and whose soever sins ye retain, they are retained.
language2_text: No si vonasen nyo o raraten no tao am todavonas rana. O ji nyo vonasa so raraten am jyavonas o raraten da."

language1_text: But Thomas, one of the twelve, called Didymus, was not with them when Jesus came.
language2_text: Asa do rarwa so ikakarwan a macinanao ji Yeso o meyngaran so Tomase. (O kasaing no ngaran na am si Nimeytovong a nimatazak a tao.) Iya rana am jya nimacikaop jira no kai ni Yeso.

language1_text: The other disciples therefore said unto him, We have seen the Lord. But he said unto them, Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails, and put my finger into the print of the nails, and thrust my hand into his side, I will not believe.
language2_text: Maniring sira o karwan da am, "Namen nimacita si Yeso a Panirsirngen ta." Maniring si Tomase jira am, "No si macita ko na a kapatoz ko so rokap ko do nipayorayan da so lima na do jyojika kapinan ko do tagtagzang na am ori saon o anoyngan ko jya am."

language1_text: And after eight days again his disciples were within, and Thomas with them: then came Jesus, the doors being shut, and stood in the midst, and said, Peace be unto you.
language2_text: Ikawao na araw am malovot pa sira o macinanao ji Yeso. No kanang am macilovot rana jira si Tomase. Mangneb sira do kalovotan da vahay am to meytatanek si Yeso do tangain da. Maniring jira am, "Makapiya kamo so onowned an."

language1_text: Then saith he to Thomas, Reach hither thy finger, and behold my hands; and reach hither thy hand, and thrust it into my side: and be not faithless, but believing.
language2_text: Maniring ji Tomase am, "Patozey o lima mo do jya. Cita pala o lima ko. Pacisngen a kapinan mo do tagtagzang ko. Taosya rana kaji mo manganwanoyngan an. So ipanganoyong mo an."

language1_text: And Thomas answered and said unto him, My Lord and my God.
language2_text: Maniring si Tomase ji Yeso am, "Mo Panirsirngen a Tao do to ko."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto him, Thomas, because thou hast seen me, thou hast believed: blessed are they that have not seen, and yet have believed.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Mo na anoyngan yaken, ta mo na nimacita yaken? Am o to nganoyong jyaken a ji nimakacita jyaken am tey yapya sira ori."

language1_text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples, which are not written in this book:
language2_text: Aro pa dang o mina vazay na do tangain no macinanao jya mapeyzokab a vazay. Am yajya nipadket do vakong eya.

language1_text: but these are written, that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ, the Son of God; and that believing ye might have life through his name.
language2_text: O yanipadketan so karwan na do vakong eya am anoyngan nyo ji Yeso a Misayya a Anak ni Ama ta do to. O manganoyong a tao am mahap da o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias; and on this wise shewed he himself.
language2_text: Kadadayan na so araraw am mangay pa mapacita do macinanao jya do ngaranan da Tipilyo a rako a meybebneng a ranom. O mina vazay da no kano nang am yata malavat do jya an.

language1_text: There were together Simon Peter, and Thomas called Didymus, and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee, and the sons of Zebedee, and two other of his disciples.
language2_text: No kano nang am nimalovot sira Simong Pite a kani Tomase a meyngaran pa so Nimeytovong a nimatazak a tao a kani Natannay a tao do Cyana do Cyadidi a kano rarwa ka anak ni Sipitay a kano rarwa pa dang a kararay da a macinanao ji Yeso.

language1_text: Simon Peter saith unto them, I go a fishing. They say unto him, We also go with thee. They went forth, and entered into a ship immediately; and that night they caught nothing.
language2_text: Maniring si Simong Pite do karwan da am, "Ko mangay mangahahap." Maniring o karwan da am, "Macihza namen jimo." Am ori o nilwas da do asa ka vazangay. Am abo inahahapan da kasahep.

language1_text: But when the morning was now come, Jesus stood on the shore: but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus.
language2_text: Domada o araw am meytatanek si Yeso do pamsan na. Am ji da pa singkaji no macinanao jya si Yeso.

language1_text: Then Jesus saith unto them, Children, have ye any meat? They answered him, No.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Kokay kamo. Kamo nimakamong an?" Maniring sira am, "Jyabo yasa namen nimamong a yakasahep a!"

language1_text: And he said unto them, Cast the net on the right side of the ship, and ye shall find. They cast therefore, and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Zoywan kamo o tawaz nyo do kawanan, ta ori na yanan no among." Karahan am izoyo da na o tawaz am ji da rana anat a pazagpiten, ta tey yaro rana o among do tawaz.

language1_text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter, It is the Lord. Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord, he girt his fisher's coat unto him, (for he was naked, ) and did cast himself into the sea.
language2_text: Maniring ji Pite o ney kaglaw na ni Yeso a macinanao jya am, "Si Yeso ya a Panirsirngen ta." Mamizing ni Simong Pite o ka si Yeso na am meyyayob a kaokso na.

language1_text: And the other disciples came in a little ship; (for they were not far from land, but as it were two hundred cubits, ) dragging the net with fishes.
language2_text: Karwan da am kaoden da o vazangay makarala. Karahan am alikey rana kaji da makaransan do pamsan na am lolwen da na o tawaz a yanan no aro a among.

language1_text: As soon then as they were come to land, they saw a fire of coals there, and fish laid thereon, and bread.
language2_text: Makaranes sira do pamsan na am macita da o myanpaw a kano inmala rana a yanan no panazaban ni Yeso so among.

language1_text: Jesus saith unto them, Bring of the fish which ye have now caught.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Pangap kamo pa do yanyo nimamong so apeleh."

language1_text: Simon Peter went up, and drew the net to land full of great fishes, an hundred and fifty and three: and for all there were so many, yet was not the net broken.
language2_text: So nyangay na ni Simong Pite do vazangay amngingit so tawaz a ipakarala. Am mamimin a rarako a among o nimatawaz. Vilangan da na am atlo o ikasikanem na so ikarwa poo (153). Am jya nimapising o tawaz da no among ang.

language1_text: Jesus saith unto them, Come and dine. And none of the disciples durst ask him, Who art thou? knowing that it was the Lord.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jira am, "Sijya kamo a karyag nyo." Am abo o asa ka tao do macinanao jya o makadket jya pacicin, ta katenngan da o ka si Yeso na.

language1_text: Jesus then cometh, and taketh bread, and giveth them, and fish likewise.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay jira si Yeso a kavonong na so myanpaw jira. Akman sang o among a vonongen na jira.

language1_text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples, after that he was risen from the dead.
language2_text: Ipitlo na rana ya ni Yeso a mapacita do macinanao jya no keypirwa na rana mavyay.

language1_text: So when they had dined, Jesus saith to Simon Peter, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me more than these? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my lambs.
language2_text: Teyka sira romyag am maniring si Yeso ji Simong Pite am, "Imo rana mo Simong a anak ni Yowani am manngwa, ka makdekdeng pa kano karwan nyo eya a maglaw nyaken an?" Maniring si Pite am, "Noon. Mo katenngan yaken a yatey maglaw nimo, mo Panirsirngen." Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Peyveyveknen mo o yaomanoyong jyaken a tao a akma koy lilikta kagling."

language1_text: He saith to him again the second time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? He saith unto him, Yea, Lord; thou knowest that I love thee. He saith unto him, Feed my sheep.
language2_text: Ipidwa na pacicin am, "Imo rana mo Simong a anak ni Yowani am manngwa, yamo ikaglaw yaken an?" Maniring si Simong am, "Noon. Mo katenngan yaken a yatey maglaw nimo." Maniring jya si Yeso am, "Peyveyveknen mo o omanoyong jyaken a tao a akma koy kagling."

language1_text: He saith unto him the third time, Simon, son of Jonas, lovest thou me? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time, Lovest thou me? And he said unto him, Lord, thou knowest all things; thou knowest that I love thee. Jesus saith unto him, Feed my sheep.
language2_text: Ipitlo na pacicin ni Yeso am akman sang o ciring na. Maniring am, "Imo rana mo Simong a anak ni Yowani am manngwa, mo ikaglaw yaken an?" Mina todarahet o aktokto na ni Pite do keypipitlo na mapacici sya no kaglaw na nya, kaji na aglawan nya. Maniring rana ji Yeso si Pite am, "Mo katenngan o makakaday. So mo ipakateneng jyaken a yatey maglaw nimo, mo Panirsirngen." Maniring si Yeso jya am, "Peyveyveknen mo o yaomanoyong jyaken a tao a akma koy kagling.

language1_text: Verily, verily, I say unto thee, When thou wast young, thou girdedst thyself, and walkedst whither thou wouldest: but when thou shalt be old, thou shalt stretch forth thy hands, and another shall gird thee, and carry thee whither thou wouldest not.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jimo am no kalavayo mo pa am to mo meyneynakman o angangayan mo. Am no rarakeh ka na am abo rana oyowyat mo a mapatozatozak do amvaod jimo a tomaosya so ji mo akzakzan a angayan."

language1_text: This spake he, signifying by what death he should glorify God. And when he had spoken this, he saith unto him, Follow me.
language2_text: O peycirngan na so sang ni Yeso am pazimanen na ji Pite o pangavosan na no inawan na no makwa do kazwazway na si Ama ta do to. Maniring si Yeso ji Pite am, "Macilolo ka jyaken."

language1_text: Then Peter, turning about, seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following; which also leaned on his breast at supper, and said, Lord, which is he that betrayeth thee?
language2_text: Meyvazingowngaw si Pite am macita na o ney kaglaw na macinanao ji Yeso a macihza jira. Iya rana ori am nimacitangked ji Yeso no kakan da a mapacici sya do keyyan no tao a manazang nya.

language1_text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus, Lord, and what shall this man do?
language2_text: Macita na ni Pite am maniring ji Yeso am, "Meypanngonngo si Yowani eya no makwa."

language1_text: Jesus saith unto him, If I will that he tarry till I come, what is that to thee? follow thou me.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso jya am, "No si ipanci ko kato na avyayan a mangay no yai ko na am ikongo mo kazyakan nya. To ka macilolo jyaken am."

language1_text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren, that that disciple should not die: yet Jesus said not unto him, He shall not die; but, If I will that he tarry till I come, what is that to thee?
language2_text: Karahan am o akman sang a ciring am todavangovangon. Ori malavat da no macinanao ji Yeso o kaji na wakwakan no asa ka macinanao ji Yeso. Am ji na nipanci ni Yeso o kaji na wakwakan no nang. Ta kapanci na no, "No si ipanci ko kato na avyayan a mangay no yai ko na am ikongo mo kazyakan nya."

language1_text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things, and wrote these things: and we know that his testimony is true.
language2_text: O ney kaglaw na ni Yeso a macinanao jya o yamapatwaw so aro a vazay eya a na kavatvatek jya. So namen pacyanoyngan do ciring na a tey manoyong.

language1_text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did, the which, if they should be written every one, I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written. Amen.
language2_text: Aro pa o mina vazay na ni Yeso. Am no ko naknakmen am no si mamimin a vatvatkan am ji rana makangay do karawan o karwaro no vakong.

language1_text: The former treatise have I made, O Theophilus, of all that Jesus began both to do and teach,
language2_text: Kokay mo Tiawveylo. O ko nivatvatkan rana nimanma vakong am ko na nimimin o vazay na kano nipangnanao na ni Yeso,

language1_text: until the day in which he was taken up, after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen: to whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs, being seen of them forty days, and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God:
language2_text: a mangay no kapeycyakavat na rana mangay do teyngato. Ikapat na ngarnan (40) no araraw no nipeyvangon na am ipiro na o kataotao na ipacita do nipamnekan na omlivolivon no ciriciring na. So ipakateneng da do kanoyong na rana nimavyay a kapanci na nya jira so italamozong na ni Ama ta do to. No kaji na pa meycyakavatan a mangay do teyngato am nioyatan no Seyzi si Yeso a omyokod no nipamnekan na omlivolivon no ciriciring na a vazay na jira. a mangay no kapeycyakavat na rana mangay do teyngato. Ikapat na ngarnan (40) no araraw no nipeyvangon na am ipiro na o kataotao na ipacita do nipamnekan na omlivolivon no ciriciring na. So ipakateneng da do kanoyong na rana nimavyay a kapanci na nya jira so italamozong na ni Ama ta do to. No kaji na pa meycyakavatan a mangay do teyngato am nioyatan no Seyzi si Yeso a omyokod no nipamnekan na omlivolivon no ciriciring na a vazay na jira.

language1_text: and, being assembled together with them, commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem, but wait for the promise of the Father, which, saith he, ye have heard of me.For John truly baptized with water; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence.
language2_text: Ipisa no kalovot da pa am nipanci ni Yeso jira o, "Si Yowani rana am nitaktakan na inyo no ranom. Am do kadadayan no araraw am meyhekas jinyo o Seyzi. Am ori o ji nyo ngaroi do Yelosaleng, ta nanalahen nyo o Seyzi a itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to akman so nipanci na jyaken no kakwa kano nipanci ko pa jinyo asyo."Ipisa no kalovot da pa am nipanci ni Yeso jira o, "Si Yowani rana am nitaktakan na inyo no ranom. Am do kadadayan no araraw am meyhekas jinyo o Seyzi. Am ori o ji nyo ngaroi do Yelosaleng, ta nanalahen nyo o Seyzi a itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to akman so nipanci na jyaken no kakwa kano nipanci ko pa jinyo asyo."

language1_text: When they therefore were come together, they asked of him, saying, Lord, wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel?
language2_text: No keypisa na ni Yeso a macilovot do nipamnekan na omlivolivon no ciriciring na am pacicin da. Maniring sira am, "Mo Panirsirngen, sicyaikwaya o mo torwan no oyowyat namen a sivosivovoong ni Isedi a tomalamozong no pongso namen?"

language1_text: And he said unto them, It is not for you to know the times or the seasons, which the Father hath put in his own power.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Yeso am, "O akman rana sang a vazay a kano araraw na am si Ama ta do to o makateneng jya.

language1_text: But ye shall receive power, after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem, and in all Judæ a, and in Samaria, and unto the uttermost part of the earth.
language2_text: Am meyhekas jinyo o Seyzi. So iyan no rako a oyowyat nyo a meylimwang nyaken do Yelosaleng a kado peycyeylilyan na do Yotay a kado Samadiya a mangay do peycyamahamahatawan na."

language1_text: And when he had spoken these things, while they beheld, he was taken up; and a cloud received him out of their sight.
language2_text: Teyka na rana ori a ciring am meycyakavat rana si Yeso do teyngato. Tangarahen da am amyan so asa ka cinalab ambengbeng so citahen da.

language1_text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel;
language2_text: Karwan na rana sira am to da cita o rarwa a malavang so ayob a tao a tomanek do katangked da a manci no,

language1_text: which also said, Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.
language2_text: "Inyo rana a tao do Cyadidi am ikongo nyo ipeytatanek do jya a yatomangara so hanit. Ta si Yeso eya yakomaro rana jinyo a yamangay rana do teyngato am akman sang, ta mirwa pa meysinaoli do teyrahem a maciralay do cinalab."

language1_text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet, which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day's journey.
language2_text: Meyratateng am karwan da rana o meyngaran so Kanlan a tokon no nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na a meysinaoli rana do Yelosaleng. O karairai na am kakteb no toki do alaman sya.

language1_text: And when they were come in, they went up into an upper room, where abode both Peter, and James, and John, and Andrew, Philip, and Thomas, Bartholomew, and Matthew, James the son of Alphæ us, and Simon Zelotes, and Judas the brother of James.
language2_text: Makaranes sira do Yelosaleng am somdep rana sira do kavava no vahay a peyvahayan da. Sira rana am si Pite a kani Yowani a kani Yake a kani Antele a kani Veydipo a kani Tomase a kani Patolomaw a kani Matay a kano anak na ni Alevey a si Yake a kano ipanci da macikagom do macioya do Loma a meyngaran so Simong a kano anak na ni Yake a si Yota.

language1_text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication, with the women, and Mary the mother of Jesus, and with his brethren.
language2_text: Mangday sira meylovolovot a meynozi a kano mavavakes. Amyan pa jira si Madiya ina na ni Yeso a kada wari na ni Yeso a mahakay.

language1_text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples, and said, (the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty, )
language2_text: Kadadayan na so araraw am meylovolovot sira omanoyong ji Yeso. Adwa ngarnan sira so ikakarwan a poo (120) o karwaro da. Meytatanek si Pite a kapanci na no,

language1_text: Men and brethren, this scripture must needs have been fulfilled, which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas, which was guide to them that took Jesus.
language2_text: "Manga kakteh, nimangononong o nivatvatkan ni Tawey a nipaziman na jya no Seyzi no kakwa pa a omagaz ji Yota a nimapalolo so tao a amrakep si Yeso.

language1_text: For he was numbered with us, and had obtained part of this ministry.
language2_text: Ta si Yota rana am mina kararay ta nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na a somidong jyaten do vazay ta."

language1_text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity; and falling headlong, he burst asunder in the midst, and all his bowels gushed out.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka hakawan a nipalit da no nizpi a ngina no inawan na ni Yeso. Do dang o nikazakatan ni Yota. Ta nilalavicin na o kataotao na a kakas na kavotdak no velek na kapeytotwaw no cinai na.

language1_text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue, Aceldama, that is to say, The field of blood.
language2_text: Mamizing da no meyvahay do Yelosaleng am ngaranan da o hakawan ang so Haketama. O peypeypangayan na am, "Nivoyogan no rala no tao."

language1_text: For it is written in the book of Psalms, Let his habitation be desolate, And let no man dwell therein: andHis bishoprick let another take.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Pite am, "O nivatvatkan rana ni Tawey do Anwanood a omagaz ji Yota am oya o nipanci na, 'Inaoy no si abo o tao a meyvahay do dang.' Maniring pa am, 'Inaoy no si macipalit o tao a omahap so vazay na.'"

language1_text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us, beginning from the baptism of John, unto that same day that he was taken up from us, must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Pite am, "Mamnek ta so asa ka tao a kapalit na ni Yota a kararay ta meylimwang ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a nimirwa a mavyay. O ahapen ta am nimacilovot jyaten no kapapo na ni Yowani a manaktak a mangay do araraw no kapeycyakavat na ni Yeso do teyngato." Maniring pa si Pite am, "Mamnek ta so asa ka tao a kapalit na ni Yota a kararay ta meylimwang ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a nimirwa a mavyay. O ahapen ta am nimacilovot jyaten no kapapo na ni Yowani a manaktak a mangay do araraw no kapeycyakavat na ni Yeso do teyngato."

language1_text: And they appointed two, Joseph called Barsabas, who was surnamed Justus, and Matthias.
language2_text: So nipamnek da so rarwa ka tao a meyngaran si Yoseyvo a kani Matiya. O kasaing no ngaran ni Yoseyvo am si Pasapa kani Yoseto.

language1_text: And they prayed, and said, Thou, Lord, which knowest the hearts of all men, shew whether of these two thou hast chosen,
language2_text: Meyratateng am meynozi sira a manci no, "Mo Panirsirngen, mo katenngan o nakenakem no tao do teyrahem. So pancyan mo nya jyamen so nipamnekan mo do yararwa eya,

language1_text: that he may take part of this ministry and apostleship, from which Judas by transgression fell, that he might go to his own place.
language2_text: a macipalit do vazay ni Yota. Ta nikarwan na rana o vazay na mangay do angayan na."

language1_text: And they gave forth their lots; and the lot fell upon Matthias; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles.
language2_text: Mateyka da ori a ciring am masipangoyongoyot sira a kapakahap da so meyngaran so Matiya a kapacirapa na rana do asa so ikakarwan (11) a nipamnekan na ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come, they were all with one accord in one place.
language2_text: Marateng rana o araw no Osinci am meylovolovot sira o amraralay ni Yeso do asa ka vahay.

language1_text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind, and it filled all the house where they were sitting.
language2_text: To da amizing o akmey rako a pagpag apo do teyngato. So mina to nagnozi no yanan da vahay.

language1_text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire, and it sat upon each of them.
language2_text: So nipakacita da so akmey lila no apoy a makakaday jira mangay someyked do oo da.

language1_text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and began to speak with other tongues, as the Spirit gave them utterance.
language2_text: Am ori o nioyatan na jira no Seyzi a kapanci da no meycyataretarek a ciriciring do kowyat na jira no Seyzi.

language1_text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews, devout men, out of every nation under heaven.
language2_text: No kano nang am amyan so tao do Yotay apo do peycyamahamahatawan na kano meyvahay do Yelosaleng a makekdeng so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Now when this was noised abroad, the multitude came together, and were confounded, because that every man heard them speak in his own language.
language2_text: Mamizing da o akmey rako a pagpag am mai sira meylovolovot o aro a tao. Ta yeyyak da sira o amraralay ni Yeso a tao a meyzezyak so ciriciring do peycyamahamahatawan na.

language1_text: And they were all amazed and marvelled, saying one to another, Behold, are not all these which speak Galilæ ans?
language2_text: Ori o nipancyan da no, "Cita pala sira o yameyzezyak a tao ito, a yamamimin a tao do Cyadidi.

language1_text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue, wherein we were born?
language2_text: Ikongo da todamimini nira ito a yamakateneng do ciriciring ta.

language1_text: Parthians, and Medes, and Elamites, and the dwellers in Mesopotamia, and in Judæ a, and Cappadocia, in Pontus, and Asia,
language2_text: Yamyan jyaten eya so tao do Patiya kano tao do Mitiya kano tao do Ilan a kano yapo do Meysopotamiya kado Yotay a kado Kapatocya kado Pento a kado Yasiya,

language1_text: Phrygia, and Pamphylia, in Egypt, and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene, and strangers of Rome, Jews and proselytes,
language2_text: kado Vodicya kado Pangveydiya kado Ayci a kano yapo do Dipiya a masngen do Cidinay. Yamyan jyaten eya so apo do Loma a tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay a omahap rana so iwawalam ta tao do Yotay.

language1_text: Cretes and Arabians, we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God.
language2_text: Amyan jyaten eya so yapo do Kedite a kado Alapo. Am ikongo da todamimini a yamakateneng do aro a ciriciring ta a yamanci no yamapeyzokab a vazay ni Ama ta do to!"

language1_text: And they were all amazed, and were in doubt, saying one to another, What meaneth this?
language2_text: So nikalakan da nira kapeyyahhahes da manci no, "Ikongo o akman sya vazay!"

language1_text: Others mocking said, These men are full of new wine.
language2_text: Am amyan jira so maming nira manci no, "Yamasaki sira ori."

language1_text: But Peter, standing up with the eleven, lifted up his voice, and said unto them, Ye men of Judæ a, and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem, be this known unto you, and hearken to my words:
language2_text: No kanang na rana am meytatanek si Pite a kano asa so ikakarwan a kararay na. So nilolos na manci nya do aro a tao so, "Inyo rana manga zipos a tao do Yotay a kano yameyvahay do Yelosaleng eya tao am amizngen nyo o ciring ko an.

language1_text: For these are not drunken, as ye suppose, seeing it is but the third hour of the day.
