language2_text: Nyo ipanci sira ori a yamasaki. Beken an, ta neykasyam pa ya no toki an.

language1_text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel;
language2_text: Yamanoyong ya nipanci no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to no kakwa a meyngaran si Yoel. Maniring am,

language1_text: And it shall come to pass in the last days, saith God, I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh: And your sons and your daughters shall prophesy, And your young men shall see visions, And your old men shall dream dreams:
language2_text: 'O ciring na ni Ama ta do to am: No marateng rana o araraw ko no makwa am tovoin ko o Seyzi a macikaop do aro a tao. O anak nyo a mahakay a kano mavakes am mangay o kapanoyonoyo da so ciriciring ko. So iyan no malavayo a mahakay a makacita so mapangyangyalak a ipacita ko jira do akma dey tateynep. So iyan no rarakeh a mahakay a meytateynep so mapeyzokab a ipatateynep ko sira.

language1_text: And on my servants and on my handmaidensI will pour out in those days of my Spirit; and they shall prophesy:
language2_text: Sira rana mahap so vazay ko am tana mavakes a tana mahakay am tovoin ko jira o Seyzi a omoyat jira. So peylimwangan da no ciriciring ko.

language1_text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above, And signs in the earth beneath; Blood, and fire, and vapour of smoke:
language2_text: So iyan no ipacita ko a mapangyangyalak do hanit a kado teyrahem. Ori rana am apoy a kano rala kano rako a aob.

language1_text: The sun shall be turned into darkness, And the moon into blood, Before that great and notableDay of the Lord come:
language2_text: O araw am ji rana maniray. O vehan am akmey rala. So ikatey makdeng na no araraw no nang. Ta ori o yai ko rana a Panirsirngen.

language1_text: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
language2_text: Si masasnad rana o araraw no nang am o mapasyasi jyaken am ori o patazadangen ko.'"

language1_text: Ye men of Israel, hear these words; Jesus of Nazareth, a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs, which God did by him in the midst of you, as ye yourselves also know:
language2_text: Maniring pa si Pite am, "Inyo rana Isedi a tao a keylyan ko am amizngen nyo o ciring ko an. Ta si Yeso rana tao do Nasale am nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to. Oyowyat na kano mapeyzokab a vazay na rana ni Yeso am yongkad na ori do mina katovoy na sya ni Ama ta do to. So nyo ipakateneng do akman sang a vazay. Ta mina vazay na ya do tangain nyo an.

language1_text: him, being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God, ye have taken, and by wicked hands have crucified and slain:
language2_text: O nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to no kakwa am hapen nyo si Yeso a itoro do marahet so nakenakem a tao a kapadket da sya do jyojika a wakwaken.

language1_text: whom God hath raised up, having loosed the pains of death: because it was not possible that he should be holden of it.
language2_text: Am mina kapirwa na sya avyain ni Ama ta do to. So ikabo rana no alalaw na ikawakwak na.

language1_text: For David speaketh concerning him, I foresaw the Lord always before my face, For he is on my right hand, that I should not be moved:
language2_text: Amyan so nivatvatkan ni Tawey a nipanci ni Yeso. Maniring am, 'Ko mangday a macita si Ama ta do to do wanan ko. Am ori o ji ko a mogawi.

language1_text: Therefore did my heart rejoice, and my tongue was glad; Moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope:
language2_text: Am ori o ko ikasaray so onowned a yaomazwazway jimo. Tana mawakwak o kataotao ko am o pahad ko am ahapen mo do teyngato.

language1_text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell, Neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
language2_text: Ta mo ji mya o pahad ko a to ngyan do yanan da no nimawakwak a tao. So ji na macirapai do tana no kataotao ko, ta nipeyvazay ko na o vazay mo.

language1_text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life; Thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance.
language2_text: Ta nipananao mo rana jyaken o manoyong a pangonongan ko. So sarayan ko nimo a macikaop jyaken.'"

language1_text: Men and brethren, let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David, that he is both dead and buried, and his sepulchre is with us unto this day.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Pite am, "Manga zipos, ta katenngan o ineynapo ta si Tawey a nimawakwak rana no kakwa kabobo da nya. Ta katenngan o nibobwan da nya.

language1_text: Therefore being a prophet, and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him, that of the fruit of his loins, according to the flesh, he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne;
language2_text: No kapeyigegen na pa do karawan ni Tawey am panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to. So ipakateneng na do nipanci na jya ni Ama ta do to. Ta amyan do sivosivovoong na so macipalit jya a asa ka Panirsirngen.

language1_text: he seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ, that his soul was not left in hell, neither his flesh did see corruption.
language2_text: Katenngan na ni Tawey o kapeyvangon na ni Ama ta do to so sivovoong na a si Kizisto a nipamnekan na Panirsirngen. Maniring am, 'Ji na mya ni Ama ta do to o pahad na to ngyan do yanan da no nimawakwak a tao. So ji na macirapai do tana no kataotao na.'

language1_text: This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
language2_text: "Ta si Yeso am nivyay ni Ama ta do to. Ta yamen rana am yongkad no akman sang a vazay. Ta nimacita namen rana ori a nimavyay. So namen pancyan nya jinyo.

language1_text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted, and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost, he hath shed forth this, which ye now see and hear.
language2_text: So na rana nipeycyakavat a yamyan do wanan na ni Ama ta do to a yamahap so itoro na jya ni Ama ta do to a Seyzi. O nyo macita rana kano nyo mamizing sicyaikwaya am mamimin a yapo do oyowyat na no Seyzi a na nitoro ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For David is not ascended into the heavens: but he saith himself, The LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand,
language2_text: O nipanci na ni Tawey am beken a o kataotao na o nipanci na a nimangay do teyngato. Ta maniring do nivatvatkan na a omagaz ji Yeso am, 'Maniring si Ama ta do to do Panirsirngen ko am: Amlisna ka do wanan ko,

language1_text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool.
language2_text: mangay no si balinasen ko sira o macioya jimo a tao.'

language1_text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly, that God hath made that same Jesus, whom ye have crucified, both Lord and Christ.
language2_text: "Am ori an manga zipos a kakteh ko a Isedi a tao am naknakmen nyo an. Ta si Yeso a nyo nipadket do jyojika am yana rana nibnek ni Ama ta do to a Misayya a Panirsirngen ta."

language1_text: Now when they heard this, they were pricked in their heart, and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles, Men and brethren, what shall we do?
language2_text: Mamizing da no aro a tao am marahet o onowned da. Am ori o nipacicyan da si Pite a kano kararay na a nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na. Maniring sira am, "Manga kakteh, makongo namen so wanjin eya."

language1_text: Then Peter said unto them, Repent, and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite jira am, "Mamlis kamo na so nakem a komaro do raraten nyo a kataktak da jinyo no ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto. Ta ori o ikavonas na no raraten nyo a katoro na rana nya jinyo so Seyzi ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For the promise is unto you, and to your children, and to all that are afar off, even as many as the Lord our God shall call.
language2_text: Ta ori o nipanci na itoro na jinyo a kano ananak nyo a pacyangayan da no tao do peycyamahamahatawan na. Ta tamo mamimin a rarahen ni Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta."

language1_text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort, saying, Save yourselves from this untoward generation.
language2_text: So ikaro na pa no ciring na ni Pite a pakoyokoin na jira. Maniring pa am, "Inyo rana am macisyay kamo do meyraraten a tao an. Ta ori o ji nyo macizanoji do balinasen na ni Ama ta do to a tao."

language1_text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized: and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls.
language2_text: So ikaro da no tao a mahap rana so ipangnanao na a kataktak da rana jira. No kanang rana am omanoyong ji Yeso am nikarapan sira so kakatlwan a ranaw (3000) a tao.

language1_text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles' doctrine and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and in prayers.
language2_text: So nikowyat da macinanao do nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na kalwalovot da rana meynozi a kakan da so pang a makanakem si Yeso a nimawakwak.

language1_text: And fear came upon every soul: and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles.
language2_text: So ikaro no mapeyzokab a vazay da no nipamnekan na ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na a mapacita no rako a oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to. So ikaro no tao a somavasavak nya.

language1_text: And all that believed were together, and had all things common;
language2_text: So ikatey yapya da no yamraralay ni Yeso a tao do kapeyyangangay da so onowned. So ikamimin da ji beywan do kangangay da do kadwan jira,

language1_text: and sold their possessions and goods, and parted them to all men, as every man had need.
language2_text: kapanazang da no iheyhakaw da kano kangangay da do vahay da a kavonong da so nginangina na nizpi a itoro do kadwan jira. To da palololwa o itoro da do ikasi da tao.

language1_text: And they, continuing daily with one accord in the temple, and breaking bread from house to house, did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart,
language2_text: So ipangday da mangay a malwalovot do rako a panaralayan a meyyangangay so nakenakem. So ikasasaray da no onowned a koman so pang do kavahayan da. So icyakman da sang a mahahanghang do kanen da,

language1_text: praising God, and having favour with all the people. And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved.
language2_text: kazwazway da si Ama ta do to. So ikaro no tao a manci no kapiya no icicirawat da. Am ori o nipangday da do araraw a meyparo no tao a omanoyong ji Yeso.

language1_text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer, being the ninth hour.
language2_text: Ipisa do ikatlo na vatvatek do makoyab am nimangay si Pite a kani Yowani do rako a panaralayan, ta ori o vatvatek no toki a ipeyneynozi da.

language1_text: And a certain man lame from his mother's womb was carried, whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful, to ask alms of them that entered into the temple;
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tao a mapilay nimakalapo no kalyalikey na. Mangday do araraw o kangay da nya do ngaranan da so Apiya pazezevngen a ngoso no rako a panaralayan a macyami do somdep do rako a panaralayan.

language1_text: who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms.
language2_text: Macita na sira Pite a kani Yowani a somdep am pacyamyan na sira.

language1_text: And Peter, fastening his eyes upon him with John, said, Look on us.
language2_text: Pacimatan da kapanci na nya ni Pite so, "Cita pala yamen."

language1_text: And he gave heed unto them, expecting to receive something of them.
language2_text: So nicittan na sira a komakzeb so kapantan da nya.

language1_text: Then Peter said, Silver and gold have I none; but such as I have give I thee: In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Pite am, "Yabo jyamen o nizpi. Am itoro ko jimo o yamyan jyaken an. Ko pangozayan o ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto a tao do Nasale a manci nimo a tomanek a kalam mo rana."

language1_text: And he took him by the right hand, and lifted him up: and immediately his feet and ankle bones received strength.
language2_text: So nikatkatan na sya ni Pite so wanan na do lima na kasidong na sya meytatanek. So niyan no oyowyat na rana no ai na,

language1_text: And he leaping up stood, and walked, and entered with them into the temple, walking, and leaping, and praising God.
language2_text: a kapeytatanek na omalam rana a kapacihza na rana jira a somdep do rako a panaralayan a to nonoto a somaray nya ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God:
language2_text: Macita da no aro a tao a makakalam rana a somaray nya ji Ama ta do to am

language1_text: and they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple: and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him.
language2_text: kasingkadan da rana a nimacyacyami do ngoso no rako a panaralayan. Am ori o nipeyzokaban da nya.

language1_text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John, all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon's, greatly wondering.
language2_text: No keyyan da rana do macinapnap do rako a panaralayan a ngaranan da so Vahay na ni Solomen am macikalay ji Pite a kani Yowani o nimapya rana so ai a tao ang. Aro tao a meypalalayo a mangay amlimot sira malak nya.

language1_text: And when Peter saw it, he answered unto the people, Ye men of Israel, why marvel ye at this? or why look ye so earnestly on us, as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk?
language2_text: Macita na ni Pite o aro a tao am maniring jira am, "Inyo rana a keylyan ko a Isedi a tao am ikongo nyo kalakan no akman sya vazay ang. Ikongo nyo to nitai jyamen. Nyo ipanci a oyowyat namen am kakdekdeng namen o yaniomiwakwak do tao eya?

language1_text: The God of Abraham, and of Isaac, and of Jacob, the God of our fathers, hath glorified his Son Jesus; whom ye delivered up, and denied him in the presence of Pilate, when he was determined to let him go.
language2_text: Beken a yamen ori. Ta si Ama ta do to a yada iraralay no ineynapo ta si Apolahan a kani Isa kani Yakebo o niomiwakwak jya. So ikanoyong na mazway ni Yeso. Iya rana am nitoro nyo do aro a panipanirsirngen a karaherahet nyo sya do tangain ni Pilato. Pasawain na ni Pilato am ji nyo mya.

language1_text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just, and desired a murderer to be granted unto you;
language2_text: Apyapyahen nyo pa o kalikod nyo do ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao a kapyapya nyo pa sya manci ni Pilato a mapasaway so asa ka nimanwakwak a tao.

language1_text: and killed the Prince of life, whom God hath raised from the dead; whereof we are witnesses.
language2_text: Am ori o nizakatan nyo si Yeso a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad. Am kanimapeyvangon na sya ni Ama ta do to. Yamen rana am yongkad na yamen a nimakacita sya.

language1_text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong, whom ye see and know: yea, the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all.
language2_text: Namen nipangozayan o ngaran na ni Yeso. Ori o na nikapya no tao a yanyo macita do nyo tangain ang.

language1_text: And now, brethren, I wot that through ignorance ye did it, as did also your rulers.
language2_text: "Am inyo rana manga keypong am nyo nizakat si Yeso. Am nyo jyatenngi ori a nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to. Tana panipanirsirngen nyo am akman sira so sang a ji makateneng jya.

language1_text: But those things, which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets, that Christ should suffer, he hath so fulfilled.
language2_text: No kakwa pa am nipanci na rana ni Ama ta do to do aro a panoyonoywan na so ciring o kapaziman da si Yeso a pakakasi nyo. Am yana nipangononongan sicyaikwaya o akman sang.

language1_text: Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord;
language2_text: Am ori o ipamlis nyo rana somazap si Ama ta do to. Ta ori o ivonas na so raraten nyo.

language1_text: and he shall send Jesus Christ, which before was preached unto you:
language2_text: Ta ipanta na inyo so vayo a ikasaray no onowned nyo. Ta yarana nimai si Yeso a Misayya a nitovoy ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things, which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began.
language2_text: Am to ngyan pa do teyngato si Yeso a mangay no si yavaywen ni Ama ta do to o makakaday amyan do teyrahem eya. Ta oya rana am nipanci ni Ama ta do to no kakwa pa do panoyonoywan na so ciring na.

language1_text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers, A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you.
language2_text: Ta nipanci na pa ni Moyse am, 'Si Ama ta do to a Tao do to nyo am amyan so pamnekan na keylyan ta Isedi a panoyonoywan na so ciring na akman jyaken a nipamnekan na meylimwang nya jinyo. O ipanci na jinyo a ciring na am ahapen nyo an.

language1_text: And it shall come to pass, that every soul, which will not hear that prophet, shall be destroyed from among the people.
language2_text: O ji ngamizing so panoyonoywan na so ciring am pasyain na jyaten a balinasen ni Ama ta do to.'"

language1_text: Yea, and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after, as many as have spoken, have likewise foretold of these days.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Pite am, "Tana si Samoar a kano yamapalipalit a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to am nimamimin da rana nipanci o akman sya vazay sicyaraw eya.

language1_text: Ye are the children of the prophets, and of the covenant which God made with our fathers, saying unto Abraham, And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed.
language2_text: Yaten o mahap so nipanci da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a kano nipanci na ji Apolahan. Ta maniring am, 'Mamnek ko do sivosivovoong mo so asa ka tao a tomeneng a mapeypapya so tao do karawan.'

language1_text: Unto you first God, having raised up his Son Jesus, sent him to bless you, in turning away every one of you from his iniquities.
language2_text: Am ori o panmanman na jyaten a tao do Yotay a tovoyan na si Yeso a somidong jyaten a ikaro ta do marahet a icicirawat ta."

language1_text: And as they spake unto the people, the priests, and the captain of the temple, and the Sadducees, came upon them,
language2_text: No kapangnanao da pa ni Pite a kani Yowani do aro a tao am to sira ngai o mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano panirsirngen da no mamzamzat do rako a panaralayan a kano tao a macyagom do Satokay.

language1_text: being grieved that they taught the people, and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead.
language2_text: Meyoyaoya sira makamizing sya, ta ipangnanao da Pite a kani Yowani o kanimirwa na mavyay ni Yeso. Ta si Yeso am yongkad no kanoyong no nimawakwak rana tao a mirwa a mavyay.

language1_text: And they laid hands on them, and put them in hold unto the next day: for it was now eventide.
language2_text: Am ori o nirakpan da sira kapasdep da sira do pamemtengan mangay do ikadwa na araw, ta makoyab rana.

language1_text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed; and the number of the men was about five thousand.
language2_text: Am no kanang am aro tao a niomanoyong do nipangnanao da Pite. O vilang da no mahakay am kakaliman a ranaw (5000).

language1_text: And it came to pass on the morrow, that their rulers, and elders, and scribes,
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am o kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a kano karwan da no panipanirsirngen da am meylovolovot sira do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: and Annas the high priest, and Caiaphas, and John, and Alexander, and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest, were gathered together at Jerusalem.
language2_text: O rako a panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a meyngaran si Annase a kani Keyava kani Yowani a kani Yadisanta kano zipos na mahakay ni Annase am amyan sira do dang.

language1_text: And when they had set them in the midst, they asked, By what power, or by what name, have ye done this?
language2_text: Nyangay da sira Pite a kani Yowani do tangain da a kapacici da sira. Maniring sira am, "Do wanjin na kapwan no oyowyat nyo a yaniomiwakwak do nimapilay a tao ang. Sino yanimanta ninyo so oyowyat nyo."

language1_text: Then Peter, filled with the Holy Ghost, said unto them, Ye rulers of the people, and elders of Israel,
language2_text: No kanang rana am oyatan no Seyzi si Pite. Am ori o nipancyan na no, "Inyo rana panipanirsirngen namen a kano kamanrarakehan am,

language1_text: if we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man, by what means he is made whole;
language2_text: no si myan jinyo so mapacici jyamen sicyaraw eya do namen kanimapeypapya so nimapilay a tao ori am

language1_text: be it known unto you all, and to all the people of Israel, that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth, whom ye crucified, whom God raised from the dead, even by him doth this man stand here before you whole.
language2_text: naknakmen nyo a Isedi a tao an. O na nipeytatanek do tangain nyo no tao eya a nimapya rana am oyowyat no ngaran na ni Yeso a tao do Nasale a nipadket nyo do jyojika a nipirwa na avyain ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders, which is become the head of the corner.
language2_text: O ciring do Seysyo no kakwa a omagaz ji Yeso am, 'O Vato a niwalit da no mapatnek so vahay am meyvoga am ney makdeng na aslet no ai no vahay.'

language1_text: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
language2_text: Si Yeso o mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato. So ikabwata no ikararwa na do karawan a nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to a mapatazadang jyaten."

language1_text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men, they marvelled; and they took knowledge of them, that they had been with Jesus.
language2_text: Macita da no panipanirsirngen do peykeykaygyan si Pite a kani Yowani a mowyat so onowned am manakem da rana sira todna ka tao a jya nimeyvatvatek. Am ori o nipeyzokaban da nira. Meyratateng am katovilan da rana sira nimacilocilolo ji Yeso.

language1_text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them, they could say nothing against it.
language2_text: Am ori o ji da rana tenngi a meyzezyak, ta macita da o nipeypapya da so ai a meytatanek do tangain da.

language1_text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council, they conferred among themselves,
language2_text: To da na mancyan sira makowbot do rako a peykeykaygyan a kapeysirsiring da rana no panipanirsirngen.

language1_text: saying, What shall we do to these men? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem; and we cannot deny it.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Kongwen ta sira ya, ta o meyvahay rana do Yelosaleng a tao am da katenngan sira yamapeyzokab so vazay. So ikabo no omalalas so sang a tao.

language1_text: But that it spread no further among the people, let us straitly threaten them, that they speak henceforth to no man in this name.
language2_text: Marahet si meyparo tao a makateneng do akman sang a vazay. Apyapya o kalalaw ta sira, kaji da makadketan do ngaran ni Yeso a ipeylimwang do tao."

language1_text: And they called them, and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus.
language2_text: Am ori o nitawagan da jira mai a kalalaw da sira a manci nya jira so kaji da mangnanawan no ngaran ni Yeso a ipamizing so tao.

language1_text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them, Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God, judge ye.
language2_text: Am maniring si Pite a kani Yowani am, "Do tangain ni Ama ta do to am amizngen namen o ciring nyo an? Ano amizngen namen o ciring ni Ama ta do to. Naknakmen nyo pala.

language1_text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard.
language2_text: Jyabo kaji namen mancyan no namen nimacita kano namen nimamizing a."

language1_text: So when they had further threatened them, they let them go, finding nothing how they might punish them, because of the people: for all men glorified God for that which was done.
language2_text: Meyratateng am peyparowen da o ciring da yalalaw da sira kapasaway da rana sira. Ta ji da kala o karatan da, a macyoman pa o kanyahey da no aro a tao ang a somaray nya ji Ama ta do to, do mapeyzokab a vazay na do nimapilay ang.

language1_text: For the man was above forty years old, on whom this miracle of healing was shewed.
language2_text: O kakawakawan na no nimapilay a tao ori am to ngyan so ikasikalima (50) no awawan na ang.

language1_text: And being let go, they went to their own company, and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them.
language2_text: Pasawain da si Pite a kani Yowani am mangay rana sira do kararay da omraralay ni Yeso a tao a manci no mina ciring da jira no panipanirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kamanrarakehan.

language1_text: And when they heard that, they lifted up their voice to God with one accord, and said, Lord, thou art God, which hast made heaven, and earth, and the sea, and all that in them is:
language2_text: Mamizing da am malovot sira meynozi ji Ama ta do to. Maniring sira am, "Mo Panirsirngen a nimangamamaog so hanit a kano teyrahem a kano awa kano meycyamadadayan,

language1_text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said, Why did the heathen rage, And the people imagine vain things?
language2_text: si Tawey rana ineynapo namen a nimahap so vazay mo am nioyatan mo no Seyzi a manci no, 'Ikongo isozi da no beken a tao do Yotay. Ikongo pakanakman da so vazay a yabo so peypeypangayan.

language1_text: The kings of the earth stood up, And the rulers were gathered togetherAgainst the Lord, and against his Christ.
language2_text: O kabtekan a panirsirngen rana do teyrahem a kano karwan da panipanirsirngen am malovot sira amnakenakem so kazazat da ji Ama ta do to a kano Misayya.'

language1_text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus, whom thou hast anointed, both Herod, and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles, and the people of Israel, were gathered together,
language2_text: So nipangononong no nang a mina vazay da do Yelosaleng eya. Ta si Helote rana kani Pangsyo Pilato a kano karwan da tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay am nimalovot sira nimnakenakem so kazakat da si Yeso a ji meylimoteng so onowned a nipamnekan mo a mahap so vazay mo.

language1_text: for to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done.
language2_text: Da pangononongan o mina ciring mo a omagaz do nipamnemnekan mo.

language1_text: And now, Lord, behold their threatenings: and grant unto thy servants, that with all boldness they may speak thy word,
language2_text: Am ori o pakatenngan mo jira so onowned a yaomalalaw jyamen. So sidongan mo jyamen, mo Panirsirngen a mahap so vazay mo a kaji namen a mogawan a meylimwang no ciriciring mo.

language1_text: by stretching forth thine hand to heal; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus.
language2_text: So pacittan mo no oyowyat mo a mangiwakwak so ingingnen no tao a keyyan no mapeyzokab a vazay namen a mangozay do ngaran ni Yeso a nipamnekan mo a mahap so vazay mo."

language1_text: And when they had prayed, the place was shaken where they were assembled together; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and they spake the word of God with boldness.
language2_text: Mateyka sira meynozi am todagoyogoyon o peynozyan da a kamimin da nioyatan no Seyzi. Ori o nikowyat da a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ori ji da rana mogawi.

language1_text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul: neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own; but they had all things common.
language2_text: Omraralay rana ni Yeso a tao am meyyangangay o onowned da. So ikabo no asa ka tao a maveyvow do kangangay na, ta akma dey todalovoci apzapzatan.

language1_text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus: and great grace was upon them all.
language2_text: O nipamnekan na rana ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na am mowyat sira meylimwang no mina kapirwa na ni Yeso a mavyay. So nisidongan na sira ni Ama ta do to so omraralay nya tao.

language1_text: Neither was there any among them that lacked: for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them, and brought the prices of the things that were sold,
language2_text: So ikabo no asa ka tao amyan so kalahen. Ta o myan so iheyhakawan a kano vahay am nipamalit da so nizpi o karwan na.

language1_text: and laid them down at the apostles' feet: and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need.
language2_text: O nipalit da nizpi am nyangay da do nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na a kavonong da sya. To da palololwa do ikeykasi da tao o kavonongan na.

language1_text: And Joses, who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas, (which is, being interpreted, The son of consolation, ) a Levite, and of the country of Cyprus,
language2_text: Akman sang o vazay na no asa ka Diwey a tao do Saypolose a pongso a meyngaran so Yoseyvo. O ingaran da jya no nipamnekan na ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na am si Parnapo. O peypeypangayan no ngaran na ori am "Mapayyait so nakenakem."

language1_text: having land, sold it, and brought the money, and laid it at the apostles' feet.
language2_text: Ta nipamalit na o asa ka nihakawan na so nizpi a katoro na nya do nipamnekan na ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: But a certain man named Ananias, with Sapphira his wife, sold a possession,
language2_text: Am amyan so asa ka tao a meyngaran si Ananiya kano mavakes na meyngaran so Saveyla. Sira rana am nipamalit da so nizpi o nihakawan da.

language1_text: and kept back part of the price, his wife also being privy to it, and brought a certain part, and laid it at the apostles' feet.
language2_text: Nipeysirisiring da na meyyaven do vahay o kavezed da so katey no nizpi. O mapanpan am ori o nitoro ni Ananiya jira do nipamnekan na ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: But Peter said, Ananias, why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost, and to keep back part of the price of the land?
language2_text: Maniring jya si Pite am, "Mo Ananiya, ikongo mo apyan si Satan a yamapasala so onowned mo a yaomalalas do Seyzi, do mo katayo so katey no nizpi a ngina no nihakawan nyo.

language1_text: Whiles it remained, was it not thine own? and after it was sold, was it not in thine own power? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart? thou hast not lied unto men, but unto God.
language2_text: No kaji nyo pa macinginanginan no nihakawan nyo am inyo an o tomalamozong nya. Am nyo ipamalit rana so nizpi am inyo saon o maponged nya am. Am ikongo nakenakem mo ya. Beken a mo alalasan o tao an, ta mo alalasan si Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down, and gave up the ghost: and great fear came on all them that heard these things.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Ananiya o ciring ni Pite am mavazakwang a kawakwak na. So nikamogaw da no tao a makamizing sya.

language1_text: And the young men arose, wound him up, and carried him out, and buried him.
language2_text: Meyratateng am pongosan da rana o kataotao na no milakayob no malalavayo a mahakay a kangay da rana nya ibobo.

language1_text: And it was about the space of three hours after, when his wife, not knowing what was done, came in.
language2_text: Hatasen na o ikatlo na vatvatek am mai rana o mavakes na. Am ji na tenngi pa o vazay ang.

language1_text: And Peter answered unto her, Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much? And she said, Yea, for so much.
language2_text: Maniring jya si Pite am, "Manoyong ya karwaro no ngina no nihakawan nyo?" Maniring am, "Noon, manoyong ori."

language1_text: Then Peter said unto her, How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord? behold, the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door, and shall carry thee out.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Ikongo nakenakem nyo. Nyo kalalas do Seyzi ni Ama ta do to. Manngwa, 'Abo oyyan na nyamen ni Ama ta do to,' kwan nyo? Cita pala o yanimbobo no mahakay mo a yakai pa. So ikakman mo sang a yangay da ibobo."

language1_text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet, and yielded up the ghost: and the young men came in, and found her dead, and, carrying her forth, buried her by her husband.
language2_text: Karahan am mavazakwang rana a mawakwak o mavakes ang. Somdep sira o malalavayo a tao a tomita sya am nimawakwak rana kahap da sya ipakowbot a mangay ibobo do katangked no mahakay na.

language1_text: And great fear came upon all the church, and upon as many as heard these things.
language2_text: Mamizing da ori no omraralay ni Yeso a kano karwan no tao am tey maonib sira.

language1_text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people; (and they were all with one accord in Solomon's porch.
language2_text: Aro mapeyzokab a vazay da no nipamnekan na ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na a nimacita da no taotao. Mangday sira so araraw o omraralay ni Yeso a malwalovot do macinapnap do rako a panaralayan a ngaranan da so Vahay na ni Solomen.

language1_text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them: but the people magnified them.
language2_text: Ikanig da sira no tao do Yelosaleng. Am ji dadkeci no tao o kapacivaoy da jira.

language1_text: And believers were the more added to the Lord, multitudes both of men and women.)
language2_text: Am nimeyparo sira omanoyong ji Yeso a mavakes a kano mahakay a macirapa jira.

language1_text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets, and laid them on beds and couches, that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them.
language2_text: Macita da o mapeyzokab a vazay da no nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na am ori o nyangayan da no meykeyngeyngen a tao do ireyrayan da kapangay da sira do siri no rarahan. Ta tana avwavong na pa ni Pite a mangay jira am anoyngan da o kapya da.

language1_text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem, bringing sick folks, and them which were vexed with unclean spirits: and they were healed every one.
language2_text: Amyan so aro a tao a meyvahay do peycyeylilyan na masngen do Yelosaleng a nimai no meykeyngeyngen a tao a kano nikovotan no kalamsoyan ni Satan a tao a kamimin da nimapya rana.

language1_text: Then the high priest rose up, and all they that were with him, (which is the sect of the Sadducees, ) and were filled with indignation,
language2_text: O rako a panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kararay na macyagom do Satokay am ikeynanahet da sira o nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: and laid their hands on the apostles, and put them in the common prison.
language2_text: Am ori o nirakpan da sira kaneb da jira do pamemtengan.

language1_text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors, and brought them forth, and said,
language2_text: Mahep rana am amyan so tinsi ni Ama ta do to a nimiwang do pamemtengan a kapalolo na sira makowbot. Maniring jira am,

language1_text: Go, stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life.
language2_text: "Mangay kamo do rako a panaralayan a meylimwang nya do taotao so omagaz do to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad."

language1_text: And when they heard that, they entered into the temple early in the morning, and taught. But the high priest came, and they that were with him, and called the council together, and all the senate of the children of Israel, and sent to the prison to have them brought.
language2_text: Madagdag rana am somdep sira do rako a panaralayan a mangnanao. Meyratateng am o rako a panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to a kano kararay na am lovoten da sira o kamanrarakehan da no tao do Yotay a kapanovoy da so tao a mai no amyan do pamemtengan a nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: But when the officers came, and found them not in the prison, they returned, and told,
language2_text: Am makaranes sira dang am abo rana sira. Am ori o nipeyoli da rana a mangay manci nya do aro a tao do rako a peykeykaygyan.

language1_text: saying, The prison truly found we shut with all safety, and the keepers standing without before the doors: but when we had opened, we found no man within.
language2_text: Maniring sira am, "Namen makaranes do pamemtengan am namen macita o pangengneban na yamakagi. O mamzamzat am yamyan do pantaw na. Namen iwangan am sira abo rana o tao do sahad na."

language1_text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things, they doubted of them whereunto this would grow.
language2_text: Mamizing da no panirsirngen da no mamzamzat do rako a panaralayan a kano panipanirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am ikarahet da, ta ji da tenngi o nyangayan da no nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: Then came one and told them, saying, Behold, the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple, and teaching the people.
language2_text: Am keyyan no asa ka tao a nimai a manci nya jira. Maniring am, "O nyo nyaneban a tao am sira mangnanao so tao do rako a panaralayan."

language1_text: Then went the captain with the officers, and brought them without violence: for they feared the people, lest they should have been stoned.
language2_text: Am ori o nyangay da no mamzamzat a kano panirsirngen da amrakep sira. Am ji da bakbaki sira, ta ikamogaw da o tao. Ta ihawa da sira gomsagseh jira.

language1_text: And when they had brought them, they set them before the council: and the high priest asked them,
language2_text: Pasdepen da sira do rako a peykeykaygyan a kapatanek da sira do tangain da kapacici na sira no rako a panirsirngen no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: saying, Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name? and, behold, ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine, and intend to bring this man's blood upon us.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Namen nipaziman jinyo o kaji nyo mangnanawan no omagaz ji Yeso am ikongo nyo pangnanawan pa nya do Yelosaleng. Ikongo nyo pancyan nyamen a nimwakwak sya."

language1_text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite a kano kararay na nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na am, "Jyabo kaji namen ngamizngan si Ama ta do to a. Ta amizngan namen so tao.

language1_text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus, whom ye slew and hanged on a tree.
language2_text: Si Yeso rana nipadket nyo do jyojika niwakwak nyo am yana rana nivyay no Tao do to da no ineynapo ta.

language1_text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour, for to give repentance to Israel, and forgiveness of sins.
language2_text: So na rana iyan do wanan na ni Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta a yamapatazadang jyaten do teyngato. Na kakzeben yaten a Isedi a tao a mamlis so nakenakem, ta ori o ivonas na so raraten ta.

language1_text: And we are his witnesses of these things; and so is also the Holy Ghost, whom God hath given to them that obey him.
language2_text: Am ori o namen peylimwangan no akman sya vazay. Ta yamen a kano Seyzi o yongkad na. Ta o Seyzi rana am na itoro ni Ama ta do to a macikaop do mahap so ciriciring na tao."

language1_text: When they heard that, they were cut to the heart, and took counsel to slay them.
language2_text: Mamizing da no panipanirsirngen am somozi sira. Am ori o ninaknakman da so kazakat da sira.

language1_text: Then stood there up one in the council, a Pharisee, named Gamaliel, a doctor of the law, had in reputation among all the people, and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space;
language2_text: Am amyan so kararay da meyngaran si Cyamadi. Iya rana am tao a macyagom do Vadisay a mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to. Iya rana am ikanig da no tao. To rana meytatanek si Cyamadi a manci no tao a mapowbot so nipamnekan na ni Yeso.

language1_text: and said unto them, Ye men of Israel, take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men.
language2_text: Maniring jira am, "Inyo rana Isedi a tao am pakapyahen ta o ahahapan ta sira ya.

language1_text: For before these days rose up Theudas, boasting himself to be somebody; to whom a number of men, about four hundred, joined themselves: who was slain; and all, as many as obeyed him, were scattered, and brought to nought.
language2_text: Ta no keypisa am amyan so tao a nimai a meyngaran si Teota a mapakarakarang so kataotao na kapacilolo da no kakapatan a poo (400) a tao. Am wakwaken da si Teota am to sira na meyvwak o nimacilocilolo jya tao, kabo na rana no angangayan na.

language1_text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing, and drew away much people after him: he also perished; and all, even as many as obeyed him, were dispersed.
language2_text: Meyratateng am amyan so asa ka tao do Cyadidi a meyngaran so Yota. No kano nang am ahapen no seyvo o vilavilang no tao do peycyeylilyan na. Aro nilittan na tao a macihza jya. Am wakwaken da am to sira na meyvwak o macilocilolo jya tao.

language1_text: And now I say unto you, Refrain from these men, and let them alone: for if this counsel or this work be of men, it will come to nought:
language2_text: O ko ipanci jinyo sicyaikwaya am to tamo macipanadngi sira. To ta na pasawaya sira. No si apo do tao o vazay da am to meycyabobo rana.

language1_text: but if it be of God, ye cannot overthrow it; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God.
language2_text: Am no apo ji Ama ta do to am jyabo kapakaharag ta sira a. Ta o vazay ta rana am ta akmey to maciliman ji Ama ta do to." So nyamizngan da so ciring na ni Cyamadi.

language1_text: And to him they agreed: and when they had called the apostles, and beaten them, they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go.
language2_text: Karahan am pasdepen da sira bakbakan, kapanci da nira ji rana meylimwang no ngaran ni Yeso a kapasaway da rana sira.

language1_text: And they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.
language2_text: Karwan da o rako a peykeykaygyan am masaray sira. Ta nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to o karahet da sira a meyhanhan ni Yeso.

language1_text: And daily in the temple, and in every house, they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Mangday so araraw kangay da do rako a panaralayan a kado kavahayan a mangnanao so tao a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring ni Yeso, do kanoyong na Misayya a nitovoy ni Ama ta do to do teyrahem.

language1_text: And in those days, when the number of the disciples was multiplied, there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews, because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration.
language2_text: No kanang rana am meyparo sira omraralay ni Yeso. Am amyan so tao do Yotay a mapeyciring so ciring da no Sila a meyoyaoya. Ta ikarahet da sira o tao do Yotay a mapeyciring so ciring da no Sipolay. Ta ano meyvonong sira so isidong da sira am ji da pa vononga sira o vao a mavakes a meyzezyak so ciring da no tao do Sila.

language1_text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them, and said, It is not reason that we should leave the word of God, and serve tables.
language2_text: Am ori o nilovotan da so aro a sinjya no rarwa so ikakarwan a nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na a kapanci da nya jira so, "Si iptad namen o kapeylimwang namen no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a amvonong so isidong ta so tao am marahet o akman sang, ta ikasanga namen.

language1_text: Wherefore, brethren, look ye out among you seven men of honest report, full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom, whom we may appoint over this business.
language2_text: Am ori o ipamnek nyo so papito a ka tao a katenngan no tao apiya so icicirawat a kano mateneng a oyatan no Seyzi, ta sira rana o to namen rana pahanhana a omvonong sya.

language1_text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer, and to the ministry of the word.
language2_text: Am yamen rana am kasazap namen so kapeynozi a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude: and they chose Stephen, a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost, and Philip, and Prochorus, and Nicanor, and Timon, and Parmenas, and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch:
language2_text: Mamizing da no aro a sinjya am mamimin sira amya sya. Am ori o nipamnekan da ji Setiven, ta meysominogat o nakenakem na ji Ama ta do to a oyatan no Seyzi, a kapamnek da pa ji Veydipo a kani Polokelo a kani Nike a kani Timen a kani Pamona kani Nikela. Si Nikela rana am beken a tao do Yotay, ta tao do Antia a mahap rana so iwawalam da no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: whom they set before the apostles: and when they had prayed, they laid their hands on them.
language2_text: So nipancyan da nira meytatanek do tangain da no nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na a meynozi nira maparapong so lima da jira ipowyat da sira do akman sang a vazay da.

language1_text: And the word of God increased; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith.
language2_text: Am ori o nipeylimwang na rana no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o to da raparapai jira no omanoyong ji Yeso do Yelosaleng a karo da rana. Tana mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to am aro sira omanoyong rana ji Yeso.

language1_text: And Stephen, full of faith and power, did great wonders and miracles among the people.
language2_text: Si Setiven rana am aro mapeyzokab a vazay na do tangain da no tao, ta sidongen na ni Ama ta do to a kowyat na jya no Seyzi.

language1_text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue, which is called the synagogue of the Libertines, and Cyrenians, and Alexandrians, and of them of Cilicia and of Asia, disputing with Stephen.
language2_text: Am amyan so tao a macioya jya a somkad jya. O tatasa jira am tao do Yotay apo do Cidinay a kado Yadisanta. Sira rana am manaralay do ngaranan da so Peyneynozyan da no somaliway rana tao. O karwan da am tao do Yotay apo do Cidicya kado Yasiya.

language1_text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake.
language2_text: Am ji da tenngi a pasapan o ciring ni Setiven, ta nipanta na no Seyzi so teneteneng na.

language1_text: Then they suborned men, which said, We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses, and against God.
language2_text: Am ori o nipeykala da so tao a katoro da jira so nizpi a meykala so karatan na ni Setiven. Maniring sira am, "O tao rana ya am namen nimamizing a yamraherahet si Moyse a kani Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And they stirred up the people, and the elders, and the scribes, and came upon him, and caught him, and brought him to the council,
language2_text: Ori o nisozi da no aro a tao a kano kamanrarakehan a kano mangnanao no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to. Ori o nirakpan da si Setiven a yangay do rako a peykeykaygyan.

language1_text: and set up false witnesses, which said, This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place, and the law:
language2_text: So niyan da do dang no nipanta da so nizpi a tao a mangamaog so malas a ciring a iraherahet da sya. Maniring sira am, "O tao rana ya am yamangday a yamraherahet so rako a panaralayan ta ya kano iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: for we have heard him say, that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place, and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us.
language2_text: O nimamizing namen a nipanci na am si Yeso a tao do Nasale am kavahen na o rako a panaralayan eya, kablis na do iwawalam ni Moyse a nitaid na jyaten."

language1_text: And all that sat in the council, looking stedfastly on him, saw his face as it had been the face of an angel.
language2_text: So nikamimin da no myan do peykeykaygyan a tao a tomita si Setiven. Karahan am macita da o moing na akmey moimoing no tinsi.

language1_text: Then said the high priest, Are these things so?
language2_text: Pacicin no rako a panirsirngen da no mapatanatanang so nakem da si Ama ta do to si Setiven. Maniring sira am, "Manngwa, yamanoyong o na keyyan no akman sang a vazay mo an?"

language1_text: And he said, Men, brethren, and fathers, hearken; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham, when he was in Mesopotamia, before he dwelt in Charran,
language2_text: Pasapan na ni Setiven am, "Manga maran, manga kakteh, amizngen nyo yaken an. No kakwa pa am nimapacita o mazway a si Ama ta do to ji Apolahan no keyyan na pa do Meysopotamiya a meypanam pa a meyvahay do Alan a ili.

language1_text: and said unto him, Get thee out of thy country, and from thy kindred, and come into the land which I shall shew thee.
language2_text: Maniring jya am, 'Karwan mo o ili nyo a kano apapnan mo a mangay do tovoyan ko jimo an.'

language1_text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldæ ans, and dwelt in Charran: and from thence, when his father was dead, he removed him into this land, wherein ye now dwell.
language2_text: Am ori o nikarwan na jya ni Apolahan do Cyaloti a pongso a kangay na meyvahay do Alan. Mawakwak si ama na am ori o nyangay na rana do meyngongyod a tovoyan na sya ni Ama ta do to, do ili ta ya.

language1_text: And he gave him none inheritance in it, no, not so much as to set his foot on: yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession, and to his seed after him, when as yet he had no child.
language2_text: No kanang am abo pa nitoro na jya ni Ama ta do to a iheyhakaw na. Am nipanci na pa jya ni Ama ta do to no kakwa am itoro na jya o ili ta ya a lisanan da no apwapo na. Am no kanang am abo pa o anak na ni Apolahan.

language1_text: And God spake on this wise, That his seed should sojourn in a strange land; and that they should bring them into bondage, and entreat them evil four hundred years.
language2_text: Maniring pa jya si Ama ta do to am, 'O sivosivovoong mo am meyvahay sira do teysa ka mahataw an, a kapeylamlamsoy da sira dang a peyrarehten so sikapat a poo (400) so awawan.

language1_text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge, said God: and after that shall they come forth, and serve me in this place.
language2_text: Am pasingsingtan ko sira o mapeylamlamsoy sira a tao do teysa ka mahataw a kakaro da rana do dang a meysinaoli do jya kararalay da nyaken.'

language1_text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision: and so Abraham begat Isaac, and circumcised him the eighth day; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs.
language2_text: Meyratateng am ipanci na ni Ama ta do to ji Apolahan o keyyan na no yongkad na jira do ananak na mahakay, do kaji da makahamangan do nipanci na jira ni Ama ta do to. Am matazak a tao si Isa am niyongkadan na o kataotao na do ikawao na pa araw. Akman sang vazay ni Isa do anak na si Yakebo. Akman sahang o vazay na ni Yakebo do rarwa so ikakarwan a ananak na mahakay a ineynapo ta tao do Yotay no kakwa."

language1_text: And the patriarchs, moved with envy, sold Joseph into Egypt: but God was with him,
language2_text: Maniring pa si Setiven am, "Asa do anak ni Yakebo a meyngaran so Yoseyvo am nikeynanahet da no kakakteh na. Am ori o nipanazangan da nya do tao do Ayci. Am mina kapzat na jya ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: and delivered him out of all his afflictions, and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house.
language2_text: do meycyamadadayan a kanginanawan na. Nipanta na ni Ama ta do to so teneteneng na. Am ori o nikakza na nya no rako a panirsirngen da do Ayci a meyngaran so Valaw. Am ori o nipamnekan na nya tomonton jya meypanirsirngen do Ayci a tomalamozong no kangangay na kano kanekanen na.

language1_text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan, and great affliction: and our fathers found no sustenance.
language2_text: "Mownay am meykabcil do Ayci a kado Cyanan a pongso. Am ori o nikaro no alalaw da no ineynapo ta, ta abo rana o kanekanen da do Cyanan.

language1_text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt, he sent out our fathers first.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Yakebo o kabsoy da no Ayci am tovoin na sira o anak na a ineynapo ta mangay do Ayci. Ori am ikeypisa da pa ori a yanimangay.

language1_text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren; and Joseph's kindred was made known unto Pharaoh.
language2_text: Ipidwa so kangay da am ipanci na ni Yoseyvo o kataotao na da kakakteh na. Ori o nipakatenngan na rana ni Valaw do kakakteh na ni Yoseyvo.

language1_text: Then sent Joseph, and called his father Jacob to him, and all his kindred, threescore and fifteen souls.
language2_text: So nipanovoy na so tao ni Yoseyvo a manci ni ama na kano aro a zipozipos da mai do Ayci. O nimai a apapnan na am lalima o ikasikawao da (75).

language1_text: So Jacob went down into Egypt, and died, he, and our fathers,
language2_text: Am ori o nyai da rana do Ayci a meyvahay a kato da wakwakan do dang ni Yakebo a kano ananak na a ineynapo ta.

language1_text: and were carried over into Sychem, and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem.
language2_text: Mownay am anaten da o totowang da yangay do Secyan a ili do ninginangina na ni Apolahan a heseb no kakwa pa do ananak na ni Hamo.

language1_text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh, which God had sworn to Abraham, the people grew and multiplied in Egypt,
language2_text: "Toda jyarateng o mina ciring na ni Ama ta do to ji Apolahan am nisomaod sira o ineynapo ta do dang.

language1_text: Till another king arose, which knew not Joseph.
language2_text: No kanang rana am amyan so nimacipalit a vayo a panirsirngen no tao do Ayci. Am ji na pa nimamizing si Yoseyvo no kakwa pa.

language1_text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred, and evil entreated our fathers, so that they cast out their young children, to the end they might not live.
language2_text: Am ori o nikarahet na no niyokodan na no ineynapo ta a peyrarehten. Ipanci na o kapipowa da no anak da kawakwak da.

language1_text: In which time Moses was born, and was exceeding fair, and nourished up in his father's house three months:
language2_text: No kanang rana am nimatazak a tao si Moyse. Apiya o kamahamahakay na. Ikatlo na vehan am nitayo da do vahay da a peyveyveknen.

language1_text: and when he was cast out, Pharaoh's daughter took him up, and nourished him for her own son.
language2_text: Marateng rana o araraw no nipasazokaw da sya am macita na no mavakes a anak na ni Valaw. Am ori o nyahapan na sya azwazovwen a kabnek na sya anak na.

language1_text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians, and was mighty in words and in deeds.
language2_text: So ninanawan da sya no iwawalam da do Ayci. So ikateneng na mapehtaw so ciring a mateneng do ahahapan na so vazay na.

language1_text: And when he was full forty years old, it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel.
language2_text: "Sikapat a ngarnan (40) o kakawakawan ni Moyse am naknakmen na o kangay na tomita so keylyan na Isedi a tao.

language1_text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong, he defended him, and avenged him that was oppressed, and smote the Egyptian:
language2_text: Makaranes am to na cita o asa ka keylyan da ji dasnesnekan no tao do Ayci. Am ori o nyangay na mabong no keylyan na, kazakat na so tao do Ayci.

language1_text: for he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them: but they understood not.
language2_text: O nakenakem na ni Moyse am, 'Ala katenngan da yaken no keylyan namen a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a makasidong sira do peyrarehten da sira no tao do Ayci.' Am ji da tenngi ori no keylyan da.

language1_text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove, and would have set them at one again, saying, Sirs, ye are brethren; why do ye wrong one to another?
language2_text: Ikadwa na araw am macita na o rarwa ka keylyan da meyliman. Am ori o nipeyyawwan na sira. Maniring jira am, 'Manga kahakay, inyo rana am kamo meykeylyan. Ikongo nyo ipeyliman.'

language1_text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us?
language2_text: Am o mapeymetdeh so kararay na am nimapadondon si Moyse. Maniring jya am, 'Sino nimanci nimo a yamyokod nyamen.

language1_text: Wilt thou kill me, as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday?
language2_text: Mo zakaten yaken a akman so nizakat mo no kakyab a asa ka tao do Ayci?'

language1_text: Then fled Moses at this saying, and was a stranger in the land of Madian, where he begat two sons.
language2_text: Mamizing na ni Moyse am malalayo a komaro rana do Ayci a mangay meyvahay rana do Miteyang a ili, kapeytaodtod na dang so rarwa ka mahakay.

language1_text: And when forty years were expired, there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush.
language2_text: "Mahatas rana o sikapat a ngarnan (40) awawan am mangay si Moyse do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a meyngaran so Sinay a tokon. So nipakacita na dang so asa ka tinsi amyan do amlila tazici.

language1_text: When Moses saw it, he wondered at the sight: and as he drew near to behold it, the voice of the Lord came unto him,
language2_text: Macita na ori ni Moyse am mina to ogto a kapeypasngen na tomita sya. Karahan am to na amizing o ciring na ni Ama ta do to a manci no,

language1_text: saying, I am the God of thy fathers, the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob. Then Moses trembled, and durst not behold.
language2_text: 'Yaken rana am Tao do to da yaken no ineynapo nyo si Apolahan a kani Isa kani Yakebo.' So nizikzik na ni Moyse a maonib nya. Ori ji na nitomitai sya.

language1_text: Then said the Lord to him, Put off thy shoes from thy feet: for the place where thou standest is holy ground.
language2_text: Maniring pa jya si Ama ta do to am, 'Pakaro o tokap mo, ta o mo peytatankan eya am yako yanan.

language1_text: I have seen, I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt, and I have heard their groaning, and am come down to deliver them. And now come, I will send thee into Egypt.
language2_text: Ko nimacita rana sira o ko yaponged a tao a yamyan do Ayci. Ko nimamizing o da ipasyasi jyaken, do na katey yaro no alalaw da. Am ori o ko ipeygegcin a mapasaway sira do da peyrarehtan sira no tao do Ayci. Ko tovoin imo sicyaikwaya a yamangay omagag sira do Ayci.'

language1_text: This Moses whom they refused, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush.
language2_text: "Si Moyse rana am ji dakzan no keylyan na a somidong sira. Maniring sira am, 'Sino nimamnek jimo a yatomalamozong nyamen.' Am iya rana am nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a amyokod nira a komaro do Ayci, do kanisomidong na sya no tinsi a nimacisirsiring jya do amlila tazici ang.

language1_text: He brought them out, after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt, and in the Red sea, and in the wilderness forty years.
language2_text: Si Moyse o nitomirara so ineynapo ta a komaro do Ayci. So nikaro no mapeyzokab a vazay na, no kaji da pa ngarwan do Ayci a kano kapangonong da do meyngaran so Mabazangbang awa kano keyyan da pa do kabwan no nihakawan no tao so sikapat a ngarnan (40) so awawan.

language1_text: This is that Moses, which said unto the children of Israel, A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear.
language2_text: Si Moyse o nimanci nya do Isedi a tao so, 'No makwa am amyan pa do sivosivovoong nyo so panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a tovoin na jinyo akman jyaken a nitovoy na jinyo a Isedi.'

language1_text: This is he, that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina, and with our fathers: who received the lively oracles to give unto us:
language2_text: Si Moyse o nipacisirsirngan no tinsi do tokon a meyngaran so Sinay, no keyyan da pa no ineynapo ta do kabwan no nihakawan no tao. Iya o torwan na no nivatvatkan a to meyyonong a Ciriciring ni Ama ta do to a nitaid na jyaten.

language1_text: to whom our fathers would not obey, but thrust him from them, and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt,
language2_text: "Am ji da nyamizing si Moyse no ineynapo ta, ta manakem da o kapeysinaoli da pa do Ayci.

language1_text: saying unto Aaron, Make us gods to go before us: for as for this Moses, which brought us out of the land of Egypt, we wot not what is become of him.
language2_text: Amyan pa si Moyse do tokon am nimangay sira do kakteh na a meyngaran so Yalon a manci no, 'Ipamaring mo pa yamen so iraralay namen an, a kapangonong na nyaten do rarahan. Ta namen jyatenngi rana o vazay ni Moyse a niomagag jyaten do Ayci.'

language1_text: And they made a calf in those days, and offered sacrifice unto the idol, and rejoiced in the works of their own hands.
language2_text: So nipamaring da so likta baka a iraralay da a papazosan da, kapamaring da so kanen a somaray no nipariparing da a iraralay da.

language1_text: Then God turned, and gave them up to worship the host of heaven; as it is written in the book of the prophets, O ye house of Israel, have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices By the space of forty years in the wilderness?
language2_text: Am ori o nikarwan na jira ni Ama ta do to, ta ioya na sira a omraralay no mata no hanit akman so nivatvatkan da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a manci no, 'Inyo rana Isedi a tao am nimanzakat kamo so vinyay a ipazos nyo do iraralay nyo no keyyan nyo pa do kabwan no nihakawan no tao so sikapat a ngarnan (40) so awawan. Am beken a yaken o nitorwan nyo nya.

language1_text: Yea, ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch, And the star of your god Remphan, Figures which ye made to worship them: And I will carry you away beyond Babylon.
language2_text: Nipalolo nyo o vahay no iraralay nyo a meyngaran so Molo a kano akmey mata no hanit a meyngaran so Layvan. Niparing nyo sira ori a iraralay nyo. Am ori o angayan ko ninyo do Papilon a ili.'"

language1_text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness, as he had appointed, speaking unto Moses, that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Setiven am, "No kanang na am amyan so vilad a niparing da a panaralayan da no ineynapo ta. Ori rana am inarahen da o niyokodan na ni Moyse ni Ama ta do to, ipakateneng da do kaji na ngarwan jira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles, whom God drave out before the face of our fathers, unto the days of David;
language2_text: Macipalit rana si Jyesoya ji Moyse am palolwen da rana o nipariparing da panaralayan da a yangay do ili ta ya. Nibalinas da sira o beken a tao do Yotay, ta nisidong na sira ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o nipakaranes da rana jya. O nipariparing da panaralayan am mangay do araraw no ipeypanirsirngen ni Tawey.

language1_text: who found favour before God, and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob.
language2_text: Nikaglaw na si Tawey ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o nipancyan na nya ni Tawey ji Ama ta do to so kapamaring na so apiya raralayan da nya. Iya rana am niraralay na no kakwa ni Yakebo.

language1_text: But Solomon built him an house.
language2_text: Am ji na mya ni Ama ta do to. Ta o anak na ni Tawey a meyngaran so Solomen am ori o nimakaparing sya.

language1_text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands; as saith the prophet,
language2_text: "Am si Ama ta do to rana am ji meyvahay do nipariparing da no tao a vahay. Ta akman so nivatvatkan no panoyonoywan na so ciring na no kakwa. Maniring am,

language1_text: Heaven is my throne, And earth is my footstool: What house will ye build me? saith the Lord: Or what is the place of my rest?
language2_text: 'O teyngato rana am lisnan ko. O teyrahem rana am pazasagan ko so ai ko. Akman so wanjin paringen nyo a peyvahayan ko a kano peywalaman ko.

language1_text: Hath not my hand made all these things?
language2_text: Yaken saon o nimangamaog so karawan eya am.'"

language1_text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears, ye do always resist the Holy Ghost: as your fathers did, so do ye.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Setiven am, "Inyo rana ji mangap so ciring a tao am kamo meyyangay a kano ji manaralay a tao a ji ngahap so ciriciring ni Ama ta do to. Ta nyo to nginara sira o ineynapo nyo a ji ngahap so Seyzi.

language1_text: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers:
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a ji da nipakakasi no ineynapo nyo an? Yabo. Niwakwak da sira o meylimwang no omanam a mai a Misayya. Iya rana am tey yapya o nakenakem na a omahap so vazay ni Ama ta do to a nipacinginangina nyo a niwakwak nyo.

language1_text: who have received the law by the disposition of angels, and have not kept it.
language2_text: Inyo o nitorwan da nya no tinsi so iwawalam ni Ama ta do to am nyo ji peyvazaya."

language1_text: When they heard these things, they were cut to the heart, and they gnashed on him with their teeth.
language2_text: Mamizing da no panipanirsirngen no tao do Yotay o ciring na ni Setiven am meyoyaoya sira a mangisem.

language1_text: But he, being full of the Holy Ghost, looked up stedfastly into heaven, and saw the glory of God, and Jesus standing on the right hand of God,
language2_text: Am nioyatan no Seyzi si Setiven. Tangarahen na o hanit am macita na o azwazway ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso a meytatanek do wanan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and said, Behold, I see the heavens opened, and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God.
language2_text: Maniring si Setiven am, "Ko macita o teyngato a yameywang. O Nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a tao am yameytatanek do wanan na."

language1_text: Then they cried out with a loud voice, and stopped their ears, and ran upon him with one accord,
language2_text: Amlololos sira somengseng do cicilwan da kakarakararwa da ji Setiven a rakpen,

language1_text: and cast him out of the city, and stoned him: and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man's feet, whose name was Saul.
language2_text: kalolo da sya a yangay do asked no ili da kabhebhes da jya, kazakat na rana. O nitorwan da so nizpi a tao a mangamaog so karatan na ni Setiven am nitoro da o talili da do asa ka malavayo a tao a meyngaran si Sawlo a citahen na a kapacyangay da a ombhebhes jya.

language1_text: And they stoned Stephen, calling upon God, and saying, Lord Jesus, receive my spirit.
language2_text: Abhebhesan da si Setiven am meynozi. Maniring am, "Mo Yeso, Panirsirngen ko, ahapen mo o pahad ko an,"

language1_text: And he kneeled down, and cried with a loud voice, Lord, lay not this sin to their charge. And when he had said this, he fell asleep.
language2_text: a kapeylilitod na amlolos. Maniring am, "Mo Panirsirngen, ji mo naknakma o raraten da jyaken an." Teyka na ipanci am mawakwak rana.

language1_text: And Saul was consenting unto his death. And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judæ a and Samaria, except the apostles. And devout men carried Stephen to his burial, and made great lamentation over him. As for Saul, he made havock of the church, entering into every house, and haling men and women committed them to prison.
language2_text: Yamyan so amraralay ni Yeso a nimonong do inawan na ni Setiven. So nizezezeng da amlavi jya. Am si Sawlo rana am nisaray na o kazakat da sya. Nimapo no kano nang o kakdekdeng da pa a mapakakasi so amraralay ni Yeso a tao do Yelosaleng. Tey makdeng si Sawlo a mapakakasi sira, kakakaday na so kavahayan da peycyarakrakpen so mavakes a kano mahakay a kalolo na sira a pasasaziden a yangay na do pamemtengan. Am ori o nipeyvwak da rana no amraralay ni Yeso a mangay do peycyeylilyan na do Yotay a kado Samadiya. Am o nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na am todavezed do Yelosaleng.Yamyan so amraralay ni Yeso a nimonong do inawan na ni Setiven. So nizezezeng da amlavi jya. Am si Sawlo rana am nisaray na o kazakat da sya. Nimapo no kano nang o kakdekdeng da pa a mapakakasi so amraralay ni Yeso a tao do Yelosaleng. Tey makdeng si Sawlo a mapakakasi sira, kakakaday na so kavahayan da peycyarakrakpen so mavakes a kano mahakay a kalolo na sira a pasasaziden a yangay na do pamemtengan. Am ori o nipeyvwak da rana no amraralay ni Yeso a mangay do peycyeylilyan na do Yotay a kado Samadiya. Am o nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na am todavezed do Yelosaleng.Yamyan so amraralay ni Yeso a nimonong do inawan na ni Setiven. So nizezezeng da amlavi jya. Am si Sawlo rana am nisaray na o kazakat da sya. Nimapo no kano nang o kakdekdeng da pa a mapakakasi so amraralay ni Yeso a tao do Yelosaleng. Tey makdeng si Sawlo a mapakakasi sira, kakakaday na so kavahayan da peycyarakrakpen so mavakes a kano mahakay a kalolo na sira a pasasaziden a yangay na do pamemtengan. Am ori o nipeyvwak da rana no amraralay ni Yeso a mangay do peycyeylilyan na do Yotay a kado Samadiya. Am o nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na am todavezed do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word.
language2_text: O nimeyvwak a nimraralay ni Yeso am mangay sira do peycyeylilyan na a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a omagaz ji Yeso.

language1_text: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria, and preached Christ unto them.
language2_text: O asa jira am si Veydipo am nimangay do asa ka ili do Samadiya a meylimwang no kanoyong na ni Yeso a Misayya a nitovoy ni Ama ta do to do teyrahem.

language1_text: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake, hearing and seeing the miracles which he did.
language2_text: So ikaro da no tao a omanoyong do nipanci na jira ni Veydipo, ta nimacita da o mapeyzokab a vazay na.

language1_text: For unclean spirits, crying with loud voice, came out of many that were possessed with them: and many taken with palsies, and that were lame, were healed.
language2_text: Ta aro sira o tao a nipamozwawan na so kalamsoyan ni Satan. Mavozwaw sira am amlololos sira makowbot do kataotao no tao. So niyan da no aro a makasapa a tao a nimapya rana.

language1_text: And there was great joy in that city.
language2_text: So ikasasaray da no tao do dang.

language1_text: But there was a certain man, called Simon, which beforetime in the same city used sorcery, and bewitched the people of Samaria, giving out that himself was some great one:
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tao a meyngaran si Simong a meyvahay do ili ang. Amyan so vazay na ikalak da no tao. Pahamahen na o kataotao na a manci no kaizay na tao.

language1_text: to whom they all gave heed, from the least to the greatest, saying, This man is the great power of God.
language2_text: So ikamimin da no tao do dang, tana maizay a tao a tana todna ka tao am ikakza da amizngen, ta patolinen da oyatan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And to him they had regard, because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries.
language2_text: Ikongo do mownay rana ori a meyvazay no mapangyangyalak a vazay, am ori o ikaro da no tao a nimacilolo jya.

language1_text: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God, and the name of Jesus Christ, they were baptized, both men and women.
language2_text: Ipeylimwang na ni Veydipo o Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a omagaz do italamozong na kano ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto am anoyngan da no nimyan dang a mahahakay a kano mavavakes kataktak da jira.

language1_text: Then Simon himself believed also: and when he was baptized, he continued with Philip, and wondered, beholding the miracles and signs which were done.
language2_text: Tana si Simong am mina to na nganoyngi rana a kataktak da jya. Meyratateng am macihza rana ji Veydipo. Macita na o mapeyzokab a vazay na ni Veydipo am nisavasavak na.

language1_text: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God, they sent unto them Peter and John:
language2_text: O nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na amyan do Yelosaleng am mamizing da o keyyan no tao do Samadiya a mahap rana so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o nitovoyan da si Pite a kani Yowani a mangay jira.

language1_text: who, when they were come down, prayed for them, that they might receive the Holy Ghost:
language2_text: Makaranes sira dang am ipeynozi da sira o omanoyong rana ji Yeso a keyyan na jira no Seyzi.

language1_text: (for as yet he was fallen upon none of them: only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus.)
language2_text: Ta no kano nang rana am ji pa nimeyhekas jira o Seyzi do mina kataktak jira no ngaran na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Then laid they their hands on them, and they received the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Am ori o nipaoptan da jira so lima da da Pite a kani Yowani a ipanlanlag da. Ori o niyan na rana jira no Seyzi.

language1_text: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles' hands the Holy Ghost was given, he offered them money,
language2_text: Citahen ni Simong o nipaoptan da so lima da Pite a kani Yowani a yanan na rana no Seyzi am ipanta na sira so nizpi.

language1_text: saying, Give me also this power, that on whomsoever I lay hands, he may receive the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Itoro nyo jyaken oyowyat ori a torwan ko inyo so nizpi, kapaopta ko so lima ko do tao a keyyan na rana jira no Seyzi."

language1_text: But Peter said unto him, Thy money perish with thee, because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money.
language2_text: Maniring si Pite am, "Paciralay do nizpi mo a matemtem, ta yamalas o aktokto mo do kanginangina mo so oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to no nizpi mo.

language1_text: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter: for thy heart is not right in the sight of God.
language2_text: Ikongo o mo kasngesngenan jyamen, ta na katenngan ni Ama ta do to onowned mo a yajyanoyong.

language1_text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness, and pray God, if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee.
language2_text: So ipamlis mo na komaro do malas a nakenakem mo a kapeynozi mo ji Ama ta do to. Ta ala vonasen na o marahet a nakenakem mo.

language1_text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness, and in the bond of iniquity.
language2_text: Ta na imo vaoden no mo panginanehtan do tao a kano meycyamadadayan a raraten mo."

language1_text: Then answered Simon, and said, Pray ye to the Lord for me, that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me.
language2_text: Maniring jira si Simong am, "Ipeynozi nyo yaken an, kaji na meydednan jyaken no nyo ipanci ang."

language1_text: And they, when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord, returned to Jerusalem, and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans.
language2_text: Mateyka si Pite a kani Yowani a mangnanao no ciriciring ni Ama ta do to am meyoli rana sira a mangay do Yelosaleng a kapeylimwang da no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do peycyeylilyan na do Samadiya a nipeyliktawan da ili.

language1_text: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip, saying, Arise, and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza, which is desert.
language2_text: Amyan so asa ka tinsi ni Ama ta do to a nimangay ji Veydipo. Maniring am, "Mangonong ka do rarahan apo do Yelosaleng a mangay do Cyasa." Jyasangibi no tao a panahanan.

language1_text: And he arose and went: and, behold, a man of Ethiopia, an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians, who had the charge of all her treasure, and had come to Jerusalem for to worship, was returning, and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet.
language2_text: Karahan am mangay rana si Veydipo. Amyan do rarahan am macita na o asa ka maizay a tao do Isopiya a tomalamozong no nizpi no panirsirngen da mavakes a meyngaran si Kantaci. O yangay na do Yelosaleng am iraralay na si Ama ta do to. Meysinaoli rana mangay do ili da am vilangan na do aleleh na o vakong na no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran si Isayya. Karahan am mangay rana si Veydipo. Amyan do rarahan am macita na o asa ka maizay a tao do Isopiya a tomalamozong no nizpi no panirsirngen da mavakes a meyngaran si Kantaci. O yangay na do Yelosaleng am iraralay na si Ama ta do to. Meysinaoli rana mangay do ili da am vilangan na do aleleh na o vakong na no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a meyngaran si Isayya.

language1_text: Then the Spirit said unto Philip, Go near, and join thyself to this chariot.
language2_text: Maniring o Seyzi ji Veydipo am, "Mangay ka macikasngen do aleleh ang."

language1_text: And Philip ran thither to him, and heard him read the prophet Esaias, and said, Understandest thou what thou readest?
language2_text: Am ori o nipalayo na a mangay ni Veydipo. So nipakamizngan na so tao ang a omvilang do vakong ni Isayya. Maniring jya si Veydipo am, "Mo katenngan o mo vilangan ang?"

language1_text: And he said, How can I, except some man should guide me? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Si myan so amnanao jyaken am ori o ipakateneng ko jya." Am ori o nipancyan na ni Veydipo a somakay do aleleh na.

language1_text: The place of the scripture which he read was this, He was led as a sheep to the slaughter; And like a lamb dumb before his shearer, So opened he not his mouth:
language2_text: O vilangan na no tao do Isopiya a ciring ni Ama ta do to am, "Iya rana am akmey kagling a alaken da zakaten a to norotoro no kataotao na. So icyakma ney likta kagling a tedtedan da so bobow a ji meyzezyak.

language1_text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away: And who shall declare his generation? For his life is taken from the earth.
language2_text: No kapeymetdeh da sya am abo macingosongoso nya. Abo o tomapil jya sivosivovoong na, ta makeykai o allallag na mabo do karawan."

language1_text: And the eunuch answered Philip, and said, I pray thee, of whom speaketh the prophet this? of himself, or of some other man?
language2_text: Maniring o tao do Isopiya do pacicyan na si Veydipo am, "Pancyan pala jyaken o na pakacirngan sya no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to eya. Paingen na jya an? Ano paingen na do karwan no tao."

language1_text: Then Philip opened his mouth, and began at the same scripture, and preached unto him Jesus.
