language1_text: And if some of the branches be broken off, and thou, being a wild olive tree, wert graffed in among them, and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree;
language2_text: O tao do Yotay am sira akman so kayo a meyngaran so kanlan a polcingen a kangay mapatolang so yangaw no jya nimowa kanlan. Inyo rana beken a tao do Yotay am kapalangayan nyo o yajya nipamowa kanlan. So yanyo ipacizanod do tao do Yotay a na ikarilaw ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: boast not against the branches. But if thou boast, thou bearest not the root, but the root thee.
language2_text: Am ji nyo ngolala o yangaw na a nimapolcing, ta kapalangayan nyo o yangaw ang. So ji nyo mapazwai so kataotao nyo, ta beken a inyo o yapwan no pamnowan no kayo. Ta o yamot na am ori na ilida.

language1_text: Thou wilt say then, The branches were broken off, that I might be graffed in.
language2_text: Ala no maniring ka am, "O yapolcingan so yangaw na no nipamowa a kanlan am yaken o da patolangen do dang."

language1_text: Well; because of unbelief they were broken off, and thou standest by faith. Be not highminded, but fear:
language2_text: Jyabo na kalalasan no ciring nyo a. O yada polcingan sya am sira ji manganoyong o tao do Yotay. Inyo am apya kamo, ta kamo manganoyong. Am ko ipanci jinyo am ji kamo mapahama so nakenakem an. Ta manginanawa kamo.

language1_text: for if God spared not the natural branches, take heed lest he also spare not thee.
language2_text: Kakwakwan no tao do Yotay a meyngongyod akmey yangaw no kayo a na ji ingbeywani am ney manngo kamo, ta jyabo kabeywan na jinyo a, do nyo kaji manganoyngan.

language1_text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God: on them which fell, severity; but toward thee, goodness, if thou continue in his goodness: otherwise thou also shalt be cut off.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo pala si Ama ta do to. Ta yamyan so pangangasyan na. Yamyan so peyoyaoyyan na. O meyraraten a tao am manoyong kaoya na nira. Am inyo am na ikasi. Am ori o ji nyo ngaroi do pangangasyan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta akman kamo so yangaw no kayo a polcingen na.

language1_text: And they also, if they abide not still in unbelief, shall be graffed in: for God is able to graff them in again.
language2_text: No si mamlis sira o tao do Yotay a omanoyong ji Yeso am ori rana o paolyan na sira do nikapolcingan da kayo. Ta mowwamek ori ji Ama ta do to a vazay na.

language1_text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature, and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree: how much more shall these, which be the natural branches, be graffed into their own olive tree?
language2_text: Inyo rana beken a tao do Yotay am yakamo akmey yangaw no yajya nipamowa a kayo do kahasan a nimapolcing a yada kapatolang sya do nimowa kayo. Am sira akmey nipamowa kayo o tao do Yotay. Kakwakwan nyo a na patolangen a yamacitarek a yangaw no kayo am imanngo sira o tao do Yotay. Jyabo kaji na patolangan pa sira do kayo ori a.

language1_text: For I would not, brethren, that ye should be ignorant of this mystery, lest ye should be wise in your own conceits; that blindness in part is happened to Israel, until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, inaoy no si katenngan nyo na o vazay na ni Ama ta do to a ji nipatwaw no kakwa. So ji nyo mapakarangi so nakem nyo. Ta beken a todamimin o Isedi a tao a ji mamlis, ta yana pananalahen ni Ama ta do to o karwan no beken a tao do Yotay a omanod jya.

language1_text: And so all Israel shall be saved: as it is written, There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer, And shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob:
language2_text: So ikamimin da no Isedi a tao ahapen na ni Ama ta do to. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Amyan so mai apo do Sian a mapatazadang jinyo do teyngato. Iya rana am vonasen na o raraten da no tao do Yotay a sivosivovoong na ni Yakebo.

language1_text: For this is my covenant unto them, When I shall take away their sins.
language2_text: No si marateng rana o araraw am pangononongan ko o ciring ko a amvonas so raraten da."

language1_text: As concerning the gospel, they are enemies for your sakes: but as touching the election, they are beloved for the fathers' sakes.
language2_text: Da nitaosya no tao do Yotay o Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o na likodan jira ni Ama ta do to a na katoro nya jinyo a beken a tao do Yotay so na pangangasyan ni Ama ta do to. Am meykongwen o pamnemnekan na ni Ama ta do to a marilaw sira. Ta akman sang o aryarilaw na sira so ineynapo da no kakwa pa.

language1_text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance.
language2_text: Ta jyablis o nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to a marilaw no nipamnekan na tao.

language1_text: For as ye in times past have not believed God, yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief:
language2_text: No kakwa am ji nyo ngonoci si Ama ta do to a beken a tao do Yotay. Am nyo na mahap o pangangasyan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta da ji ngonoci si Ama ta do to no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: even so have these also now not believed, that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy.
language2_text: Akman sang sira o tao do Yotay. Tana ji da nganoyngi si Ama ta do to sicyaikwaya am mahap da o pangangasyan na no makwa.

language1_text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief, that he might have mercy upon all.
language2_text: Nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to o kamimin no tao do karawan a makateneng do da peyraratenan. Ta ori o ipakateneng da do pangangasyan na.

language1_text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God! how unsearchable are his judgments, and his ways past finding out!
language2_text: Yatey rako o pangangasyan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta yabo o makahap so teneteneng na. Sino makapatak no ahahapan na sya ni Ama ta do to. Sino makateneng do vazay na.

language1_text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord? or who hath been his counsellor?
language2_text: Maniring do Seysyo am, "Sino makateneng do onowned na ni Ama ta do to. Sino makayokod nya tao."

language1_text: Or who hath first given to him, and it shall be recompensed unto him again?
language2_text: "Sino niomazaw sya so paolyan na jya."

language1_text: For of him, and through him, and to him, are all things: to whom be glory for ever. Amen.
language2_text: Ta yamamimin o makakaday a yana nyamamaog. So ika iya na no tomalamozong no makakaday do karawan. Inaoy no si mangay jya o azwazway na mangay do kaidan no karawan. Amin.

language1_text: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ko vavagan inyo an. Ta yatey rako na kasyan nyaten ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o torwan nyo no kataotao nyo a italamozong na a komaro do raraten nyo. Ta ori sarayan na ninyo ni Ama ta do to a meyngongyod so onowned a amraralay nya.

language1_text: And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
language2_text: Ji nyo to panwanoda o kataotao nyo do yamarahet so yahahapan sya tao do karawan. Ta apyapya pa o kablis na so onowned nyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori o ipakateneng nyo do apya nakenakem na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a kano isaray ni Ama ta do to a vazay.

language1_text: For I say, through the grace given unto me, to every man that is among you, not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think; but to think soberly, according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith.
language2_text: Yaken rana a nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a lamlamsoy na a nipantan na so aryarilaw na am ko vavagan inyo. Ji nyo pahamaha o kataotao nyo. Ta to nyo palololwa o ahahapan nyo so kataotao nyo do na nitoro jinyo ni Ama ta do to a teneteneng nyo.

language1_text: For as we have many members in one body, and all members have not the same office:
language2_text: O makakaday a peyvongvongwan ta am ori o ta ikamaog a yasa ka tao. Am yameykataretarek o vazay da no peyvongvongwan ta.

language1_text: so we, being many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.
language2_text: Yakman sang, ta tana tamo aro a tao am tamo akmey asa ka tao ji Yeso Kizisto a yamacisidosidong.

language1_text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, whether prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith;
language2_text: Na ikarilaw yaten ni Ama ta do to a nimanta nyaten so meykataretarek a teneteneng ta. Am ori o pangozayan ta do teneteneng ta a nitoro na jyaten ni Ama ta do to a somidong so akma tey kakteh do cinai. No teneteneng a mangononong so ciriciring na o nitoro na jyaten am pangozayan ta o nakenakem ta si Ama ta do to a mangononong so ciriciring na.

language1_text: or ministry, let us wait on our ministering: or he that teacheth, on teaching;
language2_text: No panidongan ta o na nitoro jyaten am manidong ta so tao an. No na nitoro jyaten o ikateneng ta mangnanao am mangnanao ta so tao an.

language1_text: or he that exhorteth, on exhortation: he that giveth, let him do it with simplicity; he that ruleth, with diligence; he that sheweth mercy, with cheerfulness.
language2_text: No manvavaga o nitoro na jyaten am vavagan ta o icyatatao ta an. No mazonos o nitoro na jyaten am ji ta mangbeywan do icyatatao ta an. O meypanirsirngen am ji maciziziknai o vazay an. No mangarilaw so tao am masaray onowned.

language1_text: Let love be without dissimulation. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.
language2_text: Beken a hapet no onowned o ipangarilaw so tao. Ji nyo akzan o marahet a vazay, ta o kahap nyo so apiya vazay.

language1_text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another;
language2_text: Masicyakarilaw kamo an. Ta inyo rana am akmey meyketeketeh kamo do tangain na ni Kizisto. So ipasikakanig nyo.

language1_text: not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;
language2_text: Taosya o malma, ta kowyat nyo a meyvazay. Ahapen nyo o makdeng a nakenakem nyo a omahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;
language2_text: Masaray kamo a omnanala so na itoro jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Tana amyan so alalaw nyo am ji kamo ahayo a meynozi ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: distributing to the necessity of saints; given to hospitality.
language2_text: Sidongen nyo sira o makasi a tao a akma nyoy kakteh do cinai. Taotawwen nyo sira o minangilili a tao.

language1_text: Bless them which persecute you: bless, and curse not.
language2_text: Ipeynozi nyo sira o mapakakasi jinyo a tao. Ji nyo manircirngi sira o macioya jinyo a tao.

language1_text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice, and weep with them that weep.
language2_text: Macikasaray kamo do somaray a tao. Macikalavi kamo do amlavi a tao.

language1_text: Be of the same mind one toward another. Mind not high things, but condescend to men of low estate. Be not wise in your own conceits.
language2_text: Peyyangangain nyo o tao a sidongen. Ji nyo pahama o nakenakem nyo, ta pehbowen nyo o nakem nyo. Ji kamo mapakateneteneng.

language1_text: Recompense to no man evil for evil. Provide things honest in the sight of all men.
language2_text: Ji kamo mapatongtonggal. O ipanci no tao apiya vazay am ahapen nyo a peyvazain.

language1_text: If it be possible, as much as lieth in you, live peaceably with all men.
language2_text: Makapya kamo so nakenakem do icyatatao nyo.

language1_text: Dearly beloved, avenge not yourselves, but rather give place unto wrath: for it is written, Vengeance is mine; I will repay, saith the Lord.
language2_text: Ji nyo to meyneynakman o kapatonggal nyo do amwoya ninyo a tao, manga keypong. Cyaha, ta si Ama ta do to o mapasapa do dang. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Yaken o mapasapa do oyaoyyan da ninyo. Yaken o mapeyvazay so amwoya ninyo." Ori rana am ciring na no Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger, feed him; if he thirst, give him drink: for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head.
language2_text: Maniring pa do Seysyo am, "No makcin o kavosoyan nyo am pakanen nyo sira. No mawaw sira am peyyopen nyo sira. Si akman kamo sang am to sira nasnek a manig ninyo."

language1_text: Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.
language2_text: O marahet a vazay da jimo no tao am ji mo rata. Ta o apiya ahahapan mo sya am itovis mo do marahet a vazay da.

language1_text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers. For there is no power but of God: the powers that be are ordained of God.
language2_text: Mamimin o tao a omanod so nakenakem do amyokod no seyvo. Ta o iyan no makayokod a tao am nakenakem na ori ni Ama ta do to. Ta o oyowyat da a amyokod no seyvo am apo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power, resisteth the ordinance of God: and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation.
language2_text: O mapasobna do seyvo am akmey si Ama ta do to o pasobnan da. O akman rana sang a tao am jyabo kaji na ngyanan no ipasingsingkad na sira.

language1_text: For rulers are not a terror to good works, but to the evil. Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power? do that which is good, and thou shalt have praise of the same:
language2_text: Ta o vazay no manyokod a tao am jyanyaheyan no apiya so ahahapan sya tao. Am ikanyahey ori no marahet so ahahapan sya tao. Mo ikanyahey o makayokod so tao ang? No si ikanyahey mo am mangasi ka so tao, ta ori o sarayan na nimo.

language1_text: for he is the minister of God to thee for good. But if thou do that which is evil, be afraid; for he beareth not the sword in vain: for he is the minister of God, a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil.
language2_text: Ta iya rana am lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to. O vazay na am ipeypapya nyo. Am no si pasobnan nyo am manoyong kanyahey nyo nya. Ta manoyong ori a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to amwoya no mapasobna a tao.

language1_text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject, not only for wrath, but also for conscience sake.
language2_text: Am ori o onotan nyo do makayokod ninyo. Am beken a kanyahey nyo no oyaoyyan na ninyo, ta omaing do onowned nyo rana a makateneng do apya kano marahet.

language1_text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also: for they are God's ministers, attending continually upon this very thing.
language2_text: O itoro nyo a deyking do seyvo am itoro nyo, ta o meyvazay da no amyokod ninyo a tao am vazay ori ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Render therefore to all their dues: tribute to whom tribute is due; custom to whom custom; fear to whom fear; honour to whom honour.
language2_text: Am ori o torwan nyo jira. Ikanig nyo sira.

language1_text: Owe no man any thing, but to love one another: for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law.
language2_text: No amyan so nivood nyo jira am ji nyo peyyahahaya a paolin. To nyo peyyononga o karilaw nyo no icyatatao nyo. No si mangarilaw ka so tao am manoyong ka na nimakahap so iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For this, Thou shalt not commit adultery, Thou shalt not kill, Thou shalt not steal, Thou shalt not bear false witness, Thou shalt not covet; and if there be any other commandment, it is briefly comprehended in this saying, namely, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
language2_text: Ta o ciring a, "Ji mangzakza. Ji manwakwak. Ji manakaw. Ji mangagom," a kano yamakakaday pa a iwawalam na am na to zaksa ori no yasa ka ciring. O ciring ori am, "O aryarilaw mo so kataotao mo am akman sang o karilawan mo no icyatatao mo."

language1_text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour: therefore love is the fulfilling of the law.
language2_text: O mangarilaw so icyatatao am ji mapeyvazay so marahet a vazay a. Ta o akman rana sang am manoyong rana makahap so nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And that, knowing the time, that now it is high time to awake out of sleep: for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed.
language2_text: Peyvazain nyo o akman sang. Ta nyo katenngan o kakeykai na rana ni Yeso a mai a mahap jyaten. So ji nyo to ngitkehi. Ta meytataziman kamo.

language1_text: The night is far spent, the day is at hand: let us therefore cast off the works of darkness, and let us put on the armour of light.
language2_text: Yakomavos rana o marahet a vazay da no tao do karawan. Na kapakaranes rana no yapiya na patazadangan jyaten ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o ji ta to peyvazai so jyapsepsek a vazay ta. Ta kahap ta so apiya vazay akmey voovoo a ipakaharag ta so amlita jyaten a Satan.

language1_text: Let us walk honestly, as in the day; not in rioting and drunkenness, not in chambering and wantonness, not in strife and envying.
language2_text: To ta peynara o icicirawat do maraw. Ji ta to ngyop so saki. Ji pasagpyana o aktokto. Ji maciskaskad. Ji manginanahet.

language1_text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof.
language2_text: Ahapen nyo si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta, akma nyoy voovoo a ipzat nyo do onowned nyo. Ji nyo to mamyapyan o kapeyraraten nyo. So ingtwan nyo do kataotao nyo.

language1_text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye, but not to doubtful disputations.
language2_text: O malma pa so onowned ji Ama ta do to a tao am makapya kamo jya so nakenakem an. Tana macitarek o ahahapan na sya am ji nyo a zyakan.

language1_text: For one believeth that he may eat all things: another, who is weak, eateth herbs.
language2_text: O makdeng so onowned ji Ama ta do to a tao am abo ji da ngangana. Am o malma pa so onowned a tao am o voovoong o yakan da.

language1_text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth: for God hath received him.
language2_text: O makakakan a tao am ji na zyakan sira o ji makakakan a tao. O voovoong so yakan am ji na namwada sira o makakakan a tao. Ta meyyangay sira akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Who art thou that judgest another man's servant? to his own master he standeth or falleth. Yea, he shall be holden up: for God is able to make him stand.
language2_text: Sino ka a yamazyak no lamlamsoy no karwan no tao. Manngwa, ji na zyakan no katenngan a tao o karatan no lamlamsoy na? No si Yeso o Panirsirngen na kasidong na sya am jyabo karahet na.

language1_text: One man esteemeth one day above another: another esteemeth every day alike. Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind.
language2_text: Amyan so tao a manci no katey makdeng no kasaraw a raralayan ni Ama ta do to a kano toda kararaw. Am amyan so tao a manci no kato na meyyangangayan no araraw. Ney yapya na am ji meykawad so nakenakem.

language1_text: He that regardeth the day, regardeth it unto the Lord; and he that regardeth not the day, to the Lord he doth not regard it. He that eateth, eateth to the Lord, for he giveth God thanks; and he that eateth not, to the Lord he eateth not, and giveth God thanks.
language2_text: O tao rana a tongdeng do kasaraw a raralayan da ni Ama ta do to am isaray da o kapakanakem da si Ama ta do to. Akman sang o makakakan a tao, ta isaray na ji Ama ta do to o kanekanen na. O ji makakakan a tao am akman sang. Ta isaray na si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For none of us liveth to himself, and no man dieth to himself.
language2_text: O cinatazak ta tao do karawan a yamraralay ni Yeso am beken a kakakzeb ta so kapeypapya no kataotao.

language1_text: For whether we live, we live unto the Lord; and whether we die, we die unto the Lord: whether we live therefore, or die, we are the Lord's.
language2_text: Ta si Yeso a Panirsirngen ta am yapwan no inawan ta. Am ori o ika si Yeso na no pasarain ta. Tana do ika mavyay ta pa, tana do ikawakwak ta na am ji ta hamangi o ka si Yeso no tomalamozong nyaten.

language1_text: For to this end Christ both died, and rose, and revived, that he might be Lord both of the dead and living.
language2_text: Ta si Yeso Kizisto rana am nimawakwak a keypirwa na rana mavyay. O ikakman na sang am peypanirsirngan da no mavyay a tao a kano nimawakwak a tao.

language1_text: But why dost thou judge thy brother? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ.
language2_text: Am sino ka paro amraherahet so akma moy kakteh do cinai. Ikeykongo ka yajyaninig no akma moy kakteh do cinai. Ta yaten rana am mamimin ta tomnek do tangain na ni Ama ta do to no pacicin na yaten.

language1_text: For it is written, As I live, saith the Lord, every knee shall bow to me, And every tongue shall confess to God.
language2_text: Ta maniring do Seysyo a ciring na ni Ama ta do to am, "O ko pa ciring jinyo am ko manoyong a mavyay a Tao do to. Am ori o ikamimin da no tao a meylilitod do tangain ko a zomwazway jyaken a Tao do to da."

language1_text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God.
language2_text: No si akman sang am mamimin tamo a mangay do tangain na pacicin na ni Ama ta do to no makwa.

language1_text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more: but judge this rather, that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother's way.
language2_text: Am ori o ji ta macitamtamwaji an. Ta naknakmen ta kaji ta mapeyvazayan so pacikzan da meyraraten no akma tey kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: I know, and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus, that there is nothing unclean of itself: but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean, to him it is unclean.
language2_text: Macikaop ko na ji Yeso a Panirsirngen ta am katenngan ko na o kabo no makanyaw a kanekanen. No amyan so tao a manci nya makanyaw am manoyong o kakanyaw na do tao no nang.

language1_text: But if thy brother be grieved with thy meat, now walkest thou not charitably. Destroy not him with thy meat, for whom Christ died.
language2_text: No si kanen mo o ikarahet no nakenakem no akma moy kakteh do cinai am manoyong kabwata no pangangarilawan mo. Ta tey marahet o koman so ikarahet da no onowned no nikawakwak na ni Yeso Kizisto a tao.

language1_text: Let not then your good be evil spoken of:
language2_text: Tana apya jimo o naknakmen mo a vazay mo am ji mo peyvazaya o raten da no tao a itamwad da jimo.

language1_text: for the kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Ta o ney makdeng na do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to am beken a monganay do kanen a kano yopen. Ta monganay do apya vazay a kano kapyapya no onowned kano sarasaray a itoro na jyaten no Seyzi.

language1_text: For he that in these things serveth Christ is acceptable to God, and approved of men.
language2_text: Ori an o ahapan ta so vazay ta ji Kizisto an. Ta ori o sarayan na nyaten ni Ama ta do to a kano icyatatao ta.

language1_text: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace, and things wherewith one may edify another.
language2_text: Am ori o ikasangib ta mapeyvazay so ikapya no tao a vazay a kano ipeypakdeng no tao so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to a vazay.

language1_text: For meat destroy not the work of God. All things indeed are pure; but it is evil for that man who eateth with offence.
language2_text: Ji nyo peyparaheta no isovo nyo a kanen o vazay na ni Ama ta do to do onowned no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai. Ta abo kararatan no kanekanen. Am no si kanen nyo o ikarahet da no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai am raraten nyo rana ori.

language1_text: It is good neither to eat flesh, nor to drink wine, nor any thing whereby thy brother stumbleth, or is offended, or is made weak.
language2_text: Apyapya pa o kajyanganan so vinyay, ji ngyop so saki a ji mapeyvazay so makakaday a vazay a pacikzan da meyraraten no akma tey kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: Hast thou faith? have it to thyself before God. Happy is he that condemneth not himself in that thing which he alloweth.
language2_text: Ta ipeyhanhan mo o vazay mo do tangain na ni Ama ta do to abo so karatan. So ji mo meykawaji so nakenakem. Ta o akman rana sang a tao am tey masaray. Am ji mo mancyan do tao. Ta si Ama ta do to makateneng jya.

language1_text: And he that doubteth is damned if he eat, because he eateth not of faith: for whatsoever is not of faith is sin.
language2_text: Am no si amyan so ji mo adkeci a kanen a kakan mo sya am raraten mo ori. Ta ji mo panadnada o nakenakem mo si Ama ta do to. No meyvazay a kaji mapanadnadan si Ama ta do to am mamimin o akman sang a raraten.

language1_text: We then that are strong ought to bear the infirmities of the weak, and not to please ourselves.
language2_text: Yaten rana yamakdeng so onowned ji Ama ta do to am sidongen ta sira o yapa malma so onowned ji Ama ta do to, kabo rana no ikarahet da do vazay ta. Ta beken a kataotao ta o naknakmen ta.

language1_text: Let every one of us please his neighbour for his good to edification.
language2_text: Manakem ta o kapasaray ta so akma tey kakteh do cinai. Ta ori o ikarapa do onowned da amraralay ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For even Christ pleased not himself; but, as it is written, The reproaches of them that reproached thee fell on me.
language2_text: Ta si Yeso Kizisto rana am beken a o kataotao na o manakem na. Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Maniring am, "O avavay da jimo no tao am mai jyaken."

language1_text: For whatsoever things were written aforetime were written for our learning, that we through patience and comfort of the scriptures might have hope.
language2_text: O ciriciring do Seysyo a yadomket am yamamimin a yana inanao jyaten ni Ama ta do to. O peypeypangayan no nang am ikait jyaten a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to, kasaray ta amnanala so itoro na jyaten ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Now the God of patience and consolation grant you to be likeminded one toward another according to Christ Jesus:
language2_text: Inaoy no si sidongen na inyo ni Ama ta do to a yapwan no sarasaray ta a yamapait so onowned ta. Inaoy no si inarahen nyo si Yeso Kizisto apiya so icicirawat a icyakma nyoy asa ka tao so onowned.

language1_text: that ye may with one mind and one mouth glorify God, even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: So ikalovot nyo a zomwazway si Ama ta do to a Ama na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Wherefore receive ye one another, as Christ also received us to the glory of God.
language2_text: Makapya kamo so nakenakem do kadwan jinyo. Ta yakman sang si Yeso Kizisto a apya so nakenakem jyaten. Ta ori sarayan da ni Ama ta do to no tao.

language1_text: Now I say that Jesus Christ was a minister of the circumcision for the truth of God, to confirm the promises made unto the fathers:
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo an, ta o na nyai ni Kizisto do teyrahem am sidongen na o tao do Yotay a makateneng do kanoyong na ni Ama ta do to a mangononong do mina ciring na do ineynapo da no kakwa pa.

language1_text: and that the Gentiles might glorify God for his mercy; as it is written, For this cause I will confess to thee among the Gentiles, And sing unto thy name.
language2_text: O ikadwa na no na peypeypangayan no na nyai ni Kizisto am sidongen na inyo a beken a tao do Yotay a somaray no pangangasyan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Ori o anoodan ko jimo a azwazwain a isaray do yanan da no beken a tao do Yotay."

language1_text: And again he saith, Rejoice, ye Gentiles, with his people.
language2_text: Maniring pa am, "Inyo rana beken a tao do Yotay am macizanod kamo do Isedi a tao a somaray an."

language1_text: And again, Praise the Lord, all ye Gentiles; And laud him, all ye people.
language2_text: Maniring pa am, "Inyo rana beken a tao do Yotay am isaray nyo o Panirsirngen ta. Inyo rana a tao do teyrahem am azwazwain nyo si Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And again, Esaias saith, There shall be a root of Jesse, And he that shall rise to reign over the Gentiles; In him shall the Gentiles trust.
language2_text: Maniring pa si Isayya am, "Meytotwaw o sivovoong na no meyngaran so Yesi. Iya o meymatmatngeh no beken a tao do Yotay. Am ori o peyhanhanan da nya no beken a tao do Yotay."

language1_text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Inaoy no si itoro na jinyo o sarasaray na ni Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong nyo rana masaray so onowned a meyhanhan nya, do na kasidong jinyo no Seyzi.

language1_text: And I myself also am persuaded of you, my brethren, that ye also are full of goodness, filled with all knowledge, able also to admonish one another.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ko anoyngan inyo a yapiya so yahahapan sya a yamateteneng a yamvavaga do kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: Nevertheless, brethren, I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort, as putting you in mind, because of the grace that is given to me of God, that I should be the minister of Jesus Christ to the Gentiles, ministering the gospel of God, that the offering up of the Gentiles might be acceptable, being sanctified by the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Am o teygami rana ya am ji ko na nayotaywa o ciring ko a inanao ko jinyo do yamakakaday a nyo pa jyataptap a vazay. Ta na nipamnekan yaken ni Ama ta do to a lamlamsoy na ni Yeso Kizisto a yameyvazay do beken a tao do Yotay. So yako ikakmey mapatanatanang so kingking a tao a yameylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Inaoy no si akmey kingking sira o beken a tao do Yotay a isaray na ni Ama ta do to, ta niblis na rana no Seyzi o onowned da. So ikanoyong da rana abo so raraten do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.Am o teygami rana ya am ji ko na nayotaywa o ciring ko a inanao ko jinyo do yamakakaday a nyo pa jyataptap a vazay. Ta na nipamnekan yaken ni Ama ta do to a lamlamsoy na ni Yeso Kizisto a yameyvazay do beken a tao do Yotay. So yako ikakmey mapatanatanang so kingking a tao a yameylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Inaoy no si akmey kingking sira o beken a tao do Yotay a isaray na ni Ama ta do to, ta niblis na rana no Seyzi o onowned da. So ikanoyong da rana abo so raraten do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I have therefore whereof I may glory through Jesus Christ in those things which pertain to God.
language2_text: Yako na macilovot ji Yeso Kizisto. Am ori o ko ikazway a yamahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For I will not dare to speak of any of those things which Christ hath not wrought by me, to make the Gentiles obedient, by word and deed,
language2_text: O yamakdeng a yako ipanci am nioyatan na yaken ni Yeso Kizisto a yasomidong so beken a tao do Yotay a yaomanod ji Ama ta do to. Nisidong na yaken do makakaday a vazay a kano nipeylimwangan ko nya.

language1_text: through mighty signs and wonders, by the power of the Spirit of God; so that from Jerusalem, and round about unto Illyricum, I have fully preached the gospel of Christ.
language2_text: So nikowyat ko a mapeyvazay so mapeyzokab a vazay do kanimoyat na jyaken no Seyzi. Am ori o nipapwan ko sya do Yelosaleng a kangay na do Ididiko o yako peylimwangan no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Yea, so have I strived to preach the gospel, not where Christ was named, lest I should build upon another man's foundation:
language2_text: O ney kakza ko a angayan a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring am do ji da pa nimakamizngi so monganay ji Kizisto a ili. Ta ko jyakzan o kapirwa ko so nyangayan da rana nimangnanao.

language1_text: But as it is written, To whom he was not spoken of, they shall see: And they that have not heard shall understand.
language2_text: Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Sira rana o jya nimakamizing pa sya am mamizing da rana. So ipakateneng da rana do manoyong a nanao."

language1_text: For which cause also I have been much hindered from coming to you.
language2_text: O yako jya nimangai a tomita jinyo do dang am ko ipeylimwang o ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do yapa ji makasingkad ji Ama ta do to a teyhesa ka ili.

language1_text: But now having no more place in these parts, and having a great desire these many years to come unto you;
language2_text: Am ko na nipakavos o vazay ko do jya. So ko na yangay a tomita jinyo. Ta yako na mownay a yamnakenakem so kangay ko jinyo do dang.

language1_text: whensoever I take my journey into Spain, I will come to you: for I trust to see you in my journey, and to be brought on my way thitherward by you, if first I be somewhat filled with your company.
language2_text: Am no si mangay ko rana do Sipanya pongso am mangay ko sazin inyo. Jyabo kaji ta narayan a makacita so kadwan jyaten a. Ala sidongen nyo pa yaken a meypangay do angayan ko.

language1_text: But now I go unto Jerusalem to minister unto the saints.
language2_text: Am ko meypangay pa sicyaikwaya do Yelosaleng a somidong so yamraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: For it hath pleased them of Macedonia and Achaia to make a certain contribution for the poor saints which are at Jerusalem.
language2_text: Ta sira meykingking o kyokay do Maciton a kado Akayya so nizpi a yada isidong so abo so nizpi a sinjya do Yelosaleng.

language1_text: It hath pleased them verily; and their debtors they are. For if the Gentiles have been made partakers of their spiritual things, their duty is also to minister unto them in carnal things.
language2_text: Ori rana am nakenakem da o kasidong da sira. Am manoyong o kasidong da so yamakasi a tao do Yotay. Ta o beken a tao do Yotay am macivonong sira do aryarilaw na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o pantan da nira so isidong da so makcin a tao do Yotay.

language1_text: When therefore I have performed this, and have sealed to them this fruit, I will come by you into Spain.
language2_text: Si mateyka ko na itoro o kingking do sinjya do Yelosaleng am mangay ko na citahen inyo a kangay ko na do Sipanya.

language1_text: And I am sure that, when I come unto you, I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ.
language2_text: Ko katenngan, ta si mangay ko jinyo do dang am arako o sarasaray ta a itoro na jyaten ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Now I beseech you, brethren, for the Lord Jesus Christ's sake, and for the love of the Spirit, that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me;
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ko pangozayan si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta kano Seyzi a yamanta nyaten so pangarilawan ta. Inaoy no si ipeynozi nyo yaken.

language1_text: that I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judæ a; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints;
language2_text: Ipeynozi nyo yaken, a kaji da manaptan jyaken no ji manaralay a tao a meyvahay do Yotay, a kasaray da no sinjya do Yelosaleng a mahap so kingking a yako yangay jira.

language1_text: that I may come unto you with joy by the will of God, and may with you be refreshed.
language2_text: No si apyahen na ni Ama ta do to am ori o ikasaray ko a mangay jinyo do dang a macigaga jinyo.

language1_text: Now the God of peace be with you all. Amen.
language2_text: Inaoy si macikaop jinyo si Ama ta do to a yamanta nyaten so ikapiya no onowned ta. Amin.

language1_text: I commend unto you Phebe our sister, which is a servant of the church which is at Cenchrea:
language2_text: Amyan so mangay jinyo do dang a meyngaran si Veypey. Iya rana ori am akma tey kakteh do cinai a mavakes a yasomidong so sinjya do Kengkedi.

language1_text: that ye receive her in the Lord, as becometh saints, and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you: for she hath been a succourer of many, and of myself also.
language2_text: Taotawwen nyo ori an, ta ori o vazay ta akmey meyketeketeh do cinai. No amyan so kakzeben na am sidongen nyo. Ta iya rana ori am ney makdeng a nisomidong so aro a tao. So nisidongan na jyakehen.

language1_text: Greet Priscilla and Aquila my helpers in Christ Jesus:
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi si Paycila kani Akwila a kararay ko a mahap so vazay na ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: who have for my life laid down their own necks: unto whom not only I give thanks, but also all the churches of the Gentiles.
language2_text: Ta toda jyangay o inawan da no kasidong da jyaken. So ikabeken a yakehen no yasomaray nira, ta yakman sang o akma tey kakteh do cinai a beken a tao do Yotay do peycyakyokyokayan na a yasomaray nira.

language1_text: Likewise greet the church that is in their house. Salute my wellbeloved Epæ netus, who is the firstfruits of Achaia unto Christ.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi sira o yamalwalovot a yameynozi do vahay da. Ko ipeyminaminasi o kagagan ko a si Ipaynayto. Ta iya rana am ney manma na niomanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto do Yasiya a pongso.

language1_text: Greet Mary, who bestowed much labour on us.
language2_text: Ko isaray ji Madiya o zikzikna na jinyo.

language1_text: Salute Andronicus and Junia, my kinsmen, and my fellowprisoners, who are of note among the apostles, who also were in Christ before me.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi o kasina ko no inawan a si Antoniko a kani Yoniya. Sira ori am nimanmanma pa ka nyaken a niomanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto. No kapteng da jyamen am sira ori o mina kararay ko do pamemtengan. Katenngan da sira no nipamnekan na ni Yeso Kizisto a amlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: Greet Amplias my beloved in the Lord.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi si Anpodi a kagagan ko a yarana omanod ji Kizisto.

language1_text: Salute Urbane, our helper in Christ, and Stachys my beloved.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi pa si Opano a kararay ta a meyvazay ji Kizisto a kani Setawey a kagagan ko.

language1_text: Salute Apelles approved in Christ. Salute them which are of Aristobulus' household.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi si Apeydi a jyablis so nakenakem ji Kizisto a kani Aditopo asa ka vahay.

language1_text: Salute Herodion my kinsman. Greet them that be of the household of Narcissus, which are in the Lord.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi o kasina ko so inawan a kakteh ta si Helotyan a kano akma tey kakteh do cinai a si Naciso asa ka vahay a omanoyong ji Yeso.

language1_text: Salute Tryphena and Tryphosa, who labour in the Lord. Salute the beloved Persis, which laboured much in the Lord.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi o kararay ko si Toveyna kani Tovosa kano kavakes ko a meyngaran si Peysi. Ta sira rana ori am yamakdeng sira a yamahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Salute Rufus chosen in the Lord, and his mother and mine.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi pa si Lovo. Iya rana ori am ney yapya na mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to. Ko ipeyminaminasi pa si ina na, ta iya ori am akma ney anak yaken.

language1_text: Salute Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes, and the brethren which are with them.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi si Asincito a kani Veykong a kani Hemeyse a kani Palopo a kani Hema kano karwan da akma tey kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: Salute Philologus, and Julia, Nereus, and his sister, and Olympas, and all the saints which are with them.
language2_text: Ko ipeyminaminasi pa si Veyaytaw a kani Yodiya kani Nidiya kano kakteh na mavakes a kani Awdinpa kano aro a sinjya a kararay da.

language1_text: Salute one another with an holy kiss. The churches of Christ salute you.
language2_text: Ipeyminaminasi nyo pa o kadwan jinyo. Yada ipeyminaminasi inyo no aro a sinjya do peycyakyokyokayan na do jya.

language1_text: Now I beseech you, brethren, mark them which cause divisions and offences contrary to the doctrine which ye have learned; and avoid them.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, o ko ivavaga jinyo am azimanen nyo sira o mangamaog so ciring a ipeyvwak da jinyo a iraherahet da so nakenakem da no amraralay ni Ama ta do to. Azimanen nyo sira o amlikolikod do manoyong a nanao a nimamizing nyo. Ta o akman rana sang a tao am ji nyo macikasngeni sira.

language1_text: For they that are such serve not our Lord Jesus Christ, but their own belly; and by good words and fair speeches deceive the hearts of the simple.
language2_text: Ta o akman rana sang a tao am da ji ngapa o vazay ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta. Ta o kataotao da o da naknakmen. Sira ori am littan da no ciring da o mahaha so nakem ji Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: For your obedience is come abroad unto all men. I am glad therefore on your behalf: but yet I would have you wise unto that which is good, and simple concerning evil.
language2_text: Yabo yaji makateneng jinyo so nakenakem a yamahap so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o ko sarayan ya jinyo. O yako kakzeben jinyo am makakdeng kamo do apya vazay. O marahet a vazay am ji nyo macikasngeni.

language1_text: And the God of peace shall bruise Satan under your feet shortly. The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen.
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to o yamanta nyaten so ikapiya no onowned ta. Makeykai na rana si Satan a haragen a kabo na rana no oyowyat na amlita jinyo. Inaoy si itoro na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na jinyo.

language1_text: Timotheus my workfellow, and Lucius, and Jason, and Sosipater, my kinsmen, salute you.
language2_text: Na ipeyminaminasi inyo no mina kararay ko a si Timotay a nimeylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. O kasina ko no inawan a meyngaran si Lociye a kani Yeson a kani Sosipate am sira mamimin a yameyminaminasi ninyo.

language1_text: I Tertius, who wrote this epistle, salute you in the Lord.
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Tesan ko a yamvatvatek do teygami eya. Yako ipeyminaminasi inyo.

language1_text: Gaius mine host, and of the whole church, saluteth you. Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you, and Quartus a brother.
language2_text: O yako pacivahayan a meyngaran so Cyayo a yamrara so sinjya a yameynozi do vahay da am yakman sang a yameyminaminasi ninyo. Si Ilato a yatomalamozong no nizpi do keymiminili namen ya kani Kose am yakman sang sira yameyminaminasi ninyo.

language1_text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.
language2_text: [Inaoy si itoro na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na jinyo. Amin.]

language1_text: Now to him that is of power to stablish you according to my gospel, and the preaching of Jesus Christ, according to the revelation of the mystery, which was kept secret since the world began,
language2_text: Manoyong o kazwazway ta si Ama ta do to. Ta iya rana am yamanoyong a yaomoyat jinyo a meyhanhan nya akman so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na a ipeylimwang ko a yaomagaz ji Yeso Kizisto. Ori rana am ji da nikatenngan no kakwa a nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: but now is made manifest, and by the scriptures of the prophets, according to the commandment of the everlasting God, made known to all nations for the obedience of faith:
language2_text: Am sicyaikwaya am yameylimwang rana o nivatvatkan da no panoyonoywan na so ciring na no kakwa. Ori rana am ciring na do peycyamahamahatawan na no to meyyonong a Tao do to. So ikanoyong da na no tao a meyhanhan nya.

language1_text: to God only wise, be glory through Jesus Christ for ever. Amen. Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.
language2_text: Azwazwain ta si Ama ta do to a tey mateneng a Tao do to a mangay do kaidan no karawan, do kanisomidong na jyaten ni Yeso Kizisto. Amin!

language1_text: Paul, called to be an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, and Sosthenes our brother, unto the church of God which is at Corinth, to them that are sanctified in Christ Jesus, called to be saints, with all that in every place call upon the name of Jesus Christ our Lord, both their's and our's:
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a yana nipamnekan ni Yeso Kizisto a amlivolivon no ciriciring na a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to. Yaken rana kano akma tey kakteh do cinai si Sotenay am namen ipeyteygami inyo a sinjya do Kedinto a kyokay. Inyo rana kano yamakakaday do peycyeylilyan na a macikaop ji Kizisto a tao am yatamo meyyangangay a na nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a italamozong na. Si Kizisto am Panirsirngen da. So yata icyakman sang a yamapeypanirsirngen sya. Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a yana nipamnekan ni Yeso Kizisto a amlivolivon no ciriciring na a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to. Yaken rana kano akma tey kakteh do cinai si Sotenay am namen ipeyteygami inyo a sinjya do Kedinto a kyokay. Inyo rana kano yamakakaday do peycyeylilyan na a macikaop ji Kizisto a tao am yatamo meyyangangay a na nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a italamozong na. Si Kizisto am Panirsirngen da. So yata icyakman sang a yamapeypanirsirngen sya.

language1_text: grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Inaoy no si itoro na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na kano ikapiya no onowned nyo.

language1_text: I thank my God always on your behalf, for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ;
language2_text: Ko masangib inyo a isaray ji Ama ta do to, ta na nitoro jinyo o pangangarilawan na, ta yakamo macikaop rana ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: that in every thing ye are enriched by him, in all utterance, and in all knowledge;
language2_text: Kanyo tey meynakem rana a macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto a tao. Ori o nyo kateteneng a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Kizisto, do nyo kapakateneng do manoyong a nanao na.

language1_text: even as the testimony of Christ was confirmed in you:
language2_text: O ciring na rana ni Kizisto a nipeylimwang ko jinyo am yamanoyong a yana amyan do onowned nyo.

language1_text: so that ye come behind in no gift; waiting for the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ:
language2_text: So yana ikabo no yana jya nitoro jinyo no Seyzi a oyowyat a kano teneteneng nyo, do nyo kapanala si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a mai.

language1_text: who shall also confirm you unto the end, that ye may be blameless in the day of our Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Jyabo kaji na ngoyatan jinyo ni Yeso a. So ikanoyong nyo na abo rana so karatan do tangain na, no si mai si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: God is faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.
language2_text: Abo kalalasan na ni Ama ta do to a nimamnek jinyo a meyhanhan nya. So ikanoyong nyo rana macikaop do Anak na si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Now I beseech you, brethren, by the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye all speak the same thing, and that there be no divisions among you; but that ye be perfectly joined together in the same mind and in the same judgment.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ko vavagan inyo no ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta akmey asa so ciriciring a ji meykataretarek so nakenakem a malwalovot, akmey asa so onowned, akmey asa so pangozayan.

language1_text: For it hath been declared unto me of you, my brethren, by them which are of the house of Chloe, that there are contentions among you.
language2_text: Ta o kararay na ni Kelay a tao am sya jya nimanayotayo so ciring da jyaken. Maniring sira jyaken am yamyan kono jinyo do dang so nyo ipeykataretarek so nakenakem.

language1_text: Now this I say, that every one of you saith, I am of Paul; and I of Apollos; and I of Cephas; and I of Christ.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no ciring ko am yamyan kono jinyo so yamanci no na kapacyanod jyaken. Yamyan kono so yamanci no na kapacyanod ji Apolo. Yamyan so yamanci no na kapacyanod ji Pite. Yamyan so yamanci no na kapacyanod ji Kizisto.

language1_text: Is Christ divided? was Paul crucified for you? or were ye baptized in the name of Paul?
language2_text: So yanyo icyakmey amvonong so kataotao na ni Yeso Kizisto. Manngwa, yaken o nimawakwak ninyo do jyojika an? Manngwa, yada inyo nitaktakan no ngaran ko an?

language1_text: I thank God that I baptized none of you, but Crispus and Gaius;
language2_text: Ko isaray ji Ama ta do to an. Ta si Kedisepo a kani Cyayo o nitaktakan ko. So na ikabo no ikararwa na nira ori a nitaktakan ko.

language1_text: lest any should say that I had baptized in mine own name.
language2_text: So ikabo na jinyo no manci no kanitomaktak ko jinyo no ngaran ko.

language1_text: And I baptized also the household of Stephanas: besides, I know not whether I baptized any other.
language2_text: Si Setiva rana asa ka vahay o ko nikahamangan a nitaktakan. So ko na ji makatenngi do na keyyan pa no nitaktakan ko jinyo do dang.

language1_text: For Christ sent me not to baptize, but to preach the gospel: not with wisdom of words, lest the cross of Christ should be made of none effect.
language2_text: Ta o nipamnekan na jyaken ni Kizisto am beken a manaktak. Ta kapeylimwang ko no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. So ji ko mangozai do teneteneng ko a mangononong. Ta si akman sang am o teneteneng ko a mangononong o ikakza da ahapen no tao, a kaji da na ngapan so oyowyat no mina kawakwak na ni Kizisto do jyojika.

language1_text: For the preaching of the cross is to them that perish foolishness; but unto us which are saved it is the power of God.
language2_text: O ipeylimwang a jyojika ni Yeso Kizisto am abo o peypeypangayan na do ji manganoyong a tao. Am yaten a na patazadangen do teyngato ni Ama ta do to am tey rako ori a oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For it is written, I will destroy the wisdom of the wise, And will bring to nothing the understanding of the prudent.
language2_text: Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Balinasen ko o teneteneng da no ji raralay nyaken a tao kaji na mangononongan no ahapan da so vazay da."

language1_text: Where is the wise? where is the scribe? where is the disputer of this world? hath not God made foolish the wisdom of this world?
language2_text: No akman sang am wanjin o teneteneng da no mateneng a tao. Wanjin o teneng da no aro so nivilangan a tao. Wanjin sira o makey a macinekanekad a tao do karawan. So na nipeyolyan sya ni Ama ta do to so teneteneng no tao do karawan abo so angangayan.

language1_text: For after that in the wisdom of God the world by wisdom knew not God, it pleased God by the foolishness of preaching to save them that believe.
language2_text: Tey makdeng o teneteneng na ni Ama ta do to. So ikabo no tao do karawan a mangozay do teneteneng da makateneng ji Ama ta do to. Am kanimamnek na ni Ama ta do to do yada ipanci abo so peypeypangayan a yanamen ipeylimwang a yana ivyay so omanoyong jya tao.

language1_text: For the Jews require a sign, and the Greeks seek after wisdom:
language2_text: Kakdain da no tao do Yotay o kapakacita da so mapeyzokab a vazay. Ta ori o yanoyong da ji Ama ta do to. Kakdain da no tao do Sila o kateneng da. Ta ipeyhanhan da o teneteneng no tao do karawan.

language1_text: but we preach Christ crucified, unto the Jews a stumblingblock, and unto the Greeks foolishness;
language2_text: Am yanamen ipeylimwang si Kizisto a nipadket da do jyojika. O akman rana sang do tao do Yotay am ipacimanig da. Am no citahen da o akman sang no beken a tao do Yotay am abwata o ayyaingan na.

language1_text: but unto them which are called, both Jews and Greeks, Christ the power of God, and the wisdom of God.
language2_text: Am do tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a omanoyong ji Kizisto am katenngan da si Kizisto a yanan no rako a oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to a kano teneteneng na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Because the foolishness of God is wiser than men; and the weakness of God is stronger than men.
language2_text: Ta o todalapit a teneng ni Ama ta do to am maharahara pa kano teneteneng no tao. O alikey a oyowyat ni Ama ta do to am rakorako pa kano rako a oyowyat no tao.

language1_text: For ye see your calling, brethren, how that not many wise men after the flesh, not many mighty, not many noble, are called:
language2_text: Manga kakteh, naknakmen nyo an. Ta akman kamo so wanjin a tao no kapamnek na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. No ahapen ta do tao am apereh jinyo o mateteneng a kano meynakem a tao.

language1_text: but God hath chosen the foolish things of the world to confound the wise; and God hath chosen the weak things of the world to confound the things which are mighty;
language2_text: Am nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to o ipangoyongoyod da a jyateteneng a tao do karawan, mangay na ipeyleylak so mapahama so nakem a tao do karawan.

language1_text: and base things of the world, and things which are despised, hath God chosen, yea, and things which are not, to bring to nought things that are:
language2_text: Na nipamnekan o ji da pavivilanga a tao do karawan a kano ikaoya da kano ipanci da abwata so pacicingayan a ipaveveh na so ipanci da meynakem a tao do karawan.

language1_text: that no flesh should glory in his presence.
language2_text: Ta ori o ikabo no tao a mapazway do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But of him are ye in Christ Jesus, who of God is made unto us wisdom, and righteousness, and sanctification, and redemption:
language2_text: Am si Ama ta do to o yanimapanop jinyo ji Yeso Kizisto. So na ikanoyong a na yapwan no teneng ta. Iya o na niyapwan no yamvonas so raraten ta. Am ori o na abnekan jyaten ni Ama ta do to a abo so raraten do tangain na. So icyakma tey matnaw a ranom so onowned a macilovot ji Ama ta do to a ji na rana nalamozongan no raraten.

language1_text: that, according as it is written, He that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord.
language2_text: Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Maniring am, "O mapazway a tao am apyapya pa si Yeso o azwain na."

language1_text: And I, brethren, when I came to you, came not with excellency of speech or of wisdom, declaring unto you the testimony of God.
language2_text: No kangay ko pa jinyo no kakwa pa am ji ko nipatwaw o makdeng a ciriciring ko jinyo a kano teneteneng ko a inanao ko jinyo no kapeylimwang ko no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to jinyo.

language1_text: For I determined not to know any thing among you, save Jesus Christ, and him crucified.
language2_text: Ta mina to ko na mamneki do kabo no yamatarek a yako inanao jinyo. Ta si Yeso Kizisto a nipadket da do jyojika o yako inanao jinyo.

language1_text: And I was with you in weakness, and in fear, and in much trembling.
language2_text: Am ori an, makaranes ko jinyo do dang am malma ko so kataotao amzikzik do kanyahey ko. Ta ihawa ko kaji ko makatenngan do vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And my speech and my preaching was not with enticing words of man's wisdom, but in demonstration of the Spirit and of power:
language2_text: O nipeylimwang ko a ciriciring am beken a masalit a amizngen. So ko ji meyhanhani no ciring ko. Ta yako ipeyhanhan o Seyzi a omoyat jyaken a mapatwaw sya.

language1_text: that your faith should not stand in the wisdom of men, but in the power of God.
language2_text: So ikanoyong no nakenakem nyo ji Ama ta do to. Beken a monganay do teneteneng no tao. Ta monganay do oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Howbeit we speak wisdom among them that are perfect: yet not the wisdom of this world, nor of the princes of this world, that come to nought:
language2_text: Am o yamakekdeng so nakem ji Ama ta do to am yako peylimwangan no yamakdeng a nanao. Am beken a monganay do tao do karawan o teneteneng. So ji ko makalavaci so teneteneng no panirsirngen do karawan. Ta amyan so kasaraw a kabo na no teneteneng da.

language1_text: but we speak the wisdom of God in a mystery, even the hidden wisdom, which God ordained before the world unto our glory:
language2_text: O yako ipeylimwang eya am ji da pa nipatwaw no tao no kakwa a teneteneng na ni Ama ta do to. Ta no kaji na pa mamaogan no karawan am amyan rana ori a nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to do kapacikaop ta jya no makwa.

language1_text: which none of the princes of this world knew: for had they known it, they would not have crucified the Lord of glory.
language2_text: O panipanirsirngen do karawan am abo jira o manoyong a makateneng do pamnemnekan na ni Ama ta do to. No nikatenngan da am jyabo kato da padketan so mazway a Panirsirngen ta do jyojika.

language1_text: But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard, Neither have entered into the heart of man, The things which God hath prepared for them that love him.
language2_text: Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Ta maniring am, "O nakem na ni Ama ta do to a itoro na do amraralay nya tao am ji da pa nimacita no mata da. Ji da pa nimamizing no cicilwan da. Ji da pa nimanakem no tao."

language1_text: But God hath revealed them unto us by his Spirit: for the Spirit searcheth all things, yea, the deep things of God.
language2_text: Am na kasidong jyaten no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a ta ipakateneng jya. Ta katenngan no Seyzi o makakaday a vazay. Katenngan na o jyatenngi a vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For what man knoweth the things of a man, save the spirit of man which is in him? even so the things of God knoweth no man, but the Spirit of God.
language2_text: Ji ta tenngi o nakenakem da no tao, ta o kataotao da o makateneng jya. Akman sang an, ta o Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to o makateneng do makakaday a vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Now we have received, not the spirit of the world, but the spirit which is of God; that we might know the things that are freely given to us of God.
language2_text: Tanyo jya nyahap o teneteneng da no tao do karawan. Ta o nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to a Seyzi am ori o ta nyahap. Ori o ta ipakateneng do makakaday a aryarilaw na jyaten ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Which things also we speak, not in the words which man's wisdom teacheth, but which the Holy Ghost teacheth; comparing spiritual things with spiritual.
language2_text: Ori an, ikabeken a teneteneng no tao o namen inanao jinyo a ciriciring. Ta ciriciring no Seyzi o namen ninanao jinyo a na yanan rana no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But the natural man receiveth not the things of the Spirit of God: for they are foolishness unto him: neither can he know them, because they are spiritually discerned.
language2_text: O kabwan no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to am ji na hap o itoro no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to. Ta o akman rana sang a tao am ji da tenngi o akman sang a vazay. Ta ipanci da abo so angangayan. Ta o yanan no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to o makateneng jya.

language1_text: But he that is spiritual judgeth all things, yet he himself is judged of no man.
language2_text: O yanan no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a tao am ori o makateneng do monganay ji Ama ta do to a vazay. Am o kabwan no Seyzi a tao am ji da tenngi o monganay ji Ama ta do to a vazay. Am ori o ji da zyaki no akman sang a tao.

language1_text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord, that he may instruct him? But we have the mind of Christ.
language2_text: Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Maniring am, "Sino makateneng do onowned na ni Ama ta do to. Sino makayokod nya." Am yaten takamo a yana yanan no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to am katenngan ta o onowned na ni Kizisto.

language1_text: And I, brethren, could not speak unto you as unto spiritual, but as unto carnal, even as unto babes in Christ.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ji ko na naywa jinyo o ciring ko. No kananao ko pa jinyo no kakwa am ji ko meyhanhanan inyo a ipeypalanginan na no Seyzi. Ta monganay kamo pa do karawan. So nyo icyakmey kanakan pa so nakenakem a yaji meypahagnat a yamraralay ni Kizisto.

language1_text: I have fed you with milk, and not with meat: for hitherto ye were not able to bear it, neither yet now are ye able.
language2_text: Ori o ko peyyopan pa jinyo no meyzoko, ta marahet pa o kapakan ko jinyo no cinvevekeh. Ta ji nyo anget. So nyo ikakman sang sicyaikwaya a yaji ngahap so yamakdeng a yako inanao jinyo.

language1_text: For ye are yet carnal: for whereas there is among you envying, and strife, and divisions, are ye not carnal, and walk as men?
language2_text: Ta inyo rana am nyo pa pangozayan o icicirawat no tao. Ta amyan pa jinyo so yamanginanahet a kano yamgalagal a tao. O na ikakman sang am kakownongan na no nyo kapacikaop pa do karawan.

language1_text: For while one saith, I am of Paul; and another, I am of Apollos; are ye not carnal?
language2_text: Yamyan so yatatasa jinyo a yamanci no, "Yaken am yako macyanod ji Pawlo." Yamyan so tao a yamanci no, "Yaken am ko macyanod ji Apolo." So nyo ipeyyangay pa kano yaji nganoyong ji Yeso a tao.

language1_text: Who then is Paul, and who is Apollos, but ministers by whom ye believed, even as the Lord gave to every man?
language2_text: Ikongo angangayan ni Apolo a ka nyaken. Yamen rana am na kapeylamlamsoy jyamen ni Ama ta do to a yamapalolo jinyo a yaomanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto. Ta namen to mangozai o nitoro na ni Ama ta do to a vazay.

language1_text: I have planted, Apollos watered; but God gave the increase.
language2_text: Ko nimowa a na kataktak jya ni Apolo. O amzowazovo sya am si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: So then neither is he that planteth any thing, neither he that watereth; but God that giveth the increase.
language2_text: O mapamowa sya kano tomaktak jya am todalapit pa ori a vazay. Am o amzowazovo sya am si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Now he that planteth and he that watereth are one: and every man shall receive his own reward according to his own labour.
language2_text: O mapamowa sya kano tomaktak jya am meyyangay a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to. So to na palololoi sya ni Ama ta do to do lamlamsoy na so itoro na jira.

language1_text: For we are labourers together with God: ye are God's husbandry, ye are God's building.
language2_text: Yamen rana am namen macipeyvazay ji Ama ta do to. Inyo rana am kanyo akmey nihakawan na ni Ama ta do to a namen pirwahen pa. So nyo icyakmey vahay a na patneken ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: According to the grace of God which is given unto me, as a wise masterbuilder, I have laid the foundation, and another buildeth thereon. But let every man take heed how he buildeth thereupon.
language2_text: No ko pangozayan o nitoro na jyaken ni Ama ta do to a teneteneng am ko akmey mateneng a mangamaog so vahay a tao, do kanimapangay ko so soil na a katonton da jya pakapyahen do teyngato no karwan no tao. So pakapyan da so paringen da vahay.

language1_text: For other foundation can no man lay than that is laid, which is Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Ta abo ikararwa na ni Yeso Kizisto a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a akma ney soil.

language1_text: Now if any man build upon this foundation gold, silver, precious stones, wood, hay, stubble;
language2_text: O mangamaog so vahay a tao am amyan so mangamaog no vowawan. Amyan so mangamaog no lalitan. So iyan no tao a mamaring no kayo a kano vocid.

language1_text: every man's work shall be made manifest: for the day shall declare it, because it shall be revealed by fire; and the fire shall try every man's work of what sort it is.
language2_text: Am o mina vazay ta am macita ta rana no makwa o kehni na a kaji nehniyan. Ta no marateng rana o araraw na no yai ni Yeso am patwawen na rana. Ori o ipakateneng rana jya. Ta no makwa am askadan na rana ni Yeso o mina vazay ta.

language1_text: If any man's work abide which he hath built thereupon, he shall receive a reward.
language2_text: O mehni so niparing a tao am ori o mavezed. O akman rana sang a tao am ori azawen na.

language1_text: If any man's work shall be burned, he shall suffer loss: but he himself shall be saved; yet so as by fire.
language2_text: Am o jyehni so niparing am abo azaw na. Am ahapen na ni Ama ta do to do teyngato, do kakma ney nimakagag so kataotao na do apoy.

language1_text: Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?
language2_text: Manngwa, nyo jyatenngi o na kapacilovot jinyo ni Ama ta do to? Manngwa, nyo jyatenngi na keyyan jinyo no Seyzi?

language1_text: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.
language2_text: Am ori an, no si amyan so tao a mapeykaraherahet so kataotao na a na pacikaopan ni Ama ta do to am jyabo kaji na patovilan jya. Ta o pacikaopan ni Ama ta do to a tao am abo karatan na. Inyo rana am yamyan jinyo si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Let no man deceive himself. If any man among you seemeth to be wise in this world, let him become a fool, that he may be wise.
language2_text: Ji nyo ngalalasa o aktokto no kataotao nyo an. No amyan jinyo so ominara so icicirawat no tao do karawan a mapazway so teneng na am iptad na rana o kapakateneteneng na. Ta ori o ikanoyong na mateneng a tao.

language1_text: For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written, He taketh the wise in their own craftiness.
language2_text: Ta o ipanci no tao do karawan a mateneng am ipanci na ni Ama ta do to a jyateneng a tao. Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Maniring am, "O mateneng a tao am kalittan sira no teneng da kaji na mangononongan no vazay da."

language1_text: And again, The Lord knoweth the thoughts of the wise, that they are vain.
language2_text: O ciring pa do Seysyo am, "Katenngan na ni Ama ta do to o kabo no peypeypangayan na no naknakmen da no mapakateneteneng a tao."

language1_text: Therefore let no man glory in men. For all things are your's;
language2_text: Am ori o ikabo no tao a mapazway a manci no kownot na do kadwan jyamen. Ta yamen rana a yamangnanao am nitovoy na yamen jinyo ni Ama ta do to a amnanao jinyo.

language1_text: whether Paul, or Apollos, or Cephas, or the world, or life, or death, or things present, or things to come; all are your's;
language2_text: Yamen rana si Apolo a kani Pite am namen meyyangangay a nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to a somidong jinyo. Tana karawan a tana mavyay kano mawakwak a tana sicyaikwaya kano makwa am o yamakakaday rana ya am nitoro na ni Ama ta do to a ipeypapya nyo.

language1_text: and ye are Christ's; and Christ is God's.
language2_text: Am naknakmen nyo an, ta inyo am na italamozong ni Kizisto an. Si Kizisto am amizngen na si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Let a man so account of us, as of the ministers of Christ, and stewards of the mysteries of God.
language2_text: Inyo rana am panadnaden nyo yamen a lamlamsoy na ni Kizisto a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a meylimwang no ciriciring na an. Ori rana am ji da tenngi no tao no kakwa.

language1_text: Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful.
language2_text: O kakzeben no lawpan do lamlamsoy na am manoyong so onowned.

language1_text: But with me it is a very small thing that I should be judged of you, or of man's judgment: yea, I judge not mine own self.
language2_text: Yaken rana am tana pacicin nyo yaken am tana pacicin da yaken no mapacicici so tao am to ko pa nazibwan o akman sang a vazay. Ta ji ko mancyan kapya na, karahet na no vazay ko.

language1_text: For I know nothing by myself; yet am I not hereby justified: but he that judgeth me is the Lord.
language2_text: Yako jyatenngi o keyyan no ko karatan. Am yako ji mancyan o kabo na. Ta si Ama ta do to o manoyong a makateneng jya.

language1_text: Therefore judge nothing before the time, until the Lord come, who both will bring to light the hidden things of darkness, and will make manifest the counsels of the hearts: and then shall every man have praise of God.
language2_text: Am ori an, ji nyo manamwaji so tao do ji na pa makaranesi no yai ni Kizisto. Ta si ipirwa mai si Yeso am ori o ipeytotwaw na rana no makakaday a nitayo a vazay a kano amyan do onowned no tao. No marateng rana ori am mamimin o tao a makahap so itoro na jira ni Ama ta do to a sarasaray da. Am palololwen na do mina vazay da.

language1_text: And these things, brethren, I have in a figure transferred to myself and to Apollos for your sakes; that ye might learn in us not to think of men above that which is written, that no one of you be puffed up for one against another.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, o ko pancyan no aro a vazay namen si Apolo am ipakateneng nyo do kaji nyo mapeycyakabanan so lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to akman so domket do Seysyo a ciring.

language1_text: For who maketh thee to differ from another? and what hast thou that thou didst not receive? now if thou didst receive it, why dost thou glory, as if thou hadst not received it?
language2_text: Inyo rana mapakazwazway am sino ney mowyat na jinyo a makaharag so tao. Manngwa, nyo jyatenngi o yamakakaday jinyo a yamamimin a yapo ji Ama ta do to? Ikongo nyo peyzezwayan no nitoro na jinyo. Am ori o pavevehan nyo pa so nakenakem nyo an.

language1_text: Now ye are full, now ye are rich, ye have reigned as kings without us: and I would to God ye did reign, that we also might reign with you.
language2_text: Ala nyo ipanci o kabwata rana no yaji ngyangyan jinyo, a yarana makataptap so teneteneng a kano makakaday a itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a akmey amyan rana do panirsirngen. Inaoy no si manoyong keyyan nyo do peypakarangan nyo a kapacikazway namen jinyo a panirsirngen.

language1_text: For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles last, as it were appointed to death: for we are made a spectacle unto the world, and to angels, and to men.
language2_text: Ta no ko citahen am yamen rana nipamnekan na ni Yeso a amlivolivon no ciriciring na am yakmey nipazasing na yamen ni Ama ta do to do pakananaken a tao do karawan. Akman so nipamnekan da rana wakwaken a meyraraten a tao a ipeyyangwangongoyod da no tao do karawan a kano tinsi.

language1_text: We are fools for Christ's sake, but ye are wise in Christ; we are weak, but ye are strong; ye are honourable, but we are despised.
language2_text: Da ipanci yamen no tao do karawan a abo so kapsepsekan, do namen kapangnanao no ciriciring na ni Kizisto. Am inyo am nyo ipanci o kataotao nyo a mateneng a meyhanhan ni Kizisto. So nyo ikowyowyat pa ka nyamen. So da kolalahan jyamen a da kanig ninyo.

language1_text: Even unto this present hour we both hunger, and thirst, and are naked, and are buffeted, and have no certain dwellingplace;
language2_text: Yato ngai sicyaikwaya o yanamen ipacikekcin a yamawaw a yamamez a abo so ayob a yamasangib a yada bakbakan a yabo so vahay,

language1_text: and labour, working with our own hands: being reviled, we bless; being persecuted, we suffer it:
language2_text: a yamowyat a yameyvazay a yamyaw no velek namen. So yanamen ikasangib a yada avain. Am namen ipeynozi sira. No yada peymetdehan yamen am namen to nazibwan.

language1_text: being defamed, we intreat: we are made as the filth of the world, and are the offscouring of all things unto this day.
language2_text: No yada yamen pasnesneken am namen tovisan sira no apya a ciriciring. Na kai sicyaikwaya no yada pancyan nyamen a akmey ibeybek no karawan, abo so angangayan a tao.

language1_text: I write not these things to shame you, but as my beloved sons I warn you.
language2_text: O yako vatvatkan do yakman sang a ciriciring am beken a ko ipasnesnek jinyo, ta yako ipeypakatkat jinyo akma koy anak.

language1_text: For though ye have ten thousand instructors in Christ, yet have ye not many fathers: for in Christ Jesus I have begotten you through the gospel.
language2_text: Tana todaro tao amnanao jinyo a mapeypahagnat so nakenakem nyo ji Kizisto am asa saon o ama nyo am. Ta yaken rana am nipeylimwang ko jinyo o Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. So yako icyakmey ama nyo a omanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: Wherefore I beseech you, be ye followers of me.
language2_text: Am ori o ko vavagan jinyo a ominara jyaken.

language1_text: For this cause have I sent unto you Timotheus, who is my beloved son, and faithful in the Lord, who shall bring you into remembrance of my ways which be in Christ, as I teach every where in every church.
language2_text: So tovoyan ko si Timotay a mangay jinyo do dang. Ta iya rana do ta raralayan ni Yeso am ney mowyat ori akma koy anak. So pazimanan na sya jinyo so ahahapan ko sya, do ko kararalay ni Yeso Kizisto. Ori rana am nipangnanao ko rana ori do peycyakyokyokayan na.

language1_text: Now some are puffed up, as though I would not come to you.
language2_text: Yamyan so yatatasa ka tao jinyo a yamapahama so nakem a yamanci no kaji ko rana nangayan jinyo do dang.

language1_text: But I will come to you shortly, if the Lord will, and will know, not the speech of them which are puffed up, but the power.
language2_text: Am no si apyahen na yaken ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta am jyabo kapeyyahahay ko a mangay a tomita jinyo a. No si marateng rana o araraw no yangay ko jinyo do dang am jyabo kaji ko ankadan do vazay da kano ciring da no mapakazwazway a tao.

language1_text: For the kingdom of God is not in word, but in power.
language2_text: Ta o tao rana a macikaop do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to am to rana cita do vazay da o oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to. So ji na makaneci no ciriciring da.

language1_text: What will ye? shall I come unto you with a rod, or in love, and in the spirit of meekness?
language2_text: Ikongo apyahen nyo a vazay ko si makaranes ko jinyo do dang. Manngwa, apyahen nyo o kaoya ko ninyo? No apyapyahen nyo o kasaray ko ninyo.

language1_text: It is reported commonly that there is fornication among you, and such fornication as is not so much as named among the Gentiles, that one should have his father's wife.
language2_text: Yamanoyong o kanimakamizing ko so keyyan na jinyo no mapasagpyan so kataotao na. O akman rana sang a vazay am ji da mya no ji manaralay a tao. O nimamizing ko am amyan so tao a mapasagpyan so nakenakem na do kaminan na.

language1_text: And ye are puffed up, and have not rather mourned, that he that hath done this deed might be taken away from among you.
language2_text: Ikongo dang o pazwain nyo. Manngwa, ji nyo a ratan so onowned o akman so sang so vazay a tao? Am ori o to nyo na pasyai so akman sang a tao.

language1_text: For I verily, as absent in body, but present in spirit, have judged already, as though I were present, concerning him that hath so done this deed, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, when ye are gathered together, and my spirit, with the power of our Lord Jesus Christ,
language2_text: Yaken rana am tana yamarai o kataotao ko jinyo am onowned ko am yakmey to ngyan jinyo. So yako pangozayan do ngaran na ni Yeso a yamwoya no yakman sang so vazay a tao. So yako icyakmey yamyan jinyo do dang. No malwalovot kamo am akma koy to macilovot jinyo so onowned, do ko kapangozay do oyowyat na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta. Yaken rana am tana yamarai o kataotao ko jinyo am onowned ko am yakmey to ngyan jinyo. So yako pangozayan do ngaran na ni Yeso a yamwoya no yakman sang so vazay a tao. So yako icyakmey yamyan jinyo do dang. No malwalovot kamo am akma koy to macilovot jinyo so onowned, do ko kapangozay do oyowyat na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: to deliver such an one unto Satan for the destruction of the flesh, that the spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord Jesus.
language2_text: O akman rana sang a tao am to nyo macyozai a kapeyingnen na so kataotao na ni Satan. Si maliliw na o kataotao na meyngen am ori o ipamlis na rana a kavyay no pahad na no si pirwa mai si Yeso a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Your glorying is not good. Know ye not that a little leaven leaveneth the whole lump?
language2_text: Taosya o kapakazwazway nyo. Nyo jyatenngi o ciring a manci no, "O likta kosozi no odong am mapeymway na o rako a odong."

language1_text: Purge out therefore the old leaven, that ye may be a new lump, as ye are unleavened. For even Christ our passover is sacrificed for us:
language2_text: So pakarwan nyo so kosozi no odong a mapeyraraten jinyo, ta ori o ikanownaw no onowned nyo a nimavonas rana so raraten. Ta nimawakwak si Yeso Kizisto a yanimalit so raraten ta, akmey kagling a wakwaken da no tao do Yotay. So nipatastasan na sira no tinsi a jya nimwakwak so kabnekan da no yanan no rala no kagling a vahay.

language1_text: therefore let us keep the feast, not with old leaven, neither with the leaven of malice and wickedness; but with the unleavened bread of sincerity and truth.
language2_text: Ori an, sarayan ta ni Yeso a nimawakwak no raraten ta. So ikanoyong ta rana komaro do peyraratenan ta. Taosya rana mangalalas a kano meyraraten a icicirawat an. Ta o manownaw a onowned a kano manoyong a nanao o ahapen ta, akman so kabwan no kosozi a odong.

language1_text: I wrote unto you in an epistle not to company with fornicators:
language2_text: O mina teygami ko jinyo no kakwa am nipaziman ko na jinyo o kaji nyo macihzan do mapasagpyan so nakenakem a tao.

language1_text: yet not altogether with the fornicators of this world, or with the covetous, or extortioners, or with idolaters; for then must ye needs go out of the world.
language2_text: O ko ipanci am beken a ji manaralay a tao a somagpyan, mangamkam, manakaw a kano manaralay so malas a iraralay. Ta no si karwan ta na o karawan saon o ji ta macikaopi jira.

language1_text: But now I have written unto you not to keep company, if any man that is called a brother be a fornicator, or covetous, or an idolater, or a railer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner; with such an one no not to eat.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no ciring ko am ji macihza do mapasagpyan so nakenakem na, mangamkam, manaralay so malas a iraralay, mangangavain, masakisakin a kano manakaw a ji mamlis so nakenakem a sinjya. So ikanoyong no kaji nyo macihzan jira a ji macihanghang jira.

language1_text: For what have I to do to judge them also that are without? do not ye judge them that are within? But them that are without God judgeth. Therefore put away from among yourselves that wicked person.
language2_text: Ji ta zyakan sira o ji manaralay a tao, ta si Ama ta do to o mapacici sira. Am o manaralay a tao am jyabo kaji ta mapatwawan so raraten da. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Pasyain nyo jinyo o meyraraten a tao."Ji ta zyakan sira o ji manaralay a tao, ta si Ama ta do to o mapacici sira. Am o manaralay a tao am jyabo kaji ta mapatwawan so raraten da. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Pasyain nyo jinyo o meyraraten a tao."

language1_text: Dare any of you, having a matter against another, go to law before the unjust, and not before the saints?
language2_text: No amyan so ikazyak nyo a vazay no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai am ji nyo mancyan do ji manaralay a mapacicici a tao. Ta to nyo na zavata do akma nyoy kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: Do ye not know that the saints shall judge the world? and if the world shall be judged by you, are ye unworthy to judge the smallest matters?
language2_text: Manngwa, nyo jyatenngi yaten a italamozong na ni Ama ta do to o mapacici so tao do karawan no makwa? No si inyo eya mapacici so tao eya am manngwa, ji nyo rana zavat o likta a vazay?

language1_text: Know ye not that we shall judge angels? how much more things that pertain to this life?
language2_text: Manngwa, nyo jyatenngi tamo kapacici so tinsi no makwa? Kakwakwan no nang a ney manngo rana o vazay do karawan.

language1_text: If then ye have judgments of things pertaining to this life, set them to judge who are least esteemed in the church.
language2_text: No akman sang a keyyan no ikazyak nyo am manngwa, ipanci nyo sira o ji manaralay a tao a mangay omzavat sya?

language1_text: I speak to your shame. Is it so, that there is not a wise man among you? no, not one that shall be able to judge between his brethren?
language2_text: Tey macimasnek o akman sang. Manngwa, yabwata rana jinyo o yasa ka mapatak a tao a mangay omzavat so ikazyak da no akma tey kakteh do cinai?

language1_text: But brother goeth to law with brother, and that before the unbelievers.
language2_text: Ikeykongo kamo a yamakalavat so da karatan no kakteh nyo do tangain no ji nganoyong ji Yeso a tao.

language1_text: Now therefore there is utterly a fault among you, because ye go to law one with another. Why do ye not rather take wrong? Why do ye not rather suffer yourselves to be defrauded?
language2_text: O yongkad no nyo karatan am nyo kapaciraherahet. Ikeykong kamo a yajya todalpid so nakenakem.

language1_text: Nay, ye do wrong, and defraud, and that your brethren.
