language1_text: But I fear, lest by any means, as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty, so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ.
language2_text: Am yako ikanyahey o kapeyparahet no onowned nyo a todahamang rana ji Yeso Kizisto, akman si Iwa a nilittan no volay.

language1_text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus, whom we have not preached, or if ye receive another spirit, which ye have not received, or another gospel, which ye have not accepted, ye might well bear with him.
language2_text: Ikeykongo kamo a yato mamyapya no yamacitarek so ipeylimwang a ka nyamen a yaomagaz ji Yeso. Ikeykongo kamo eya a to nganoyong do macitarek so ipeylimwang a Seyzi a kano Mapasaray a Ciriciring.

language1_text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles.
language2_text: Ko ji nganoyngi o ko katonton do yamangalalas a beken a lamlamsoy ni Kizisto.

language1_text: But though I be rude in speech, yet not in knowledge; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things.
language2_text: Tana ko jyateneteneng a meyzezyak am jyabo katonton ko so teneteneng jira mangalalas a tao. So yako ikasangib a yamapacita no akman sang a vazay jinyo.

language1_text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted, because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely?
language2_text: No ko pamizngen inyo no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am yabwata asa ka apzapzatan a yako nyami jinyo. Ko to pakabowa o kataotao ko, do ko kapyapya pa jinyo a meypahagnat so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to. Manngwa, ko kalasan o akman sang?

language1_text: I robbed other churches, taking wages of them, to do you service.
language2_text: No kapeyvazay ko pa jinyo do dang am patodahan da yaken no tatasa ka kyokay. So yako icyakmey jyaninig no kyokay ori a yako peylamsoin a yasomidong jinyo.

language1_text: And when I was present with you, and wanted, I was chargeable to no man: for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied: and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you, and so will I keep myself.
language2_text: No keyyan ko pa jinyo do dang am tana amyan so ikeykakza ko am ji ko pa nimapasyasi jinyo. So ikamimin na apo do akma koy kakteh do cinai do Maciton no mapatodeh jyaken. Tana no kakwa am tana no makwa am akman sang. Jyabo kapamyapya ko no kataotao ko a ikazikna nyo a.

language1_text: As the truth of Christ is in me, no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia.
language2_text: Abo malas a ciring ni Yeso. So icyakman ko sang a jyalas so ciring jinyo. Am ori o ko jyamoi a manci nya do pongso no Sila so kakman ko sang a ji ngakday so patodahen da jyaken.

language1_text: Wherefore? because I love you not? God knoweth.
language2_text: Ikongo ko peycirngan sang. Manngwa, ko jyarilawan inyo? Cyaha, ta na katenngan ni Ama ta do to o ko karilawan ninyo.

language1_text: But what I do, that I will do, that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion; that wherein they glory, they may be found even as we.
language2_text: So ji ko mirwai do akman sang a nakenakem ko a mahap so patodahen nyo jyaken. Ta izavat ko so pazwayan da so ciring da no mangalalas a beken a lamlamsoy ni Kizisto, do kabo no pacicingayan no vazay da jyamen.

language1_text: For such are false apostles, deceitful workers, transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ.
language2_text: Sira rana mangalalas a tao am beken a meyngongyod sira a lamlamsoy ni Kizisto. Ta sira ji macipayok so icicirawat.

language1_text: And no marvel; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light.
language2_text: Am jyabo kazyak no akman sang a. Ta kakwakwan ni Satan a mapatpetpeh akmey maniray a tinsi ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness; whose end shall be according to their works.
language2_text: Am ori o ji ta ngyaki no mangalalas a tao a peylamsoin ni Satan a akmey apiya so ciring. Ta to rana tenngi o pangavosan no vazay da no akman sang a tao pasingsingtan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I say again, Let no man think me a fool; if otherwise, yet as a fool receive me, that I may boast myself a little.
language2_text: So ko olyan pa sya ipanci. Jyabo kapasagsagpyan da jyaken no tao a. Tana pasagsagpyanen nyo yaken am amizngen nyo yaken an a mapazway so aliket a vazay.

language1_text: That which I speak, I speak it not after the Lord, but as it were foolishly, in this confidence of boasting.
language2_text: O ciring ko na sicyaikwaya am beken a si Yeso Kizisto o yamapahanhan jyaken a yamanci nya. Ta monganay jyaken a mapazway so kataotao ko.

language1_text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh, I will glory also.
language2_text: Am da katey yaro no tao a mapazway so monganay jira vazay. Ori o ko ikakman sahang.

language1_text: For ye suffer fools gladly, seeing ye yourselves are wise.
language2_text: Inyo rana am kamo todamimin a yamateteneng a tao. Am ikeykongo kamo eya to mamyapya no jyapsepsek so onowned a tao!

language1_text: For ye suffer, if a man bring you into bondage, if a man devour you, if a man take of you, if a man exalt himself, if a man smite you on the face.
language2_text: Ta no peylamsoin da inyo am littan da inyo am soziban da inyo am ji da ninigan inyo am somiplang so posngi nyo am nyo to macyozai sira.

language1_text: I speak as concerning reproach, as though we had been weak. Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold, (I speak foolishly, ) I am bold also.
language2_text: Ji ko nasnek a manci nya jinyo am o akman rana sang a vazay am namen jyadkeci a peyvazain. Am no myan so tao a mapazway so vazay da am to ko na mancyan o kateneng ko a mapazway.

language1_text: Are they Hebrews? so am I. Are they Israelites? so am I. Are they the seed of Abraham? so am I.
language2_text: No si Sipolay a tao sira am Sipolay ko an. No si Isedi a tao sira am Isedi ko an. No si apwapo na sira ni Apolahan am apo na yaken an.

language1_text: Are they ministers of Christ? (I speak as a fool) I am more; in labours more abundant, in stripes above measure, in prisons more frequent, in deaths oft.
language2_text: No si lamlamsoy na sira ni Kizisto am ji ko pazway a ciring ko am jyabo kaji ko a haraharan pa ka nira. Ta yarakorako o zikzikna ko so vazay na ni Ama ta do to. Yako ipiro a da aptengen, yada bakbakan, kaji ko angayan no inawan.

language1_text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one.
language2_text: Ipeylima ko a bakbakan da no tao do Yotay. No sipzotan da yaken am asyam o kasikapat na (39) no karwaro na no ibakbak da jyaken.

language1_text: Thrice was I beaten with rods, once was I stoned, thrice I suffered shipwreck, a night and a day I have been in the deep;
language2_text: Ipitlo da yaken a bakbakan no sisipzot no tao do Loma. Ipisa da yaken no tao a nigsahan. Ipitlo ko a apwaro do karakwan no awa. Ipisa ko a kasaraw a kano kasahep do karakwan no awa a to meyyawawat.

language1_text: in journeyings often, in perils of waters, in perils of robbers, in perils by mine own countrymen, in perils by the heathen, in perils in the city, in perils in the wilderness, in perils in the sea, in perils among false brethren;
language2_text: No kalivon ko am apokwaro no kapeykaranom na, apokwaro do marahet so nakenakem a tao, pacyangayan no alalaw ko do tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay a kano alalaw ko do rako a ili da no aro a tao a kano alalaw ko do kabwan no nihakawan no tao a kano alalaw ko do karakwan no awa, a kapacyangay no alalaw ko do ji meyngongyod a akma koy kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: in weariness and painfulness, in watchings often, in hunger and thirst, in fastings often, in cold and nakedness.
language2_text: Jingwan sang am masangib ko a ji makaitkeh do katey mazikna ko no kataotao. No makcin ko, mawaw ko, abo isanan ko, mahen ko am akman sira sang o ikarahet ko.

language1_text: Beside those things that are without, that which cometh upon me daily, the care of all the churches.
language2_text: Beken a ori an, ta akma koy malpid no kataotao no masagpaw a rara ko, do kaji ko angnedan no ninyakan a makanakem so peycyakyokyokayan na.

language1_text: Who is weak, and I am not weak? who is offended, and I burn not?
language2_text: Ta sino ji ko ingenen no onowned a malma so onowned. Sino ji ko a zababan so onowned a meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: If I must needs glory, I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities.
language2_text: Si zowain ko o kataotao ko am apyapya pa kapazway ko so makakaday a alalaw ko.

language1_text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which is blessed for evermore, knoweth that I lie not.
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to a Ama na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta o makateneng jyaken a ji mangalalas. Iya o manoyong a azwazwain ta so ngaran mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison, desirous to apprehend me:
language2_text: No keyyan ko pa do Tamaseke am o kalamsoyan no panirsirngen a meyngaran so Aleta am nitovoy na o pamzaten da do ngoso no ili da amrakep jyaken.

language1_text: and through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall, and escaped his hands.
language2_text: Am keyyan no sinjya a nitomonton jyaken no kolili do yala a pakasen do pazevngen no makarang a atoy no ahad no ili da. Ori o nipakasaway ko. So ji na nimakarakepi jyaken.

language1_text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory. I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord.
language2_text: Abwata kapyapyan no mapazway. Am na keyyan pa no yalikey yako pazwain. Sicyaikwaya am ko malavat o nitoro na jyaken ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a akmey tatateynep a nimacita ko.

language1_text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago, (whether in the body, I cannot tell; or whether out of the body, I cannot tell: God knoweth;) such an one caught up to the third heaven.
language2_text: Ko katenngan o keyyan no yasa ka sinjya a mina kapat so icyarwa (14) so awan a nikatkat na do teyngato ni Ama ta do to. Am ko jyatenngi kanimangay na no kataotao na, ta ala pahad na nimangay do teyngato.

language1_text: And I knew such a man, (whether in the body, or out of the body, I cannot tell: God knoweth;)
language2_text: So ko olyan sya ipanci. O tao rana ori am nimangay do kapyapyan. Am ko jyatenngi kanimangay na no kataotao na, ta ala pahad na nimangay do teyngato. So ko ji makatenngi jya, ta si Ama ta do to yamakateneng jya.

language1_text: how that he was caught up into paradise, and heard unspeakable words, which it is not lawful for a man to utter.
language2_text: Amyan do dang am makamizing ori so ji na mya a ipeycicici a vazay ni Ama ta do to. Ori rana am jyatenngi a ononongan a vazay.

language1_text: Of such an one will I glory: yet of myself I will not glory, but in mine infirmities.
language2_text: O akman rana sang a tao am ko pazwain. Am yaken rana am yabo ko pazwain do kataotao ko. Ta o yamakakaday a alalaw ko am ori o yako pazwain.

language1_text: For though I would desire to glory, I shall not be a fool; for I will say the truth: but now I forbear, lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be, or that he heareth of me.
language2_text: Am no si manoyong o kapazway ko so kataotao ko am abo karatan no nang. Ta abo na kalalasan no ciriciring ko. Am ko kaji mapazwayan. Ta ko jyakzan o da kazwazway jyaken no tao, do kabo no teywara nimacita da, nimamizing da a monganay jyaken.

language1_text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations, there was given to me a thorn in the flesh, the messenger of Satan to buffet me, lest I should be exalted above measure.
language2_text: Ta maraherahet o kazway ko so teywara a nimacita ko a vazay do teyngato. So na iyan do kataotao ko no ko maliliw a akma ney bakbakan jyaken ni Satan. Ori o ko ji makadkeci do ko kapazway so kataotao ko.

language1_text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice, that it might depart from me.
language2_text: Yako ipitlo a yamapasyasi ji Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a mapakaro so akman sang a ingingnen ko.

language1_text: And he said unto me, My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities, that the power of Christ may rest upon me.
language2_text: O na nitovis jyaken am, "Cyaha, ta yarakorako rana o aryarilaw ko jimo. Ta ko mangay oyatan imo no abo oyowyat mo." Ori an o ko apyapyan pa so ko kapazway so oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to do kataotao ko. Ta nioyatan na yaken no kabo no oyowyat ko.

language1_text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities, in reproaches, in necessities, in persecutions, in distresses for Christ's sake: for when I am weak, then am I strong.
language2_text: Am ori an, ko na to meyhanhanan si Kizisto. So ji ko a raci nya no kangangay no yabo oyowyat ko, da avain yaken, no myan so rako a alalaw ko a kano peyrarehtan da jyaken do kahap ko so vazay ni Kizisto. Ta no abo oyowyat ko am na oyatan yaken ni Kizisto.

language1_text: I am become a fool in glorying; ye have compelled me: for I ought to have been commended of you: for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles, though I be nothing.
language2_text: Yako akmey mapazway a tao. Am monganay jinyo o yako ikakman sang a yaji mapazway jyaken do tangain no malas a tao. Tana abo angangayan ko am jyabo kaji ko maciktwan do yamangalalas a beken a lamlamsoy ni Kizisto a.

language1_text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience, in signs, and wonders, and mighty deeds.
language2_text: No keyyan ko pa jinyo do dang am tana masaod ko o alalaw ko am ji ko macimazai o vazay ko. So iyan no yeyyak nyo a vazay, yeyyak nyo a oyowyat, mapeyzokab a vazay akmey yongkad ko jinyo do kanoyong ko a nipamnekan ni Kizisto a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches, except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you? forgive me this wrong.
language2_text: Yabo nyo pacinasan do peycyakyokyokayan na. O ko kaji mangapan so nyo nipatodeh jyaken. So to nyo peykaboboi so kalasan ko a jya nimahap so patodahen nyo jyaken!

language1_text: Behold, the third time I am ready to come to you; and I will not be burdensome to you: for I seek not your's, but you: for the children ought not to lay up for the parents, but the parents for the children.
language2_text: Ko naknakmen o ko keypitlo a mangay a tomazogaw ninyo. Am yabo ko kakzeben jinyo. Ko kakzeben am inyo. Beken a nizpi. Ta o kanakan am beken allamen da o inyapwan da. Ta o inyapwan am ori o amlam so ananak da.

language1_text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you; though the more abundantly I love you, the less I be loved.
language2_text: Ko ikakza inyo a sidongen an. So ikapyapya na pa no kangay no inawan ko a kapakasidong ko so pahad nyo. Manngwa, ipeyparahet nyo so nakem jyaken o karilaw ko ninyo?

language1_text: But be it so, I did not burden you: nevertheless, being crafty, I caught you with guile.
language2_text: Yabo nyo kalalasan do kaji ko nimziknan jinyo. Am na keyyan no tao a yamanci no ko kapamizing jinyo no yamalas a yamahap so nizpi nyo.

language1_text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you?
language2_text: Manngwa, manoyong o kanimapasonson ko so tao a amlita jinyo an?

language1_text: I desired Titus, and with him I sent a brother. Did Titus make a gain of you? walked we not in the same spirit? walked we not in the same steps?
language2_text: Nipanci ko si Tito a mangay a tomazogaw ninyo. So nipanovoy ko so tao a macihza jya a mangay. Am nilittan na inyo ni Tito? Jyabo na kaji macingayan jyaken so nakem a. Jyabo namen kaji meyyangangayan no namen ahahapan sya a.

language1_text: Again, think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you? we speak before God in Christ: but we do all things, dearly beloved, for your edifying.
language2_text: Ala nyo ipanci yamen a yamangamaog no kataotao namen so ciring. Am to ko na macitangayan jinyo am namen jyakman sang an. Ta o ciriciring ni Kizisto o namen ipanci jinyo do tangain ni Ama ta do to. Manga keypong, o vazay namen am namen kanakenakem so yakasidong jinyo a peypahagnaten so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For I fear, lest, when I come, I shall not find you such as I would, and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not: lest there be debates, envyings, wraths, strifes, backbitings, whisperings, swellings, tumults:
language2_text: O ko ihawa si mangay ko jinyo do dang am macita ko inyo a macitarek rana so nakenakem. Macita nyo yaken a macitarek so nakem jinyo. Ko ihawa ko kapakacita so manginanahet a kano maciskaskad a kano maoyaoyahen a kano mabayo a kano manamwad a kano mangamizing so ciring do palawawan, mapazway a kano mapeyvonag so tao.

language1_text: and lest, when I come again, my God will humble me among you, and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already, and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed.
language2_text: Ko ihawa o kapacimasesnek ko ninyo do tangain ni Ama ta do to no ipisa mangay ko jinyo. Jyabo kaji ko lavyan a makacita so aro a somagpyan a kano mangzakza no kakwa pa a ji mamlis so nakem a tao a.

language1_text: This is the third time I am coming to you. In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established.
language2_text: Ikeypitlo ko na ya mangay a tomita jinyo. Naknakmen nyo an. Ta taosya o kapaciraherahet nyo ano jya rarwa, tatlo o yongkad nyo a nimakacita sira. Ta ori o ikanoyong na. Ta ori rana am ciring do Seysyo.

language1_text: I told you before, and foretell you, as if I were present, the second time; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned, and to all other, that, if I come again, I will not spare:
language2_text: Ko ipanci pa jinyo akman so nipaziman ko na jinyo no keypidwa ko a mai jinyo no kakwa. Am manakem nyo no kaji ko pa angayan jinyo sicyaikwaya an. Ta no ipisa mai ko am jyabo asa ka tao a makatayo do oyaoyyan ko ninyo a.

language1_text: since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me, which to you-ward is not weak, but is mighty in you.
language2_text: So iyan na pa no makakaday a yongkad nyo do kakma ney mapatwaw sya ni Kizisto so ciring na jyaken. So ipakacita nyo so oyowyat na ni Kizisto a meydedna do meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: For though he was crucified through weakness, yet he liveth by the power of God. For we also are weak in him, but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you.
language2_text: Tana yakmey yabo oyowyat na ni Kizisto do yada kanimapadket sya do jyojika am oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to o yanimapeyvangon sya. So namen ikakman sang akmey abo so oyowyat a yamacikaop ji Kizisto. Am no namen ioya inyo am oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to o namen pangozayan an.

language1_text: Examine yourselves, whether ye be in the faith; prove your own selves. Know ye not your own selves, how that Jesus Christ is in you, except ye be reprobates?
language2_text: Ileylamdamen nyo pala o kataotao nyo. Manngwa, nyo pangononongan o nanao na ni Ama ta do to? Manngwa, nyo jyatenngi na keyyan ni Yeso Kizisto jinyo? No si abo am ji kamo anoyong pa a omanoyong jya.

language1_text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates.
language2_text: Ko ipeyhanhan inyo a makateneng jyamen a manoyong a lamlamsoy ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil; not that we should appear approved, but that ye should do that which is honest, though we be as reprobates.
language2_text: Namen ipeynozi ji Ama ta do to o kaji nyo mapeyvazayan so marahet a vazay a ikaoya namen no si makaranes namen jinyo. Ta namen ikakza o kanoyong nyo rana apiya so nakenakem. Tana abo rana o vazay namen jinyo am cyaha, ta manoyong kamo na omonot ji Kizisto.

language1_text: For we can do nothing against the truth, but for the truth.
language2_text: Ta o vazay namen am kapangozay namen do manoyong a nanao a mapeypahagnat jinyo.

language1_text: For we are glad, when we are weak, and ye are strong: and this also we wish, even your perfection.
language2_text: Tana da ipanci yamen a abo so oyowyat a omwoya ninyo a kakdeng no nakenakem nyo ji Ama ta do to am isaray namen o akman sang. O namen kakzeben am kapeypahagnat nyo so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Therefore I write these things being absent, lest being present I should use sharpness, according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification, and not to destruction.
language2_text: O ko peyteygamyan ninyo am ko kakzeben o kaji ko oyyan ninyo a mangozay do oyowyat na ni Kizisto no si mai ko jinyo do dang. Ta o yana nitoro ni Kizisto a oyowyat na jyaken am isidong ko jinyo. Beken a ioya ko inyo.

language1_text: Finally, brethren, farewell. Be perfect, be of good comfort, be of one mind, live in peace; and the God of love and peace shall be with you.
language2_text: O ney manowji na yako ipanci jinyo manga kakteh am makowyowyat kamo pa mapeypahagnat so nakenakem nyo ji Kizisto an. So ahapan nyo so ivavaga ko jinyo, akman si Yeso so onowned a apiya so nakenakem do icyatatao na. Ta jyabo kaji na macitovongan jinyo no yatey rako so pangangarilawan na kano yamanta nyaten so ikapiya ta so onowned a Tao do to ta.

language1_text: Greet one another with an holy kiss.
language2_text: Inyo rana am masicyakarilaw kamo a meyminaminasi no kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: All the saints salute you.
language2_text: So da ikamimin no sinjya do jya a yameyminaminasi ninyo.

language1_text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost, be with you all. Amen. The second epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
language2_text: Inaoy no si macitovong jinyo o pangangasyan ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta kano pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a kapzat na jinyo no Seyzi.

language1_text: Paul, an apostle, (not of men, neither by man, but by Jesus Christ, and God the Father, who raised him from the dead;)
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko. O yako ipeyngongyod a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to am beken a tao o yaniomrara jyaken a omlivolivon no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to, ta si Yeso Kizisto a kani Ama ta do to a nimapeyvangon si Yeso Kizisto o yanitomovoy jyaken.

language1_text: and all the brethren which are with me, unto the churches of Galatia:
language2_text: Yaken rana kano akma tey kakteh do cinai do jya am yanamen ipeyteygami inyo a peycyakyokyokayan na do Cyalatay.

language1_text: grace be to you and peace from God the Father, and from our Lord Jesus Christ,
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na kano ikapiya na no onowned nyo.

language1_text: who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:
language2_text: Si Yeso Kizisto am na pahawahen yaten do raraten do karawan. Am ori o na pangozayan do nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to a mawakwak no raraten ta.

language1_text: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
language2_text: Inaoy no azwazwain ta si Ama ta do to mangay do kaidan no karawan. Amin.

language1_text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:
language2_text: Ko ikeyngen inyo so onowned a yato ngaro do pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a yanimamnek jinyo a nyo kahap so yamalas a nanao.

language1_text: which is not another; but there be some that trouble you, and would pervert the gospel of Christ.
language2_text: Am to ko na mancyan jinyo am abo o ikadwa na no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Am da kapeykawaw jinyo no tao a komaro do manoyong a nanao ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: But though we, or an angel from heaven, preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you, let him be accursed.
language2_text: Am tana yamen a tana nimapo do teyngato a tinsi na ni Ama ta do to am no si macitarek a kano ninanao namen jinyo no kakwa o inanao da jinyo am manoyong akman sira ori a peydednan no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: As we said before, so say I now again, If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received, let him be accursed.
language2_text: Nipanci namen rana jinyo no kakwa pa am yako ipanci pa jinyo am no myan so meylimwang nya jinyo so macitarek a nanao a kaji na meyyangayan a kano nimamizing nyo na no kakwa am manoyong o kapeydedna na jira no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For do I now persuade men, or God? or do I seek to please men? for if I yet pleased men, I should not be the servant of Christ.
language2_text: Manngwa, ko kakzeben o kazwazway da jyaken no tao a kapanci ko no akman sang? Jyabo kakman na sang a. O ko ikakza am azwain na yaken ni Ama ta do to. Manngwa, ko ikakza o kazwazway da jyaken no tao? No ikakza ko o tao a omazway jyaken am beken a lamlamsoy na yaken ni Kizisto.

language1_text: But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, to ko na macitangayan jinyo am o ko ipeylimwang jinyo a Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am beken a nimyapo do tao.

language1_text: For I neither received it of man, neither was I taught it, but by the revelation of Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Yabo yasa ka tao a ko nipacyamizngan a ko nipacinanawan so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta si Yeso Kizisto o mina to manci rana nya jyaken.

language1_text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews' religion, how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God, and wasted it:
language2_text: Nyo katenngan o iwawalam ko no kapacibedbed ko pa do anodan namen a tao do Yotay. Ta tey makdeng ko a mapakakasi so amraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a tao. Naknakmen ko o kawakwak ko sira.

language1_text: and profited in the Jews' religion above many my equals in mine own nation, being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers.
language2_text: Makdekdeng ko pa kano kapalangayan ko a tao do Yotay a mahap so iwawalam namen do anodan namen a tao do Yotay. Tana nanao da no ineynapo namen no kakwa am akman sang, ta tey makdeng ko a mangozay jya.

language1_text: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother's womb, and called me by his grace,
language2_text: No kaji ko pa nimatazakan a tao am nipamnekan na rana yaken a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to, do karilaw na nyaken.

language1_text: to reveal his Son in me, that I might preach him among the heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:
language2_text: Nipacita na jyaken o Anak na. Am ori o nipakateneng ko do Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Kizisto a ipeylimwang do beken a tao do Yotay. So ikabo no tao a nipacyamizngan ko.

language1_text: neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me; but I went into Arabia, and returned again unto Damascus.
language2_text: Yako ji nimangay do Yelosaleng a macyamizing do nimanmanma pa ka nyaken a amlivolivon no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a tao. Ta nimangay ko do Alapo a kapeysinaoli ko na mangay do Tamaseke.

language1_text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter, and abode with him fifteen days.
language2_text: Ikatlo na kawan am mangay ko ji Pite do Yelosaleng a macivahay jya so makalima so icyarwa (15) so araraw.

language1_text: But other of the apostles saw I none, save James the Lord's brother.
language2_text: So ji ko nimakacitai so karwan da nipamnekan na ni Yeso Kizisto a amlivolivon no ciriciring na. O wari na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a meyngaran so Yake o nimacita ko. So ji ko nimakacitai so karwan da a nipamnekan na ni Yeso Kizisto a amlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: Now the things which I write unto you, behold, before God, I lie not.
language2_text: Yabo o yamalas do teygami ko ya a ciring ko. Pacyanoyngan na yaken ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangay ko na do Sidiya kado Cidicya.

language1_text: and was unknown by face unto the churches of Judæ a which were in Christ:
language2_text: No kano nang am ji da pa nimacita yaken no sinjya do Yotay.

language1_text: but they had heard only, That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.
language2_text: Kapakamizing da jyaken a yameylimwang rana no ciriciring na ni Kizisto a nimacioya jya no kakwa pa.

language1_text: And they glorified God in me.
language2_text: Am ori o yada rana sarayan ya ni Ama ta do to, do yako kapamlis rana a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas, and took Titus with me also.
language2_text: Ikapat na so icyarwa (14) no awawan am macihza ko ji Parnapo a mangay do Yelosaleng a kapehza ko si Tito.

language1_text: And I went up by revelation, and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles, but privately to them which were of reputation, lest by any means I should run, or had run, in vain.
language2_text: O yangay ko do Yelosaleng am onotan ko o ciring na ni Ama ta do to a manci nya do panipanirsirngen no kyokay so mina vazay ko no kapeylimwang ko no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do beken a tao do Yotay. Ta ji ko mamyapyan o kapanci da no vazay ko ji Ama ta do to no kakwa a kasicyakwaya abo so peypeypangayan.

language1_text: But neither Titus, who was with me, being a Greek, was compelled to be circumcised:
language2_text: Ikongo do nisaray da o vazay ko no kanang, am ori o ji da nimgacigaci ji Tito amyongkad do kataotao na a mahap so iwawalam ni Moyse. Ta si Tito rana am beken a tao do Yotay, ta tao do Sila.

language1_text: and that because of false brethren unawares brought in, who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage:
language2_text: Am yamyan so tatasa ka tao a yanimacizavoz a yamapatpeh so kataotao da. Sira ori am kakzeben da si Tito a amyongkad do kataotao na. Am sira rana am beken a kayyai da, ta ileylamdamen da yamen a yamraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a tao. Ta manngo paro sira. Ala ahapen da o iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: to whom we gave place by subjection, no, not for an hour; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you.
language2_text: Am ji namen mamyapyan o kablis na no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a nipeylimwang namen jinyo. Am ori o ji namen nimapaoyoi jira.

language1_text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat, (whatsoever they were, it maketh no matter to me: God accepteth no man's person:) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me:
language2_text: Am sira rana panipanirsirngen am ji ko ngezsangan o keynakem da, kato da katawwan. Ta si Ama ta do to rana am ji na nita o akman sang. O ko pancyan no nang am abo nikarahet da do ipangnanao ko.

language1_text: but contrariwise, when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me, as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter;
language2_text: To da rana tenngi o kanitomovoy na jyaken ni Ama ta do to a yamangay a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na do beken a tao do Yotay. Akman sang si Pite a nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to do tao do Yotay a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na.

language1_text: (for he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision, the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles:)
language2_text: Ta si Ama ta do to o yaniomoyat jyaken a mangay do beken a tao do Yotay, akman si Pite a nitovoy na ni Ama ta do to a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na do tao do Yotay.

language1_text: and when James, Cephas, and John, who seemed to be pillars, perceived the grace that was given unto me, they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship; that we should go unto the heathen, and they unto the circumcision.
language2_text: Am katenngan da no panipanirsirngen do kyokay a si Yake a kani Pite a kani Yowani o ka yaken na no nipanta na ni Ama ta do to so oyowyat a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na do beken a tao do Yotay am isaray da yaken a kani Parnapo. Am ori o mina to da macipanadngi jyamen a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to do beken a tao do Yotay. Am sira am to sira tarek a mapamizing so tao do Yotay.

language1_text: Only they would that we should remember the poor; the same which I also was forward to do.
language2_text: Da kakzeben yamen a makanakem so makcin a tao do Yelosaleng. O akman rana sang am yamangday ori a yako naknakmen a vazay.

language1_text: But when Peter was come to Antioch, I withstood him to the face, because he was to be blamed.
language2_text: Mownay am mangay si Pite do Antia. Am ikongo do amyan so kalasan na, am ori o ninanawan ko sya.

language1_text: For before that certain came from James, he did eat with the Gentiles: but when they were come, he withdrew and separated himself, fearing them which were of the circumcision.
language2_text: Ta no keyyan na rana ni Pite do Antia am nimacyakan do beken a tao do Yotay a sinjya. Am makaranes rana sira o nitovoy ni Yake a tao do Yotay am ji na ranadkeci ni Pite o kapacyakan na do beken a tao do Yotay. Ta ihawa na sira o tao do Yotay a mazyak nya. Ta sira rana am pangozayan da pa o iwawalam ni Moyse a amyongkad do kataotao da.

language1_text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation.
language2_text: Macita da no karwan da no tao do Yotay si Pite a akmey jya nikoman am to da nginara si Pite. So nikakman na sang ni Parnapo.

language1_text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel, I said unto Peter before them all, If thou, being a Jew, livest after the manner of Gentiles, and not as do the Jews, why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews?
language2_text: Macita ko o iwawalam da a macisala do Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am maniring ko ji Pite do tangain da no aro a tao am, "Imo am tao do Yotay ka. Am iwawalam mo am beken a tao do Yotay a yaji mangozay do adan a iwawalam ta a tao do Yotay. Ikeykongo ka yamgacigat do beken a tao do Yotay a mangozay do iwawalam da no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: We who are Jews by nature, and not sinners of the Gentiles,
language2_text: "Yajyalas. Ta imo a ka nyaken am ta manoyong a yamacitetngehan do tao do Yotay. So ji ta nginarai so beken a tao do Yotay a ji ngahap so iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law, but by the faith of Jesus Christ, even we have believed in Jesus Christ, that we might be justified by the faith of Christ, and not by the works of the law: for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified.
language2_text: Am ta katenngan an, o ipacikaop no tao ji Ama ta do to am anoyngan si Yeso Kizisto. Beken a omagaz do kahap so iwawalam ni Moyse. Yaten rana am yata anoyngan si Yeso Kizisto. Am ori o ta ipacikaop ji Ama ta do to. So na ji monganai do ta kapangozay do iwawalam na ni Moyse. Ta abo o asa ka tao a meypapya no iwawalam na ni Moyse do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But if, while we seek to be justified by Christ, we ourselves also are found sinners, is therefore Christ the minister of sin? God forbid.
language2_text: Yaten rana a yaomanoyong ji Kizisto a nibnek na ni Ama ta do to a abo rana so raraten do tangain na am no si meyyangay ta kano beken a tao do Yotay a meyraraten am manngwa, apyahen na ni Kizisto o kapeyraraten ta saon? Jyabo kapya na sya a.

language1_text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed, I make myself a transgressor.
language2_text: Am no si olin ko pa hapen o iwawalam ni Moyse am raraten ko ori.

language1_text: For I through the law am dead to the law, that I might live unto God.
language2_text: Yaken rana am ko katenngan o kaji makahapan so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ko no si pangozayan ko o iwawalam ni Moyse. Am ori o ko na ji ngapi so iwawalam ni Moyse. Ta ko na hapen o vazay na ni Ama ta do to. Ko akmey to macizasing so kataotao ji Kizisto a nimawakwak do jyojika.

language1_text: I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God, who loved me, and gave himself for me.
language2_text: Am ori an, ikabeken a yaken rana no yamavyay sicyaikwaya. Ta si Kizisto rana o yamavyay do onowned ko. O yako ikavyay sicyaikwaya am yako ipeyhanhan o Anak na ni Ama ta do to. Na nikarilaw yaken a na nyangay no inawan.

language1_text: I do not frustrate the grace of God: for if righteousness come by the law, then Christ is dead in vain.
language2_text: Ko ji zazaci o pangangasyan na ni Ama ta do to. No si iwawalam na ni Moyse o abnekan na jyaken ni Ama ta do to a abo rana so raraten do tangain na am manngwa, abo saon o peypeypangayan no na kanimawakwak ni Kizisto am."

language1_text: O foolish Galatians, who hath bewitched you, that ye should not obey the truth, before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth, crucified among you?
language2_text: Inyo rana abwata so kapsepsekan a tao do Cyalatay am yamanoyong na kanidomket ni Yeso Kizisto do jyojika. Am sinosino yamapeykawaw jinyo. Manngwa, kamo mavota saon?

language1_text: This only would I learn of you, Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?
language2_text: Pancyan kamo pala jyaken. Iwawalam na ni Moyse o yanyo ipakahap so Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to? No yapo do yanyo nimamizing a Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Are ye so foolish? having begun in the Spirit, are ye now made perfect by the flesh?
language2_text: Yakamo meypanngonngo a yakmey abo so nakem. No kakwa am nipeyhanhan nyo o Seyzi a tomalamozong ninyo. Am ikongo kamo a to mangozangozay do nyo ahapan sya a mapasaray si Ama ta do to sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain? if it be yet in vain.
language2_text: Manngwa, abo peypeypangayan na no kato nyo meyrektan do mina alalaw nyo no kakwa? Jyabo kakman na sang a.

language1_text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit, and worketh miracles among you, doeth he it by the works of the law, or by the hearing of faith?
language2_text: Na nitoro ni Ama ta do to o Seyzi jinyo a yamapeyvazay so mapeyzokab a vazay. Am manngwa, yamonganay ori do yanyo kahap so iwawalam na ni Moyse? No yamonganay do yanyo kanimakamizing so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
language2_text: Akman si Apolahan a nimalavat da do Seysyo. Maniring am, "Iya rana am nyanoyngan na si Ama ta do to. Am ori o nibnekan na sya a abo so raraten do tangain na."

language1_text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith, the same are the children of Abraham.
language2_text: Am ori an, no si myan so tao a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to am manoyong ori a macikownongan ji Apolahan.

language1_text: And the scripture, foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith, preached before the gospel unto Abraham, saying, In thee shall all nations be blessed.
language2_text: Nipaziman na rana ni Ama ta do to do Seysyo o kabnek na so beken a tao do Yotay a abo so raraten do tangain na, do kapeyhanhan da ni Ama ta do to. So nipazimanan na rana sya ji Apolahan so akman sang a Mapasaray a Ciriciring no kakwa pa. Maniring am, "Mamimin o tao do karawan a ipanta ko so aryarilaw ko, do mo kapeyhanhan nyaken."

language1_text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham.
language2_text: Nyanoyngan na ni Apolahan. Ori o nikarilawan na nya ni Ama ta do to. So ikamimin no omanoyong jya tao a ikarilaw na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse: for it is written, Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them.
language2_text: O tao a meyhanhan no iwawalam na ni Moyse am meydedna jira o peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to, do kaji da makataptapan sya a peyvazain. Ta o ciring do Seysyo am, "O tao a ji makataptap sya peyvazain so yadomket a iwawalam ni Moyse am mangay jira o peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God, it is evident: for, The just shall live by faith.
language2_text: Ori o ikanoyong no kabo no asa ka tao a abneken na ni Ama ta do to a abo so raraten do tangain na a mangozay do iwawalam ni Moyse. Ta o ciring do Seysyo am, "O meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to a tao o abneken na abo so raraten do tangain na. So ikanoyong na rana makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na."

language1_text: And the law is not of faith: but, The man that doeth them shall live in them.
language2_text: Am o iwawalam na ni Moyse am abo kasngesngenan na do kapeyhanhan ni Ama ta do to. Ta o ciring do Seysyo am, "O mangozay do iwawalam na ni Moyse am abo dang o likliken a ciring."

language1_text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us: for it is written, Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree:
language2_text: Am si Kizisto o nimalit jyaten do oyaoyyan na nyaten ni Ama ta do to a ji makataptap so iwawalam na ni Moyse. Ta o ciring pa do Seysyo am, "O nipadket da do jyojika am iya o nyangayan no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: that the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.
language2_text: O nikakman na sang ni Yeso Kizisto am ikakza na o aryarilaw na ni Ama ta do to si Apolahan a mangay na itoro do beken a tao do Yotay. So ta rana ikamimin a makahap so Seyzi a nipanci na itoro na jyaten ni Ama ta do to, do kapeyhanhan ta nya.

language1_text: Brethren, I speak after the manner of men; Though it be but a man's covenant, yet if it be confirmed, no man disannulleth, or addeth thereto.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, o ahahapan sya no tao am no meysirisiring o rarwa ka tao do vazay da am to da na mamneki o apyahen da. So ikabo rana no mapasobna do nipamnekan da vazay, do kabo rana no nipeyras da vazay.

language1_text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made. He saith not, And to seeds, as of many; but as of one, And to thy seed, which is Christ.
language2_text: Akman sang an, o nipanci ni Ama ta do to a nakem na a itoro na ji Apolahan a kano asa ka tao do sivosivovoong na. So ji na nimapakaciringi sya do aro a tao, ta asa ka tao. Iya rana am si Kizisto.

language1_text: And this I say, that the covenant, that was confirmed before of God in Christ, the law, which was four hundred and thirty years after, cannot disannul, that it should make the promise of none effect.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no ciring ko am ji meyyopowpas o nimanmanma a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a ciring na. Tana nimanownowji o iwawalam ni Moyse so atlo a poo so ikasikalima ranaw (430) so awawan am jyablis o mina ciring na ni Ama ta do to ji Apolahan.

language1_text: For if the inheritance be of the law, it is no more of promise: but God gave it to Abraham by promise.
language2_text: Ta no si pangozayan ta o iwawalam na ni Moyse o torwan na jyaten so aryarilaw na ni Ama ta do to am beken a monganay ori do mina ciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta o nitoro na aryarilaw na ji Apolahan am pangononongan na ni Ama ta do to o mina ciring na jya.

language1_text: Wherefore then serveth the law? It was added because of transgressions, till the seed should come to whom the promise was made; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator.
language2_text: Am ikongo peypeypangayan na no iwawalam ni Ama ta do to a nitaid na ji Moyse. O iwawalam rana ori am ipakateneng no tao do raraten da mangay do yai no sivovoong ni Apolahan a si Kizisto. Am no kano nang am tinsi o nitomoro nya ji Moyse so iwawalam ang a katoro na rana nya do tao.

language1_text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one, but God is one.
language2_text: Am si Ama ta do to o nimacisirsiring ji Apolahan.

language1_text: Is the law then against the promises of God? God forbid: for if there had been a law given which could have given life, verily righteousness should have been by the law.
language2_text: No akman sang am manngwa, masipalpalpid o iwawalam ni Moyse a kano pangozayan na a ciring a nitoro na ni Ama ta do to? Jyabo kakman na sang a. No si manoyong o kapakahap ta no iwawalam ni Moyse so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta am makanet rana ori a ipacikaop ta ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin, that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe.
language2_text: Am o ciring do Seysyo am yatodamimin o tao do karawan a yamabedbed no raraten. Am ori an, no kakzeben ta o kapakahap ta so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta am kapeyhanhan ta ni Yeso Kizisto. Ta ori rana am mina ciring na ori ni Ama ta do to do amraralay nya tao.

language1_text: But before faith came, we were kept under the law, shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed.
language2_text: Am no kabo pa ni Yeso a ipeyhanhan ta am apya, ta amyan so iwawalam ni Moyse a omzat do onowned ta.

language1_text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ, that we might be justified by faith.
language2_text: Am ori o icyakma ney inyapwan ta no iwawalam ni Moyse amzat do onowned ta mangay do yai na rana ni Kizisto a kabnek na rana jyaten ni Ama ta do to a abo rana so raraten do tangain na, do kapeyhanhan ta nya.

language1_text: But after that faith is come, we are no longer under a schoolmaster.
language2_text: Sicyaikwa rana ya am yarana amyan si Kizisto. Am ori o na rana ji amzaci do onowned ta no iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Inyo rana am kamo rana mamimin a akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to, do yanyo rana kapeyhanhan ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ.
language2_text: Inyo rana am kamo rana a nimamlis so onowned a nitaktakan rana a yarana macikaop ji Kizisto a ominara so icicirawat na.

language1_text: There is neither Jew nor Greek, there is neither bond nor free, there is neither male nor female: for ye are all one in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Am ori o ikabo rana no matarek do amraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a tao. Ta meyyangangay sira do tangain na. Tana tao do Yotay a tana beken a tao do Yotay, tana lamlamsoy a kano beken a lamlamsoy, tana mahakay a tana mavakes am kamo mamimin a akmey asa rana a yamacikaop ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: And if ye be Christ's, then are ye Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise.
language2_text: No kamo macilovot ji Kizisto am manoyong kamo na a macikownongan ji Apolahan a omamoon so aryarilaw na ni Ama ta do to si Apolahan.

language1_text: Now I say, That the heir, as long as he is a child, differeth nothing from a servant, though he be lord of all; but is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father.
language2_text: Am tana kanakan o omamoon so kangangay na ni ama na am abo peytarkan na kano lamlamsoy, ta ji pa teneng o kanakan a meymatmatngeh no kangangay na. Am ori o iyan no makaveyvow a tao a somidong sya a meymatmatngeh no kangangay na, mangay do ipakaveyvow na rana. Am tana kanakan o omamoon so kangangay na ni ama na am abo peytarkan na kano lamlamsoy, ta ji pa teneng o kanakan a meymatmatngeh no kangangay na. Am ori o iyan no makaveyvow a tao a somidong sya a meymatmatngeh no kangangay na, mangay do ipakaveyvow na rana.

language1_text: Even so we, when we were children, were in bondage under the elements of the world:
language2_text: Akman sang an, ta no kaji ta pa meypahagnatan so nakenakem ji Kizisto no kakwa am akma tey lamlamsoy a italamozong no jyapsepsek a iwawalam no tao do karawan.

language1_text: but when the fulness of the time was come, God sent forth his Son, made of a woman, made under the law,
language2_text: Am marateng rana o araraw a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to am tovoin na rana o Anak na alavaten no asa ka mavakes a italamozong no iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: to redeem them that were under the law, that we might receive the adoption of sons.
language2_text: O ikakman na sang am ovayan na sira o mavaod no iwawalam na ni Moyse a tao. So ikanoyong ta rana meyngongyod a akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And because ye are sons, God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts, crying, Abba, Father.
language2_text: O nitovoyan na sya jinyo ni Ama ta do to so Seyzi ni Kizisto am kamo meyngongyod rana akma ney anak. Am ori o nyo jyanigi a yatomawag ji Ama ta do to a Ama nyo.

language1_text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant, but a son; and if a son, then an heir of God through Christ.
language2_text: Inyo rana sicyaikwaya am beken a lamlamsoy kamo rana a na italamozong no iwawalam ni Moyse, ta akma ney anak rana inyo ni Ama ta do to. O akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to am ori o makahap so aryarilaw na.

language1_text: Howbeit then, when ye knew not God, ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods.
language2_text: No kakwa pa am ji nyo a tenngi si Ama ta do to. Am ori o ikanoyong nyo a lamlamsoy no makakaday a malas a iraralay nyo.

language1_text: But now, after that ye have known God, or rather are known of God, how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements, whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage?
language2_text: Am nyo katenngan si Ama ta do to sicyaikwaya. So na ipakateneng jinyo ni Ama ta do to a akma ney anak. Am ikongo kamo a yapa mangay amwoli so makanyaw a iwawalam nyo a abo so peypeypangayan. Manngwa, nyo apyapyahen pa o kakma nyoy lamlamsoy no makanyaw?

language1_text: Ye observe days, and months, and times, and years.
language2_text: Nyo pahamahamahen pa o pamarmarngan nyo so kanen do araraw a kado vehavehan a kado awawan.

language1_text: I am afraid of you, lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain.
language2_text: So ko kalawan ninyo an, do na kakmey meyyopowpas a cinalab no ninanao ko jinyo no kakwa.

language1_text: Brethren, I beseech you, be as I am; for I am as ye are: ye have not injured me at all.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, inaoy si inarahen nyo yaken a ji rana mangozay do iwawalam ni Moyse. Ta beken a iwawalam nyo o kapangozay nyo do iwawalam ni Moyse a beken a tao do Yotay. Am ori o ko sarayan ninyo.

language1_text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first.
language2_text: Ta no keyngen ko am nipeyveyveken nyo yaken no ka ori pa so kapeylimwang ko no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to jinyo.

language1_text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not, nor rejected; but received me as an angel of God, even as Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Tana nyo ikarahet no kangangay o ingingnen ko am nyo jya nikahayo yaken. Ta nyo nipehngay yaken do tinsi na ni Ama ta do to a taotawwen. So icyakma koy Yeso Kizisto a nitaotao nyo,

language1_text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of? for I bear you record, that, if it had been possible, ye would have plucked out your own eyes, and have given them to me.
language2_text: kasasaray nyo no kano nang, kaji nyo ngosowan so mata nyo a itoro jyaken, do nyo karilawan nyaken. Am kamo makongokongo sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: Am I therefore become your enemy, because I tell you the truth?
language2_text: Ala ori nyo oyyan yaken am ko na ji nayotaywa o ciring ko a ko ivavaga jinyo.

language1_text: They zealously affect you, but not well; yea, they would exclude you, that ye might affect them.
language2_text: Sira rana yamnanao jinyo no malas am da kakzeben o kapacioya nyo jyaken a kaglaw nyo nira.

language1_text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing, and not only when I am present with you.
language2_text: Apya o karilaw da ninyo. Am ney yapya na am tana myan ko dang a tana abo ko dang am to meyyonong o karilawan da ninyo.

language1_text: My little children, of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you,
language2_text: Kamo akmey anak ko na. Ta yatey rako o aryarilaw ko jinyo. So yako icyakmey mavakes a toda jyapaw so totowang so alalaw a omnanao jinyo, mangay no si meynara nyo na si Yeso Kizisto so icicirawat.

language1_text: I desire to be present with you now, and to change my voice; for I stand in doubt of you.
language2_text: Ko toda ji nalap a macikaop jinyo a kaji ko na ratan ninyo so kangangay, do kahawa ninyo a da pamizngen no malas a ciring.

language1_text: Tell me, ye that desire to be under the law, do ye not hear the law?
language2_text: Inyo rana yamangozay do iwawalam ni Moyse sicyaikwaya am manngwa, nyo katenngan o ciriciring a yadomket do iwawalam na ni Moyse an?

language1_text: For it is written, that Abraham had two sons, the one by a bondmaid, the other by a freewoman.
language2_text: O nivatvatkan do Seysyo am rarwa o anak ni Apolahan. Asa am anak no lamlamsoy na. Asa am anak no meyngongyod a mavakes na.

language1_text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh; but he of the freewoman was by promise.
language2_text: O anak no lamlamsoy na am omaing do pamnemnekan na. Am o anak no meyngongyod a mavakes na am omaing do mina ciring na jya ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Which things are an allegory: for these are the two covenants; the one from the mount Sinai, which gendereth to bondage, which is Agar.
language2_text: Sira rana ya rarwa ka mavakes am kehngehngay no adan a kano vayo a pangozayan a ciring ni Ama ta do to. O meyngaran so Hacya a lamlamsoy am omagaz do iwawalam na ni Moyse do Sinay a tokon. O ipanci da ananak ni Hacya tao am pangozayan da o iwawalam na ni Moyse. So icyakma dey lamlamsoy no iwawalam na ni Moyse.

language1_text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia, and answereth to Jerusalem which now is, and is in bondage with her children.
language2_text: O Sinay a tokon am amyan do Alapo. Akma ney kehngehngay no tao do Yelosaleng a mangozay do iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: But Jerusalem which is above is free, which is the mother of us all.
language2_text: Am o mavakes a meyngaran si Salay am akma tey ina, do kakma ney mapehngehngay sya do Yelosaleng do teyngato a ji rana nalamozongan no iwawalam na ni Moyse.

language1_text: For it is written, Rejoice, thou barren that bearest not; Break forth and cry, thou that travailest not: For the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband.
language2_text: Ta o ciring do Seysyo a omaing ji Salay am, "Imo rana ji meytaodtod a ji pa nimangalavat a mavakes am somaray ka an. Imo rana ji pa nimacizaza mavakes am arakorako pa o sarasaray mo, ta pasaoden ko jimo o ananak mo. So ikanoyong mo a arwaro pa so anak a kano lamlamsoy da mavakes."

language1_text: Now we, brethren, as Isaac was, are the children of promise.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, kamo na meyvaliw a akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to. Ta yarana nimangononong jinyo o ciring na ni Ama ta do to, akman si Isa a anak ni Salay. Ta iya rana am nimangononong o ciring na ni Ama ta do to ji Apolahan.

language1_text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit, even so it is now.
language2_text: No kano nang am o anak na ni Hacya am nipeyrarahet na o kakteh na si Isa a nimalikey apo do Seyzi. Yakman so tao do Yotay sicyaikwaya a yamangozay do iwawalam na ni Moyse a yamapakakasi jyaten.

language1_text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture? Cast out the bondwoman and her son: for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman.
language2_text: Am o ciring do Seysyo am, "Pagcinen mo o lamlamsoy mo a mavakes a kano anak na. Ta o anak no lamlamsoy mo am ji macivonong do kangangay mo. Ta o kangangay mo am amoonen no meyngongyod a anak no mavakes mo."

language1_text: So then, brethren, we are not children of the bondwoman, but of the free.
language2_text: Ori an, manga kakteh an, ta ji macikownongi do anak no lamlamsoy a mavakes. Ta yaten rana am akma ney anak yaten ni Ama ta do to, do yata kaji mangozayan rana do adan a pangozayan a ciring.

language1_text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
language2_text: Na rana niovayan yaten ni Kizisto do yamvaod jyaten a iwawalam ni Moyse. Ori o ji nyo rana meyhanhani no adan a iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: Behold, I Paul say unto you, that if ye be circumcised, Christ shall profit you nothing.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo am no si ipeyhanhan nyo o kayongkad do kataotao nyo a ipasaray nyo si Ama ta do to am abo peypeypangayan ni Kizisto jinyo.

language1_text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised, that he is a debtor to do the whole law.
language2_text: Ko pazimanen pa jinyo so ipisa. No si yongkadan nyo o kataotao nyo am pangononongan nyo saon o aro a iwawalam ni Moyse am.

language1_text: Christ is become of no effect unto you, whosoever of you are justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.
language2_text: Inyo rana yamnakenakem so kabnek na jinyo a abo so raraten ni Ama ta do to a yamangozay do iwawalam na ni Moyse am kanyo manoyong a yameyparai ji Kizisto, do nyo kataosya so oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to a yasomidong jinyo.

language1_text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith.
language2_text: Am yaten rana am na oyatan yaten no Seyzi a meyhanhan ni Yeso Kizisto. Am ori o na abnekan rana jyaten ni Ama ta do to a abo rana so raraten do tangain na.

language1_text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.
language2_text: Ta o tao a macikaop rana ji Yeso Kizisto am ji na rana ngezsangan o kaji na yongkadan do kataotao na. Ta o ney makdeng na ji Ama ta do to am ipeyhanhan ta si Kizisto a kapangarilaw ta so icyatatao ta.

language1_text: Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth?
language2_text: Kanyo tey yapya so ahahapan sya a yamnakenakem si Kizisto. Sino a yamazazat jinyo a yanyo kaji ngonotan do manoyong a nanao.

language1_text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you.
language2_text: Jyabo ka si Ama ta do to no amzazat jinyo a. Ta iya o nimamnek jinyo a omanoyong ji Yeso.

language1_text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.
language2_text: Ta naknakmen nyo pala o kosozi no odong. Tana alikey pazavozen am mapeymway na o nipeysolisoliket a odong. Akman sang o malas a nanao a makeykai a meylimwang a ikarahet no tao.

language1_text: I have confidence in you through the Lord, that ye will be none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment, whosoever he be.
language2_text: Am ko ipeyhanhan inyo, do ta kapeyyangangay a macikaop ji Kizisto. Yabo kapacitarek no nakenakem nyo jyaken a. O tao rana mapeyzavozavoz jinyo am mangay a meydedna jya o peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And I, brethren, if I yet preach circumcision, why do I yet suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.
language2_text: No si ipeylimwang ko o kayongkad do kataotao am ikongo da rehrehtan jyaken. O da rehrehtan jyaken am ko ipeylimwang o jyojika ni Kizisto. Am ori o da oyyan nyaken no ji raralay ni Yeso.

language1_text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you.
language2_text: Ko apyapyahen pa o kato da na ngarwan jinyo no yamapeyzavozavoz jinyo a tao.

language1_text: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, o na nipamnekan jinyo ni Ama ta do to am na ovayan inyo a yamvaod no iwawalam ni Moyse. Am ori o ji nyo to mamyapyai no kataotao nyo a italamozong no marahet a nakenakem nyo. Apyapya pa o pangarilawan a isidong nyo so kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
language2_text: Ta yana to zagoma no pangangarilawan o iwawalam na ni Moyse. Ta si ahapen ta o ciring do Seysyo a manci no, "O aryarilaw mo so kataotao mo am akman sang o karilawan mo no icyatatao mo," am nimahap ta rana o iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.
language2_text: Am no si akman kamo so omalalam a somongisongit so kadwan jinyo am jyabo kapya nyo a.

language1_text: This I say then, Walk in the Spirit, and ye shall not fulfil the lust of the flesh.
language2_text: O yako ipanci am onotan nyo o peypalanginan na ninyo no Seyzi an. Ta ori o ipakazazat nyo do onowned nyo a to mangozangozay do apyahen nyo no nakem.

language1_text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
language2_text: Ta o marahet a ikeykakza no kataotao ta am macitarek a kano ikakza na jyaten no Seyzi. So icyakma dey meykavosoyan, do kazazat na jyaten no Seyzi a mangozay do marahet a ikeykakza no kataotao ta.

language1_text: But if ye be led of the Spirit, ye are not under the law.
language2_text: No si peypalanginan na inyo no Seyzi am ji na rana vaoda inyo no iwawalam na ni Moyse.

language1_text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest, which are these; Adultery, fornication, uncleanness, lasciviousness,
language2_text: Mapengkad o marahet a vazay no tao. Ta to rana tenngi do icicirawat da, akman so macimasesnek a vazay,

language1_text: idolatry, witchcraft, hatred, variance, emulations, wrath, strife, seditions, heresies,
language2_text: manaralay so malas a iraralay a kano mamnek a kano meyliliman a kano maoyaoyahen a kano mararaten a kano mapeysyasyay so nakem no tao,

language1_text: envyings, murders, drunkenness, revellings, and such like: of the which I tell you before, as I have also told you in time past, that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God.
language2_text: manginanahet a kano mayoyopen so saki a kano makakaday pa a ikarahet no tao a vazay. Oya rana am nipaziman ko na jinyo no kakwa. Am yako olin pa ipanci jinyo. Ta o mapeyvazay so akman sang a tao am ji macilovot do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,
language2_text: O italamozong no Seyzi a tao am mangarilaw, masaray, apiya o nakenakem na, jyaharag no alalaw, mazonos, manidong so tao, ji mangalalas,

language1_text: meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
language2_text: ji mapahama so nakem, ji to mangozangozay do nakem. So ikabo no pasobnan na a ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to no akman sang a tao.

language1_text: And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts.
language2_text: O yaomanod ji Yeso Kizisto a tao am akma dey nipazanod o marahet a nakenakem da do jyojika ni Yeso Kizisto, do kanimawakwak na no raraten ta.

language1_text: If we live in the Spirit, let us also walk in the Spirit.
language2_text: Manoyong o kanimanta na rana nyaten no Seyzi so vayo a onowned ta. Am ori o na ikanoyong a yatomalamozong nyaten.

language1_text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
language2_text: Ji ta mapahama so nakem. Ji ta pasozisozya o kadwan jyaten. Ji ta manginanahet.

language1_text: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, inyo rana yamakdeng so nakem ji Ama ta do to am no myan so tao a to meyraraten am ji nyo anigan a pamizngen. Am taosya o kapahama nyo so onowned nyo a mapamizing sya. So ipeytataziman nyo, ta kalittan kamo.

language1_text: Bear ye one another's burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
language2_text: No myan so alalaw nyo am macisidosidong kamo. Ta ori rana am nanao na jyaten ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.
language2_text: O mapakateneteneng a tao am akma ney littan o kataotao na.

language1_text: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.
language2_text: So ikamimin no tao a manakenakem a manci no, "Manngwa, yapya no yamarahet o iwawalam ko." No si apya am manoyong o kasaray na. So ji mapadmai so kataotao do icyatatao.

language1_text: For every man shall bear his own burden.
language2_text: So ikamimin no tao a macipanoyonoyong a ji makanet so nakenakem do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.
language2_text: Inyo rana da pamizngen no nanao ni Ama ta do to am sidongen nyo o yamapamizing jinyo no nanao na ni Ama ta do to a tao. Ipanta nyo sira so makakaday a apyahen da no nakem.

language1_text: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
language2_text: Ji kamo manayotayo do tangain na ni Ama ta do to. Ta abo matayo ta do tangain na. So ikanoyong no kapacilocilolo no mahap no tao do makakaday a mina vazay na.

language1_text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
language2_text: Ta no myan so tao a to mangozangozay do nakenakem na am mangay o kapakahap na so to meyyonong a alalaw do makotokotod a lila no apoy. Am no si pangozayan na o ahapan na sya no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to am mahap na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na do teyngato a itoro no Seyzi.

language1_text: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
language2_text: Am ori o ji ta macimaziknai a mapeyvazay so apya vazay. Ta no si to ta ngotokot a mahap so akman sang a vazay am no marateng o araraw no makwa am amyan so nakem na jyaten ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
language2_text: Am ori an, no myan so sidongan ta so icyatatao ta am sidongen ta sira an. Am arakorako pa o sidongan ta so akma tey kakteh do cinai an.

language1_text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.
language2_text: Citahen nyo an, o yararako a vatvatek. Ta ori rana am yako nivatvatkan ori.

language1_text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.
language2_text: Sira rana mapazway so kataotao da a yamanci ninyo a amyongkad do kataotao nyo am o da ikakman sang am ikanyahey da sira o mapakakasi sira no mangnanao sira no jyojika na ni Kizisto. Ta makanet rana ori a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato.

language1_text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.
language2_text: Am sira rana a nimyongkad do kataotao da am da jyamimin o iwawalam na ni Moyse a yamahap. O da pancyan ninyo a amyongkad do kataotao nyo am da pazwain o kaniomamizing nyo sira.

language1_text: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.
language2_text: Am yaken rana am yabo ikadwa na no yako pazwain, ta si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o yako pazwain a yanimawakwak nyaten do jyojika. O peypeypangayan no jyojika jyaken am yanimavonas rana o marahet a nakenakem ko. O peypeypangayan no nang am yako na nimamlis.

language1_text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.
language2_text: So ji na ranakdengi no kayongkad do kataotao. Ta makdekdeng o vazay no Seyzi a omyavayo so onowned ta.

language1_text: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.
language2_text: Inaoy no si ikarilaw na sira ni Ama ta do to o yamangozay do ciriciring ko, pacyangayan da no tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay, kapanta na nira so ikapiya no onowned da.

language1_text: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
language2_text: Inaoy si papwen da sicyaikwaya o kaji da rana zyakan nyaken a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Yeso Kizisto. Ta o aro a kozad ko do kataotao ko am ori o yongkad ko a lamlamsoy ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen. Unto the Galatians written from Rome.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, inaoy si itoro na jinyo o pangangarilawan na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Amin.

language1_text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, to the saints which are at Ephesus, and to the faithful in Christ Jesus:
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to a yana nipamnekan ni Yeso Kizisto a omlivolivon no ciriciring na. Yako ipeyteygami inyo a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao do Ivoso a yato ngotokot so nakem ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: grace be to you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na jinyo o ikapiya no onowned nyo a kano pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ:
language2_text: Isaray ta ji Ama ta do to a Ama na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Ta yatamo na macibedbed ji Kizisto. So yana rana nitorwan so makakaday a aglaglaw na jyaten a na ipasaray jyaten.

language1_text: according as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world, that we should be holy and without blame before him in love:
language2_text: No kaji na pa amaogan no karawan am nipamnekan na rana yaten ni Ama ta do to a monganay jya. Ta nikawakwak ni Yeso Kizisto o raraten ta. So ikanoyong ta abo rana so karatan do tangain na ni Ama ta do to. Na tey karilaw yaten ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself, according to the good pleasure of his will,
language2_text: Am ori o na sarayan nyaten ni Ama ta do to a na panopen a akma ney anak, ta yata na macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: to the praise of the glory of his grace, wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved.
language2_text: So ikanoyong ta somaray no akman sang a pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to, do na kabo no ngina na no Anak na, na to norwan jyaten.

language1_text: In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins, according to the riches of his grace;
language2_text: Si Kizisto yanimawakwak nyaten. Am ori o yana nikavonas no raraten ta. Tey rako o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a yana nitoro jyaten.

language1_text: wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;
language2_text: O pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to am ta na ipakateneng do na ahahapan sya ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: having made known unto us the mystery of his will, according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:
language2_text: So ta rana ipakateneng ji Kizisto akma ney kahanhanan a mapakavos so ji nitomwaw pa vazay na no kakwa.

language1_text: that in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ, both which are in heaven, and which are on earth; even in him:
language2_text: Ta o pamnemnekan na ni Ama ta do to no kakwa am itoro na o makakaday do karawan a kado teyngato ji Kizisto a italamozong na, no marateng o araraw no nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: in whom also we have obtained an inheritance, being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will:
language2_text: O makakaday do karawan am abo ji mangozay do ahahapan na sya ni Ama ta do to. So na to mangozai do nakenakem na a mapanop jyamen a amraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a tao do Yotay a akma ney anak a macikaop ji Kizisto.

language1_text: that we should be to the praise of his glory, who first trusted in Christ.
language2_text: Inaoy no si mamimin namen a ney manma na makateneng ji Kizisto a somaray ni Ama ta do to a ney mazway na a Tao do to!

language1_text: In whom ye also trusted, after that ye heard the word of truth, the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that ye believed, ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise,
language2_text: Inyo rana beken a tao do Yotay am kamo akman sang, ta no kapakamizing nyo so manoyong a mapasaray a nanao am mina to nyo nganoyngi si Kizisto. Ori o na nitorwan rana no Seyzi jinyo ni Ama ta do to akma ney yongkad no kapacikownongan nyo rana jya.

language1_text: which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession, unto the praise of his glory.
language2_text: O Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to am ori o akma tey yongkad a somidong jyaten a omamoon so nipanci na itoro ni Ama ta do to do monganay jya tao. So ikanoyong na ni Ama ta do to a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato a yaomanoyong jya tao. So sarayan ta ni Ama ta do to a tey mazway a Tao do to!

language1_text: Wherefore I also, after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus, and love unto all the saints,
language2_text: Am ori an, mamizing ko na inyo a meyhanhan rana ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a marilaw no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai am,

language1_text: cease not to give thanks for you, making mention of you in my prayers;
language2_text: ji ko ranamtad a somaray ninyo ji Ama ta do to. So ikasangib ko a makalavat jinyo do inozi ko.

language1_text: that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Father of glory, may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him:
language2_text: Ko mapasyasi ji Ama ta do to a tey mazway a Tao do to a Ama na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a manta ninyo so teneng a kapakateneng nyo rana ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: the eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling, and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
language2_text: Ko mapasyasi ji Ama ta do to a omiwang do onowned nyo a kapakateneng nyo na do peypeypangayan no na panopan jinyo a kapanta na ninyo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo do teyngato. So ikatey rako na no aryarilaw na so omanoyong jya tao.

language1_text: and what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe, according to the working of his mighty power,
language2_text: Yamapeyzokab o na vazay no oyowyat na do yaomanoyong jya tao. Oyowyat rana ori am

language1_text: which he wrought in Christ, when he raised him from the dead, and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places,
language2_text: nimapeyvangon si Yeso apo do heseb na. So na rana iyan do teyngato a yaomlisna do wanan na ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: far above all principality, and power, and might, and dominion, and every name that is named, not only in this world, but also in that which is to come:
language2_text: a kabtekan rana a Panirsirngen do sinokob no hanit. So ikabo rana no makahad so oyowyat na kano azwazway na do karawan a kado teyngato mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: and hath put all things under his feet, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church,
language2_text: Abo ji na nalamozongan ni Kizisto do karawan. Ta iya o yameymatmatngeh nyaten a omanoyong jya tao.

language1_text: which is his body, the fulness of him that filleth all in all.
language2_text: Yaten rana yamraralay ni Kizisto am akma ney kataotao yaten, do ta kararalay nya, do na kanimapeypapya so makakaday.

language1_text: And you hath he quickened, who were dead in trespasses and sins;
language2_text: No kaji nyo pa manaralayan am pasobnan nyo pa o ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a meyraraten.

language1_text: wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world, according to the prince of the power of the air, the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:
language2_text: No kano nang am onotan nyo pa o malas a vazay da no ji manganoyong a tao a kano ciring ni Satan a yatomalamozong no meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh, fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath, even as others.
language2_text: No kakwa am akman tamo sira a to mangozangozay do nakenakem da. Am ori o ikanoyong ta meyraraten a tao a pasingsingtan na ni Ama ta do to no makwa.

language1_text: But God, who is rich in mercy, for his great love wherewith he loved us, even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)
language2_text: Am tana akman ta sang a meyraraten a tao no kakwa am yatey rako o na karilawan nyaten ni Ama ta do to, do kanimanta na nyaten so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta a macikaop rana ji Kizisto. So ta ikanoyong a yana nipatazadang no pangangarilawan na. Am tana akman ta sang a meyraraten a tao no kakwa am yatey rako o na karilawan nyaten ni Ama ta do to, do kanimanta na nyaten so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta a macikaop rana ji Kizisto. So ta ikanoyong a yana nipatazadang no pangangarilawan na.

language1_text: and hath raised us up together, and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus:
language2_text: Na rana nipazasing yaten so inawan ji Yeso Kizisto a nimirwa a mavyay. So icyakma tey macikaop jya amyan do teyngato.

language1_text: that in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.
language2_text: O ikakman na sang ni Ama ta do to am ipacita na do kaidan no karawan o mapeyzokab a pangangarilawan na kano pangangasyan na jyaten a yamacikaop ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:
language2_text: Na nyahap inyo do peyraratenan nyo, ta nyo rana ipeyhanhan si Kizisto. O nyo ipakahap so sang am beken a oyowyat nyo, ta omagaz do pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a na yazaw jinyo.

language1_text: not of works, lest any man should boast.
language2_text: Am ori o ji nyo pahamai so nakem nyo. Ta beken a omaing do kapya no icicirawat nyo o na nyahapan jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works, which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them.
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to o yata nikablis no onowned a yarana macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto. So na ikapya rana no vazay ta a mangonong do na peypalanginan nyaten ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wherefore remember, that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh, who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands;
language2_text: Am ori an, pakanakman nyo so kataotao nyo a ji da nipazasing no tao do Yotay a omraralay ni Ama ta do to no kakwa, do kaji nyo nginaran sira amyongkad do kataotao nyo.

language1_text: that at that time ye were without Christ, being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel, and strangers from the covenants of promise, having no hope, and without God in the world:
