language2_text: No kano nang am abo o kasngesngenan nyo ji Kizisto, ta akma kamoy kadwan a ji da patwatopa do tangain ni Ama ta do to, do kaji nyo macitetngehan do tao do Yotay. Ta sira am nipanta na sira ni Ama ta do to so pangozayan na ciring. So ikanoyong nyo a to rana hayo so onowned, do kaji nyo makatenngan ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: but now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ.
language2_text: Am inyo rana a ji ngasngen ji Ama ta do to a tao am na rana nipanop inyo ji Yeso Kizisto sicyaikwaya. So nyo ikanoyong rana yamacikaop ji Ama ta do to. Ta na nikawakwak rana inyo ni Kizisto.

language1_text: For he is our peace, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us;
language2_text: Iya o yamapeyyanowanop jyaten a tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay. Na nibalinas no kataotao na o yakmey atoy a yamapeysyay so tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay a da pacikaoyyan.

language1_text: having abolished in his flesh the enmity, even the law of commandments contained in ordinances; for to make in himself of twain one new man, so making peace;
language2_text: O na nyangay so inawan ni Kizisto am na niblis o yada hanhan no tao do Yotay a iwawalam ni Moyse. So icyakma dey yasa rana no tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay do tangain ni Kizisto. No si manoyong kakma tey yasa rana am apya ta na so nakem do kadwan jyaten.

language1_text: and that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross, having slain the enmity thereby:
language2_text: O nikawakwak na ni Kizisto do jyojika am balinasen na o kakma tey meykavosoyan. O jyojika na ni Yeso Kizisto o mapeyyanowanop jyaten, akmey asa ka tao so onowned a meyyangangay rana amraralay ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and came and preached peace to you which were afar off, and to them that were nigh.
language2_text: O na nyai ni Kizisto am na ipeylimwang do aro a tao o Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to, pacyangayan nyo a beken a tao do Yotay a ji makateneng ji Ama ta do to no kakwa ka nira tao do Yotay.

language1_text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father.
language2_text: Na peyyanowanopen yaten ni Kizisto a tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay, akmey asa so onowned do tangain na ni Ama ta do to a yana sidongen no Seyzi.

language1_text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners, but fellowcitizens with the saints, and of the household of God;
language2_text: Am ori an, ikabeken nyo rana kadwan a beken a tao do Yotay an. Ta tamo na mamimin a akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to a yakmey yasa ka vahay.

language1_text: and are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets, Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone;
language2_text: Ta nyo nimahap rana o nanao da no nipamnekan ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na kano mangononong so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. So na ikamimin no nang a yapo ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: in whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord:
language2_text: Iya o yatomalamozong nyaten a yamanta nyaten so ji meylimoteng a onowned ta.

language1_text: in whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.
language2_text: Am ori o nyo ipeyyangangay rana kano tao do Yotay a na rana yanan no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For this cause I Paul, the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles,
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no ko iyan do pamemtengan am ko ipeylimwang no ciriciring na ni Yeso Kizisto jinyo a beken a tao do Yotay. Tana akman ko sang am yako jimtadan a meynozi ninyo.

language1_text: if ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to you-ward:
language2_text: Nyo katenngan yaken a na nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a yameylimwang nya jinyo so pangangarilawan na.

language1_text: how that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery; (as I wrote afore in few words,
language2_text: Na nipananao jyaken ni Ama ta do to o vazay na a jyatenngi no kakwa. So yako rana ipakateneng jya. So nipakalavatan ko na sya jinyo.

language1_text: whereby, when ye read, ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ)
language2_text: No si vilangan nyo o teygami ko eya am katenngan nyo rana ori a omaing ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men, as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit;
language2_text: No kakwa am abo pa tao a nimapatwaw so nanao eya a omaing ji Kizisto. Am sicyaikwaya am na rana patwawen no Seyzi do nipamnekan na ni Yeso a omlivolivon no ciriciring na tao a kado mangononong so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: that the Gentiles should be fellowheirs, and of the same body, and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel:
language2_text: O ji da nipatwaw a nanao na am na rana pazanoden o beken a tao do Yotay do meyngongyod a tao do Yotay a makahap so aryarilaw na jyaten ni Ama ta do to, do kanimakamizing nyo rana so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Kizisto. So nyo rana icyakmey yasa so nakem a kano tao do Yotay a meyhanhan ni Yeso Kizisto a makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: whereof I was made a minister, according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power.
language2_text: Na nitenngan yaken ni Ama ta do to a lamlamsoy na a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na. Am pangangarilawan ni Ama ta do to a kano oyowyat na o yasomidong jyaken a yamahap so vazay na.

language1_text: Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, is this grace given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ;
language2_text: Tana mina saod na so kabo no kapsepsekan ko am na manket yaken a pahanhanen a meylimwang nya jinyo a beken a tao do Yotay so aglaglaw na jyaten ni Kizisto.

language1_text: and to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery, which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God, who created all things by Jesus Christ:
language2_text: Na nipanta yaken so oyowyat ko a somidong so tao do karawan a makateneng do pamnemnekan na ni Ama ta do to a nimangamaog so karawan. Ta no kakwa pa am abo pa makateneng jya tao.

language1_text: to the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold wisdom of God,
language2_text: Ta na kakzeben ni Ama ta do to o kapakacita da sya no tinsi jyaten a yamraralay nya tao so apiya vazay na kano teneteneng na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: according to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord:
language2_text: O na akmanan sang ni Ama ta do to am na pangozayan o to meyyonong a pamnemnekan na. Am na rana nipangononongan ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: in whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him.
language2_text: Am ori o ji ta na nyahei a mangay do tangain na ni Ama ta do to, do kapeyhanhan ta ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you, which is your glory.
language2_text: Am ori an o ko pakotokotan pa sya jinyo. Taosya o kahaha nyo so nakem do iyan no alalaw ko. Ta o akman sang am isaray nyo o mina kapeylimwang ko no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to jinyo.

language1_text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ,
language2_text: Am ori an, yako ipeylilitod a meynozi do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named,
language2_text: Sira rana o yamyan do teyngato a kano yapa amyan do teyrahem am mamimin sira akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: that he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man;
language2_text: Ko ipeynozi ji Ama ta do to o kowyat na jinyo no Seyzi a meypakdeng so nakem ji Ama ta do to. Ta iya rana am yatey mowyat a yatey mazway a Tao do to.

language1_text: that Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye, being rooted and grounded in love,
language2_text: Ori o ipakateneng nyo ji Kizisto a manoyong rana a yamacikaop jinyo a yatomalamozong ninyo. Ko ipeynozi inyo a mapayamot so pangangarilawan na do onowned nyo.

language1_text: may be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth, and length, and depth, and height;
language2_text: Ta ori o ipeyyangangay nyo a kano aro a akma nyoy kakteh do cinai a makateneng do mapeyzokab a pangangarilawan na ni Kizisto.

language1_text: and to know the love of Christ, which passeth knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.
language2_text: Tana yajyatenngi no tao o na pamanmandan no mapeyzokab a pangangarilawan na ni Kizisto am inaoy si meypahagnat kamo so nakem a makateneng do pangangarilawan na. No si makman kamo sang am manoyong kamo na a yanan no aglaglaw na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that worketh in us,
language2_text: Oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to am ori o yameyvazay do onowned ta a omoyat jyaten a meyhanhan nya. Ori o yata ipakahap so yamapeyzokab a ji tangtoktwan a vazay.

language1_text: unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all ages, world without end. Amen.
language2_text: Inaoy si pangozayan ta a yamraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a tao o kato ta meyyonongan a zomwazway si Ama ta do to sicyaikwaya mangay do kaidan no karawan. Amin.

language1_text: I therefore, the prisoner of the Lord, beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called,
language2_text: O yako iyan do pamemtengan sicyaikwaya am yako peyvazain o vazay na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta. So yako pancyan ninyo a omzat do icicirawat nyo. So ikanoyong nyo a macipayok so icicirawat ji Kizisto.

language1_text: with all lowliness and meekness, with longsuffering, forbearing one another in love;
language2_text: Taosya o kapahama nyo so nakem nyo. Apyapya pa kapiya no nakem nyo do icyatatao nyo. Ji kamo meyoyaoya. Ta karilaw nyo no kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace.
language2_text: Makowyowyat kamo pa mapeyyanowanop so kadwan jinyo. Ta ori o icyakma nyoy yasa so onowned a yanan no Seyzi.

language1_text: There is one body, and one Spirit, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling;
language2_text: Ta yaten rana yamraralay ni Yeso am yata akmey yasa so kataotao. Yasa o Seyzi a yamyan jyaten a yasa so ipeynanakem a yameyhanhan ni Ama ta do to a yanimapanop jyaten.

language1_text: one Lord, one faith, one baptism,
language2_text: Yasa o Panirsirngen ta. Yasa o ta ipeyhanhan. Yasa o ta pangozayan so ngaran a tomaktak jyaten.

language1_text: one God and Father of all, who is above all, and through all, and in you all.
language2_text: Yasa o Tao do to ta, akma tey Ama do karawan. Iya rana am yameymatmatngeh nyaten a yamraralay nya tao a yamacikaop jyaten a mapakavos so vazay na do karawan.

language1_text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ.
language2_text: Am yameykataretarek o na nitoro jyaten ni Yeso Kizisto a teneteneng ta. Am na to mangozai o nakem na a yatomoro nya jyaten.

language1_text: Wherefore he saith, When he ascended up on high, he led captivity captive, And gave gifts unto men.
language2_text: Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Ta maniring am, "No kapeycyakavat na rana do teyngato am niharag na si Satan a kano kalamsoyan na a kapanta na no yaomanod jya tao so teneteneng a kano oyowyat da."

language1_text: (Now that he ascended, what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth?
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no kanimeycyakavat na do teyngato am nimanmanma mai do karawan.

language1_text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens, that he might fill all things.)
language2_text: O nimeygegcin do karawan am iya o nimeycyakavat do teyngato. O ikakman na sang am na itoro do tao do karawan o mapeyzokab a aryarilaw na.

language1_text: And he gave some, apostles; and some, prophets; and some, evangelists; and some, pastors and teachers;
language2_text: Iya o nimanta no tao so teneteneng a kano oyowyat da. Nitenngan na o tatasa ka tao a amlivolivon no ciriciring na, kapamnek na do tatasa ka tao a mangononong so ciriciring na, kapamnek na do tatasa ka tao a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na. So iyan no tao a panirsirngen do kyokay amnanao so sinjya.

language1_text: for the perfecting of the saints, for the work of the ministry, for the edifying of the body of Christ:
language2_text: O ikakman na sang am ipakasidong da so aro a omanod ji Ama ta do to a tao a meypahagnat so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to. Ta yaten rana am akma ney kataotao ni Kizisto.

language1_text: till we all come in the unity of the faith, and of the knowledge of the Son of God, unto a perfect man, unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:
language2_text: So ikamimin ta akmey yasa meyhanhan nya a makateneng ji Yeso a Anak na ni Ama ta do to a akmey makaveyvow a tao a makataptap rana so nanao ni Kizisto,

language1_text: that we henceforth be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, and cunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive;
language2_text: a ji rana akman so kanakan, akmey azda a kano pagpag a jyatenngi so pamnemnekan a to ngonongonot so nakem do mangalalas so ciring a tao.

language1_text: but speaking the truth in love, may grow up into him in all things, which is the head, even Christ:
language2_text: Ji ta mangononong so malas. Ta pangozayan ta o pangangarilawan a macisirsiring do icyatatao ta. Ta ori o ipeypahagnat ta so onowned a ominara si Kizisto a yameymatmatngeh nyaten.

language1_text: from whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth, according to the effectual working in the measure of every part, maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.
language2_text: Yaten rana yamraralay nya tao am akma ney kataotao yaten. Iya am yatomalamozong nyaten. Ori ta icyakmey yasa so nakenakem yamarilaw no kadwan jyaten. Ta yaten rana akmey meyketeketeh do cinai am cinamaog no kataotao na. No si akma tey yasa mapanod so nakenakem ta ji Kizisto am tey rako o oyowyat ta, do kapeyyanowanop na jyaten no pangangarilawan na ni Kizisto.

language1_text: This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk, in the vanity of their mind,
language2_text: Ko pangozayan o ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a yamvavaga jinyo. Ji nyo nginara o icicirawat da no yaji manaralay a tao, ta o nakenakem da nira am yabo na peypeypangayan.

language1_text: having the understanding darkened, being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them, because of the blindness of their heart:
language2_text: Onowned da am yakmey kasarisaryan. Yabo da kasngesngenan do vayo a onowned a yapo ji Ama ta do to. So da ikanoyong a yaji macipayok so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness, to work all uncleanness with greediness.
language2_text: Da jyatenngi o da kanigan a yato mangozangozay do nakem da yamapasagpyan so aktokto da.

language1_text: But ye have not so learned Christ;
language2_text: Am abo o akman sang a nanao na ni Kizisto a nimamizing nyo.

language1_text: if so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus:
language2_text: No kamo manoyong a yarana nimakamizing sya, yarana mangononong do manoyong a nanao na ni Yeso a ninanao namen jinyo am,

language1_text: that ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man, which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;
language2_text: karwan nyo na o adan a nakenakem nyo a yamngingit jinyo do peyraratenan nyo.

language1_text: and be renewed in the spirit of your mind;
language2_text: So alitan nyo na do adan a nakenakem nyo.

language1_text: and that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.
language2_text: Pangozayan nyo o avayo a onowned nyo a kano icicirawat nyo a mapatwaw so apiya nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wherefore putting away lying, speak every man truth with his neighbour: for we are members one of another.
language2_text: Am ori o ji nyo na mangononongi so malas. O manoyong a ciring o patwawen nyo do akma nyoy kakteh do cinai, ta tamo mamimin a akma ney peyvongvongwan no kataotao ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Be ye angry, and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your wrath:
language2_text: No si meyoyaoya kamo am ji kamo na to meyraraten. Taosya o kato nyo pasdepan so araw a meyoyaoya.

language1_text: neither give place to the devil.
language2_text: Ta no si akman kamo sang am kalittan kamo a littan ni Satan.

language1_text: Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working with his hands the thing which is good, that he may have to give to him that needeth.
language2_text: O nimangap so ahahapen no kakwa am ablisan na rana o panakawan na a kowyat na rana amyaw no velek na, makanakem so kapanidong na so makasi a tao.

language1_text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth, but that which is good to the use of edifying, that it may minister grace unto the hearers.
language2_text: Taosya o marahet a ciring a makowbot jinyo. Ta o makasidong so tao a kano ikapya no tao a ciring o patwawen nyo. Ta ori o ipakasidong nyo so omamizing so ciring nyo a tao.

language1_text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God, whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption.
language2_text: Ji nyo alavat o ikeyngen na no onowned no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a vazay. Ta o Seyzi am yongkad na jinyo ni Ama ta do to, do kavyay na jinyo no makwa.

language1_text: Let all bitterness, and wrath, and anger, and clamour, and evil speaking, be put away from you, with all malice:
language2_text: Ablisan nyo na o oyaoyyan nyo no kadwan jinyo. Ji nyo macizagzagi o icyatatao nyo a meyoyaoyan. Ji kamo na lololos a mangavay. Taosya rana o kapeyyan nyo sya do onowned nyo so pacioyyan nyo do tao.

language1_text: and be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.
language2_text: O kapya nyo so nakenakem do kadwan jinyo. To nyongbowa o oyyan nyo no kadwan jinyo, akman si Ama ta do to a yatongbo so raraten nyo, do na kanimawakwak ninyo ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Be ye therefore followers of God, as dear children;
language2_text: No kamo manoyong a na tey kaglaw a anak na am inarahen nyo si Ama ta do to a tey yapya so nakenakem.

language1_text: and walk in love, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour.
language2_text: Patwawen nyo do icicirawat nyo o pangangasyan na ni Ama ta do to, akman si Yeso Kizisto a yamarilaw nyaten a yajingbeywan do inawan na nisomidong jyaten. Ta o akman rana sang a vazay na am isaray na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But fornication, and all uncleanness, or covetousness, let it not be once named among you, as becometh saints; neither filthiness, nor foolish talking, nor jesting, which are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.
language2_text: Ji nyo pasngesngena o mangzakza kano pangagoman nyo. Ta o akman rana sang am no peyyanen do onowned ori a kapeynyagamo nya am tey marahet o akman sang. Ta akmey anak na rana inyo ni Ama ta do to. So ikapyapya na no kasaray nyo no sidongan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Ji nyo pasngesngena o mangzakza kano pangagoman nyo. Ta o akman rana sang am no peyyanen do onowned ori a kapeynyagamo nya am tey marahet o akman sang. Ta akmey anak na rana inyo ni Ama ta do to. So ikapyapya na no kasaray nyo no sidongan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For this ye know, that no whoremonger, nor unclean person, nor covetous man, who is an idolater, hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God.
language2_text: Ta o mangzakza kano mangagom a tao am ji na nalamozongan o akman sang ni Yeso Kizisto a kani Ama ta do to. Ta akma ney pahamahamahen pa o pangagoman na kani Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience.
language2_text: Am ori o ji nyo litai do kadwan jinyo a manci no kapya no akman sang a vazay. Ta o akman rana sang so icicirawat a tao am amyan so oyaoyyan na nira ni Ama ta do to no makwa, do kaji da niomonotan do nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them.
language2_text: Ji kamo na macihza do akman sang a tao.

language1_text: For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:
language2_text: Ta no kakwa am nimyan kamo do kasarisaryan a ji makateneng ji Ama ta do to. Am sicyaikwaya am kamo na macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. So yanyo iyan rana do kazngangan. Am ori o inaran nyo so icicirawat da no tao a yamakateneng rana do ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: (for the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth;)
language2_text: Ta o icicirawat no makateneng do ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am ji meylimoteng so onowned. Omonod do manoyong a ciring. Ji mapowzib so nakem do icyatatao.

language1_text: proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo o kahap nyo so apiya vazay a isaray na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Ta ori o ahapen nyo.

language1_text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them.
language2_text: Ji nyo nginara o marahet a vazay da no amyan do kasarisaryan a yameyraraten a tao. Ta apyapya o kapacimalag nyo so apya vazay nyo jira. Ta ori o ipakateneng da do marahet a vazay da.

language1_text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.
language2_text: No malavat o katamwadan da no akman sang a tao am tey macimanig.

language1_text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.
language2_text: O apiya icicirawat nyo am ori o ipakateneng da do marahet a vazay da no meyraraten a tao a kapamlis da rana.

language1_text: Wherefore he saith, Awake thou that sleepest, and arise from the dead, and Christ shall give thee light.
language2_text: Am ori o pancyan da nya, "Kayokay rana yamitkeh a tao. Pamlis kamo na, yapa meyraraten. Ta cirain na inyo ni Kizisto."

language1_text: See then that ye walk circumspectly, not as fools, but as wise,
language2_text: Am ori o apzatan nyo do icicirawat nyo. Ta ji nyo nginara o abo so pannaknakman a tao. Ta inarahen nyo sira o tey rako so pangasasnekan so icyatatao.

language1_text: redeeming the time, because the days are evil.
language2_text: No to ngyan so sidongen a tao am sidongen nyo sira. Ta ji nyo painini. Ta aliket rana o ta iyan do karawan.

language1_text: Wherefore be ye not unwise, but understanding what the will of the Lord is.
language2_text: Ji ta todabwabo so nakem. Ta katenngan ta o apya vazay a pahanhanan na jyaten ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And be not drunk with wine, wherein is excess; but be filled with the Spirit;
language2_text: Ji ta todasaki, ta makararahet so tao o akman sang. Apyapya pa o kakza ta no Seyzi a tomalamozong nyaten.

language1_text: speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;
language2_text: O isirisiring nyo so kadwan jinyo am yadomket do Seysyo a Anwanood ni Tawey a kano meyngongyod apo do onowned nyo a yanood nyo si Ama ta do to. Akman sang o peyyanen nyo do onowned nyo a ipasaray nyo si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;
language2_text: O kasaray nyo no makakaday a yana nitoro jinyo ni Ama ta do to, ta si Yeso Kizisto o manoyong a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.
language2_text: Masicyakanig kamo, akman so nakenakem nyo si Yeso Kizisto a yamanig nya.

language1_text: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as unto the Lord.
language2_text: Inyo rana a mavakes am amizngen nyo o kahanghangan nyo akman si Yeso Kizisto a yanyo amizngen a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: For the husband is the head of the wife, even as Christ is the head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.
language2_text: Ta o kahanghangan nyo rana a mahakay am mamanong ninyo, akman si Yeso Kizisto a yamamanong no yamraralay nya tao. Ta iya rana am mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato. So icyakma ney mapeykataotao jyaten ni Kizisto a yamraralay nya.

language1_text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ, so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing.
language2_text: Am ori o onotan nyo do kahanghangan nyo a mahakay an, akman jyaten a yaomonot ji Kizisto.

language1_text: Husbands, love your wives, even as Christ also loved the church, and gave himself for it;
language2_text: Inyo rana mahakay am ikarilaw nyo o katovong nyo do vahay an, akman si Kizisto a marilaw nyaten a nimawakwak nyaten.

language1_text: that he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word,
language2_text: O na peyvazayan jyaten ni Kizisto am na toda ji ngamoga jyaten a yaponged na ni Ama ta do to. Nivonas na o raraten ta a kayavayo na so onowned ta, do yata kahap so ciriciring na.

language1_text: that he might present it to himself a glorious church, not having spot, or wrinkle, or any such thing; but that it should be holy and without blemish.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no vazay na ni Kizisto am isaray na yaten a tey yapya a abwata so karatan do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that loveth his wife loveth himself.
language2_text: O mahakay rana am ikarilaw na o katovong na do vahay. To na peynara o aryarilaw na so kataotao na a marilaw no mavakes na. Ta o marilaw no mavakes na am marilaw no kataotao na.

language1_text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and cherisheth it, even as the Lord the church:
language2_text: Abo o tao a macioya do kataotao na. Ta peyveyveknen na akman si Kizisto a yaomzat jyaten.

language1_text: for we are members of his body, of his flesh, and of his bones.
language2_text: Ta yaten rana yamraralay nya tao am akma ney peyvongvongwan no kataotao na ni Kizisto.

language1_text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother, and shall be joined unto his wife, and they two shall be one flesh.
language2_text: Am ori an, "No myan rana so tao do mahakay am ji sira rana macivahay do inyapwan da, ta matarek rana sira kano kahanghangan na. So icyakma dey asa ka tao a meyyaven do vahay."

language1_text: This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the church.
language2_text: Ori rana am yatey makdeng ori a ciring a yadomket do Seysyo a na pehngehngain ji Kizisto a kano amraralay nya tao.

language1_text: Nevertheless, let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her husband.
language2_text: So icyakman nyo sang a mahakay a marilaw no katovong nyo do vahay. To nyo peynara do karilawan nyo no kataotao nyo o karilawan nyo nira. Am panadnaden nyo a mavakes o kahanghangan nyo.

language1_text: Children, obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.
language2_text: Inyo rana kanakan am amizngen nyo o inyapwan nyo. Ta ori rana am iyangay ta amraralay ni Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Honour thy father and mother; which is the first commandment with promise; that it may be well with thee, and thou mayest live long on the earth.
language2_text: "Ikaglaw nyo a ikanig o inyapwan nyo. Ta ori o ipeypapya nyo a peypanokonokow na do karawan ni Ama ta do to do." So na idket do iwawalam ni Moyse no kaji na ablisan no aglaglaw na so akman sang a tao ni Ama ta do to."Ikaglaw nyo a ikanig o inyapwan nyo. Ta ori o ipeypapya nyo a peypanokonokow na do karawan ni Ama ta do to do." So na idket do iwawalam ni Moyse no kaji na ablisan no aglaglaw na so akman sang a tao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And, ye fathers, provoke not your children to wrath: but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.
language2_text: Inyo rana keynyapwanan da am ji nyo pasozya o anak nyo. Vavagan nyo sira no nanao ni Kizisto a ipeypararako nyo so nakem da.

language1_text: Servants, be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh, with fear and trembling, in singleness of your heart, as unto Christ;
language2_text: Inyo rana lamlamsoy da am onotan nyo sira o lawpan nyo. Ikanig nyo sira. To nyo peynara o nakenakem nyo si Kizisto a mahap so vazay da no lawpan nyo.

language1_text: not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but as the servants of Christ, doing the will of God from the heart;
language2_text: Beken a no mangay da citahen inyo no lawpan o ikakdeng nyo a mahap so vazay da. Ta omaing do kararalay nyo ni Ama ta do to o kasaray nyo a mahap so vazay da, do kakma nyoy kalamsoyan ni Kizisto.

language1_text: with good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men:
language2_text: Ji nyo nginara sira o somoli so lawpan da tao. Manakem nyo o kakma nyoy mahap so vazay ni Ama ta do to, a omahap so vazay no lawpan.

language1_text: knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth, the same shall he receive of the Lord, whether he be bond or free.
language2_text: Manakem nyo o na kato mapeyyangangayan so tao ni Ama ta do to. Tana peylamsoin da am tana beken a lamlamsoy am na to palololwa do kapyapya no vazay na o yazaw na sya.

language1_text: And, ye masters, do the same things unto them, forbearing threatening: knowing that your Master also is in heaven; neither is there respect of persons with him.
language2_text: Inyo rana yamapeylamsoy so tao a lawpan am makapya kamo so nakem jira an. Taosya o kateywara no oyyan nyo nira. Manakem nyo o kapeyyangay nyo a tao a italamozong no asa ka Panirsirngen ta do teyngato. Iya rana am peyyangangain na o tao a ikarilaw.

language1_text: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, oya rana am imanowji rana yako inanao jinyo. Inyo rana am ipeyhanhan nyo o rako a oyowyat no Panirsirngen ta a omzat jinyo.

language1_text: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
language2_text: Ahapen nyo o akma nyoy voovoo a na nitoro ni Ama ta do to, ta ori o ipakaharag nyo si Satan no mangay na littan inyo.

language1_text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.
language2_text: Ta yaten rana am beken a ta macililiman do tao. Ta tamo macililiman ji Satan a kano aro a kalamsoyan na yatomalamozong no meyraraten a tao do karawan.

language1_text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
language2_text: Am ori o ahapan nyo so akma nyoy voovoo a nitoro ni Ama ta do to a ipaciliman nyo ji Satan a kano kalamsoyan na a yamlita jinyo. Ta ori o ipakaharag nyo sira. So to nyo meyyonongi rana ji da rana litai.

language1_text: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness;
language2_text: Am ori o ipeytataziman nyo a mapeyyabtek so manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to. Kalokalen nyo o apya icicirawat nyo a omaing ji Kizisto.

language1_text: and your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace;
language2_text: Akma nyoy tokap o kapeylimwang nyo no Mapasaray a Ciriciring a mapanop so tao ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.
language2_text: O peyhanhanan nyo ni Kizisto am akma nyoy sirong a izazat nyo do akmey apoy a ilita na jinyo ni Satan.

language1_text: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God:
language2_text: Ipeyhanhan nyo si Ama ta do to a mapatazadang jinyo. Ta akma nyoy sakop o kapatazadang na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Peyyanen nyo do onowned nyo o Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori rana am akma nyoy cinalolot a nitoro na jinyo no Seyzi.

language1_text: praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints;
language2_text: Miminen nyo ori a ipeynozi ji Ama ta do to a kasidong na jinyo. Abo ji nyo meynozyan a tomala so Seyzi a meypalanginan ninyo. Ori o ipeytataziman nyo. Ji nyo amtadan o kapeynozi nyo no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: and for me, that utterance may be given unto me, that I may open my mouth boldly, to make known the mystery of the gospel,
language2_text: Ipeynozi nyo yaken an, katoro na nya jyaken ni Ama ta do to so ciriciring na ipangnanao ko. Ta ori o ji ko a mamai no ji da pa nipatwaw no kakwa a Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a ipeylimwang ko.

language1_text: for which I am an ambassador in bonds: that therein I may speak boldly, as I ought to speak.
language2_text: Ori an, yako iyan do pamemtengan. So yako alitan ji Kizisto a yameylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na. Ori o peynozyan nyo nyaken a kaji ko macimamman no ciriciring na ipeylimwang ko. Ta ori o peypeypangayan no na nipamnekan jyaken.

language1_text: But that ye also may know my affairs, and how I do, Tychicus, a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord, shall make known to you all things:
language2_text: Si Ticiko a kakteh ta do cinai a yamakdeng a yamahap so vazay na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta am cyaha, ta ipanci na jinyo o ko kapiya do jya.

language1_text: whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that ye might know our affairs, and that he might comfort your hearts.
language2_text: Am ori o yako pasonsonan sya mangay a manci nya jinyo so namen kapiya do jya a kapait na pa so onowned nyo.

language1_text: Peace be to the brethren, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Inaoy no si itoro na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto o ikapiya no onowned nyo, a kazagoman nyo a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to, a kapanta na ninyo so manoyong a pangangarilawan nyo, a kakdeng nyo na so nakem a meyhanhan nya.

language1_text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity. Amen. Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.
language2_text: Inaoy no si itoro na ni Ama ta do to o pangangarilawan na jinyo a yajyahayo a yamraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a kani Timotay a lamlamsoy na ni Yeso Kizisto. Namen ipeyteygami inyo a yameyili do Veydipi a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to a yaomanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto a ka ninyo a panipanirsirngen do kyokay.

language1_text: grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Inaoy no si itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na kano ikapiya no onowned nyo.

language1_text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,
language2_text: No ko manakem inyo am ko isaray inyo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,
language2_text: Yako masaray so onowned a meynozi ninyo.

language1_text: for your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;
language2_text: Ta nimeycicinda no kakwa na kai sicyaikwaya o yanyo sidongan jyaken a yameylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:
language2_text: Ko anoyngan o na kapeyvazay do onowned nyo ni Ama ta do to icyakma ney kanapnapan a ovid. Jyabo kakavos no nya vazay na jinyo a mangay no si komavos o akman sya no si ipirwa pa mai si Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.
language2_text: Manoyong o kapaw ko ninyo. Ta tana ko na myan do pamemtengan sicyaikwaya, tana no kasaliway ko pa a macinekanekad no manoyong a Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am yabo nyo jya nisidongan jyaken a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Katenngan na ni Ama ta do to o karilaw ko ninyo no pangangarilawan na ni Yeso Kizisto do kapaw ko ninyo. So ikanoyong no nya ciring.

language1_text: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment;
language2_text: O ko peynozyan ninyo am kaji na meypahahayan no pangangarilawan nyo a meypahagnat. Akman sang o teneteneng nyo a makapatak no makakaday a vazay.

language1_text: that ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;
language2_text: So ipakateneng nyo rana do ney yapiya na vazay. No si makman kamo sang am manoyong kamo na a ji meylimoteng so onowned a abo so karatan do araraw no ipirwa na mai ni Kizisto.

language1_text: being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
language2_text: So ikasasaray nyo a mapeyvazay so apiya vazay do kowyat na jinyo ni Yeso Kizisto. Ta si makman kamo sang am azwazwain da rana si Ama ta do to no aro a tao.

language1_text: But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ko kakdain inyo a makateneng jyaken a yamyan do pamemtengan. Cyaha, ta na ikapyapya a yasomidong jyaken a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: so that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other places;
language2_text: Am ori o da ikaro no mamzat a tao do vahay no panirsirngen eya kano aro a tao do jya do Loma a yamamimin a yamakateneng jyaken a nipteng da do kahap ko so vazay na ni Yeso.

language1_text: and many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.
language2_text: Ta yada ikowyowyat so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to no akma tey kakteh do cinai a yajyanyahey a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:
language2_text: Manoyong o keyyan no tatasa ka tao a manginanahet a meynenenet a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Kizisto. Am amyan so tatasa ka tao a apiya so nakenakem a meylimwang nya.

language1_text: the one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:
language2_text: Sira rana ya am sira mamimin a yamarilaw nyaken a yamakateneng jyaken a yana nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a yamacinekanekad no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na.

language1_text: but the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.
language2_text: Am o yatatasa ka tao a yameylimwang ni Kizisto am yasomala o onowned da. Yada naknakmen o yada karapa do alalaw ko, do yako iyan do pamemtengan eya.

language1_text: What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.
language2_text: Am cinakongo na. Tana somala rana o onowned da am cyaha, ta si Kizisto o ipeylimwang da. Am ori o sarayan ko nya sicyaikwaya mangay no makwa.

language1_text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,
language2_text: Ta katenngan ko o kapakowbot da jyaken, do peynozyan nyo nyaken a kano sidongan na jyaken no Seyzi a nitovoy na jinyo ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: according to my earnest expectation and my hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether it be by life, or by death.
language2_text: Ko ipeyhanhan si Ama ta do to a somidong jyaken a mapeyvazay so isaray na vazay. Tana sicyaikwaya kano kakwa am meyyangay o kaji ko anyaheyan. Tana mavyay ko a tana mawakwak ko am jyabo kaji ko azwazwayan si Kizisto do kataotao ko a.

language1_text: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.
language2_text: Ta o ko ikakman sang no nakenakem am si Yeso Kizisto o ney makdeng na a yako naknakmen. Si mawakwak ko am apyapya pa, ta ahapen na yaken a mangay a macitovong jya.

language1_text: But if I live in the flesh, this is the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.
language2_text: Am no si mavyay ko pa am apiya pa, ta makapeyvazay ko pa. Am ko jyatenngi sicyaikwaya o ko pamnekan.

language1_text: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:
language2_text: Ko ikakza o ko kakaro rana do karawan a mangay a macilovot rana ji Kizisto. Ta abo rana o apyapyan pa kano nang.

language1_text: nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you.
language2_text: Am ko kapakanakem jinyo a yamakdekdeng pa a yako sidongen.

language1_text: And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;
language2_text: Katenngan ko o kasidong ko jinyo. So ikanoyong nyo a ikataid ko do karawan a peypakatkaten so nakenakem a kano pasarain so onowned.

language1_text: that your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.
language2_text: Am ori an, no si mangay ko pa jinyo do dang am jyabo kaji na rakorakwan pa no sarasaray nyo ji Yeso Kizisto, do kanisomidong na jyaken a meysinaoli pa jinyo.

language1_text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;
language2_text: O ahahapan nyo so onowned nyo do araraw am pehngehngain nyo do Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Kizisto an. Tana ji ko angay a tomita jinyo a kapakamizing ko jinyo a akmey asa so pangtoktwan a kano onowned a mowyat a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring,

language1_text: and in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.
language2_text: a jyanyahey no macioya jinyo a tao. No si akman kamo sang am yongkad na no kapeygegcin na jira no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to a keyyan na no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;
language2_text: O na nipamnekan jinyo am beken a nyo kanoyong ji Kizisto an, ta ahapen nyo o alalaw na a mahap so vazay na,

language1_text: having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear to be in me.
language2_text: akman so nimacita nyo rana do kataotao ko a kano nimamizing nyo. So yana to ngaii sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ, if any comfort of love, if any fellowship of the Spirit, if any bowels and mercies,
language2_text: Manngwa, yanikarapa do onowned nyo o yanyo ipacikaop rana ji Kizisto an? Manngwa, yanikait jinyo o pangangarilawan na an? Manngwa, nyo katenngan o Seyzi a yasomidong jinyo an? Manngwa, nyo ikarilaw o kadwan jinyo an?

language1_text: fulfil ye my joy, that ye be likeminded, having the same love, being of one accord, of one mind.
language2_text: No kamo nimeypahagnat am ko kakzeben inyo akmey yasa so anodan a kano pangangarilawan a kano nakenakem. Ta ori o ikanoyong ko na a somaray so onowned.

language1_text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves.
language2_text: Ji nyo pakaranga o nakenakem nyo an. Ji nyo akzan o keynakem nyo a tao an. Ikanig nyo o kadwan jinyo an. Naknakmen nyo o keyyan no tao a apyapya pa ka ninyo an.

language1_text: Look not every man on his own things, but every man also on the things of others.
language2_text: Beken a o kataotao mo o manakem mo an. Ta manakem mo o kapanidong mo so icyatatao mo an.

language1_text: Let this mind be in you, which was also in Christ Jesus:
language2_text: Inarahen nyo si Yeso Kizisto an.

language1_text: who, being in the form of God, thought it not robbery to be equal with God:
language2_text: Ta si Yeso rana am Tao do to. Am na jyangai no nakem o kapeyyangay da kani Ama na a Tao do to.

language1_text: but made himself of no reputation, and took upon him the form of a servant, and was made in the likeness of men:
language2_text: Ta iya rana am na nipaveveh o na nyahapan sya a na kapyapya pa so na kakmey lamlamsoy a nimalikey a tao. So na icyakman jyaten a tao do karawan so kataotao.

language1_text: and being found in fashion as a man, he humbled himself, and became obedient unto death, even the death of the cross.
language2_text: Na pavevehen o kataotao na a omamizing si Ama na a mahap so vazay ni Ama na a mangay a mawakwak do jyojika.

language1_text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him, and given him a name which is above every name:
language2_text: Am ori an, nyazwazway na ni Ama ta do to si Yeso a kapanta na nya so ney mazway a ngaran na. O nitoro na jya a ngaran na am Panirsirngen.

language1_text: that at the name of Jesus every knee should bow, of things in heaven, and things in earth, and things under the earth;
language2_text: Ori an, tana do teyngato a tana do teyrahem a tana mavyay a tao a tana nimawakwak rana am abwata o ji meylilitod do tangain na,

language1_text: and that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord, to the glory of God the Father.
language2_text: a manci ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen. So ikanoyong no azwazway a mangay ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wherefore, my beloved, as ye have always obeyed, not as in my presence only, but now much more in my absence, work out your own salvation with fear and trembling.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, no kapacikaop ko pa jinyo am masangib kamo a omamizing jyaken. Am ori o ikakdekdeng nyo pa omahap so ciring ko do ikabo ko jinyo do dang an. Makapzat kamo an. Makowyowyat kamo a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori rana am manoyong a vazay no nimamlis so nakenakem a tao.

language1_text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
language2_text: Ta yameyvazay do onowned nyo si Ama ta do to. So ikasasaray nyo a mapeyvazay so kakdain na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings:
language2_text: O makakaday a vazay nyo am ji nyo a ratan. Ji nyo a zyakan.

language1_text: that ye may be blameless and harmless, the sons of God, without rebuke, in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation, among whom ye shine as lights in the world;
language2_text: So nyo ji meylimotengi so onowned a abo so karatan a akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to a yamacikaop do meyraraten a tao do karawan. Ta inyo rana am akma kamoy zezak da, akman so mata no hanit a amzezak so kasarisaryan,

language1_text: holding forth the word of life; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ, that I have not run in vain, neither laboured in vain.
language2_text: a kapakateneng da do ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a manta nira so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da. Ta no si akman kamo sang am amyan rana so kakownongan no zikzikna ko jinyo no si marateng o araraw no yai na ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Yea, and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith, I joy, and rejoice with you all.
language2_text: O raralayan nyo ni Ama ta do to am akmey nakem nyo a patanangen nyo jya. Tana wakwaken da rana yaken a pavoyogen so rala am cyaha, ta akmey nakem ko rana ori a patanangen ko ji Ama ta do to. So ko isaray, ta macizanod kamo jyaken a somaray.

language1_text: For the same cause also do ye joy, and rejoice with me.
language2_text: Akman kamo sang an. No somaray kamo am manakem nyo yaken a macizanod jinyo a somaray an.

language1_text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you, that I also may be of good comfort, when I know your state.
language2_text: No si apyahen na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta am makeykai ko a tovoin si Timotay a mangay jinyo do dang. So ipakateneng ko do vazay nyo do dang.

language1_text: For I have no man likeminded, who will naturally care for your state.
language2_text: Ta iya ori o yamacizanod jyaken so onowned a yamanoyong a yamarilaw ninyo.

language1_text: For all seek their own, not the things which are Jesus Christ's.
language2_text: O karwan no tao am o kataotao da o da naknakmen. Da jyanakem o vazay na ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: But ye know the proof of him, that, as a son with the father, he hath served with me in the gospel.
language2_text: Nyo katenngan o mina vazay na ni Timotay. Ta yanamen akmey meyyama a yamazikna a yameylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring.

language1_text: Him therefore I hope to send presently, so soon as I shall see how it will go with me.
language2_text: No si katenngan ko o araraw na no ipakowbot ko do pamemtengan eya am makeykai ko a tovoin si Timotay a mangay a tomita jinyo.

language1_text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly.
language2_text: Ko anoyngan si Ama ta do to a makeykai rana tomovoy jyaken a mangay a tomita jinyo.

language1_text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus, my brother, and companion in labour, and fellowsoldier, but your messenger, and he that ministered to my wants.
language2_text: Ko naknakmen o katovoy ko so akma tey kakteh do cinai a si Ipaloti a mangay jinyo do dang. Ta iya rana am arako o nisidongan na jyaken do kanitomovoy nyo sya jyaken, do katey mowyat na a macipeyvazay jyaken.

language1_text: For he longed after you all, and was full of heaviness, because that ye had heard that he had been sick.
language2_text: Yateywara o apapaw na jinyo. Na ikarahet no onowned o nyo kapakamizing sya yameyngen so kataotao.

language1_text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death: but God had mercy on him; and not on him only, but on me also, lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow.
language2_text: Manoyong o kanimeyngen na a toda jyangay so inawan. Am mina kasi na nyamen ni Ama ta do to. So ji ko nimazababi nya no onowned.

language1_text: I sent him therefore the more carefully, that, when ye see him again, ye may rejoice, and that I may be the less sorrowful.
language2_text: Am ori o ko naknakman so kakeykai ko rana tomovoy sya do vahay da. So ikasasaray nyo a macikaop rana jya. So ikapyapya na rana no akman sang.

language1_text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness; and hold such in reputation:
language2_text: Am ori an, isaray nyo a tomaotao sya, do nyo kakmey meyketeketeh do cinai. So kanigan nyo no akman sang a tao an.

language1_text: because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death, not regarding his life, to supply your lack of service toward me.
language2_text: Ta na kajyawakwakan rana, do yana kahap so vazay ni Kizisto a kano vazay nyo a yasomidong jyaken.

language1_text: Finally, my brethren, rejoice in the Lord. To write the same things to you, to me indeed is not grievous, but for you it is safe.
language2_text: O ney manowji a ciring ko jinyo akma koy kakteh do cinai am somaray kamo, ta kamo macikaop rana ji Kizisto. So yako papirwan pa so mina ciring ko jinyo no kakwa pa. Ta beken a ikarahet nyo, ta ipeypapya nyo ori.

language1_text: Beware of dogs, beware of evil workers, beware of the concision.
language2_text: Azimanen nyo sira o meyraraten a tao a omalalas do nanao na ni Ama ta do to. Sira rana am tao do Yotay a yamanci no kayongkad do kataotao.

language1_text: For we are the circumcision, which worship God in the spirit, and rejoice in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh.
language2_text: Ta yaten rana am manoyong a niyongkadan na rana ni Ama ta do to, do kasidong na jyaten no Seyzi a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to. So ta ji mangozai do makakaday a iwawalam da no tao do Yotay a mapeypapya jyaten do tangain na ni Ama ta do to, ta si Yeso Kizisto o ozain ta. Am ori o yata ikasaray rana a yamacikaop jya.

language1_text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh. If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh, I more:
language2_text: No myan so tao a manci no kapeypapya na no apya vazay na do tangain na ni Ama ta do to am apyapya ko pa manci no akman so sang.

language1_text: circumcised the eighth day, of the stock of Israel, of the tribe of Benjamin, an Hebrew of the Hebrews; as touching the law, a Pharisee;
language2_text: Kawao araw ko pa nimatazak a tao am niyongkadan da na yaken no iweywawalam ta. Ta manoyong ko a Isedi a tao a macitetngehan ji Penyaming. So ikanoyong ko a macikownongan do Sipolay a tao. No hapen ta do iwawalam ta tao do Yotay am makdekdeng ko pa a mangozay jya, do kapacitetngehan ko do tao a macyagom do Vadisay.

language1_text: concerning zeal, persecuting the church; touching the righteousness which is in the law, blameless.
language2_text: No hapen ta do kakdekdeng ta no onowned am nimacivosoy ko rana do niomanoyong ji Yeso a tao. Am no si pangozayan ta o iwawalam na ni Moyse a cittan ta so kapyapya ta am jyabo karatan ko a.

language1_text: But what things were gain to me, those I counted loss for Christ.
language2_text: Am o ipanci ko no kakwa apiya am ko rana nilikodan a ko kararalay ni Kizisto sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: Yea doubtless, and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord: for whom I have suffered the loss of all things, and do count them but dung, that I may win Christ,
language2_text: Beken a ori an. Ta yamaharahara rana o nakem ko ji Yeso Kizisto sicyararalay ko na nya. Yako ipanci o makakaday a vazay a yabwata so angangayan, do yako kapyapya pa so ko kapakateneng ji Kizisto a Panirsirngen ko.

language1_text: and be found in him, not having mine own righteousness, which is of the law, but that which is through the faith of Christ, the righteousness which is of God by faith:
language2_text: Ko manoyong a yamacikaop jya. So ko na peymakarwan do mina vazay ko no kakwa. So ikanoyong ko na abo so karatan do tangain na ni Ama ta do to. O yako icyakman sang am ko ipeyhanhan si Kizisto. Beken a ko kahap so iwawalam na ni Moyse. Ta yamanoyong ya nitoro ni Ama ta do to o ikapya ko do tangain na.

language1_text: that I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made conformable unto his death;
language2_text: Am ori o ko naknakman so ko kapakateneng ji Kizisto a kano arako a oyowyat na jyaken. Ta iya rana am tey mowyat, ta nimirwa a mavyay. Yako ikakza o ko kapacizanod jya so alalaw, akman sya ji rahet so kawakwak na.

language1_text: if by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead.
language2_text: Inaoy no si akman ko sang a mavyay a apo do heseb ko no makwa.

language1_text: Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.
language2_text: O ko peycirngan sang am beken a ko rana nimimin a yamahap o yamakakaday a yamyan ji Ama ta do to. So ko ikakdekdeng pa yaominara si Yeso Kizisto do na katalamozong nyaken.

language1_text: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before,
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ko ji naknakma o ko kanimakahap rana so sang. Ta yasa ka vazay o ko naknakmen. Ko na ji paolya o mata ko do mina vazay ko no kakwa. Ta ko na naknakmen o yako kahap so yaomanam a vazay.

language1_text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Am ori o ko icyakmey malayo a tao a yasomazap so ko angayan, do ko kanakenakem so ko kapakahap so azaw ko ji Ama ta do to a to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad. Ori rana am nipamnekan na yaken ni Ama ta do to a omanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto a kapakahap ko na sang.

language1_text: Let us therefore, as many as be perfect, be thus minded: and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded, God shall reveal even this unto you.
language2_text: Am ori o ikamimin ta yamakdeng so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to a makateneng do akman sang an. No si macitarek o nakenakem nyo am cyaha, ta si Ama ta do to o mapananao nya jinyo.

language1_text: Nevertheless, whereto we have already attained, let us walk by the same rule, let us mind the same thing.
language2_text: Am ji ta ablis so nakenakem a mangozay do manoyong a nanao a nimamizing ta.

language1_text: Brethren, be followers together of me, and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample.
language2_text: Inarahen nyo yaken, manga kakteh an. Panginginaran nyo sira o yaominara jyamen a tao an, ta yanamen rana nipacita jinyo o manoyong a icicirawat namen.

language1_text: (For many walk, of whom I have told you often, and now tell you even weeping, that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ:
language2_text: Beken a ko ipisa inyo a yavavagan. So ko to lavii a yamapamizing jinyo an. O icicirawat da no aro a tao am yamacisala ji Kizisto a nimawakwak do jyojika. So da ikanoyong a akmey mapeykavosoyan si Yeso.

language1_text: whose end is destruction, whose God is their belly, and whose glory is in their shame, who mind earthly things.)
language2_text: O mapeyvazay so sang a tao am mangay sira do kararatan. Ta o isovo da kanen o da naknakmen. Da azwazwain o yamacimanig a vazay. Da ji ngawawan o kasasaodan da do karawan.

language1_text: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:
language2_text: Am yaten rana am italamozong na yaten ni Ama ta do to. So pananalan ta si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a meygegcin a apo do teyngato. Ta iya o mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato.

language1_text: who shall change our vile body, that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body, according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself.
language2_text: Pangozayan na do oyowyat na ipanod na so makakaday do sinokob no hanit a iblis na so kataotao ta do karawan. So icyakman takamo so kataotao na ni Yeso a maniray a ji rana wakwak.

language1_text: Therefore, my brethren dearly beloved and longed for, my joy and crown, so stand fast in the Lord, my dearly beloved.
language2_text: Am ori o ikakdeng nyo pa so onowned a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to, manga keypong an. So ko sarayan ninyo a akma koy kakteh do cinai. Ta yamyan so kakownongan na no vazay ko jinyo. Inaoy no si macita ko pa inyo.

language1_text: I beseech Euodias, and beseech Syntyche, that they be of the same mind in the Lord.
language2_text: Inyo rana yararwa akma nameney kakteh do cinai a mavakes a meyngaran so Yoati a kani Sentihe am to nyo peykabobwa o raraten nyo do kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: And I intreat thee also, true yokefellow, help those women which laboured with me in the gospel, with Clement also, and with other my fellowlabourers, whose names are in the book of life.
language2_text: Imo rana mo kahakay a kararay ko am sidongen mo sira an. Ta sira rana am mina kararay ko a kani Kedimong a kano kadwan jyamen. Sira ori o nimahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to. Ta sira rana am yana domket o ngaran da do vakong na ni Ama ta do to a yamanoyong a makahap rana so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: Rejoice in the Lord alway: and again I say, Rejoice.
language2_text: Mangday kamo do araraw a somaray a yamacikaop ji Yeso. So papirwan ko pa sya ipanci jinyo an. Somaray kamo an.

language1_text: Let your moderation be known unto all men. The Lord is at hand.
language2_text: Manakem nyo o kapangarilaw nyo so tao an. Ta yana makeykai si Yeso a yamai.

language1_text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
language2_text: Ji nyo a ratan o makakaday a vazay nyo an. Ta ipanci nyo do inozi nyo o kakzeben nyo ji Ama ta do to a kasaray nyo so onowned a mapasyasi jya an.

language1_text: And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Ta itoro na jinyo o ikapiya no onowned nyo a ji da tenngi no karwan no tao. Mangay na irapa do nakenakem nyo do nyo kararalay ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: Finally, brethren, whatsoever things are true, whatsoever things are honest, whatsoever things are just, whatsoever things are pure, whatsoever things are lovely, whatsoever things are of good report; if there be any virtue, and if there be any praise, think on these things.
language2_text: Am ori manga keypong an, ahapan nyo so apipiya vazay a isaray na ni Ama ta do to a kano ji meypareki so onowned a kano tey mazway a vazay. O akman rana sang am peyyanen nyo do onowned nyo a patwawen do icicirawat nyo.

language1_text: Those things, which ye have both learned, and received, and heard, and seen in me, do: and the God of peace shall be with you.
language2_text: O nimamizing nyo a kano nimacita nyo a icicirawat ko am miminen nyo a peyvazain an. Ta ori o ipacitovong na jinyo no yamanta nyaten so ikapiya no onowned ta a si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly, that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again; wherein ye were also careful, but ye lacked opportunity.
language2_text: Ko masaray do ko kararalay ni Yeso. Ta yapa mirwa o nakenakem nyo a yasomidong jyaken. So ko ipakateneng jinyo a yamasangib a yamnakenakem jyaken. Am na kabo no tao a yanyo pararan so aryarilaw nyo jyaken.

language1_text: Not that I speak in respect of want: for I have learned, in whatsoever state I am, therewith to be content.
language2_text: O ko peycirngan so sang am beken a nyo kaji mapanadnadan jyaken. Ta ko rana mapeyneynara no abo o amyan do kataotao.

language1_text: I know both how to be abased, and I know how to abound: every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry, both to abound and to suffer need.
language2_text: Nimasapa ko rana o kakcinan ko, kabsoyan ko. Tana mabsoy ko a tana makcin ko a tana abo o kalahen ko am amyan rana so ko peyneynaran sya.

language1_text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
language2_text: Ta si Yeso Kizisto a yaomoyat jyaken am ori o ko ipakownong do ko ahahapan sya, do yameycyataretarek a ko masapa.

language1_text: Notwithstanding ye have well done, that ye did communicate with my affliction.
language2_text: Am tey yapya o nisidongan nyo jyaken do alalaw ko.

language1_text: Now ye Philippians know also, that in the beginning of the gospel, when I departed from Macedonia, no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving, but ye only.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo a tao do Veydipi an. No ka ori pa so kapeylimwang ko no Mapasaray a Ciriciring am karwan ko o pongso do Maciton. No kano nang am sinjya nyo o nisomidong jyaken a mapatodeh jyaken.

language1_text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity.
language2_text: No keyyan ko pa do Tesalonicya am beken a ipisa kamo a nisomidong jyaken.

language1_text: Not because I desire a gift: but I desire fruit that may abound to your account.
language2_text: Ji ko ngakzeba o kazaw nyo jyaken. Ta tey kakza ko ji Ama ta do to o karwaro na pa no isidong na jinyo do kapiya no nakenakem nyo jyaken.

language1_text: But I have all, and abound: I am full, having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you, an odour of a sweet smell, a sacrifice acceptable, wellpleasing to God.
language2_text: O nyo nyazaw jyaken a apzapzatan am ko na nimamimin a yanimahap. So ko to meypanpani jya. Si Ipaloti a akma tey kakteh am ori o yanimai no aro a azaw ko. So na sarayan nya ni Ama ta do to so akma nyoy nakem jya.

language1_text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to o tomoro no makakaday a apyahen nyo no nakem, ta kamo na macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto. Ta ji nyo a giji o kangangay na ni Ama ta do to a itoro na jinyo.

language1_text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
language2_text: Inaoy no azwazwain ta si Ama ta do to a mangay do kaidan no karawan. Amin.

language1_text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus. The brethren which are with me greet you.
language2_text: Ipeyminaminasi nyo sira o akma tey kakteh do cinai a yamraralay ni Yeso Kizisto. Akman sang sira o kararay ko a meyminaminasi ninyo.

language1_text: All the saints salute you, chiefly they that are of Cæ sar's household.
language2_text: Sira mamimin o sinjya do jya kano tao do vahay na ni Kaysa a yameyminaminasi ninyo.

language1_text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen. It was written to the Philippians from Rome by Epaphroditus.
language2_text: Inaoy no itoro na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na jinyo.

language1_text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, and Timotheus our brother,
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to a yana nipamnekan ni Yeso Kizisto a omlivolivon no ciriciring na. Yaken rana kano akma tey kakteh do cinai a si Timotay am,

language1_text: to the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: yanamen ipeyteygami inyo a yameyili do Kelosi a sinjya a yatey makdeng so nakem ji Kizisto. Inaoy si itoro na ni Ama ta do to o pangangarilawan na kano ikapiya no onowned nyo.

language1_text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,
language2_text: No namen ipeynozi inyo am namen masangib a isaray ninyo ji Ama ta do to a Ama na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which ye have to all the saints,
language2_text: Ta namen rana nimamizing o nakenakem nyo si Yeso Kizisto a kano aryarilaw nyo so aro a sinjya.

language1_text: for the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel;
language2_text: Ta no kavavayo nyo pa nimakamizing so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am to nyo na nganoyngi o itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to do teyngato.

language1_text: which is come unto you, as it is in all the world; and bringeth forth fruit, as it doth also in you, since the day ye heard of it, and knew the grace of God in truth:
language2_text: Beken a inyoo o na peylimwangan no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to, ta yarana nimeylimwang do peycyamahamahatawan na. So da rana ipamlis no tao. So da icyakman jinyo a yarana makateneng do pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: as ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant, who is for you a faithful minister of Christ;
language2_text: Nyo nimahap o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to ji Ipava a kararay namen a yaji mapasaklang do vazay ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit.
language2_text: Iya o nimanci nya jyamen so katey mangarilaw nyo so icyatatao nyo, do kaniomoyat na jinyo no Seyzi.

language1_text: For this cause we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;
language2_text: Mamizing namen inyo am masangib namen a meynozi ninyo. Ipeynozi namen o kapanta na ninyo no Seyzi so makakaday a teneteneng a makateneng do nisidongan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a kano peypalanginan na ninyo.

language1_text: that ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;
language2_text: No si akman sang am manoyong kamo na macipayok so vazay ji Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta, do kahap nyo so vazay na a meypahagnat rana so onowned a makateneng rana ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: strengthened with all might, according to his glorious power, unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness;
language2_text: Ta iya rana am tey mowyat. So namen peyhanhanan nya a makasidong jinyo a jyamama no makakaday a alalaw a masaray rana so onowned.

language1_text: giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light:
language2_text: Isaray nyo si Ama ta do to. Ta iya o yanimapanop jinyo a yamraralay nya. So nyo ikanoyong rana yamyan do kazngangan.

language1_text: who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son:
language2_text: Na nyagag yaten do kasarisaryan a na kaparapong jyaten do italamozong no Anak na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: in whom we have redemption through his blood, even the forgiveness of sins:
language2_text: Nyagag na yaten ni Yeso Kizisto do peyraratenan ta. So ta ikanoyong rana nimavonas so raraten.

language1_text: Who is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature:
language2_text: Si Kizisto rana am akma ney kamamagenan ni Ama ta do to. So na ikanoyong ney manhama na do makakaday a nyamamaog na.

language1_text: for by him were all things created, that are in heaven, and that are in earth, visible and invisible, whether they be thrones, or dominions, or principalities, or powers: all things were created by him, and for him:
language2_text: Iya o nyamaogan na sya ni Ama ta do to so hanit a kano karawan a kano meycyamadadayan a yamacita kano yajyacita, pacyangayan no yajyacita so oyowyat a kalamsoyan ni Satan a kano tinsi na ni Ama ta do to. So na ikanoyong a tey mazway a Tao do to.

language1_text: and he is before all things, and by him all things consist.
language2_text: Jya nimamaog pa o makakaday am amyan rana si Kizisto. So ika iya na no tomalamozong no yamakakaday.

language1_text: And he is the head of the body, the church: who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead; that in all things he might have the preeminence.
language2_text: Yaten rana a yamraralay nya am akma ney kataotao yaten ni Yeso Kizisto. So ika iya na no yameymatmatngeh nyaten. Iya o na yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta. Iya am Anak na ni Ama ta do to a nimirwa mavyay. So ika iya na no ney manokdwan na do karawan.

language1_text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell;
language2_text: Ta kakdain na ni Ama ta do to o Anak na macikto jya so kadmayan.

language1_text: and, having made peace through the blood of his cross, by him to reconcile all things unto himself; by him, I say, whether they be things in earth, or things in heaven.
language2_text: Tana teyrahem a tana teyngato am yana nimimin a nitoro ji Yeso ni Ama ta do to. Ta iya rana am na nikawakwak yaten do jyojika. So na ikabo rana no yamarahet.

language1_text: And you, that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now hath he reconciled
language2_text: No kakwa pa am abo kasngesngenan nyo ji Ama ta do to, do karahet no onowned nyo a kano vazay nyo. So nikanoyong nyo akmey mapeykavosoyan si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: in the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:
language2_text: Am sicyaikwaya am nikawakwak na rana yaten ni Yeso Kizisto a Anak na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o yanyo rana ipacikaop ji Ama ta do to. O icyakman na sang am kakzeben na inyo a ji meylimoteng so onowned a abo so karatan do tangain na.

language1_text: if ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;
language2_text: Am ori an, ji nyo na pasalai do nimamizing nyo pa no kakwa a Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta to kamo ngotokot so onowned a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to a manta ninyo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo. So na rana nipeylimwangan no akman sang a nanao do karawan. So yako ikanoyong a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to a meylimwang no ciriciring na.

language1_text: who now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body's sake, which is the church:
language2_text: Tana tey rako o alalaw ko sicyaikwaya am cyaha, ta o akman rana sang am ipakasidong ko jinyo a meypahagnat so nakenakem a omraralay ni Yeso. Am ori o ko isaray, ta ipakasidong ko so omraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a tao. Ta nimakman sang si Yeso Kizisto a nimawakwak no omraralay nya tao.

language1_text: whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, to fulfil the word of God;
language2_text: Yaken rana am lamlamsoy na yaken ni Yeso Kizisto a somidong so yamraralay nya tao. O na nitorwan nya jyaken so akman sya vazay ni Ama ta do to am ipeypahagnat ko inyo. So ikanoyong ko rana meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations, but now is made manifest to his saints:
language2_text: Ori rana am ji da pa nipatwaw no kakwa, a ji da tenngi no tao do karawan. Am na rana nipatwaw sicyaikwaya ni Ama ta do to do amraralay nya tao.

language1_text: to whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:
language2_text: O nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to am ikakza na o kapakateneng da no tao do karawan so mapeyzokab a nanao na. Ori rana am si Yeso Kizisto a yarana macikaop jyaten. So yata ikanoyong a macizanod do azwazway na ni Ama ta do to no makwa.

language1_text: whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:
language2_text: Si Kizisto o namen ipeylimwang do aro a tao. Am ori o na ikabo no namen jyasapa rana a ipeylimwang do tao a ivavaga jira, ipaziman sira, a kanoyong da rana a meypahagnat so nakenakem a amraralay ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: whereunto I also labour, striving according to his working, which worketh in me mightily.
language2_text: Am ori an o ko ikowyat a yameyvazay a ji macimazikna do vazay a mangozay do na kaniomoyat jyaken ni Kizisto a yanitomoro no vazay na jyaken.

language1_text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you, and for them at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;
language2_text: Inaoy si katenngan nyo yaken a tao do Kelosi a ka ninyo a tao do Lawticya a mowyat a meynozi ninyo a kano aro a tao a ji ko pa nimacita.

language1_text: that their hearts might be comforted, being knit together in love, and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding, to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God, and of the Father, and of Christ;
language2_text: O ko ikakman sang am ko kakzeben o kasaray nyo so onowned a masicyakarilaw. So ikapinpin na no nang a ko tey kakza inyo a manoyong rana makateneng do nanao ni Ama ta do to a omagaz ji Kizisto.

language1_text: in whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.
language2_text: Si Kizisto o na yanan no makakaday a teneteneng.

language1_text: And this I say, lest any man should beguile you with enticing words.
language2_text: O ko pancyan no akman sang jinyo am ko ihawa o karwan no tao a mapeykawad jinyo no malas a ciring da.

language1_text: For though I be absent in the flesh, yet am I with you in the spirit, joying and beholding your order, and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ.
language2_text: Tana ko ji ngyan jinyo do dang am cyaha, ta yamyan jinyo o onowned ko. So ko ikasaray a yamakanakem jinyo a mowyat so onowned a meyhanhan ni Kizisto.

language1_text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him:
language2_text: Inyo rana am nyo anoyngan si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Am ori o panadnadan nyo sya an.

language1_text: rooted and built up in him, and stablished in the faith, as ye have been taught, abounding therein with thanksgiving.
language2_text: Payamoten nyo o nanao na ni Yeso Kizisto do onowned nyo a kapeypahagnat nyo na so nakenakem jya. So sarayan nyo nya ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit, after the tradition of men, after the rudiments of the world, and not after Christ.
language2_text: Makapzat kamo. Ji nyo ngonoci o mapeycyakawad jinyo a nanao no tao do karawan. Ta o akman rana sang a nanao am apo do tao no kakwa. So ji na monganai ji Kizisto no da ipamizing jinyo.

language1_text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.
language2_text: Ta yamanoyong o nakem na ni Ama ta do to a yarana nimacimalag ji Kizisto.

language1_text: And ye are complete in him, which is the head of all principality and power:
language2_text: Yakamo rana a macikaop ji Kizisto. Am ori o nyo rana ipakahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo. So na ikanoyong a Panirsirngen ta, ney manokdwan na do karawan.

language1_text: in whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ:
language2_text: So na rana iyan no yongkad nyo a yamonganay ji Ama ta do to a tao, do nyo kapacikaop ji Kizisto. Am o yongkad rana am beken a monganay do kataotao. Ta yamonganay ori ji Kizisto, do na kaniomyavayo so onowned nyo.

language1_text: buried with him in baptism, wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God, who hath raised him from the dead.
language2_text: Ta o peypeypangayan no da kataktak jinyo am yongkad no kapacizanod no raraten nyo a yakmey nimacikawakwak ji Kizisto. So icyakman nyo sang a akmey to nimacizanod ji Kizisto a nimirwa a mavyay, do kanoyong nyo do mapeyzokab a oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to a nimapeyvangon sya.

language1_text: And you, being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh, hath he quickened together with him, having forgiven you all trespasses;
language2_text: No kakwa pa am abo pa jinyo o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo, do keyyan no raraten nyo a nimacisyay ji Ama ta do to. Am kanimapazanod na jinyo ji Kizisto a avyain ni Ama ta do to, do kanimvonas na rana so raraten ta ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;
language2_text: Nipeyyopowpas no rala ni Yeso Kizisto o domket a raraten ta a ji ngahap so iwawalam ni Moyse.

language1_text: and having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.
language2_text: Na nibalinas ni Yeso Kizisto no jyojika na o oyowyat ni Satan. So na ikanoyong a yarana nimharag sya do tangain no tao do karawan.

language1_text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat, or in drink, or in respect of an holyday, or of the new moon, or of the sabbath days:
