language2_text: Am ori an, ji nyo rana ingnan no onowned do kazyakan da ninyo no tao a jingdeng so nakem do adan a icicirawat nyo a omagaz do pamarmarngan nyo so kanen a kano ipeyweywalam no tao.

language1_text: which are a shadow of things to come; but the body is of Christ.
language2_text: O ahahapan da sya no tao do Yotay no kakwa am ji pa meyngongyod ori. Ta akmey avwavong ori. Am o vazay ni Kizisto a ta macita am ori o meyngongyod a makasidong jyaten a macikaop ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels, intruding into those things which he hath not seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,
language2_text: Ji nyo ngonoci sira o mapakateneteneng a tao a manci no kapakacita da so mapangyangyalak a vazay a kano tanwasiwasi a amraralay no tinsi. Ta mapehes jinyo o akma ney nakem jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta o akman rana sang a tao am to da mangozangozai o nakem da a tanteneteneng.

language1_text: and not holding the Head, from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered, and knit together, increaseth with the increase of God.
language2_text: Sira rana am ji sira rana macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto. Ta si Yeso Kizisto rana am Panirsirngen ta a yamraralay nya tao. So ta icyakmey kataotao na. No macikaop ta na ji Kizisto a yamraralay nya am ori o ipeypahagnat ta rana so onowned, do kapakateneng ta rana do manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world, why, as though living in the world, are ye subject to ordinances,
language2_text: Inyo rana yameyngongyod a macikaop ji Kizisto am ji nyo rana pasaklanga o adan a marahet a icicirawat nyo, do nyo kaji ngonotan rana do adan nyo a icicirawat. Am ikeykongo kamo ya a yapa macizavoz do icicirawat da no tao do karawan,

language1_text: (touch not; taste not; handle not;
language2_text: a yaro pa so yamakanyaw a yamangozay do ciring da no tao no kakwa a manci no, "Ji nyo minani oya. Ji nyo nganna ori."

language1_text: which all are to perish with the using;) after the commandments and doctrines of men?
language2_text: Manoyong o kabo no peypeypangayan no akman sang a iwawalam no tao. Ta o meycyamadadayan a isovo a kanen am makeykai a gomcin do kataotao.

language1_text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship, and humility, and neglecting of the body; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh.
language2_text: No citahen sira o amraralay no tinsi a kano tanwasiwasi a kano mapeyzaza so kataotao da manaralay so malas a iraralay am akmey apiya sira. Am sira rana am ji da pariparing o aktokto da do kataotao da. So ikabo no peypeypangayan na.

language1_text: If ye then be risen with Christ, seek those things which are above, where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God.
language2_text: Inyo rana am kamo rana akmey nimacizanod ji Kizisto a nimirwa a mavyay. Am ori an, naknakman nyo kato nyo ngotokotan so onowned a omahap so apyahen na vazay ni Kizisto. Ta iya rana am yamyan do wanan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth.
language2_text: Makowyowyat kamo a amnakenakem so vazay do teyngato. So ikabeken a vazay do teyrahem no naknakmen nyo.

language1_text: For ye are dead, and your life is hid with Christ in God.
language2_text: Ta inyo rana am yamyan rana jinyo so vayo a onowned nyo a ji nalamozongan rana no raraten. Ta kamo rana macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto a kani Ama ta do to.

language1_text: When Christ, who is our life, shall appear, then shall ye also appear with him in glory.
language2_text: Si Yeso Kizisto rana am yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo. Si mirwa mai si Yeso am ipanta na inyo so vayo a kataotao nyo a pazanoden do azwazway na.

language1_text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth; fornication, uncleanness, inordinate affection, evil concupiscence, and covetousness, which is idolatry:
language2_text: Am ori o to nyo peykaboboi so marahet a ikeykakza nyo, akman so mapasagpyan so aktokto a kano makakaday a marahet a aktokto a kano mangagom. Ta o mangagom rana ya am akmey to na raralayan o kakzeben na no nakem.

language1_text: for which things' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience:
language2_text: O akman rana sang a vazay am peydednahen na jya o peyoyaoyyan ni Ama ta do to do akman sang a ji ngonot jya tao.

language1_text: in the which ye also walked some time, when ye lived in them.
language2_text: No kakwa pa am nimakman kamo so sang a nitalamozong no adan a nakenakem nyo.

language1_text: But now ye also put off all these; anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy communication out of your mouth.
language2_text: Am sicyaikwa rana ya am zavaten nyo na o akman sang a vazay. Ji nyo na peyneynama o karahet no iyangay nyo abo so panganyanigan a mapeyyan do onowned so oyaoyyan nyo no tao a mangangavay a mapatwaw so makararahet a ciring.

language1_text: Lie not one to another, seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds;
language2_text: Ji nyo palasa o ciring nyo. Ta nyo na nikarwan o adan a nakenakem nyo a kano adan a iwawalam nyo,

language1_text: and have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:
language2_text: kapalit nyo rana so vayo a onowned nyo apo ji Ama ta do to, do na kaji amtadan a yasomidong jinyo a yaomyavayo so icicirawat nyo. Am ori o ikanoyong nyo rana meypahagnat a makateneng ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcision nor uncircumcision, Barbarian, Scythian, bond nor free: but Christ is all, and in all.
language2_text: No manoyong kakman ta sang am abo rana peytartarkan ta do tangain na ni Ama ta do to. Tana tao do Yotay a kano beken a tao do Yotay a tana jyapsek a kano mapsek a tao a tana peylamsoin da kano ji da peylamsoya a pacyangayan ta am ta meyyangangay a yarana vayo so onowned ji Kizisto. So ika iya no azwazwain ta.

language1_text: Put on therefore, as the elect of God, holy and beloved, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind, meekness, longsuffering;
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to o yamarilaw ninyo a nimamnek jinyo a akma ney anak. Am ori o ipangarilaw nyo a mapanalawbo so aktokto nyo, ta kapiya nyo so nakem do tangain no tao a jyahayo so onowned.

language1_text: forbearing one another, and forgiving one another, if any man have a quarrel against any: even as Christ forgave you, so also do ye.
language2_text: Macisidosidong kamo. No amyan so kazyakan nyo no kadwan jinyo am to nyo peykabobwa. Inarahen nyo si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a nimapeykabobo so raraten nyo.

language1_text: And above all these things put on charity, which is the bond of perfectness.
language2_text: O ney makdeng na do makakaday a vazay am pangangarilawan. Ta o pangangarilawan rana am mapeypayopayok so onowned ta do icyatatao ta.

language1_text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to the which also ye are called in one body; and be ye thankful.
language2_text: O nitoro na ni Kizisto a ikapiya no onowned nyo am ipeypalanginan na inyo. Isaray nyo ji Ama ta do to. Ta iya o yanimamnek jinyo akmey yasa so kataotao, do yana kanitomoro nya jinyo so ikapiya no onowned nyo.

language1_text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
language2_text: Pakolivavahen nyo do onowned nyo o nanao ni Kizisto. Pangozayan nyo o teneng a nitoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a macinanannao. Meyyanwanood kamo so Anwanood ni Tawey a kano meyngongyod apo do onowned nyo a yanood nyo si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed, do all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God and the Father by him.
language2_text: O makakaday a vazay nyo a kano ciring nyo am mamimin a pagazen nyo do ngaran ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a somaray nya ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wives, submit yourselves unto your own husbands, as it is fit in the Lord.
language2_text: Inyo rana mavakes am onotan nyo o kahanghangan nyo. Ta ori rana am adan ta iwawalam a amraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a tao.

language1_text: Husbands, love your wives, and be not bitter against them.
language2_text: Inyo rana mahakay am ikaglaw nyo sira o kataned nyo do vahay a mavakes. Taosya o kangamo nyo sira.

language1_text: Children, obey your parents in all things: for this is well pleasing unto the Lord.
language2_text: Inyo rana minapodpod jira am amizngen nyo o ciring no inyapwan nyo. Ta ori rana am adan ta iwawalam a amraralay ni Kizisto a tao. So sarayan na no akman sang ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Fathers, provoke not your children to anger, lest they be discouraged.
language2_text: Inyo rana inyapwan da am ji nyo peyleylakan sira o minapodpod jinyo. Ta ikahayo da no onowned a ji ngahap so inanao nyo sira.

language1_text: Servants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh; not with eyeservice, as menpleasers; but in singleness of heart, fearing God:
language2_text: Inyo rana peylamsoin da tao am amizngen nyo o ciring da no mapeylamsoy jinyo a tao. Ta o vazay nyo rana am beken a tao o pacittan nyo nya, ta omagaz rana do kakdekdeng nyo a amraralay ni Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: and whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
language2_text: O makakaday a vazay nyo am to nyongdengi a peyvazain a makanakem si Kizisto. So ji na monganai no vazay nyo do tao.

language1_text: knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.
language2_text: Manakem nyo o keyyan no nakem na jinyo ni Kizisto, do kanoyong nyo a makahap rana so nakem na so omanop jya tao. So ikanoyong ni Kizisto a ahapen nyo so vazay.

language1_text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done: and there is no respect of persons.
language2_text: O meyraraten a tao am mamimin sira angayan no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta meyyangangay o ahahapan na so tao do karawan.

language1_text: Masters, give unto your servants that which is just and equal; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven.
language2_text: Inyo rana yamapeylamsoy a tao am peyyangangain nyo o nakenakem nyo so peylamsoin nyo a tao. Ta nyo katenngan na keyyan no Tao do to nyo do teyngato a yatomita so vazay nyo.

language1_text: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving;
language2_text: Makowyat kamo a meynozi. Ji kamo tongwakwan a meynozi. Ta mapo do onowned nyo o inozi nyo a kasaray nyo so onowned ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:
language2_text: Ipeynozi nyo yamen a kapeypalanginan na nyamen ni Ama ta do to a mangay meylimwang no ciriciring na. So ikanoyong na rana meylimwang no ji da pa nipatwaw no kakwa a nanao ni Kizisto. O yada aptengan jyaken sicyaikwaya am ko nyahap o vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: that I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.
language2_text: Am ori an, peynozyan nyo nyaken a kanoyong ko a ombaba so nanao ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without, redeeming the time.
language2_text: Apzatan nyo o iwawalam nyo a kano ciriciring nyo, ta peycitacittan da inyo no ji manaralay so Tao do to. Makateteneng kamo a meylimwang no nanao ni Ama ta do to jira.

language1_text: Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.
language2_text: No meyzezyak kamo am pasaklangen nyo o apiya gamogamo nyo, kapiya da omamizing nya a kateneng nyo a mapasapa do mapacici jinyo a tao.

language1_text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, who is a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:
language2_text: Si Ticiko rana akma tey kakteh do cinai am ipanci na jinyo o namen kapiya do jya. Iya rana am tey makdeng a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to. So namen ipeyyangay a yamahap so vazay ni Ama ta do to a lamlamsoy na.

language1_text: whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;
language2_text: Am ori o ko tovoyan sya yamangay jinyo do dang a manci no namen kapiya do jya a ipait na jinyo so onowned.

language1_text: with Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They shall make known unto you all things which are done here.
language2_text: O yamacihza jya am akma tey kakteh do cinai si Onaysemo a tey mowyat so nakem ji Ama ta do to. Iya ori am keylyan nyo. Cyaha, ta ipanci da jinyo no yararwa ang o vazay namen do jya.

language1_text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you, and Marcus, sister's son to Barnabas, (touching whom ye received commandments: if he come unto you, receive him;)
language2_text: Na ipeyminaminasi inyo no yako kararay a yada aptengen do jya si Aditako. O kateysa ni Parnapo a meyngaran si Make am yakman sang a yameyminaminasi ninyo. Si Make rana am nipanci ko na o kapeyseysan nyo pa sya si mangay jinyo do dang.

language1_text: and Jesus, which is called Justus, who are of the circumcision. These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God, which have been a comfort unto me.
language2_text: Si Yeso a yada ngaranan a Yoseto am yakman sang a yameyminaminasi ninyo. Do tao do Yotay a sinjya am sira yatatlo ang o kararay ko a mahap so vazay ni Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong da nimakasidong jyaken.

language1_text: Epaphras, who is one of you, a servant of Christ, saluteth you, always labouring fervently for you in prayers, that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God.
language2_text: Si Ipava rana a keylyan nyo am yakman sang a yameyminaminasi ninyo. Iya rana am lamlamsoy ni Yeso Kizisto a masangib a meynozi ninyo. Ipeynozi na o kakdeng nyo so nakem ji Ama ta do to a meypahagnat so nakem a manoyong a omonot do nakem na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For I bear him record, that he hath a great zeal for you, and them that are in Laodicea, and them in Hierapolis.
language2_text: To ko na macitangayan jinyo a tao do Kelosi am aro alalaw na do kasidong na jinyo, pacyangayan nyo a sinjya do Lawticya kado Silapodi.

language1_text: Luke, the beloved physician, and Demas, greet you.
language2_text: O akma tey kakteh do cinai a koysang a meyngaran so Locya kani Temase am da ipeyminaminasi inyo.

language1_text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea, and Nymphas, and the church which is in his house.
language2_text: Ipanci nyo pa da kakteh ta do Lawticya kani Ningva kano yamalwalovot do vahay da sinjya o ko kapeyminaminasi nira.

language1_text: And when this epistle is read among you, cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea.
language2_text: No si teyka nyo a vilangan o teygami eya am yangay nyo do Lawticya, kavilang da jya do kyokay do dang. O yai da teygami apo do Lawticya am akman sang, ta vilangan nyo pa.

language1_text: And say to Archippus, Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord, that thou fulfil it.
language2_text: Ipanci nyo ji Asipo, ta pakavosen na o nitoro na jya ni Ama ta do to a vazay.

language1_text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul. Remember my bonds. Grace be with you. Amen. Written from Rome to the Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko. Ko meyvatvatek so yako peyminaminasyan ninyo. Ji nyo a hamangi yaken a da aptengen an. Inaoy si mangay jinyo o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko. Yamen rana sira Sila kani Timotay am namen ipeyteygami inyo a kyokay do Tesalonicya a omanoyong ji Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Inaoy si itoro na ni Ama ta do to o pangangarilawan na jinyo a katoro na nya jinyo so ikapiya no onowned nyo.

language1_text: We give thanks to God always for you all, making mention of you in our prayers;
language2_text: Namen masangib a somaray ninyo ji Ama ta do to. Namen masangib a yamakalavat jinyo do inozi namen.

language1_text: remembering without ceasing your work of faith, and labour of love, and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ, in the sight of God and our Father;
language2_text: No namen meynozi am namen isaray ji Ama ta do to o apiya vazay nyo a yongkad no nyo kapeyhanhan ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta, kano nyo kazikna yamangarilaw so tao, do nyo raralayan ni Ama ta do to a yatongbo so alalaw nyo a yaomapanala si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a yameygegcin.

language1_text: knowing, brethren beloved, your election of God.
language2_text: Inyo rana manga kakteh a na ikarilaw ni Ama ta do to am namen katenngan o mina kapamnek na jinyo a omraralay nya.

language1_text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only, but also in power, and in the Holy Ghost, and in much assurance; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake.
language2_text: Ta o namen nipeylimwang a Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to jinyo am beken a ciriciring namen ori. Ta namen ipeyhanhan o oyowyat no Seyzi a kano yameysominogat a onowned namen so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta nyo mamimin a katenngan o onowned namen no kapacikaop namen pa jinyo do dang.

language1_text: And ye became followers of us, and of the Lord, having received the word in much affliction, with joy of the Holy Ghost:
language2_text: Tana aro o alalaw nyo am kamo masaray a na sidongen no Seyzi a yamahap so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a yaominara si Yeso, akman jyamen a yajyamama no alalaw namen.

language1_text: so that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.
language2_text: Am ori o da peycitacittan jinyo no yana omraralay ni Yeso Kizisto do Maciton a kado Akayya.

language1_text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia, but also in every place your faith to God-ward is spread abroad; so that we need not to speak any thing.
language2_text: So yana nikapo jinyo a yameylimwang no nanao na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta. O nakenakem nyo si Ama ta do to am beken a do Maciton a kado Akayya o na nispowan, ta yanisompo do peycyeylilyan na. So ji namen mapakaroi so ciring namen an.

language1_text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you, and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God;
language2_text: Ta yaro o tao a yamanci nya jyamen so kapiya no nitaotawwan nyo jyamen no kangay namen jinyo do dang a kano yanyo mina kakaro rana do yamalas a niraralay nyo a yarana omanod ji Ama ta do to a yaomraralay nya a yamanoyong a yamavyay a Tao do to.

language1_text: and to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, even Jesus, which delivered us from the wrath to come.
language2_text: So yanyo nanalan so Anak na si Yeso Kizisto a meygegcin a apo do teyngato. Si Yeso Kizisto am nivyay na ni Ama ta do to a nimapo do heseb na. Iya o yata pakahatasan so peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to no makwa.

language1_text: For yourselves, brethren, know our entrance in unto you, that it was not in vain:
language2_text: Manga kakteh, nyo katenngan an, ta no kangay namen jinyo do dang am apiya o vazay namen, ta aro o niomanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto a tao.

language1_text: but even after that we had suffered before, and were shamefully entreated, as ye know, at Philippi, we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention.
language2_text: Nyo katenngan an, ta no kaji namen angayan pa jinyo do dang am amyan rana so alalaw namen do kapeymetdeh da jyamen do Veydipi a ili. Am na mina kapanta nyamen so oyowyat ni Ama ta do to. So namen jyanyahei no meykamadadayan a da izazat jyamen a yameylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to jinyo.

language1_text: For our exhortation was not of deceit, nor of uncleanness, nor in guile:
language2_text: Yabo o yamalas a nanao namen jinyo. Abo o nanao namen a ilita namen jinyo.

language1_text: but as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel, even so we speak; not as pleasing men, but God, which trieth our hearts.
language2_text: Ta o yana nipamnekan jyamen ni Ama ta do to am na meypakemkemen jyamen o kapeylimwang namen no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na. Am ori o ji namen mapatareki so ipanci namen a komagkaglaw so icyatatao namen. Ta o makateneng do onowned no tao a Tao do to am iya ori o namen pasarain no vazay namen.

language1_text: For neither at any time used we flattering words, as ye know, nor a cloke of covetousness; God is witness:
language2_text: Nyo katenngan yamen a yaji manlita so tao no ciriciring namen. So na ikabo no yamarahet a aktokto namen. Ta si Ama ta do to am yongkad namen a manoyong so ipanci.

language1_text: nor of men sought we glory, neither of you, nor yet of others, when we might have been burdensome, as the apostles of Christ.
language2_text: Tana nipamnekan na yamen ni Kizisto a omlivolivon no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na am namen ji ngakdaya o kazwazway da jyamen no tao. So ji namen ngakdai jinyo a kano karwan no tao a zomwazway jyamen.

language1_text: But we were gentle among you, even as a nurse cherisheth her children:
language2_text: Am no kapacikaop namen pa jinyo am apiya namen so nakem jinyo, akman so inyapwan a mavakes a omazwazovo so minapodpod jya.

language1_text: so being affectionately desirous of you, we were willing to have imparted unto you, not the gospel of God only, but also our own souls, because ye were dear unto us.
language2_text: Namen hapen do namen karilaw ninyo. Ori o namen sarayan no kapeylimwang namen nya jinyo no yanimapo ji Ama ta do to a Mapasaray a Ciriciring na. Mangay do inawan namen o namen ji beywani jinyo. Ta inyo rana am namen tey kaglaw.

language1_text: For ye remember, brethren, our labour and travail: for labouring night and day, because we would not be chargeable unto any of you, we preached unto you the gospel of God.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, naknakmen nyo o zikna namen do maraw a kano mahep an, do namen kalan so isovo namen a kanen. Ta namen ji myapya inyo a mazikna nyamen no isovo namen a kanen no kapeylimwang namen nya jinyo so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Ye are witnesses, and God also, how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe:
language2_text: No kapacikaop namen pa jinyo do dang am o ciriciring namen a kano icicirawat namen am apiya macita nyo. Abo o malas a vazay namen. Cyaha, ta inyo a kani Ama ta do to am yongkad no vazay namen ang.

language1_text: as ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you, as a father doth his children,
language2_text: Nyo katenngan o nakenakem namen jinyo. Ta yakman so inyapwan a mahakay a amvavaga do minapodpod jya,

language1_text: that ye would walk worthy of God, who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory.
language2_text: a yajimtad a yamnanao jinyo a yamapait so onowned nyo a yamapadnadna so nakem nyo. So ikanoyong nyo a isaray na ni Ama ta do to. Na nipamnekan inyo a macizanod do oyowyat na kano azwazway na.

language1_text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing, because, when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us, ye received it not as the word of men, but as it is in truth, the word of God, which effectually worketh also in you that believe.
language2_text: Namen masangib a yasomaray nya ji Ama ta do to. Ta o namen nipeylimwang a ciriciring na am nyo na nimamizing. Nyo na nimahap. So nyo ji mancii nya ciring no tao, ta nyo anoyngan ori a ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta o ciring ori am yaomoyat do onowned nyo a yarana omanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: For ye, brethren, became followers of the churches of God which in Judæ a are in Christ Jesus: for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen, even as they have of the Jews:
language2_text: Manga kakteh, o alalaw nyo a kano alalaw da no aro a kyokay do Yotay am alalaw da ori no omanod ji Ama ta do to a tao. Ta o iraherahet da jinyo no keylyan nyo am akman so sang o iraherahet da so aro a kyokay no tao do Yotay.

language1_text: who both killed the Lord Jesus, and their own prophets, and have persecuted us; and they please not God, and are contrary to all men:
language2_text: Sira rana tao do Yotay am niwakwak da si Yeso a Panirsirngen ta kano aro a panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a da kavozwaw pa jyamehen. So da ikanoyong a yameyraraten do tangain na ni Ama ta do to. So icyakma dey kavosoyan no tao do karawan.

language1_text: forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved, to fill up their sins alway: for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost.
language2_text: Yada zazaten yamen a yameylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a mapatazadang so beken a tao do Yotay. So da ikanoyong a yameyparo so yapeyraratenan a peydednan no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But we, brethren, being taken from you for a short time in presence, not in heart, endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, tana yapa jyownay o namen nikaro jinyo am namen ikapaw inyo. Tana namen ji macikaop jinyo am cyaha, ta yamacikaop jinyo o onowned namen. Inaoy no si mirwa namen pa makacita inyo.

language1_text: Wherefore we would have come unto you, even I Paul, once and again; but Satan hindered us.
language2_text: Namen ikakza o namen kangay pa jinyo do dang. Ko masangib a yamnakenakem so yako kangay jinyo do dang am na kazazat jyamen ni Satan.

language1_text: For what is our hope, or joy, or crown of rejoicing? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming?
language2_text: Ta inyo o hanhan namen a yamapasaray jyamen. Si meygegcin si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta am sino o ipakazwazway namen no jya inyo.

language1_text: For ye are our glory and joy.
language2_text: So ikanoyong nyo a pacikazwazwayan namen a isaray namen.

language1_text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear, we thought it good to be left at Athens alone;
language2_text: Yabo o yasa ka ciring a yanamen nimamizing jinyo. Am ori o namen to ngyani rana do Yatyan eya.

language1_text: and sent Timotheus, our brother, and minister of God, and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith:
language2_text: Namen nitovoy o akma tey kakteh do cinai si Timotay a mangay jinyo do dang. Iya rana am kararay namen a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Kizisto. O namen nitovoyan sya am sidongen na inyo a komdeng so nakem a omraralay ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: that no man should be moved by these afflictions: for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto.
language2_text: a kaji da oniban so nakem no kadwan jinyo no peyrarehten da inyo. Ta kangay na ori no alalaw ta a omraralay ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: For verily, when we were with you, we told you before that we should suffer tribulation; even as it came to pass, and ye know.
language2_text: No kapacikaop namen pa jinyo asyo am nipanci namen rana jinyo o akman sang a alalaw. So na ipakaranes rana no alalaw nyo sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: For this cause, when I could no longer forbear, I sent to know your faith, lest by some means the tempter have tempted you, and our labour be in vain.
language2_text: Am ori o ko nitovoyan si Timotay a mangay jinyo. Ta ko ikasinalaw inyo. O ko nitovoyan sya am ipakateneng namen do nakenakem nyo si Ama ta do to. So namen ji nganoyngi jinyo a na nilittan rana ni Satan. Ta no si manoyong o akman sang am akma nameney jya ninanao inyo no kakwa pa.

language1_text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us, and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity, and that ye have good remembrance of us always, desiring greatly to see us, as we also to see you:
language2_text: Sicyaikwa rana ya am yanimeysinaoli si Timotay a yanimapo jinyo. Na nipanci jyamen o nakenakem nyo si Ama ta do to a kano nyo pangarilawan so tao. Na ipanci jyamen o nyo kasangib a yamnakenakem jyamen a yamakza no kapakacita nyo jyamen. So nyo icyakman jyamen a yamapaw ninyo.

language1_text: therefore, brethren, we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith:
language2_text: Am ori o namen jyavokahawi, manga keypong. Ta namen pangozayan o nakenakem nyo si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: for now we live, if ye stand fast in the Lord.
language2_text: No kamo to ngotokot so onowned ji Yeso a Panirsirngen ta am namen tongned so ninyakan.

language1_text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you, for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God;
language2_text: Ori o sarayan namen ninyo ji Ama ta do to. Ta inyo o yamapasaray jyamen do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face, and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith?
language2_text: Tana maraw a tana mahep am yabo o namen ji meynozii ji Ama ta do to a amya jyamen a mangay tomita jinyo a mapait so onowned nyo.

language1_text: Now God himself and our Father, and our Lord Jesus Christ, direct our way unto you.
language2_text: Inaoy si peypalanginan na yaten ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a kangay namen rana jinyo do dang.

language1_text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another, and toward all men, even as we do toward you:
language2_text: Inaoy no si oyatan na inyo a meypahagnat so pangangarilawan a marilaw no kadwan jinyo, pacyangayan no karwan no tao, akman jyamen a yamarilaw ninyo.

language1_text: to the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God, even our Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints.
language2_text: Am ori o ikanoyong na ni Ama ta do to a mapakdeng so nakenakem nyo a omraralay nya. Ta no si meygegcin si Yeso a Panirsirngen ta kano niomraralay nya tao am manoyong kamo do tangain na ni Ama ta do to a ji meylimoteng so onowned a abo so karatan.

language1_text: Furthermore then we beseech you, brethren, and exhort you by the Lord Jesus, that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God, so ye would abound more and more.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, nyo na nimahap jyamen o apiya icicirawat a isaray na ni Ama ta do to. Sicyaikwa rana ya am namen vavagan inyo no ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Ta ori o ikowyowyat nyo paha a mahap so apiya vazay.

language1_text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus.
language2_text: Ta nyo na katenngan o ninanao namen jinyo apo ji Yeso a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: For this is the will of God, even your sanctification, that ye should abstain from fornication:
language2_text: O nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to am kakzeben na o kazngang no onowned nyo. Ji na mamyapyan inyo a mangzakza so icyatatao nyo.

language1_text: that every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour;
language2_text: So ikamimin nyo a mahakay a makateneng do kabo no karatan nyo a mapasakay so kadwan nyo do vahay. Ji nyo to mangozai o onowned nyo. Ta ozain nyo si Ama ta do to an.

language1_text: not in the lust of concupiscence, even as the Gentiles which know not God:
language2_text: So ji nyo mapasagpyani so kataotao nyo an. Ji kamo macyangangay do yato nazibo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: that no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter: because that the Lord is the avenger of all such, as we also have forewarned you and testified.
language2_text: O akman rana sya vazay am taosya o kapasala nyo do akma nyoy kakteh do cinai an. Ta mangay o kaoya na no meyvazay so marahet a vazay ni Ama ta do to. Ori rana am nipaziman namen rana jinyo.

language1_text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness, but unto holiness.
language2_text: O na nipamnekan jyaten ni Ama ta do to am beken a mangay ta pasagpyanen o kataotao ta, ta kakzeben na yaten a ji meylimoteng so onowned.

language1_text: He therefore that despiseth, despiseth not man, but God, who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit.
language2_text: O ji ngahap so akman sang a nanao am beken a tao o na pasobnan, ta o Seyzi a nitoro na jyaten ni Ama ta do to am ori o pasobnan na.

language1_text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you: for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another.
language2_text: O pasicyakarilawan nyo am tana ji namen mancyan do teygami am cyaha, ta amyan rana o nanao na ni Ama ta do to jinyo do kapasicyakarilawan nyo.

language1_text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia: but we beseech you, brethren, that ye increase more and more;
language2_text: Ko katenngan inyo a sinjya do Tesalonicya a yamarilaw no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai do Maciton. Am o namen pa ciring jinyo am makowyowyat kamo pa mahap so yapiya vazay ori an.

language1_text: and that ye study to be quiet, and to do your own business, and to work with your own hands, as we commanded you;
language2_text: Makapya kamo so onowned do kadwan jinyo an. Ji kamo manamwad an, ta makowyat kamo a amyaw no velek nyo an. Inarahen nyo o ninanao namen pa jinyo no kakwa an.

language1_text: that ye may walk honestly toward them that are without, and that ye may have lack of nothing.
language2_text: So ji nyo meyhanhani no icyatatao nyo a mapatodeh jinyo. So ikanoyong nyo a ikanig da no ji manaralay a tao.

language1_text: But I would not have you to be ignorant, brethren, concerning them which are asleep, that ye sorrow not, even as others which have no hope.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, o nimawakwak rana tao am inaoy no si katenngan nyo o peypeypangayan na a kaji nyo na zababan so onowned. Ji nyo nginarai o yaji manaralay a tao a yaji makateneng do peypeypangayan na.

language1_text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.
language2_text: Ta yata anoyngan si Yeso a nimawakwak a kapirwa na mavyay. Akman sang, ta yata anoyngan si Ama ta do to a mapeyvangon so omanoyong jya a nimawakwak a tao. No mirwa pa si Yeso a mai am macihza sira mai.

language1_text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord, that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep.
language2_text: Sicyaikwa rana ya am namen pangozayan o nanao na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a manci nya jinyo. Yaten rana ya mavyay pa tao do ipeypanam na pa meygegcin ni Yeso am jyabo kapanmanma ta a kano nimawakwak a tao a mangay omrapong si Yeso a.

language1_text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:
language2_text: Ta no si marateng rana o araraw no nang am meygegcin si Yeso a tomawag jyaten a keyyan no panirsirngen no tinsi a manci nyaten. No mamizing ta o zapa do teyngato a ipatao na jyaten ni Ama ta do to am o niomanoyong ji Kizisto a nimawakwak rana tao am manomanoma sira mirwa a mavyay.

language1_text: then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds, to meet the Lord in the air: and so shall we ever be with the Lord.
language2_text: Am yaten rana yamavyay pa am pehzahen na yaten jira a katkaten do cinalab a kapakacita ta na si Yeso do hanit. So ikanoyong ta a macitovong ji Yeso a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words.
language2_text: Ahapen nyo o ciriciring eya a ipait nyo so onowned no kadwan jinyo a ipasaray nyo sira.

language1_text: But of the times and the seasons, brethren, ye have no need that I write unto you.
language2_text: Inyo rana akma koy kakteh do cinai am o ipakaranes no ipeygegcin ni Yeso am ji ko to mancyan jinyo do teygami ko,

language1_text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.
language2_text: ta to nyo na tenngi. O araraw no ipeygegcin na ni Yeso am abwata o tao a makaziman sya, akman so tao a ji makaziman so manakaw do vahay da.

language1_text: For when they shall say, Peace and safety; then sudden destruction cometh upon them, as travail upon a woman with child; and they shall not escape.
language2_text: No si maniring o tao am, "Cyaha, ta tanyo apiya," am jyakman sang, ta jyaziman o alalaw a makaranes a ombalinas sira, akman so meyrehrehmet a mavakes a ji rana makatayo do alalaw na.

language1_text: But ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that that day should overtake you as a thief.
language2_text: Am manga kakteh, beken a kamo amyan do kasarisaryan a ji makaziman so araraw no yai ni Yeso, akman so tao a ji makaziman so manakaw a tao do mahep.

language1_text: Ye are all the children of light, and the children of the day: we are not of the night, nor of darkness.
language2_text: Am inyo rana am kamo amyan rana do kazngangan, do nyo kapakaziman rana sya.

language1_text: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
language2_text: Ori o ji ta to nginarai so karwan no tao a to ngitkeh, ta meytataziman ta.

language1_text: For they that sleep, sleep in the night; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night.
language2_text: Ta o itkeh no tao am mahep. O ikasaki no tao am mahep.

language1_text: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
language2_text: No ta manoyong amyan do kazngangan am meytataziman ta an. O nakenakem ta ji Ama ta do to a kano pangangarilawan na am akma tey sirong. Akma tey sakop o jyagonay a onowned ta a mapanala sya mahap jyaten do teyngato. So ikabo rana no oyaoyyan na nyaten.

language1_text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath, but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,
language2_text: Ta o na nipamnekan jyaten ni Ama ta do to am beken a mangay na ioya nyaten. Ta ahapen na yaten do kapyapyan. Ori o mina vazay na no Anak na si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: who died for us, that, whether we wake or sleep, we should live together with him.
language2_text: O nikawakwak na ni Kizisto am ahapen na yaten do kapyapyan. Am ori an, tana do ta ika mavyay pa ya a tana do ikawakwak ta rana am no si mai si Yeso am macikaop ta na jya a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another, even as also ye do.
language2_text: Am ori o ipasipapait nyo a mapamizing so kadwan jinyo, akman so yapiya nyo ahahapan sya sicyaikwaya.

language1_text: And we beseech you, brethren, to know them which labour among you, and are over you in the Lord, and admonish you;
language2_text: Namen ipacimeseseg jinyo manga kakteh am ikanig nyo pa sira o meyyapwaponged no kyokay a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta sira rana am da vavagan inyo no icicirawat no omraralay ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: and to esteem them very highly in love for their work's sake. And be at peace among yourselves.
language2_text: So karilawan nyo nira ahapen so vazay an. Makapiya kamo so nakenakem do kadwan jinyo an.

language1_text: Now we exhort you, brethren, warn them that are unruly, comfort the feebleminded, support the weak, be patient toward all men.
language2_text: Yanamen ipanci pa jinyo manga keypong am pazimanen nyo sira o malelma a tao an, a kapait nyo so mahayo so onowned a tao, kasidong nyo so jyakdeng so nakem ji Ama ta do to. Tana apiya so ahahapan sya, tana marahet so ahahapan sya tao am to nyo peyyangaya o nakenakem nyo sira.

language1_text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man; but ever follow that which is good, both among yourselves, and to all men.
language2_text: Azimanen nyo an. Ji nyo patonggali o macioya jinyo a tao an. O kapasicyakarilaw nyo. O tey kakza da vazay no icyatatao nyo am peyvazain nyo.

language1_text: Rejoice evermore.
language2_text: O kasaray nyo.

language1_text: Pray without ceasing.
language2_text: Ji kamo amtad a meynozi.

language1_text: In every thing give thanks: for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you.
language2_text: Tana apya, tana marahet o masapa nyo am o kasaray nyo ji Ama ta do to. Ta ori rana am nakenakem na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a omanod ji Yeso Kizisto a tao.

language1_text: Quench not the Spirit.
language2_text: Ji nyo nengsengi o vazay no Seyzi.

language1_text: Despise not prophesyings.
language2_text: Ji nyo ngolala o ipanci da no meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Prove all things; hold fast that which is good.
language2_text: Am pakanaknakmen nyo o nimamizing nyo a nanao da jinyo a kownot nyo do manoyong a nanao an.

language1_text: Abstain from all appearance of evil.
language2_text: Peymakarwan nyo o peyraratenan nyo do teyrahem.

language1_text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Ko ipeynozi inyo ji Ama ta do to a yamanta ninyo so apiya nakenakem nyo a kapzat na do onowned nyo a kano pahad nyo a kano kataotao nyo. So ikanoyong na amzat jinyo a kabo no karatan nyo a mangay do ikeypirwa na mai ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to rana a yanimamnek jinyo a omanoyong jya am yatey manoyong a makasidong jinyo.

language1_text: Brethren, pray for us.
language2_text: Inyo akma nameney kakteh do cinai am ipeyneynozi nyo yamen an.

language1_text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss.
language2_text: Masicyakarilaw kamo a meyminaminasi no kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren.
language2_text: Yako pangozayan o ngaran na ni Yeso a manci no kavilang nyo do teygami ya a ipamizing nyo so akma nyoy kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you. Amen. The first epistle unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na jinyo.

language1_text: Paul, and Silvanus, and Timotheus, unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ:
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko. Yamen rana sira Sila kani Timotay am namen ipeyteygami inyo a kyokay do Tesalonicya a yamacikaop rana ji Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: grace unto you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na o pangangarilawan na jinyo a kano ikapiya no onowned nyo ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: We are bound to thank God always for you, brethren, as it is meet, because that your faith groweth exceedingly, and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth;
language2_text: Manga kakteh, namen mangday do araraw inyo a isaray ji Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong na no akman sang an. Ta yakamo meypahagnat so nakenakem do yanyo kapeypakdeng so aryarilaw so kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: so that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure:
language2_text: Am ori o namen azwazwayan jinyo do peycyakyokyokayan na a namen angayan. Tana yarako o alalaw nyo a da peyrarehten no tao do nyo kanod ji Yeso am yajyablis o nakenakem nyo an. Am ori o namen azwazwayan jinyo.

language1_text: which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God, that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God, for which ye also suffer:
language2_text: So ikanoyong na no akman so sya a yongkad na no kaji na oyyan ninyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta o nakenakem na jinyo am macikasaray kamo jya do kanoyong nyo rana macikaop do italamozong na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you;
language2_text: Manoyong o vazay na ni Ama ta do to, ta meydedna jira o alalaw da no yamapeyrarahet jinyo.

language1_text: and to you who are troubled rest with us, when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels, in flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God, and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ:
language2_text: Inyo rana a yakman jyamen a da peyrarehten am ji kamo alaw, ta balinasen na rana ni Ama ta do to o alalaw ta no si mai si Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a meygegcin apo do teyngato a maciralay do apoy a kano aro a mowyat a tinsi. So ikanoyong no ji nganoyong jya tao a kano ji ngamizing so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a ioya na. Inyo rana a yakman jyamen a da peyrarehten am ji kamo alaw, ta balinasen na rana ni Ama ta do to o alalaw ta no si mai si Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a meygegcin apo do teyngato a maciralay do apoy a kano aro a mowyat a tinsi. So ikanoyong no ji nganoyong jya tao a kano ji ngamizing so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a ioya na.

language1_text: who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord, and from the glory of his power;
language2_text: Am ori o pasyayan na sira do oyowyat na kano azwazway na. So ikanoyong da peydednan na no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: when he shall come to be glorified in his saints, and to be admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among you was believed) in that day.
language2_text: O araraw na no ipeygegcin na am mamimin sira omanoyong jya tao a omazwazway sya a somaray nya. Inyo rana am macyangay kamo do dang, ta nyo anoyngan o nipeylimwang namen jinyo a ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wherefore also we pray always for you, that our God would count you worthy of this calling, and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness, and the work of faith with power:
language2_text: Am ori o namen ikasangib a meynozi ninyo. So ipacimangno na no nakem na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Inaoy si itoro na o oyowyat na a isidong na jinyo. So ipakateneng nyo jya a omonot do apyahen na vazay ni Ama ta do to. Ta na sidongen inyo, do nyo kapeyhanhan nya.

language1_text: that the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you, and ye in him, according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: No akman kamo sang am ikazway no ngaran na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta. So ipacikazway nyo jya. O kapwan no nang am apo do pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Now we beseech you, brethren, by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, and by our gathering together unto him,
language2_text: No si mirwa mai si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta no malovot ta amrapong sya manga kakteh am namen kakdain inyo,

language1_text: that ye be not soon shaken in mind, or be troubled, neither by spirit, nor by word, nor by letter as from us, as that the day of Christ is at hand.
language2_text: ji kamo tey makeykai a marahet nya so nakenakem no mamizing nyo o ipanci da no mangononong so malas do mina kapakaranes na rana no araraw na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Tana mangamaog sira o tao so ciring a manci no kapo na do Seyzi a tana nipatolin da jyamen no tao a mapeyciring sya, tana ipanci da ciring namen do teygami am,

language1_text: Let no man deceive you by any means: for that day shall not come, except there come a falling away first, and that man of sin be revealed, the son of perdition;
language2_text: ji nyo to nganoyngi o ciring da an. Ta no omanam rana o araraw am manoyong o kapacioya da ji Ama ta do to no aro a tao a macyanod so nakenakem do irako na so raraten a italamozong na ni Satan a tao a yamapalolo sira a mangay do kararatan, mangay o kangay na do makotokotod a lila no apoy.

language1_text: who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God, or that is worshipped; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God, shewing himself that he is God.
language2_text: Iya rana am ioya na sira o tao a ji raralay nya. Ta abneken na o kataotao na makarakarang pa kano iraralay da no tao. So yangay na omlisna do raralayan da ni Ama ta do to a mapakataotao do to.

language1_text: Remember ye not, that, when I was yet with you, I told you these things?
language2_text: Manngwa, nyo na jyanakem o akman so sya a mina ciring ko pa jinyo no kapacikaop ko pa jinyo asyo?

language1_text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time.
language2_text: Nyo katenngan o keyyan no amzazat do tao a irako na so raraten a italamozong na ni Satan. Am amyan so araraw no nang a ipeytotwaw na.

language1_text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work: only he who now letteth will let, until he be taken out of the way.
language2_text: Ta yana papwen o na kapeyvazay no irako na so raraten a italamozong na ni Satan a tao. Am ji pa meyngongyod o vazay na, ta zazazzatan no mowyowyat pa ka nya. Am no si peylisen na rana o lima no yamzazat do vazay eya am,

language1_text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed, whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth, and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming:
language2_text: ori o ipeytotwaw na rana no tao a italamozong na ni Satan. No si mai si Yeso am ahahan na kazakat na rana kabwata na rana no oyowyat na ipeyzavozavoz na so tao.

language1_text: even him, whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders,
language2_text: Ta no kapeyigegen na pa no irako na so raraten a tao am oyatan ni Satan a mai a kapeyvazay na so mapangyangyalak a vazay. So icyakma ney mowyat. Am jyanoyong ori,

language1_text: and with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish; because they received not the love of the truth, that they might be saved.
language2_text: kalita na do ji manganoyong a tao no meykamadadayan a vazay, ta ji da ngahapa o manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to a manta nira so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion, that they should believe a lie:
language2_text: Am ori o to na macyozai rana jira ni Ama ta do to do malas a nakenakem a omanoyong do malas a nanao.

language1_text: that they all might be damned who believed not the truth, but had pleasure in unrighteousness.
language2_text: O ji nganoyong do manoyong a nanao a makza no raraten da am mamimin sira peydednan no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you, brethren beloved of the Lord, because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth:
language2_text: Inyo rana manga kakteh a na ikarilaw ni Ama ta do to am namen masangib inyo a isaray ji Ama ta do to. Ta no kaji na pa amaogan no karawan am nipamnekan na rana inyo ni Ama ta do to a ahapen. So nyavaywan na so onowned nyo no Seyzi a kowyat na jinyo a omanoyong do nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: whereunto he called you by our gospel, to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: O Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a nipamizing namen jinyo am ori o yanimrara jinyo a macikasaray do azwazway na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Therefore, brethren, stand fast, and hold the traditions which ye have been taught, whether by word, or our epistle.
language2_text: Ori an manga kakteh an, makakdeng kamo so nakenakem an. O ninanao namen jinyo a ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am meyyangay ori a kano ciriciring namen do teygami a miminen nyo a ahapen.

language1_text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace,
language2_text: Na ikarilaw yaten ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. O pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to am ori o yapwan no to meyyonong a sarasaray no onowned ta amnanala so nakem na jyaten.

language1_text: comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.
language2_text: Inaoy no si pasarain na o onowned nyo a kapait na jinyo a jyablis so nakenakem a mapeyvazay so meykamadadayan a apiya vazay a kapanci nyo no apiya ciriciring.

language1_text: Finally, brethren, pray for us, that the word of the Lord may have free course, and be glorified, even as it is with you:
language2_text: Imanowji na ko ipanci jinyo manga kakteh am ipeyneynozi nyo yamen a kakeykai na no ciriciring na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a meylimwang a kanoyong da jya no tao akman jinyo a omanoyong rana jya.

language1_text: and that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men: for all men have not faith.
language2_text: Meynozi kamo ji Ama ta do to a kapahawa na jyamen do meyraraten a tao. Ta beken a todamimin o tao a yaomanoyong ji Yeso.

language1_text: But the Lord is faithful, who shall stablish you, and keep you from evil.
language2_text: Am yabo na kalalasan ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta. Iya rana am ikakoyapet nyo so nakenakem a kaji na makagogadan jinyo ni Satan.

language1_text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you, that ye both do and will do the things which we command you.
language2_text: Namen ipeyhanhan inyo a sidongen na ni Yeso. Namen katenngan inyo a yajimtad a mapeyvazay so ninanao namen jinyo.

language1_text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God, and into the patient waiting for Christ.
language2_text: Inaoy no ipeypalanginan na inyo ni Yeso a kapeypahagnat nyo so nakenakem a makateneng do karilawan na ninyo ni Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong nyo a ominara si Kizisto a tongbo so alalaw na.

language1_text: Now we command you, brethren, in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly, and not after the tradition which he received of us.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, namen pangozayan o ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a manci nya jinyo. Ji nyo nganopa sira o akma tey kakteh do cinai a abwata so vazavazay a yaji ngahap so nanao namen jinyo.

language1_text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us: for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you;
language2_text: Jyabo nyo kaji makatenngan jyamen a inarahen a. Ta no keyyan namen pa jinyo do dang am jyabo kanimalma namen a.

language1_text: neither did we eat any man's bread for nought; but wrought with labour and travail night and day, that we might not be chargeable to any of you:
language2_text: Ji namen nimacyakakan do karwan no tao. Tana maraw a tana mahep am mangday kapeyvazay namen a omyaw no velek namen do kaji namen mamyapyan ninyo a masanga nyamen.

language1_text: not because we have not power, but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us.
language2_text: O ikakman namen sang am beken a ikamo namen inyo a mapatodeh jyamen, am kapakanakem namen so kapeycitacita nyo jyamen a inarahen.

language1_text: For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.
language2_text: No keyyan namen pa jinyo do dang asyo am nipaziman namen rana jinyo o kaji nyo mapakanan so abo so vazavazay a tao.

language1_text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly, working not at all, but are busybodies.
language2_text: O peycirngan namen so akman sang am nimamizing namen o tatasa jinyo a to meyyowyaw a abo so vazavazay a kapanazovaz so icyatatao da.

language1_text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ, that with quietness they work, and eat their own bread.
language2_text: O akman rana sang a tao am pangozayan namen o ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a mapaziman sira. So ikowyowyat da pa a meyvazay a omyaw no velek da. Ji sira to manazovaz so icyatatao da.

language1_text: But ye, brethren, be not weary in well doing.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ji nyo macimazai o kapeyvazay nyo so apipiya vazay.

language1_text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle, note that man, and have no company with him, that he may be ashamed.
language2_text: Ala amyan so tao a to nazibo no ciring namen do teygami. Am o akman rana sang a tao am azimanen nyo an. Ji kamo maciwalam jya an a kasnek na.

language1_text: Yet count him not as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.
language2_text: Am ji nyo abneka a kavosoyan nyo, ta kavavaga nyo jya akman so kakteh nyo do cinai.

language1_text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means. The Lord be with you all.
language2_text: Inaoy no si mangday na itoro jinyo o ikapiya no onowned nyo ni Yeso Kizisto. Ta iya rana am kapwan no ikapiya ta no onowned. Inaoy no si macitovong jinyo si Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand, which is the token in every epistle: so I write.
language2_text: Ko vatvatkan o ngaran ko an. Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a yameyminaminasi ninyo. Yamamimin o teygami ko a yako padketan so aryarilaw ko jinyo. So na ikanoyong no teygami ya a yapo jyaken.

language1_text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen. The second epistle to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
language2_text: Inaoy no si itoro na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na jinyo.

language1_text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope;
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a lamlamsoy ni Ama ta do to a manoyong a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato. Yana nipamnekan yaken ni Yeso Kizisto a omlivolivon no ciriciring na. So ikanoyong na ni Yeso Kizisto a hanhan ta.

language1_text: unto Timothy, my own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.
language2_text: Ko ipeyteygami imo, mo Timotay, akma koy manganak do ta kapeyyangay a omanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto. Inaoy no si itoro na jimo ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto o pangangarilawan na kano pangangasyan na kano ikapiya no onowned mo.

language1_text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,
language2_text: Apyapya kato mo ngyanan do Ivoso akman so mina ciring ko jimo no kapeypangay ko do Maciton a omzazat do yameylimwang no malas a nanao.

language1_text: neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than godly edifying which is in faith: so do.
language2_text: Ta peymakarwan da rana o abo so angangayan a kavavatanen a kano katatapilan no ineynapo da a ononongan da. Ta o akman rana sang am mapeyliliman. So ji na makasidongi so tao a makateneng do vazay na ni Ama ta do to. Ta no anoyngan ta am ori o ipakateneng ta jya.

language1_text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:
language2_text: O agagazan no akman sang a ciriciring ko am ko kakzeben o kapakateneng da do pangangasyan da so tao apo do ji meylimoteng a onowned da a manoyong a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to. So ikabo na no vazay da a somala do nakenakem da.

language1_text: from which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;
language2_text: Ta yamyan so tao a yaji ngonot jya. So da ikanoyong a yanisomala do manoyong a nanao a da kaononong do abo so peypeypangayan a ciriciring da.

language1_text: desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.
language2_text: Da naknakmen o kapangnanao da no iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to a nitaid na ji Moyse. Am da jyatenngi o da ipanci a kano imakdeng na ipangnanao.

language1_text: But we know that the law is good, if a man use it lawfully;
language2_text: Katenngan ta an, ta no apiya o ahapan ta so iwawalam ni Moyse am jyabo kaji na apyan no nang a.

language1_text: knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,
language2_text: Am ori o naknakman ta sya an. Ta o iwawalam rana ni Moyse am beken a isidong so apya so nakenakem a tao an. Ta o marahet so nakenakem am ori o cinamaog na a izazat do marahet a vazay da. O ipanci da marahet so nakenakem a tao a kano ji mangozay do iwawalam na ni Moyse am ji ngahap so nanao, ji raralay ni Ama ta do to, meyraraten, komolala so ipeylimwang da ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to, makza no marahet a icicirawat no tao do karawan, manwakwak so inyapwan a kano icyatatao,

language1_text: for whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;
language2_text: mangzakza so icyatatao, mangzakza so kehngehngay na so kolit, manakaw so kanakan, manlita, mangononong so malas, jyanoyong so ipanci do pacicicyan a kano mapasala do manoyong a nanao.

language1_text: according to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.
language2_text: O manoyong a pangozayan a ciring am yapo do Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a somidong jyaten. Am ori o azwazwayan ta si Ama ta do to an. So na ikanoyong no nang a yako ipeylimwang a ciriciring.

language1_text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;
language2_text: Ko tey saray ji Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Ta nipanta na yaken so oyowyat ko a meylimwang nya. Ta na ji ngolala yaken. Ori na nipamnekan jyaken a mahap so vazay na.

language1_text: who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.
language2_text: Am tana niraherahet ko si Yeso no kakwa pa a kapakakasi ko sira pasnesneken so omanoyong jya am na ikarilaw yaken ni Ama ta do to, ta no kanang am ji ko nganoyngi pa si Yeso. So ji ko makatenngi do vazay ko.

language1_text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: O Panirsirngen ta rana si Yeso Kizisto am yatey rako o pangangarilawan na a na nitoro jyaken a na kapanta pa nyaken so onowned ko a meyhanhan nya kano pangangarilawan ko so icyatatao ko, ta yako macikaop rana jya.

language1_text: This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.
language2_text: Yamanoyong o ciring eya an. Inaoy no si mamimin o tao a omahap so sya. Nimai si Yeso Kizisto do teyrahem a mahap so meyraraten a tao. Yaken rana am ney rako o raraten ko.

language1_text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.
language2_text: Am kanikasi na nyaken ni Ama ta do to. Ta si Yeso Kizisto am manoyong a nimapapalit do nakenakem ko a meyraraten a tao. Na jyahaywan yaken a tey rako so raraten a tao. So ipakateneng da rana do pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to no manownowji amraralay nya tao, kapakahap da rana so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.
language2_text: Inaoy no to ta meyyonong a omazwazway si Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta. Ta iya rana am jyawakwak a jyacita a meyngongyod a Tao do to. Amin.

language1_text: This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;
language2_text: Manganako, mo Timotay, ko pakoyokoin pa jimo am ji ka onib so onowned an. Si myan so somengseng do ipeylimwang mo a ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am naknakmen mo o mina kapamnek da jimo no kararay ta a meyvazay ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:
language2_text: So peyhanhanan mo ni Yeso a kahap mo so apiya nakenakem mo. Ta amyan so tao a mapasala so nakenakem da. Am ori o ikatarek na no anoyngan da.

language1_text: of whom is Hymenæ us and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.
language2_text: O akman rana sang a tao am si Siminay a kani Yadisanta. So ko na nitorwan nira ji Satan a italamozong na, ta ori pa o ipakateneng da do apya, kaji da na rehrehtan si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;
language2_text: O yamanma pa yako inanao jinyo am ipeynozi nyo o tao do karawan ji Ama ta do to. Ipasyasi nyo ji Ama ta do to a kasidong na sira. So ji ta hamangi no kasaray ta no aryarilaw na jyaten.

language1_text: for kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.
language2_text: Ipeynozi nyo sira o kabtekan nyo a panirsirngen do teyrahem a kano aro a panipanirsirngen do peycyeylilyan na. Ipeynozi nyo sira a kateneng da tomalamozong no pongso da. Ta ori o ikapiya takamo do keymiminili ta, ji meyrahet so nakenakem.

language1_text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
language2_text: O akman rana sang am tey yapya, ta tey kakza na o akman sang ni Ama ta do to. Iya o mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato.

language1_text: who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
language2_text: Ta na ikakza o na kasidong so tao do karawan, kapakateneng da do manoyong a nanao.

language1_text: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
language2_text: O manoyong rana a nanao am asa si Ama ta do to. Asa o yamapanop jyaten ji Ama ta do to. Iya rana am si Yeso Kizisto do mina katazak na tao do teyrahem.

language1_text: who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.
language2_text: Apyapyahen na pa o kataotao na a mawakwak, a omalit do oyaoyyan na nyaten ni Ama ta do to a meyraraten a tao. O akman rana sang a vazay am nipeyvazay na rana ni Yeso a yongkad na ni Ama ta do to a ji mamyapya no tao do karawan a mangay do kararatan.

language1_text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.
language2_text: O nipamnekan na jyaken a omlivolivon no ciriciring na do beken a tao do Yotay am nanawen ko sira a kapakateneng da rana jya a meyhanhan no manoyong a nanao. So ko ji mangononongi so malas. Ta yamanoyong o ko ipanci.

language1_text: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
language2_text: Inaoy no si katenngan da no kamahakayan do peycyakyokyokayan na o kapeyneynozi da a ji rana meylimoteng so onowned a ji oyaoyahen a ji maciskaskadan.

language1_text: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
language2_text: O mavakes rana am ko kakzeben sira ji mapakazwazway no ayob da. Akman sang o avook da kano taktakzes da. Ney yapya na am ji sira meyyayob so tey masingat a ayob.

language1_text: but (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.
language2_text: Ahapen da o apiya icicirawat, ta ori o manoyong a omraralay ni Ama ta do to a mavakes.

language1_text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
language2_text: O mavakes rana am ji sira meyzezyak, ta kapangamizing da so inanao da sira.

language1_text: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
language2_text: Ko ji mya o mavakes a mangnanao so tao do kyokay a tomalamozong no mahakay. Ta ko kakzeben o kaji da makazyazyakan.

language1_text: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.
language2_text: Ta si Ama ta do to rana am nimanmanma na nyamaog si Adam a kamamaog na rana si Iwa.

language1_text: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.
language2_text: O nilittan na ni Satan am beken a si Adam an, ta si Iwa an. Ori nipacisalan na so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
language2_text: Am o mangahanas rana mavakes am apzatan na sira ni Ama ta do to no si jyablis o nakenakem da si Ama ta do to a mangarilaw so tao, ji meylimoteng so onowned, apiya so vazay.

language1_text: This is a true saying, If a man desire the office of a bishop, he desireth a good work.
language2_text: No myan so tao a amnakenakem so katalamozong na no kyokay am apiya o akman sang a vazay an. So ikanoyong no akman sang a ciring an.

language1_text: A bishop then must be blameless, the husband of one wife, vigilant, sober, of good behaviour, given to hospitality, apt to teach;
language2_text: O tomalamozong rana no kyokay am abo oyaoyyan da nya no tao an. Asa o katovong na do vahay. Ji na peyzavozavoza o vazay na. So apzatan na do kataotao na, katwatonton na so vazay na. Ikanig na o icyatatao na, kasaray na manaotao so apo do teysa ka ili a tao a kateneng na mangnanao so tao,

language1_text: not given to wine, no striker, not greedy of filthy lucre; but patient, not a brawler, not covetous;
language2_text: jyasaki, ji macililiman, apiya o nakenakem so icyatatao, ji mangamkam so nizpi.

language1_text: one that ruleth well his own house, having his children in subjection with all gravity;
language2_text: O vazay na rana do vahay da am pakapyahen na a makatalamozong no katovong na do vahay a kananao na so minapodpod jya. Ta ori o amizngen da so nanao na no minapodpod jya.

language1_text: (for if a man know not how to rule his own house, how shall he take care of the church of God?)
language2_text: Ta no ji na tenngi o vazay na do vahay da am jyabo kapakatalamozong na no kyokay a.

language1_text: Not a novice, lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil.
language2_text: O tomalamozong no kyokay am taosya o kapahanhan so vayo pa omanoyong ji Yeso an. Ta ala mapakarakarang sira so nakenakem akman si Satan a nikaoya na ni Ama ta do to, do kapakakarakarang na so nakenakem.

language1_text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil.
language2_text: O makdeng pa am apzatan na o icicirawat na do tangain da no ji pa nganoyong ji Yeso a tao, ta si marahet o vazay na am matamwad do katalamozong na nya ni Satan.

language1_text: Likewise must the deacons be grave, not doubletongued, not given to much wine, not greedy of filthy lucre;
language2_text: O somidong rana so tomalamozong no kyokay a tao am akman sang, ta apiya o icicirawat da. So ji da mangononongi so malas a ciriciring. Jyasakisakin. Beken a nizpi o manakem da.

language1_text: holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience.
language2_text: Ney yapya na am ji meylimoteng o onowned da omanoyong do nanao ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: And let these also first be proved; then let them use the office of a deacon, being found blameless.
language2_text: Am citahen pa o icicirawat da. No si abo o karatan da am apya rana o kahap da so vazay do kyokay.

language1_text: Even so must their wives be grave, not slanderers, sober, faithful in all things.
language2_text: O katovong da do vahay a mavakes am apiya o icicirawat da. Ji sira manamwadan. Taosya o kapangalalas da no makakaday a vazay.

language1_text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife, ruling their children and their own houses well.
language2_text: O somidong so tomalamozong no kyokay a mahakay am asa o katovong da do vahay an. Akman sang o minapodpod jira, ta katenngan da nanawen. So ikapiya no kavavahay da.

language1_text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree, and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: No apya o sidongan da so vazay da no tomalamozong no kyokay am admain da rana sira no icyatatao da a kaji da rana mogawan a mangononong so nanao ni Yeso Kizisto a ipeylimwang do icyatatao da.

language1_text: These things write I unto thee, hoping to come unto thee shortly:
language2_text: No kavatvatek ko do teygami ya am to ko naknakma o kakeykai ko a mangay tomita jinyo.

language1_text: But if I tarry long, that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God, which is the church of the living God, the pillar and ground of the truth.
language2_text: Am no si kahahay ko am cyaha, ta to ko na mancyan jinyo do teygami ko o iwawalam ta. Ta yaten rana amraralay ni Ama ta do to am akma tey asa ka vahay rana, do yana katketken jyaten ni Ama ta do to no ciriciring na no to meyyonong a mavyay a Tao do to.

language1_text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory.
language2_text: Yata katenngan an, o makdeng a nanao a nipatwaw ni Ama ta do to a yata anoyngan. Nimatazak a tao si Kizisto. O Seyzi am yongkad na a abo so raraten. Nimacita da no tinsi, a yarana meylimwang do peycyamahamahatawan na, a yada rana anoyngan no aro a tao do karawan. So nikatkatan na sya ni Ama ta do to a yangay do teyngato.

language1_text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils;
language2_text: Nipaziman na rana no Seyzi o keyyan no tao no makwa a tomaosya so manoyong a nanao a kahap da so malas a nanao no kalamsoyan ni Satan.

language1_text: speaking lies in hypocrisy; having their conscience seared with a hot iron;
language2_text: O somala a nanao am apo do manlita tao. Sira rana am abwata rana o apya nakenakem da a somengseng do marahet a vazay.

language1_text: forbidding to marry, and commanding to abstain from meats, which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth.
language2_text: Ipanci da o macivahavahay a kano mapasakay yamalas, a kapanci da no kaji nganan so karwan no kanekanen. Am o kanekanen rana am nyamamaog na ni Ama ta do to. So sarayan da nya kakan da rana sya no omanoyong ji Yeso a kano makateneng do ciriciring na.

language1_text: For every creature of God is good, and nothing to be refused, if it be received with thanksgiving:
language2_text: O na nyamamaog rana ni Ama ta do to am yamamimin a yabo so karatan. Am ori o sarayan ta nya do onowned ta. So ji tanyo meyraci jya an.

language1_text: for it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.
language2_text: Ta o ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a kano inozi ta somaray nya jya am ori o ikabo na rana no marahet do kanekanen ta.

language1_text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things, thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ, nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine, whereunto thou hast attained.
language2_text: No si vahangsowen mo o aro a vazay eya do akma moy kakteh do cinai am manoyong ka lamlamsoy ni Yeso Kizisto, do kakdeng no nakenakem mo a mapeyvazay so manoyong a nanao ni Ama ta do to a yameypahagnat so onowned rana ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But refuse profane and old wives' fables, and exercise thyself rather unto godliness.
language2_text: Ji mo pasngesngena o abo so peypeypangayan a katatapilan nyo a ipanci. Ta apyapya pa o kowyat mo a meypahagnat so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For bodily exercise profiteth little: but godliness is profitable unto all things, having promise of the life that now is, and of that which is to come.
language2_text: Manoyong kapya na no mapazigton so kataotao am makdekdeng pa o kapeypahagnat ta so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to. Ta ori o makasidong jyaten sicyaikwaya kano makwa no myan ta na do teyngato.

language1_text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation.
language2_text: Manoyong o akman rana sang a ciring. So ikamimin ta mahap sya an.

language1_text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach, because we trust in the living God, who is the Saviour of all men, specially of those that believe.
language2_text: O yata ikowyat a yamahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to am ta ipeyhanhan si Ama ta do to a mapatazadang jyaten. Ta iya rana am to meyyonong a mavyay a Tao do to. Am o meyhanhan nya o avyain na.

language1_text: These things command and teach.
language2_text: So pancyan mo no akman sang a vazay a kananao mo so kararay mo.

language1_text: Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the believers, in word, in conversation, in charity, in spirit, in faith, in purity.
language2_text: Tana malavayo ka am apzatan mo o ciriciring mo a kano icicirawat mo a kano pangangarilawan mo so icyatatao mo. Akman sang o onowned mo. Ta peycitacittan da imo no omanoyong ji Yeso, kaji da rana ngolalai so ipangnanao mo.

language1_text: Till I come, give attendance to reading, to exhortation, to doctrine.
language2_text: So ji mo amtaji no kapeyvilang mo so Seysyo do kalwalovotan a kapeylimwang mo nya inanao sira.

language1_text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee, which was given thee by prophecy, with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery.
language2_text: Ji mo to nazibwan o oyowyat na jimo no Seyzi a tomalamozong no kyokay. Ta ori rana am nitoro na jimo do kanimanlanlag da nimo no lima da ipeynozi no tomalamozong no kyokay, do mina kapamnek da jimo a mapeyvazay eya.

language1_text: Meditate upon these things; give thyself wholly to them; that thy profiting may appear to all.
language2_text: O akman rana sang a vazay am makowyat ka mapeyvazay sya an. Ta ori o ipakacita da jimo a nimeypakatkat rana.

language1_text: Take heed unto thyself, and unto the doctrine; continue in them: for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself, and them that hear thee.
language2_text: Meypepzat ka so kataotao an. Akman so sang o ipangnanao mo an. Ji mo macimazai o vazay mo. Ta ori o ipatazadang na jimo ni Ama ta do to do teyngato. So ikakman da sang no pamizngen mo a tao a patazadangen na.

language1_text: Rebuke not an elder, but intreat him as a father; and the younger men as brethren;
language2_text: Ji mo sira oyyan o rarakeh rana mahakay an. Ta akmey inyapwan mo sira pamizngen. No nanawen mo sira o malalavayo a mahakay am pehngehngain mo sira do kakteh mo.

language1_text: the elder women as mothers; the younger as sisters, with all purity.
language2_text: No nanawen mo sira o rarakeh a mavakes am to mo peynara sira do ina mo an. No nanawen mo sira o malalavayo a mavakes am makapya ka so nakenakem a omnanao sira. So ikanoyong nyo a akmey meyketeketeh.

language1_text: Honour widows that are widows indeed.
language2_text: O vao rana mavakes a abo so mapeylamnay sira am peyveyveknen nyo sira an.

language1_text: But if any widow have children or nephews, let them learn first to shew piety at home, and to requite their parents: for that is good and acceptable before God.
language2_text: No myan so anak da no vao a mavakes a kano apwapo da am nanawen mo sira do vahay da mapeylamnay so inyapwan da kano akes da kano akay da. Ta ikakza na o akman sang ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Now she that is a widow indeed, and desolate, trusteth in God, and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day.
language2_text: O vao a mavakes rana abwata so mapeylamnay sya am ipeyhanhan na si Ama ta do to kapangday na meynozi do maraw a kano mahep a mapasyasi jya somidong sya.
