language1_text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth.
language2_text: Am o makza no keylamnay da tao do karawan am tana mavyay o kataotao da am akmey nimawakwak o onowned da.

language1_text: And these things give in charge, that they may be blameless.
language2_text: Ipanci mo jira do omanoyong ji Yeso o akman sang a nanao, ta ori o ikabo no tao a omraherahet sira.

language1_text: But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.
language2_text: No myan so tao a ji rana makanakem so zipos na kano kavavahay da am peymakarwan na o nanao ni Yeso. So ikaraherahet na pa kano ji nganoyong ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old, having been the wife of one man,
language2_text: O padketen a vao a mavakes so ngaran a azawen no kyokay am sikanem (60) o kakawakawan na. Ipisa nimacivahavahay.

language1_text: well reported of for good works; if she have brought up children, if she have lodged strangers, if she have washed the saints' feet, if she have relieved the afflicted, if she have diligently followed every good work.
language2_text: Katenngan da no tao apya so vazay, makananao so anak na, mateneng a manaotao so apo do teysa ka ili a tao. Ji mapahama so nakenakem, kasidong na so amyan so alalaw a tao a kowyat na mahap so apya vazay.

language1_text: But the younger widows refuse: for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ, they will marry;
language2_text: O malavayo pa vao a mavakes am ji da padketa pa o ngaran da, ta no si naknakmen da pa o kapacivahavahay da am aryan da na o kapeyvazay da ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: having damnation, because they have cast off their first faith.
language2_text: So iyan na no raraten da, ta ji da hap o mina ciring da no kakwa pa a manci no kahap da so vazay na ni Yeso.

language1_text: And withal they learn to be idle, wandering about from house to house; and not only idle, but tattlers also and busybodies, speaking things which they ought not.
language2_text: Sira rana am kalivolivon da meyyowyaw a abwata so vazavazay. O maraherahet pa vazay da am ikazyak da o beken a vazay da, kapeygamogamo da no marahet a ciriciring.

language1_text: I will therefore that the younger women marry, bear children, guide the house, give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully.
language2_text: Am ori o ko apyapyan so malavayo a vao a mavakes a mirwa pa macivahavahay a mangahanas a kapeyveyveken da so kavavahay da. Ta ori o ikabo no iraherahet da jyaten no ji nganoyong ji Yeso a macioya jyaten a tao.

language1_text: For some are already turned aside after Satan.
language2_text: Ta yamyan do vao a mavakes so yamablis so nakenakem a somazap so vazay ni Satan.

language1_text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows, let them relieve them, and let not the church be charged; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed.
language2_text: No myan do sinjya so vao a mavakes am peyveyveknen na an. Ji da to meyhanhanan o kyokay yasomidong sya. Ta o makasi a vao a abo so mapeylamnay sira am ori o sidongen no kyokay.

language1_text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour, especially they who labour in the word and doctrine.
language2_text: O tomalamozong rana no kyokay a tao a makateneng do ahahapan da so vazay da do kyokay a yamowyat a meylimwang no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a kano mateneng amnanao so sinjya am ikanig nyo sira, kapanta nyo nira so apyahen da no nakem.

language1_text: For the scripture saith, Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn. And, The labourer is worthy of his reward.
language2_text: Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "O peyvazain a baka am ji ngakcina sira an." Maniring pa am, "O meyveyvazay a tao am pakanen nyo sira an."

language1_text: Against an elder receive not an accusation, but before two or three witnesses.
language2_text: Ano myan so tao a amraherahet so tomalamozong no kyokay am ji nyo anoyngi no si ji sira rarwa, tatlo o tao a macyanoyong jya.

language1_text: Them that sin rebuke before all, that others also may fear.
language2_text: No amyan so meyraraten a tomalamozong no kyokay am vavagan nyo sira do ipacikaop no aro a sinjya. Ta ipaziman so aro a tao.

language1_text: I charge thee before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, and the elect angels, that thou observe these things without preferring one before another, doing nothing by partiality.
language2_text: Yako myan do tangain na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a kano tinsi a yamanci nya jimo. So hapan mo so nanao eya an. No si myan so pacicin mo am amizngen mo o manoyong. Peyyangangain mo sira citahen so karatan.

language1_text: Lay hands suddenly on no man, neither be partaker of other men's sins: keep thyself pure.
language2_text: Ji mo to minaknakman o kapamnek mo so tomalamozong no kyokay, ta citahen mo pa o iwawalam na, do kapya na, karahet na. Ta no si myan so raraten na am macilovot ka dang. Ji mo ablisi o apiya nakenakem mo.

language1_text: Drink no longer water, but use a little wine for thy stomach's sake and thine often infirmities.
language2_text: Beken a ka ranom na no yopen mo. Ta amyop ka so alikey a potaw cyo a kosozi no velek mo a kaji mo a sangiban a meyngen so kataotao.

language1_text: Some men's sins are open beforehand, going before to judgment; and some men they follow after.
language2_text: No mamnek ka so mimong no kyokay am naknakmen mo o yatatasa yamapengkad so raraten a tao. Am yamyan so tao a jyapengkad so raraten. Tana jyapengkad o raraten am cyaha, ta mangay kapeytotwaw na.

language1_text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid.
language2_text: Akman sang o tao a apya so vazay am katenngan ori. Am tana jyatenngi am abo makatayo sya.

language1_text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour, that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed.
language2_text: Omraralay ni Yeso a peylamsoin da am amizngen da o mapeylamsoy sira tao an. Ta ori o ji da rehrehci so ngaran na ni Ama ta do to a kano nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And they that have believing masters, let them not despise them, because they are brethren; but rather do them service, because they are faithful and beloved, partakers of the benefit. These things teach and exhort.
language2_text: No si iraralay na si Yeso no mapeylamsoy jinyo a tao am ji nyo akwan a lamlamsoy da o kapeykakteh nyo sira do cinai. Ta ikowyowyat nyo pa somidong so vazay da. Ahapen mo o akman sya vazay a ipangnanao do amraralay ni Yeso a tao.

language1_text: If any man teach otherwise, and consent not to wholesome words, even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ, and to the doctrine which is according to godliness;
language2_text: Ano amyan so tao a meylimwang no macisala do ciriciring na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta, kapacitarek na do ipangnanao ta ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am,

language1_text: he is proud, knowing nothing, but doting about questions and strifes of words, whereof cometh envy, strife, railings, evil surmisings,
language2_text: o akman rana sang a tao am mapahama, abwata so katatenngan. So ikanoyong da makza no kapaciskaskad da a manamwad. So iyan na rana do onowned da no panginanehtan da, pacililimanan da, ji da manganoyngi.

language1_text: perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds, and destitute of the truth, supposing that gain is godliness: from such withdraw thyself.
language2_text: Ta ori o yapwan no kato da mangamaogan so malas a nakenakem a kano marahet a icicirawat da. O nakenakem da nira omraralay ni Ama ta do to am naknakmen da o kapeynizpi da nya.

language1_text: But godliness with contentment is great gain.
language2_text: Manoyong o katey yapya no omahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to am tana abo nizpi am masaray an.

language1_text: For we brought nothing into this world, and it is certain we can carry nothing out.
language2_text: Matazak a tao ta do karawan am abwata o nipalolo ta an. Am si karwan ta rana o karawan eya am abo o palolwen taha.

language1_text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content.
language2_text: Am ori an, no myan so kanen ta kano ayob ta am isaray ta an.

language1_text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare, and into many foolish and hurtful lusts, which drown men in destruction and perdition.
language2_text: O komakzeb so karo no nizpi da am makeykai sira kalittan, ta masanga sira no abo so angangayan a vazay a maozoz so nakenakem. O kapalit no akman sang am mangay sira do makotokotod a lila no apoy a mangay no makwa.

language1_text: For the love of money is the root of all evil: which while some coveted after, they have erred from the faith, and pierced themselves through with many sorrows.
language2_text: O makza rana no nizpi am yapwan na no meycyamadadayan a raraten na. Ta amyan so tao a tey makza no nizpi a to ngaro rana do manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to. So ikaro na rana no ikeyngen na no onowned.

language1_text: But thou, O man of God, flee these things; and follow after righteousness, godliness, faith, love, patience, meekness.
language2_text: Am imo rana am na nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a yamahap so vazay na. So peymakarwan mo na do akman sang a marahet a kahap mo so meysominogat a onowned. Macilolo ka do apyahen na ni Ama ta do to a kapeyhanhan mo nya. Ji mo a haywan o kapangarilaw mo. Ji ka hayohayowen. Ji ka oyaoyahen.

language1_text: Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, whereunto thou art also called, and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses.
language2_text: Makowyowyat ka omahap so vazay na ni Yeso akman so macipalayolayo a komakzeb so kangay na do pacipanmanma na. Ji mo to nazibwan o nitoro na rana jimo a to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad mo. Ta ori o na agagazan no na nipamnekan jimo ni Ama ta do to. So mo na nipeylimwangan no nang do tangain no aro a tao. So ikanoyong no akman sang.

language1_text: I give thee charge in the sight of God, who quickeneth all things, and before Christ Jesus, who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession;
language2_text: O yako ipanci jimo am yongkad ko si Ama ta do to a nimangamaog so meycyamadadayan a kani Yeso Kizisto a jyanyahey a manci no manoyong a ciring do tangain na ni Pangsyo Pilato.

language1_text: that thou keep this commandment without spot, unrebukeable, until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ:
language2_text: So hapan mo so manoyong a nipakolivava ko jimo a ciriciring. So ikabo no karatan mo mangay rana do araw na no yai ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: which in his times he shall shew, who is the blessed and only Potentate, the King of kings, and Lord of lords;
language2_text: Si marateng rana o araraw a nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to am mai rana si Yeso Kizisto. Ta iya o manoyong a azwazwain ta a maveyvow abwata so ikararwa a Panirsirngen do peycyamahamahatawan na.

language1_text: who only hath immortality, dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto; whom no man hath seen, nor can see: to whom be honour and power everlasting. Amen.
language2_text: Ta si Ama ta do to am jyawakwak. Meyvahay do ji macisngeni no tao a maniray. Abwata pa o nimakacita sya tao. So ikabo no macisazap jya. Inaoy no to meyyonong a azwazwain ta, katalamozong na nyaten. Amin.

language1_text: Charge them that are rich in this world, that they be not highminded, nor trust in uncertain riches, but in the living God, who giveth us richly all things to enjoy;
language2_text: Pazimanen mo do aro so kangangay sicyaikwaya an, ta ji sira mapakazwazway. Ji da meyhanhanan o aro a apzapzatan da, ta ji da tenngi o kato na meyyonongan no nang a ikapya da. Ta si Ama ta do to o ipeyhanhan da yamanta nyaten so meycyamadadayan.

language1_text: that they do good, that they be rich in good works, ready to distribute, willing to communicate;
language2_text: So pancyan mo nira mapeyvazay so apya vazay, kazonos da a manidong so icyatatao da.

language1_text: laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come, that they may lay hold on eternal life.
language2_text: No si akman sira sang am akma dey peyparwen o peymeymasaodan da ji Ama ta do to a keyyan na pa no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da.

language1_text: O Timothy, keep that which is committed to thy trust, avoiding profane and vain babblings, and oppositions of science falsely so called:
language2_text: Imo rana mo Timotay, anak ko am ahapen mo o nipakolivava ko jimo a vazay eya an. Peyyanen mo do onowned mo o vazay eya an. Ta ji mo ngapa o abwata so angangayan a ciriciring.

language1_text: which some professing have erred concerning the faith. Grace be with thee. Amen. The first to Timothy was written from Laodicea, which is the chiefest city of Phrygia Pacatiana.
language2_text: Ta yamyan so yatatasa ka tao a mapakateneteneng a yamanci no da kapakateneng rana do akman sang. Am yajyakman sang, ta sira nimavozaw so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to. Inaoy si myan jinyo o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God, according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus,
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to a nipamnekan na ni Yeso Kizisto a omlivolivon no ciriciring na. Yaken rana am yako ipeylimwang o mina ciring na jyaten ni Kizisto a ipakahap ta so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta a omraralay nya.

language1_text: To Timothy, my dearly beloved son: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.
language2_text: Imo rana mo Timotay a akma koy anak am ko ipeyteygami imo. Inaoy si itoro na jimo ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na kano pangangasyan na kano ikapiya no onowned mo.

language1_text: I thank God, whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience, that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day;
language2_text: Yako isaray ji Ama ta do to o namen kapeyyangay a kano ineynapo namen a yaji meylimoteng so nakem a yamraralay nya. Yamangday no ko meynozi do mahep a kado maraw o yako kapakanakem jimo.

language1_text: greatly desiring to see thee, being mindful of thy tears, that I may be filled with joy;
language2_text: Ta ko manakem o kato mo na meykaooi asyo a pacisyayan ko. So ko toda ji ngamogi so kakeykai ko a makacita jimo. Ta jyabo kaji ko narayan a makacita jimo a.

language1_text: when I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee, which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois, and thy mother Eunice; and I am persuaded that in thee also.
language2_text: Ta ko katenngan o na kajyalasan no onowned mo ji Ama ta do to. O akman rana sang a onowned mo si Ama ta do to am yana nimanmanma ji Loi a akes mo a kani Yonise a ina mo. So ko anoyngan jimo a yakman sang.

language1_text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God, which is in thee by the putting on of my hands.
language2_text: Am ori o yako pancyan nya jimo, makowyat ka meyvazay an. Ta naknakmen mo o oyowyat a nitoro na jimo ni Ama ta do to no kaparapong ko so lima ko jimo a ipeynozi no kakwa pa.

language1_text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
language2_text: Ta o Seyzi a na nitoro rana jyaten ni Ama ta do to am beken a ikalma no onowned ta. Ta ikowyat no onowned ta kano iyan no pangangarilawan ta kano apiya pangtoktwan ta.

language1_text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner: but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God;
language2_text: Am ori o ji mo asneki a meylimwang ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta. Ji mo macimasnekan yaken a nipteng da mahap so vazay na ni Kizisto. So ahapan mo so alalaw ta no kapeylimwang ta no Mapasaray a Ciriciring, ta na sidongen imo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: who hath saved us, and called us with an holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began,
language2_text: Iya o nimahap jyaten a mapanop jyaten a omanod jya. Am beken a omagaz do kapya no icicirawat ta, ta yaomagaz do nakenakem na kano pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta no kaji na pa nimangamaogan so karawan am nimanakem na rana o katovoy na si Yeso Kizisto a somidong jyaten.

language1_text: but is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ, who hath abolished death, and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel:
language2_text: Yarana nimangononong o akman sang a na sidongan jyaten. Ta yarana nimeyhekas si Yeso Kizisto a yamapatazadang jyaten. Am ori o ji ta nyahei no kawakwak ta, ta amyan rana jyaten so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta. Ori rana am ipanci na jyaten do Mapasaray a Ciriciring na.

language1_text: whereunto I am appointed a preacher, and an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles.
language2_text: Na nipamnekan yaken ni Ama ta do to a amlivolivon a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na a ipangnanao so tao.

language1_text: For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed, and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day.
language2_text: Ori o yana niyapwan no alalaw ko. Am cyaha, ta yako katenngan si Yeso a yako ipeyhanhan. So ko anoyngan ji Yeso a makasidong jyaken a mapeyvazay so vazay na mangay do araraw no ikeypirwa na mai.

language1_text: Hold fast the form of sound words, which thou hast heard of me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Pakanakmen mo o manoyong a nanao a ninanao ko rana jimo a pangozayan mo. Ji mo to nazibwan o nimahap mo a pangangarilawan a kano nakenakem mo ji Yeso Kizisto an. Ta ori o yongkad no macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us.
language2_text: Am ori o peyhanhanan mo no isidong na jimo no Seyzi a yamyan jyaten a kapzat mo do manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to a nitoro na jimo a ipeylimwang mo.

language1_text: This thou knowest, that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes.
language2_text: Mo katenngan rana, ta o tao rana do Yasiya pongso ya am sira mamimin a yajyakza nyaken. Yakman sang si Veykelo a kani Hemokenay a yajyakza nyaken.

language1_text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus; for he oft refreshed me, and was not ashamed of my chain:
language2_text: Inaoy no ikasi na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta si Onaysevo a yasa ka vahay. Ta yamasangib ori a yamai a yamapasaray jyaken. So na ji macimasneki nyaken a nipteng da.

language1_text: but, when he was in Rome, he sought me out very diligently, and found me.
language2_text: Ta kapakaranes na do Loma am amlivolivon a komala jyaken. Mownay am makala na rana yaken.

language1_text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day: and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus, thou knowest very well.
language2_text: Inaoy no ikasi na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta no si marateng rana o yai na a mapeykapyapinpin so tao do karawan. Yamo katenngan rana o aro a vazay a nisidongan na jyaken no keyyan ko pa do Ivoso.

language1_text: Thou therefore, my son, be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Imo rana manganako am ahapen mo o na nitoro jimo ni Yeso Kizisto a pangangarilawan na, ta ori o ikowyat no onowned mo.

language1_text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses, the same commit thou to faithful men, who shall be able to teach others also.
language2_text: Ahapen mo o nanao a nimamizing mo jyaken do tangain da no aro a tao a inanao mo so milamdam mo a makdeng so nakenakem a tao a kananao da so icyatatao da.

language1_text: Thou therefore endure hardness, as a good soldier of Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Makowyat ka so nakenakem a somazap so alalaw mo an, do kapacinanod mo jyaken a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to. Ta akma tey itaysang na ni Yeso Kizisto a ji mapasobna do mimong nira.

language1_text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier.
language2_text: O myan rana do itaysang am no kakzeben na o kaglaw na nya no mimong nya am ji na pazavoza o makakaday a vazay na, ta ikasanga na.

language1_text: And if a man also strive for masteries, yet is he not crowned, except he strive lawfully.
language2_text: No macipalalayo o tao a kaji na mangozayan do nipamnekan da a pangozayan no malalayo am abo o azaw na.

language1_text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits.
language2_text: O mowyat a amhakakaw a tao am ori o mabsoy a tao.

language1_text: Consider what I say; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things.
language2_text: Naknakmen mo o ko nipanci jimo a ko payyaingan sya. Ta si Yeso o makasidong jimo a ipakateneng mo do akman sang a vazay.

language1_text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel:
language2_text: Naknakmen mo si Yeso Kizisto a nimatazak a tao a sivovoong na ni Tawey. Tana da niwakwak am nimirwa a mavyay. Ori o ko ipeylimwang a Mapasaray a Ciriciring.

language1_text: wherein I suffer trouble, as an evil doer, even unto bonds; but the word of God is not bound.
language2_text: Am ori o ko nipeyrarahet a nivaod da no nilalin da vahalang. Am o ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am jyasengsengi. So ikabo no makazazat jya.

language1_text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect's sakes, that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory.
language2_text: Am ori o ko to liliwi so yamakakaday a da peyrarehtan jyaken, do ko kasidong so nipamnekan na ni Ama ta do to a tao a omanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto. So ikanoyong da makahap so to meyyonong a pangangarilawan na kano azwazway.

language1_text: It is a faithful saying: For if we be dead with him, we shall also live with him:
language2_text: O ciring eya am tey manoyong: No si pazanoden ta o onowned ta ji Yeso Kizisto a nimawakwak nyaten am akman ta si Yeso Kizisto a avyain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: if we suffer, we shall also reign with him: if we deny him, he also will deny us:
language2_text: Si ji ta hayo so nakenakem am macizanod ta jya tomalamozong no teyngato. Si ji ta nganoyngi am ji na singkaji yaten.

language1_text: if we believe not, yet he abideth faithful: he cannot deny himself.
language2_text: Tana malas o onowned ta jya am jyablis o ciring na, ta ji na mamyapyan o kaji na mangononongan no ciring na.

language1_text: Of these things put them in remembrance, charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit, but to the subverting of the hearers.
language2_text: Pazimanen mo o aro a tao do tangain na ni Ama ta do to, ta ji sira macinekanekad no ciriciring da. Ta abo o peypeypangayan no akman sang. Ta kapeyparahet da nya no omamizing sya tao.

language1_text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God, a workman that needeth not to be ashamed, rightly dividing the word of truth.
language2_text: Makowyowyat ka pa do tangain na ni Ama ta do to a mapacita no kaji mo ablisan no nakenakem jya a abo so karatan a mahap so vazay na a mapatak a mangnanao no manoyong a nanao na.

language1_text: But shun profane and vain babblings: for they will increase unto more ungodliness.
language2_text: Ji mo pasngena o abo so angangayan a pacinekanekadan. Ta o akman rana sang a ciriciring am mapeyparai so tao ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And their word will eat as doth a canker: of whom is Hymenæ us and Philetus;
language2_text: Ta o ipangnanao da rana am akmey noka jyapya a makatotoin. Yamacyangay jira ang si Siminay a kani Veydito.

language1_text: who concerning the truth have erred, saying that the resurrection is past already; and overthrow the faith of some.
language2_text: Sira rana am da na nikarwan o manoyong a nanao. Ta ipanci da o kaji da na mirwan a mavyay no nimawakwak rana tao a niomanoyong ji Yeso. Ta da ipanci o kanikomavos rana no keypirwa a mavyay no tao. So da ikanoyong a mapeykamakamali so onowned no tao ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure, having this seal, The Lord knoweth them that are his. And, Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.
language2_text: Am yajyablis o manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to. Ta maniring do nivatvatkan a Ciriciring am, "Katenngan na ni Yeso o omanoyong jya tao." Maniring pa am, "O manci no kararalay da ni Ama ta do to am peymakarwan da rana o raraten da."

language1_text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth; and some to honour, and some to dishonour.
language2_text: O rako a vahay no katenngan a tao am aro dang o makakaday a apzapzatan a makonokon dang. Am amyan so makdeng, amyan so jyakdeng.

language1_text: If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honour, sanctified, and meet for the master's use, and prepared unto every good work.
language2_text: O ko pancyan no nang am tanyo akman so makakaday a apzapzatan ang. No ji ta pasngena o raraten do kataotao ta am manoyong kapahanhan na jyaten ni Ama ta do to do makdeng a vazay.

language1_text: Flee also youthful lusts: but follow righteousness, faith, charity, peace, with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart.
language2_text: Ji mo nginara sira o malavayo a tao a to mangozay do nakenakem da, ta o ahapen mo am ji meyrahet a nakenakem, kakdeng no onowned mo ji Ama ta do to, kapeypakatkat no pangangarilawan mo a kano kapya no onowned mo do icyatatao mo, do yamo ipacizanod do tao a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to a mazngang so onowned.

language1_text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid, knowing that they do gender strifes.
language2_text: Ji nyo ngahapa o malas a ciriciring a ipacinekanekad nyo. Ta katenngan mo o akman sang a vazay a mapeyliliman.

language1_text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive; but be gentle unto all men, apt to teach, patient,
language2_text: O lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to am ji macililiman, ta apiya o nakenakem na so icyatatao na a kowyat na omnanao sira. Tana ji da ngamiznga am jyahayo o onowned na.

language1_text: in meekness instructing those that oppose themselves; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth;
language2_text: No akman sang o inanao na so ji ngahap so nanao a tao am ala ipanta na sira ni Ama ta do to so ipamlis da so nakenakem, kapakateneng da rana do manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil, who are taken captive by him at his will.
language2_text: Tana meypasngen sira do raraten da omamizing so ciring na ni Satan am amyan so kasaraw a ikaro da do littan na jira.

language1_text: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.
language2_text: Naknakmen mo an, ta no si makeykai rana mai si Yeso am amyan so kanginanawan a kano alalaw an.

language1_text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,
language2_text: Ta o kataotao da o manakem da. O kapangamkam da so nizpi. O kapahama da so nakem da. O kapanraherahet da. O kapasala da do inyapwan da. Ji da narayan o nisidongan da sira no tao. Jyanoyong o nakenakem da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,
language2_text: Abo rana o pangarilawan da so tao. Abo o pangangasyan da so icyatatao da. Mananamwad sira. Masosozi sira. Mangangamo sira. Ikaoya da o apya vazay.

language1_text: traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;
language2_text: Ipacinginangina da o icyatatao da. Ji da naknakma o apiya ahapan da so vazay da. O ahapen da am mapakazwazway sira. Maharahara pa o sarasaray da so makakaday a vazay da a kani Ama ta do to.

language1_text: having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.
language2_text: Ta sira rana am akmey manaralay sira am ji macipayok o vazay da, ta to da nazibwan o oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to. O akman rana sang a tao am ji mo macikasngeni sira an.

language1_text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,
language2_text: Ta amyan so mahakay a mangnanao no malas a ciring so jyahadpet so nakem a mavavakes a ipeyzavozavoz da so nakenakem da. Am ori o to da anwanoyngi jira, do keyyan na pa jira no raraten da no kakwa pa.

language1_text: ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.
language2_text: Tana sira masangib o mavavakes a yamacinanao am da jyatenngi o yamanoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.
language2_text: Akman si Yanayse a kani Yangpole a ji ngahap so apya nanao na ni Moyse am akman sang o vazay da no mangnanao no malas a tao. Ta yajyablis o pangtoktwan da. So ikabo na no katatenngan da a manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.
language2_text: So ikanoyong no vazay da abo so angangayan. Ta meytotwaw rana o karatan da do tangain no aro a tao akman si Yanayse a kani Yangpole.

language1_text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,
language2_text: Imo rana mo Timotay am mo na nyahap o nanao ko a kano icicirawat ko a kano ahapan ko so vazay do karawan a kano onowned ko ji Ama ta do to. Mo katenngan yaken a ji macimaza do vazay ko ji Ama ta do to a kano pangangarilawan ko so icyatatao ko.

language1_text: persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.
language2_text: Mo katenngan o ko kato nazibwan no aro a alalaw ko do Antia kado Ikenyan a kado Disetela. Am kanisomidong na jyaken ni Yeso a komaro do akman sang a nipeyrarehtan da jyaken no tao.

language1_text: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.
language2_text: Mamimin o macilolo ji Yeso Kizisto a mapeyvazay so nanao ni Ama ta do to a peyrarehten da.

language1_text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.
language2_text: Ta o meyraraten rana tao a kano mangnanao no malas a tao am meypeyparahet o vazay da. Ta alalasan da o tao am akman sang sira kalittan.

language1_text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;
language2_text: Am o mo nimahap rana yamanoyong a nanao am panekseken mo do onowned mo an. Ta mo katenngan sira o mo nipacinanawan an.

language1_text: and that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Ta mo manakem no ka kanakan mo pa am katenngan mo rana o Seysyo a yamnanao jimo. So ikatopos mo a meyhanhan ni Yeso Kizisto a mapatazadang jimo do kapyapyan.

language1_text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
language2_text: O Seysyo rana am mamimin a apo ji Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong na tey mowyat a inanao na so omanoyong jya tao, a iblis na so onowned no malas a tao, a ipaziman na so meyraraten a tao, a inanao na so tao a mangozay do apiya vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: that the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
language2_text: Ta ori o ikateneng ta a ikowyat ta a mapeyvazay so makakaday a vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;
language2_text: Yako vavagan imo do tangain na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto. Katenngan ta, ta no makwa am meygegcin si Yeso Kizisto a tomalamozong no vayo a karawan. Ta iya o mapeykapyapinpin so mavyay a kano nimawakwak rana tao.

language1_text: preach the word; be instant in season, out of season; reprove, rebuke, exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.
language2_text: Am ori o peylimwangan mo no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Tana amizngen da, tana ji da ngamiznga am ji ka hayo so onowned a amvavaga jira kano mapait sira a omnanao sira.

language1_text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers, having itching ears;
language2_text: Ta yamyan so araraw na no ji da ngapi so manoyong a nanao a to ngonongonong do apyahen da no nakem a ji rana mingsan so amizngen da.

language1_text: and they shall turn away their ears from the truth, and shall be turned unto fables.
language2_text: So bengbengan da so cicilwan da ji ngamizing so manoyong a nanao a kamizing da so nipapo no tao a kavavatanen.

language1_text: But watch thou in all things, endure afflictions, do the work of an evangelist, make full proof of thy ministry.
language2_text: Am imo rana am meypepzat ka do meykamadadayan a vazay mo. Ji mo a mamman o alalaw mo a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring. Ta ori o ikowyat mo a mahap so vazay mo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For I am now ready to be offered, and the time of my departure is at hand.
language2_text: Yaken rana am yako rana makeykai a mangay ji Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong ko rana a na ahapen ni Ama ta do to do teyngato.

language1_text: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:
language2_text: O vazay ko rana ji Ama ta do to a na nitoro jyaken am ko na nimamimin a nipateyka nipeyvazay. Akman so malalayo a tao a omtad rana malayo. So ko rana nimiminan so manoyong a nanao a nyahap.

language1_text: henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, shall give me at that day: and not to me only, but unto all them also that love his appearing.
language2_text: Am ori o na iyan no azaw ko apo ji Ama ta do to. Ta si mai rana o yamapeyyangangay a mapacici a Panirsirngen ta am itoro na rana jyaken. Am beken a yaken o torwan na nya. Ta itoro na ori do tao a amraralay nya kano somaray a amnanala sya a mai do teyrahem.

language1_text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:
language2_text: Makeykai ka mangay do jya.

language1_text: for Demas hath forsaken me, having loved this present world, and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, Titus unto Dalmatia.
language2_text: Ta na nikarwan rana yaken ni Temase a mangay do Tesalonicya, do kapyapya na pa so masaod no karawan. Si Keleseke rana am nimangay do Cyalatay. Si Tito am nimangay do Taarmatiya.

language1_text: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with thee: for he is profitable to me for the ministry.
language2_text: So na ika si Locya no kararay ko. Am ori o mangay mo kalan si Make kapalolo mo sya yai do jya, ta mowyat a somidong jyaken do vazay ko.

language1_text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.
language2_text: Si Ticiko rana am ko na nitovoy a yamangay do Ivoso.

language1_text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus, when thou comest, bring with thee, and the books, but especially the parchments.
language2_text: Si mai ka am yai mo o asa ka magorogod ko nyaryan ko do vahay da Kaarpo do Teloya a kahap mo pa so vakong ko. Ta yamyan do dang so yamakdeng a ko vilangan.

language1_text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward him according to his works:
language2_text: O mapakapkapya so vahalang a meyngaran si Yadisanta am tey rako o nyalalawan na jyaken. Cyaha, ta ji ngyan so ipasingkad na sya ni Ama ta do to a.

language1_text: of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our words.
language2_text: Ko ipanci jimo, ta azimanen mo. Ta iya rana am na pacioyyan o ta ipangnanao a ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: At my first answer no man stood with me, but all men forsook me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.
language2_text: No keypisa ko pa macirawarawa no kataotao ko am abwata o macikabong jyaken. Am inaoy no ji na peyyana do onowned na o raraten da ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known, and that all the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.
language2_text: Am si Ama ta do to o yamyan do katangked ko a somidong jyaken a manta nyaken so oyowyat ko a meylimwang no ciriciring na do beken a tao do Yotay a kavyay na pa jyaken no kavovo da jyaken a wakwaken.

language1_text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
language2_text: So ikanoyong na ni Ama ta do to a mahap jyaken a komaro do kanginanawan ko do maciocioya jyaken a tao, mangay no si ahapen na rana yaken do teyngato. Inaoy no to meyyonong o kazwazway ta si Ama ta do to. Amin.

language1_text: Salute Prisca and Aquila, and the household of Onesiphorus.
language2_text: Ipanci mo ji Paycila kani Akwila kani Onaysevo a asa ka vahay do ko kapeyminaminasi nira.

language1_text: Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick.
language2_text: Si Ilato rana am yana meyvahay do Kedinto. Am si Teloveymo am yameyngen o kataotao na. So ko nivezedan sya do Midito.

language1_text: Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee, and Pudens, and Linus, and Claudia, and all the brethren.
language2_text: Imo rana am makeykai ka mai do jya, do yana ipeypamyan rana, ta marekmeh rana. Yopolo a kani Poteng a kani Dino a kani Kelawtiya kano aro a akma tey kakteh do cinai o yameyminaminasi nimo.

language1_text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you. Amen. The second epistle unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.
language2_text: Inaoy no macitovong jimo si Ama ta do to. Inaoy no itoro na o pangangarilawan na jinyo.

language1_text: Paul, a servant of God, and an apostle of Jesus Christ, according to the faith of God's elect, and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness;
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to a nipamnekan ni Yeso Kizisto a omlivolivon no ciriciring na. O na nipamnekan jyaken am yana tovoin yaken a mapait so onowned da no nipamnekan na tao ni Ama ta do to a omanoyong ji Yeso. So palolwan ko sira a kapakateneng da rana do nanao na no yatamo iraralay.

language1_text: in hope of eternal life, which God, that cannot lie, promised before the world began;
language2_text: O peypeypangayan na rana no nanao eya am ipakahap ta so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta. Manoyong o nipanci na a itoro na jyaten no kaji na pa mangamaogan so karawan. Ta si Ama ta do to rana am abo kalalasan na.

language1_text: but hath in due times manifested his word through preaching, which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour;
language2_text: So peylimwangan no akman sang sicyaikwaya. Ori ko pangozayan do ngaran na ni Ama ta do to a nitomovoy jyaken a yameylimwang no akman sang a nanao na. Ta iya rana am mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato.

language1_text: to Titus, mine own son after the common faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour.
language2_text: Ko ipeyteygami imo, mo Tito. Imo rana do ta raralayan ni Ama ta do to am ka manoyong a akma koy anak. Inaoy no si itoro na jimo ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto o pangangarilawan na kano ikapiya no onowned mo. Ta si Yeso Kizisto rana am mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato.

language1_text: For this cause left I thee in Crete, that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting, and ordain elders in every city, as I had appointed thee:
language2_text: Nivezed ko imo do Kedite a pongso no kakwa, ta pakavosen mo pa o ji ta pa nipakavos a vazay a kapamnek mo pa do peycyeylilyan na so tomalamozong no kyokay a tao, akman so mina ciring ko jimo no kakwa pa.

language1_text: if any be blameless, the husband of one wife, having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly.
language2_text: O tomalamozong rana no kyokay am abwata o karatan na. Asa o kahanghangan na. O ananak na am mamimin sira omanoyong ji Yeso. Abwata o iraherahet da sira no tao a kamizing da so ciring no inyapwan da.

language1_text: For a bishop must be blameless, as the steward of God; not selfwilled, not soon angry, not given to wine, no striker, not given to filthy lucre;
language2_text: Ta o manoyong a yamahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to a yatomalamozong no kyokay am abo o karatan na. Ta iya rana am ji mapahama so nakem. Jyaoyaoyahen. Ji mapeyvazay so keyyop so saki. Ji mamakbak so tao. Ji mangamkam so nizpi no icyatatao na.

language1_text: but a lover of hospitality, a lover of good men, sober, just, holy, temperate;
language2_text: Isaray na o kapanaotao na so tao. Isaray na o kapanidong na so tao. Apzatan na o onowned na, kapiya na no icicirawat na. Akmey mazngang o onowned na a ji nala so nakenakem.

language1_text: holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught, that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers.
language2_text: Pangozayan na o manoyong a nanao a apo ji Ama ta do to. Ta ori o ipakananao na so amraralay ni Yeso a tao a kano mangalalas a ji manganwanoyong a tao.

language1_text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers, specially they of the circumcision:
language2_text: Ta yaro o tao a yaji manganoyong a yamapeyzavozavoz so ciring da a omalalas do manoyong a nanao. Da ipanci o beken a tao do Yotay a amyongkad do kataotao.

language1_text: whose mouths must be stopped, who subvert whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for filthy lucre's sake.
language2_text: Ji mo mamyapyan sira o akman sang a tao a meyzezyak an. Ta sira rana am da naknakmen o da kapangamkam so nizpi do icyatatao da. So na ikaro rana no tao do peykavakavahayan na nipeykaraherahet no malas a nanao da.

language1_text: One of themselves, even a prophet of their own, said, The Cretians are alway liars, evil beasts, slow bellies.
language2_text: Amyan so nipanci no asa ka meynakem a tao do Kedite no kakwa. Maniring ori am, "Sira mamimin o tao do Kedite a yamangalalas. So da ikatey manginanawa. Yatey malma sira. Da kakan so yada naknakmen."

language1_text: This witness is true. Wherefore rebuke them sharply, that they may be sound in the faith;
language2_text: Yabwata o kalalasan na no ciring na. Am ori o ji mo anigi nira ioya. Ta ori o ikanoyong no nakenakem da ji Ama ta do to,

language1_text: not giving heed to Jewish fables, and commandments of men, that turn from the truth.
language2_text: a kaji da nganoyngan do yamalas a kavavatanen da no tao do Yotay a kano yokoyokod da no ji nganoyong do nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Unto the pure all things are pure: but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure; but even their mind and conscience is defiled.
language2_text: Ta o ji meypinarek so onowned a tao am abo marahet jira kanekanen da. Am o meyraraten a ji manaralay a tao am abwata o asa ka vazay da apya, mangay do nakenakem da kano onowned da ji macipayok.

language1_text: They profess that they know God; but in works they deny him, being abominable, and disobedient, and unto every good work reprobate.
language2_text: O akman rana sang a tao am o ciriciring da am akmey macyanoyong ji Ama ta do to. Am o aktokto da am ori o omalalas jya. So ikanoyong da pacioyyan na ni Ama ta do to, do kaji da ngahapan so nanao na. So ikabwata no apya vazay a peyvazain da.

language1_text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:
language2_text: Am imo rana am ji mo palasa o ipanvavaga mo so amraralay ni Yeso a tao an. Ta to mo mangozai o manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: that the aged men be sober, grave, temperate, sound in faith, in charity, in patience.
language2_text: Vavagan mo sira o rarakeh a mahakay, ta apzatan da o onowned da an. Ji da pasala o nakenakem da ji Ama ta do to an. Ji sira hayo so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to. Ta naknakmen da o pangarilawan da so icyatatao da a kato da peykabobwan so alalaw da.

language1_text: The aged women likewise, that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness, not false accusers, not given to much wine, teachers of good things;
language2_text: Vavagan mo sira o rarakeh a mavakes a kapiya da so nakenakem. Ji sira manamwad. Ji da macikeyyani o saki. Ta naknakmen da o kapeycitacita da jira no malalavayo a mavavakes.

language1_text: that they may teach the young women to be sober, to love their husbands, to love their children,
language2_text: Nanawen da sira o malalavayo a mavavakes a marilaw no kahanghangan da kano ananak da.

language1_text: to be discreet, chaste, keepers at home, good, obedient to their own husbands, that the word of God be not blasphemed.
language2_text: Apzatan da o kataotao da a kateneng da meyvazay do kavavahay da apya so nakenakem a ji mapasobna do kahanghangan da. Ta ori o ji da rehrehci sya no tao so nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.
language2_text: Akman sang, ta vavagan mo sira o malalavayo a mahakay a amzat do kataotao da.

language1_text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine shewing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity,
language2_text: Imo rana am tana makakaday o vazay mo am ji ka rahet so icicirawat an. Ta manakem mo o kapeycitacita da jimo no tao. Makapiya ka so nakenakem a omnanao sira an.

language1_text: sound speech, that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed, having no evil thing to say of you.
language2_text: Ji mo palasa o ciring mo. Ta ori o ji da namwaji jimo no tao. No si makman ka sang am ji sira todasnek rana o macioya jyaten a tao a ji makakala so karatan ta, do kabo no kalalasan ta.

language1_text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters, and to please them well in all things; not answering again;
language2_text: Nanawen mo sira o peylamlamsoin da tao, kownot da do ciriciring no peyvazayan da tao. Ji sira mapatongtonggalan, ta kowyat da meyvazay a ipasaray da so lawpan da.

language1_text: not purloining, but shewing all good fidelity; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.
language2_text: Ji sira manakaw, ta ori o peyhanhanan da nira no mapeyvazay sira mahap so vazay na. No akman sang o makakaday a vazay a apiya am jyabo kaji da azwazwayan so nanao na ni Ama ta do to a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato a.

language1_text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men,
language2_text: Peyvazain ta o yamakakaday ang. Ta yarana mapengkad o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a mapatazadang jyaten a tao do karawan.

language1_text: teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world;
language2_text: O akman sang a pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to am ori o ipakateneng ta do kakaro ta do raten na ni Ama ta do to a vazay ta kano meykamadadayan a ikakza ta do karawan. So ipakateneng ta do kapzat ta do onowned ta a mapeypahagnat so nakenakem ta ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: looking for that blessed hope, and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;
language2_text: So ikanoyong ta mapananala so ipeygegcin na no Tao do to ta si Yeso Kizisto a kapacizanod ta somaray do azwazway na. Ta iya o mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato.

language1_text: who gave himself for us, that he might redeem us from all iniquity, and purify unto himself a peculiar people, zealous of good works.
language2_text: Na nipalit ni Yeso Kizisto no kataotao na o raraten ta. So ikaro ta rana do makakaday a ta pineyraratenan. So icyakma tamoy matnaw a ranom so onowned a omanod jya, mowyat a meyvazay so apya vazay.

language1_text: These things speak, and exhort, and rebuke with all authority. Let no man despise thee.
language2_text: Nanawen mo sira no yamakakaday a vazay. No myan so ivavaga mo jira kano oyaoyyan mo nira am manakem mo o yada kownot jimo a yamizngen so ciring. Ta ji mo akwan o kalavayo mo.

language1_text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers, to obey magistrates, to be ready to every good work,
language2_text: Pazimanen mo jira o kownot da do vazay no makayokod nira tao. Amizngen da o pipya vazay a ipanci da.

language1_text: to speak evil of no man, to be no brawlers, but gentle, shewing all meekness unto all men.
language2_text: Vavagan mo sira ji manamwad so icyatatao da, kaji da macivaivaitan. Manganyanig sira so tao. Ji sira mapahama so nakem do icyatatao da.

language1_text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish, disobedient, deceived, serving divers lusts and pleasures, living in malice and envy, hateful, and hating one another.
language2_text: Yaten rana no kakwa pa am abwata o katatenngan ta a ji mangamizing a akmey mavozaw pa so aktokto a to mangozangozay do onowned ta a makza no meycyamadadayan do karawan. So ikanoyong ta amyan pa do peyraratenan ta kano panginanehtan ta kano pasikaokaoyyan ta.

language1_text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared,
language2_text: O ipakateneng ta do pangangarilawan na kano pangangasyan na ni Ama ta do to am

language1_text: not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;
language2_text: na patazadangen yaten do teyngato, do na karilaw nyaten. So ikabeken na omaing do apya icicirawat ta. O Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to am ori o nikaro ta do raraten ta. So icyakma tey nimalikey a avayo rana so aktokto. So iyan na rana jyaten no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta.

language1_text: which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour;
language2_text: Si Yeso Kizisto am nimawakwak no raraten ta. Am ori o ji na ingbeywani do Seyzi a itoro na jyaten ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: that being justified by his grace, we should be made heirs according to the hope of eternal life.
language2_text: O pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to am ori o ikapya ta na so nakenakem jya, ta abwata rana o raraten ta do tangain na. So ikanoyong ta mapananala so kapakahap ta rana so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta.

language1_text: This is a faithful saying, and these things I will that thou affirm constantly, that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and profitable unto men.
language2_text: So ikabo no kalalasan no ciriciring eya. Pakanakmen mo a ipanci jira oya an, a kowyat da no amraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao a meyvazay so apiya vazay. Ta o akman rana sya vazay am tey yapya a makasidong so tao.

language1_text: But avoid foolish questions, and genealogies, and contentions, and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and vain.
language2_text: Am ji mo pasngena o kapacinekanekad da a macivaivait no iwawalam na ni Moyse a kano katatapilan nyo. Ta o akman rana sang am abo o peypeypangayan no akman sang.

language1_text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject;
language2_text: O yapwan no ipeygalagal a ipeyvwak da no sinjya a tao am ipidwa nyo sira pazimanen. No mirwa pa sira am to nyo na ngaroi sira.

language1_text: knowing that he that is such is subverted, and sinneth, being condemned of himself.
language2_text: Katenngan nyo an, ta o akman rana sang a tao am peymakarwan da o nanao na ni Ama ta do to. O yongkad no kalasan da am raraten da.

language1_text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee, or Tychicus, be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to winter.
language2_text: Ko naknakmen a tovoin si Atema no beken a si Ticiko a mangay jimo do dang. So ji mo meypahahai a mangay do Nikepodi a mapananala jyaken. Ta nipamnekan ko na o kato ko ngyanan do dang sicyamyan eya.

language1_text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently, that nothing be wanting unto them.
language2_text: Sidongen mo o mapacicici a tao a meyngaran si Sena kani Apolo a yaomavat do da kapangilili. So ikabo no kahamangan da palolwen.

language1_text: And let our's also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses, that they be not unfruitful.
language2_text: Ipanci mo do kakteh ta do cinai o kowyat da omhakakaw a amyaw no velek da a kasidong da so makasi a tao. Ji da nginara o to meyyowyaw a abwata so angangayan a tao.

language1_text: All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in the faith. Grace be with you all. Amen. It was written to Titus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Cretians, from Nicopolis of Macedonia.
language2_text: Da ipeyminaminasi imo no kararay ko do jya. Ipanci mo do akma tey kakteh do cinai a yamanaralay ni Yeso, ta namen ipeyminaminasi sira. Inaoy no si itoro na ni Ama ta do to o pangangarilawan na jinyo.

language1_text: Paul, a prisoner of Jesus Christ, and Timothy our brother, unto Philemon our dearly beloved, and fellowlabourer,
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pawlo ko. Yako akmey nimanakaw a tao a yada aptengen do yako kahap so vazay na ni Yeso Kizisto. Yaken a kani Timotay am namen ipeyteygami imo a akma nameney kakteh do cinai, mo Veydimeng,

language1_text: and to our beloved Apphia, and Archippus our fellowsoldier, and to the church in thy house:
language2_text: a kano yameyneynozi do vahay nyo a akma tey kakteh do cinai. So namen peyteygamyan no kakteh ta si Aveyya kano kararay namen a si Asipo a yamowyat a yamahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: grace to you, and peace, from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Inaoy no si itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na kano ikapiya no onowned nyo.

language1_text: I thank my God, making mention of thee always in my prayers,
language2_text: Imo rana akma nameney kakteh do cinai mo Veydimeng am no ko ipeynozi imo am yako isaray imo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: hearing of thy love and faith, which thou hast toward the Lord Jesus, and toward all saints;
language2_text: Ta ko mamizing o pangasyan mo so akma tey kakteh do cinai a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to a kano nakenakem mo ji Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: that the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus.
language2_text: Ko ipeynozi ji Ama ta do to o kapeyraporapong na jyaten do yata kakmey yasa a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to. So ipakateneng ta do makakaday a apya vazay a mamimin a apo ji Kizisto, do yata kapeyhanhan ni Kizisto a yasomidong jyaten.

language1_text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love, because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee, brother.
language2_text: O pangangarilawan mo, mo Veydimeng am yatey rako na nipasarayan jyaken, na nipaitan jyaken. So da ikamimin no akma tey kakteh do cinai a yasomaray nimo.

language1_text: Wherefore, though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient,
language2_text: Am ori an, no ko manoyong a akma moy kakteh do cinai do ta kapacikaop ji Kizisto am ji ko amwan nimo a pahanhanen a mahap so ciring ko.

language1_text: yet for love's sake I rather beseech thee, being such an one as Paul the aged, and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Ko katenngan o katey rako no pangarilawan mo so tao. Am ko ji gacigaci imo a manidong so tao, ta yako apyapyahen pa o kapasyasi ko jimo do kapanadnad ko jimo. Ta yako rarakeh rana a yada masangib a aptengen, do ko kahap so vazay na ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus, whom I have begotten in my bonds:
language2_text: O yako kakdain jimo am ikarilaw mo si Onaysemo an. Ta iya rana am akma koy anak ji Kizisto do ko iyan rana do pamemtengan. So ko icyakmey ama na do raralayan ta ni Ama ta do to, ta amizngen na o ninanao ko sya a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: which in time past was to thee unprofitable, but now profitable to thee and to me:
language2_text: No kakwa pa am abo o ilamnayan na jimo. Am sicyaikwaya am yana ilamnain rana imo a ka nyaken.

language1_text: whom I have sent again: thou therefore receive him, that is, mine own bowels:
language2_text: Ko na peysinaolin jimo sicyaikwaya si Onaysemo a mangay jimo do dang, a ney kaglaw ko akmey minapodpod jyaken.

language1_text: whom I would have retained with me, that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel:
language2_text: Ko kakdain o kato na ngyanan do katangked ko akmey kataotao mo a mapeyveyveken jyaken, do aptengan da jyaken a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring.

language1_text: but without thy mind would I do nothing; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity, but willingly.
language2_text: So ko kakdayan jimo a to meynakem nya ikarilaw. Taosya kasalit mo a marilaw nya. Am no si ji mo amya am cyaha, to ko macipanadngi imo.

language1_text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season, that thou shouldest receive him for ever;
language2_text: Ala nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to o mina kakaro na jimo so alikey ni Onaysemo. Am cyaha, ta ji na rana ngaro imo a mangay no makwa.

language1_text: not now as a servant, but above a servant, a brother beloved, specially to me, but how much more unto thee, both in the flesh, and in the Lord?
language2_text: Iya rana sicyakwaya am beken a lamlamsoy an. Ta iya rana am akma tey kakteh do cinai. O akman rana sang a vazay jyaken am manoyong ori an. Kakwakwan ko a imanngo rana do akman jimo. Ta inyo rana am lamlamsoy na rana inyo ni Yeso a akmey meyketeh do cinai.

language1_text: If thou count me therefore a partner, receive him as myself.
language2_text: Am ori an, no si anoyngan mo yaken a kagagan mo am akmey kataotao ko rana iya a taotawwen mo do vahay mo.

language1_text: If he hath wronged thee, or oweth thee ought, put that on mine account;
language2_text: No si myan so karatan na jimo a kano ji na pa nipaoli jimo a nizpi am to mo mimina padketen o ngaran ko. Ta torwan ko.

language1_text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand, I will repay it: albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides.
language2_text: So to ko na padkeci sya do teygami ya. Cyaha, ta yaken o tomoro jya. O ko ipanci a paolin mo jyaken am tana ji ko mancyan jimo am to mo na tenngi do onowned mo.

language1_text: Yea, brother, let me have joy of thee in the Lord: refresh my bowels in the Lord.
language2_text: Am ori o karilawan mo nyaken, mo Veydimeng, do ta kararalay ni Yeso Kizisto. So sidongan mo jyaken a pasarain so onowned.

language1_text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee, knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say.
language2_text: Ko anoyngan imo a omamizing jyaken. Ori o ko vatvatkan do teygami ya. Ko katenngan o karo no vazay mo do pahanhanan jimo.

language1_text: But withal prepare me also a lodging: for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you.
language2_text: Ipeykala mo pa yaken so asa ka vahay a isanan ko dang. Inaoy si amizngen na o inozi nyo ni Ama ta do to. So ipacitovong ko jinyo do dang.

language1_text: There salute thee Epaphras, my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus;
language2_text: Na ipeyminaminasi inyo no kararay ko a si Ipava do pamemtengan a yada aptengen do yanamen kahap so vazay na ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: Marcus, Aristarchus, Demas, Lucas, my fellowlabourers.
language2_text: Si Make a kani Aditako a kani Temase a kani Locya a kararay ko a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to am sira mamimin a yameyminaminasi ninyo.

language1_text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen. Written from Rome to Philemon, by Onesimus a servant.
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na jinyo.

language1_text: God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets,
language2_text: No kakwa pa am masangib si Ama ta do to a somapasapa so pazyazimanan na so ciriciring na do ineynapo ta. O ciriciring na rana am patwawen da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son, whom he hath appointed heir of all things, by whom also he made the worlds;
language2_text: Am sicyaikwaya am o Anak na ni Ama ta do to o nimapatwaw so ciriciring na jyaten. Si Yeso o nimangamamaog so karawan no ciring na ni Ama ta do to. So nitorwan na ni Ama ta do to no makakaday do karawan eya a italamozong ni Yeso.

language1_text: who being the brightness of his glory, and the express image of his person, and upholding all things by the word of his power, when he had by himself purged our sins, sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high;
language2_text: Yatomwaw jya o azwazway ni Ama ta do to. Iya rana am akma ney kataotao ni Ama ta do to. Na kalopkopen no oyowyat no ciring na o makakaday do karawan. Nikawakwak na o raraten no tao a kangay na rana do teyngato amlisna do wanan ni Ama ta do to a meypanirsirngen.

language1_text: being made so much better than the angels, as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they.
language2_text: Makarakarang pa o Anak ni Ama ta do to a kano tinsi. Yakman sang o ngaran na a na nitoro ni Ama ta do to do Anak na yamaharahara pa kano tinsi.

language1_text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time, Thou art my Son, This day have I begotten thee? And again, I will be to him a Father, And he shall be to me a Son?
language2_text: Abo asa ka tinsi a nipancyan na nya ni Ama ta do to so, "Imo am Anak ko imo an. So peylimwangan ko nimo a mapeyyama jyaken sicyaraw eya." Akman sang ta abo asa ka tinsi a pakacirngen na so, "Ama na yaken. Iya am Anak ko."

language1_text: And again, when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world, he saith, And let all the angels of God worship him.
language2_text: Am tovoin na o veyvowen na Anak ni Ama ta do to do karawan am maniring si Ama ta do to am, "Mamimin sira o tinsi a amraralay nya."

language1_text: And of the angels he saith, Who maketh his angels spirits, And his ministers a flame of fire.
language2_text: O mina ciring ni Ama ta do to a omagaz do tinsi am pahanhanen na sira akman so pagpag a kano apoy so kamamagenan.

language1_text: But unto the Son he saith, Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: A sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom.
language2_text: Am pagazen na ni Ama ta do to o ciring na do Anak na am, "Oyowyat mo a Tao do to a tomalamozong no tao do karawan am todangay do kaidan no karawan. Ta yaka ji mapeycyakaban so tao.

language1_text: Thou hast loved righteousness, and hated iniquity; Therefore God, even thy God, hath anointed theeWith the oil of gladness above thy fellows.
language2_text: O yapya vazay o mo ikakza. Mo ikaoya o malas a vazay. Am ori an, na ika yaken a Tao do to mo no yanimamnek jimo a yanimanta nimo so azwazway mo a kano sarasaray mo. So da ikabo no kararay mo a makahap jimo."

language1_text: And, Thou, Lord, in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth; And the heavens are the works of thine hands:
language2_text: Maniring pa am, "Mo Panirsirngen, imo niomamaog so karawan. Nyamaog mo o hanit no lima mo.

language1_text: They shall perish; but thou remainest: And they all shall wax old as doth a garment;
language2_text: Amyan so kasaraw a ikabalinas da. Am imo am to ka meyyonong. So ikanoyong da akmey ayob a mararalaw.

language1_text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up, And they shall be changed: But thou art the same, And thy years shall not fail.
language2_text: Akman so ayob o karawan a topin a kapalit mo rana so vayo. Am imo am ka jyablis a abo so pangavosan."

language1_text: But to which of the angels said he at any time, Sit on my right hand, Until I make thine enemies thy footstool?
language2_text: Ji na pa nipanci ni Ama ta do to do tinsi o, "Amlisna ka do wanan ko, mangay no si balinasen ko sira o macioya jimo a tao."

language1_text: Are they not all ministering spirits, sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation?
language2_text: Ikongo o tinsi. Sira rana am na kalamsoyan sira ni Ama ta do to a somidong so yarana makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da tao.

language1_text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard, lest at any time we should let them slip.
language2_text: Am ori an, peyyanan ta so nimamizing ta a nanao na ni Ama ta do to do onowned ta. Ta ori o ji ta macisyai do manoyong a nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast, and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward;
language2_text: O nipeylimwang no tinsi do ineynapo ta a iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to am yamanoyong rana. Ta sira rana yaji ngahap so nanao eya am yarana nimeydedna jira o peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: how shall we escape, if we neglect so great salvation; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord, and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him;
language2_text: No yamanoyong o akman sang am no si to ta nazibwan si Ama ta do to a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato am makongo ta tomayo no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta nipeylimwang na rana jyaten ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta o kavyay na jyaten ni Ama ta do to. So nipancyan da rana nya jyaten no nimakamizing sya tao.

language1_text: God also bearing them witness, both with signs and wonders, and with divers miracles, and gifts of the Holy Ghost, according to his own will?
language2_text: Yakman sang, ta nioyatan na sira ni Ama ta do to a mapeyvazay so makakaday a yamapeyzokab a vazay a yongkad no kanoyong no ipangnanao da. So yana ikakman sang ni Ama ta do to a yamangozay do nakem na a yamvonong so teneteneng a kano oyowyat no Seyzi do omanoyong jya tao a isidong da so icyatatao da.

language1_text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come, whereof we speak.
language2_text: O yaomanam a yana amaogen a vayo a karawan ni Ama ta do to am beken a tinsi o nipamnekan na a tomalamozong nya.

language1_text: But one in a certain place testified, saying, What is man, that thou art mindful of him? Or the son of man, that thou visitest him?
language2_text: Ta tao o nipamnekan na a tomalamozong nya, yakman so ciring a yadomket do Seysyo. Maniring am, "Mo Ama do to, ikongo da peypeypangayan no tao do karawan a yamo kanakenakem sira. Ikongo yamo peyveyveknan sira.

language1_text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels; Thou crownedst him with glory and honour, And didst set him over the works of thy hands:
language2_text: No kamaog mo sira am maveveveh pa sira kano tinsi. Am kanisomakop mo jira no azwazway mo,

language1_text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet. For in that he put all in subjection under him, he left nothing that is not put under him. But now we see not yet all things put under him.
language2_text: a tomalamozong no makakaday do karawan." O na ipanci do jya yakatalamozong no tao so makakaday am yamapengkad do jya o kabo no ji da nalamozongan no tao no makwa. Am ta jyacita sicyaikwaya o tao a yatomalamozong no meycyamadadayan.

language1_text: But we see Jesus, who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death, crowned with glory and honour; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man.
language2_text: Am o akman sang a vazay am nimangononong rana do mina katazak na tao ni Yeso a yamaveveveh pa kano tinsi. Am jya nimeyyonownay. Na pangozain ni Yeso o pangangasyan ni Ama ta do to so tao do karawan a mawakwak no raraten ta. So nipantan na nya ni Ama ta do to so azwazway na.

language1_text: For it became him, for whom are all things, and by whom are all things, in bringing many sons unto glory, to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings.
language2_text: O alalaw na ni Yeso Kizisto am ori o na nipazanodan jyaten akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to a macikasaray do azwazway na. Ta si Ama ta do to rana a nimangamaog so karawan a tomketken do karawan am yatey manoyong o vazay na. Ta si Yeso Kizisto o meypalanginan nyaten a mangay ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one: for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren,
language2_text: Na nivonas o raraten no tao do karawan. So yada rana ipacingay ji Kizisto a mapeyyama si Ama ta do to no yarana nimavonas so raraten a tao. Am ori o na rana ji macimasneki nira ni Yeso a akma ney kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: saying, I will declare thy name unto my brethren, In the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Mo Ama do to, ipeylimwang ko do akma koy kakteh o ngaran mo. Anooden ko imo do tangain no aro a tao."

language1_text: And again, I will put my trust in him. And again, Behold I and the children which God hath given me.
language2_text: Maniring pa am, "Ipeyhanhan ko si Ama ta do to." Maniring pa am, "Cita pala yamen a yamalovot do jya kano yana nitoro jyaken a yaomanod jyaken a tao."

language1_text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood, he also himself likewise took part of the same; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death, that is, the devil;
language2_text: Yaten rana akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to am tao ta do karawan. So nicyakman na jyaten ni Yeso a yamyan so kataotao. Am mawakwak rana o kataotao na ni Yeso am haragen na o oyowyat ni Satan a omwakwak so tao.

language1_text: and deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
language2_text: O jyojika na ni Yeso Kizisto am isidong na so manyahey no kawakwak da do karawan a tao a kabo na rana no ikanyahey da do ikamavyay da pa.

language1_text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels; but he took on him the seed of Abraham.
language2_text: Na ji nidonga o tinsi. Ta na sidongen yaten a sivosivovoong ni Apolahan.

language1_text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren, that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God, to make reconciliation for the sins of the people.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no kapeyngongyod na tao ni Yeso Kizisto am amyan rana so peyneynaran na sya do alalaw no tao do karawan a kapakateneng na rana do ahahapan na sya a marilaw nyaten a mapasyasi nyaten ji Ama ta do to, do ka iya na no ney manhama na mapatanatanang nyaten so nakem ta ji Ama ta do to. Am ori o ikanoyong ta na nivonas na rana ni Ama ta do to so raraten.

language1_text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.
language2_text: Ikongo do nimapeyneynara na rana o alalaw na kano littan na jya ni Satan, am ori o na ikanoyong a makasidong so littan ni Satan a tao.

language1_text: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;
language2_text: Inyo rana akma koy kakteh do cinai a yana rana nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a omanop jya am naknakmen nyo si Yeso a yana nitovoy ni Ama ta do to do teyrahem. Iya rana am ney manhama na mapatanatanang so nakem ta ji Ama ta do to a yata pangozayan a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also Moses was faithful in all his house.
language2_text: Si Yeso rana am na ji pasalai si Ama ta do to a yanimamnek jya, akman si Moyse a ji mapasala do vazay ni Ama ta do to a tomalamozong no amraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses, inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house.
language2_text: O tao rana mapatnek so vahay am arakorako pa o kazwayan na kano vahay na. Akman sang ta arakorako pa o kazwayan ni Yeso a kani Moyse.

language1_text: For every house is builded by some man; but he that built all things is God.
language2_text: Yamamimin o vahay a yanyamaog no lima no tao. Am si Ama ta do to am nimangamaog so makakaday.

language1_text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after;
language2_text: Ji mapasalasala si Moyse a lamlamsoy ni Ama ta do to do vazay na. So ikanoyong na no ciring na ni Moyse a meylimwang no meypanam pa ciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: but Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.
language2_text: Akman sang si Yeso Kizisto a ji mapasala do vazay ni Ama ta do to a tomalamozong no amraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao. Am iya am Anak na ni Ama ta do to. No ji ta hayo a meyhanhan nya a omapanala so nakem na jyaten no makwa am manoyong ta macikaop ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wherefore (as the Holy Ghost saith, To day if ye will hear his voice,
language2_text: Am ori o peycirngan na sya no Seyzi. Maniring am, "No si mamizing nyo o ciring na jinyo ni Ama ta do to sicyaraw eya am,

language1_text: Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, In the day of temptation in the wilderness:
language2_text: taosya o keynara nyo so ineynapo nyo a to nazibo no ciring na ni Ama ta do to a mapasobna jya a niomileylamdam sya do kabwan no nihakawan no tao.

language1_text: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, And saw my works forty years.
language2_text: Maniring si Ama ta do to am, Tana yarana makasikapat (40) so awawan o ineynapo nyo a yanimakacita so vazay ko am alalasan da pa yaken a askadan do yanan da.

language1_text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation, And said, They do alway err in their heart; And they have not known my ways.
language2_text: Am ori o nioyyan ko no tao no kanang. Maniring ko rana am, 'Da pasobnan yaken a ji ngamiznga so ciring.'

language1_text: So I sware in my wrath, They shall not enter into my rest.)
language2_text: To ko na mancyan o kapeyoyaoya ko a kaji da makaransan do ipanci ko a pamahamahan da."

language1_text: Take heed, brethren, lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief, in departing from the living God.
language2_text: Inyo rana akma koy kakteh do cinai am meypepzat kamo an. Ta kalittan o onowned no tatasa jinyo a meyparai do to meyyonong a Tao do to ta a ji manganoyong.

language1_text: But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.
language2_text: Mangday kamo do araraw a amvavaga do kadwan jinyo do yanyo ikavyay pa ya. Ta kalittan o tatasa jinyo a to nazibo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;
language2_text: No ji ta haha so nakem ji Ama ta do to am manoyong ta macizanod ji Kizisto a mahap so vazay na.

language1_text: while it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts, as in the provocation.
language2_text: Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "No si mamizing nyo o ciring na jinyo ni Ama ta do to sicyaraw eya am taosya o keynara nyo so ineynapo nyo a to nazibo nya a ji ngamizing si Ama ta do to."

language1_text: For some, when they had heard, did provoke: howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses.
language2_text: Sino sira o mapasobna a tao. O nyagag ni Moyse a tao saon apo do Ayci am.

language1_text: But with whom was he grieved forty years? was it not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?
language2_text: Sino sira o nioya ni Ama ta do to a makasikapat (40) so awawan. Sira saon o nimawakwak do kabwan no nihakawan no tao am, do kanimeyraraten da.

language1_text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest, but to them that believed not?
language2_text: Am sino sira o mina to na rana mamneki ni Ama ta do to a ji zagpit do pamahamahan da. O jya nimangamizing a tao saon am.

language1_text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief.
language2_text: Tamo katenngan o kaji da nimakatokodan so pamahamahan da a angayan na jira ni Ama ta do to, do kaji da manganoyngan.

language1_text: Let us therefore fear, lest, a promise being left us of entering into his rest, any of you should seem to come short of it.
language2_text: Am ori o naknakman nyo so kato nyo ngotokotan so nakem a omanoyong ji Ama ta do to. Ta no si ji kamo manganoyong am ji kamo macikaop ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For unto us was the gospel preached, as well as unto them: but the word preached did not profit them, not being mixed with faith in them that heard it.
language2_text: Tamo akman so ineynapo ta ang a yarana nimakamizing so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Am da ji meypapyan o da nimamizing a nanao na ni Ama ta do to. Ta da ji nganoyngi.

language1_text: For we which have believed do enter into rest, as he said, As I have sworn in my wrath, If they shall enter into my rest: although the works were finished from the foundation of the world.
language2_text: Yaten rana yamanganoyong a tao am manoyong o kapacikaop ta na ji Ama ta do to. Ta maniring si Ama ta do to am, "To ko na mancyan o kapeyoyaoya ko a kaji da makaransan do ipanci ko a pamahamahan da." Tana nimeycicinda no kakwa o keyyan no pamahamahan da no kakavos no karawan a nyamaog na ni Ama ta do to am ji da tokod o pamahamahan ang, ta ji da nganoyngi.

language1_text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise, And God did rest the seventh day from all his works.
language2_text: Amyan do Seysyo so asa ka vakong a yanan no makalavat so ikapito na araw. O domket dang am, "Nimeyvazay si Ama ta do to do kanem a araw a kapamahamaha na do ikapito na araw."

language1_text: And in this place again, If they shall enter into my rest.
language2_text: Maniring pa am, "To sira angay do kaidan no karawan o ji ko payaknengi sira."

language1_text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein, and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief:
language2_text: Sira rana nimanmanma makamizing so Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am ji da nimatokod o pamahamahan da. Ta ji da nyamizing si Ama ta do to. Am o tao rana a omanoyong ji Ama ta do to am macikaop sira ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: again, he limiteth a certain day, saying in David, To day, after so long a time; as it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, Harden not your hearts.
language2_text: Na rana vahangsowen do jya o na kapamnek ni Ama ta do to so kasaraw a yaipanci a "sicyaraw eya." Mownay am toywen na ni Tawey o ciring ni Ama ta do to. So na idket rana do Seysyo. Maniring am, "No si mamizing nyo sicyaraw eya o ciring na ni Ama ta do to am ji nyo a oyyan."

language1_text: For if Jesus had given them rest, then would he not afterward have spoken of another day.
language2_text: No si manoyong si Jyesoya a nimangay no aro a tao a mamahamaha do nipanci ni Ama ta do to a pamahamahan da am jyabo o kapakalavat na pa so kasaraw a ipakahap ta so nakem na jyaten ni Ama ta do to a.
