language1_text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually, that is, the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name.
language2_text: Am ori o ipangday ta so araraw a somaray ni Ama ta do to a nitomovoy si Yeso a nimangay mawakwak nyaten. O itoro ta ji Ama ta do to am apya anwanood ta a idmadmay ta sya.

language1_text: But to do good and to communicate forget not: for with such sacrifices God is well pleased.
language2_text: Ji nyo hamangi o kapanidong nyo so tao. Ta o akman rana so sang a vazay am akmey nakem ta patanangen ji Ama ta do to a isaray na.

language1_text: Obey them that have the rule over you, and submit yourselves: for they watch for your souls, as they that must give account, that they may do it with joy, and not with grief: for that is unprofitable for you.
language2_text: Onotan nyo o makayokod ninyo a tao do kyokay. Amizngen nyo o ciring da. Ta sira rana am da peyveyveknen o pahad nyo, do da kahap so vazay ni Ama ta do to. No si amizngen nyo sira am masasaray sira mahap so vazay ni Ama ta do to. Am no si ji nyo ngamiznga sira am meyngen o onowned da. No si akman sang am jyabo kapya nyo a.

language1_text: Pray for us: for we trust we have a good conscience, in all things willing to live honestly.
language2_text: Ji nyo amtadan yamen a ipeynozi. Ta namen anoyngan o kapya no vazay namen do tangain no tao a kani Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But I beseech you the rather to do this, that I may be restored to you the sooner.
language2_text: Ko kakzeben inyo a meynozi nyaken. Inaoy si makeykai na yaken ni Ama ta do to a tovoin a mangay jinyo do dang.

language1_text: Now the God of peace, that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus, that great shepherd of the sheep, through the blood of the everlasting covenant,
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to rana a yamanta nyaten so ikapiya no onowned ta am nipeyvangon na si Yeso a Panirsirngen ta do heseb na. Na rana nipangononongan ni Ama ta do to no rala ni Yeso o to meyyonong a pangozayan a ciring na. So na ikanoyong a tomalamozong nyaten aro a tao.

language1_text: make you perfect in every good work to do his will, working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight, through Jesus Christ; to whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to o makakaday a ileylamnay no nakem nyo a kowyat na jinyo a mahap so isaray na vazay. So ikanoyong nyo a mahap so nakenakem ni Ama ta do to, do nyo kararalay ni Yeso Kizisto. Inaoy si mangay o azwazway ji Kizisto mangay do kaidan no karawan. Amin.

language1_text: And I beseech you, brethren, suffer the word of exhortation: for I have written a letter unto you in few words.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ko inyo vavagan am pakamyamizngen nyo o ciring ko an. So na jyanaroi no ciring ko do teygami.

language1_text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty; with whom, if he come shortly, I will see you.
language2_text: Ko kakzeben inyo a makateneng do na kanimakowbot rana no kakteh ta a si Timotay do pamemtengan. No si makeykai rana mai am macihza jyaken a mangay tomita jinyo.

language1_text: Salute all them that have the rule over you, and all the saints. They of Italy salute you.
language2_text: Ipeyminaminasi nyo pa sira o yamyokod ninyo do kyokay a tao a kapeyminaminasi nyo pa no aro a sinjya. Da ipeyminaminasi inyo no kakteh ta yapo do Itadi.

language1_text: Grace be with you all. Amen. Written to the Hebrews from Italy by Timothy.
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na jinyo o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: James, a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ, to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad, greeting.
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Yake ko a lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Yako ipeyminaminasi o yamavonong do peycyavanovanwan na a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations;
language2_text: Manga kakteh, tana amyan so alalaw a mangay jinyo am somaray kamo an.

language1_text: knowing this, that the trying of your faith worketh patience.
language2_text: Ta no myan so alalaw nyo a kaji nyo rana ablisan so onowned ji Ama ta do to am ji nyo na nyaheyan o meyteytotoro a alalaw nyo. Ta mapeyneynara nyo na.

language1_text: But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
language2_text: Manakem nyo o kato nyo nazibwan no alalaw nyo. Ta ori o ikanoyong nyo a meypahagnat so nakenakem a abo so karatan.

language1_text: If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
language2_text: No amyan jinyo so makza no karapa do teneteneng na am makowyowyat pa mapasyasi ji Ama ta do to a kapanta na nya ni Ama ta do to so teneng na. Ta iya rana am tey mazonos a apiya so nakenakem a marilaw no mapasyasi jya tao.

language1_text: But let him ask in faith, nothing wavering. For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed.
language2_text: Am no meynozi kamo am to kamo ngotokot so onowned an. Ta o ji ngotokot so nakem a tao am akman so azda a ji meyhanahanang a pavyovyoten no pagpag.

language1_text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord. A double minded man is unstable in all his ways.
language2_text: O tao a ji ngotokot so nakem ji Ama ta do to am ji na tenngi o manoyong a zokzokan no nakenakem na. Ta abo mapsek a pamnekan na. O akman sang a tao am ji na ngakzeba o keyyan no mahap na ji Ama ta do to.O tao a ji ngotokot so nakem ji Ama ta do to am ji na tenngi o manoyong a zokzokan no nakenakem na. Ta abo mapsek a pamnekan na. O akman sang a tao am ji na ngakzeba o keyyan no mahap na ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted:
language2_text: Tana abo o peymeymasaodan no manaralay a tao am somaray, ta sidongen na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: but the rich, in that he is made low: because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away.
language2_text: Akman sang ahan. No akasen na ni Ama ta do to o peymeymasaodan da no omraralay nya tao am isaray da o akman sang an. Ta o peymeymasaodan no tao am akman so savong no tamek a mahayo a mababalinas.

language1_text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat, but it withereth the grass, and the flower thereof falleth, and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth: so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways.
language2_text: No domada o araw a kazidangdang no sinazawsaw na am ji meyyahahay a mahayo. Akman sang o meynakem a tao, ta makeykai a mababalinas.

language1_text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.
language2_text: No amyan so alalaw a kajyablisan so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to am tey masaray o akman sang a tao. Ta no jyablis o nakem na am mahap na o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na a nakem na sira ni Ama ta do to so amraralay nya tao.

language1_text: Let no man say when he is tempted, I am tempted of God: for God cannot be tempted with evil, neither tempteth he any man:
language2_text: No myan so tao a kalittan so nakenakem am ji na to patolina ji Ama ta do to amlita jya a meyraraten. Ta si Ama ta do to am abo makalita jya. Iya am ji manlita so tao.

language1_text: but every man is tempted, when he is drawn away of his own lust, and enticed.
language2_text: O kalittan a tao am littan no marahet a ikeykakza na do onowned na.

language1_text: Then when lust hath conceived, it bringeth forth sin: and sin, when it is finished, bringeth forth death.
language2_text: No amlida do onowned na o marahet a ikeykakza na am meytotwaw rana o raraten na. Ori rana am yapwan no kangay na do makotokotod a lila no apoy a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: Do not err, my beloved brethren.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, naknakmen nyo an.

language1_text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above, and cometh down from the Father of lights, with whom is no variableness, neither shadow of turning.
language2_text: O makakaday a yatey pipya a vazay am yamamimin a yapo ji Ama ta do to a yanimangamaog so araw a kano vehan a kano mata no hanit. Iya rana am jyabliblis so pamnemnekan.

language1_text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth, that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures.
language2_text: Na to mangozai o nakem na a manci nyaten akma ney anak. Ta yaten rana am ipeyhanhan ta o manoyong a nanao na. Am ori o yata iyan do ney manokdwan na do makakaday a nyamamaog na.

language1_text: Wherefore, my beloved brethren, let every man be swift to hear, slow to speak, slow to wrath:
language2_text: Manga kakteh, no mangamizing kamo so ciring no tao am taosya o kato nyo maciogtwan do ciring da jinyo. Ji kamo to meyoyaoya.

language1_text: for the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God.
language2_text: No meyoyaoya o tao am ji na rana tenngi a peyvazain o apya vazay a isaray na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness, and receive with meekness the engrafted word, which is able to save your souls.
language2_text: Am ori an, vonasan nyo so marahet a nakenakem nyo a kano marahet a icicirawat nyo a omonot ji Ama ta do to a omahap so ciriciring na a na akmey nipamowa do onowned nyo a mapatazadang jinyo do teyngato.

language1_text: But be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves.
language2_text: Taosya o kamizing so ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a ji peyvazaya. Ta o akman rana sang am alalasan o kataotao.

language1_text: For if any be a hearer of the word, and not a doer, he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass:
language2_text: O kamizing sya a ji mapeyvazay sya am akman so tao a tomita so avwavong na do kagami,

language1_text: for he beholdeth himself, and goeth his way, and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was.
language2_text: a makapengkad so lolit no moing na, kato na rana angayan, ji na rana nakem o kapeyramon na.

language1_text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty, and continueth therein, he being not a forgetful hearer, but a doer of the work, this man shall be blessed in his deed.
language2_text: Am beken a kamizing ta so Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta peyvazain ta o nimamizing ta a Ciriciring na a yamapahawa jyaten do peyraratenan ta. Ta o manoyong a mangozay jya tao am isaray na ni Ama ta do to o akman sang.

language1_text: If any man among you seem to be religious, and bridleth not his tongue, but deceiveth his own heart, this man's religion is vain.
language2_text: No myan so tao a mapakakdekdeng so nakem ji Ama ta do to a kaji na amzatan do ciring na am alalasan na o kataotao na. So ikabo no peypeypangayan na no kararalay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep himself unspotted from the world.
language2_text: O ipanci na ni Ama ta do to a manoyong a omraralay nya tao am ji manginanahet do nimasbang a kano vao a mavakes a makapzat do onowned na, ji macikza do tao do karawan a meyraraten.

language1_text: My brethren, have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ, the Lord of glory, with respect of persons.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, no kamo manoyong a yamraralay ni Yeso Kizisto a yatey mazway a Panirsirngen ta am taosya o kapeycyakaban nyo so tao.

language1_text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring, in goodly apparel, and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment;
language2_text: No amyan so meynakem a tao a meygagaling so ovay a meyyayob so apipiya ayob a makaranes do panaralayan nyo a kai no makasi a tao a mapisipising so ayob am

language1_text: and ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing, and say unto him, Sit thou here in a good place; and say to the poor, Stand thou there, or sit here under my footstool:
language2_text: no si teywara o anyanig mo so apiya so ayob a tao a manci no, "Lisna do jya, mo keypong," a kapanci mo nya do makasi a tao so, "Kangay mo do kwang a amlisna."

language1_text: are ye not then partial in yourselves, and are become judges of evil thoughts?
language2_text: No si makman kamo sang am malas o nakenakem nyo, do kapeycyakaban nyo so tao.

language1_text: Hearken, my beloved brethren, Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith, and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him?
language2_text: Amizngen nyo manga keypong an. Na nitenngan ni Ama ta do to sira o makasi a tao do karawan a makdeng so nakem a omraralay nya. So da ikanoyong a makahap so nakem na sira ni Ama ta do to a macikaop rana do italamozong na.

language1_text: But ye have despised the poor. Do not rich men oppress you, and draw you before the judgment seats?
language2_text: Am inyo rana am nyo panyanigen sira o yamakasi a tao. Am o yamapasnesnek jinyo a yamangay ninyo do pacicicyan am sira o katenngan a tao a yaro so nizpi.

language1_text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called?
language2_text: Sira rana o katenngan a tao a aro so nizpi am da rehrehten o mazway a ngaran ni Yeso Kizisto a nyo pacingaranan.

language1_text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture, Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself, ye do well:
language2_text: No si manoyong kamo a mangozay do ciring do Seysyo am, "To mo mangozai o aryarilaw mo so kataotao mo a marilaw no icyatatao mo." Ta ori rana am ney makdeng na a iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to. No si peyvazain nyo ori am manoyong kamo na so ahahapan sya.

language1_text: but if ye have respect to persons, ye commit sin, and are convinced of the law as transgressors.
language2_text: Am no si mapeycyakaban kamo so tao am raraten nyo ori. So ikanoyong nyo a pazasingen no iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to do meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law, and yet offend in one point, he is guilty of all.
language2_text: Tana asa nipasobnan no tao do iwawalam am akma ney to zagoma o iwawalam a nipasobnan.

language1_text: For he that said, Do not commit adultery, said also, Do not kill. Now if thou commit no adultery, yet if thou kill, thou art become a transgressor of the law.
language2_text: Ta o yamanci no kaji mapasagpyanan so kataotao am ipanci na o kaji mangapan so tao. Tana ji ka mangap so tao a kasagpyan mo so aktokto am pavilangen na imo a meyraraten a mapasobna do iwawalam na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: So speak ye, and so do, as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty.
language2_text: Am ori an, apzatan ta do ciring ta kano icicirawat ta. Ta katenngan ta o kapacici na jyaten ni Ama ta do to. Am cyaha, ji ta nyaheyan, ta onotan ta o Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a yamapahawa jyaten do peyraratenan ta.

language1_text: For he shall have judgment without mercy, that hath shewed no mercy; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment.
language2_text: Ta no mapacici si Ama ta do to am ji na arilawan sira o ji mangarilaw a tao. Ta o mangarilaw so icyatatao na o avyain na. So ikabo no ikanyahey da no mangarilaw a tao do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: What doth it profit, my brethren, though a man say he hath faith, and have not works? can faith save him?
language2_text: Manga kakteh, no myan so tao a manci no kakdeng na so nakem ji Ama ta do to a kaji na mapatwawan sya do icicirawat na am ikongo peypeypangayan no akman sang so nakem ji Ama ta do to. Manngwa, ikavyay no pahad na o akman sang?

language1_text: If a brother or sister be naked, and destitute of daily food,
language2_text: No myan jinyo so akma nyoy kakteh do cinai a ji makarapya do kanen da abo so ayob am,

language1_text: and one of you say unto them, Depart in peace, be ye warmed and filled; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body; what doth it profit?
language2_text: manngwa, kasirisiring nyo sira a manci no, "Makapiya kamo so kataotao. Inaoy si mabsoy kamo. Inaoy si myan so ayob nyo," kwan nyo a abo so isidong sira am ikongo ayyaingan no akman sang.

language1_text: Even so faith, if it hath not works, is dead, being alone.
language2_text: Akman sang o nakenakem ta si Ama ta do to. Ta no ji ta patwawa do icicirawat ta am akmey ji ta manaralay a tao.

language1_text: Yea, a man may say, Thou hast faith, and I have works: shew me thy faith without thy works, and I will shew thee my faith by my works.
language2_text: Ala no maniring o tatasa ka tao am, "Imo am ka makdeng so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to. Yaken am yako apiya so vazay." No si maniring ko am, "Pacittan pala jyaken o nakenakem mo si Ama ta do to. Am yaken am to mo na cita do apya vazay ko. Ta ori o ipakateneng mo do nakenakem ko si Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Thou believest that there is one God; thou doest well: the devils also believe, and tremble.
language2_text: Apya o kanoyong ta ji Ama ta do to a abo so ikararwa. Am ji pa makanet o akman sang. Ta tana o kalamsoyan ni Satan am anoyngan da o keyyan na ni Ama ta do to. Am kazikzik da a manyahey nya.

language1_text: But wilt thou know, O vain man, that faith without works is dead?
language2_text: Nyo jyatenngi o kabo no peypeypangayan no ji mangononong do nakenakem na ji Ama ta do to?

language1_text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works, when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar?
language2_text: Nimakongo si Apolahan a ineynapo ta kabnek na sya ni Ama ta do to a abo so raraten do tangain na. Manngwa, yaji monganay do kaniomonot na ji Ama ta do to a nitomoro no anak na a meyngaran so Isa?

language1_text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works, and by works was faith made perfect?
language2_text: Si Apolahan rana am no mangay o kapeyhanhan na ni Ama ta do to am mangay o kapatwaw na sya do vazay na.

language1_text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith, Abraham believed God, and it was imputed unto him for righteousness: and he was called the Friend of God.
language2_text: Nimangononong rana o ciring eya, ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Nipeyhanhan na ni Apolahan si Ama ta do to. Am ori o nibnekan na sya ni Ama ta do to a abo so raraten do tangain na" a akma ney kagagan.

language1_text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified, and not by faith only.
language2_text: Am ori an, o abnekan na jyaten a abo so raraten ta do tangain na ni Ama ta do to am omagaz do kapatwaw ta sya do icicirawat ta. So ji na veyvowi no nakenakem ta sya, ta pazagomen ta o kapeyvazay ta sya.

language1_text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works, when she had received the messengers, and had sent them out another way?
language2_text: Akman sang si Laha a nisomagpyan a mavakes. O nibnekan na sya abo so raraten do tangain na ni Ama ta do to am nitaotao na o nitovoy da no tao do Yotay a mangamizing a kasidong na pa sira mapasala so angayan da rarahan a tomayo no omwakwak sira tao.

language1_text: For as the body without the spirit is dead, so faith without works is dead also.
language2_text: Akman so kataotao ta. Ta no ji rana ngineynawa o tao am mawakwak o akman sang. Akman sang o nakenakem ta ji Ama ta do to. Ta no ji peyvazaya am abo o peypeypangayan no akman sang.

language1_text: My brethren, be not many masters, knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation.
language2_text: Manga kakteh, ji nyo ngakdaya o kamimin nyo a mangnanao. Ta o mangnanao so tao am arakorako pa o oyyan na nira ni Ama ta do to, no si meyraraten sira, kano ji mangnanao a tao.

language1_text: For in many things we offend all. If any man offend not in word, the same is a perfect man, and able also to bridle the whole body.
language2_text: Abo jyaten eya o jya nimalas so vazay. Am o tao a ji mapatwaw so marahet a ciring am manoyong o akman sang a abo so karatan, do kapakapzat na do lila na kano kataotao na.

language1_text: Behold, we put bits in the horses' mouths, that they may obey us; and we turn about their whole body.
language2_text: O ta pangayan so ovid do ngongoy no baka am ipakataid ta do baka a omonot jyaten.

language1_text: Behold also the ships, which though they be so great, and are driven of fierce winds, yet are they turned about with a very small helm, whithersoever the governor listeth.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo pala o avang. Tana yarako o kavavang na yana pavyovyoten no rako a pagpag do karakwan no awa am yalikey saon o savilak na yasomavilak sya do na angangayan.

language1_text: Even so the tongue is a little member, and boasteth great things. Behold, how great a matter a little fire kindleth!
language2_text: Yakman sang o lila ta tao. Tana yalikey am yateywara o na patwawen a ciring. Naknakmen nyo pala o apoy. Tana alikey o apoy a amlila am to na lanata pa o rako a kahasan.

language1_text: And the tongue is a fire, a world of iniquity: so is the tongue among our members, that it defileth the whole body, and setteth on fire the course of nature; and it is set on fire of hell.
language2_text: O lila ta am akman rana so apoy. O lila rana ya am ney marahet na do peyvongvongwan ta. Ta yamapatwaw so akmey lila no apoy do kararatan a yamrahet so kangangay ta.

language1_text: For every kind of beasts, and of birds, and of serpents, and of things in the sea, is tamed, and hath been tamed of mankind:
language2_text: Katenngan no tao o makakaday a nyamamaog ni Ama ta do to a italamozong a yananawen. Kakwakwan no masosozi a omalalam a kano meyyasasalap a kano volay a kano amowamong a yada mananaoo.

language1_text: but the tongue can no man tame; it is an unruly evil, full of deadly poison.
language2_text: Am o lila no tao am abo o makananao sya. So ikatey marahet no lila no tao a jyananao. So ikanoyong na akmey makawawakwak so tao.

language1_text: Therewith bless we God, even the Father; and therewith curse we men, which are made after the similitude of God.
language2_text: Tamo anwanooden no lila ta si Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta. So tamo pangavayan no lila ta so tao a nyamamaog na ni Ama ta do to akman sya so kamamagenan.

language1_text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing. My brethren, these things ought not so to be.
language2_text: Yasa ka ngoso ta o na yapwan no ta sarayan ni Ama ta do to, ta pangavayan so tao. Manga kakteh, taosya o kamirpirwa ta pa mapatwaw no lila ta so marahet.

language1_text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter?
language2_text: O atbod am ji voyog dang o makopad a kano maganinem a ranom.

language1_text: Can the fig tree, my brethren, bear olive berries? either a vine, figs? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh.
language2_text: O acyai, manga kakteh, am ji meyyasi so vineveh. O vazacinok am ji meyyasi so anyoy. O attaw am ji voyog dang o matavang a ranom.

language1_text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom.
language2_text: Sino jinyo o yamateneng a tao. No si myan am apyapya o kapehbo na so nakem na a mapeyvazay so apiya vazay.

language1_text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts, glory not, and lie not against the truth.
language2_text: Am no si amyan do onowned nyo so manginanahet a kano masicyakaoya kano mararaten am ji kamo na mapazway so nakem. Taosya o kapakateneteneng nyo.

language1_text: This wisdom descendeth not from above, but is earthly, sensual, devilish.
language2_text: Ta o akman rana sang a teneng am beken a apo do teyngato, ta apo do tao do teyrahem. So ikamonganay na do karawan a kano kalamsoyan ni Satan.

language1_text: For where envying and strife is, there is confusion and every evil work.
language2_text: O yanan na no manginanahet a kano mararaten am manoyong keyyan na do onowned da no meyzavozavoz a vazay a kano makakaday a raraten.

language1_text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure, then peaceable, gentle, and easy to be intreated, full of mercy and good fruits, without partiality, and without hypocrisy.
language2_text: O apo rana do teyngato a teneng am o manma na vazay am ji meylimoteng so nakem. O tomonton am mapeypapya so onowned no tao. Apiya o nakem na do icyatatao na. Ji mapakarang so nakem. Mangarilaw so tao. Abo marahet do onowned na. Ji mapeycyakaban so tao. Ji mangalalas.

language1_text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace.
language2_text: O makakaday a apiya vazay am akma ney asi no nipamowa a nanao ni Ama ta do to do onowned no tao a mapeypapya so onowned da kano icyatatao da.

language1_text: From whence come wars and fightings among you? come they not hence, even of your lusts that war in your members?
language2_text: Do wanjin na kapwan no yamapeyliliman jinyo. Manngwa, beken a yapo do malas a onowned nyo?

language1_text: Ye lust, and have not: ye kill, and desire to have, and cannot obtain: ye fight and war, yet ye have not, because ye ask not.
language2_text: Nyo ikakza o karo no makadpeh jinyo. Am no yanyo jyahap am nyo naknakmen o nyo kapangap so tao. Yateywara o pangangagoman nyo am nyo kaji makahapan sya. Am ori o nyo ipeygalagalagal. Am o yanyo ji makahapi sya am nyo ji ngamya ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Ye ask, and receive not, because ye ask amiss, that ye may consume it upon your lusts.
language2_text: No nyo amin ji Ama ta do to am nyo jyahap. Ta yamalas o aktokto nyo. Ta o kataotao nyo o nyo naknakmen.

language1_text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses, know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.
language2_text: To kamo makasi yaomalalas ji Ama ta do to a tao. Ta manngwa, nyo jyatenngi o kapeykavosoyan na si Ama ta do to no meyparai jya so nakem a tao? So ji na alasi no akman sang a tao a mapeykavosoyan si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain, The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy?
language2_text: Ji nyo akwan o kalas na no ciring do Seysyo a manci no kaji na mamyapyan nyaten no Seyzi amyan do onowned ta a mapatarek so iraralay ta.

language1_text: But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble.
language2_text: Ta arakorako pa o sidongan na jyaten ni Ama ta do to. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Ji na nidonga ni Ama ta do to o mapahama so nakem na tao. Apyapyahen na pa sidongen sira o mapaveveh so nakem da tao."

language1_text: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
language2_text: Am ori an, onotan nyo ji Ama ta do to. Pasobnan nyo si Satan a kakaro na rana jinyo.

language1_text: Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.
language2_text: Macikasngen kamo ji Ama ta do to a kapacikasngen na jinyo. Inyo a yameycyakawad so nakem ji Ama ta do to a tao am ablisan nyo na o malas a onowned nyo a kaji nyo na meylimotngan so onowned.

language1_text: Be afflicted, and mourn, and weep: let your laughter be turned to mourning, and your joy to heaviness.
language2_text: Amlavi kamo a meyngen so onowned a komaro do peyraratenan nyo.

language1_text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up.
language2_text: Pavevehen nyo o nakem nyo do tangain na ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori o peypakatkatan na so onowned nyo.

language1_text: Speak not evil one of another, brethren. He that speaketh evil of his brother, and judgeth his brother, speaketh evil of the law, and judgeth the law: but if thou judge the law, thou art not a doer of the law, but a judge.
language2_text: Ji kamo maciraherahet, manga kakteh an. No amyan so tao a amraherahet so kakteh na do cinai am akma ney to rehrehta o Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. No rehrehten nyo o Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am manoyong o kapasobna nyo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: There is one lawgiver, who is able to save and to destroy: who art thou that judgest another?
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to o manci no apya kano marahet a vazay. So ika iya na no mapacici. Iya o mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato. So ika iya na no mapasingsingkad. Sino ka a yamakadket do akma moy kakteh do cinai a yarehrehten.

language1_text: Go to now, ye that say, To day or to morrow we will go into such a city, and continue there a year, and buy and sell, and get gain:
language2_text: Ala no maniring kamo am, "Mangay ta sicyaraw eya ka simaraw a meyyowyaw do teyhesa ka ili a kapeyyawan ta dang a meyvazay a meynizpi."

language1_text: whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.
language2_text: Am to ko na macitangayan jinyo am ji nyo a tenngi o inawan nyo simaraw an. Ta akman kamo so aob a ji meyyahahay a meyyopowpas.

language1_text: For that ye ought to say, If the Lord will, we shall live, and do this, or that.
language2_text: Apyapya o kapanci nyo no, "No si apyahen na ni Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta am amyan ta pa a mapeyvazay so makakaday a vazay."

language1_text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings: all such rejoicing is evil.
language2_text: Am ikeykongo kamo eya a yato mapahama so nakem a ji mangozay do nakenakem na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. O mapazway rana ya am malas ya a vazay.

language1_text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.
language2_text: Am ori an, o tao rana a makateneng do apya vazay a kaji na mapeyvazayan sya am raraten o akman sang.

language1_text: Go to now, ye rich men, weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you.
language2_text: Inyo rana yakatenngan a tao am amizngen nyo o ciring ko. Amlavi kamo a peydednan no alalaw.

language1_text: Your riches are corrupted, and your garments are motheaten.
language2_text: Mavozcin jinyo o peymeymasaodan nyo. Mangay kapeykamyamil no ayob nyo.

language1_text: Your gold and silver is cankered; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you, and shall eat your flesh as it were fire. Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days.
language2_text: Mangay karaci no nizpi nyo. O raci no nizpi nyo am yongkad no kababayo nyo. So icyakma ney apoy no nizpi nyo a ombalinas jinyo. Ikeykongo kamo a yato ngimong no kangangay nyo, do yana ikakeykai rana no araraw no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Behold, the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields, which is of you kept back by fraud, crieth: and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth.
language2_text: Nyo jingneta o nizpi da no yameyvazay do hakawan nyo. Amizngey kamo o da iraherahet jinyo a kano da pasyasyan. Ta na rana nimamizing ni Ama ta do to o da lavyan.

language1_text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth, and been wanton; ye have nourished your hearts, as in a day of slaughter.
language2_text: Yateywara o yanyo sarayan no peymeymasaodan nyo do karawan. So yanyo icyakmey vinyay a tey matatava a yameypanam a da ipamaring so kanen.

language1_text: Ye have condemned and killed the just; and he doth not resist you.
language2_text: Nyo pananakawen sira o yamakasi a tao. Nyo kawakwak pa siraha, do da kabo no oyowyat a yamapatonggal jinyo.

language1_text: Be patient therefore, brethren, unto the coming of the Lord. Behold, the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth, and hath long patience for it, until he receive the early and latter rain.
language2_text: Am ori manga kakteh an, ji nyo macimangsahi a omapananala si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta mai. To nyo nita o omhakakaw a tao a ji macimangseh a mapanala so cimoy a mapasaod so nihakawan na.

language1_text: Be ye also patient; stablish your hearts: for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh.
language2_text: Akman sang an, to kamo ngotokot so nakem a mapananala so araraw na no yai na ni Yeso Kizisto. Ta yarana makeykai o araraw no na yai.

language1_text: Grudge not one against another, brethren, lest ye be condemned: behold, the judge standeth before the door.
language2_text: Ji nyo oyyan o kadwan jinyo, manga kakteh an, ta ioya na inyo ni Ama ta do to. So na rana ikakeykai a mai no yamapeykapyapinpin jyaten a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: Take, my brethren, the prophets, who have spoken in the name of the Lord, for an example of suffering affliction, and of patience.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo sira o yamangozay do ngaran na ni Ama ta do to a yamnoyonoyo so ciring na tao an. Ta inarahen nyo sira a tongbo so alalaw da an.

language1_text: Behold, we count them happy which endure. Ye have heard of the patience of Job, and have seen the end of the Lord; that the Lord is very pitiful, and of tender mercy.
language2_text: Tamo ipanci sira tey masaray a tao an, do da kajya haywan no yamyan so alalaw da an. Nimamizing nyo rana si Yepo a jya nimablis so onowned no keyyan no alalaw na. So nyo ipakateneng do kato na ngavosan no alalaw na nisidong na ni Ama ta do to. Ta si Ama ta do to rana am tey rako o pangangarilawan na kano pangangasyan na.

language1_text: But above all things, my brethren, swear not, neither by heaven, neither by the earth, neither by any other oath: but let your yea be yea; and your nay, nay; lest ye fall into condemnation.
language2_text: O ney makdeng na, manga kakteh am taosya o kapacipeyyeyyan nyo so nakem do teyrahem. Ta manoyong saon am manoyong am. O malas saon am malas am. Ta no si makman kamo sang am jyabo kaoya na ninyo ni Ama ta do to a.

language1_text: Is any among you afflicted? let him pray. Is any merry? let him sing psalms.
language2_text: No myan jinyo so makasazi so alalaw am meynozi an. No masaray kamo am meyyanwanood kamo an a somaray nya ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Is any sick among you? let him call for the elders of the church; and let them pray over him, anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord:
language2_text: No myan jinyo so meyngen am ipanci na sira o panipanirsirngen do kyokay a meynozi nya a kapangozay da do ngaran na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a komoris jya no haneng.

language1_text: and the prayer of faith shall save the sick, and the Lord shall raise him up; and if he have committed sins, they shall be forgiven him.
language2_text: No ipeyhanhan nyo o ngaran na am mavoga na o ingingnen na no makaliliw sya tao. So ikanoyong na rana nikeywakwakan so kataotao. No myan so raraten no tao ori am todavonas rana.

language1_text: Confess your faults one to another, and pray one for another, that ye may be healed. The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
language2_text: Patwawen nyo o kalasan nyo do kadwan jinyo a kapeynozi nyo no kadwan jinyo a keywakwak jinyo. Ta tey rako o oyowyat no inozi no apiya so nakenakem a tao.

language1_text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are, and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain: and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months.
language2_text: Meyyangay ta tao a kani Idiya. Ikongo do tey makdeng a meynozi no kaji na cimoyan, am ori o ikanoyong na jya nimacimoy a kasisi so ikapat a kawan.

language1_text: And he prayed again, and the heaven gave rain, and the earth brought forth her fruit.
language2_text: Meynozi pa am makas rana o cimoy apo do teyngato. Ori o nipakapiya na rana nimlida no nihakawan da.

language1_text: Brethren, if any of you do err from the truth, and one convert him;
language2_text: Manga kakteh, no si myan jinyo so nimavozaw a nikomaro rana do nanao na ni Ama ta do to a keyyan no tao a mapeysinaoli sya am,

language1_text: let him know, that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death, and shall hide a multitude of sins.
language2_text: manakem nyo an. O tao a nimapaoli so akma ney kakteh do cinai a apo do peyraratenan na am manoyong o akman sang a tao a niomagag sya do peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to, do kanimavonas na rana no aro a raraten na.

language1_text: Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia, and Bithynia,
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Pite ko a lamlamsoy na ni Yeso Kizisto a nipamnekan na a omlivolivon no ciriciring na. Yako ipeyteygami inyo a yana yaponged ni Ama ta do to a nikomaro do ili nyo a yameyvahay do Pento a kado Cyalatay a kado Kapatocya kado Yasiya kado Potiniya.

language1_text: elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father, through sanctification of the Spirit, unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ: Grace unto you, and peace, be multiplied.
language2_text: Nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to o yana kanimapanop jinyo a omanoyong ji Yeso. So yanyo ikanoyong rana a yana nyavayo no Seyzi so onowned a yaomonot ji Yeso Kizisto, do kanimvonas na so raraten nyo no rala na. Inaoy si arakorako pa o pangangarilawan na kano apiya onowned nyo a itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead,
language2_text: Isaray takamo si Ama ta do to a Ama na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Ta yatey rako o pangangasyan na a yanimanta nyaten so vayo a onowned ta, do yana kanimapeyvangon si Yeso Kizisto do heseb na. So anoyngan ta do akman sang a oyowyat ni Ama ta do to a mapeyvangon jyaten no makwa.

language1_text: to an inheritance incorruptible, and undefiled, and that fadeth not away, reserved in heaven for you,
language2_text: So tamo ikanoyong a yaomamoon so peymeymasaodan na ni Ama ta do to a omanoyong jya tao. To meyyonong o itoro na jinyo do teyngato ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time.
language2_text: Ori rana am itoro na ni Ama ta do to do meyhanhan nya tao, do kapzat na jira ni Ama ta do to no oyowyat na a kaji da na vozawan a mangay do ikarateng no araraw no ipatazadang na sira do teyngato.

language1_text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice, though now for a season, if need be, ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations:
language2_text: Ori o sarayan nyo nya an. Tana yaro pa o alalaw nyo sicyaikwaya am cyaha, ta ji meyyonownay o akman sang a mavitos.

language1_text: that the trial of your faith, being much more precious than of gold that perisheth, though it be tried with fire, might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ:
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no alalaw nyo am ipakateneng jinyo a manoyong so nakem ji Ama ta do to. Mapaonag no apoy o ovay. Am o nakenakem nyo ji Ama ta do to am jyabo kaji nakdekdengan pa kano ovay a jyagonay a. So ji na alasi no keyleylamdam na so onowned nyo ni Ama ta do to. No si ji kamo a hayo am mahap nyo rana o kazwayan nyo no marateng rana o araraw no yai na ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing, ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory:
language2_text: Tana nyo jyacita si Yeso Kizisto sicyaikwaya am nyo katenngan o nyo kararalay nya. Abo rana o ciriciring jinyo, ta kamo tey masaray rana so onowned.

language1_text: receiving the end of your faith, even the salvation of your souls.
language2_text: Ta nyo na nimahap o patazadangan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Ori rana am kakownongan na ori no nakem nyo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Of which salvation the prophets have enquired and searched diligently, who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you:
language2_text: Sira rana panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a tao no kakwa am nimanakem da o kakala da so peypeypangayan no kapatazadang na so tao do teyngato ni Ama ta do to. So nipakalavatan da so sang a itoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: searching what, or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify, when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ, and the glory that should follow.
language2_text: O Seyzi na ni Kizisto amyan jira am ori o nipaziman jira so keyyan no alalaw ni Kizisto a kapakaranes na rana no kazwayan na. Am ori o nipakanakman da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to so kapakateneng da do araraw na kano agcigcinan na no vazay ang.

language1_text: Unto whom it was revealed, that not unto themselves, but unto us they did minister the things, which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven; which things the angels desire to look into.
language2_text: Nipaziman na rana ni Ama ta do to do panoyonoywan na so ciring a tao o ka beken na monganay jira no ipanci da vazay. Ta monganay jinyo a omanoyong jya. Am sicyaikwaya am na rana nioyatan sira no Seyzi o yameylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring jinyo. Am o da ipeylimwang ori am mangay do tinsi o yamakza nya a katenngan.

language1_text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind, be sober, and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ;
language2_text: Am ori o ipeytataziman nyo a mahap so vazay na ni Ama ta do to a meyhanhan nya a manta ninyo so aryarilaw na no mai rana si Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: as obedient children, not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance:
language2_text: Onotan nyo si Ama ta do to. Ji nyo to nginara o marahet a icicirawat nyo no kaji nyo pa manaralayan.

language1_text: but as he which hath called you is holy, so be ye holy in all manner of conversation;
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo o kaji nyo mapazavozan so marahet a vazay nyo. Ta si Ama ta do to a yanimapanop jinyo am yabo jiya o marahet.

language1_text: because it is written, Be ye holy; for I am holy.
language2_text: Maniring do Seysyo am, "Ji kamo meylimoteng so onowned an. Ta yaken rana am ji ko meylimoteng so onowned a Tao do to."

language1_text: And if ye call on the Father, who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man's work, pass the time of your sojourning here in fear:
language2_text: No kamo meynozi am nyo abneken si Ama ta do to a Ama nyo. Iya rana am ji mapeycyakaban a yamanita so mina vazay no tao. Am ori o panadnadan nyo sya an, do iyan nyo pa do karawan.

language1_text: forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things, as silver and gold, from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers;
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo o kaji na nitombosan jinyo ni Ama ta do to no monganay jinyo a ovay, do nyamoon nyo a malas a icicirawat no ineynapo nyo no kakwa.

language1_text: but with the precious blood of Christ, as of a lamb without blemish and without spot:
language2_text: Ta o na nitbos jinyo ni Ama ta do to do nyo peyraratenan am rala na ni Yeso Kizisto, akman so icicirawat da no mapatanatanang so nakem ji Ama ta do to a mapatanang so rala no ney yapya na kagling da.

language1_text: who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world, but was manifest in these last times for you,
language2_text: Ji na pa nyamaog o karawan am nipamnekan na rana si Yeso ni Ama ta do to a mawakwak no raraten no tao do karawan. So na ikanoyong rana a nimai a somidong jinyo.

language1_text: who by him do believe in God, that raised him up from the dead, and gave him glory; that your faith and hope might be in God.
language2_text: Iya o yanyo ipakateneng rana ji Ama ta do to a nimapeyvangon sya do heseb na a nimanta nya so azwazway na. Am ori o nyo rana to ngotokoci so nakem ji Ama ta do to a omanoyong do akman sang a oyowyat na a mapeyvangon jinyo no makwa.

language1_text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren, see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently:
language2_text: Kamo manoyong a yarana ji meylimoteng so onowned a yamarilaw no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai, do yanyo kanoyong a yaomonot do nanao na ni Ama ta do to. So ikakdekdeng nyo pa a marilaw no kadwan jinyo.

language1_text: being born again, not of corruptible seed, but of incorruptible, by the word of God, which liveth and abideth for ever.
language2_text: Ta inyo rana am yamyan rana jinyo so to meyyonong a Ciriciring ni Ama ta do to a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: ForAll flesh is as grass, And all the glory of man as the flower of grass. The grass withereth, and the flower thereof falleth away:
language2_text: Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Ta maniring am, "Yamamimin o tao a yakmey tamek. O kapyapya da am akman so savong no tamek a ji meyyonownay a mavozas.

language1_text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever. And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you.
language2_text: Am o ciring na ni Ama ta do to am to meyyonong." Ori rana am Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a yanamen rana nipeylimwang jinyo.

language1_text: Wherefore laying aside all malice, and all guile, and hypocrisies, and envies, and all evil speakings,
language2_text: Am ori o karwan nyo do makakaday a marahet a vazay. Taosya o kapangononong so malas. Taosya o kapakatanteneteneng nyo. Taosya o kapanginanahet nyo. Taosya o kapanraherahet nyo so tao.

language1_text: as newborn babes, desire the sincere milk of the word, that ye may grow thereby:
language2_text: Akman kamo so nimatazak a kanakan a komakday so meyzoko a akmey kanen no pahad nyo. So yopan nyo so sang a ipeypahagnat nyo a macikaop ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: if so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious.
language2_text: Ta nyo nimapeyneynara o na karilawan ninyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: To whom coming, as unto a living stone, disallowed indeed of men, but chosen of God, and precious,
language2_text: Omasngen kamo so nakem ji Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta. Ta iya rana am yamanta nyaten so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta. So na icyakmey lalitan a tey mehni. Tana to da nazibwan no tao am jyakman sang si Ama ta do to a to nazibo nya. Ta si Yeso am nitenngan na ni Ama ta do to akmey lalitan a ikehni no onowned ta.

language1_text: ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Inyo rana a tao a na yanan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo am itoro nyo o kataotao nyo ji Ama ta do to. So icyakma nyoy vato a ipatnek na so panaralayan. So nyo icyakmey mapatanatanang so nakem ji Ama ta do to. Am o patanangen nyo am sarasaray nyo. So sarayan na nya jinyo ni Ama ta do to so akman sang a nakem nyo sya, ta kamo na macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto a na rana yanan no Seyzi.

language1_text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture, Behold, I lay in Sion a chief corner stone, elect, precious: And he that believeth on him shall not be confounded.
language2_text: Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Ko nimangata so jya toda ka vato a lalitan a soil no vahay do Sian. Sira rana a meyhanhan nya am amyan so nakem na jira ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient, The stone which the builders disallowed, The same is made the head of the corner,
language2_text: O akmey lalitan rana am tey makdeng jinyo a omraralay ni Ama ta do to. Am o lalitan rana do ji raralay ni Ama ta do to a tao am ji da tenngi o kakdeng na. Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Maniring am, "O Vato a niwalit da no mapatnek so vahay am nimeyvoga a ney makdeng na aslet no ai no vahay."

language1_text: andA stone of stumbling, and a rock of offence, even to them which stumble at the word, being disobedient: whereunto also they were appointed.
language2_text: Maniring pa do Seysyo am, "O Vato rana ori am cikadan da no tao a ikalektek da." O icikad da no tao am ji da nganoyngi o ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ori rana am ahapan na ni Ama ta do to so ji manaralay a tao.

language1_text: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light:
language2_text: Am inyo am na nipamnekan inyo a yasa so inawan a mapatanatanang so nakem ji Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta. So ikanoyong nyo a abo so karatan a asa ka mahataw a italamozong ni Ama ta do to, a na nipamnekan a meylimwang no yamapeyzokab a vazay na. Ta inyo am na nyagag inyo do kasarisaryan a yameyraratenen. So nyo rana iyan do kazngangan.

language1_text: which in time past were not a people, but are now the people of God: which had not obtained mercy, but now have obtained mercy.
language2_text: No kakwa am beken a italamozong na inyo ni Ama ta do to. Am sicyaikwaya am na rana italamozong inyo. No kakwa am ji nyo a tenngi o pangangasyan ni Ama ta do to. Am sicyaikwaya am nyo na nimahap o pangangasyan na.

language1_text: Dearly beloved, I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims, abstain from fleshly lusts, which war against the soul;
language2_text: O ko ipanci pa jinyo manga keypong am tamo akmey miseysan do karawan. Ji nyo to ngonongonongi o nakenakem nyo. Ta o marahet a onowned ta am ipeyparai ta ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: having your conversation honest among the Gentiles: that, whereas they speak against you as evildoers, they may by your good works, which they shall behold, glorify God in the day of visitation.
language2_text: Ji nyo nginara o icicirawat da no ji nganoyong ji Ama ta do to a tao, ta arako o kapyapyan no iwawalam nyo a ka nira. Ta no si macita da inyo apiya so icicirawat no yatomamwad jinyo a kano yamazyak ninyo a tao am azwazwain da na si Ama ta do to no mai si Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord's sake: whether it be to the king, as supreme; or unto governors, as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers, and for the praise of them that do well.
language2_text: Am ori an, onotan nyo do makayokod ninyo a tao do karawan, do kapanadnad nyo si Ama ta do to. Akman sang sira o nipamnekan no panirsirngen a omzat do apiya so nakenakem a tao a kano oyyan da no marahet so vazay a tao. Ta onotan nyo sira. Am ori an, onotan nyo do makayokod ninyo a tao do karawan, do kapanadnad nyo si Ama ta do to. Akman sang sira o nipamnekan no panirsirngen a omzat do apiya so nakenakem a tao a kano oyyan da no marahet so vazay a tao. Ta onotan nyo sira.

language1_text: For so is the will of God, that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men:
language2_text: Ta o nakenakem na jinyo ni Ama ta do to am zazatan nyo no apiya icicirawat nyo o ji mamayok a ciring da no macioya ji Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: as free, and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness, but as the servants of God.
language2_text: Inyo rana am kamo manoyong a italamozong ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o ji nyo rana pasngesngeni so marahet do onowned nyo. Ta manakem nyo o kakma nyoy lamlamsoy ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Honour all men. Love the brotherhood. Fear God. Honour the king.
language2_text: Ikanig nyo o kadwan jinyo. Ikarilaw nyo sira o akma nyoy kakteh do cinai. Panadnaden nyo si Ama ta do to. Ikanig nyo sira o makayokod ninyo a tao.

language1_text: Servants, be subject to your masters with all fear; not only to the good and gentle, but also to the froward.
language2_text: Inyo rana a lamlamsoy da am onotan nyo sira o mapeylamsoy jinyo a tao ipakateneng da jinyo a manig nira. Am beken a marilaw ninyo o ikanig nyo, ta ikanig nyo sira o ji ngarilaw ninyo a lawpan.

language1_text: For this is thankworthy, if a man for conscience toward God endure grief, suffering wrongfully.
language2_text: No abo kalasan nyo a to nazibwan no peyrarehtan da jinyo am isaray na o akman sang ni Ama ta do to. Ta onowned nyo am ahapen nyo o vazay na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For what glory is it, if, when ye be buffeted for your faults, ye shall take it patiently? but if, when ye do well, and suffer for it, ye take it patiently, this is acceptable with God.
language2_text: No si kalasan mo o bakbakan da jimo a kato mo liliwan sya am cyaha, ta kalasan mo o akman sang. Am no abo o kalasan mo a kato da oyyan nimo a kato mo peykabobwan sya am cyaha, ta isaray na o akman sang ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For even hereunto were ye called: because Christ also suffered for us, leaving us an example, that ye should follow his steps:
language2_text: Ori o peypeypangayan na no na panopan jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta akman sang si Yeso Kizisto a nimanngannga ninyo. So inaran nyo sya a to nazibo no alalaw nyo.

language1_text: who did no sin, neither was guile found in his mouth:
language2_text: Abo o raraten na. Abo o malas a ciring na.

language1_text: who, when he was reviled, reviled not again; when he suffered, he threatened not; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously:
language2_text: No kavay da sya am abo o asa ka ciring na nipasapan na jira. No kapeyyalilima da jya am abo o asa ka ciring na yalalaw na sira. Ta kapasyasi na ji Ama ta do to a yamapeyyangangay so tao.

language1_text: who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree, that we, being dead to sins, should live unto righteousness: by whose stripes ye were healed.
language2_text: Nisabway na ni Kizisto o raraten ta do jyojika. Ori o karwan ta na do peyraratenan ta a somazap so isaray na vazay ni Ama ta do to. O kataotao na ni Yeso a yanimanngannga nyaten am yata nipakahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta.

language1_text: For ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.
language2_text: Kamo akmey mavozaw a kagling a ji makateneng do rarahan. Am na rana nipaoli inyo. So yanyo ipacilolo rana jya a yana apzatan so pahad.

language1_text: Likewise, ye wives, be in subjection to your own husbands; that, if any obey not the word, they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives;
language2_text: Inyo rana mavakes am onotan nyo o kahanghangan nyo. Ta no si amyan jira ori so ji nganoyong do Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to am anoyngan da rana, do pakacittan da so apiya icicirawat nyo. So ikapyapya no apya icicirawat nyo a kano aro a ciring nyo a inanao nyo sira.

language1_text: while they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear.
language2_text: Ta macita da o kapiya no icicirawat nyo a kano kakdekdeng nyo amraralay ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair, and of wearing of gold, or of putting on of apparel;
language2_text: Taosya o kapeyhahama nyo no avok nyo a kano ovaovay nyo a kano aywayob nyo.

language1_text: but let it be the hidden man of the heart, in that which is not corruptible, even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit, which is in the sight of God of great price.
language2_text: Ta ney makdeng o kapiya no onowned nyo. Ta o tey yapya so nakenakem do icyatatao na ji makazyazyak a mangay do ikararakehan na am tey mazway o akman sang do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also, who trusted in God, adorned themselves, being in subjection unto their own husbands:
language2_text: Ta sira rana meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to a mavakes no kakwa am akman sang o ahahapan da so kataotao da a omonot do kahanghangan da.

language1_text: even as Sara obeyed Abraham, calling him lord: whose daughters ye are, as long as ye do well, and are not afraid with any amazement.
language2_text: O meyngaran so Salay mavakes am akman so sang a niomonot do kahanghangan na a meyngaran si Apolahan. Abneken na o kahanghangan na meymatmatngeh nya. No si manoyong kamo a apiya so icicirawat a jyanyahey no makakaday a vazay am manoyong kamo a akma ney anak ni Salay.

language1_text: Likewise, ye husbands, dwell with them according to knowledge, giving honour unto the wife, as unto the weaker vessel, and as being heirs together of the grace of life; that your prayers be not hindered.
language2_text: Inyo rana mahakay a katovong da am panadnaden nyo sira o katovong nyo do vahay a mavakes, do kaji da macingayan jinyo so kolit. Ori an, kanigan nyo nira. Ta meyyangay kamo a makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo. No si mahap nyo o akman sang am abo ji na ngamizing a inozi nyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Finally, be ye all of one mind, having compassion one of another, love as brethren, be pitiful, be courteous:
language2_text: Ko pakoyokoin jinyo am akma kamoy asa so ahahapan sya masicyakarilaw. Akman so aryarilaw nyo so kakteh nyo o karilawan nyo no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai. Makapiya kamo so nakem do kadwan jinyo. Masicyakanig kamo.

language1_text: not rendering evil for evil, or railing for railing: but contrariwise blessing; knowing that ye are thereunto called, that ye should inherit a blessing.
language2_text: Ji nyo patonggali o karatan no kadwan jinyo. Ji kamo masyavavay. Ta kaovayovay nyo so kadwan jinyo. Ta no kapanop na jinyo ni Ama ta do to am akman so sang o nakenakem na jinyo.

language1_text: ForHe that will love life, And see good days, Let him refrain his tongue from evil, And his lips that they speak no guile:
language2_text: Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Maniring am, "No kakzeben o kasaray do karawan am taosya o kapatwaw so marahet a ciring. Taosya o kapangalalas.

language1_text: Let him eschew evil, and do good; Let him seek peace, and ensue it.
language2_text: Ney yapya na am peymakarwan na o marahet a vazay na a kasazap na so apiya vazay. To na noiban do karawan o kapiya na so nakem do icyatatao na.

language1_text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous, And his ears are open unto their prayers: But the face of the Lord is against them that do evil.
language2_text: Ta singkadan na ni Ama ta do to o ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao. Amizngen na o inozi da. Ji na nidonga o meyraraten a tao."

language1_text: And who is he that will harm you, if ye be followers of that which is good?
language2_text: Sino to makagogad ninyo no si meyngongyod kamo a somazap so apya vazay.

language1_text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness' sake, happy are ye: and be not afraid of their terror, neither be troubled;
language2_text: Tana meyrarahet kamo do kanoyngan nyo am somaray kamo. Ji nyo anyaheyan o tatasa ka tao a omalalaw jinyo. Ji kamo a rahet so onowned.

language1_text: but sanctify the Lord God in your hearts: and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear:
language2_text: Ji kamo a haha so nakem ji Kizisto. Iraralay nyo a panadnaden o Panirsirngen nyo. Mangday kamo do araraw a omnakenakem so itovis nyo do mapacici jinyo, do raralayan nyo ni Ama ta do to a mapatazadang jinyo do teyngato.

language1_text: having a good conscience; that, whereas they speak evil of you, as of evildoers, they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ.
language2_text: Am panalawbowen nyo o nakem nyo a tomovis do akman sang a tao. Ji kamo meylimoteng so onowned a kanig da no mapanyanig jinyo, do kapiya no icicirawat nyo a omahap so nanao ni Kizisto.

language1_text: For it is better, if the will of God be so, that ye suffer for well doing, than for evil doing.
language2_text: No nakenakem ni Ama ta do to o kapeyrarahet da jinyo do kanoyngan nyo am cyaha. Ta apyapya rana ori a kano peyrarehtan da jinyo do kalasan nyo.

language1_text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins, the just for the unjust, that he might bring us to God, being put to death in the flesh, but quickened by the Spirit:
language2_text: Ta ipisa si Yeso Kizisto a nimawakwak no raraten ta, kapakavos na rana so vazay na a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato. So ikanoyong na abo so raraten a nisomabway no raraten no tao, do na kapanop jyaten ji Ama ta do to. Tana niwakwak da o kataotao na am jya nimawakwak o pahad na.

language1_text: by which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison;
language2_text: Nioyatan no Seyzi o pahad ni Yeso a mangay a mapamizing so pahad no nimawakwak rana tao.

language1_text: which sometime were disobedient, when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah, while the ark was a preparing, wherein few, that is, eight souls were saved by water.
language2_text: Sira rana am ji da nyanoyngan si Ama ta do to no kapamaring na ni Noya so avang na. Kakwakwan da ji manganoyong am ji na nikahayo sira ni Ama ta do to a nanalahen a mamlis. Tana wawao sira o nisomdep do avang ni Noya am nivyay na sira ni Ama ta do to do rako a henep.

language1_text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us (not the putting away of the filth of the flesh, but the answer of a good conscience toward God, ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ:
language2_text: O henep rana am kehngehngay na no ranom a da itaktak jyaten do kyokay. Am sicyaikwa rana ya am nyo rana ipeyhanhan si Yeso Kizisto a nimirwa a mavyay a mapatazadang jinyo do teyngato. So ji na monganai do kanownaw no kataotao nyo. Ta monganay jyaten a manci nya ji Ama ta do to so kanoyong ta na mahap so vazay na.

language1_text: who is gone into heaven, and is on the right hand of God; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him.
language2_text: Yana myan si Yeso Kizisto do teyngato a yamlisna do wanan ni Ama ta do to a yatomalamozong no tinsi. So ji da makapeysopoi do oyowyat ni Kizisto no makakaday do teyngato.

language1_text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh, arm yourselves likewise with the same mind: for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin;
language2_text: Manoyong o kanimanngannga na ninyo ni Yeso Kizisto. Am ori an, no manngannga kamo do raralayan nyo ni Yeso Kizisto a kato nyo liliwan sya a makanakem si Kizisto a nisomabway no raraten nyo am manoyong kamo na nikomaro do peyraratenan nyo.

language1_text: that he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men, but to the will of God.
language2_text: Pamindahen nyo rana sicyaikwaya o kaji nyo rana mangozayan do malas a monganay jinyo a onowned nyo. Ta o apyahen na ni Ama ta do to o ahapen nyo, do ipeyigegen nyo pa do karawan.

language1_text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles, when we walked in lasciviousness, lusts, excess of wine, revellings, banquetings, and abominable idolatries:
language2_text: Teywara o mina raraten nyo no kakwa. Ta meyyangay kamo pa so vazay a kano ji raralay ni Ama ta do to a tao a to meyvozaw a mapasagpyan so aktokto nyo a masakisakin, manaralay so malas a tao do to nyo, pacyangayan no makakaday a raraten nyo.

language1_text: wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot, speaking evil of you:
language2_text: So yada na savasavakan ninyo no yaji manaralay a tao, do yanyo na kaji macikaopan jira a somagpyan so vazay. Am ori o da kazyakan ninyo.

language1_text: who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead.
language2_text: Am cyaha, ta mangay o kasazap da si Ama ta do to a yamapeykapyapinpin so mavyay a kano nimawakwak a tao.

language1_text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead, that they might be judged according to men in the flesh, but live according to God in the spirit.
language2_text: Ori o yarana nipamizngan no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to so yarana nimawakwak a tao. Ta tana meyyangangay o tao a tana mawakwak a komaro do karawan am o pahad da no nimraralay ni Ama ta do to am macitovong ji Ama ta do to do teyngato.

language1_text: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.
language2_text: Yarana masngen o ikavos no karawan. Makowyowyat kamo pa omzat do onowned no kataotao nyo. Ta ori o ikabo no raraten a makazazat do inozi nyo.

language1_text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves: for charity shall cover the multitude of sins.
language2_text: O ney makdeng na am ikarilaw nyo o kadwan jinyo. Ta o pangarilawan rana am mapeyyopowpas so makakaday a pasicyakaoyyan ta do karawan.

language1_text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging.
language2_text: Masaray kamo a tomaotao so omatao jinyo a tao. Taosya o kaoya nyo so aktokto a amrapong sira.

language1_text: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
language2_text: To ta mangozai o teneteneng a nitoro na jyaten ni Ama ta do to a somidong so tao.

language1_text: If any man speak, let him speak as the oracles of God; if any man minister, let him do it as of the ability which God giveth: that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
language2_text: O meylimwang no Ciriciring ni Ama ta do to am Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to o malavat da. No manidong ta so icyatatao ta am ipeyhanhan ta si Ama ta do to a tomoro no oyowyat na jyaten. Ta no si macita da no tao o vazay ta a sidongen ni Yeso Kizisto am azwazwain da si Ama ta do to no aro a tao. Inaoy si mangay ji Ama ta do to o azwazway a kano oyowyat a mangay do kaidan no karawan! Amin.

language1_text: Beloved, think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you, as though some strange thing happened unto you:
language2_text: Manga keypong, ji nyo ngyakan o keyyan no makdeng a alalaw nyo a ileylamdam na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta kangay na ori no alalaw ta amraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: but rejoice, inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ's sufferings; that, when his glory shall be revealed, ye may be glad also with exceeding joy.
language2_text: Kasaray nyo a macizanod so alalaw ji Kizisto. Ta ori o ikasaray nyo no mai rana si Kizisto.

language1_text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ, happy are ye; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you: on their part he is evil spoken of, but on your part he is glorified.
language2_text: Masaray kamo no amyan so peyleylakan da jinyo a mahap so vazay ni Kizisto. Ta padnadnahen na o nakem nyo no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a yamyan jinyo.

language1_text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer, or as a thief, or as an evildoer, or as a busybody in other men's matters.
language2_text: Inaoy no si ji monganay do panwakwakan nyo so tao a kano panakawan nyo a kano peyvonagan nyo so tao a kano kazyakan nyo no icyatatao nyo o yapwan no alalaw nyo.

language1_text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian, let him not be ashamed; but let him glorify God on this behalf.
language2_text: Am no amyan so alalaw nyo do kapanaralay nyo am ji nyo macimasnekan. Isaray nyo ji Ama ta do to o yanyo kapacikazway do ngaran ni Kizisto.

language1_text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God: and if it first begin at us, what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God?
language2_text: Yarana marateng sicyaikwaya o araraw no yana ipeykapyapinpin so tao ni Ama ta do to. Am papwen na do omanoyong jya tao o pacicin na. No si panmahen na yaten a pacicin ni Ama ta do to am makongo paro sira so wanjin o jya niomanoyong do Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a tao.

language1_text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved, where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear?
language2_text: Akman so ciring do Seysyo. Maniring am, "Kakwakwan da no apiya so nakenakem a tao a masalit a patazadangen ni Ama ta do to, a ney manngo sira o yatey rako so raraten a tao. Ta jyabo kaji na meydednan jira no pasingsingtan na jira ni Ama ta do to a."

language1_text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing, as unto a faithful Creator.
language2_text: Am ori an, no si nakem na ni Ama ta do to o kapakasazi da no tao so alalaw am ji da macimazai o kapanidong da so tao. Ta ipeyhanhan da si Ama ta do to a nimangamaog so tao do karawan a makasidong sira.

language1_text: The elders which are among you I exhort, who am also an elder, and a witness of the sufferings of Christ, and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed:
language2_text: Inyo rana yakman jyaken a cyozo do kyokay am ko ipanci jinyo o kanimakacita ko si Yeso Kizisto a nipeyrarahet da kawakwak da sya. Ko ipanci jinyo o azwazway ta no makwa do teyngato.

language1_text: feed the flock of God which is among you, taking the oversight thereof, not by constraint, but willingly; not for filthy lucre, but of a ready mind;
language2_text: Pakapyahen nyo sira nanawen o akma ney kagling ni Ama ta do to a yana nitoro jinyo a yaponged nyo. Am taosya o kasalit nyo so onowned a mapeyveyveken sira. Beken a no panizpin da inyo o ipeyvazay nyo. Ta manoyong o kasaray no onowned nyo a somidong sira.

language1_text: neither as being lords over God's heritage, but being ensamples to the flock.
language2_text: Taosya o kapeymetdeh nyo so nitoro na jinyo ni Ama ta do to a yaponged nyo a akma ney kagling. Ta peycitacittan da o apiya vazay nyo nira.

language1_text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear, ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away.
language2_text: Ta no si makaranes rana o araraw ni Yeso Kizisto a yaomaponged ninyo am manoyong o kapakahap nyo rana so yazaw na jinyo a to meyyonong a azwazway nyo do teyngato.

language1_text: Likewise, ye younger, submit yourselves unto the elder. Yea, all of you be subject one to another, and be clothed with humility: for God resisteth the proud, and giveth grace to the humble.
language2_text: Inyo rana a malalavayo a tao am onotan nyo o apya ciring da jinyo no rarakeh. So ko to zagomi jinyo a yapancyan no kapaveveh nyo so aktokto nyo a somidong so vazay no kadwan jinyo. Ta maniring do Seysyo am, "Ji na nidonga ni Ama ta do to o mapahama so nakem na tao. Apyapyahen na pa sidongen sira o mapaveveh so nakem da tao."

language1_text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:
language2_text: Pavevehen nyo o nakem nyo do tangain ni Ama ta do to. Ta amyan so araraw na no pakatkatan na jinyo ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
language2_text: To nyo mimina o alalaw nyo a itoro ji Ama ta do to. Ta iya o makasidong jinyo.

language1_text: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour:
language2_text: Meypepzat kamo. Taosya o kakma nyoy mitkeh so onowned. Ta si Satan a kavosoyan nyo am yakmey kokoman so tao a yaji yakneng do na yanan a yameykala so tao a na kanen a na pasyain so nakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.
language2_text: Pahadpeten nyo o nakem si Ama ta do to. Likodan nyo o vazay ni Satan. Ta nyo katenngan sira o akma nyoy kakteh do cinai a yakman jinyo a yamakasazi so alalaw da a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But the God of all grace, who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus, after that ye have suffered a while, make you perfect, stablish, strengthen, settle you.
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to am yana yapwan no rako a pangangarilawan, do na kapazanod jinyo do azwazway na. Ta inyo rana am kamo rana macikaop ji Kizisto. Am ori an, no si mavitos rana o yaji meyyonownay a alalaw nyo am manoyong kamo na oyatan ni Ama ta do to, kahadpet nyo na so nakem.

language1_text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
language2_text: Inaoy no si mangay o azwazway a kano oyowyat ji Ama ta do to a mangay do kaidan no karawan! Amin.

language1_text: By Silvanus, a faithful brother unto you, as I suppose, I have written briefly, exhorting, and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand.
language2_text: O teygami rana ya am si Sila akma tey kakteh do cinai o yanisomidong jyaken a yameyteygami ninyo. Ta ko katenngan o na katey makdeng so nakem ji Yeso Kizisto. Ko paiten inyo. Ko ipanci jinyo o manoyong a pangangasyan ni Ama ta do to. Ji kamo a haha so onowned an.

language1_text: The church that is at Babylon, elected together with you, saluteth you; and so doth Marcus my son.
language2_text: Sira rana akma nyoy kakteh do cinai do Papilon a kyokay am yada ipeyminaminasi inyo. Ta kamo meyyangangay a na nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to a omanoyong ji Yeso. Yakman sang si Make a akma koy anak a yameyminaminasi ninyo.

language1_text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity. Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus. Amen.
language2_text: Ipeyminaminasi nyo o kadwan jinyo, do kapasicyakarilaw nyo amraralay ni Ama ta do to. Inaoy no si mamimin kamo a makahap so ikapiya no onowned nyo a meyhanhan ni Kizisto.

language1_text: Simon Peter, a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ, to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ:
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Simong Pite ko a nipamnekan na ni Yeso Kizisto a amlivolivon no ciriciring na a lamlamsoy na. Yako ipeyteygami inyo a yana rana nipatazadang ni Yeso Kizisto a Tao do to ta. Ta tamo na meyyangay a yamraralay ni Yeso, do kaji na mapeycyakabanan jyaten ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and of Jesus our Lord,
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na ni Ama ta do to a kani Yeso a Panirsirngen ta o pangangarilawan na kano ikapiya no onowned nyo, do yanyo kanoyong a yarana makateneng ji Ama ta do to a kani Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: according as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness, through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue:
language2_text: Na rana nipazanod yaten ni Ama ta do to no oyowyat na, akma ney anak do karawan. Am ori o ji tamo meylimotengi so onowned do araraw. O tamo ipakahap so sang am yaomagaz do tamo rana kapakateneng ji Ama ta do to a yanimapanop jyaten a yamapazanod jyaten do inawan na kano azwazway na ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises: that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature, having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust.
language2_text: do na kapangononong do mina ciring na jyaten. Ori o ikanoyong nyo a komaro do ikeykakza nyo a monganay jinyo a tao do karawan a macikaop rana ji Ama ta do to a ji meylimoteng so onowned.

language1_text: And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge;
language2_text: Ori o ikowyowyat nyo pa mapeypahagnat so nakem ji Ama ta do to. Ta ori o ikapya na no icicirawat nyo. Meypahagnat kamo so aktokto. Ta ori o ipakazab nyo so nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and to knowledge temperance; and to temperance patience; and to patience godliness;
language2_text: Apzatan nyo o onowned nyo do icyatatao nyo. Meypahagnat kamo so onowned a ji mapeyyan do onowned nyo so makakaday a alalaw. Ta ori o ikakdeng nyo rana so nakem a amraralay ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and to godliness brotherly kindness; and to brotherly kindness charity.
language2_text: Makakdekdeng kamo pa omraralay ni Ama ta do to a marilaw no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai. Inarahen nyo si Ama ta do to so pangarilawan a marilaw no aro a tao.

language1_text: For if these things be in you, and abound, they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Mamimin ori a ahapen nyo. Ta ori o iyan no peypeypangayan no kararalay nyo ni Kizisto, do kapakateneng nyo rana ji Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta.

language1_text: But he that lacketh these things is blind, and cannot see afar off, and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins.
language2_text: O ji mangononong do akman sang a vazay a tao am akmey mavota, do kato na rana makahamangan do mina kavonas na rana no raraten na no kakwa.

language1_text: Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure: for if ye do these things, ye shall never fall:
language2_text: Ori an manga kakteh an, ipakowyowyat nyo pa a mapeyyan sya do onowned nyo so mina kapamnek na jinyo ni Ama ta do to. Ta no si akman kamo sang am jyabo kapeyparai nyo ji Ama ta do to a,

language1_text: for so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
language2_text: a macikaop rana do to meyyonong a italamozong na ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato.

language1_text: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things, though ye know them, and be established in the present truth.
language2_text: Tana nyo na katenngan o yamakakaday a vazay eya a yarana mapeyyan so nanao na ni Ama ta do to do onowned nyo am ko ji macimazai o ko kapaziman jinyo.

language1_text: Yea, I think it meet, as long as I am in this tabernacle, to stir you up by putting you in remembrance;
language2_text: Do ko iyan pa do karawan am jyabo kapacimaza ko jinyo a vavagan a peyparakwen so nakenakem a.

language1_text: knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle, even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me.
language2_text: Ko na makazazap o kakeykai na rana no kataotao ko a komaro do karawan, do kanimapaziman na rana sya jyaken ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance.
language2_text: Jyabo o kapacimaza ko do yamakakaday a nanao na ni Ama ta do to a ipamizing jinyo a, a kaji nyo rana makahamangan jya, do italikan ko rana do karawan.

language1_text: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables, when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ, but were eyewitnesses of his majesty.
language2_text: Beken a namen to mangamaog so kavavatanen a namen ipamizing jinyo a yamanci no keypirwa na mai ni Yeso Kizisto a yatey mowyat a Panirsirngen ta. Ta manoyong o kanimakacita namen sya a tey mazway a Tao do to.

language1_text: For he received from God the Father honour and glory, when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
language2_text: No kapeydedna na so azwazway ni Ama ta do to ji Yeso Kizisto am nimyan namen do dang. Nimapo do teyngato o ciring na ni Ama ta do to. Maniring am, "Iya rana am Anak ko ya a yako ikaglaw."

language1_text: And this voice which came from heaven we heard, when we were with him in the holy mount.
language2_text: Manoyong o kanimakamizing namen so ciring na ni Ama ta do to a apo do teyngato no kapacihza namen ji Yeso no keyyan namen do tokon.

language1_text: We have also a more sure word of prophecy; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed, as unto a light that shineth in a dark place, until the day dawn, and the day star arise in your hearts:
language2_text: Ori o yanamen ji palasi so ciring a yada ipeylimwang no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a tao. So pakamyamizngan nyo pala so ciring ang. Ta ori rana am yakmey zampo ori a yatomiray so kasarisaryan, mangay do idada na rana no araw do madagdag. So icyakman na sang si Yeso a omzezak so onowned nyo a mangay do araraw no yai na rana.

language1_text: knowing this first, that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation.
language2_text: O ney makdeng na am ji nyo to ngonongonongi a pehtawen o ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to do Seysyo.

language1_text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man: but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost.
language2_text: Ta o ciring no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a tao am beken a monganay jira. Ta o oyowyat no Seyzi o nisomidong sira. So ikanoyong no ciring da apo ji Ama ta do to.
