language1_text: But there were false prophets also among the people, even as there shall be false teachers among you, who privily shall bring in damnable heresies, even denying the Lord that bought them, and bring upon themselves swift destruction.
language2_text: No kakwa do Isedi am amyan so nimalas so ipangnanao a tao. Akman sang jinyo, ta no makwa am amyan so malas so ciring a tao. Sira rana am ipeylimwang da o iparai no pahad nyo ji Ama ta do to, mangay ji Yeso Kizisto a nimawakwak nira o alalasan da. Am o akman rana sang a tao am ji meyyahahay o kapeydedna na jira no oyaoyyan na nira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And many shall follow their pernicious ways; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of.
language2_text: Tana somagpyan sira am amyan so aro a tao a macilolo jira a mapasagpyan so nakenakem da. So ikanoyong no nanao na ni Ama ta do to a pasagsagpyanen da no tao.

language1_text: And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you: whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not, and their damnation slumbereth not.
language2_text: Sira rana malas so ipangnanao a tao am mangamaog sira so ciriciring a ipeylimwang da ipangap da so apzapzatan no tao a ikadpeh jira. So iyan na rana no kakwa no oyyan na nira ni Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong da rana ji rana makasaway do pasingsingtan na jira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned, but cast them down to hell, and delivered them into chains of darkness, to be reserved unto judgment;
language2_text: O nimeyraraten a tinsi am ji na vonasa o raraten da. Ta nipangay na sira do kararatan. So nilyowan na sira aptengen do kasarisaryan a yamapanala so araraw ni Ama ta do to a mapeykapyapinpin so tao.

language1_text: and spared not the old world, but saved Noah the eighth person, a preacher of righteousness, bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly;
language2_text: Ji na nipeykabobo o raraten da no tao no kakwa. Ori o nipeykehnepan na sya a ibalinas na so ji mapanadnad si Ama ta do to a tao. Wawao sira Noya asa ka vahay a nivyay ni Ama ta do to, do kaji na nimapasalan do ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a ipeylimwang do tao.

language1_text: and turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned them with an overthrow, making them an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly;
language2_text: Nibalinas na ni Ama ta do to o tao do adwa ka ili a meyngaran so Sotoma kano Hamola. Ori o nipakasan na so apoy a itemtem na sira a ipacita na so ji manganwanoyong a tao.

language1_text: and delivered just Lot, vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked:
language2_text: Nivyay na o meyngaran so Lote, do kapya no onowned na. Iya rana am ikarahet na no onowned sira o meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: (for that righteous man dwelling among them, in seeing and hearing, vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds;)
language2_text: Tey meyngen o onowned na a makacita so raraten da do araraw no meyraraten a tao, do kapacikeylyan na jira.

language1_text: the Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations, and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished:
language2_text: Am katenngan na ni Ama ta do to a pahawahen sira o jyablis so onowned a makanakem sya a tao do alalaw da. So ipakateneng na ni Ama ta do to do meyraraten a tao a pasingsingtan no marateng o araraw na no peykapyapinpinan na so tao.

language1_text: but chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness, and despise government. Presumptuous are they, selfwilled, they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities.
language2_text: Tarek pa sira o to mangozangozay do onowned da a ji mapanadnad so oyowyat ni Ama ta do to. Ta jyabo kaji nakdekdengan pa no pasingsingtan na jira. Pahamahen da o nakem da no malas so ipangnanao a tao a ji mapanadnad so tinsi na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Whereas angels, which are greater in power and might, bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord.
language2_text: Kakwakwan da no tinsi arakorako pa so oyowyat a ka nira am ji dadkeci sira rehrehten no ciriciring da do tangain na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But these, as natural brute beasts, made to be taken and destroyed, speak evil of the things that they understand not; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption;
language2_text: Am o malas so ipangnanao a tao am sya akmey omalalam a yaji makateneng do kasnekan da a yamapananala so omwakwak sira a tao. Da ikazyak o yada jyatenngi a vazay. So ikanoyong na mangay jira no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: and shall receive the reward of unrighteousness, as they that count it pleasure to riot in the daytime. Spots they are and blemishes, sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you;
language2_text: do kalas no vazay da do icyatatao da. O abneken da ney yapya na vazay am azwain da o kataotao da, abo so ji peyveyvazaya do maraw. So nyo ikanoyong a yamacikatamwad jira do da kapacizavoz jinyo. Ta sira rana am da isaray da kapanlita so tao.

language1_text: having eyes full of adultery, and that cannot cease from sin; beguiling unstable souls: an heart they have exercised with covetous practices; cursed children:
language2_text: Yabo da ji nitanita no mata da. Da pa ji makamyamyan o yamakakaday a yada peyraratenan. Da cirarahen sira o yaji makanet so onowned ji Ama ta do to a tao a mapasagpyan so kataotao da. Sira rana am da inaman o yada pangangagoman. So da ikanoyong a yana balinasen ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: which have forsaken the right way, and are gone astray, following the way of Balaam the son of Bosor, who loved the wages of unrighteousness;
language2_text: Da peymakarwan o apiya rarahan. So da ikanoyong a yamavozaw a yaominara so anak ni Peyley a meyngaran so Palang. Iya rana am ikeykakza na pa o keyyan no nizpi na, ji na ngezsangan o kapeyraraten na.

language1_text: but was rebuked for his iniquity: the dumb ass speaking with man's voice forbad the madness of the prophet.
language2_text: So nioyyan na nya ni Ama ta do to do raraten na. Ori o mina to na meyzezyaki rana no baka a kaoranan na amwoya nya a omzazat do malas a vazay na.

language1_text: These are wells without water, clouds that are carried with a tempest; to whom the mist of darkness is reserved for ever.
language2_text: Sira rana o malas so ipangnanao a tao am akman sira so matdes a atbod a kabwan rana no ranom. So icyakma dey pavyoten no pagpag a cinalab a kabwan no maciralay a cimoy. Mangay o kapangayan na sira ni Ama ta do to do rako a kasarisaryan.

language1_text: For when they speak great swelling words of vanity, they allure through the lusts of the flesh, through much wantonness, those that were clean escaped from them who live in error.
language2_text: Sira rana am sya mapatwaw so rako a ciring a tomirara so vayo pa niomtad no peyraratenan da tao.

language1_text: While they promise them liberty, they themselves are the servants of corruption: for of whom a man is overcome, of the same is he brought in bondage.
language2_text: Ipanci da o kapeypapya da no macilolo jira. Am jyakman sang, ta kapasagpyan da so icicirawat da. So ikanoyong no macihza jira tao a kalamsoyan no makakaday, do katalamozong na nira no raraten.

language1_text: For if after they have escaped the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ, they are again entangled therein, and overcome, the latter end is worse with them than the beginning.
language2_text: No si amyan so tao a makateneng do Panirsirngen ta si Yeso Kizisto a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato a kanikomaro na rana do makakaday a raraten do karawan, a kaoli na pa so mina raraten na am arakorako pa o kanginanawan na no nang.

language1_text: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness, than, after they have known it, to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them.
language2_text: O to ngaro do apyahen na vazay ni Ama ta do to amraralay nya am apyapya rana kaji na nimakamizngan so Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb, The dog is turned to his own vomit again; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire.
language2_text: Manoyong o ciring da no tao no kakwa. Ta maniring sira am, "O niota da no ino am mangay da olin a kanen." Akman sang o kois, ta no teyka rana sira aryosen am meyoli pa sira marios do kahethetkan.

language1_text: This second epistle, beloved, I now write unto you; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance:
language2_text: Manga kakteh, oya rana am ikadwa na ya no teygami ko jinyo. Yameynanod yadwa ka teygami a yana adketan no ciring a yako ipaziman jinyo, a yako ivavaga jinyo a peyparakwen so nakenakem.

language1_text: that ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets, and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour:
language2_text: Inaoy si mamimin nyo peyyanen do onowned nyo o mina ciring da no panoyonoywan na so ciring ni Ama ta do to a kano mina ciring na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato a ninanao da jinyo no nipamnekan na a omlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: knowing this first, that there shall come in the last days scoffers, walking after their own lusts,
language2_text: O ney makdeng na am manakem nyo o keyyan no to mangozangozay do onowned da tao a meykeykaming ninyo do pangavosan no karawan.

language1_text: and saying, Where is the promise of his coming? for since the fathers fell asleep, all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation.
language2_text: No maniring sira am, "Wanjin na kai ni Kizisto a manci no kai na asyo. Sira rana nimeykawakwakwak a ineynapo ta am wanjin o na kablis no nyamaog na karawan."

language1_text: For this they willingly are ignorant of, that by the word of God the heavens were of old, and the earth standing out of the water and in the water:
language2_text: To da nazibwan o kanimamaog na ni Ama ta do to so hanit a kano karawan no ciring na. O tana eya am nimeytotwaw apo do ranom a kapeypinpin na rana sya.

language1_text: whereby the world that then was, being overflowed with water, perished:
language2_text: Nipangamaog na ni Ama ta do to o ranom so karawan. Nibalinas na no ranom o karawan.

language1_text: but the heavens and the earth, which are now, by the same word are kept in store, reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men.
language2_text: Am sicyaikwaya am yajyablis o hanit a kano teyrahem, do yana kahad sya no ciring na ni Ama ta do to, mangay do itemtem na so hanit a kano karawan a kano ji manganoyong a tao, no marateng rana o araraw no ipeykapyapinpin na so tao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: But, beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years, and a thousand years as one day.
language2_text: Am ji nyo a hamangi o meykasa vazay, manga kakteh an. Tana kasaraw a tana makazivo awawan am meyyangay ori ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.
language2_text: O nakenakem ni Ama ta do to a kano tao am ji meyyangay. Ta si Ama ta do to am ji mapainin do mina ciring na. Ta tana inyo am akman sang a na jyahaywan a pananalahen a yamamlis. Ta ji na mamyapyan o asa ka tao do karawan a mangay do kararatan. Ta ikakza na o kamimin no tao a mamlis a komaro do raraten da.

language1_text: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat, the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up.
language2_text: Am o araraw no yai na no Panirsirngen ta am jyaziman a akmey manakaw a tao. No si marateng o araraw ori am meykaing a matemtem do kakavos no karawan a kabo na rana no sinokob no hanit a kano teyrahem a matemtem no rako a lila no apoy. So ikabo na rana no masaod no karawan.

language1_text: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved, what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness,
language2_text: No si manoyong o kakman na sang a mabalinas no makakaday am makongo kamo so wanjin a tao. Am ori an, kakzan nyo no ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao a omraralay ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God, wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat?
language2_text: a omapananala so araraw ni Ama ta do to a ji meyyahahay a makaranes. No si marateng o araraw ori am matemtem o masaod no hanit. So ikabo na rana no masaod no hanit a omonag no lila no apoy.

language1_text: Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new heavens and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness.
language2_text: Am yaten rana am yata pananalahen o nipanci na ni Ama ta do to a vayo a hanit a kano teyrahem. O ji meyraraten o amyan do dang.

language1_text: Wherefore, beloved, seeing that ye look for such things, be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace, without spot, and blameless.
language2_text: Am ori an manga kakteh an, no kamo manoyong a yamapananala so araraw ori am makowyowyat kamo pa mapeyvazay so apya vazay a abo so karatan a macikaop ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And account that the longsuffering of our Lord is salvation; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you;
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo o kaji na angsahan jinyo a pananalahen ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori o avyayan na jinyo, akman so mina ciring ni Pawlo a akma tey kakteh do cinai do teygami na a mangozay do teneng na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: as also in all his epistles, speaking in them of these things; in which are some things hard to be understood, which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest, as they do also the other scriptures, unto their own destruction.
language2_text: O akman rana sang am yamamimin do teygami ni Pawlo. Am yaro dang yamasalit a ciring ni Pawlo a yada to peypalasa a yapazsin no yaji macipayok so nakem a tao. Akman so yatatasa ciring do Seysyo a yada patareken a yaononongan. Am o akman rana sang a tao am peydednan no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Ye therefore, beloved, seeing ye know these things before, beware lest ye also, being led away with the error of the wicked, fall from your own stedfastness.
language2_text: Am nyo na katenngan o yakman sang a ciring, manga kakteh. So azimanan nyo sya, ta kalittan kamo so onowned a peykowawen so nakem no yaji macipayok so nakem a tao.

language1_text: But grow in grace, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ. To him be glory both now and for ever. Amen.
language2_text: Am meypahagnat kamo so nakem a makateneng ji Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato, a makateneng do karilawan na ninyo. Inaoy si mangay jya o azwazway sicyaikwaya kangay na do kaidan no karawan. Amin.

language1_text: That which was from the beginning, which we have heard, which we have seen with our eyes, which we have looked upon, and our hands have handled, of the Word of life;
language2_text: Namen padketen do teygami eya o Ciring a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad. Ori rana am Ciring na ni Ama ta do to a nimeycicinda a nimyan no kakwa. Nimamizing namen rana o ciring na. Nimacita namen rana ori. So na ikanoyong no kanimakacita namen sya do kanimacihza namen jya no keyyan na do teyrahem. Iya rana am si Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: (for the life was manifested, and we have seen it, and bear witness, and shew unto you that eternal life, which was with the Father, and was manifested unto us;)
language2_text: No kai na do teyrahem am manoyong o kanimakacita namen sya. Am ori o namen peylimwangan nya jinyo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta. Ta iya o yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta, a nimacitovong ji Ama ta do to do teyngato a nimacikaop jyamen.

language1_text: that which we have seen and heard declare we unto you, that ye also may have fellowship with us: and truly our fellowship is with the Father, and with his Son Jesus Christ.
language2_text: O nimacita namen a kano nimamizing namen am namen toywen jinyo. So ikanoyong nyo na macikaop jyamen a akma nyoy kakteh do cinai, do namen kapacikaop ji Ama ta do to a kano Anak na si Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.
language2_text: O namen padketan sang do vakong eya am namen ikakza inyo a macikasaray jyamen.

language1_text: This then is the message which we have heard of him, and declare unto you, that God is light, and in him is no darkness at all.
language2_text: Namen ipeylimwang jinyo o ciring a yanamen nimamizing ji Yeso Kizisto. So ikanoyong na akmey zezngang ni Ama ta do to. So ikabo no masari jya.

language1_text: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:
language2_text: Am ori an, no si ipanci ta o kapacikaop ta jya kaji ta mamlisan a meyraraten akmey amyan do kasarisaryan am manoyong kapangalalas ta, do kaji na macipayokan no nakenakem ta.

language1_text: but if we walk in the light, as he is in the light, we have fellowship one with another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
language2_text: Am no si amyan ta do kazngangan a akman si Ama ta do to am macikaop ta do akma tey kakteh do cinai a omraralay ni Ama ta do to. Ta o rala na ni Yeso Kizisto a Anak na ni Ama ta do to o amvonas so makakaday a raraten ta.

language1_text: If we say that we have no sin, we deceive ourselves, and the truth is not in us.
language2_text: No si ipanci ta o kabo no raraten ta am alalasen ta o kataotao ta, do kaji ta mangononongan do nanao ni Ama ta do to a nimamizing ta.

language1_text: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
language2_text: Am no si ji ta naywa o raraten ta ji Ama ta do to a yaji mapeycyakaban so tao am vonasen na o raraten ta, do kapangononong na do ciring na. So icyakma tey nikowyasan a malavang so onowned a abo rana so karatan.

language1_text: If we say that we have not sinned, we make him a liar, and his word is not in us.
language2_text: Am no si ipanci ta o kaji ta pa nimeyraraten am manoyong ta ipanci si Ama ta do to a mangalalas. Ta nipanci na rana ni Ama ta do to do Seysyo o kamimin no tao a meyraraten. So icyakma ney abo no ciring na ni Ama ta do to do onowned ta.

language1_text: My little children, these things write I unto you, that ye sin not. And if any man sin, we have an advocate with the Father, Jesus Christ the righteous:
language2_text: O yako peyteygamyan ninyo manga ovay am ko vavagan inyo a kakaro nyo do peyraratenan nyo. Am no si amyan so asa ka tao a meyraraten am cyaha, ta ipasyasi na yaten ni Yeso Kizisto ji Ama ta do to. Ta iya rana am abo o raraten na.

language1_text: and he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for our's only, but also for the sins of the whole world.
language2_text: Nimawakwak si Kizisto a omvonas so raraten ta. Am beken a yatehen, ta kazagoman no tao do karawan.

language1_text: And hereby we do know that we know him, if we keep his commandments.
language2_text: No si onotan ta o ciring na ni Ama ta do to am manoyong ta macikaop jya.

language1_text: He that saith, I know him, and keepeth not his commandments, is a liar, and the truth is not in him.
language2_text: No amyan so tao a manci no kapakateneng na jya kaji na ngonotan do ciring na am mangalalas o akman sang a tao, do kaji na mangozayan jya peyvazain so nanao na ni Ama ta do to a nimamizing na.

language1_text: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.
language2_text: Am o tao a mapeyvazay so ciring na ni Ama ta do to am manoyong ori a omraralay nya. So ipeyngongyod na rana a macikaop ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk, even as he walked.
language2_text: O tao rana manci no kapacikaop na ji Ama ta do to am inarahen na an o icicirawat ni Kizisto no keyyan na pa do teyrahem eya.

language1_text: Brethren, I write no new commandment unto you, but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning. The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning.
language2_text: O vatvatek ko rana ya manga kakteh am o kapasicyakarilaw tamo an. Ta oya rana am beken a yavayo ya nanao. Ta nimamizing nyo pa no kavayo nyo pa omanoyong ji Yeso o akman sya nanao.

language1_text: Again, a new commandment I write unto you, which thing is true in him and in you: because the darkness is past, and the true light now shineth.
language2_text: Am o yako vatvatkan a ciring jinyo am akmey yavayo ori an. Ta o nanao am yana nipacita jyaten ni Kizisto o manoyong a pangangarilawan na. So nyo ikakman sang a yamapatwaw sya. So yana rana ikaslin no masari a yana cirain no kazngangan.

language1_text: He that saith he is in the light, and hateth his brother, is in darkness even until now.
language2_text: No amyan so tao a manci no keyyan na rana do kazngangan a kaji na vonasan no pacioyyan na do akma ney kakteh do cinai am jyablis ori a amyan do kasarisaryan.

language1_text: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light, and there is none occasion of stumbling in him.
language2_text: O tao rana marilaw no akma ney kakteh do cinai am amyan ori do kazngangan, do kabo rana no marahet do onowned na a pacikzan da no tao.

language1_text: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness, and walketh in darkness, and knoweth not whither he goeth, because that darkness hath blinded his eyes.
language2_text: Am o mapeyyan do onowned na so oyyan na no akma ney kakteh do cinai am amyan ori do kasarisaryan. So ikanoyong na akmey omalam do kasarisaryan a ji makacita so angayan na.

language1_text: I write unto you, little children, because your sins are forgiven you for his name's sake.
language2_text: Ko ipeyteygami inyo a akma koy anak, ta o raraten nyo am yana rana nivonas ni Ama ta do to, do kanimawakwak na nyaten ni Kizisto.

language1_text: I write unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I write unto you, young men, because ye have overcome the wicked one. I write unto you, little children, because ye have known the Father.
language2_text: Ko ipeyteygami inyo a akma koy inyapwan, do nyo kanoyngan ji Yeso Kizisto a nimeycicinda mavyay no kakwa a Tao do to. Ko inyo ipeyteygami a mowva tao, ta yanyo rana niharag si Satan.

language1_text: I have written unto you, fathers, because ye have known him that is from the beginning. I have written unto you, young men, because ye are strong, and the word of God abideth in you, and ye have overcome the wicked one.
language2_text: Yako ipeyteygami inyo akma koy anak, ta nyo anoyngan si Ama ta do to. Ko ipeyteygami inyo a akma koy inyapwan, ta nyo anoyngan si Yeso Kizisto a nimeycicinda amyan no kakwa. Ko inyo ipeyteygami a mowva tao, ta kamo tey makdeng so nakenakem a meyhanhan ni Ama ta do to, do nyo kapeyyan sya do onowned nyo so ciring na ni Ama ta do to, a yarana nimharag si Satan.

language1_text: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
language2_text: Ji nyo akzan o makakaday a ikeykakza no tao do karawan. Ta no si ikakza nyo ori am meyparai kamo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, and the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, is not of the Father, but is of the world.
language2_text: O makakaday rana marahet do karawan a akman so pangangagoman ta kano ta macita a ikeykakza ta marahet a kano pahaman ta so nakenakem ta am mamimin ori a monganay do raraten no tao do karawan. So ji na monganai ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And the world passeth away, and the lust thereof: but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever.
language2_text: O karawan eya kano pangangagoman no tao am ji meyyonownay ori. Am o mapeyvazay so vazay ni Ama ta do to am amyan rana jya o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na do teyngato.

language1_text: Little children, it is the last time: and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come, even now are there many antichrists; whereby we know that it is the last time.
language2_text: Manga ovay, yarana makeykai o na pangavosan no karawan. Nimamizing nyo na o na kai no Omalalas ji Kizisto a tao. So yada ikanoyong no omalalas ji Kizisto a yarana meytotwaw. O vazay rana ori am ipakateneng ta na do kasngen na rana no pangavosan no karawan.

language1_text: They went out from us, but they were not of us; for if they had been of us, they would no doubt have continued with us: but they went out, that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us.
language2_text: Sira rana omalalas ji Kizisto a tao am sya ji meyngongyod ori a omraralay ni Kizisto. Am ori o da rana ji macilovoci jyaten. O manoyong a omraralay ni Kizisto am macikaop sira jyaten. Am sya ji macikaop jyaten sicyaikwaya. Am ori o ta ipakateneng jira omalalas ji Kizisto.

language1_text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One, and ye know all things.
language2_text: Am na rana nitoro jinyo o Seyzi ni Kizisto. Am ori o nyo ikamimin a yarana makateneng do nanao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
language2_text: O ko peyteygamyan ninyo am nyo katenngan o nanao na ni Ama ta do to. So nyo ipakateneng do malas a beken a apo do nanao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ? He is antichrist, that denieth the Father and the Son.
language2_text: O mangalalas a tao am omalalas ji Yeso Kizisto a Tao do to. So ikanoyong no akman sang a omalalas ji Kizisto a tao, do kaji da nganoyngan ji Ama ta do to a kano Anak na.

language1_text: Whosoever denieth the Son, the same hath not the Father: (but) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also.
language2_text: O ji nganoyong do Anak ni Ama ta do to am akman sang si Ama ta do to a ji da nganoyngi. Omanoyong do Anak ni Ama ta do to am akman sang si Ama ta do to a anoyngan da.

language1_text: Let that therefore abide in you, which ye have heard from the beginning. If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you, ye also shall continue in the Son, and in the Father.
language2_text: O ciriciring na ni Ama ta to do a nimamizing nyo no kavayo nyo pa manganoyong am to nyo peyyononga pangozayan. No si manoyong kakman nyo sang am macikaop kamo na ji Ama ta do to a kano Anak na.

language1_text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us, even eternal life.
language2_text: Ta o ipanci na jyaten a mahap ta ni Kizisto am to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta.

language1_text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you.
language2_text: O yadomket do teygami ko a ciring am yako ipaziman jinyo do kaji nyo ngamizngan so malas so ipangnanao a tao.

language1_text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
language2_text: Am inyo am na rana nitoro jinyo ni Yeso Kizisto o Seyzi. No si myan jinyo o Seyzi am ji nyo na ngakdaya o nanao da no tao. Ta nanawen na inyo no Seyzi a ipakateneng nyo do makakaday a vazay. O inanao na jinyo no Seyzi am abo do dang malas. Onotan nyo o nanao no Seyzi. Ta ori o ikanoyong nyo a macikaop ji Kizisto.

language1_text: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.
language2_text: Ji nyo ngawawan o kapacikaop nyo ji Kizisto, manga ovay an. Ta no si marateng o araraw no yai na am abo rana ikarahet nyo no onowned do tangain na.

language1_text: If ye know that he is righteous, ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him.
language2_text: Katenngan nyo o kabo no kararatan ni Kizisto. O tao rana abo so karatan a mangozay do nanao ni Ama ta do to am manoyong a anak ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God: therefore the world knoweth us not, because it knew him not.
language2_text: Yatey makdeng o aryarilaw na jyaten ni Ama ta do to. Yatey rako o pangangarilawan na a makanket jyaten a abneken a anak na. So ikanoyong no nang a ciring. O yada ji makatenngi jyaten a anak ni Ama ta do to no ji nganoyong jya tao am da ji nganoyngi si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Beloved, now are we the sons of God, and it doth not yet appear what we shall be: but we know that, when he shall appear, we shall be like him; for we shall see him as he is.
language2_text: Manga ovay, yaten rana sicyaikwaya am anak na yaten ni Ama ta do to. Am yapa jyatenngi sicyaikwaya o keyteytawan ta no makwa. Am katenngan ta o kakman ta si Kizisto so kataotao no mai, ta manoyong o kapakacita ta sya no mai.

language1_text: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself, even as he is pure.
language2_text: O tao rana mapananala so araraw no yai ni Kizisto am ji meyraraten. Ta inarahen na si Kizisto a ji meylimoteng so onowned.

language1_text: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law: for sin is the transgression of the law.
language2_text: O tao a mapasobna do iwawalam ni Ama ta do to am raraten o akman sang. Ta o raraten rana am mapasobna do iwawalam ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins; and in him is no sin.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no na kai ni Kizisto am na vonasen o raraten no tao, do na kabo no raraten na.

language1_text: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not: whosoever sinneth hath not seen him, neither known him.
language2_text: O macikaop rana ji Yeso a tao am ji ngakdaya rana o kapeyraraten. Am o ji ngaro do raraten na am ji sira pa meyngongyod a omanoyong ji Kizisto.

language1_text: Little children, let no man deceive you: he that doeth righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.
language2_text: Manga ovay, ji kamo a litai an. O apya so icicirawat a tao am manoyong o akman sang a ji meylimoteng so onowned a tao, akman si Kizisto a ji meylimoteng so onowned.

language1_text: He that committeth sin is of the devil; for the devil sinneth from the beginning. For this purpose the Son of God was manifested, that he might destroy the works of the devil.
language2_text: O meyraraten pa tao am macibedbed pa ori ji Satan. Ta nimeycicinda no kakwa o kapeyraraten na ni Satan. Ori na nyai no Anak ni Ama ta do to a ombalinas so vazay ni Satan.

language1_text: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.
language2_text: O anak na rana ni Ama ta do to am ji da rana ngakdaya o kapeyraraten da. Ta macikaop jira si Ama ta do to. Am ori o ji da rana meyrarateni, ta Ama da rana si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: In this the children of God are manifest, and the children of the devil: whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God, neither he that loveth not his brother.
language2_text: O peytarkan no anak ni Ama ta do to a kano macibedbed pa ji Satan am o macibedbed pa ji Satan am ji dakzan o apya. Ji da arilawan o icyatatao da.

language1_text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning, that we should love one another.
language2_text: O ney manma na nimamizing nyo a nanao am masicyakarilaw takamo an.

language1_text: Not as Cain, who was of that wicked one, and slew his brother. And wherefore slew he him? Because his own works were evil, and his brother's righteous.
language2_text: Ji tamo nginara si Kayin. Ta iya rana am macibedbed pa ji Satan a to wakwak so kakteh na a meyngaran si Yapo. Am ikongo to na wakwaki sya ni Kayin. O ikakman na sang am ikeynanahet na si wari na, do kanoyonoyong no nyahahapan na sya ni wari na.

language1_text: Marvel not, my brethren, if the world hate you.
language2_text: Am ori o ji nyo angyaki nya, manga kakteh, no ikaoya da inyo no ji pa nganoyong ji Yeso a tao.

language1_text: We know that we have passed from death unto life, because we love the brethren. He that loveth not his brother abideth in death.
language2_text: Yata rana katenngan o yata kanimablis rana so onowned. O ta ipakateneng dang am ta ikarilaw o akma tey kakteh do cinai. O abo so pangarilawan na am mavaod pa ori no raraten.

language1_text: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer: and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him.
language2_text: O macioya do akma ney kakteh do cinai am akmey to mangap so tao. O mangap so tao am abo pa jya o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na.

language1_text: Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.
language2_text: O ta ipakateneng do pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to am si Kizisto nitomoro no inawan na jyaten. Am ori o ikasaray ta manidong so tao. Tana mangay rana o inawan ta do panidongan ta so akma tey kakteh do cinai am cyaha. Apya akman sang.

language1_text: But whoso hath this world's good, and seeth his brother have need, and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him, how dwelleth the love of God in him?
language2_text: No myan so mabsoy a tao a makacita so akma ney kakteh do cinai a ji makananaob a kato na ngilikan sya am ji na mancyan keyyan na jya no pangangarilawan ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: My little children, let us not love in word, neither in tongue; but in deed and in truth.
language2_text: Manga ovay, taosya o ciring so pangangarilawan an. Ta o manoyong a pangarilawan na am macita do icicirawat na o panidongan na so tao.

language1_text: And hereby we know that we are of the truth, and shall assure our hearts before him.
language2_text: O ikanoyong ta makateneng do kahap ta so manoyong a nanao ni Ama ta do to am amyan jyaten o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to. Am ori o ji ta nyahei do tangain ni Ama ta do to

language1_text: For if our heart condemn us, God is greater than our heart, and knoweth all things.
language2_text: a makanakem so mina raraten ta. Ta ipeyhanhan ta o kavonas na ni Ama ta do to so raraten ta, do katey rako no pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God.
language2_text: Manga ovay, no abo rana o ikarahet ta do tangain ni Ama ta do to am masaray ta so onowned a omanop rana si Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his commandments, and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.
language2_text: No myan so amin ta ji Ama ta do to am itoro na jyaten. Ta ta onotan o nanao na a yamapeyvazay so isaray na vazay.

language1_text: And this is his commandment, That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ, and love one another, as he gave us commandment.
language2_text: O ciring na jyaten ni Ama ta do to am anoyngan ta o Anak na si Yeso Kizisto a manci no kapasicyakarilaw ta.

language1_text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him, and he in him. And hereby we know that he abideth in us, by the Spirit which he hath given us.
language2_text: O tao a omonot do ciring na ni Ama ta do to am manoyong o akman sang a macikaop ji Ama ta do to. So icyakman na sang ni Ama ta do to a macikaop jya. O ta ipakateneng ji Ama ta do to a yamacikaop jyaten am Seyzi a yamacitovong jyaten.

language1_text: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.
language2_text: Inyo rana manga keypong am ji nyo to peyzangkapa sira anoyngan o manci no keyyan na jira no Seyzi. Ta ileylamdamen nyo o kanoyong na, kalas na no ipanci da Seyzi a apo ji Ama ta do to. Ta yaro sira o yamangalalas no nanao da a tao.

language1_text: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:
language2_text: O ipakateneng nyo do tao a yanan no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to am to nyo na tenngi o tao a manci ni Yeso Kizisto a nimatazak a tao, ta ori o manoyong a yanan no apo ji Ama ta do to a Seyzi.

language1_text: and every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that spirit of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.
language2_text: Omalalas ji Yeso a tao am abo jya o Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to. O akman sang a tao am alalasan da si Kizisto. Nimamizing nyo na o kai no akman sang a tao do karawan. So na ikanoyong rana yamyan do karawan.

language1_text: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
language2_text: Am inyo rana manga ovay am yakamo macikaop ji Ama ta do to. So nyo ikanoyong a yarana nimharag so malas so ipangnanao a tao. Ta yarakorako o oyowyat no Seyzi a yamyan jinyo a kani Satan a tomalamozong nira.

language1_text: They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.
language2_text: Sira rana yamalas so ipangnanao a tao am sira macikownongan pa ji Satan. Ta o da ipangnanao am yaji macipayok do manoyong a nanao ni Ama ta do to. So da amizngan sira no ji nganoyong ji Yeso a tao.

language1_text: We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.
language2_text: Am yata rana macikaop ji Ama ta do to. Am sira rana yaomanoyong ji Ama ta do to a tao am da amizngen o ipeylimwang ta a nanao. Am sira rana yaji nganoyong jya am da ji ngamiznga yaten. Ori an o ipakateneng ta do manoyong a yanan no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a kano kabwan no Seyzi a mangalalas a tao.

language1_text: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
language2_text: Masicyakarilaw tamo manga ovay an. Ta yapo o pangangarilawan ji Ama ta do to. O mangarilaw a tao am manoyong a anak ni Ama ta do to, do kapakateneng da ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
language2_text: O abo so pangangarilawan na am beken a anak ni Ama ta do to. Ta si Ama ta do to rana am yapwan no pangangarilawan.

language1_text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.
language2_text: Na nitovoy ni Ama ta do to o veyvowen a Anak na a yamapacita no pangangarilawan na jyaten. So ikanoyong ta makahap so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta.

language1_text: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
language2_text: O pangangarilawan rana am beken a yaten marilaw ni Ama ta do to, ta si Ama ta do to am ori o marilaw nyaten. Ta iya o yapwan no meyngongyod a pangangarilawan. Am ori o nitovoyan na so Anak na mangay mawakwak no raraten ta.

language1_text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.
language2_text: Masicyakarilaw tamo manga keypong an. Ta si Ama ta do to o yamarilaw nyaten.

language1_text: No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.
language2_text: Abo tao a nimakacita si Ama ta do to. Am no si masicyakarilaw tamo am manoyong kapacikaop na jyaten ni Ama ta do to, do kanoyong ta na mapatwaw so pangangarilawan na.

language1_text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
language2_text: Yamanoyong ta kapacikaop ji Ama ta do to. So na ikakman sang a yamacikaop jyaten. O ta ipakateneng do dang am na nitoro jyaten o Seyzi.

language1_text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to am na nitovoy o Anak na do karawan a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato. So namen nipakacittan so akman sang, a namen kapeylimwang rana no nang do tao.

language1_text: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.
language2_text: No amyan so tao a manci no kanoyong na ji Yeso a Anak na ni Ama ta do to am manoyong o akman sang a macikaop ji Ama ta do to. So icyakman na sang ni Ama ta do to a macikaop jya.

language1_text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.
language2_text: Tamo anoyngan na karilaw nyaten ni Ama ta do to. Ta si Ama ta do to am yapwan no pangangarilawan. O yanan no pangangarilawan ni Ama ta do to a tao am macikaop ji Ama ta do to. So icyakman na sang ni Ama ta do to a macikaop jya.

language1_text: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.
language2_text: O pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to am peypahagnat na o pangangarilawan ta. Ta no marateng rana o araraw no ipeykapyapinpin na so tao ni Ama ta do to am masaray ta so onowned. Ta inarahen ta o icicirawat ni Kizisto no keyyan na pa do teyrahem.

language1_text: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.
language2_text: No katenngan ta rana si Ama ta do to a marilaw nyaten am abo rana o ikanyahey ta. Ta ji na rana pasingkaji yaten ni Ama ta do to. Ta o pangangarilawan ni Ama ta do to o mapakaro so kanyaheyan ta. No ikanyahey ta pa si Ama ta do to am ji ta pa meyhanhanan a marilaw nyaten.

language1_text: We love him, because he first loved us.
language2_text: O ta ipangarilaw am nimanmanma si Ama ta do to a nimarilaw nyaten.

language1_text: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?
language2_text: No amyan so tao a manci no kararalay na ni Ama ta do to a kapacioya na pa do akma ney kakteh do cinai am mangalalas a tao o akman sang. Ta kaji na aryarilawan no macita na akma ney kakteh do cinai a imanngo rana yajyacita ta Tao do to.

language1_text: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.
language2_text: O ciring na jyaten ni Yeso Kizisto am o omraralay ni Ama ta do to a tao am ikarilaw na o akma ney kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God: and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him.
language2_text: O tao rana omanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto a Misayya am manoyong o akman sang a anak na ni Ama ta do to. O tao a omraralay ni Ama ta do to am akman sang a marilaw no akma ney kakteh do cinai, ta meyyangangay sira anak na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.
language2_text: No si iraralay ta si Ama ta do to a mahap so nanao na am katenngan ta rana o kapeyngongyod ta marilaw no akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to do karawan.

language1_text: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no kararalay ta ni Ama ta do to am onotan ta o ciring na. Ta jyasalit o ciring na ni Ama ta do to a onotan.

language1_text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.
language2_text: Mamimin o anak ni Ama ta do to o makaharag so marahet a vazay do karawan. O ipakaharag da so marahet a vazay am voovoo da o kapeyhanhan da ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?
language2_text: Sino sira o makaharag so marahet a vazay do karawan. Omanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto a Anak ni Ama ta do to a tao am ori saon o makaharag sya.

language1_text: This is he that came by water and blood, even Jesus Christ; not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth.
language2_text: O nimai do teyrahem a nitaktakan no ranom a nimvoyog so rala am si Yeso Kizisto. O ranom a kano rala na am yongkad no ka Misayya na. So icyakman na sang no Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to a macyanoyong jya. Ta o Seyzi rana am tey manoyong.

language1_text: For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one.
language2_text: Meykatlo o macyanoyong jya.

language1_text: And there are three that bear witness in earth, the Spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one.
language2_text: Ori rana am Seyzi a kano ranom a kano rala na a nimvoyog a nimawakwak no raraten ta. So icyakma dey asa nira ori a yongkad na Misayya.

language1_text: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son.
language2_text: Tamo anoyngan o yada ipeylimwang no tao. Am maharahara pa si Ama ta do to a meylimwang no Anak na.

language1_text: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.
language2_text: Am o tao rana omanoyong do Anak na ni Ama ta do to am manoyong keyyan na do onowned na no ciring na ni Ama ta do to. Am o ji nganoyong ji Ama ta do to am alalasen na si Ama ta do to. Ta ji na nganoyngi o ciring na ni Ama ta do to a meylimwang no Anak na.

language1_text: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
language2_text: O ciring rana nipeylimwang na ni Ama ta do to am nitoro na rana jyaten o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta. Am o yapwan na no nang am Anak na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.
language2_text: O tao a omanoyong do Anak na am amyan jya o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na. O ji nganoyong do Anak ni Ama ta do to am abo jya o to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na.

language1_text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.
language2_text: O ko vatvatkan do jya am ko ipanci jinyo o na rana keyyan jinyo a yaomanoyong do Anak na ni Ama ta do to no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:
language2_text: Abo ikanyahey ta do tangain ni Ama ta do to, ta tamo ipeyhanhan o na kamizing so inozi ta no si pangozayan ta o nakenakem na ni Ama ta do to a mapasyasi jya.

language1_text: and if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.
language2_text: Tamo anoyngan o kamizing na so inozi ta ni Ama ta do to a tomoro no amin ta jya.

language1_text: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.
language2_text: No makacita kamo so akma nyoy kakteh do cinai a meyraraten am ipeynozi nyo ji Ama ta do to a kavonas na jya kapanta na nya so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na. Am o omalalas do Seyzi am ji ko na mancyan o kapeynozi nyo nya. Ta manoyong o akman sang a peydednan no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: All unrighteousness is sin: and there is a sin not unto death.
language2_text: O malas a vazay am mamimin a raraten o akman sang. Am amyan dang so jyavonas.

language1_text: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.
language2_text: Yaten rana anak ni Ama ta do to am ji ta rana ngakdaya o kapeyraraten ta. Ta apzatan ni Yeso Kizisto o onowned ta. So ji na rana makagogaji nyaten ni Satan.

language1_text: And we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.
language2_text: Tamo katenngan o kapacikaop ta ji Ama ta do to. So ta pakatenngan do kapacikownongan da ji Satan no yaji manganoyong a tao do karawan.

language1_text: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.
language2_text: Tamo katenngan o Anak ni Ama ta do to a yanimai rana a yamanta nyaten so teneteneng ta a ta ipakateneng do manoyong a Tao do to. So ta ikanoyong a macikaop do ney manoyong na a Tao do to a kani Yeso Kizisto a Anak na. Iya rana am manoyong a Tao do to a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad ta.

language1_text: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
language2_text: Inyo rana manganako am makowyowyat kamo pa mapahawa so kataotao nyo do malas a iraralay da.

language1_text: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth; and not I only, but also all they that have known the truth;
language2_text: Yaken rana am cyozo ko. Yako ipeyteygami imo a yana nipamnekan ni Ama ta do to amraralay nya a mavakes a kano ananak mo. Yatey rako o yako karilawan ninyo. Am beken a yakehen o yamarilaw ninyo, ta yamamimin sira o yamakateneng do nanao ni Ama ta do to a yamarilaw ninyo.

language1_text: for the truth's sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.
language2_text: Ta o nanao ni Ama ta do to am yamyan do onowned ta a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: Grace be with you, mercy, and peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na jyaten ni Ama ta do to a kano Anak na si Yeso Kizisto o pangangarilawan na kano pangangasyan na kano ikapiya no onowned ta. So to ta na noibi nya do karawan so kapangononong ta do nanao na kano pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.
language2_text: Ko masaray a yamakateneng do na keyyan do ananak mo no yamanoyong a yaomonot do nanao na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
language2_text: Am ori o yako vavagan jinyo an. Inaoy si akma tamoy asa a marilaw no kadwan jyaten. Oya rana am beken a vayo a ciring an, ta oya rana am nimamizing nyo na no kavayo nyo pa omanoyong ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.
language2_text: O yako ipanci a pangangarilawan am amizngen ta o ciring na ni Ama ta do to. O nimamizing nyo pa no kakwa a pangangarilawan am patwawen nyo do icicirawat nyo.

language1_text: For many deceivers are entered into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver and an antichrist.
language2_text: Yamyan so aro a mangnanao no malas a nanao a tao a amlivolivon do karawan. O da patwawen a ciring am da alalasan si Yeso Kizisto a nimalikey do karawan. Sira rana ori am mangalalas so tao a omalalas ji Kizisto.

language1_text: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.
language2_text: Makapzat kamo an. Ta ori o iyan no kakownongan no vazay namen jinyo. So ikanoyong nyo a makahap so nakem na jinyo ni Ama ta do to no makwa.

language1_text: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.
language2_text: O ji ngahap so nanao ni Kizisto a mapasala jya tao am abo do onowned na si Ama ta do to. O mahap so nanao na ni Ama ta do to a tao am manoyong sira akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to a macikaop ji Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: If there come any unto you, and bring not this doctrine, receive him not into your house, neither bid him God speed:
language2_text: No amyan so tao a omnanao jinyo a katarek no ipangnanao na am ji nyo amya mangay do vahay nyo. Ji nyo nirsirnga.

language1_text: for he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.
language2_text: No amyan so tao a meyminaminasi nya am akma ney to macyanoyngi o malas a vazay na.

language1_text: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write with paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.
language2_text: Yaro pa o ciring a yako ipanci jinyo am ko ji to nosnosan a yavatvatkan, ta ko naknakmen o kato ko na macimatan jinyo a pacisirsirngan. No si makaranes ko jinyo do dang am jyabo kaji ta narayan a makacita so kadwan jyaten a.

language1_text: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.
language2_text: O ananak da no akma nyoy kakteh do cinai am da ipeyminaminasi inyo.

language1_text: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.
language2_text: Yaken rana am cyozo ko a yameyteygami ni Cyayo a ney kaglaw ko a akma koy kakteh do cinai.

language1_text: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.
language2_text: Mo ovay, inaoy si apiya o makakaday a vazay mo. Akman sang o kataotao mo a akmey aryaripasalaw, akman so yamo kakdekdeng so nakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For I rejoiced greatly, when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee, even as thou walkest in the truth.
language2_text: Makaranes sira o akma tey kakteh do cinai do jya am ipanci da jyaken o kakdekdeng mo so nakem ji Ama ta do to a manoyong a mangozay do nanao na. So nikasaray ko a makamizing sya.

language1_text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth.
language2_text: Mamizing ko inyo manganako a mangozay do nanao ni Ama ta do to am ji ko rana tenngi o sarasaray ko.

language1_text: Beloved, thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren, and to strangers;
language2_text: Mo keypong, yatey makdeng o nakenakem mo a yamahap so vazay no akma moy kakteh do cinai. Tana kadwan lili am yakman sang o nakem mo sira.

language1_text: which have borne witness of thy charity before the church: whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort, thou shalt do well:
language2_text: Da nimalavat do kyokay do jya o pangangarilawan mo. So sidongan mo pa sira meypangay do angayan da a meylimwang no Mapasaray a Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to an. Ta akman rana sang am isaray ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: because that for his name's sake they went forth, taking nothing of the Gentiles.
language2_text: Ta o ipangilili da nira ori am ciring na ni Yeso Kizisto. Am yabo da nyahap a da isidong sira no ji manaralay a tao.

language1_text: We therefore ought to receive such, that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth.
language2_text: Ori o sidongan ta sira a yamraralay ni Ama ta do to. Ta ori o icyakma tey macivazay jira meylimwang no nanao ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I wrote unto the church: but Diotrephes, who loveth to have the preeminence among them, receiveth us not.
language2_text: Ko nimeyteygami do kyokay do dang am si Titevey a yamnakenakem so na kakmey tomalamozong no kyokay am na to nazibwan o ciring ko.

language1_text: Wherefore, if I come, I will remember his deeds which he doeth, prating against us with malicious words: and not content therewith, neither doth he himself receive the brethren, and forbiddeth them that would, and casteth them out of the church.
language2_text: No si mai ko am patwawen ko o mina vazay na, do kanimangamaog na so iraherahet na jyamen a ciring. Beken a orii o na nikarehtan. Ta iya rana am na ji naotawwa sira o akma ney kakteh do cinai a meylimwang no Ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a na ioya sira a yapagcinen do kyokay o yatomaotao sira tao.

language1_text: Beloved, follow not that which is evil, but that which is good. He that doeth good is of God: but he that doeth evil hath not seen God.
language2_text: Ji mo nginara o akman sang a marahet, mo keypong an, ta kahap mo so apiya vazay. Ta o apya so icicirawat am macikaop ji Ama ta do to. O marahet so icicirawat a tao am ji meyngongyod o akman sang a makateneng ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Demetrius hath good report of all men, and of the truth itself: yea, and we also bear record; and ye know that our record is true.
language2_text: Yabo yaji naray ni Temolyo, do na kato macipayokan no icicirawat na do ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. So namen sarayan nya. So na ikanoyong no yakman sang a ciring namen.

language1_text: I had many things to write, but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee:
language2_text: Yaro pa ciring a yako ipanci jimo. Am ko na jyapakongo a yavatvatkan.

language1_text: but I trust I shall shortly see thee, and we shall speak face to face. Peace be to thee. Our friends salute thee. Greet the friends by name.
language2_text: Inaoy si makeykai ko rana makacita jimo a kawalawalam tamo rana makacita so kadwan jyaten.

language1_text: Jude, the servant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to them that are sanctified by God the Father, and preserved in Jesus Christ, and called:
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Yota ko a lamlamsoy na ni Yeso Kizisto a kakteh na ni Yake. Ko ipeyteygami inyo a nipamnekan na rana ni Ama ta do to a yamahap rana so pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a yamanoyong a yana rana apzatan ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: mercy unto you, and peace, and love, be multiplied.
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na jinyo o pangangasyan na kano ikapiya no onowned nyo a kano pangangarilawan nyo.

language1_text: Beloved, when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation, it was needful for me to write unto you, and exhort you that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints.
language2_text: Manga keypong, nimanakem ko o kapeyteygami ko ninyo a pancyan ko no kapatazadang na jyaten ni Ama ta do to do teyngato. Am apyapya pa o kavavaga ko jinyo a kowyat nyo a mangozay do nipeylimwang da rana jinyo no nipamnekan na ni Yeso a amlivolivon no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. Ta oya rana am yajyablis a pangozayan no amraralay nya tao.

language1_text: For there are certain men crept in unawares, who were before of old ordained to this condemnation, ungodly men, turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness, and denying the only Lord God, and our Lord Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Ta yamyan so yatatasa ka tao a yamacizavoz jyaten. Sira rana am yamalas o yada ahahapan so pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a kano ciring na a yada ibonbon do da pasagpyanan so kataotao da. Da taosyahen si Yeso Kizisto a yamaveyvow a yatomalamozong nyaten. No kakwa pa am amyan rana so ciring a domket do Seysyo a omaing jira, do keyyan no ipasingsingkad na sira ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: I will therefore put you in remembrance, though ye once knew this, how that the Lord, having saved the people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed them that believed not.
language2_text: Tana nyo na mamimin o akman sang a vazay a katenngan am ko paolin a ipanci jinyo o nisidongan na sira ni Ama ta do to so Isedi a tao a nikomaro do Ayci. So nibalinas na so karwan da ji manganoyong a tao.

language1_text: And the angels which kept not their first estate, but left their own habitation, he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo sira o nimeyraraten a tinsi a ji niomamizing si Ama ta do to a to ngaro do apiya yanan da do teyngato. Sira rana am na sira to peyyononga yavaoden ni Ama ta do to a yaneban do kasarisaryan a yaomapanala so araraw no ipasingkad na sira.

language1_text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha, and the cities about them in like manner, giving themselves over to fornication, and going after strange flesh, are set forth for an example, suffering the vengeance of eternal fire.
language2_text: Naknakmen nyo o tao a yameyvahay do Sotoma kado Hamola kano yamacitangked do dang so ili a tao a yamapasala so aktokto da a yamapeyvazay so macimasesnek a vazay. So ikanoyong no jyahesep a lila no apoy a nimangay meydedna jira. O akman rana sang a vazay am ikananao da rana ori no meyraraten a tao.

language1_text: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh, despise dominion, and speak evil of dignities.
language2_text: O yamalas so ipangnanao a tao am akman sira so sang. Ta da to mangozangozai o aktokto da yamapasagpyan so kataotao da. Da kolalahen o oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to. Da ipeyzozominyak o tinsi do teyngato.

language1_text: Yet Michael the archangel, when contending with the devil he disputed about the body of Moses, durst not bring against him a railing accusation, but said, The Lord rebuke thee.
language2_text: Kakwakwan no panirsirngen no tinsi a meyngaran so Micyale a ji makadket ji Satan a avain, no kapeysolib da do kataotao ni Moyse no kawakwak na. O kanimanci na nya ji Satan so, "Ioya na imo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: But these speak evil of those things which they know not: but what they know naturally, as brute beasts, in those things they corrupt themselves.
language2_text: Am sira rana a malas so ipangnanao a tao ori am da to rehrehta o yada jyatenngi a vazay. So da icyakmey omalalam a ji makateneng do apya kano marahet. Ori rana o ipakasapa da so peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Woe unto them! for they have gone in the way of Cain, and ran greedily after the error of Balaam for reward, and perished in the gainsaying of Core.
language2_text: Sira rana am to sira makasi, ta da to nginara o mina vazay ni Kayin a kani Palang a nimakza no nizpi. So da icyakman si Kela a jya niomamizing si Moyse. So icyakman da sira ori a balinasen na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: These are spots in your feasts of charity, when they feast with you, feeding themselves without fear: clouds they are without water, carried about of winds; trees whose fruit withereth, without fruit, twice dead, plucked up by the roots;
language2_text: No kamo mamarimaring so kanen am nyo pacikatamwadan sira, do da kabo no panganyanigan. So da icyakman so cinalab a yana pavyoten no pagpag a ji na maciralai no cimoy. So da icyakman so kayo a ji malasi, akmey nimasapwat so yamot a to rana oto.

language1_text: raging waves of the sea, foaming out their own shame; wandering stars, to whom is reserved the blackness of darkness for ever.
language2_text: Sira akman so otab no awa yarana todapengkad so raraten. Sira akman so ananayo a jyatenngi so angayan. Am o angayan na nira ni Ama ta do to am to meyyonong a kasarisaryan.

language1_text: And Enoch also, the seventh from Adam, prophesied of these, saying, Behold, the Lord cometh with ten thousands of his saints,
language2_text: Amyan rana so ciring na a pagazen na jira do ikapito da tapilan no sivosivovoong na ni Adam a meyngaran so Inok. Maniring am, "Cita kamo o Panirsirngen ta a yamapalolo so yameykalaklaksa a tinsi a yamai do karawan,

language1_text: to execute judgment upon all, and to convince all that are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have ungodly committed, and of all their hard speeches which ungodly sinners have spoken against him.
language2_text: a mapeykapyapinpin so tao do karawan, a mapasingsingkad do meyraraten a tao. Ta ji sira macipayok so aktokto a meynyagamo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: These are murmurers, complainers, walking after their own lusts; and their mouth speaketh great swelling words, having men's persons in admiration because of advantage.
language2_text: Masangib sira meyoyaoya a ji makamyamya no peymeymasaodan da. Da to ngonongonongi o nakenakem da, mapakazwazway no ciring da. Apiya o ciring da a ipeha da do icyatatao da.

language1_text: But, beloved, remember ye the words which were spoken before of the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ;
language2_text: Am manga keypong, ji nyo a hamangi o ciring da no nipamnekan ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a amlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: how that they told you there should be mockers in the last time, who should walk after their own ungodly lusts.
language2_text: Maniring sira jinyo am, "Do kavosan no karawan am amyan so tao a komolala si Ama ta do to a meykeykaming ninyo."

language1_text: These be they who separate themselves, sensual, having not the Spirit.
language2_text: So to na meyyangai ya kano mina ciring da jinyo. O akman rana sang a mapeyzavozavoz jinyo a tao am abo jira o Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to. Ta kapangozay da do onowned da a omnakenakem so kapeyvwak da so tao.

language1_text: But ye, beloved, building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Ghost,
language2_text: Am inyo rana manga keypong am makowyat kamo so nakenakem ji Ama ta do to a mangozay do manoyong a nanao na. Ipeyhanhan nyo o Seyzi no meynozi kamo.

language1_text: keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.
language2_text: Ji nyo ngawawan do onowned nyo o pangangarilawan na ni Ama ta do to a meyhanhan ni Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a marilaw ninyo a manta ninyo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: And of some have compassion, making a difference:
language2_text: Sira rana yameykeykarwa pa so nakem a tao am ikarilaw nyo sira a pakdekdengen so nakem ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and others save with fear, pulling them out of the fire; hating even the garment spotted by the flesh.
language2_text: O yatatasa ka tao a da nilittan no yamalas so ipangnanao a tao am paolin nyo o nakenakem da, ta makasi sira mangay do lila no apoy. Am azimanen nyo o kaji nyo to macikzan jira a meyraraten.

language1_text: Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory with exceeding joy,
language2_text: Apzatan na inyo ni Ama ta do to a kaji nyo meyraratenan. So ikanoyong nyo a masaray a abo so karatan a mangay do tangain na ni Ama ta do to a macikazway jya.

language1_text: to the only wise God our Saviour, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and ever. Amen.
language2_text: Si Ama ta do to am abo o ikararwa na a yanitomovoy si Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen ta a mapatazadang jyaten do teyngato. Inaoy si mangay jya o azwazway do teyngato a kado teyrahem nimapo no kakwa, na kai sicyakwaya a kangay na do kaidan no karawan. Amin.

language1_text: The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John:
language2_text: O vakong rana ya am na adketan no nipatwaw ni Yeso Kizisto a vazay. O na nitorwan nya jya ni Ama ta do to so akman sang a vazay am mangay na ipanci do aro a lamlamsoy na o yarana makeykai a makaranes a vazay. Si Kizisto rana am nimapahanhan so tinsi a mangay mapacita no aro a vazay eya do lamlamsoy na si Yowani.

language1_text: who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.
language2_text: Meyratateng am padketen na rana ni Yowani do vakong o nimacita na aro a vazay. Ori rana am nipatwaw ni Yeso Kizisto a ciriciring a apo ji Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Blessed is he that readeth, and they that hear the words of this prophecy, and keep those things which are written therein: for the time is at hand.
language2_text: O amvilang do vakong eya tao am tey yapya sira. O makamizing so yana nipaziman a ciring a kapangonong da jya am tey yapya sira o akman sang a tao, ta yarana makeykai o araraw na no ipakaranes na.

language1_text: John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace be unto you, and peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne;
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Yowani ko. Yako ipeyteygami sira o yapito a ka kyokay do Yasiya pongso. Inaoy no si itoro na jinyo o ikapiya no onowned nyo a kano pangangarilawan a apo ji Ama ta do to a jyablis a Tao do to a nimapo no kakwa a na kato ngayyan sicyaikwaya a mangay do kaidan no karawan a kano Seyzi na ni Ama ta do to,

language1_text: and from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,
language2_text: a kani Yeso Kizisto a ta ipeyhanhan so ciring. Iya rana am ney manma na nimirwa a mavyay. Si Yeso Kizisto rana am yatomalamozong no panipanirsirngen do karawan. Na ikarilaw yaten. Na nipahawa yaten no rala na do yata peyraratenan.

language1_text: and hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
language2_text: Na nipamnekan yaten ni Yeso a to ngonongonong do kangay ta do tangain na ni Ama ta do to a omraralay nya. Inaoy si omaing o azwazway a kano oyowyat ji Yeso Kizisto a mangay do kaidan no karawan. Amin.

language1_text: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.
language2_text: Citahen nyo an, si Yeso Kizisto a maciralay do cinalab a mai an. Mamimin o tao a makacita sya, mangay do nimapadket sya do jyojika tao o makacita sya. So ikamimin no tao do karawan a malaw nya so onowned a makaranes do karawan. So ikanoyong no akman so sang.

language1_text: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
language2_text: Maniring si Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta am, "Yaken am Aarva kano Yamicya a nikapwan na kano pangavosan na no aro a vazay eya." Ta si Ama ta do to rana am jyablis a Tao do to a nimapo no kakwa a na kato ngayyan sicyaikwaya a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: I John, who also am your brother, and companion in tribulation, and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ, was in the isle that is called Patmos, for the word of God, and for the testimony of Jesus Christ.
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Yowani ko a akma nyoy kakteh do cinai. Ta yata akmey asaha do tangain ni Yeso. So yako ipacizanod jinyo a yaji macizizikna do alalaw nyo, do yana katalamozongan nyaten ni Ama ta do to. Niplin da yaken do alikey a pongso a meyngaran so Patemo do kapeylimwang ko no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a kano nanao a nipatwaw ni Yeso Kizisto.

language1_text: I was in the Spirit on the Lord's day, and heard behind me a great voice, as of a trumpet,
language2_text: Ipisa ka niciyo na am oyatan na yaken no Seyzi. So nipakamizing ko so akmey meyzapa a manci nya jyaken do likod ko.

language1_text: saying, I am Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What thou seest, write in a book, and send it unto the seven churches which are in Asia; unto Ephesus, and unto Smyrna, and unto Pergamos, and unto Thyatira, and unto Sardis, and unto Philadelphia, and unto Laodicea.
language2_text: Maniring am, "Imo rana am vatvatkan mo o mo macita a kaparara mo so vakong do apito a ka kyokay do Ivoso a kado Semayna kado Peycyamo a kado Tiyatila kado Satise a kado Veylatevey a kado Lawticya."

language1_text: And I turned to see the voice that spake with me. And being turned, I saw seven golden candlesticks;
language2_text: Citahen ko o macisirsiring jyaken a tao am mapengkad ko o apito a ka peyzeyzampwan a ovay.

language1_text: and in the midst of the seven candlesticks one like unto the Son of man, clothed with a garment down to the foot, and girt about the paps with a golden girdle.
language2_text: O avak no peyzeyzampwan am amyan so asa ka akmey tao a meytatanek do dang a meyyayob so magorogod a mangay do ai na a mibtek so ovay do vatavat na.

language1_text: His head and his hairs were white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes were as a flame of fire;
language2_text: O avok na am akman so bobow no kagling so kalavalavang. O mata na am akman so apoy a manikap.

language1_text: and his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.
language2_text: O ai na am akmey nilinasan a aswaz. O ciring na am akman so azda a zomaigezeg.

language1_text: And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword: and his countenance was as the sun shineth in his strength.
language2_text: O wanan na am meypinan so apito a ka mata no hanit a somangpa so matarem a ipangan. O moing na am akman so peyignan no araw a mangowap.

language1_text: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last:
language2_text: Macita ko am to ko naziyazikaz do tangain na, akman rana so nimawakwak a tao. Meyratateng am pinanan na yaken no wanan na. Maniring am, "Ji ka nyahey. Ta yaken rana am nikapwan na kano pangavosan na.

language1_text: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.
language2_text: Yaken rana am to ko meyyonong a mavyay. Nimawakwak ko no kakwa. Am ko na mavyay sicyaikwaya a mangay do kaidan no karawan. Yaken rana am yatomalamozong no kawakwakan a kano yaomanam pa vazay ko do mawakwak a tao.

language1_text: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;
language2_text: Imo rana am vatvatkan mo o macita mo. Tana sicyaikwaya, tana yaomanam pa a vazay am miminen mo a padketen.

language1_text: the mystery of the seven stars which thou sawest in my right hand, and the seven golden candlesticks. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches: and the seven candlesticks which thou sawest are the seven churches.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan no yapito a ka peyzeyzampwan a ovay a macita mo do wanan ko am yapito a ka kyokay. O yapito a ka mata no hanit am panipanirsirngen no yapito a ka kyokay."

language1_text: Unto the angel of the church of Ephesus write; These things saith he that holdeth the seven stars in his right hand, who walketh in the midst of the seven golden candlesticks;
language2_text: Maniring jyaken si Yeso am, "Ipeyteygami mo o yamimong no kyokay do Ivoso. Si maniring ka am, 'Yamaniring o yameypinan no wanan na so yapito a ka mata no hanit a yaomalam do avak no yapito a ka peyzeyzampwan a niparing da no ovay am:

language1_text: I know thy works, and thy labour, and thy patience, and how thou canst not bear them which are evil: and thou hast tried them which say they are apostles, and are not, and hast found them liars:
language2_text: Ko katenngan o nyo kasasaodan. Kamo mowyat a yameyvazay a yaji macizizikna do alalaw nyo. Ko katenngan inyo a yamapengkad so meyraraten a tao a amlivolivon no yamacitarek a ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to. So yanyo ipakateneng do malas a tao.

language1_text: and hast borne, and hast patience, and for my name's sake hast laboured, and hast not fainted.
language2_text: Yakamo tey mowyat so onowned a ji macizizikna do aro a alalaw nyo a mahap so vazay ko.

language1_text: Nevertheless I have somewhat against thee, because thou hast left thy first love.
language2_text: Am yamyan so yasa ka vazay a yako oyyan ninyo. Ori rana am yarana nimablis o nyo kararalay nyaken. So nyo rana jyakmai no kakwa so onowned.

language1_text: Remember therefore from whence thou art fallen, and repent, and do the first works; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will remove thy candlestick out of his place, except thou repent.
language2_text: To nyo rana naknakma o yanyo nikahahan no nakenakem an. So ipamlis nyo a amwoli so kararalay nyo nyaken an. Ta no si ji kamo mamlis am to ko nangai a mehes so peyzeyzampwan nyo.

language1_text: But this thou hast, that thou hatest the deeds of the Nicolaitanes, which I also hate.
language2_text: Am yasa o yanyo kapyan, ta yakamo akman jyaken a yamaoya no iwawalam no Nikela tao.

language1_text: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the midst of the paradise of God.
language2_text: O ciring no Seyzi so peycyakyokyokayan na am amizngen nyo a yameycicilwan a tao an. Sira rana yamakata tao am ipanta ko sira so oyowyat da a koman so asyasi no kayo a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da ji Ama ta do to do teyngato.'

language1_text: And unto the angel of the church in Smyrna write; These things saith the first and the last, which was dead, and is alive;
language2_text: "Ipeyteygami mo o yamimong no kyokay do Semayna. Si maniring ka am, 'Yamaniring o nikapwan na kano pangavosan na a yanimirwa a mavyay am:

language1_text: I know thy works, and tribulation, and poverty, (but thou art rich) and I know the blasphemy of them which say they are Jews, and are not, but are the synagogue of Satan.
language2_text: Ko inyo katenngan so alalaw a yamavak so velek. Am inyo rana am kamo ney mabsoy na. Ko inyo katenngan a yada tamwaden no yamanci no ka tao da do Yotay. Am sira rana ori am beken a tao do Yotay, ta sira rana am akmey kalavongan ni Satan.

language1_text: Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall cast some of you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.
language2_text: Ji nyo anyaheyan o yaomanam a alalaw nyo. Citahey kamo si Satan a yaomileylamdam so nakem nyo si Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong no tatasa jinyo a mangay na alyowen do pamemtengan. So ikasa ngarnan (10) no araraw na no peyrarehten no kataotao nyo. Am to kamo ngotokot so nakem. Ta ori o pantan ko ninyo so to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad nyo.

language1_text: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; He that overcometh shall not be hurt of the second death.
language2_text: "'O ciring no Seyzi so peycyakyokyokayan na am amizngen nyo a yameycicilwan an. O jya nimablis so onowned a tao am ji rana meydedna jya o keypirwa na mawakwak.'

language1_text: And to the angel of the church in Pergamos write; These things saith he which hath the sharp sword with two edges;
language2_text: "Ipeyteygami mo o yamimong no kyokay do Peycyamo. Si maniring ka am, 'Yamaniring o yameypinan so yamatarem a ipangan am:

language1_text: I know thy works, and where thou dwellest, even where Satan's seat is: and thou holdest fast my name, and hast not denied my faith, even in those days wherein Antipas was my faithful martyr, who was slain among you, where Satan dwelleth.
language2_text: Ko katenngan na katey mowyat ni Satan do yanyo peyilyan. Am yanyo jya nipasaklangan yaken no kawakwak da so meylimwang no ciring ko a tao a meyngaran so Antipa do italamozong na ni Satan a ili nyo. Nyo jya nipeymakarwan yaken a iraralay.

language1_text: But I have a few things against thee, because thou hast there them that hold the doctrine of Balaam, who taught Balac to cast a stumblingblock before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed unto idols, and to commit fornication.
