Sira rana am meytatanek sira do awa panganinwan a minan do nitoro na jira ni Ama ta do to a pakzikziken a meyyanwanood,

language1_text: And they sing the song of Moses the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, Great and marvellous are thy works, Lord God Almighty; just and true are thy ways, thou King of saints.
language2_text: a meyyanwanood so anood ni Moyse a lamlamsoy ni Ama ta do to a kano anood no Kagling. O aingan no anood da am, "Mo Panirsirngen a tey mowyat a Tao do to a yatomalamozong no peycyamahamahatawan na. Yatey manoyong o vazay mo a yaji mapeycyakaban so tao.

language1_text: Who shall not fear thee, O Lord, and glorify thy name? for thou only art holy: for all nations shall come and worship before thee; for thy judgments are made manifest.
language2_text: Mo Panirsirngen, sino makadket jimo a ji raralayan. Sino ji nganood so ngaran mo. Imo saon o ji meylimoteng so onowned a Tao do to am. So ikamimin no tao do peycyamahamahatawan na a mangay do tangain mo a omraralay nimo. Ta yarana nimamimin o tao a yarana nimeymatamata do iwawalam mo a yaji mapeycyakaban so tao."

language1_text: And after that I looked, and, behold, the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened:
language2_text: Komavos ori am macita ko do teyngato o panaralayan a meywang. Amyan do sahad na so peyheyhekasan na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and the seven angels came out of the temple, having the seven plagues, clothed in pure and white linen, and having their breasts girded with golden girdles.
language2_text: O tomalamozong no apito a ka alalaw a tinsi am makowbot a apo do panaralayan a meyyayob so maniray a ayob. O vatavat da am mibtek so vowawan.

language1_text: And one of the four beasts gave unto the seven angels seven golden vials full of the wrath of God, who liveth for ever and ever.
language2_text: O asa do apat a ka omalalam am itoro na o apito a ka vowawan a panay do papito a tinsi a kapnowan no oyaoya no to meyyonong a Tao do to.

language1_text: And the temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power; and no man was able to enter into the temple, till the seven plagues of the seven angels were fulfilled.
language2_text: O panaralayan na am kapnowan no aob a apo do azwazway a kano oyowyat ni Ama ta do to. Ji da nipakas no papito a ka tinsi so apito a ka alalaw am abo tao a makasdep do sahad no panaralayan.

language1_text: And I heard a great voice out of the temple saying to the seven angels, Go your ways, and pour out the vials of the wrath of God upon the earth.
language2_text: Makamizing ko so ciring a amlololos a apo do sahad no panaralayan a somirisiring so papito a ka tinsi. Maniring am, "Angay kamo a kapaglo nyo do teyrahem so yamyan do yapito a ka panay a peyoyaoyyan ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And the first went, and poured out his vial upon the earth; and there fell a noisome and grievous sore upon the men which had the mark of the beast, and upon them which worshipped his image.
language2_text: Mangay o ney manma na tinsi am paglowen na o panay na do teyrahem. Karahan am amlida o noka do kataotao da no yanan no yongkad no omalalam a kano nimraralay no kamamagenan na no omalalam a tao.

language1_text: And the second angel poured out his vial upon the sea; and it became as the blood of a dead man: and every living soul died in the sea.
language2_text: O tomonton a tinsi am paglowen na o panay na do awa. Karahan am meyvaliw o awa akmey rala no nimawakwak a tao. Ori o nikamimin no masaod no awa a mawakwak.

language1_text: And the third angel poured out his vial upon the rivers and fountains of waters; and they became blood.
language2_text: O ikatatlo da no tinsi am paglowen na o panay na do ayo a kado atbodan no ranom. Karahan am meyvaliw o ranom a rala.

language1_text: And I heard the angel of the waters say, Thou art righteous, O Lord, which art, and wast, and shalt be, because thou hast judged thus.
language2_text: Maniring o tomalamozong no ranom a tinsi a nimamizing ko pa am, "Imo rana yamyan sicyaikwaya kano kakwa a yaji meylimoteng so onowned am ka manoyong a yaji mapeycyakaban so tao a yamapacici.

language1_text: For they have shed the blood of saints and prophets, and thou hast given them blood to drink; for they are worthy.
language2_text: Sira rana am nipavoyog da o rala no yaomanop jimo a tao a kano panoyonoywan mo so ciring mo. Sicyaikwa rana ya am ipanta mo sira so rala a yopen da. Ta manoyong ori a ipasingsingkad mo sira."

language1_text: And I heard another out of the altar say, Even so, Lord God Almighty, true and righteous are thy judgments.
language2_text: Maniring o ciring a apo do patanatanangan so nakem a nimamizing ko am, "Mo Panirsirngen a tey mowyat a Tao do to, yabo mo kalalasan a yamapacici so tao, do yamo kaji mapeycyakabanan so tao."

language1_text: And the fourth angel poured out his vial upon the sun; and power was given unto him to scorch men with fire.
language2_text: Paglowen no ikapapat no tinsi o panay na do araw am to rana manemtem so tao o azidangdang no araw.

language1_text: And men were scorched with great heat, and blasphemed the name of God, which hath power over these plagues: and they repented not to give him glory.
language2_text: O tao am kakwatan no azidangdang no araw. Am ori o nyavayan da so tey mowyat a Tao do to a tomalamozong no alalaw. So ji da ngaroi do peyraratenan da. Ji dakzan o kasaray da ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And the fifth angel poured out his vial upon the seat of the beast; and his kingdom was full of darkness; and they gnawed their tongues for pain,
language2_text: O ikalalima no tinsi am paglowen na o panay na do lilisnan no omalalam ang a apo do awa. Meyratateng am masari rana o italamozong na ili. O tao rana am to da ranangta o lila da, do kateywara no pakaliliwan da so kataotao da.

language1_text: and blasphemed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores, and repented not of their deeds.
language2_text: To da na ngavaya si Ama ta do to, do kateywara no pakaliliwan da so kataotao da kano noka da. Am ji da ngaroi o marahet a iwawalam da.

language1_text: And the sixth angel poured out his vial upon the great river Euphrates; and the water thereof was dried up, that the way of the kings of the east might be prepared.
language2_text: O ikananem no tinsi am paglowen na o panay na do ayo a meyngaran so Yovalati. Meyratateng am to rana akehang do kapeypalanginan na no apo do daddan no araw a panipanirsirngen so rarahan da.

language1_text: And I saw three unclean spirits like frogs come out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast, and out of the mouth of the false prophet.
language2_text: Karahan am macita ko o tatlo a ka kalamsoyan ni Satan a akmey tozatoza a nimapo do ngoso no kamolay a kado ngoso no omalalam a kado ngoso na no makahaw a tao.

language1_text: For they are the spirits of devils, working miracles, which go forth unto the kings of the earth and of the whole world, to gather them to the battle of that great day of God Almighty.
language2_text: Sira rana am kalamsoyan ni Satan a meyvazay so mapangyangyalak a vazay. Sira rana kalamsoyan ni Satan am mangay sira do peycyeylilyan na a meykala so panipanirsirngen a kalovot da sira a omarap si Ama ta do to no marateng rana o araraw ni Ama ta do to a tey mowyat a Tao do to.

language1_text: Behold, I come as a thief. Blessed is he that watcheth, and keepeth his garments, lest he walk naked, and they see his shame.
language2_text: "Amizngen nyo an. No mai ko am akma koy manakaw a ji mapaziman a mai. O meytataziman a tao am tey yapya o akman sang, ta nyayoban na rana o kataotao na. So ji na rana macimasesneki no kataotao na do tangain no tao."

language1_text: And he gathered them together into a place called in the Hebrew tongue Armageddon.
language2_text: Karahan am lovoten da rana no tatlo a kalamsoyan ni Satan o aro a panipanirsirngen do ngaranan no Sipolay a tao a Hamaketon.

language1_text: And the seventh angel poured out his vial into the air; and there came a great voice out of the temple of heaven, from the throne, saying, It is done.
language2_text: Paglowen na no ikapapito no tinsi o panay na do hanit am amyan so ciring a apo do lilisnan do panaralayan. Maniring am, "Cyana," kwan na.

language1_text: And there were voices, and thunders, and lightnings; and there was a great earthquake, such as was not since men were upon the earth, so mighty an earthquake, and so great.
language2_text: Meyratateng am meycicilat a kapeykadey na, kapeykanini na. Am abo pa o akman sang so karakorako a kanini.

language1_text: And the great city was divided into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell: and great Babylon came in remembrance before God, to give unto her the cup of the wine of the fierceness of his wrath.
language2_text: O rako a ili a meyngaran so Papilon am nimeykadwa o nikazazyan na. So ikabo na no jya nimabalinas a ili do peycyamahamahatawan na. O icyakman na sang am peyyanen na ni Ama ta do to do onowned na o raraten da no tao do Papilon. Am ori o nipakasan na sya jira ni Ama ta do to so peyoyaoyyan na.

language1_text: And every island fled away, and the mountains were not found.
language2_text: So nikamimin no mahataw a ji rana cita. So icyakman na sang no tokotokon.

language1_text: And there fell upon men a great hail out of heaven, every stone about the weight of a talent: and men blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail; for the plague thereof was exceeding great.
language2_text: O rako a makarerekmeh am mangay makas do tao. O karehrehmet na am abo makanat sang a tao so karehrehmet. Am ori o to da raheraheci si Ama ta do to, do kateywara no pakaliliwan da so kataotao da meyngen.

language1_text: And there came one of the seven angels which had the seven vials, and talked with me, saying unto me, Come hither; I will shew unto thee the judgment of the great whore that sitteth upon many waters:
language2_text: O papito a ka tinsi a makakaday no panay am amyan jira so asa a mai jyaken. Maniring am, "Sijya, ta ipacita ko jimo o ipasingkad so yasomagpyan a mavakes. Iya rana am yatomnek a rako a ili do sirisiri no aro ayo.

language1_text: with whom the kings of the earth have committed fornication, and the inhabitants of the earth have been made drunk with the wine of her fornication.
language2_text: Abo ji na nicirara no somagpyan a mavakes a panipanirsirngen do karawan a omraralay no malas a tao do to. So icyakma dey masaki no tao do karawan a to ngonongonot jya."

language1_text: So he carried me away in the spirit into the wilderness: and I saw a woman sit upon a scarlet coloured beast, full of names of blasphemy, having seven heads and ten horns.
language2_text: Yaken rana am nipeypalanginan na yaken no Seyzi a kangay na nyaken no tinsi do kabwan no nihakawan no tao. Am ori o nipakacita ko so asa ka mavakes a maoran do asa ka akmey vangkoro a omalalam. O kataotao no omalalam am makakaday no nivatvatkan a ciring a iraherahet na si Ama ta do to. Omalalam rana am apito oo na kano asa ngarnan a ozong na.

language1_text: And the woman was arrayed in purple and scarlet colour, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls, having a golden cup in her hand full of abominations and filthiness of her fornication:
language2_text: O mavakes rana am meyyayob so vangkoro a ayob a adketan no vowawan a kano olo a kano masingat a lalitan. O lima na am meypinan so vowawan a panay a kapnowan no makakaday a macimasesnek a vazay na.

language1_text: and upon her forehead was a name written, MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF HARLOTS AND ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH.
language2_text: Amyan so matayo so peypeypangayan a nivatvatkan do zozogwan na. Ori rana am, "Rako a ili do Papilon a akma dey ina no mapasagpyan so kataotao da do karawan."

language1_text: And I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus: and when I saw her, I wondered with great admiration.
language2_text: Karahan am macita ko o mavakes a masaki no rala no omanop ji Ama ta do to a tao a kano rala da no niwakwak da a nimeylimwang ni Yeso a tao. Macita ko am ikalak ko.

language1_text: And the angel said unto me, Wherefore didst thou marvel? I will tell thee the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carrieth her, which hath the seven heads and ten horns.
language2_text: Maniring jyaken o tinsi am, "Ikongo mo kalakan nya. Ipanci ko jimo o peypeypangayan no yasomagpyan a mavakes a kano na avangan a yapito so oo a kano yasa ngarnan so ozong a omalalam ang.

language1_text: The beast that thou sawest was, and is not; and shall ascend out of the bottomless pit, and go into perdition: and they that dwell on the earth shall wonder, whose names were not written in the book of life from the foundation of the world, when they behold the beast that was, and is not, and yet is.
language2_text: O nimacita mo a omalalam am nimavyay pa no kakwa am yarana maliman sicyaikwaya. So ikakeykai na rana mai a apo do abo so takadan a gazawagaw a jyatenngi so karaherahem a meypangay do kararatan a ipasingkad na sya ni Ama ta do to. O tao do teyrahem a jidket so ngaran do vakong a yanan na rana no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da no kaji na pa amaogan no karawan am mamimin sira malak no omalalam a nimavyay pa no kakwa yarana maliman sicyaikwaya. So ikanoyong da malak nya no meytotwaw no makwa.

language1_text: And here is the mind which hath wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sitteth.
language2_text: "O mateneng a tao am to da na tenngi. O peypeypangayan no apito a ka oo am apito a ka tokon a lisnan no mavakes. Ipanci da ori a papito a ka panirsirngen.

language1_text: And there are seven kings: five are fallen, and one is, and the other is not yet come; and when he cometh, he must continue a short space.
language2_text: Nimawakwak rana o lalima. O asa am meypanirsirngen sicyaikwaya. So ipeypanam na pa no asa mai. Am no mai am alikey iyan na meypanirsirngen.

language1_text: And the beast that was, and is not, even he is the eighth, and is of the seven, and goeth into perdition.
language2_text: O nimavyay no kakwa yarana maliman sicyaikwaya am iya o ikawao a panirsirngen. Am karwan da ori no papito a ka panirsirngen a meypangay do kararatan a ipasingkad na sya ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And the ten horns which thou sawest are ten kings, which have received no kingdom as yet; but receive power as kings one hour with the beast.
language2_text: "O peypeypangayan no mo nimacita yasa ngarnan a ozong am yaomanam pa yasa ngarnan a panipanirsirngen. Am sira rana am mahap da o peypanirsirngan da a kapacizanod da do omalalam a meypanirsirngen. Am alikey o iyan da do panirsirngen.

language1_text: These have one mind, and shall give their power and strength unto the beast.
language2_text: Sira rana yasa ngarnan a panipanirsirngen am meyyangangay o ahapan da sya. Ta itoro da o oyowyat da do omalalam.

language1_text: These shall make war with the Lamb, and the Lamb shall overcome them: for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings: and they that are with him are called, and chosen, and faithful.
language2_text: Sira rana am arapen da o Kagling am haragen na sira no Kagling a kano nipamnekan na tao a omanop jya. Ta iya rana am kabtekan a Panirsirngen."

language1_text: And he saith unto me, The waters which thou sawest, where the whore sitteth, are peoples, and multitudes, and nations, and tongues.
language2_text: Maniring pa jyaken o tinsi am, "Mo nimacita o ranom a yana lisnan no yasomagpyan a mavakes ang. O peypeypangayan no nang am peycyamahamahatawan na kano meykalyalipenpenan a tao a kano meykataretarek so ciriciring a tao.

language1_text: And the ten horns which thou sawest upon the beast, these shall hate the whore, and shall make her desolate and naked, and shall eat her flesh, and burn her with fire.
language2_text: O yasa ngarnan a ozong a kano omalalam am ikaoya da o mavakes. Am ori o nipehes da so kangangay na. So ikabo na rana no aywayob na a kakan da pa so asisi na a kasleb da rana sya temtemen.

language1_text: For God hath put in their hearts to fulfil his will, and to agree, and give their kingdom unto the beast, until the words of God shall be fulfilled.
language2_text: Ta nipakemkem na ni Ama ta do to o nakenakem na do onowned da no asa ngarnan a panipanirsirngen. So icyakma dey asa so ahahapan sya, a kapanta da rana no omalalam so oyowyat a meypanirsirngen mangay si mangononong rana o ciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And the woman which thou sawest is that great city, which reigneth over the kings of the earth.
language2_text: O mavakes rana a mo nimacita am rako a ili a yatomalamozong no panipanirsirngen do karawan." Ori rana o ciring na jyaken no tinsi.

language1_text: And after these things I saw another angel come down from heaven, having great power; and the earth was lightened with his glory.
language2_text: Mavitos rana ori am macita ko o asa ka tinsi a meyhekas a apo do teyngato. Iya rana am tey rako oyowyat na a to maniray so karawan.

language1_text: And he cried mightily with a strong voice, saying, Babylon the great is fallen, is fallen, and is become the habitation of devils, and the hold of every foul spirit, and a cage of every unclean and hateful bird.
language2_text: Maniring ori a amlololos am, "Yarana nimabalinas o rako a ili a meyngaran so Papilon. Ori rana am yamanoyong a yada peyvahayan no makakaday a kararay na ni Satan a da peyvahayan no yamapaoya a meyyasasalap.

language1_text: For all nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her fornication, and the kings of the earth have committed fornication with her, and the merchants of the earth are waxed rich through the abundance of her delicacies.
language2_text: Ta yana cinirara no Papilon o peycyamahamahatawan na a mapasagpyan so kataotao da a yamraralay no malas a iraralay da. So da nionotan jya no panipanirsirngen. O meypananazangan a tao am nikarapan o nizpi da no peycyamahamahatawan na a omraralay no malas a iraralay da."

language1_text: And I heard another voice from heaven, saying, Come out of her, my people, that ye be not partakers of her sins, and that ye receive not of her plagues.
language2_text: Makamizing ko paha so ciring a apo do teyngato. Maniring am, "Pakowbot kamo na a yamanop jyaken a tao. Pakowbot kamo na apo do ili ang. Ta mangay jinyo o raraten na kano pasingsingtan na jya ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: For her sins have reached unto heaven, and God hath remembered her iniquities.
language2_text: Ta yarana to makanavak do hanit o raraten na. So na tovilan do raraten na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: Reward her even as she rewarded you, and double unto her double according to her works: in the cup which she hath filled fill to her double.
language2_text: So to na macilociloloi do mina vazay na no ipasingkad na jya. So ikanoyong no ipasingkad na jya a meyparahet.

language1_text: How much she hath glorified herself, and lived deliciously, so much torment and sorrow give her: for she saith in her heart, I sit a queen, and am no widow, and shall see no sorrow.
language2_text: O nakenakem na meyhahama no kabsoy na kano kazwayan na am meyvoga rana o kakdekdeng no ipasingkad na jya. So ikabo no kavyavyayan na a meyrarahet. Ta o aktokto na so kataotao na am, 'Amlisna ko do lilisnan no panirsirngen. Beken a vao ko. So ikabo no alalaw ko.'

language1_text: Therefore shall her plagues come in one day, death, and mourning, and famine; and she shall be utterly burned with fire: for strong is the Lord God who judgeth her.
language2_text: Am ori o ipeydedna na no alalaw jya do kasaraw. So iyan na rana no ingingnen a kano meykakcin a kano mazabab so onowned. So ikatemtem na do lila no apoy. Ta o mapasingkad jya am Panirsirngen a tey rako so oyowyat a Tao do to."

language1_text: And the kings of the earth, who have committed fornication and lived deliciously with her, shall bewail her, and lament for her, when they shall see the smoke of her burning,
language2_text: O macizanod jya amraralay no malas a tao do to a panipanirsirngen do teyrahem am mavoya da o aob no apoy a tomemtem sya. So ilololos da mazabab nya so onowned.

language1_text: standing afar off for the fear of her torment, saying, Alas, alas, that great city Babylon, that mighty city! for in one hour is thy judgment come.
language2_text: Manyahey sira a makacita sya meyrarahet. Ori o nipakarai da meytatanek. Maniring sira am, "To ka makasi a rako a ili a yameyngaran so Papilon. Ta yasa ka vatvatek pa am yarana meydedna jimo no pasingsingtan na jimo ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her; for no man buyeth their merchandise any more:
language2_text: O meypananazangan do teyrahem a tao am abo ji lavi jya, do kabo rana no somazang do apzapzatan da.

language1_text: the merchandise of gold, and silver, and precious stones, and of pearls, and fine linen, and purple, and silk, and scarlet, and all thyine wood, and all manner vessels of ivory, and all manner vessels of most precious wood, and of brass, and iron, and marble,
language2_text: So ikabo rana no tao a somazang do ovay da kano gizit da kano zaka da kano angongonay da kano tamtamek da. So icyakman na sang no nicinon da masisingat a ayob a kano nipariparing da no masisingat a kayo a apzapzatan a kano makakaday a masisingat a ileylamnay da no nakem.

language1_text: and cinnamon, and odours, and ointments, and frankincense, and wine, and oil, and fine flour, and wheat, and beasts, and sheep, and horses, and chariots, and slaves, and souls of men.
language2_text: Abo rana o tao a manazang so makakaday a pipya kanekanen a kano mahangno a haneng a kano saki a kano makakaday a pazavozen da do yakan da a haneng a kano odong a kano mogi a kano baka kano kagling a kano lolowen no baka aleleh a kano peylamsoin da tao.

language1_text: And the fruits that thy soul lusted after are departed from thee, and all things which were dainty and goodly are departed from thee, and thou shalt find them no more at all.
language2_text: Maniring o meypananazangan a tao do rako a ili a meyngaran so Papilon am, "O yamo ikakza a meycyamadadayan a apipya apzapzatan am yabo rana. Yakman sang o azwazway mo. Ta todabo rana. Jyabo kapeysinaoli na pa jimo a."

language1_text: The merchants of these things, which were made rich by her, shall stand afar off for the fear of her torment, weeping and wailing,
language2_text: O meypananazangan do ili ori a nimakanizpi a tao am makararai sira do kahawa da no kapazanod na sira do pasingsingtan ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: and saying, Alas, alas, that great city, that was clothed in fine linen, and purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold, and precious stones, and pearls!
language2_text: Maniring sira amlavi am, "To makasi o rako a ili ya. Ta akman so mavakes a mabwang a meyyayob so inyangana na meytaktakzes so padonen a kano makekdeng a tamtamek.

language1_text: For in one hour so great riches is come to nought. And every shipmaster, and all the company in ships, and sailors, and as many as trade by sea, stood afar off,
language2_text: Am yapa jyangay do yasa ka vatvatek am na rana nikatemteman no kangangay na." O manavilak do aro a avang a kano maoran do avang a tao a kano kasakap da kano aro a mangahangahahap a tao am makararai sira do kwang.

language1_text: and cried when they saw the smoke of her burning, saying, What city is like unto this great city!
language2_text: Macita da o aob no apoy a tomemtem so rako a ili am amlololos sira. Maniring sira am, "Sino o makataha so akman sya rako a ili."

language1_text: And they cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and wailing, saying, Alas, alas, that great city, wherein were made rich all that had ships in the sea by reason of her costliness! for in one hour is she made desolate.
language2_text: Meyratateng am mangap sira so tana a pasakoin da do oo da a amzezezeng a omlavi. Maniring sira am, "To makasi o rako a ili ya. Ta makanizpi sira o amyan so avang a meyliyliktaw do jya. Ta ji pa angay do asa ka vatvatek am katemteman na rana a kabo na no makakaday a kangangay na.

language1_text: Rejoice over her, thou heaven, and ye holy apostles and prophets; for God hath avenged you on her.
language2_text: "Somaray kamo do teyngato, ta yarana nimabalinas o rako a ili a meyngaran so Papilon. Inyo a yaomanop ji Ama ta do to a kano amlivolivon no ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a kano panoyonoywan na so ciring am somaray kamo, ta na rana nipangonong inyo ni Ama ta do to. So na rana nipasingsingtan jya."

language1_text: And a mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone, and cast it into the sea, saying, Thus with violence shall that great city Babylon be thrown down, and shall be found no more at all.
language2_text: Makarahan am amyan so mowyat a tinsi a mangap so rako a vato a paliwaten na do awa. Maniring am, "Kakma ka sang a rako a ili do Papilon a mabalinas a ji rana meyteytotoro.

language1_text: And the voice of harpers, and musicians, and of pipers, and trumpeters, shall be heard no more at all in thee; and no craftsman, of whatsoever craft he be, shall be found any more in thee; and the sound of a millstone shall be heard no more at all in thee;
language2_text: Abo rana dang o mamizing a maganaganam a meyyanwanood a kano meyzeyzapa tao. So icyakman da sang no meytanatana tao a kano mangsad a tao a ji rana amizing.

language1_text: and the light of a candle shall shine no more at all in thee; and the voice of the bridegroom and of the bride shall be heard no more at all in thee: for thy merchants were the great men of the earth; for by thy sorceries were all nations deceived.
language2_text: Ji rana lila o zampo. Ji rana amizing o ciriciring da no meysinmo a tao. O meypananazangan a tao do dang am mamimin sira ney meynakem na tao do karawan. Abo ji na nicirara a tao do karawan no oyowyat ni Satan."

language1_text: And in her was found the blood of prophets, and of saints, and of all that were slain upon the earth.
language2_text: Manoyong o ili do Papilon a peydednan no peyoyaoyyan na ni Ama ta do to. Ta do ili rana ori am nikawakwakan da no panoyonoywan na so ciring a kano omanop jya tao. So ikanoyong na do ili ori nikawakwakan da no tao do teyrahem.

language1_text: And after these things I heard a great voice of much people in heaven, saying, Alleluia; Salvation, and glory, and honour, and power, unto the Lord our God:
language2_text: Komavos ori am makamizing ko pa so macyak a ciring. So icyakma dey amlololos no tao do teyngato. Maniring sira am, "Anooden ta si Ama ta do to. Ta si Ama ta do to o yamapatazadang jyaten a kano yapwan no azwazway a kano oyowyat.

language1_text: for true and righteous are his judgments: for he hath judged the great whore, which did corrupt the earth with her fornication, and hath avenged the blood of his servants at her hand.
language2_text: Manoyong o kaji na mapeycyakabanan so tao do pacicyan na so tao, ta na rana nipasingsingtan o rako a ili akman so somagpyan a mavakes a yatomirara so tao do karawan a yamraralay no malas a iraralay a na kawakwak pa so lamlamsoy na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And again they said, Alleluia. And her smoke rose up for ever and ever.
language2_text: Maniring sira no keypirwa da amlolos am, "Anooden si Ama ta do to. O aob no apoy a itemtem na so rako a ili am jyavitos a mangay do kaidan no karawan."

language1_text: And the four and twenty elders and the four beasts fell down and worshipped God that sat on the throne, saying, Amen; Alleluia.
language2_text: Makarahan am meylilitod sira o papat so ikakatlwan a kamanrarakehan a kano apat a ka omalalam a omraralay ni Ama ta do to a omlisna do lilisnan no panirsirngen. Maniring sira am, "Amin. Anooden si Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And a voice came out of the throne, saying, Praise our God, all ye his servants, and ye that fear him, both small and great.
language2_text: Makarahan am amyan so ciring a apo do lilisnan. Maniring am, "Inyo rana a lamlamsoy ni Ama ta do to a kano amraralay nya tao am tana meynakem a tana ipangoyongoyod da inyo am mamimin kamo a omanwanood so Tao do to ta."

language1_text: And I heard as it were the voice of a great multitude, and as the voice of many waters, and as the voice of mighty thunderings, saying, Alleluia: for the Lord God omnipotent reigneth.
language2_text: Mamizing ko paha o akmey amlololos a aro a tao. O ciring da am akma raney azda kano adey a zomaigezeg. Maniring am, "Anooden si Ama ta do to, ta yatey mowyat a yarana myan do Panirsirngen.

language1_text: Let us be glad and rejoice, and give honour to him: for the marriage of the Lamb is come, and his wife hath made herself ready.
language2_text: Makapya ta somaray a zomwazway sya. Ta yarana makeykai o araw no kapazagzagpit no Kagling. So yana rana tazimanan jya no yasomeksek jya mavakes.

language1_text: And to her was granted that she should be arrayed in fine linen, clean and white: for the fine linen is the righteousness of saints.
language2_text: Na rana nipanta ni Ama ta do to so malavang a ayob na." (O peypeypangayan no malavang a ayob ori am kapyapya no vazay da no omanop ji Ama ta do to a tao.)

language1_text: And he saith unto me, Write, Blessed are they which are called unto the marriage supper of the Lamb. And he saith unto me, These are the true sayings of God.
language2_text: Makarahan am maniring jyaken o tinsi am, "Vatvatkan mo o katey yapya da no nitaidan na tao a macikasaray jya a nimatarek so vahay." Maniring pa o tinsi am, "Manoyong ya ciring na ni Ama ta do to."

language1_text: And I fell at his feet to worship him. And he said unto me, See thou do it not: I am thy fellowservant, and of thy brethren that have the testimony of Jesus: worship God: for the testimony of Jesus is the spirit of prophecy.
language2_text: So nipeylilitod ko do tangain na omraralay nya. Maniring jyaken am, "Ji ka akman sang an. Ta yaken rana ka nimo a kano akma moy kakteh do cinai a yamahap so nipeylimwang na ni Yeso a nanao am mamimin a lamlamsoy ni Ama ta do to. So raralayan mo ni Ama ta do to. Ta o nanao na ni Yeso Kizisto am meyyangay ori a kano nipangnanao da no panoyonoywan na ni Ama ta do to so ciring na no kakwa pa yato ngai sicyaikwaya."

language1_text: And I saw heaven opened, and behold a white horse; and he that sat upon him was called Faithful and True, and in righteousness he doth judge and make war.
language2_text: Makarahan am macita ko o teyngato a kacyangan a keyyan no asa ka malavang a baka. O ngaran no maoran do baka tao am meyngaran si Manoyong a kani Ipeyhanhan. Iya rana am to na mangozai o apya aktokto na a mapacici so tao a omarap so kavosoyan na.

language1_text: His eyes were as a flame of fire, and on his head were many crowns; and he had a name written, that no man knew, but he himself.
language2_text: O mata na am akma raney lila no apoy. O oo na am meysakop so aro a sakop no panirsirngen. Amyan so nivatvatkan do kataotao na a ngaran am abo tao a makateneng do peypeypangayan na. Ta iya o makateneng jya.

language1_text: And he was clothed with a vesture dipped in blood: and his name is called The Word of God.
language2_text: O ayob na magorogod am maday a rala. O ingaran da jya am Ciring na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: And the armies which were in heaven followed him upon white horses, clothed in fine linen, white and clean.
language2_text: O kalavongan na do teyngato am maoran sira do malavang a baka a meyyayob so malavang a ayob a macihza jya.

language1_text: And out of his mouth goeth a sharp sword, that with it he should smite the nations: and he shall rule them with a rod of iron: and he treadeth the winepress of the fierceness and wrath of Almighty God.
language2_text: So nipeytotwaw no ipangan do ngongoy na. O ipangan am ibalinas na so peycyamahamahatawan. So icyakma ney vahalang so kowyowyat a tomalamozong no peycyamahamahatawan na. So icyakma ney komates so macioya jya tao a pasingsingtan na jira no tey mowyat a Tao do to.

language1_text: And he hath on his vesture and on his thigh a name written, KING OF KINGS, AND Lord OF LORDS.
language2_text: O vatvatek a domket do ayob na kado appa na am, "Kabtekan a Panirsirngen."

language1_text: And I saw an angel standing in the sun; and he cried with a loud voice, saying to all the fowls that fly in the midst of heaven, Come and gather yourselves together unto the supper of the great God;
language2_text: Makarahan am makacita ko so asa ka tinsi a meytatanek do zezaken no araw a omlololos a tomawag do meyyasasalap do hanit. Maniring am, "Sijya kamo, ta yamyan so itoro na ni Ama ta do to a ikabsoy nyo.

language1_text: that ye may eat the flesh of kings, and the flesh of captains, and the flesh of mighty men, and the flesh of horses, and of them that sit on them, and the flesh of all men, both free and bond, both small and great.
language2_text: Kanen nyo rana o kataotao da no nimawakwak a panipanirsirngen a kano panipanirsirngen no itaysang a kano itaysang a kano baka kano maoran do baka tao a kano peylamsoin da kano to naliway a tao a kano meynakem a kano jyeynakem a tao."

language1_text: And I saw the beast, and the kings of the earth, and their armies, gathered together to make war against him that sat on the horse, and against his army.
language2_text: Karahan am macita ko paha o omalalam a kano panipanirsirngen do teyrahem a amlovot so itaysang da a omarap so maoran do baka tao a kano kalavongan na.

language1_text: And the beast was taken, and with him the false prophet that wrought miracles before him, with which he deceived them that had received the mark of the beast, and them that worshipped his image. These both were cast alive into a lake of fire burning with brimstone.
language2_text: So nirakpan da so omalalam a kapazanod da so nimeyvazay so mapangyangyalak a makahaw a tao a rakpen. O makahaw a tao am nimeyvazay ori so mapangyangyalak a vazay a ipeykawad na so yanan no ipatotodo no omalalam a kano niomraralay no kamamagenan na tao. Omalalam rana kano makahaw a tao am niwalit na sira do akman so awa so karakorako a lila no apoy.

language1_text: And the remnant were slain with the sword of him that sat upon the horse, which sword proceeded out of his mouth: and all the fowls were filled with their flesh.
language2_text: O itaysang da am nimimin na sira niwakwak no matarem a ipangan a apo do ngoso na no maoran do malavang a baka tao. So nikabobsoy da no meyyasasalap a nimanoktok so asisi da.

language1_text: And I saw an angel come down from heaven, having the key of the bottomless pit and a great chain in his hand.
language2_text: Makarahan am makacita ko so asa ka tinsi a meygegcin a apo do teyngato a meypinan so kagi no abo so takadan a gazawagaw a jyatenngi so karaherahem a kano rako a ipamamaod a vahalang.

language1_text: And he laid hold on the dragon, that old serpent, which is the Devil, and Satan, and bound him a thousand years,
language2_text: So nirakpan na no tinsi so kamolay. Iya rana ori o volay do Ityan no kakwa pa a meyngaran so Satan. So nivaodan na sya so asa zivo (1000) so awawan.

language1_text: and cast him into the bottomless pit, and shut him up, and set a seal upon him, that he should deceive the nations no more, till the thousand years should be fulfilled: and after that he must be loosed a little season.
language2_text: Meyratateng am iwalit na no tinsi si Satan do abo so takadan a gazawagaw a jyatenngi so karaherahem a kaneb na rana jya a patodwan a kaji na ranay mapeykawadan so peycyamahamahatawan so ipakazivo na (1000) so awawan a ji meytotwaw. Manet rana o asa zivo (1000) so awawan am powboten na rana. Am ji meyyonownay a kaneb na rana jya.

language1_text: And I saw thrones, and they sat upon them, and judgment was given unto them: and I saw the souls of them that were beheaded for the witness of Jesus, and for the word of God, and which had not worshipped the beast, neither his image, neither had received his mark upon their foreheads, or in their hands; and they lived and reigned with Christ a thousand years.
language2_text: Macita ko o aro a lilisnan no panirsirngen a lisnan no tao. Sira rana am mamimin sira nipanta na so oyowyat da a mapacici a mapeykapyapinpin so tao. So nipakacittan ko so pahad da no niwakwak da a meylimwang no nanao ni Yeso a kano ciriciring na ni Ama ta do to a tao. Sira rana am ji da niraralay o omalalam a kano kamamagenan na. Jidket do zozogwan da kado lima da o ngaran no omalalam. Sira rana am nimamimin sira nimirwa a mavyay a kapacizanod da ji Yeso a meypanirsirngen do asa zivo (1000) a awawan.

language1_text: But the rest of the dead lived not again until the thousand years were finished. This is the first resurrection.
language2_text: Ori rana am ipisa pa o kapeyvangon. Karwan da no nimawakwak a tao am panalahen da pa o asa zivo (1000) a awawan a kapeyvangon da rana.

language1_text: Blessed and holy is he that hath part in the first resurrection: on such the second death hath no power, but they shall be priests of God and of Christ, and shall reign with him a thousand years.
language2_text: O nimacizanod do ipisa pa kapeyvangon a tao am manoyong sira akma ney anak ni Ama ta do to a tey yapya. Ta ji na rana nalamozongan sira no ipirwa kawakwak. Ta sira rana am abneken na rana sira ni Ama ta do to a kani Kizisto a to ngonongonong do kangay da do tangain na ni Ama ta do to a amraralay nya. So ipacizanod da ji Kizisto a meypanirsirngen so asa zivo (1000) a awawan.

language1_text: And when the thousand years are expired, Satan shall be loosed out of his prison,
language2_text: Hatasen na o asa zivo (1000) so awawan am pasawain na rana si Satan.

language1_text: and shall go out to deceive the nations which are in the four quarters of the earth, Gog and Magog, to gather them together to battle: the number of whom is as the sand of the sea.
language2_text: So yangay na rana mapeykawad so nakenakem da no tao do Keke a kano Make a pacyangayan da no peycyamahamahatawan. So mangay na peylovolovotan sira ni Satan a mangay omarap. O karwaro no tao am akma raney anay do pasalan so karwaro.

language1_text: And they went up on the breadth of the earth, and compassed the camp of the saints about, and the beloved city: and fire came down from God out of heaven, and devoured them.
language2_text: Makakaday sira o tao do peycyamahamahatawan a omlimot so yanan da ili no omanop ji Ama ta do to a tao. Am amyan so apoy a nipeyhekas ni Ama ta do to a itemtem na sira.

language1_text: And the devil that deceived them was cast into the lake of fire and brimstone, where the beast and the false prophet are, and shall be tormented day and night for ever and ever.
language2_text: Si Satan rana a nimapeykawad sira am iwalit na do akman so awa so karakorako a lila no apoy. Am nimanmanma rana o makahaw a tao a kano omalalam do dang. Sira rana am abo maraw a abo mahep a ipeyrarahet da a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: And I saw a great white throne, and him that sat on it, from whose face the earth and the heaven fled away; and there was found no place for them.
language2_text: Meyratateng am makacita ko so malavang a rako a lilisnan no panirsirngen a kano amlisna do dang. Ji rana cita o hanit a kano teyrahem a tomayo do tangain na.

language1_text: And I saw the dead, small and great, stand before God; and the books were opened: and another book was opened, which is the book of life: and the dead were judged out of those things which were written in the books, according to their works.
language2_text: Makacita ko pa so nimawakwak a tao. Tana meynakem a tana jyeynakem am abo ji nanek do tangain na. So nikawasak na rana no vakong. O asa ka vakong a adketan no ngarangaran no yanan na rana no to meyyonong a inawan da am akman sang a mawasak. O nimawakwak rana tao am to macilocilolo do mina iwawalam da no keyyan da pa do karawan o domket do aro a vakong ang a ipacici na sira.

language1_text: And the sea gave up the dead which were in it; and death and hell delivered up the dead which were in them: and they were judged every man according to their works.
language2_text: Makarahan am patwawen na no awa o nimawakwak a tao. Akman sang o kacyan a mapatwaw so nimawakwak a tao so pahad. Sira rana am to macilocilolo do mina raraten da no keyyan da pa do karawan o pacicyan na sira.

language1_text: And death and hell were cast into the lake of fire. This is the second death.
language2_text: Karahan am balinasen na o kawakwakan a iwalit do akman so awa so karakorako a lila no apoy. O apoy rana am ipirwa kawakwak.

language1_text: And whosoever was not found written in the book of life was cast into the lake of fire.
language2_text: O abo so ngaran do vakong a adketan no ngarangaran da no yanan na rana no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da am iwalit na sira do akman so awa so karakorako a lila no apoy.

language1_text: And I saw a new heaven and a new earth: for the first heaven and the first earth were passed away; and there was no more sea.
language2_text: Makarahan am makacita ko so vayo a hanit a kano vayo a teyrahem. O nimanmanma hanit a kano teyrahem am ji rana cita. Akman sang o awa a ji rana cita.

language1_text: And I John saw the holy city, new Jerusalem, coming down from God out of heaven, prepared as a bride adorned for her husband.
language2_text: Makarahan am macita ko o ili na ni Ama ta do to. Ori rana am Vayo a Yelosaleng a apo ji Ama ta do to do teyngato a nipagcin na do teyrahem. So icyakma ney meyvinavinaywan a tey mazway a citahen a mavakes a omrapong so mangay na seksekan a tao.

language1_text: And I heard a great voice out of heaven saying, Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them, and they shall be his people, and God himself shall be with them, and be their God.
language2_text: Makamizing ko so ciring a apo do lilisnan no panirsirngen. Maniring am, "Yamyan do karawan o vahay ni Ama ta do to a yamacivahay do tao do karawan. Sira rana am abneken na sira anak. So ipacitovong na jira ni Ama ta do to a Tao do to da.

language1_text: And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes; and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying, neither shall there be any more pain: for the former things are passed away.
language2_text: Linasan na ni Ama ta do to o kaoo da. Abo rana o mawakwak. Abo rana mazabab so onowned a kano amlavi so onowned a kano meyngen. So ikanoyong na rana komavos no mina vazay no kakwa."

language1_text: And he that sat upon the throne said, Behold, I make all things new. And he said unto me, Write: for these words are true and faithful.
language2_text: Maniring o amlisna do lilisnan no panirsirngen am, "Citahen mo o kayavayo ko so makakaday." Maniring pa am, "Padketen mo, ta yamanoyong kapeyhanhan no ciring eya."

language1_text: And he said unto me, It is done. I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end. I will give unto him that is athirst of the fountain of the water of life freely.
language2_text: Maniring pa jyaken am, "Yarana nikomavos. Yaken rana am Aarva kano Yamicya. Yaken rana am nikapwan na kano pangavosan na. No myan so mawaw am itoro ko o atbod a yopen na a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad na. Am ori rana am abo ngina na.

language1_text: He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.
language2_text: O ji nimablis so onowned a tao am ori o apya amyop sya. O icyakman na sang am abneken da yaken a Tao do to da a kabnek ko sira anak ko.

language1_text: But the fearful, and unbelieving, and the abominable, and murderers, and whoremongers, and sorcerers, and idolaters, and all liars, shall have their part in the lake which burneth with fire and brimstone: which is the second death.
language2_text: Am sira rana manyahey a tao a kano ji nganoyong jyaken a tao a kano somagpyan a kano manwakwak a kano mangzakza so icyatatao da kano manlita no oyowyat ni Satan a kano manaralay so malas a iraralay a kano mangalalas a tao am amyan so akmey awa so karakorako a lila no apoy a omapanala sira. Ori rana am ipirwa kawakwak ori."

language1_text: And there came unto me one of the seven angels which had the seven vials full of the seven last plagues, and talked with me, saying, Come hither, I will shew thee the bride, the Lamb's wife.
language2_text: O papito a ka tinsi a meypinan so apito a panay a kapnowan no manowji a alalaw am amyan so asa jira a nimai a manci nya jyaken. Maniring am, "Sijya, ta ipacita ko jimo o yasomeksek do Kagling a mavakes."

language1_text: And he carried me away in the spirit to a great and high mountain, and shewed me that great city, the holy Jerusalem, descending out of heaven from God,
language2_text: So nitalamozongan na nyaken no Seyzi. Makarahan am yangay na yaken no tinsi do toktok no tokon a kapacita na nya jyaken so apo ji Ama ta do to a nimeygegcin do teyrahem a Yelosaleng.

language1_text: having the glory of God: and her light was like unto a stone most precious, even like a jasper stone, clear as crystal;
language2_text: O rako a ili rana am yanan no azwazway ni Ama ta do to. So icyakma na raney olo a maniray. No maniray am akma raney panganinwan.

language1_text: and had a wall great and high, and had twelve gates, and at the gates twelve angels, and names written thereon, which are the names of the twelve tribes of the children of Israel:
language2_text: Amyan so makarang a atoy. O atoy rana am adwa o icyarwa na no pangengneban na a pamzatan no rarwa so ikakarwan a tinsi. O pangengneban am domket o ngaran da no rarwa so ikakarwan a iteytetngehan da no Isedi a tao.

language1_text: on the east three gates; on the north three gates; on the south three gates; and on the west three gates.
language2_text: O teyhesa ka mocimot na am atlo o pangengneban. Nikakaday da o pangengneban a nipasazap da do palapalanginan.

language1_text: And the wall of the city had twelve foundations, and in them the names of the twelve apostles of the Lamb.
language2_text: O abneken na soil no atoy am adwa o icyarwa no lalitan a kakakadayan no ngaran da no nipamnekan no Kagling a amlivolivon no ciriciring na.

language1_text: And he that talked with me had a golden reed to measure the city, and the gates thereof, and the wall thereof.
language2_text: O macisirsiring jyaken a tinsi am meypinan so vowawan a ipangtokto a ivitong na do rako a ili a kano pangengneban na kano atoy na.

language1_text: And the city lieth foursquare, and the length is as large as the breadth: and he measured the city with the reed, twelve thousand furlongs. The length and the breadth and the height of it are equal.
language2_text: Akma raney kavangan o ili so keyteytawan. O kanaronaro na kano kowvowvong na kano kakarakarang na am meyyangangay. Kaptepteng na rana jya no tinsi. Aptengan na am makanateng a zivo o kananet na. So icyakman na sang no kowvowvong na kano kakarakarang na.

language1_text: And he measured the wall thereof, an hundred and forty and four cubits, according to the measure of a man, that is, of the angel.
language2_text: No to na mangozai no tinsi o ipamtepteng no tao do karawan a idpang na do atoy no ili am o kakarakarang na am kakteb o ikapat na anet.

language1_text: And the building of the wall of it was of jasper: and the city was pure gold, like unto clear glass.
language2_text: O nipeyyatoy da am lalitan. O nyamaog da so ili da am meyngongyod a vowawan. So icyakma na raney panganinwan a to rana pengkad.

language1_text: And the foundations of the wall of the city were garnished with all manner of precious stones. The first foundation was jasper; the second, sapphire; the third, a chalcedony; the fourth, an emerald; the fifth, sardonyx; the sixth, sardius; the seventh, chrysolyte; the eighth, beryl; the ninth, a topaz; the tenth, a chrysoprasus; the eleventh, a jacinth; the twelfth, an amethyst.
language2_text: O soil na no atoy no ili am pangayan da so ikadwa na so icyarwa no makakaday a masingat a lalitan a yazwazway da sya. O soil na no atoy no ili am pangayan da so ikadwa na so icyarwa no makakaday a masingat a lalitan a yazwazway da sya.

language1_text: And the twelve gates were twelve pearls; every several gate was of one pearl: and the street of the city was pure gold, as it were transparent glass.
language2_text: O peypeypangayan na no yadwa so icyarwa a pangengneban na am adwa so icyarwa a masingat a lalitan. Mamimin o teyhesa ka pangengneban a nyamaog no masingat a lalitan. O rarahan do ili am mamimin a vowawan. So icyakma na raney panganinwan a to rana pengkad.

language1_text: And I saw no temple therein: for the Lord God Almighty and the Lamb are the temple of it.
language2_text: Abo do ili o nimacita ko a panaralayan. Ta si Ama ta do to rana kano Kagling o iraralay da do dang.

language1_text: And the city had no need of the sun, neither of the moon, to shine in it: for the glory of God did lighten it, and the Lamb is the light thereof.
language2_text: O ili rana am tana abo o araw a kano vehan am cyaha, ta cirain na sira no oyowyat na ni Ama ta do to. So peyyapoyan da so Kagling no tao do ili.

language1_text: And the nations of them which are saved shall walk in the light of it: and the kings of the earth do bring their glory and honour into it.
language2_text: Mamimin o peycyamahamahatawan do karawan a mangonong do cirain na. O panipanirsirngen do karawan am mamimin sira mai no keynakman da do ili eya.

language1_text: And the gates of it shall not be shut at all by day: for there shall be no night there.
language2_text: Kasaraw a todeywang o pangengneban. So to na meyyonongi a meywang, ta abo do dang o mahep.

language1_text: And they shall bring the glory and honour of the nations into it.
language2_text: O keynakman da kano azwazway da no peycyamahamahatawan am miminen da yai do ili eya.

language1_text: And there shall in no wise enter into it any thing that defileth, neither whatsoever worketh abomination, or maketh a lie: but they which are written in the Lamb's book of life.
language2_text: Am o meyraraten a kano marahet so iwawalam a kano mangalalas am ji sira makasdep. O amyan so ngaran do vakong no Kagling a yanan rana no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad da am ori o makasdep.

language1_text: And he shewed me a pure river of water of life, clear as crystal, proceeding out of the throne of God and of the Lamb.
language2_text: Makarahan am ipacita na pa jyaken no tinsi o asa ka ayo a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad a to meylacilat a akma raney panganinwan a apo do lilisnan ni Ama ta do to a kano Kagling.

language1_text: In the midst of the street of it, and on either side of the river, was there the tree of life, which bare twelve manner of fruits, and yielded her fruit every month: and the leaves of the tree were for the healing of the nations.
language2_text: O ranom rana am amvoyog a mangonong do rarahan do avak no ili. O sigisigil na no ayo am amyan so kayo a tomanek do dang a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad. Do kasa kawan am ipidwa so icyarwa a meyyasi. So ipangday na do vehavehan a meyyasi. O voong na am makavavaw so ingingnen no tao do peycyamahamahatawan na.

language1_text: And there shall be no more curse: but the throne of God and of the Lamb shall be in it; and his servants shall serve him:
language2_text: Abo rana do ili ya o ikaoya na ni Ama ta do to. So ikanoyong na rana no lilisnan ni Ama ta do to a kano Kagling a amyan rana do ili a kararalay da nya no lamlamsoy na.

language1_text: and they shall see his face; and his name shall be in their foreheads.
language2_text: Sira rana am pacimatan da rana o moing na ni Ama ta do to. O ngaran na ni Ama ta do to am domket do zozogwan da.

language1_text: And there shall be no night there; and they need no candle, neither light of the sun; for the Lord God giveth them light: and they shall reign for ever and ever.
language2_text: Abo rana do dang o mahep. Ji da rana ngezsangan o kabo no zampo a kano araw, ta zezak da si Ama ta do to a Panirsirngen ta. Nipamnekan na sira a meypanirsirngen a mangay do kaidan no karawan.

language1_text: And he said unto me, These sayings are faithful and true: and the Lord God of the holy prophets sent his angel to shew unto his servants the things which must shortly be done.
language2_text: Maniring jyaken o tinsi am, "Yabo na kalalasan no ciring eya. Ta si Ama ta do to a yaniomoyat do panoyonoywan na so ciring am yanimanovoy so tinsi a mapaziman so yaomanam pa vazay do aro a lamlamsoy na. Ta ji rana meyyahahay a mai."

language1_text: Behold, I come quickly: blessed is he that keepeth the sayings of the prophecy of this book.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Amizngen nyo an. Ta makeykai ko na mai. O mangozay do ciring eya yadomket do vakong eya am manoyong o akman sang a tey yapya."

language1_text: And I John saw these things, and heard them. And when I had heard and seen, I fell down to worship before the feet of the angel which shewed me these things.
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Yowani ko. Manoyong o kanimakacita ko so aro a vazay eya. Mamizing ko a macita am meylilitod ko do tangain no tinsi a nimapacita jyaken so aro a vazay eya a amraralay nya.

language1_text: Then saith he unto me, See thou do it not: for I am thy fellowservant, and of thy brethren the prophets, and of them which keep the sayings of this book: worship God.
language2_text: Am maniring jyaken am, "Ji ka akman sang. Ta yaken rana ka nimo a kano akma moy kakteh do cinai a yana panoyonoywan so ciring a kano yamangozay do ciring do vakong eya am to meyyangangay a lamlamsoy na. So ikapyapya na pa ni Ama ta do to a iraralay mo."

language1_text: And he saith unto me, Seal not the sayings of the prophecy of this book: for the time is at hand.
language2_text: Maniring pa jyaken am, "Ji mo naywa o ciriciring do vakong eya, ta makeykai rana o araraw na no ipakaranes no vazay eya.

language1_text: He that is unjust, let him be unjust still: and he which is filthy, let him be filthy still: and he that is righteous, let him be righteous still: and he that is holy, let him be holy still.
language2_text: O meyraraten am jyablis o kapeyraraten da. O mapasagpyan so aktokto da am jyablis o vazay da. O manidong so tao am jyablis o kapanidong da. O ji meylimoteng so onowned am jyablis o kaji da meylimotengan so onowned."

language1_text: And, behold, I come quickly; and my reward is with me, to give every man according as his work shall be.
language2_text: Maniring si Yeso am, "Meytataziman kamo an. Ta yako makeykai rana a mai. Yai ko o nakem ko so omanoyong jyaken a tao am to ko palolwa do kapyapya no iwawalam da o nakem ko sira.

language1_text: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end, the first and the last.
language2_text: Yaken rana am Aarva kano Yamicya. Yaken rana am nikapwan na kano pangavosan na.

language1_text: Blessed are they that do his commandments, that they may have right to the tree of life, and may enter in through the gates into the city.
language2_text: "O manownaw rana so onowned a tao am tey yapya sira. Ta sira rana am sira o apya koman so asi no kayo a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad. So ika sira da no somdep do pazezevngen no ili.

language1_text: For without are dogs, and sorcerers, and whoremongers, and murderers, and idolaters, and whosoever loveth and maketh a lie.
language2_text: Am sira rana somagpyan a kano manlita no oyowyat ni Satan a kano mangzakza so icyatatao da kano mangap so tao a kano manaralay so malas a iraralay a kano jyanoyong so ciring a kano iwawalam am mamimin sira mavezed do pantaw no ili.

language1_text: I Jesus have sent mine angel to testify unto you these things in the churches. I am the root and the offspring of David, and the bright and morning star.
language2_text: "Yaken rana am si Yeso ko. Nimanovoy ko so lamlamsoy ko a tinsi a meylimwang nya jinyo so vazay eya do peycyakyokyokayan na. Yaken rana am sivovoong na yaken ni Tawey. Yaken rana am akmey karow a mata no hanit."

language1_text: And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come. And let him that is athirst come. And whosoever will, let him take the water of life freely.
language2_text: Maniring o Seyzi a kano Macivahavahay a mavakes am, "Mai ka na." O makamizing sya tao am akman kamo sang a manci no, "Mai ka na." Mai kamo a yamawaw a tao. O makza nya am mai mai rana a omyop so ranom a yapwan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad. Am ori rana am abo o ngina na.

language1_text: For I testify unto every man that heareth the words of the prophecy of this book, If any man shall add unto these things, God shall add unto him the plagues that are written in this book:
language2_text: Yaken rana am si Yowani ko. Ko pa pakoyokoin jinyo a ipaziman jinyo a yarana nimakamizing so ciriciring a yadomket do vakong eya tao am: no amyan so tao a omnapnap do ciring eya am itoro na jya ni Ama ta do to o yadomket do vakong a makakaday a alalaw.

language1_text: and if any man shall take away from the words of the book of this prophecy, God shall take away his part out of the book of life, and out of the holy city, and from the things which are written in this book.
language2_text: No amyan so tao a komteb do ciring a yadomket do vakong eya am ji na rana mya ni Ama ta do to a koman so asi no kayo a yanan no to meyyonong a ikavyay no pahad a yadomket do vakong eya. So icyakman na sang a ji na mya a somdep do ili na ni Ama ta do to.

language1_text: He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
language2_text: Si Yeso a yamacyanoyong do aro a ciring eya am na ipanci, "Yamanoyong o kakeykai ko na a mai." Amin. Mo Yeso Kizisto a Panirsirngen, mai ka rana.

language1_text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen. THE END
language2_text: Inaoy si itoro na jinyo o pangangarilawan na ni Yeso a Panirsirngen ta. Amin.
